69a6(tsha): gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nas// rgyal po de ni de dag dang // lhan cig dur khrod rnam pa ra rol// thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis
69a7(tsha): shin tu gdug cing khro drag pa// sems can khams ni rnam sbyangs nas// dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la
69b1(tsha): sogs pa'i// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal rdo rje he ru kas dbugs phyung
69b2(tsha): ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung bas// de
69b3(tsha): tshe sems can thams cad ni// log par lta la gnas par 'gyur// shin tu lta ba ngan pa yis// 'o dod 'bod pa chen por ltung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//
69b4(tsha): byang chub sems ni rnams sbyangs phyir// pad+mo chags par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chos su gnas par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo dmar po 'di// chags pas nyes pa mi gos
69b5(tsha): pas// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa thams cad rnam par dag/ 'di ni kun tu gzigs pa na// rgyal ba dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// dpal ldan spyan ras
69b6(tsha): gzigs kyi dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na// mchod sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dul ba yis ni sna tshogs
69b7(tsha): kyi// sna tshogs pa ni 'dul bar spro// kun tu spyan ras gzigs dpal rgyal// pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// pad+mo sgyu ma mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog
70a1(tsha): des// pad+mo gar dbang la sogs pa'i// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams kyi rnam
70a2(tsha): par sbyangs// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs
70a3(tsha): pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu gdug cing rkam par 'gyur// shin tu 'jungs par gyur pa yis//
70a4(tsha): yi dgas rnams ni dmyal bar ltung // de nas 'phos nas slar yang ni// shin tu dbul por skyes par 'gyur// bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun
70a5(tsha): gsod par byed// shin tu gdug pa sbyang ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// dam pa'i don ni nor chen po// rdo rje nyi ma 'byung bar 'gyur// nam mkha'i snying
70a6(tsha): po thams cad phyogs// kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing khro ba
70a7(tsha): las// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyis nyi ma ni// rab tu gdungs pa kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'brog pas kyang ni khyad pa
70b1(tsha): rgyal bar byas nas gnas gsum gyi// rnal 'byor tshogs kun sdud par byed// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkhan
70b2(tsha): dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rab tu grol// dpal rdo rje nyi mas dbugs phyung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag
70b3(tsha): nyid chen po rtag pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba sa// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin tu chung
70b4(tsha): bar 'gyur// shin tu brtson 'grus chungs pa yis// mnar med pa yi dmyal bar ltung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/
70b5(tsha): drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal ni 'byung bar 'gyur// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi ngo ston du// pha rol gnon pa'i
70b6(tsha): rtsa la dag gis// shin tu gdug cing khro gtum pa'i// sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ byis pa rkun po chom po yis//
70b7(tsha): thams cad rnam par byang bar byed// bris pa dag ni rgyu dag dang // ngo ston stobs kyi de bzhin gshegs// dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten kun lang/
71a1(tsha): rgyal// skye 'gro gnas dang 'gro ba rnams// mtha' dag btul nas 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi rgyal srid
71a2(tsha): rjes su skyong // g.yeng ba rnams la dang sems 'gyur// khro ba rnams la khro bo'i mchog/ zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la drag pos ston// sdig
71a3(tsha): med stobs kyi ngo ston du// dbang phyug dam pa rab gnas nas// lha mo bI ma phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gis spyod// sdig med stobs kyi ngo ston du// mthu
71a4(tsha): bopo che yang rab mnan nas// rug mi rnam yang phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gis spyod// sdig me stobs kyi ngo ston du// skye dgu'i bdag por rab mnan nas//
71a5(tsha): lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs// de tshe longs spyod rang gis spyod// sdig med stobs kyi ngo ston du// 'dod pa'i lha mo rab mnan nas// dga' sdug ma yi dbang phyug ma//
71a6(tsha): phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yos mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// rdo rje'i las
71a7(tsha): mchog rnams gnon pa// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// thabs dang rgyal gyis 'grub pa yis// drag shul sbyor ba bsgrubs nas ni// khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus
71b1(tsha): pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa des thob nas// byang chub sems ni mtha' yas mchog/ drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs
71b2(tsha): kyi ngo ston du// rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'brel// lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bstan pa dang // go 'phab
71b3(tsha): mchog ni rtag pa dang // rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing // 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag/
71b4(tsha): sems can rnams la bstan par sbyin// rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yis// ma lus lus pa med pa yis// bskal pa kun tu srid par gnas// sems can kun gyi don
71b5(tsha): yang byed// de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams rnams rab tu 'grub
71b6(tsha): dpal rta mchog gis dbugs phyung ba'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi
71b7(tsha): mthas klas pa'i// rang 'byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// /
72a1(tsha): thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba mchog las/ gtam gyi phyag rgya shes
72a2(tsha): pa'i rtog pa ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang thams cad du// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog gyur pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkhan
72a3(tsha): 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bshad// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu
72a4(tsha): bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde// de bzhin gshegs pa lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas smras// dril
72a5(tsha): bu rgyul mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bres pa na// rdo rje tshig dang mchod la sogs// glu dang sil snyan rnam par sprul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dag/ mar
72a6(tsha): me dri la sogs ldan 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub// yang nA bde ba'i gnas dgra ga ma// skyed mos
72a7(tsha): tshal la sogs par bsgrub// der ni dang por gdan bshams to// 'jam zhing reg na bo der 'gyur ba// sna tshogs pad+mo ras kyis g.yogs// de ni thams cad dag
72b1(tsha): pa'i gdan// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug rnam sprul pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// des ni rnam par sprul pa mdzad// stan de
72b2(tsha): dag ni thams cad lnga// ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du 'god// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo sogs// sgo srungs dang ni
72b3(tsha): ldan par bya// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// skal bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rtag par bya// mi yi
72b4(tsha): ma tshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin gyis na 'grub pa'o// rdo rje chu dang rdo rjer bcas// mtshal chen po
72b5(tsha): dag bsgrub pa ni// mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste// pad+mo snod kyi nang du bzhag/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs
72b6(tsha): rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen po ni bsgrub pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bsra// dmar
72b7(tsha): chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen dang ni ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbus su gzhag pa ni// ra sa ya na kun slong ba// rang gi lha yi
73a1(tsha): sbyor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtse// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa yis ni dngos grub thob// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi//
73a2(tsha): ra sa ya na bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhon// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis//
73a3(tsha): 'dus pas der ni zhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ongs lding // kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// bdag gis rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun//
73a4(tsha): kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsung ba byas pa dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ba de mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag
73a5(tsha): gis 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus// ci 'dod pa yi gos dang rgyan// sna tshogs gos dag bgos na ni// me tog gos drag kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang
73a6(tsha): po// slong bas dal gyis dal gyis su// gos gdab pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gis 'byung ba bskul bar bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla'i rnams// shar ba dang ni
73a7(tsha): mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams can du grub par 'gyur// nges pa'i lam la kun ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas rnam par brgyan//
73b1(tsha): brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// kun nas slong ba bde ba ni// stong pa shin tu rnal 'byor yid med mthus// nam mkha' bzhin du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde
73b2(tsha): bar gshegs pas bzhes su gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ rgyal ba nyid kyis klu blangs nas// shin tu mya ngan yongs 'das pas// shi
73b3(tsha): ba'ang slar ni slongs 'gyur na// yongs srid pa ta ci zhig smos// lam bzhi dang ni rnam ldan pa'i// rnam par ldan par mdzes par bya// sna tshogs 'phreng ba rab tu
73b4(tsha): 'grub// 'jig rten gsum ni rab bsgrub pa// 'jig rten kun gyis phyag byas pas// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa po// 'jig rten gsum la sgyid sbyin pa// 'jig
73b5(tsha): rten gsum po dag la bsgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal 'byor pa// lha ma kun dang 'grogs pa yis// sna tshogs kun gyis dpal bzang po// a ra la ni kun 'grub
73b6(tsha): 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// lha mo kun dang bde mos pa// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs// nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char// rdo rje sems dpa'
73b7(tsha): yang dag sbyor// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde mchog 'byung // lhan cig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba// brtan zhing grub pa blo byed pa// sna
74a1(tsha): tshogs 'phreng ba de bzhin du// gan d+ha ra b+ha dang sha Ta ra ra ba'i// glu blangs sna tshogs glur bsgrub bo// de nas de nyid dam pa yis// thar pa thams cad rmongs pa
74a2(tsha): yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid la// glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba yi// pad+mo rnam par dag pa'i mchod pa sa gsal ba rjes su
74a3(tsha): mchod byas pa// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas dang ba grub par mdzod// bde ba shin tu rnal 'byor skal bzang mchod dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig rtag la rol cig
74a4(tsha): rol cig ho// kye ma'o mchog tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid// mchog tu bde ba'i rnal 'byor shin tu bskal bzang mchog snyems pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med rtag la
74a5(tsha): rol cig rol cig ho// kye ma mchog tu gsang ba rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir// rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so// 'gro ba'i rgyud 'dis rnam pa sna tshogs
74a6(tsha): 'dul bar gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'o// kye dam pa rtag
74a7(tsha): pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu sgrubs la ston/ dza hU ba ho/ kye ma'o bde mchog bde bas drongs// rnam par sprul pa hUM snang bar mdzod/ a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs
74b1(tsha): pa thams cad kyis// mkha' 'gro'i sgyu ma thams cad kyi// slob ma dag ni bzhugs su gsol// glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas// kun gyi sgra
74b2(tsha): ma bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// glu 'di dag ni len pa na// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam sprul pa// ma luso
74b3(tsha): lus pa med par snang // rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu
74b4(tsha): mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par spru la// rol cig sprul cig/ te na te na te te hUM/ rnam pa mang po rab tu dag pa'i rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul
74b5(tsha): mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab tu sprul// rol cig sprul cig/ hUM hU hU/ rnam pa mang po khro bo rgyud kyi sems
74b6(tsha): can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog rab sprul rnam par sprul// rol cig sprul cig/ o ru lu ru lu hUM/
74b7(tsha): b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa mang po'i srog gi rgyud kyi sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pas// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad
75a1(tsha): rab sprul rnam par sprul// rol cig sprul cig/ hUM shu n+ya a bi shang cu/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam
75a2(tsha): pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi glu yi rgyal// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i
75a3(tsha): dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas// thams cad bdag gis grub par 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang // lha mo kun gyis rab bskul nas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog
75a4(tsha): gi/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las 'byung ba yis// mchod pa'i sprin chen rnam bkod pa// rab 'byams tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// kun gyi
75a5(tsha): bdag gi mchod par byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/
75a6(tsha): ston pas phyag rgya phab pa yis// bud med dag kyang bsgrubs nas ni// rdo rjer bcas pa'i mnyan mar 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams dang //
75a7(tsha): byin gyis brlabs nas bsgrubs pas na// sngon med rol mo'i sil snyan gar// rnam par sprul pas grub par 'gyur// lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dra// ro dang reg pa'i bde mos
75b1(tsha): pabs// bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing // mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pas mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// rnam pa kun
75b2(tsha): tu skal bzang po'i// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba yang dag sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas sgyu mas byin brlabs pa// dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i rnam// dkyil
75b3(tsha): 'khor mthong dka' myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar sbyor ba yis// mthu nyid kyi ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub// sangs
75b4(tsha): rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du// de yis rab mthong mchod pa byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//
75b5(tsha): skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam nyid kyis// dngos grub ma lus lus med 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i//
75b6(tsha): mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi gar dag gis// rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang // de nas yang dag rang gsang bas// bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang //
75b7(tsha): gar gyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub par mdzod//
76a1(tsha): oM A hU/ de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa grub par mdzod// oM AHhUM/ dam tshig dam pa grub par mdzad du gsol// mchod pa chen po thams cad
76a2(tsha): dag par mdzod// oM A hU/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// oM A hU/ glu yi phyag rgya 'di ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' gnas te myur du 'grub/
76a3(tsha): mchod pa ma lus lus pa med pa yis// rab 'byams las la sbyar du rung // gang dag grub par ma gyur dang // mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor pa// phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas
76a4(tsha): na// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang // lha mo bzhi po dag gis ni// me tog la sogs mchod byas nas// slob ma thams cad gzud par
76a5(tsha): bya// dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod par// snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyod nas// de dag gdong gis mdzes pa yis// rang gis g.yogs pa'i gzud par bya// dngos
76a6(tsha): grub ji ltar thob 'dod par// slob ma me tog 'thor du gzhug/ lha mo gang la ltung ba ni// lha de de la grub par 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // yon gyi mchog ni blang
76a7(tsha): bar bya// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas// ji lta bas ni dbang bskur ro// dmar chen po dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba rnams// tshogs kyi dbus
76b1(tsha): su gzhag pa la// g.yon pa mtshams 'dzin rdo rjer bcas// rang gi lhar ni rnal 'byor ldan// srin lag dang ni mthe bong rtses// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin mya ngan// rtag tu
76b2(tsha): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma mchog gis kyang // rgyas mi 'debs shing mi rmongs te// de la gnod par mi
76b3(tsha): 'gyur ro// de na gnas ni grags byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mthun pa yis// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas
76b4(tsha): thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams pa khyed byed na// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha drug dang ni mi rnams dang //
76b5(tsha): de bzhin rnal 'byor grub pa po// de dag la ni snying rings na// snying la khrag chen 'thungs pa zhig/ sems can khams ni ma lus don// srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir// mi
76b6(tsha): 'gag chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// bdag gi ngo bo yongs spangs shing // dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad//
76b7(tsha): 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad las// cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyi khyed ma 'jigs// dam tshig 'da'
77a1(tsha): bar dka' ba'o// grub pa gcig la gcig su spyod// lhan cig spyod pa rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin// yang dag nyid kyi rtag tu
77a2(tsha): brten// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to// rnal
77a3(tsha): 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag gis ye shes rgyas bsgrubs nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed pas// slob ma rnams la bde ba sbyin// slob ma dam pas
77a4(tsha): de phyin chad// phyag rgya ye shes rjes bzung nas// rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid bsgrubs// de nas ro dang zas dang gnas// glu
77a5(tsha): dang sil snyan la sogs pa'i// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag dang gzhan yang 'dod dgus mchod// de nas bdag gis rab bsgrubs
77a6(tsha): nas/ kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ji lta'i tshul gyi 'jug pa yis// bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// rtog pa thams cad rab
77a7(tsha): sgrub cing // rtog pa kun las rab sbyar ba'i// ngo bo nyid ni chen po'i mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'dul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs kyis// sems can rnams
77b1(tsha): la 'dul ba'i phyir// de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam sbyang
77b2(tsha): phyir// grol ba'i mkha' 'gro 'byung bar 'gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin rlabs bsgrubs pa'i rgyas// phyag rgya ji bzhin rjes mthun pa'i// sangs
77b3(tsha): rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig las dang rnam sbyang phyir// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje mkha'
77b4(tsha): 'gro 'byung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang shin tu rnal 'byor pas// ma lus pad+mo rnam sbyang zhing // skal bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba// pad+mo sku la 'byung bar 'gyur//
77b5(tsha): gzhan yang de bzhin bcom ldan 'das// nor gyi mchog gi rnam sbyang phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi bdag mo che// rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid
77b6(tsha): bcom ldan 'das// drag shul sbyor bas sbyang ba'i phyir// rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa// rta mchog rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// rang gi byin
77b7(tsha): rlabs bsgrubs pa'i phyir// gzugs can ngo bor sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o// dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de ltar rnam par spyad nas ni//
78a1(tsha): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bsgrub// kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad
78a2(tsha): kyis// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos po de 'gyur ro// kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni// sangs rgyas sprul pa thams
78a3(tsha): cad kyis// bdag nyid rnam par sprul par ston// lha mo kun dang 'dra ba yis// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas sprul pa sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas sprul pa
78a4(tsha): sgyu ma yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa ston// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma gar byed pa// khams gsum dag ni ma lus par
78a5(tsha): dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// pad+mo sgyu ma'i rnam sprul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin thams cad// sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad mgu bar byed//
78a6(tsha): khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid rab tu che// mjal du ma g.yul 'gyed grub pa dag/ rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam sprul pas// bya ba tha mas cad ston par byed// khams gsum pa
78a7(tsha): yi rgyal srid che// bdag sdug phod pas gnan pa ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab 'joms pas// rta yi gar gyis ston par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos
78b1(tsha): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog go/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de
78b2(tsha): bzhin gshegs// dpal dgyes rol pa rnam sprul pa// sna tshogs kyi ni rnam par rol// rnam pa sna tshogs skal bzang po// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis// 'dul
78b3(tsha): ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrubs// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'
78b4(tsha): dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// bsgrub pa'i
78b5(tsha): dbang phyug dbang bsgrub pas// thams cad bdag nyid gsal bar byed// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams
78b6(tsha): cad mnyam sbyor ba'o// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma ba de mchog las// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor te drug pa'o//
78b7(tsha): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis la// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'i// gsang
79a1(tsha): mchog dag gi dgyes pa ni// thams cad bdag nyid rjes su bsgrub// bden pa yis ni gnas dag gam// rang gi skyed mos tshal la sogs// kun tu
79a2(tsha): sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun tu sna tshogs dgos pa rnams// ci bde ba ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri
79a3(tsha): yi rtse rnams thams cad du// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dgongs pa bsgrub par bya// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // ma mo gnas la sogs 'dug na//
79a4(tsha): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa dag/ rnam pa du ma 'grub par 'gyur// pad+mo skyed mos tshal dag dang // chu bo dang ni mdo dag tu// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rnams//
79a5(tsha): yang dag par ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang // rgyal po skyed mos tshal nyid du// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yis// rgyal po'i dgongs pa bsgrub
79a6(tsha): par bya// mkhar ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo 'gram dag gam// rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru// rdo rje rta ni bsgrub par bya// cha lugs
79a7(tsha): rnam pa sna tshogs dang // bsgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa la// dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu bsgrub// sangs rgyas rnams kyi pad+mo dmar//
79b1(tsha): phyag rgya rdo rje sna tshogs dang // 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar// rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi ser// kha dog kun dang ci 'byor par// bla re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rab tu
79b2(tsha): bsgrub pa dpal// rta mchog rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra bar// bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor lo thams cad ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog
79b3(tsha): gis mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyis// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las// bsod nams rtag pa ci 'dra ba// phyis bris pa yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thig
79b4(tsha): gdab shes rab can// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgrub cing // shar nub lho yi phyogs su'o// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// dkyil 'khor yang dag ci 'dra bar/
79b5(tsha): rab tu rtag par su zhig nus// rang gi lha yi rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor rtag par 'grub par bya// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par
79b6(tsha): bya// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang // nyes pa med de 'grub par 'gyur// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun tu sna tshogs 'khor lo can// kun tu sna tshogs
79b7(tsha): grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu sna tshogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyis// rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin// pad+mo dbang gi pad+mo dbyings// rin chen mchog
80a1(tsha): gi rin chen dbyings// ji ltar 'dod pa ci 'byor pa// ji lta'i dus dang ci bde bar// dkyil 'khor kun tu gnas pa dpal// rta mchog phyag na rdo rje yi//
80a2(tsha): dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing // dam tshig rnams ni yangs pa dag/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bsgrub pa ci yang mi 'grub bo// srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing //
80a3(tsha): dkon mchog gsum ni yongs mi spang // byang chub sems kyang mi gtang ste// slob dpon skal bzang yongs mi gtang // kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// bdag rang bsgrub
80a4(tsha): pas skal ba bzang // bdag med chos dbyings dang ldan pa// dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan// srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das//
80a5(tsha): skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rten na// shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'das// rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpa la// stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas//
80a6(tsha): rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan// 'dod chags thams cad dag mdzad pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzigs kyi dpal// log par lha dang ldan pas na// skal ngan mu stegs
80a7(tsha): 'jig rten na// dam pa'i nor mchog sdud pa'i phyir// skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal// bdag gi bu la'ang ma chags pas// skal ngan dka' thub spyod pa kun// rgyal/ srid
80b1(tsha): mchog rnams kun bsdus nas// rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang // bdag med yongs su 'dzin med pas// thub pa thams cad skal ba ngan// bde ba thams cad bdag bsgrub
80b2(tsha): phyir// kun nas slob dpon skal ba bzang // lta ngan dam tshig la sdang ba'i// slob ma thams cad skal ba ngan// gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'di ni gsal bar shes pa
80b3(tsha): yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// kun gyi slob dpon la gnas pas// 'khor lo 'jug par byed pa na// dkyil
80b4(tsha): 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/ thog ma nyid du gsal brjod pa// kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dri// skal ba bzang la bdag dga' zhes//
80b5(tsha): 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya// gsang ba yang dag 'di shes na// ji ltar 'dod pa rab tu gzhug/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes na// g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya// de ltar
80b6(tsha): dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas// de bzhin shin tu yon phul na// gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas// mi 'gyur ba yi mchog 'grub bo// kun tu sna tshogs bla ma
80b7(tsha): la// yon mchog dag gi dbul bar bya// gang la yongs su gtang dka' gang // de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang gi sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin tu khyad pa
81a1(tsha): can// de dang de yi bla ma la// de nyid mi zad 'dod pas 'bul// yang na de ni 'dod bsgyur ba'am// 'on te sems la dgongs pa dag/ da sbyin yang na
81a2(tsha): dgos par bya// de ni chung yang mchog yin no// de dang gal te mchog bdog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon dbul na// kun gyis slob dpon brnyas pas na// de ni rtag tu sdu/
81a3(tsha): bsngal thob// bu mo shin tu brgyan pa'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rin gyis bslu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon// mi chen dag ni phul
81a4(tsha): nas su// slar yang rin gyis bslu ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yis// yon de mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig bzang po nor bu dang // shin tu dkar ba'i ras zung dang /
81a5(tsha): de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad+mo mchog gi yon mchog ni// rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan gyi tshogs rnams dang // de bzhin mchod pa thams
81a6(tsha): cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// shin tu brgyan pa'i rta dag dang // glang po shin tu brgyan pa dang // shing rta rin chen gang ba dag/ rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no//
81a7(tsha): khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba// mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag/ spyi bo dang ni
81b1(tsha): dpral ba dang // ldan pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru// sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang
81b2(tsha): rtsa ba de bzhin te// thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan la// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu ba dag/ kun tu sna tshogs bla mar ni// kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya// rgyal srid thams cad
81b3(tsha): rnam dag pas// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras// sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dbang bskur bas//
81b4(tsha): slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje khyod// rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin// spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku// nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin//
81b5(tsha): sangs rgyas rin chen pad+mo dang // rdo rje nor bu de bzhin du// thams cad mchog gi rta mchog la// rang gi dbang bskar bsdus pa po// blug pa dang ni byas pa 'am/
81b6(tsha): brdungs pa 'am yang na bris pa'ang rung // sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yis// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu brtag/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po'i// rang byung rnams
81b7(tsha): kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du// skal bzang de bzhin skal ba bza
82a1(tsha): thod pa dang ni kha TA kha// rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad+mo rgya grum dpag med tshe// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe bsgrub pa// lha ma tshogs rnams thams cad
82a2(tsha): kyi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshogs bsgrub gzhan// mda' dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shul phyag rgya mchog/ dpag bsan
82a3(tsha): shing gi lcug ma dang // pad+mo rta mgrin 'phangs mtho ba// rta mgrin ljang khu de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa dang // zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// rin chen sna tshogs snod chen
82a4(tsha): sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa yan// thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshogs bzhin no// gling bu dang ni pi wang kun// ku ma ra dang mu
82a5(tsha): radza// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // sna tshogs dri mas de bzhin no// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i
82a6(tsha): dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dam pa'i tshogs// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub pa'i dbang
82a7(tsha): bskur rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// chos gos dang ni lhung bzed dang // de bzhin du ni 'khar gsil dang // dam pa chos kyi glegs bam
82b1(tsha): dang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshogs bzhin no// de bzhin lce yi phyag rgya dang // cha lang dang ni rnga dag dang // rdo rje dang ni rin chen no// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshogs bzhin no//
82b2(tsha): de bzhin sangs rgyas gzugs can dang // me long dang ni rlung g.ya ba dang // rdo rje ser ba'i sprin dang bcas// de bzhin mig gi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'a bar ba kha Ta
82b3(tsha): kha/ thod pa kha phor de bzhin no// dmar chen dang ni snying chen dang // sha chen po dang rkang chen dang // rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren// chang dang chu dang de bzhin te//
82b4(tsha): lcug ma rlung gi skyod pa dang // sa dang de bzhin ma dang ni// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po dpal// gdug pa thams cad za ba yis// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa'i tshogs// rnal
82b5(tsha): 'byor dngos grub rab bsgrub pa'o// pad+mo sna tshogs dmar po dang // ljang khu de bzhin dkar po dang // mthing kha ser po le brgan dag/ pad+mo mtshan mchog rnam pa bdun
82b6(tsha): pad+mo myang po bud med rgya// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // gsal zhing dpel bskyed rdo rje dag/ pad+mo mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhan no// mda' dang gzhu dang ral gri dang /
82b7(tsha): de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang bskur gter dang rgyal mtshan dang // mchod pa'i mtshan ma bsdus pa'o// de bzhin sna tshogs pad+mo dang // rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin
83a1(tsha): te// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas grub pa yin// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos po brtan g.yom
83a2(tsha): lus kun// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ma tha sa klas pa'i// de skad bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis
83a3(tsha): gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog las// dkyil 'khor tha mas cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa 'a rtog pa sta bra dun pa'o// /
83a4(tsha): / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o//
83a5(tsha): lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes par bsgyur// dpal g.yon pa yi 'gyings pa'i thabs// g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// sri
83a6(tsha): zhur bya zhing steg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis blta// bsam pa g.yos pas phyag bya'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo
83a7(tsha): 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pas// skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na// khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje
83b1(tsha): tshangs par bcas// 'dud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyis thal mo bsgyur// bsam pa g.yos pas phyag
83b2(tsha): byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis// ru lu ru lur bcas bgad nas//
83b3(tsha): tshangs pa nye dbang drag por bcas// khams gsum pa na phyag byed 'gyur// thal mo pad+mo khe phye bzhin// rang gi sa sbyor ldan snying khar bcing // mthe bong mthe'u chung
83b4(tsha): 'dab ma bzhi// rgyas pa 'dud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus kyi yan lag thams cad ni// lus la bskal te phyag bya ba// snying kha dang ni spyi gtsug tu// thal mo sbyar
83b5(tsha): te phyag bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'gyings pa'i thabs// mdzub mo'i mig gis phyag byas na// khams gsum pa yang phyag byed na// mthu snyems gzhan lta ci zhig
83b6(tsha): smos// phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// gar gyi rgyud rnams ji snyed dang // de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu//
83b7(tsha): rang gi don rnams grub byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i tshul byas nas// ji lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa
84a1(tsha): thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcas//
84a2(tsha): g.yas pa bdan gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang // dngos grub chen po mchog kun gyis// dbang phyug chen po 'grub
84a3(tsha): par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa// dpal skal ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// snyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yis// sbyor bas
84a4(tsha): de ni bteg nas su// 'gram pa'i phyogs su yongs sbyar nas// spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag par bya// thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gar byas de nas phab nas
84a5(tsha): su// skal bzang pU zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// dpal skal pa bzang po bde ba chen po zhes bya/
84a6(tsha): ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur ba'i// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni// de bzhin g.yon du bsgyur
84a7(tsha): bar byas// de bzhin sbyor ba gdeg nas kyang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzhag par bya// skal bzang o zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal
84b1(tsha): rdorje sems dpa' thal mo bsgyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur
84b2(tsha): te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// dur khrod cha lugs gar byed pas// phyag rgya 'dis ni gar byed cing // skal bzang rdo rje drag por
84b3(tsha): dgod// mchod pa thams cad 'bul bar bya// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo de/ mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa
84b4(tsha): g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// lag pa g.yas g.yon brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'bul bar bya// dpal
84b5(tsha): pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes 'gyur te// rdo rje rin chen thal sbyar nas/
84b6(tsha): mchod pa thams cad 'bul bar bya// re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yis// dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gyen du 'thar zhing
84b7(tsha): 'thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhin nyug pa dang // me tog bdug pa mar me mchog/ rnga'i mchod pa 'byung ba'o// gang ba 'am 'on te stong pa rung /
85a1(tsha): yang na ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par bsgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams bcings nas
85a2(tsha): ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur// dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang // kun gyis bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam
85a3(tsha): pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// rang byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun// gang dag 'dis ni ma byas shing // spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'i// rlabs chen
85a4(tsha): dam pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang // dngos grub la sa dang bde ba dag/ de yis mi 'grub gang yang
85a5(tsha): med// mchod pa rab 'byams grub pa'i rnams// ma lus lus med grub chen dpal// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
85a6(tsha): sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'grornam 'di la tshag las/ pa thams pad mnyam sbyor ba// dpal ldan bskal pa babyung ba'i dam tshig gi rtag pa ste brgyad pa'o//
85a7(tsha): de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// kun tu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul
85b1(tsha): pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bde ba kun
85b2(tsha): la zhen pa dang // dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsa dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir// chags pa
85b3(tsha): chen po bcom ldan 'das// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'dis// dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// khamaso gsum dag ni rin chen bzhin// sangs rgyas rin chen
85b4(tsha): lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che// dbu rgyan can ni de bas mchog/ gzhan gyi nor min mi 'phrog pas// lha rdzas chu yi dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid dang ni// rang
85b5(tsha): bzhin gyis ni grub pa po// thod pa'i 'phreng ba dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can// kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang // mi mched la sogs de 'grub bo//
85b6(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzangs po// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin//
85b7(tsha): rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum po// rgyas btab rmongs byas bslangs nas ni// las rnams kun las sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab nas ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'od
86a1(tsha): rdzing / lha mo kun mchog dpal dbaldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// ma chog tu dga' ba rab sbyor ba// bsgral pa bzang po dang ldan
86a2(tsha): sems dpa'i bde mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i cha lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa'i skyil mo
86a3(tsha): krung bcas nas// dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo // zla ba kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad
86a4(tsha): dag pa dang // pad+mo 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// brla yi dbus ni dmar la dkar// phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra// de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang // bde bar reg
86a5(tsha): pa'i dbang phyug gis// dkar zhing ser ba'i mdangs dang ldan// lha tshogs sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug pa'i mchog/ pad+ma dam pa sna tshogs la
86a6(tsha): granas pa'i// thams cad dag par rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas pad+mo la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gros// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis//
86a7(tsha): mi phyed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // 'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzad// bdag la rgyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// yan lag thams cad 'phrog pa
86b1(tsha): 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan 'dod pa kun la dbang // bde chen dbang phyug dag dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab
86b2(tsha): tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig gi
86b3(tsha): chags pa bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro//
86b4(tsha): 'ong lding // bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig
86b5(tsha): bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM la bzung ste// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya 'di// pad bcas rdo rje rgya
86b6(tsha): gram mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin tu 'gro zhing lding // rnal 'byor kun gyi dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba
86b7(tsha): rab tu sbyor// bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham por 'grub// bdag la
87a1(tsha): 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba'o// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po yis// phyag rgya 'dis ni rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin tu
87a2(tsha): 'gro 'ong lding // dpal dang ldan pa'i gzhan don 'grub pas// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor ba'o// bskal pa bzang po dpal
87a3(tsha): rje tshe'i bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'
87a4(tsha): dbyings kyi mthas klas pas// rang byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab
87a5(tsha): grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'bab par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so//
87a6(tsha): gtsug lag ji lta'i rjes mthun pa'o// dpal tshogs rdo rje rgya chen gar dag gi/ mda' bzhi yongs su 'phangs pa ni// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'gyur//
87a7(tsha): tshangs pa chen po'i mgo/ dpal rdo rje mda' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa gdeg cing phab pa dang // bshibs te mchongs pa stabs dag gis//
87b1(tsha): 'khor lo phyag rgya bstod pa ni// khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang /
87b2(tsha): 'phrog pa dag gis khyad par du// sna tshogs phyag rgya gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// dpal rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
87b3(tsha): lcug gam gang yang rung ba zung nas// bdag la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// bud med thams cad brten nas ni// dpag pas ma shing dag rab tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje 'dod/
87b4(tsha): po'i lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// myang dang gtub pa ltar byas pas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum
87b5(tsha): dag skams par byed// dpal stag gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sna yi myang ba gtub pa yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs
87b6(tsha): bcas pa'i// sna yi brngubs te myang byas nas// khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed// dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// dmig tshugs zhen par lta/
87b7(tsha): ba yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yis// 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// dpal rdo rje nyi zla me zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
88a1(tsha): thams cad bdag nyid myang ba yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje tshangs bcas pa// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal
88a2(tsha): rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas// tshangs
88a3(tsha): dang nyed dbang drag por bcas// 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gling bu dbang byed ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pi wa nga len pa'i tshul ston
88a4(tsha): pa/ ci ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas// las rnams 'grub par rab 'byams par// dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub// dpal rdo rje pi wang bde bas rmongs pas
88a5(tsha): byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// cang te'u'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa'o// ji ltar 'babs pa'i gar byed pas// rims dang gdon rnams du gzhen pa'i//
88a6(tsha): sdug bsngal thams cad myur du sel// dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdza rnga'i tshul ston rnal
88a7(tsha): 'byor pa// ji ltar bsam pa'i gar byed pas// gnas gsum dag ni ma lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par byed// dpa la rdo rje rdza rnga myos par byed pa zhes bya//
88b1(tsha): ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad byas nas ni// rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lu sa lus pa med par 'grub//
88b2(tsha): rims dang dug dang dbyig dug bya// 'phra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams// bskor ba'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis// skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur// drag po dbang po
88b3(tsha): nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa// rgyas btab rmongs bcas zos pa dag/ skad cig tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas
88b4(tsha): mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// rang byung lha mo'i phyag rgya rnams// mkha' 'gro kun gyis skabs na dpal//
88b5(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'bebs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'
88b6(tsha): 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gi/ rab tu grub pa'i glu rnams kyi sa// bla na med pa'i dngos grub thob// de nas phyag rgya'i shes pa 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje mchog gi glu// las rnam
88b7(tsha): thams cad rab 'grub cing // srid pa shin tu bsgrubs pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzangs dpal// khyod bdag legs bsgrubs rtog par mdzad du gsol//
89a1(tsha): kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid// bde ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul
89a2(tsha): ba'i mchog sgrubs pa/ bdag la sgrub par mdzad du gsol// a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar byed bstan du gsol/ dzaHhU baM ho/
89a3(tsha): kye bde mchog bde bas zung // rnam par sprul/ hUM gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ a la la ho/ de bzhin gshegs pas kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro sgyu mas slob ma
89a4(tsha): gzung du gsol/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyem sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun nas thams cad ni// 'di nyid kyis ni myur du 'grub// sangs
89a5(tsha): rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i rnal 'byor gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//
89a6(tsha): rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam dag phyir// sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// don dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// btso ma gser
89a7(tsha): gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags chen phyir// dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal srid rab bsgrubs pa// rin chen chos
89b1(tsha): las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// grayas pa'i mthe bong gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcas pa yis// sor mo
89b2(tsha): kun la reg pa ni// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin// byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos
89b3(tsha): kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab nas ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// rab tu grags par gyur pa yin
89b4(tsha): byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de// sangs rgyas nyid du rig par bya// mchog tu brtag pa'i sangs rgyas so// gang gis ldan pa 'di
89b5(tsha): mthong zhing // rnam pa kun gyi mchod byed na// de yis sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog/ mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos
89b6(tsha): kyi 'khor lo legs par bskor// dpal gyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i yal ga gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yal ga kun las rgyal//
89b7(tsha): sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i skyil mo krung ngo // rdo rje khu tshur bcas
90a1(tsha): nas su// sangs rgyas kun blo dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dag/
90a2(tsha): dpa' bo blo yi dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// pang mo'i bud med khu tshur ni// de bzhin g.yon par bkan na yang // byang chub spyod par rab bsgrub
90a3(tsha): rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pa bkab nas ni// sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus
90a4(tsha): lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pa bkab nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par
90a5(tsha): 'grub/ bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su// lag pa g.yon pa bkab nas ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rta
90a6(tsha): mchog dpal gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pa bkra ba nas kyang // thams cad 'gugs par rab 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal 'grub
90a7(tsha): can gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pa bkab nas ni// snang ba thams cad rab 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dang bor sangs rgyas kun gyi blo//
90b1(tsha): gnyis pa de bzhin dpa' bo yin// gsum pa kun tu bzang po'o// bzhi pa mi zad snod yin no// sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzangs gzungs
90b2(tsha): ma yin/ sprin chen po ni bdun pa ste// brgyad pa nam nyi can yin no// gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gis// sangs
90b3(tsha): rgyas sprul pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// glu mchog de ni grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad rab 'grub pas// slong bar byed pa rab grub pa//
90b4(tsha): de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/ shra rdza dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// dre ba de yi glu blangs so// 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grangs med khyab par spros pa yis//
90b5(tsha): rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu 'phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs skad ni// sprul pa'i sku rnams rab tu 'phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni// sred pa'i bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam/
90b6(tsha): sprul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sprul par mdzod// ho/ dpal rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba/ a la la ho/ de ring bdag la grub
90b7(tsha): par mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ grub par gyur pa gdon mi za// de nas bud
91a1(tsha): med bzhi rnams dang // rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod par 'bul// de bzhin gshegs
91a2(tsha): pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod
91a3(tsha): dpal gyi phyag rgyar gsal// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa las// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi// rnal 'byor bde mchog dam par
91a4(tsha): 'gyur// sangs rgyas khro chung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa'i sngon por 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar por snang // gzhan
91a5(tsha): gyis ma yin mi 'phrog pas// lha rdzus chu yi dag pa ste// de nas rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos chen po dang blugs pa che// sha chen po
91a6(tsha): po dang sbrang rtsi che// dur khrod kun gyi 'byung po yis// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyag mchog/ shin tu khro gdug gtum pa yi sa// sems can khams ni rnam sbyong phyir//
91a7(tsha): 'di ni dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog/ thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu rgyan mchog/ sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ rgyal srid thams cad rab tu
91b1(tsha): 'grub// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan he ru ka 'babs pa'i// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam
91b2(tsha): sprul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byed de zos nas// thal bar gyur pa yang 'tsho bar byed// dpal ldan rdo rje he/
91b3(tsha): ru ka/ rdo rje babs pa rnam sprul pa// pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha'i tshul du// kha TA kha la rgyab brten byas// lag pa g.yo
91b4(tsha): pa thod pa thogs// g.yas pa ba dran gsum par bya// nam mkha'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/
91b5(tsha): dngos po thams cad mkha' las byin// phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// nam mkha' las ni kun lhag ste// bdag gis
91b6(tsha): spyad par de spyod do// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla mkha' 'gro mi zad tshogs// mkha' las rgyu ma kun blangs nas// lus pa med par kun za'o// nam
91b7(tsha): mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i bde mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i
92a1(tsha): sbyor ba yis// bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pa'i// skyil mo krung ni byed bcas la// rkang pa rang gi brla gnan nas// drug po dbang po nye dbang
92a2(tsha): bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par gnas pa yis// rgyas gdab slong byas blangs nas su// gar dag byed cing de za'o// de dag gis ni sbyor ba yis// de nas nye ba brla
92a3(tsha): brdams pas// legs par gdams te cher gtags nas// rab tu bkrem ste gtung bar bya// bsgrub pa de dag nyid kyi sa ni// de nas brla phrag bskyod pa yis// skal
92a4(tsha): bzang mi dang lha rnams kyis// bud med kun la de spyod do// bde bar reg pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba skal bzang po/ dpal rdo rje drag po gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag
92a5(tsha): rgya'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan he ru ka 'bab pa yis// phyag rgya sna tshogs gnas
92a6(tsha): pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' bar gar byed 'gyur dang bcas// shi pA ldang ba'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i phyag rgyar ba tu gnas// zhi dang drag po
92a7(tsha): rmongs byed dang // gyen dang dbugs 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya grub pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i sbyor ba bde mchog gis// me tog bdug pa sbyor ba'i mchog
92b1(tsha): chang dang chu dang lcug ma dang // ras dang me tong grub pa yis// khyad par du ni rgyas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba gnyer ba bde ba sbyin// mdo
92b2(tsha): par gtong zhing so gol gtogs// dal bus gyen du dbugs 'byin pas// g.yon du lta zhing lag pas 'dren// 'o byed 'khyud pas de bzhin te// gar byed rab tu rmongs
92b3(tsha): pa dang // za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum la sa rgal// de bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang // rang gi
92b4(tsha): phyag rgya tshul ston dang // dur khrod dag gis gar byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jigs pa sreg pa yis// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas//
92b5(tsha): dang po rgyas 'debs ma yi rgya// snying 'dren ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin tu rmongs byed ma'i// de bzhin zhi ba 'deg byed ma'i// lnga pa gar byed ma yi rgya// drug pa
92b6(tsha): gsod byed yin par bshad// bdun pa zam mo yi rgya// brgyad pa las kyi phyag rgya yin// de bas phyag rgya 'di kun gyis// phyag rgya'i las rnams bla na med// phyag rgya
92b7(tsha): bdag nyid kun 'joms pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje pad+mo slang // gar dag byed cing byas na ni// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar
93a1(tsha): 'gyur ba'ang 'tsho bar byed// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// dpal ldan rdo rje sbyor ba'i glu// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa'i// khyad par du ni
93a2(tsha): bshad par bya// gzigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i rgyas thob la// rnam pa sna tshogs 'o byed 'khyud pa sa rmongs mdzad de// rnam pa sna tshogs bde ba'i mchod ston kun
93a3(tsha): gsol la// rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog ngo mtshar bstan du gsol// rgyas btab rmongs byas ma nabs su gsol// bde mchog ngo mtshar bde bar bzhugs// hUM/ a la
93a4(tsha): la ho snang bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag lnga 'jug tu gsol// nyon mongs dag las rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa dag mnapas su
93a5(tsha): gsol// nyon mongs thams cad gsal bar mdzod// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rdo rje thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za
93a6(tsha): bar grub par 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod
93a7(tsha): chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i phyag rgya dpal du gnas// mi 'gyur dam pa dag pa'i phyir// shel sgong bzhin du dag pa 'dra// 'dod chags thams cad gsal
93b1(tsha): ba'i phyir// 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrig pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas tshe yi rin chen spras// gos dang sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis//
93b2(tsha): bde ba can bzhin dam par 'gyur// gar thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// yongs su bsgyur zhing gar byed pas// pad+mo mtshan mchog pad+mor bcas// phyag ni rgya rnams
93b3(tsha): 'khor lo bskor// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// pad+mo sgyu ma rnam sbyangs phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrub par mdzad// 'dul ba'i
93b4(tsha): thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// skal ba bzang po dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag rgya yis// skyil mo krung
93b5(tsha): ni phyed mar gnas// rgyal po'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// dpal pad+mo rgyal po gnas zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
93b6(tsha): bsnyems pa'i yan lag g.yon pa yis// pad+mo dmar mo ci bde bzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren pa'i tshul// pad+mo 'dab ma kha phye ba'o// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon
93b7(tsha): pa yis// pad+mo sngon po bde ba bzung // rang gi snying khar 'dren tshul gyis// bud med phyag rgya bcings par bya// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo
94a1(tsha): dkar po ci bder bzung // 'khor lo phyag rgya bcings nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo
94a2(tsha): mthing kha ci bder bzung // lag pa g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pa// dpal gyi phyag rgya ba dan gsum// bskyems pa'i phyag rgya g.yon pa yis// pad+mo ser po tri ba der bzung
94a3(tsha): g.yas pa rab tu gar byed pas// chu srin tshul du bsgrengs par bya// bsnyems pa'i lag pa g.yon pa yis// pad+mo le brgan mcho ga bzung ste// rang gi snying khar 'dren
94a4(tsha): tshul gyis// rdo rje phyag rgya bcings par bya// rnam pa ra gzigs pa'i rnam dag dpal// sgrol ma byang chub mchog yin no// rgya chen ma yi 'khor lo bskor// khro gnyen
94a5(tsha): ma yi phyag rgya'i lan// pad+mo gnas pa'i dpal chen yin// 'dod pa'i dbang po 'gro ba gsum// dpal pad+mo rgyal po'i rig pa'i lha chen mo rnams so// de nas phyag
94a6(tsha): / rgya shes pa 'di// pad+mo rgyal po dpal gyi glu// las rnams tha mas cad rab grub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la sogs pa'i
94a7(tsha): gzugs mchog sna tshogs 'dzin// sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba mchog gi dngos grub mchog mnga' ba// kye sems dpa' pad+mo dga' mchog sgyu ma'i
94b1(tsha): dga' ba bstan du gsol// a la la ho/ kye gar dbang thar pa'i dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bdag tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang phyug bdag/
94b2(tsha): nyi zla dbang phyug a la la ho// pad+mo sgyu ma dpal/ rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mdzad pa'i tshul gyis mdzad pa// pad+mo'i dam tshig dbang phyug/ sangs rgyas gar rnams mdzad du
94b3(tsha): gsol// 'dod chags rnam par sbyong ba thams cad da dung rnam par skyongs// pad+mo 'dzin pa de yi spyan sngar gar mdzod cig/ glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// sna tshogs
94b4(tsha): pad+mo mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar grub par 'gyur// dpal pad+mo gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o//
94b5(tsha): rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa'ade bzhin gshegs// nor mchog rnam par sbyangs pa'i phyir// dpal ldan nyi ma phyag rgyar gnas// nam mkha'i
94b6(tsha): snying po thams cad phyogs// re ba thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ rin chen thams cad mkhas las 'bebs// shin tu gdug cing
94b7(tsha): khro bo las// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// dam pa'i don du drag por 'gyur// drag por 'dul ba'i 'jig rten rnams// drag po nyid
95a1(tsha): kyis sgrub par byed// nyi ma'i gzugs dang spyod lam dang // tshul dang gzi brjid chen por ston// rdo rje gzhu dang mda' mchog dag/ shin tu legs par
95a2(tsha): 'gengs pa ste// mdangs gsal 'dzum dang bcas pa'i rgyan// g.yon pa 'byed cing gyen du 'degs// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa//
95a3(tsha): 'jig rten gsum po ma lus par// drag shul nyid kyis 'dul bar bshad// dpal khams gsum rnam pa ra rgyal ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje pus
95a4(tsha): mo gnyis bcings te// rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas nas// bdag gis stan la 'dug nas ni// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyi ma'i
95a5(tsha): / skyil mo krung ngo // dbang bskur ba dang gter bdag dang // rgyal mtshan mchog ldan mchod pa che// ji ltar tshul rnams ston pa dag/ rang gis don rnams rab bsgrub pa'o//
95a6(tsha): de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// rgyal po sgyu ma mchog gi glu// las rnams thams cad rab grub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// khams gsum kun gyi rgyal srid sna tshogs
95a7(tsha): mchog gi nor ldan pas// 'jal 'dul g.yul 'gyed rnams kyang khyad par sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba// rnam pa sna tshogs 'jal 'dum rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan
95b1(tsha): na// rdo rje nyi ma'i rgyal po'i sgyu ma bstan du gsol// sems can sprin la byang chub mchog gi sbyin pa 'char 'bebs pa// bdag gi re ba kun bsgrub myur du ston// a la la so//
95b2(tsha): mi zad gter gyi dbang bskur khyad par bdag la stsal du gsol// khyad par 'di dag thams cad bud med rin chen thams cad phyir// rin chen sna tshogs kun nang na// bud med
95b3(tsha): rin chen gcig pu mchog/ bud med rin chen dag pas dma' ba'i rin du thams cad 'gro// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha'
95b4(tsha): 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyi ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das//
95b5(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor bas rnam sbyong dpal// rta yi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyi rnga rtan
95b6(tsha): rab tu gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'joms// 'dod chags can la g.yem par ston// gdug pa rnams la gdug par ston// zhi ba
95b7(tsha): rnams la zhi bar 'gyur// drag shul can la drag shu la sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la mig bzhi pa// brdzi nan rgyal po chen po ston pa'i dbang
96a1(tsha): phyug dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// g.yon gyi khu tshur mdzub mo yis// dpal ldan pad+mo sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje bcas shing slong bas 'grub// g.yas pa
96a2(tsha): ba dan gsum pa bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab nas ni// shin tu gtung bar 'gyur ba yang // de ma thag tu kun blangs nas// gdang ba thams cad rab tu 'grub// thams cad
96a3(tsha): dag par mnyam sbyor ba// skal ba bzang po'i dpal rdo rje slong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// brkyang bskum pa yi tshul byas nas//
96a4(tsha): khro bo'i skyil mo krung bcas te// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu bshig/ dpal rdo rje khra bo gnas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya shes pa 'di// rta mchog dpal dang ldan pa'i sku/
96a5(tsha): las rnams thams cad rab grub pa// khyad par du ni bshad par bya// mos byed stong pas lhag par bde bar 'dod pa'i gzugs ston pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis gshin rje
96a6(tsha): stong pas lhag par rab tu 'jigs// zhi ba'i sku yang tshangs pa sa stong pas shin tu lhag par stong // dkyil 'khor kun gyi mchog tu de bzhin gshegs kun grub par mdzod//
96a7(tsha): thams cad rnam dag mo sa pas ngos ston stobs kyis gnon pas gnon// he he he he he/ dbang phyug thams cad rab shig rab tu shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i
96b1(tsha): ngo ston stobs kyis dbang phyug gnon// sbyor chen du khA hu lu/ mi gsum pa las gsum 'grub drongs// rab kyi rtsal gyis gnon pa'i stobs kyis mthu chen gnon/
96b2(tsha): mnyam sbyor ru tA ma drang snying las dpal mo drongs shig rab drongs shig/ rab kyi rtsal gyis mnon pa'i stobs kyis ngo ston tshangs pa mnon// sbyor chen tshangs pa las
96b3(tsha): grol ma drongs shing // s+thA ra ra ta/ rab kyi rtsal gyis mnon pa'i stobs kyi ngo ston dag dbang ma non// mnyam sbyor ba kun gyis bdag drongs// a la la ho/ gdug cing khro la
96b4(tsha): / rab tu gtum pa'i stobs kyis sems can bsgral ba'i phyir bsgrub la bzhugs// a la la ho/ oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha ni hUM phaT phaT/ dza pho mi la bya 'am mi bya yongs rtog de dag med
96b5(tsha): kyang bla// de 'dre'i mdza' bo sgyu ma yin pas// de la mdza' bo zhes bya ni su zhig zer// dgol ba gang la byas/ mi bya yongs su rtog pa med kyang / de 'dre'i rgol ba rgya ma
96b6(tsha): yin pas/ de la dpe zhes su zhig zer// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// rta mchog mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ gdon mi za ba grub
96b7(tsha): par 'gyur// thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o// mdzub mos mthe bong mnan nas ni// rang gis mthe bos mdzub mo mnan// dpal grub can gyi
97a1(tsha): phyag rgya ste// mdzub mo mig gis 'bru bar bya// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor nus// rdo rje can ni gnyis dag tu// khong stong du ni sbyin par bya// dpal grub
97a2(tsha): pa rdo rje spyan ni// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur// dpal grub spyan ni grub pa ste// sems can thams
97a3(tsha): cad dbang byed pa// las kyi dngos grub rab 'byams rnams// ma lus dngos grub myur du 'grub// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo dgug/ mthe
97a4(tsha): bong gnyis ni rtse mo mnyam par pa zhag/ khong stong mi 'gyur dam pa'o// spyi bo mtshams su rab bzhag rnams// 'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni// sangs rgyas dngos grub
97a5(tsha): ma lus pa// lus pa med par rab tu 'grub// sems dpa' gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dbye// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo dgug/ mthe
97a6(tsha): bo pa gnyis ni mche ba gtsags// 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// grub pa bdud la sogs pa za// de bzhin du ni rmongs par byed// 'bab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub//
97a7(tsha): de bzhin rnam par shes pa bsgrub// gter rnams sbyin par byed pa yang // de bzhin nor kun 'phrog par byed// ngal pos kyis ni dpal mnan te// dpal mo dag kyang phrogs
97b1(tsha): nas ni// ma ngag gzhug ma ni byed pa dang // gnod sbyin ma dang dga' ba byed// gnod sbyin dag ni ded dpon kun// 'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// dpal rdo rje gnod
97b2(tsha): sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor nas// gung mo mnyam par rab tu bsgrub// mthe bong mthe'u chung 'dab ma bzhi// pad+mo dro med rab tu rgyas//
97b3(tsha): 'dis ni sdig rnams byang bar 'gyur// sdig pa byang na rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub mngon sangs rgyas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// dpal pad+mo rgyas
97b4(tsha): pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyor la// mdzub mo mnyam par phyir bkug ste// rdo rje mthe bong rdo rje g.yog par ni// rdo rje dpal gyi nor bu ste// phyag
97b5(tsha): rgya 'di yis btab na ni// nam mkha' thams cad rab grub ste// bud med la sogs rin chen gtor// mkha' las dngos rnams thams cad gcod// rdo rje thal mo mnyam
97b6(tsha): sbyor nas// mthe'u chung srin lag mnyam par brkyang // mdzub mo rtse ma nyam bkug pa ni// dpal mchog rta zhes grag sra pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni/
97b7(tsha): sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'brel na// thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dpal// lha mi skal bzang smos ci dgos// dam tshig gi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lus dang ngag sems
98a1(tsha): rdo rje yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ldan byas te// thams cad 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis lhar ni bdag nyid bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas thams cad dpal
98a2(tsha): de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam
98a3(tsha): pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ mi 'gyur 'byor par mi 'gyur ba'i// dam
98a4(tsha): pa rgya chen gang med pa// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dpal sbyor// ci ltar gzugs dang dbyibs su ldan// bde nyid
98a5(tsha): kyis ni kun gyi bdag/ kun gyi bdag la bzhugs par bya// phyag rgya 'di yi rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rgyal po sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra// rdo rje
98a6(tsha): sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// chags pa
98a7(tsha): med cing ma chags med// dbu ma dmigs su yod pa med// bud med kun gyi rgyu sbyor 'dis// gnyis su med pa theg pa mchog/ phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa
98b1(tsha): bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // dpal ldan sgyu ma kun gyis bdag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// sgyu ma thams cad lha mo'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// yod pa ma yin med pa min//
98b2(tsha): dbu ma dmigs su yod pa min// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang
98b3(tsha): mtshan nyid med// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// ji ltar sgyu ma thams cad du// mthong ba dang ni reg par 'gyur// dmigs su yod pa
98b4(tsha): ma yin te// de bzhin 'gro ba kun gyi tshul// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' la dngos
98b5(tsha): rnams thams cad spyod// dngos po med par bdag sbyor bas// nam mkha' kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ shin tu rtag par bsgrub
98b6(tsha): par 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo dmar po ni// chags pa'i nyes pa mi dgos pa// rnal 'byor ldan pas de bzhin du// gnas kyi nyes pa yongs mi dgos// shin tu gdug
98b7(tsha): cing drag po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyis sbyor bas ni// rnam par rgyas phyir rab tu drag/ thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig
99a1(tsha): med stobs kyis ngo thon du// drag shu la sbyor bas mnyam sbyor ba// 'jig rten thams cad gzhom par bya/ sbyor ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// sbyor ba ji snyed
99a2(tsha): yod kun tu// byed pa rnam pa sna tshogs la// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya// dngos grub thams cad rab bsgrub bo// byed pa'i phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis// 'dod pa bzhin tu 'gro
99a3(tsha): 'od lding // chags pa chen po dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang po// dpal dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
99a4(tsha): bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // khyad par du ni 'phrog pa dang // yan lag kun tu byed pa yis// de ni nor rnams kun kyang 'phrog/ 'o byed 'khyud la sogs pa yis// khams
99a5(tsha): gsum pa yang rgyas 'debs so// thar pa byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba'ang mod la gsos par byed// sbyor ba'i longs spyod thams cad kyis// gnas gsum po ni ma
99a6(tsha): lus par// rgyas btab rmongs byas spangs nas su// gar byas nas ni za bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyis bde myong bas// khams gsum pa ni ma lus par// rgyas btab
99a7(tsha): rmongs byas zos pa dang // thal bar gyur yang 'tsho bar byed// sbyor ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o// lha mo kun gyis sbyor ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur
99b1(tsha): zhing // bde ba myong nas rab sbyor ba// mdzes par lta ba'i gar byed pas// sangs rgyas thams cad pad+mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa
99b2(tsha): dag/ thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sa sgyu ma rgya// mdzes pa'i zhal ni rnam bsgyur ba// ri mor bcas shing stegs pa'i mchog/ mdzes par lha/
99b3(tsha): bas gar byas pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas spangs nas ni// zos nas slar yang 'tsho bar byed// sangs rgyas
99b4(tsha): byang chub mnyam sbyor ba// rab tu dga' bar lta zhing 'dzum// shin tu rtsad pa yang dag bsgrub// gsang bar lta ba'i gnas nas ni// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas//
99b5(tsha): nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// srid pa shin tu kun bsgrubs nas// gnas gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// rtags la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan// mdzes pa'i bzhin
99b6(tsha): ni rnam bsgyur zhing // rim gror bcas shing rdeg pa'i mchog/ steg pa'i lta bas gar byed cing // mdzes pa'i tshul dang thabs rnams kyis// drag po dbang po nye dbang
99b7(tsha): bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yis// 'jig rten gsum dag grub par byed// mche ba cung zad gtsigs pa'i kha/ khro zhing 'dzum dang bcas pa'i bzhin// khro ba
100a1(tsha): las gyur bcas shing 'dzum// gsal bar lta zhing legs par gnas// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs pa yis// rgya la
100a2(tsha): po'i sgyu mas rnam rgyal nas// khams gsum dag ni sgrub par byed// 'dod chags myong bas g.yem sbyor bas// mdzes pa'i bzhin ni rnam par 'gyur// 'di ni bzhin gyi phyag
100a3(tsha): rgya mchog/ khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// drag po mche ba rnon po gtsigs// gdug pa za ba 'jigs 'jigs pa lta// g.yas kyi bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams
100a4(tsha): gsum dag kyang zla bar byed// dngos grub kun gyis bde ba mchog/ rab tu dga' bar blta zhing 'dzum// g.yon pa bzhin gyi phyag rgya yis// khams gsum dag ni thar par byed//
100a5(tsha): spyi bor rta mgrin gsang mtho ba// rta gdong ldang ser kha dog gsal// so gtsigs pas ni ma chu mnan nas// 'jig rten thams cad 'jig par byed// bzhin gyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//
100a6(tsha): lha mo kun gyis bde ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i ma mchu sos mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// 'dod chags bde
100a7(tsha): bas g.yen skyobs// steg pa'i ma mchus so mnan pa'i// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sbyor ba kun gyi bde ba'i mchog
100b1(tsha): mdzes pa'i ma mchus g.yo bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di yis// khams gsum dag kyang dga' bar byed// sha chen gyis ni ro myong zhing // ma mchu so yis mnan
100b2(tsha): pa yi// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya mchog 'di yis// khams gsum dag kyang za bar byed// bde ba kun gyi ro myong zhing // ma mchu rnam par mdzes byas pas// 'dzum pa'i
100b3(tsha): phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// thal bar gyur pa 'ang 'tsho bar byed// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// bde ba myong bar rab sbyor ba// za ma zim lta ba rnam bsgyur ba// rgyas btab
100b4(tsha): rmongs byas zos pa yis// khams gsum dag kyang 'tsho bar byed// bud med mkhas pa sa sgyu ma'i mchog/ mdzes par blta ba'i gar byas pas// rgyas btab rmongs byas
100b5(tsha): slang nas ni// khams gsum dag kyang sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas gsang ba'i mnyam sbyor ba// lta ba rab zhi bde bar gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// bud med
100b6(tsha): thams cad dbang du byed// smin mtshams khro gnyer bsgyur ba bcas// lta ba rab 'a bar rnam par 'gyur// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang 'bar
100b7(tsha): bar byed// khro zhing 'gyur dang bcas pa 'dzum// lta ba gsal bar mdzes par gnas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khros pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// steg la sogs
101a1(tsha): pa'i ro dang ldan// rtag bcas lta ba'i gar byed pas// lta ba'i phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// khams gsum dag kyang gar byed 'jug/ lta ba'i phyag rgya shes
101a2(tsha): pa'o// na mo gu ru sarba bud de bya/ zhes pa'i phyag rgya ma gnas la// lus dang mchod pa ma lus pa// lus pa med pa thams cad 'grub// rang 'byung rnams kyis mchod pa
101a3(tsha): kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi ma thas klas pa// lan cig brjod pas grub pa yis// dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'dis// spel bar
101a4(tsha): yang ni mang gyur yang // dam pa rgya chen de dgra med// oM ru ru ru tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha le tsa ne sarba sa te ni swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mchog 'di ni// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa/
101a5(tsha): stobs kyis myur du bkug nas ni// bran bzhin du ni byed du 'jug/ su bA ga ta/ ma haM na de ba hi ri mi ri ri ni shri ya/ chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba kun sbyin
101a6(tsha): pa'o// oM tA re tud ta re tu re swA hA/ chos kyi phyag rgya la gnas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub na// bud med gzhan lta ci zhig smos// traM b+ha b+ha ta ta/ tratratra tra dra dra ta/
101a7(tsha): re ba thams cad kun rdzogs pa// chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa 'di// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// shri badz+ra pad+ma ba ta ba mu ka yo/ ki ni sho ri hi hi hi/ thi chos kyi phyag rgya
101b1(tsha): dam pa 'dis// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi dbang phyug shes pa'o// skad kyis gsang ni mthon dman gre bsgyur bcos shing bzlas pa dang // dus su rab
101b2(tsha): zhi mchog rnams kyis// hU la sogs pa'i glu blangs shing // tshig rnams kun gyi ci 'dod par// ji ltar spros pa'i glu kun gyis// hUM gi glu'i phyag rgya dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
101b3(tsha): rab grub pa'o// lha mo kun gyis lha mo mchog/ cha lus bzhin du gar bya zhing // ka ka l+ye sha ta wa la sogs// glu rnams thams cad rjes su blangs// oM zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya//
101b4(tsha): tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis ci dgar byung // ma lus lus pa med pa yis// sems can thams cad thar par byed// gdung ba'i dbyangs dang thugs kyi sgra// rdo rje drag po gang mo
101b5(tsha): che/ khur ba'i dbugs kyi glu 'byin cing // 'brug gi spa ltar zab pa yi// o ru lu ru lu hu N+yo hU~M/ zhes pa yi ni sgra phyung na// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// khams
101b6(tsha): gsum dag kyang rgyas 'debs shing // thal bar byed cing gsod par byed// shi ba 'am mod la 'tsho bar byed// rdo rje drag tu dgod pa'i phyag rgya'o// the zhes bya ba
101b7(tsha): glu yi rgya// thams cad dag par bsgrub pa'o// hri zhes bya ba'i glu yi rgya// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar byed// ka ka l+yang dang tsau ri'i dbyangs// de bzhin rab tu dbyangs snyan
102a1(tsha): dang // ka ka kha yi glu yi rgya// 'joms pa thams cad sgrub pa'o// glu yi phyag rgya shes pa'o// gling bu dang ni rgyud gcig dang // de bzhin rgyud mangs rgyud sdug
102a2(tsha): dang // sil snyan phyag rgya bshad pa rnams// las rnams thams cad grub pa'o// cha lugs bzhin du gar byed pas// ma brdungs par yang rab tu 'grub// las rnams kun la
102a3(tsha): mchog tu ni// brdungs nas dpal ni bzhir 'gyur 'grub// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig dang // bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam par sel la sogs pa'i thabs// dngos grub
102a4(tsha): thams cad 'grub pa'o// dza hUM ba ho/ du du mA te/ sma ra ma Ta/ hu lu hu lu/ pra sri tar+yA/ hUM tsakrI dza dza ni du ni/ hU dug tu hUM dza dza/ hu lu hu lu/ a a la ho/ shur+d+ha/
102a5(tsha): sir+b+ba/ da ri sha ya/ sarba ta g+he g+he ne ne/ ta g+he g+he ta g+hen+te g+he na/ g+hen g+hen g+hen/ ta ge ho na do g+hen g+hen+to/ Tak+ki hU dza/ g+hen+ta go to ti ka ki hU/ ga du mA a la la ho/ ru ru ma te/ thal
102a6(tsha): mo brdabs pa sa rtag pa'o// ta g+he na g+hen/ ta g+he nA g+he na/ ta g+hen/ ta g+he na/ g+he ta g+hen/ g+he ta g+han/ rgyud kyi sngags lo// aM a aM/ ba ba baM/ d+ha d+ha haM/ tshig gsum gyi
