135a4(tsha): 'khor spyod yul bstan pa ste le'u drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos rang rang gis theg pa gsang bar gsungs so//
135a5(tsha): 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa la// lta ba'i don la kun kyang gnas// lta bas ma khyab gcig kyang med// theg par zhugs pa shin tu nyung // 'jig rten mtha' mar ngo
135a6(tsha): mtshar can// gzhan lus bsad nas rang lus gso// 'di bde phye ma ma shes pa// 'jig rten rgyang 'phan lta bar ba shad// kha cig skye bo sman pa yis// 'di dang
135a7(tsha): phyi ma'i don ma go/ bya ba gnyis dang bral gyur pa// 'jig rten phyal ba'i lta bar bshad// rang sems snying gi dkyil gnas nas// byed pa po ru de 'dod rtag/ las
135b1(tsha): 'bras bden pa'i don med cing // thams cad mi 'dod chad par lha// mu stegs rtag chad lta ba ni// log pa'i theg pa lam du zhugs// 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa//
135b2(tsha): zag pa bcas rnams sdug bsngal zhing // chos rnams kun la bdag med pas// mya ngan 'das pa thams cad zhi// 'di ni chos rtag phyag rgya bzhi// 'di 'dod 'das
135b3(tsha): pa'i theg par bshad// sems nyid sangs rgyas rgyu dang shes pas// rgyu la sbyor ba rgyu yi chos// bsod nams tshogs dang ye shes tshogs// rdzogs nas bskal par tshogs
135b4(tsha): bsags pa'i// dus tshig phyi mar 'bras bu thob// mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg par bshad// rang sems sku gsum 'bras bur lha// bya ba spyod pa rnal 'byor rgyud//
135b5(tsha): gzugs sku lha yi 'bras bur sgom// rnal 'byor chen po longs sku bsgrub// rjes su rnal 'byor spru la sku'i lam// rdzogs chen chos sku chen por blta// 'bras bu
135b6(tsha): lam du byed pas na// tshwa gcig lus gcig mngon sangs rgyus// dge pa brtsa la legs spyad pas// mtho ris lha mi thob par 'gyur// mi dge'i las rnams
135b7(tsha): spyad pa yis// ngan song gsum du gzhol bar 'gyur// sdig spang dge sbyong lam du zhugs// 'di ni lha ma'i theg pa yin// byams pa da 'bor rnam par byang/
136a1(tsha): gnyis pa snying rje chen po la// gsum pa la ni dga' ba ste// kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms nyid// 'dir ni tshangs gnas gzugs khams yin//
136a2(tsha): rtog spyod dga' ba de gzugs khams 'grub// bzhi gnas tsam la mngon par zhe na// rnam shes don la rigs bzhir 'dzin// lhag mthong rgyab kyis phyogs pa ni//
136a3(tsha): gzugs med khams gsum skye bar byed// mi dmigs chos kyi lam zhugs pas// tshangs pa khyab 'jug gu lang dang // lha chen go 'bang thob par 'gyur// de phyir
136a4(tsha): 'di dag mchod par bya// dmigs pa phra ba'i rang rgyal bas// yid bzhin bde ba mchog gis// bas ru ne tso lta bu yi// 'bras bu dam pa thob par 'dod// mos pa
136a5(tsha): chung ba'i nyan thos pas// rgyun du zhugs dang phyir la 'ong // sA brgyad skyong bas phyir mi 'ong // dgra bcom 'bras bu thob par 'dod// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
136a6(tsha): 'di// pha rol phyin bcu'i lam zhugs pas// sa bcu rims kyis bgrod gyur nas// bcu gcig kun tu 'od yang thob// dus gsum sbyong ba'i rigs gsum pas/
136a7(tsha): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob 'gyur// rigs bzhi lha 'dod cha gnyis 'dzin// rigs bzhi rdo rje chang par 'gro// rigs lnga sgom pa'i rnal 'byor ni// stug po bkod pa'i
136b1(tsha): sa thob 'dod// rnal 'byor chen po nang pa ni// ma chags pad+ma can gyis// yi ge 'khor lo rdzogs chen la// sku lnga lhun gyis grub pa thob// rjes su rnal 'byor chen po
136b2(tsha): ni// mtshan rdzogs rdo rje gang gi sar// bcu bzhi rdo rje 'dzin pa thob/ rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// kun bzangs dbye ba med pa'i sa// chos sku thig le kun
136b3(tsha): tu brdal// thig le chen po gcig tu thob// phyal brkyang 'phan bza' btung gis// gangs ri yul lha mchod par byed// mu stegs srog chags sha khrag gis// phye dang dbang
136b4(tsha): phyug la sogs mchod// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// gtsang ma'i mchod pa sna tshogs pas// dkon mchog rnam pa gsum mchod pa// zangs mchog rtsa nga
136b5(tsha): ma'i snod kyis dbul// kri ya u pa yo ga dang // dung chos nang gi snod nang du// yi dam lha la mchod pa dbul// sbyin gtong gnas su gtor mas mchod// bskyed pa
136b6(tsha): mahA yau ga'i rgyud// rdzogs pa a nu yo ga'i lung // dam rdzas bdud rtsi b+han+na'i snod// sgrol sbyor mchod pa 'bul bar byed// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/
136b7(tsha): sems nyid rang snang rig pa la// mchod bya grub pa'i gnas med pas// chos sku gcig la rol par shar// zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bog gi rgyud las
137a1(tsha): theg pa thams cad kyi khyad par che ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen
137a2(tsha): po gzigs pa 'di 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// dri med chos kyi sku yi thugs rje 'di// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i gdul bya la// dmigs pa med pa'i mdzad pa
137a3(tsha): kun la khyab// chu bo'i rgyun ltar rtag pa rgyun du skye// rdo rje sku dang mngon par byang chub sku// rang bzhin thugs kyi thugs rje skye ba ni// dbyar dgun ston dpyid nyi ma'i dkyil
137a4(tsha): 'khor ltar// ma byas byed med rang bzhin ngang gis snang // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la thugs rjes ni// bskul zhing gsol ba btab pas skye bar 'gyur// sa bcu
137a5(tsha): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams// lhan cig pa dang go cha'i 'khor rnams las// 'gro ba'i don du skur pa 'debs pa yis// gsang ba'i bstan pa rgya cher sgrog
137a6(tsha): par 'gyur// 'di ni sngon byung yin zhes don yang bstan// de bzhin rjes su 'jug par byed pa rnams// bsam gtan rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bskyed byas nas// ye
137a7(tsha): shes dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par bsgrub// 'dod pa'i don la bskul zhing gsol ba 'debs// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yul dang phrad nas
137b1(tsha): thugs rje skye ba ni// sprul pa'i sku yis gdul bya gzigs mdzad pa// mnges 'khor la bde snod rgyud rnams gsungs// bzang po'i yul dang 'phrad par snang ba yis//
137b2(tsha): gdug pa 'dul ba'i don du khro bor bstan// ngan pa'i yul dang phrad par snang ba yin// gang la cis 'dul de la der ston pa// sna tshogs yul dang phrad par snang ba
137b3(tsha): yin// rjes 'jug rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa pos// snod ldan bu la gsang ba'i man ngag sbyin// bzang po'i snod dang phrad par gyur pa yin// zhing bcu gdug pa ma
137b4(tsha): lus sbal byas nas// gnas ngan dran song gnas rnams sgrol mdzad pa// ngan pa'i yul dang phrad par gyur pa yin// rab 'bring tha ma'i dbang po mthun rtogs pa//
137b5(tsha): sna tshogs yul dang phrad par gyur pa yin// phyogs gcig snying rje 'gro ba kun la yod// khra dang spyang khus rang gi bu nyid gsos// mtshan nyid nyan rang theg pa'i chu ngun
137b6(tsha): la// sems can rnams la dmigs pa'i snying rje yod// tshad med bzhi yis 'gro don yid la byed// mdo sde byang chub sems dpa'i theg chen la// chos la dmigs
137b7(tsha): pa'i snying rje chen po yis// kun rdzob byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yi de na rnams mdzad// gsang ba bya spyod rnal 'byor rgyud rnams ni//
138a1(tsha): thugs rje chen pos gzhan don dang du len// 'phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad// bla med rnal 'byor gsang sngags nang pa ni//
138a2(tsha): 'dod chags chos nyid dag tu sbyar byas nas// zhe sdang snying rje chen po 'di mdzad spyod kyis// mtshams med mnar med dmyal bar ltung ba dang // dam nyams rdo rje dmyal
138a3(tsha): bar skye ba rnams// gsang sngags thabs kyi mdzad spyod chen po yis// 'khor ba'i gnas nas mya ngan 'das par sgrol// rdzogs chen mthar thug theg pa chen po ni//
138a4(tsha): dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen po nyid// snying rje chen pos cir mi mdzad// srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal ba'i gnas rnams kun// chos sku thig le chen po gcig tu
138a5(tsha): rtogs// zhes gsungs so// glang po me rab 'bog gi rgyud las/ thugs rjes yongs la snang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom
138a6(tsha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas longs spyod chen po rgyal ba drug pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba'i don la bstan
138a7(tsha): pa sangs rgyas par snang ba 'di gsungs so// stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong gi/ nyon mongs de nyid gnyen po ru// stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong ni// chos kyi sgo mo de nyid spu/
138b1(tsha): stong gsum sems can ma lus pa'i// nyon mongs gnyen por dgongs nas gsungs// la lar mdo yi sde ru gsungs// la lar dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang // la lar lung du bstan pa'i
138b2(tsha): sde// la lar tshigs su bcad pa'i sde// la lar ched du brjod pa'i sde// la lar gleng gzhi'i sde dang ni// la lar rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde// de lta bu ru byung ba'i sde// la lar skyes
138b3(tsha): pa rab kyi sde// la lar shin tu rgyas pa'i sde// rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde// gtan la phab pa bstabs pa'i sde// gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rnams// gdul byar gyur pa
138b4(tsha): kang mos gsungs// la lar lhums su zhugs par ston// la lar lham nas bltams pa dang // la lar gzhon nur rol rtse da mdzad// la lar khab tu bzhes pa dang // la lar
138b5(tsha): rab tu byung ba dang // la lar dka' thub mdzad par snang // la lar cho 'phrul bstan pa dang // la lar sangs rgyas mdzad pa dang // la lar bdud rnams btul ba dang // la lar chos
138b6(tsha): kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar mya ngan 'das pa dang // la lar sku gdung dgos par mdzad// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyis// gdul bya ma lus 'dul bar 'gyur// gti mug
138b7(tsha): rmongs pa'i gdul bya rnams// bde legs snang mdzad 'byung bar 'gyur// zhe sdang mnar sems 'dul don du// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur// nga rgyal mngon pa 'dul
139a1(tsha): ba'i phyir// rin chen 'byung ldan 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dod chags can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// snang ba mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur// phrag dog
139a2(tsha): can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// don yod grub pa 'byung bar 'gyur// dug lnga 'dul ba'i gdul bya la// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor mngon par snang // bram ze 'dul phyir bya ba'i
139a3(tsha): rgyud// dmangs rigs rnams la spyod pa'i rgyud// rje'u rigs la rnal 'byor rgyud// gdol pa rnal 'byor bla na med// mi rigs bzhi rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rgyud sde bzhi ni
139a4(tsha): snang bar mdzad// rgyal rigs la ni kun gyis 'dul// chos skyong mnga' ba 'dul ba 'ong // gdug pa can rnams 'dul gyur phyir// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal//
139a5(tsha): mkhas shing snying stobs che ba'i gnas// dur khrod chen po sku la rdzogs// yon tan mthong thos can ni mang // dur khrod chen po he chen brdal// bde skyid ldan pa de na mang //
139a6(tsha): dur khrod chen po gsang chen ro la// mthu dbang yon tan de na che// dur khrod chen po lhun grub brtsegs// zas kyi longs spyod che ba'i gnas// dur khrod chen po lang kar
139a7(tsha): brtsegs// yon tan dngos grub thob pa mang // dur khrod chen po sgrol ba mdzad// rnal 'byor longs spyod rab tu ldan// dur khrod 'jig rten sngon rdzogs nas// rdzu 'phrul ya/
139b1(tsha): ma zung du ston// 'jig rten lha rgyal sgra 'dul bas// dur khrod chen po brgyad du bstan// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// zhing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang // yul dang nye ba'i yul nyid
139b2(tsha): de// tshan do nye ba'i mtshan do dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod rnams// gnas kyis 'dul bar dgongs pa rnams// he ru ka yi gnas bcur bstan// la lar tshangs pa'i gzugs
139b3(tsha): su rton// la lar dbang phyug chen por snang // la lar lha chen nyid yin la// la lar brgya byin skur snang ste// tshangs pa'i rta yi mgo can dang // gu lang glang gi mag can dang //
139b4(tsha): khyab 'jug seng ge'i mgo can te// 'jig rten thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten lha yi gzugs kyis 'dul// la lar bde gshegs mkha' 'gro ma// la lar rin chen
139b5(tsha): mkha' 'gro ma// la lAr pad+ma mkha' 'gro ma// la lar las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// la lar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// bud med tshogs rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dul ba'i dus
139b6(tsha): la bab myur na// snod kyi 'jig rten rdzas dag ma// dam chos bstan pa'i sgra spogs shing // stong nyid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nas// chos kyi bstan pa char 'bebs pas//
139b7(tsha): 'dul ba mdo sde mngon pa'i chos// snod kyi 'jig rten sgra grags ston// bcud kyi skye 'gros su shing 'chad// mtshan nyid rgyu yi sde snod dang // gsang sngags 'bras bu'i rgyud rje
140a1(tsha): rnams// gdul bya rnams dang mthun pa ru// sangs rgyas sprul pas gsung bar byed// ces gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las// chos kyi
140a2(tsha): 'khor snang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin
140a3(tsha): la snyoms par zhugs pas// lhan cig pa'i 'khor dang / go phye ba'i 'khor gyi rgyud me long ltar gsal bar gyur pa 'di ched du glengs so// gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog rgyud//
140a4(tsha): rgyan bdun dag tu rnam par gnas// de yis dbye ba ji ltar lags// go phye'i 'khor rnams mthun par zhus// gsang ba rgyud kyi bya ba bskyed// gsang chen lung gis bsgrub pa mdzad//
140a5(tsha): gsang mchog man ngag dgongs pa mdzad// gleng bslang sangs rgyas rgyas bshad dbye// snod bden rgyan bdun rmongs sel ba// lhan cig pa yi 'khor rnams kyis// mgrin gcig
140a6(tsha): mthun par gyur pa yin// rab tu rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// gleng bslangs pa yi grangs ni lnga// sangs rgyas pa yi tshul ni bzhi// bshad pa'i mtha' ni rnam pa
140a7(tsha): drug/ bshad pa'i tshul yang rnam pa bzhi// bshad pa dbye ba'i rim pa gnyis// snod kyi gang zag rnam pa lnga// bden pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis// gsang sngags rgyud rnams bshad
140b1(tsha): pa yin// gleng ba spangs pa yi grangs lnga ni// rgyud 'di'i ming na ci zhig yin// gang zag gang don rgyud 'di gsungs// byed pa'i ston pa su zhig yin// rgyud 'di'i ldang
140b2(tsha): tshad gang yin la// 'di yi dgongs pa ci zhig yod// gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba// gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud chen yin// chos rnams med du ma grub kyang //
140b3(tsha): ston pas gdul bya'i blo bstun nas// med las yod pa ming du btags// sku gsu dra thugs dang yon tan las// rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud du ma'i ming // gdul bya rnams la mtshan
140b4(tsha): du btags// dpe don yul dang gang ldang ba// so sor mtshan du grags pa yin// brtan gyis gang zag bsam yas kyang // gti mug can ni rgyal po'i rigs//
140b5(tsha): nga rgyal can ni rje'u'i rigs// zhe sdang can ni bram ze'i rigs// 'dod chags can ni dmangs kyi rigs// phrag dog can ni gdol pa'i rigs// de snyed gdul bya bas ma yas
140b6(tsha): pa'i// gang zag rigs la dgongs nas gsungs// ston pa gdul bya tha dad pas// phyi yi ston pa kun bzangs nyid// khyad par ston pa sku gsum shar// kun
140b7(tsha): bzangs sku lnga dbyer med pa// rigs bdag kun gyi spyi gzugs can// sku bzhi kun bzangs dbyer med pas// gsang ba mchog gi bdag por bzhugs// rigs lnga kun bzangs
141a1(tsha): dbyer med pas// rgyal ba drug pa rdo rje 'chang // ston pa'i bdag nyid kun bzangs nyid// rang bzhin chos sku spos dang bral// rnga za longs sku rnam par
141a2(tsha): gsal// mdzad spyod sprul sku bsam mi khyab// 'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs lnga nyid// bsam mi khyab pa snang bar 'gyur// lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // dbang
141a3(tsha): bskur ba dang dam tshig bsrung // dkyil 'khor bskyed la mchod pa 'bul// 'phrin las rnam bzhi bsnyen sgrub bzhi// ting 'dzin sgoms dang gsang sngags bzlas// 'di bcu
141a4(tsha): rgyud don rang bzhin can// ldang chud yin par rgyal bas gsungs// dgongs pa'i dgongs pa bsam yas rnams// las tshogs thun mong dngos grub bsgrubs/
141a5(tsha): mtshan bcas mtshan ma med pa yi// mchog gi dngos grub sgrubs pas 'grub// sangs rgyas sa yis tshul bzhi ni// rgyud dang gleng gzhi nges tshig rgyu//
141a6(tsha): chags bral chags sangs rgyas pa yang // mtshan nyid sngags kyi dgongs pa'o// 'dod chags bral ba'i tshul bzhi ni// rgyu ni mi yi lus yin te// sdom pa chags
141a7(tsha): pa'i rten can yin// gleng gzhi rab tu byung bas te// 'dod chags yang spangs pa'i rtags rnams 'chang // nges tshig 'dul ba'i sdom pa blangs// nyon mongs dug gsum
141b1(tsha): rta rgod 'dul// de rgyu 'bras bu sangs rgyas 'dod// tshogs gnyis yun ring bsags pas 'grub// 'khor ba spangs nas 'das pa bsgrub// 'dod chags bcas pa'i tshul
141b2(tsha): bzhi yang // gsang sngags phyag bcas gsang ba ni// rgyud ni lha yi lus kyis te// phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid// gleb bzhi rigs lnga rigs gcig 'gyur// phung po
141b3(tsha): lnga po sems nyid lus// nges tshig sngags kyi dam tshig blangs// rtsa ba yan lag rdo rje 'dzin// rgyu ni sgeg/ sogs spyod pa ste// 'dod chags bzhi ni dga' bzhir spyod//
141b4(tsha): rgyas bshad mtha' drug drang don nges// dgongs dang dgongs min ji bzhin ba shad// ji bzhin ma yin bshad pa pir// tshig tshogs rgya mtsho 'grol bar byed//
141b5(tsha): drang ba'i don du bshad pa nyid// nyan rang mu stegs nang dang phyi// 'jig rten lha klu mkha' 'gro ma// rang rang lta spyod bshad na drang // gsang sngags
141b6(tsha): nges pa'i don la gzung // yang dag don ston nges pa'i don// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pas// 'khor ba ka dag dri ma med// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas//
141b7(tsha): dgongs pas bshad pa'i blo rab la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad nas// bdag gzhan dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhe sdang shan pa rdo rje'i rigs// gti
142a1(tsha): mug glen pa de bzhin rigs// 'dod chags yang dag pad+ma'i rigs// dug gsum zhing bcu'i phung po bsad// sems nyid sangs rgyas sras su bsgral//
142a2(tsha): zhu 'bras bsod nams ye shes tshogs// bdag gzhan gnyis kas thob par 'gyur// dgongs min dbang po sman pa las// lha dman sngags kyi lha zab 'dri//
142a3(tsha): sems ni sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i rgyu// tshogs gnyis 'bad pas 'bras bu 'grub// sgra ni ji bzhin bshad pa gang // dkyil 'khor bri dang de tshig bsrungs// lha sku
142a4(tsha): bsgom dang gsang sngags bzlas// slob ma dbang bskur dngos grub blangs// bla ni ji bzhin ma yin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te// ma 'bras
142a5(tsha): rgun 'brum pa na se// na le ge rgyas a ka ru// ko tak+Sha ni srin po'i skad// kun mkhyen dgongs pa shes par 'gyur// bshad pa'i tshul bzhi tshig don dang // spyi
142a6(tsha): sbas mthar thug don du bshad// tshig don ming tshig sgra 'byor pa// rus sbal bsdur 'gros lta bu nyid// spyi don mdo sngags rnam pa gnyis// mdo la zhugs nas 'dod
142a7(tsha): pa bzlog/ sngags la zhugs nas bskyed rdzogs sgom// spyir spyad seng ge'i mchongs pas bshad// sbas bshad rtsa rlung thig le sngags// sems can lus sras ston pas 'byin//
142b1(tsha): 'dod chags kun rdzob ye shes gsum// rgyud sbas thugs gab sna rgya 'byin// mthar thug 'khor 'das dbyer med chos// rang bzhin 'od gsal zung du 'jug
142b2(tsha): nyan pa shad dbye ba rnam pa gnyis// tshogs dang slob ma phyi dang nang // tshogs bshad sgra bzhin dgongs pa yin// drang don yi ge skye yi don// slob bshad sgra nyid ji
142b3(tsha): bzhin yin// nges don dgongs te sbas mthar thug/ snod kyi gang zag rnam pa lnga// ut+pal pad+ma dkar po dang // pad+ma dmar po tsan dan dang // rin chen lta bu'i gang zag
142b4(tsha): lngas// gsang sngags snod rnams gtan la dbab// ut+pa la ma 'dzin yal ba skyen// thos mang 'dzin mkhas brjed par bla// pad dkar sbrang ma sbrang rtsi 'dzan//
142b5(tsha): thos mang bum nang ras pa la 'dra// pad+ma yid 'ongs legs par bye// sbrang rtsi 'dzag par gyur pas na// dad ldan snying rje shes rab che// thos nas kha bye tshig don brjod// tsan dan sngon
142b6(tsha): chung tri ldan 'dra// 'dab ma dug bul blang bar dka'// thos nyung nga rgyal rtsa med smra// rjes su gzung bar mi nus so// rin chen rang dag gzhan don mdzad// 'dod 'byung nor bus der
142b7(tsha): byed ltar// dam ldan 'dzin mkhas shes rab ldan// rgyud gcig thos nas len par ston// bden pa'i dgongs pa rnam pa gnyis// kun rdzob bskyed rim rgyu lus
143a1(tsha): sgoms// don ldan rdzogs rim 'od gsal bsgom// zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bog kyi rgyud las/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud thams cad
143a2(tsha): la rgyan bdun gyi bshad par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos dmigs par bya ba'i brtag bya gtan la 'bebs
143a3(tsha): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nus ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gnas lugs snang lugs gnyis su 'dus// de yang
143a4(tsha): ji lta bu zhe na// gnas lugs ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi// gnyis med ris 'bral kun ngo bo// snang lugs 'khor 'das gnyis su snang // ma rtogs pa dang rtogs par 'gyur//
143a5(tsha): de nas ma sbyangs go phye'i 'khor// lhan cig pa la 'di skad zhus// 'gro drug snang ba rang ka ma// gnas lugs bzhi nyid yin nam min// yin na 'gro drug bden mthong bas//
143a6(tsha): 'bad pa med par rang grol 'gyur// men na 'gro drug sems can rnams// sangs rgyas 'bras bu ga la thob// 'on te gnyis su med gyur na// rig dang ma rig tha dad snang //
143a7(tsha): 'on te so so tha dad na// sangs rgyas sems can 'brel pa med// sems nyid bde gshegs snying po min// chu dang me bzhin dgra zun 'dra// de skad dman pa'i lha can gsugs
143b1(tsha): de nas lhan cig gnas pa'i 'khor// dgyes nas rmad byung ngo mtshar gsungs// sred gsum 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// sems nyid ye nas mngon sangs rgyas//
143b2(tsha): de ma shes par bden mthong men// gser mthong gser du ma shes bzhin// rang sems lhun grub sangs rgyas yang // rnam rtog gzung 'dzin mthu bltas pas// bdag dang
143b3(tsha): bdag gir 'dzin pa rnams// bden pa ma mthong 'khor bar 'khyams// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med kyang // theg dman 'khor 'das tha dad 'dzin// 'khor ba spangs
143b4(tsha): nam 'das pa bsgrub// me long rgyab log dang mtshungs// khams gsum sems can las dang ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs rjes 'brel// dper na me gnyis
143b5(tsha): gnyen bshes bzhin// bde gshegs snying po gcig tu gnas// 'di rtogs sems can sangs rgyas yin// yang ni go phye'i 'khor gyis dris// 'khor ba'i rgyu ni ci la
143b6(tsha): byubyabyung // ma rig pa la byung gyur na// gzhi la yod dam med pa yin// yod na ma rig spang du med// med na yod pa'i rtsa ba med// med kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba na// nam
143b7(tsha): mkha' las kyang me tog skye// lhan cig 'khor 'a bka' stsal pa// sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // nges pa'i shes pas ma skyes pas// lhan cig skyes pa'i
144a1(tsha): ma rig pa// gzhi la med yang blo bur snang // dper na nam mkha'i sprin dang 'dra// go phye'i 'khor gyis yang bris pa// 'khor ba'i sems la gzhi rtsa med//
144a2(tsha): de la rtogs par bya yod na// nam mkha' ye nas stong pa la// de las stong pa gnyis mi rnyed// de phyir sangs rgyas gang rtog snang // lhan cig pa yi 'khor gyis gsungs// dper na
144a3(tsha): mig gis gzhan mthong yang // mig na rdul song de ma mthong // me long nang lhas rdul 'byin b+ha// rang sems rang gi ma rig pa// chos kyis dbyings kyis me long lhas// skye med
144a4(tsha): spros bral sngon du byas// yul sems gnyis med dbyings su thim// ma rig lha nga na nyes pa bral// ye shes mkhyen pa'i nyi ma shar// ma rig pa nyid rig par grol// rigs
144a5(tsha): ye 'jam slong yangs brdal// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar nub med// dpag bsam shing chen yongs su rgyas// yid bzhin mchod sdong kun la 'bar// bum pa bzang po bde
144a6(tsha): bas gang // ma rtogs rtog pas mun pa sangs// thig le chen po smra brjod 'das// dpa' bo 'bru lnga kun gyi gzhi// zhi khro lha rgya 'khor 'das rdzogs zhes sogs// glang po
144a7(tsha): che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ gnas lugs dang gnas lugs kyi 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gtan la dbab pa ste le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//
144b1(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsun dam pas/ 'gro ba'i 'bangs rnams rjes su bskyang ba'i phyir 'di dag gsungs so// lhun grub dkar nag sems nyid
144b2(tsha): gnas lugs gzhi// 'khor 'das ma lus 'byung ba sa bon tshul// kun la khyab par ye nas rang gnas la// de nyid ma rtog mngon du ma gyur pa// byang chub sems
144b3(tsha): dpa'ang shes bya'i sgrib pas bsgribs// 'gro rnams nyon mongs las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs// lam zhugs theg pa rang rang lta bas bsgribs// ma mthong mthong 'dod rang gi
144b4(tsha): sems la bltos// rab 'byams bka' yi dgongs pa bsam yas pa// rtsa ba rig pa byang chub sems su 'dus// nyan thos sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'khor bar snang //
144b5(tsha): 'gog pa la ma gyi mya ngan 'das par bsgrub// rang rgyal rten 'brel lugs 'byung 'khor bar snang // lugs las bzlog pa mya ngan 'das par sbyor// byang chub sems
144b6(tsha): dpa' kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// don dam mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul gzigs// kri ya rang nyid rigs gsum kun rdzob 'bangs// ye shes sems dpa' don dam rjes
144b7(tsha): dang 'dra// cha gnyis 'dzin pa kun rdzob rigs bzhi'i lus// don dam ye shes lha ni rang snang sku// rnal 'byor kun rdzob lha ni rang lus nyid// don dam rdo rje dbyings te spun
145a1(tsha): zla grogs// ma hA longs sgyu rtogs tshogs bden gnyis lha// a nu dbyings dang ye shes bden gnyis lnga// theg brgyad snang lugs 'khor 'das
145a2(tsha): gnyis su blta// rdzogs chen gnas lugs theg le chen po'i don// rab zhi spros med yongs su gzungs 'dzin bral// zhes gsungs so// de nas
145a3(tsha): go phye ba'i 'khor rnams kyis/ lhan cig pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces dris so// gzhi yi don ni ka dag na// ma rig 'khrul pa grub ma grub// dpa' bo dpa la mos
145a4(tsha): bka' stsa la pa// gzhi la ma rig 'khrul pa ni// ka nas dag ste grub ma myong // dung la ser po med bzhin tu// mig nad can bzhin ser por snang // rdo rje mched
145a5(tsha): kyis yang zhus pa// 'gro rnams 'bad med sgrol bar rigs// gra zhi la 'khrul med dag pa'i phyir// blo bur mig ser yin zhe na// rgyud dag la yang 'khrul 'byung
145a6(tsha): 'gyur// gzhi yi nges tshigs mi 'thad de// 'khor 'dra sa chos ni mi 'byung phyir// mtshungs ldan rgyu yang med par 'gyur// dung la 'khrul gzhi yod dam med// yod/
145a7(tsha): na gzhi yod 'khrul par 'gyur// gzhi med 'khrul pa mi srid de// du nga las sbrul du 'khrul mi srid// dpa' bo dpa' mos yang gsungs pa// 'khrul med ka dag yin
145b1(tsha): shes na// de la 'khrul pa'i yul med pas// gser la gser du rtogs pa bzhin// rdo rje mched kyis yang zhus pa// 'khor 'das gzhi la lhun grub na// phyogs gcig
145b2(tsha): grub pa ma phyogs med grub// phyogs gcig grub na gnyis ma tshang // ma grub gzhi yi nges tshig med// phyogs med grub par gyur pa na// chos can ma mthun nang grub
145b3(tsha): 'gyur// 'dod na dbang po dngos su gsal// mi gas la bsam na snang zhe na// de ni phyogs med yin par 'gyur// dpa' bo dpa' mos bka' stsal pa// phyogs
145b4(tsha): med kun tu rang shar bzhi// gang ltar bltas pa der snang bas// 'khrul med lhun grub gzhir rtogs bya// gzhi don ma nor tha snyad mtshon// 'khor 'das rang sems nyid
145b5(tsha): yin pas// til snang bzhin du ye gnas pa// gnyis su bsdus pa ma 'dres la// yongs su rdzogs pa lhun gyis grub// rdo rje mched kyi sa yang zhus pa// ma rig
145b6(tsha): 'khrul pa grub ma grub// dpa' bo dpa' mo sa bka' stsal pa// kun gyi dngos bzhir snang ba'i gzhi// yid bzhin nor bu ltar snang bas// grub ma grub kyi 'dam ka
145b7(tsha): bral// 'khor 'das snang ba shar ba ni// de ni 'khrul pas dbye bas na// brtags gzhi zhes kyang de la bya// rdo rje mched kyi yang zhus pas// chos kyis bsdus pa'i
146a1(tsha): mched lcam rnams// gzhi yi don du gcig pa la// ka dag lhun grub ci phyir gnyis// dpa' bo dpa' mos bka' stsal pa// chos kyi 'brel pa'i rdo
146a2(tsha): rje mched// gnas lugs snang lugs rnam pa gnyis// gnas lugs don la dbye ba med// log pa'i rgyu rkyen shes rab bral// snang lugs 'khor 'das gnyis su
146a3(tsha): snang // 'khor ba'i snang ba'i sems nyid la// sangs rgyas dgongs pa lhun gyis grub// 'das pa'i snang ba'i sangs rgyas la// mi rig 'khrul par ka nas dag/ gnas
146a4(tsha): lugs snang lugs thams cad kun// ma rtogs rtogs par mtshon phyir phye// yang dag don gyi gnas lugs la// rtogs dang ma rtogs grub sa med// ces gsungs
146a5(tsha): so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ 'khor 'das rtsod bral chen po'i gnas lugs ldan pa ste le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas
146a6(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'gro ba'i ched du 'di gsungs so// skal dam na sdud pa'i gdul bya rnams// sbyangs pas chos kyi snod du 'gyur//
146a7(tsha): dpag med skal bar rung la sbyangs// sngon tshe thub rgyud sngags la sbyangs// tshe 'di rgyu 'bras chos la sbyangs// de nas gsang chen sngogs la 'jug/ nges pa don gyi
146b1(tsha): gdul bya rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni snod gyur pa// skye bo ma nges sa dag nas// gsang chen sngags la rab tu 'jug/ kha cig sbyangs pa'i rims kyis pa// dpag med
146b2(tsha): sngon rnams tshe 'dir sbyangs// kha cig dus mtha'i cig char pa// rgyud lung man ngag chos la 'jug/ sngon gyi las 'phro yod pa dang // 'phral du skal bar ldan pa dang // dad pas
146b3(tsha): chos la mos pa dang // brtson 'grus dang du len pa dang // shes rab rtog par ldan rnams la// yin pa'i thog tu mtshon pa bstan// mtshon pa'i thog nas go ba dang // go ba'i
146b4(tsha): thog nas rtogs pa dang // rtog pa'i thog nas thob pa dang // thob pa'i thog nas grol 'gyur bas// ma nor nges pa'i gtan la 'bebs// dang po gtan la 'bebs dus su//
146b5(tsha): gzhal bya 'khor 'das gnyis la 'jal// 'khor 'das gnyis su zhen pa yis// snang ba gtan la dbab par bya// de tshe go phye'i 'khor gyis dris// 'das
146b6(tsha): pa la ni kha jal ba na// dang po las kyi spyod yul du// 'das pa ma gyur gzhal mi btu ba// 'khor ba la ni 'jal ba na// 'khor ba spyi yi mtshan nyid ni// da dung mi rtog
146b7(tsha): gzhal mi btub// de rtog pas ma byung shes rab 'gro sa// las ni dang po'i gang zag gis// thos pa'i chos ni ma byas par// ba sam pa'i shes rab mi yongs ngo // 'khor
147a1(tsha): ba dang ni mtshan nyid la// de la ga zhal byar byas 'jal na// 'khor ba'i rang mtshan skad cig ma// skad cig snga ma 'das pa yin// phyi ma'i ma skyes pa
147a2(tsha): ni med// da ltar rig pa skad cig ma// de la gzhal du mi btu ba ste// mdzub mo rang gi rtse mo la// mdzub mo rang gis reg mi nus// skyes bu ji ltar rtsa la che yang // rang la
147a3(tsha): rang gis mchod mi nus// spu gri'i so nyid rno gyur yang // so yis so nyid bcad du med// mig gis thams cad mthong gyur yang // rang nyid rang la mthong mi srid// de skad ma
147a4(tsha): sbyangs sems dpa' dris// lhan cig pa yis 'khor gyis gsungs// dper na gzhal bya rdzas cig la// 'jal byed bre srang lta bu yin// rdzus de bre srang gzhal mi btub//
147a5(tsha): srang med rdzas kyis tshad mi shes// ga zhal bya rang rig skad cig ma// gzhal byed gtan chags de nyid gtong // gzhal bya byas na gtan chags med// gtan tshigs byas
147a6(tsha): nAnanA gzhal bya med// khyed ni de ltar 'dod pa yin// bdag ni 'di ltar 'dod pa ste// zhen pa shes pa'i spyi yul yin// rig pa skad cig gnas 'gyur bas// shes pa rang
147a7(tsha): gi mtshan nyid yin// de phyir zhen pa'i spyi yul la// shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid mjal// yul dang sems ni ma 'dres phyir// zhen snang rigs pa 'jal rkyen med// dang po las
147b1(tsha): kyi gang zag gis// 'khor 'dras gnyis zhen snang ba la// rang rig rtogs byed tshad mas gzhal// zhen snang gzhal la smyon pa med// de skad brjod pas ma sbyangs mnyes//
147b2(tsha): srid gsum 'gro la thugs rje yis// rtag gzhi gtan la nges par phab// ces gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ gzhal bya'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// /
147b3(tsha): / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i don du brjod pa 'di dag gsungs so// sems can kun gyis yid rigs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
147b4(tsha): thugs kyi mchog/ skye shi med pa g.yu drung sku// chos sku dri ma med pa yin// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor rnams ni// ye shes rgya mtsho tshogs rnams la// thams cad chos kyi dbying
147b5(tsha): su thim// thig le chen por ya nas gnas// 'khor 'das bde ba'i longs spyod la// ye shes sgyu ma rol 'gyur ba// zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs
147b6(tsha): sku'i rigs lnga'i sku// sa bcu thob pa'i byang chub sems// smin pa rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams la// dgongs pa brda yi snang 'gyur ba// me long bzhin tu byad skyon sel// rab
147b7(tsha): 'bya ma stong gis 'jig rten na// rdul phran 'gro ba thams cad la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sprul pa'i sku// nyon mongs kun gyi nang du gnas// 'gro ba lha mi'i byang chub
148a1(tsha): sems// mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'khor kun la// rang rang so so'i skad du gsungs// tshig dbyangs mes po'i skad kyi gro/ mngon sum snang ba dngos med
148a2(tsha): nyid// dbyer med byang chub chen por rtogs// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// mngon par byang chub sku nyid la// snang ba gang yin rang snang nyid// rig pa rang snang
148a3(tsha): 'khor rnams la// snang bas bstan par grags pa ni// snang srid glegs pam tshogs su snang // skye 'jig med pas 'gyur ba med// nam mkha' nyid du rnam par dag
148a4(tsha): rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// rtag pa chen po ngo bo nyid// 'byung ba lnga nyid 'gyur med rtog/ dbyer med rdo rje'i 'khor rnams la// grag stong dbyer med snang ba yang // ma skyes
148a5(tsha): 'jig bral go bar snang // lhag pa chen po chos kyi sku// skye med don gyis gsung mchog gis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams kun// chos dbyings skye med nam mkhar rtog
148a6(tsha): longs spyod rdzogs rigs lnga'i skus// dgongs pa brda yi gsung snang bas// smin pa rgya mtsho 'khor rnams kyis// shes bya'i sgrib pa gting dpag med// mdzad pa mthar
148a7(tsha): phyin sprul pa'i skus// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi gsung snyan gyis// mos pa rgya mtsho'i 'khor rnams la// sgrib sbyangs pa dang thams cad thob// snang srid mngon par byang chub skus//
148b1(tsha): rang snang gsung gis chos ston pa// rig pa rang snang 'khor rnams la// yul snang rang rig mngon byang chub// skye 'jig bral ba'i rdo rje'i skus// grags stong dbyer med rdo rje'i
148b2(tsha): grasung // dbyer med rdo rje'i 'khor rnams la// kun rdzob don dam mi phyed go/ brtags pa'i sku lnga ma yin pa'o// mtshan nyid sku lngar snang ba la// brtags pa'i gsung lnga ma
148b3(tsha): yin pa'i// mtshan nyid gsung lngar snang ba yin// brtags pa'i 'khor lnga ma yin pa'i// mtshan nyid 'khor lnga snang ba la// brtags pa'i tshwas lA mA yin pa'i// mtshan
148b4(tsha): nyid bstan pa rnam pa lnga// gdod nas skye ba med pa'i don// skye ba med pas smra brjod bral// sems nyid shes byar rang shes pas// chos la 'dzin pa'i dri ma med// rang rang
148b5(tsha): skad du go ba yin// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par grol// snod bcud be ma rigs stong pa nyid// mngon sum snang bas chos tshul ston// kun rdzob don dam dbyar med gnas//
148b6(tsha): snang stong dbyer med rdo rje grol// sngon byung sku lnga'i mdzad pa kun// rjes 'jug dngos lnga'i bstan tshig yin// ma rtog 'gro ba rmongs pa la// sku lnga tha dad snang ba yis// lnga 'gyur/
148b7(tsha): don la tha dad bral// zla ba gcig la chu snod lnga// yid bzhin nor bu gcig nyid la// mi rigs lnga la 'dod lnga 'byung // zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud
149a1(tsha): las// dngos lnga bstan pa'i le'u rtse bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rje btsun chen pos/ 'gro ba
149a2(tsha): sems can ma lus pa'i ched du 'di gsungs so// lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs 'dzin gyis// chos sku'i dgongs pa rab ston pa// dbang po mchog gis go bar snang // rdzogs
149a3(tsha): pa chen por rdzogs sangs rgyas// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzin gyis// longs sku'i ston pa'i chos thob pas// gsang sngags rgyud dang lung du snang // dgongs pa bcwa
149a4(tsha): yi bskyed rdzogs rtogs// tshe la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin gyis// sprul pa sku yi dgongs pa rtogs// mtshan nyid gsang sngags kri yog snang // rnam par smin pa'i rigs 'dzin
149a5(tsha): gyis// mngon par byang chub sku rtogs pas// 'khor bar snang ba sangs rgyas nyid// dbang po rab kyi spyod yul can// dbyer med rdo rje'i skur rtogs pas// 'khor 'das so
149a6(tsha): so'i skye 'jig bral// dbang po bstan pa'i spyod yul can// sar chud pa yi rigs 'dzin dang // sa thob pa yi rigs 'dzin dang // sar smin rigs 'dzin rnams kyis
149a7(tsha): go/ sku lnga bstan pa de bzhin tu// tshul mthun rigs 'dzin bstan 'gyur bas// rjes su 'jug pa'i skyes bu rnams// tshul lngas gtan la phebs par 'gyur// ston pa'i
149b1(tsha): bdag gi sku lnga nyid// 'chad pa'i skyes bu rigs 'dzin lngas// 'khor ba'i snang ba'i lha mi dang // mkha' 'gro tshogs la rab rgyud pas// lha mi'i 'jig rten thams cad
149b2(tsha): du// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor rgyas// rmad byung che ba'i mdzad pa ston// thong len med pa'i don rtogs nas// phyag rgya chen po mchog nyid kyis// dngos grub dam pa
149b3(tsha): thob par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ tshul lnga'i gtan tshig gis nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// /
149b4(tsha): / de nas de bzhin gang zhigs pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lha dbus na// sku lnga'i bdag nyid chos 'chad pazhugs// ston pa'i bdag
149b5(tsha): nyid rnam pa lnga// 'chad pa'i skyes bu rnam pa lnga// dam chos lnga rnams so sor go/ spyad du med pas go ba bzhi// spyad du yod pas go ba gcig/ rnam pa gnyis su snang
149b6(tsha): 'gyur yang // sdud pa rdo rje'i snying po yis// don bzhin bsdus pa'i yi ge'i rgyud// glegs pam tshig gi tshogs rnams ni// lam gyi yi ge'i rgyud nyid de// sems lnga skyes
149b7(tsha): pa'i skyes bu'i thug/ lam gyi ngo bo rgyud yin pas// thams cad ma lus rdzogs par byed// spyad du med par go ba ni// dbang po rnon po'i spyod yul te// snang srid chos
150a1(tsha): rnams ma lus pa// byang chub snying por gtan la 'bebs// spyod du yod pas go ba ni// dbang po rtul po'i spyod yul te// dpe don rtags dang
150a2(tsha): gtan tshags kyis// yid ches nges shes skyes par ston// spyod pa zhugs na rtogs pa'i gzhi// rtogs pa zhugs na dmigs pa'i brten// dmigs pa zhugs na 'dzin
150a3(tsha): pa'i gzung // 'dzin pas zin phyir grol mi 'gyur// spyad du med pas gang spyad pas// sems can ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas byang chub snying por gnas// de phyir
150a4(tsha): spyad pa'i bya byed med// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka'// tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te// rgyal ba'i sras po cang mi gsung // spyad du yod pas spyad yod na//
150a5(tsha): phyi rol snang ba'i spyod yul la// dbang po rnam lngas spyad byas na// dug gsum skye bar snang ba rnams// ma rtogs khams gsum 'khor ba rnams// mi rtogs bde stong
150a6(tsha): lam du byas// sku gsum 'bras bu thob 'gyur ba// spyad du yod pas spyad par bya// spyad du med pas spyad med pa// rnal 'byor sems kyis sems la blta// sems la
150a7(tsha): dngos med sgom pa med// dngos por sgoms pa rnam pa min// dngos dang dngos ma na rnams spyad nas// chos rnams thams cad sems su 'dus// sems nyid nam mkha'
150b1(tsha): la gnas te// nam mkha' ci la yang mi gnas pas// de phyir spyad pa'i bya byed bral// bya med pasam bral brjod 'das rtogs// spyad du yod pa dngos zhen pa// mu stegs rtag
150b2(tsha): par lha dang mtshungs// spyad du med la zhen 'thas pa// mu stegs chad par lha dang mtshungs// mtha' gnyis gol sa spyad pa'i phyir// mkhas pas phyogs gcig zhe na mi bya//
150b3(tsha): rtag chad phyogs su gang zhen pa// don gyi snying po nyid las gol// spyad du yod pas snang ba rnams// phyis yul snang ba sna tshogs la// rang gi rig pa zhen pa yin// de nyid
150b4(tsha): spyad du med ces bya// dran par snang ba spyad yod na// zan med yin pas spyad du med// spyad du med par snang ba rnams// sems kyi sems la ltas pa yin// sems nyid skye
150b5(tsha): pab med par shes// spyad du yod med gnyis med pas// de nyid blo las 'das pa ni// zung 'jug bde ba chen por gnas// dbyer med spyod yul bral bar rtogs// yod med/
150b6(tsha): rtog pa'i blo mi gnas// snang stong ngo mnyam spyod yul bral// 'dzin med bzung ba ga la srid// du ma ro gcig kun ngo bo// rnam pa kun ldan stong par gnas// zhes
150b7(tsha): gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ gtan tshigs kyi bzhi spyad du yod med kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
151a1(tsha): kyis bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas/ pad+ma chags med kyi don 'di ched du brjod do// ston pa'i sgron ma rab 'bar
151a2(tsha): bas// lha ngan mu stegs bdud las rgyal// rnal 'byor sems nyid 'od gsal bas// ji ltar 'dod pa gtan la 'bebs// gcig gis gtan la dbab pa ni// 'khor/
151a3(tsha): 'das byang chub sems su gcig/ kun gyis sems nyid rtogs par bya// chos kyi rtsa ba shes par 'gyur// gnyis kyis gtan la 'bebs 'dod na// 'khor dang mya ngan
151a4(tsha): 'das pa'i chos// mngon sum rjes dpag dag gis rtogs// 'khor ba mngon sum rjes dpag 'das// mngon sum du ba la brten nas// rjes dpag med nyid 'dod gyur pa//
151a5(tsha): mtshan nyid rgyu las gos pa 'joms// ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te// lung dang rtog pa'i bdag nyid do// mngon su ma lud la rdzas dpag rtogs// 'bras bu sngags/
151a6(tsha): kyi rgol ba 'joms// mthong brten rtags kyis ma ma thong rtogs// gsum gyis chos rnams rtogs kha dod pas// ba de gshegs bka' lung tshad ma dang // bla ma
151a7(tsha): ma na ngag tshad ma dang // rang gi rig pa tshad ma rnams// yid ches don rig rtogs pa 'char// bzhi yis gang zhig gtan la 'bebs// bka' yi lung las snang ba
151b1(tsha): dang // bstan bya'i don dang mi 'gal zhing // rig pa la ni 'thad pa dang // gtan tshigs rnams kyis rgyas pa ni// sde snod rgyud rnams gtan la 'be bas// thun mong ma yin/
151b2(tsha): gzhi bskor smras// 'bras bu 'grub par bstan pa ni// cir yang ma yin chos nyid ni// cir yang snang du btub pa dang // cir yang snang phyir cir bsgrub btu ba// cig
151b3(tsha): yang bsgrubs pa sa gang yang 'grub// lnga yis chos rnams gtan 'beb sa na// gzhi nyid chos can dag la gnas// khas blangs pa la dam bcas nas// gtan
151b4(tsha): chags rnams kyis gtan la dra bab// mtshan pa'i dpe yis mtshon byas nas// grub mtha'i don rnams mthar phyin no// drug gis 'khor 'das gtan 'bebs pa//
151b5(tsha): gzhi las thams cad snang ba yin// rgyud las thams cad skye ba yin// rkyen gyi sa ma lus skyed par byed// las dang 'thun par srid pa yin// bag chags dag la spyod
151b6(tsha): ba yin// brtags na mi rnyed stong par thim// kun la de ltar 'byor par bya// gzhi don ma rtogs 'khor bar snang // ma reg pa yi rgyu las skyes// las dang nyon modzes
151b7(tsha): rkyen gyis bskyed// dus gsum khams gsum mthun par snang // gzung 'dzin las spyod rnam shes snang // brtags na ma rnyed chos nyid thim// 'khor ba ma lus gtan
152a1(tsha): la 'bebs// khams gsum stong gsum srid gsum gsal// gzhi yi don rtogs mya ngan 'das// tshogs gnyis rgyu las skye ba yin// lha
152a2(tsha): sgom spyod pa'i rkyen gyis bskyed// sku dang ye shes mthun par snang // sku gsung thugs rjes 'gro don spyod// rtogs na 'bras bu chos sku thim// phyogs bcu dus gsum
152a3(tsha): sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad ma lus rtog par bya// 'khor 'das dbyer med gzhi las snang // sems kyi rgyu las thams cad bskyed// rig dang ma rig rkyen
152a4(tsha): gyis bskyed// dge sdig tshogs gnyis mthun pa sra sred// 'khor 'das bag chags dron la spyod// brtags na chos nyid chos skur thi mo// thams cad dbyer med
152a5(tsha): gcig tu sdud// de bzhin gtan 'bebs gtan tshigs ni// kun rdzob snang ba 'khor ba'i chos// don dam snang ba mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam dbyer med cig/
152a6(tsha): dbyer med tsam 'dzin spyod yul bral// zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ chos thams cad gtan la 'bebs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// /
152a7(tsha): / de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos padag nyid chen por rang snang ba 'di gsungs so// yul dang thabs dang 'bras bu dang
152b1(tsha): mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid mtshan 'bras can// shes bya'i mtshan nyid lta ba rgyu// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid sgro ma rkyen// mngon gyur mtshan nyid 'bras bu gzungs// bya
152b2(tsha): byed rnal 'byor rgyu lam 'bras// lta ba'i mtshan nyid rab shes pa// gser lha gser bstan gser bzhin du// bdag phyir bya byed ma dmigs pas// rtog spyod dmigs
152b3(tsha): 'dzin mi tshol ba// de brjod nyid kyis de nyid mthong // sus kyang ma bcings bcings pa med// bcings par bya ba yod ma yin// bcings med rnam par grol med pa//
152b4(tsha): grol bar mi 'dod pacings dang bral// spyad du med pa rtog par spyad// spyad pas go bar bya ba yang // don dang mi mthun mtshon cha can// chos kun mA tha' las
152b5(tsha): 'das pa la// mtha' rnams gang yang dor med pas// 'di ltar 'di'o zhes bstan med// rang gis ngo bo bstan par dka'// 'on kyang yin mri na 'dzan grol phyir//
152b6(tsha): 'dor na ji ltar brtags bsam bzhin// 'gyur bas kun gyis ngo bor snang // de mtshon ci yang yin pa'i phyir// sems chos ci yang ma yin no// de phyir ma yin/
152b7(tsha): kun yin pa sa// cir yang yin no lhan gyis grub// mtha' kun phyogs su ma chad phyir// mtha' dang bral phyir ma bral ba'o// gang yang ma spangs mi ldan pas//
153a1(tsha): ma bral phyir na bral zhes bya// ngo bo phebs pas rgyas pas 'gyur// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // dus bzhir gshegs pa'i
153a2(tsha): rgyal ba rnams// sems gnas sems rtogs sa sa rgya nyi// de las gzhan du mi btsal lo// lam gyis mtshan nyid rab shes pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi nyi zla la// rdo rje
153a3(tsha): sems dpa' ya ba yum sgom// sangs rgyas ma lus sgoms par 'gyur// oM badz+ra satwa hU/ sems can lus la rtsa gnas pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang srog shing
153a4(tsha): gsum// g.yo ba rlung gis bskyod pa'i mes// na ma mkha'i ba bzhos bdud rtsi 'bebs// bde chen ha la longs spyod a// chos 'khor hU nyid sprul pa a// a
153a5(tsha): li kA li srog shing gsum// yi ge sngags su grub nas gnas// lus kyi khams dgu 'dus pa yis// byang chub sems kyi bdud rtsi nyid// lugs 'byung 'khor pa
153a6(tsha): skyed byed pas// lugs las bzlog pa mya nga las 'das// nam mkha'i rgyud kyis srog 'dzin cing // sa chu me rlung rtsol bar ru// rtsa ba yan lagra bcas pa yis//
153a7(tsha): phung po dbang yul las rnams byed// 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rab shes pa// rigs pa 'dzin pa'i sar gnas pa// rnam par smin pa'i rigs 'dzin ni// bskor
153b1(tsha): phor nang gi ldag pa 'dra// tshul dbang ba'i rigs 'jan ni// nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs 'dzan ni// 'jig rten mes po tshangs pa
153b2(tsha): 'dra// lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs 'dzin nI// 'byung chen ltos kyi nam mkha' 'dra// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'dra// zhes
153b3(tsha): gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ chos thams cad rnam par bsdus nas bsgo dbye ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// /
153b4(tsha): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams cad ye shes dang dribyings su ye nas sangs rgyas pa 'di gsungs so// stong gsum srid gsum
153b5(tsha): khams gsum rnams// ye nas chos kyi dbyings nyid la// ma rtog 'byung ba lnga ru 'dzin// 'dzin pa de nyid rang grol phyir// 'gyur med pa dang sangs rgyas can//
153b6(tsha): rgyun chad med pa thugs rjes rgyun// mA ma ki yi b+ha ga na// skyon bral me dbyings gos dkar ma// thog med rlung dbyings dam tshig sgrol// nam mkha' kun tu bzang
153b7(tsha): mo nyid// gnas dang skye dang spyod gyur pa// rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la// phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// yum dang 'du 'bral med par bzhugs//
154a1(tsha): snod kyi 'jig rten ma lus kun// ye nasra zhing khams rnam dag la// ma rig de nyid shes bya la// shar phyogs mngon par dga' ba nyid// rdo rje
154a2(tsha): rigs kyi gnas shes pa// lho yi phyogs na dpal dang ldan// yid bzhin rin chen yon tan gnas// nub phyogs bde ba chen po nyid// gsung mchog pad+ma rigs kyis
154a3(tsha): gnas// byang phyogs rnam dag bkod pa ni// rab rdzogs las kyi rigs kyi gnas// dbus na byang chub snying po nyid// bde gshegs gnas rnams lhun gyis grub//
154a4(tsha): ya na sa gnas phyir rtsol ba bral// lus la ye shes chen po gnas// ma rtog rtog pa rab bstan pa// nyes pa'i skyon dang bral bas na// pu sha ga ri'i mdog tu
154a5(tsha): bstan// che ba'i yon tan rgyas pas na// 'dzam bu na da'i gsar 'od mtshungs// thugs rjes kun la chags pa ni// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog tu gnas// 'phrin las thogs
154a6(tsha): pa med pas na// ma ra tag lta bu'i mdog/ chos nyid 'gyur ba med pas na// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog tu bstan// mdog gi dbyer ba rab rtsom pas// ye shes chen po lnga rnams
154a7(tsha): rtogs// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// bcud kyi 'gro ba ma lus kun// rgyal ba rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// 'gro
154b1(tsha): don mdzad par snang ba ni// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// me yi dkyil 'khor snang mtha' yas// kha dog dmar po gyen la 'bar// g.yon nas gser mdog ldang
154b2(tsha): ser rlung // don grub bsogs la 'gro ba dang // gnyis dkar dal ru chu rlung dkar// rdo rje mi bskyod byang sems 'bab// gnyis kas thur rngub sa rlung ser// rin chen
154b3(tsha): 'byung gnas thad kar gnas// nyungs kar 'bru tshod tsam du 'gro/ a dmar ha ljang hU dkar dang // sA ser 'du 'phro mdzad pa rdzogs// nyin zhag dag ni phrugs gcig la/
154b4(tsha): nyi khri cig rdzogs stong drug brgya// de rnyed bzlas pa rdzogs gyur pa// rtsa ba o nyid srog tu gnas// rlung rnams phra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// shes dang yang dag 'dres gyur nas/
154b5(tsha): dbang po'i las la byung nas su// yul rnams kun la 'jug par byed// snang ba 'tshed pa thob pa'ang gsum// lnga gsum bco lnga'i bdag nyid can// byang chub sems
154b6(tsha): dpa' 'gro don mdzad// rtog bcas rgya bcu'i 'khor lo bskor// yig 'bru gsum gyis byin brlabs pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang rnams rdzogs// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor
154b7(tsha): lo yis/ sku gsung thugs ni dbyer med pas// 'bras bu'i chos rnams lhun gyis grub// lta ba rtogs pas grub mtha' rtogs// zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs
155a1(tsha): kyi rgyud las/ dbang po rab la rang bzhin gyi rtog pa ste le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snang srid dkyil
155a2(tsha): 'khor chen por gtan la 'bebs pa 'di 'gro ba'i ched du brjod do// dag pa gsum dang dag pa bzhis// snang ba mi spong 'bras bur byed// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs
155a3(tsha): pas// 'byung ba chen po rnam lnga po// dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings su dag/ phung po lnga ru snang ba'i bcud// sangs rgyas rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dag/ shes pa'i rgyud ni
155a4(tsha): rnam shes rnams// rang byung sras kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ snang ba lha yi dkyil 'khor rtog/ rgyu 'bras kun rdzob don dam dag/ 'khor rgyu nyon mongs rnam pa lnga// ye shes
155a5(tsha): chen po lnga ru dag/ 'bras bu smin pa'i phung po lnga// dam rdzas rgyal ba rigs lngar dag/ kun rdzob snang ba'i dngos po rnams// ye shes sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor dag/ chu zla'i
155a6(tsha): snang ba ji bzhin no// don dam snang ba gzugs kyi sku// thig le chen po chos skur dag/ mnyam pa bzhi yi gtan tshigs ni// ma nyam pas mnyam byed bdag nyid che// rgyu//
155a7(tsha): las skyes nas mthun par snang // brtag na dben pa kun rdzob yin// don dam spros pa mtha' dag bral// rnam rtog blo yi spyod yul min// snang ba thams cad rkyen ba zhes bsdus//
155b1(tsha): sgyu ma tsam du snang bar mnyam// snang zhing rtog pa'i chos 'di rnams// ma skyes par ni kun mnyam mo// lhag pa kun rdzob don dam ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu las skyes// thugs
155b2(tsha): rjes chags pa'i rkyen gyis skyob// don byed nus pa'i lha skur snang // brtags na chos kyi sku ru dben// skor bdun lhun grub smra brjod 'das// shes bsgrub gnyis ka'i don yang
155b3(tsha): yin// shes rab dam pa'i yul yin pas// rtog ge ba yi spyod yul min// de rtog yon tan zad med 'byung // ye shes mdzod chen chos kyi dbyings// sku dang ye shes
155b4(tsha): bsam mi khyab// nam mkha'i mtha' la longs spyod mdzad// rtog pa bzhi yi gtan chags kyis// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo byed// 'khor 'das rgyu gcig byang chub sems// de rtsal
155b5(tsha): yi ge 'bru gsum shar// byin rlabs lus ngag yid gsum rtog/ de mthu sku gsum rnam par snang // thams cad mnyam nyid chos kyi sku// bde chen mkha' sbyor longs spyod sku//
155b6(tsha): gar dbang spyir snang sprul pa'i sku// thugs kyi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// thams cad thugs ni kun tu snang // sku gsang gsang ba thams cad sku// gsung gsang mi khyab kun tu
155b7(tsha): grags// bden pa dbyer med gtan tshigs kyis// bden pa dbyer med zung du 'jug/ kun rdzob 'khor bar snang gyur pa// don dam mya ngan 'das pa nyid// dbyer med zung du 'jug bya/
156a1(tsha): ba// don dam skye med spros dang bral// snang ba ngo bo nyid rgyur shar// kun rdzob rigs pa sgyu ma nyid// rang rgyud phyogs gcig grub pa med// snang ba thams
156a2(tsha): cad gzugs skur shar// mtshan bcas phyag rgya chen po yin// stong nyid thams cad chos skur shar// mtshan med phyag rgya chen po yin// snang stong ngo ma nyam zung du 'jug/
156a3(tsha): gnyis med phyag rgya chen por shar// zung 'jug dbyer med spyod yul bral// yid la bya ba kun bral ba// dbyer med phyag rgya chen por gnas// ldem dgongs man ngag gtan tshigs
156a4(tsha): skabs kyi don gnyis mthong bar byed// ldem por dgongs pa rnam pa bzhi// bzhugs dang mtshan nyid gnyen por bsgyur// sngags la skrag pa'i log zhen la// de nyid
156a5(tsha): sgo nas de khrid nas// gsang sngags sgo yangs kun mthun zhes// brjod nas don la gzhug par bya// kun brtag gzhan dbang yongs grub sogs// med 'dod kun brtag yid
156a6(tsha): 'dod la// gzhan dbang rtag 'dod yongs grub brtan// de sogs bstan nas don la gzud// yon tan phyogs kyi dregs pa dag/ zil gyis mnan te drang ba ni// theg pa gong
156a7(tsha): 'o ga mi dang lha// gcig gi gnyen por gcig brjod drang // sngags la mos kyang sgra bzhin spyod// de nyid thabs kyis 'dul ba'i phyir// brda dang bcus tshigs sna tshogs kyis// /
156b1(tsha): zab mo'i don la bzhugs par bya// dgongs par bshad la bsnun bzhi// mnyam nyid dus don mnyam la dgongs// bzang ngan che chung mthon dman dang // bde sdug 'khor 'das
156b2(tsha): snang stong dang // yod med la sogs zhe na grol dgongs// mos dang sems bskyed la sogs kyis// 'bras bu thob par gsungs pa yang // rgyu nas thob dgongs spyod lug don//
156b3(tsha): chos la phyogs shes snang 'gas 'khengs// rtogs na 'dis chog zer rnams la// bskal pa rdul snyed sbyangs pa yis// 'jug cing 'dir yang brtson 'bade dgos//
156b4(tsha): zhen pas zhen gasngal don la dgongs// bsam pa rgya chung rgyu bskyed phyir// gang 'dod de la skyon brjod nas// zab mo'i sa lam don bstan dgongs// nges par gnyis
156b5(tsha): nyid gcig la brtsi// tshig ldem phugs bzhed dgongs pa ste// gul ldong zan khrung dpe kun khyab// gsang don mkhas pas rtogs par bya// dngos po'i lo rgyus gtan
156b6(tsha): chags kyis// bdag nyid chen po smos ci dgos// yongs 'brel gtan 'bebs re dogs med// sna tshogs kun dbang bsgyur bar 'bebaso// chos can dang ni chos nyid
156b7(tsha): 'brel// de bzhin sems can sangs rgyas dang // lung dang rig pa dpe dang don// snang ba dngos dang yang dag bsogs// thams cad 'brel bar gnas pas nas// mes
157a1(tsha): su 'brel bar gnas pas na// yongs su 'brel bar gtan la 'bebs// zhi gnas nyams drod gtan la 'bebs// de bzhin lhag mthong shes rab
157a2(tsha): kyis// lung dang rigs pas rig pa thos// thos pa ma yengs pa dang ni// lta bas chos nyid gtan la 'bebs// chos nyid nyams drod de sgoms pas// de spyod de 'bras thob
157a3(tsha): par 'gyur// de dag gtan 'bebs gtan tshigs 'gyur// rang gnas sems kyi chos nyid 'di// gang nas kyang ni btsal mi dgos// de nyid gar yang mi 'gyur la//
157a4(tsha): pabs ma bsgru ba mi dgos re dogs bral// sna tshogs dbang bsgyur bstan par bya// rig pa bskyed med rdzas ma bsgrub// rmi lam dngos med sgyu ma dang // rang rgyud gzugs
157a5(tsha): med nam mkha'i 'jar// gang snang ma grub mi rgyu nyid// snang ba dngos med chu zla dang // mi mthun grub pa me long gzugs// rtag pa ma grub 'gyur ba can// chad pa ma grub
157a6(tsha): med rgyu snang // yod pa mi bden dngos po song // med pa mi bden nam mkha'i sprin// yod med mi bde na dri za'i gzugs// mi 'gyur gnas pa nam mkha' nyid// de sogs
157a7(tsha): cir snang gtan tshigs pas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gcig gi gtan tshigs gcig gyur pa// gtan tshigs ma yin gcig kyang med// rab 'byams kun
157b1(tsha): la dbang bskur bas// bdag nyid chen po yin par nges// rang bzhin lhun grub gtan tshigs ni// ti la la til mar lhun grub pas// sa la sra zhing chu la gsher// me la
157b2(tsha): tsha zhing rlung la g.yo// gang yang rung ba'i chos can la// chos nyid lhun gyis grub pa gnas// sems la sangs rgyas lhun gyis grub// 'dir rtog sems can sangs rgyas
157b3(tsha): yin// sgra mthun don dpag gtan tshigs ni// chos kun rang dang skyes 'phags pas// ma skyes thams cad mkhyen pa'i don// rnam pa kun ldan stong par snang // de phyir
157b4(tsha): sku gsung thugs su snang // dngos kun gcig tu ma bral ba// mtha' gsum dang ni bzhi bral lugs// khyad can gyi ni de nyid mthong // de yang ma spangs bral bar brjod/
157b5(tsha): rmongs pa'i phyir na gti mug la// ma nar sems pa ni zhe sdang ste// mngon par khengs pas nga rgyal la// kun nas gdung bas 'dod chags yin// gzhan mi shong bas
157b6(tsha): phrag dog nyid// yongs su rdzogs pas stong bdag med// de nyid ma 'dres yongs rdzogs na// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kho na// gti mug mi rtog zhe sdang gsal// nga rgyal
157b7(tsha): chos la stan tshugs zhing // 'dod chags bde ba chen po nyid// phrag dog ltar na mi shong ba// dug lnga lam du shes par bya// gnyid log rmi lam sangs rgyas 'grub//
158a1(tsha): lta ba'i nga rgyal ting 'dzin sgom// 'dod chags gsang ba rtsa ba nyid// lha ngan 'joms pas phrag dog la// gsang sngags sangs rgyas rigs lngas
158a2(tsha): 'grub// nyon mongs ma 'dres ye shes lnga// rang 'byung ye shes gcig tu rdzogs// kun la de ltar 'byor par rtog/ rnam par dbye bar bya ba ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par
158a3(tsha): dbye/ gling grangs rgyas pa stong gsum dang // gling gcig dbu zhabs khams gsum dang // srid pa gsum drang po mo dang // ma ni skye ba na dang 'chi// snod ni 'jig chags stong
158a4(tsha): dang gnas// tshugs ni skye nas na dang 'chi// 'das pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // sku gsum la sogs rim par dbye// mtshon pa bya ba dpe rnams ni// thams cad stong
158a5(tsha): pa'i nam mkha'i dpe// dgos 'dod 'byung ba yid bzhin nor// gting dpag dka' ba rgya mtsho nyid// ngo bo mi 'gyur rin chen gser// gsal ba ma 'dres nam mkha'i mtha'
158a6(tsha): 'byung bzhi med pa nam mkha'i sprin// rgyun chad med la gang gA'i chu// thams cad dpes mtshon gtan la dbab// gtan chags mang por gsungs pa kun// 'on kyang don la tha dad /
158a7(tsha): med// kun nas gtan la phebs pa'i dus// de bzhin nyid du the tsom med// lta bar bya ba'i ngo bo ni// lta ba bden pa dbyer med la// rig pa spyod yul bral ba nyid// skar
158b1(tsha): bdun ngo bo nyid rgyur gnas// ye shes rnam lnga ye shes dbyings// yul med rang rig mngon sum pa// bden pa dbyar med dron mthong bas// rang rig mngon sum gsal byas pa//
158b2(tsha): yul med rang gsal nyams rnyed pa// mthong zhes lha ba nges tshig 'grub// dang po don rtog mthar mi stong // rin chen chu srin khar tshud 'dra// rtog pa'i don gems mthar phyin pas//
158b3(tsha): sangs rgyas de nas 'khor mi srid// ces gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ blo 'bring gi rnal 'byor bsgrub par 'dod pa la gtan tshigs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi
158b4(tsha): shu pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po sa theg pa thams cad ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs
158b5(tsha): pa 'di gsungs so// shin tu rnal 'byor mchog gi mchog/ 'phags pa las kyang 'phags pa'i don// gser gling rin chen lta bu'i mchog/ 'dod la sgrib byed chu sbrang dang /
158b6(tsha): chu srin nya mig lta bu'i dgra// 'jig rten 'das pa'i rgyud zhugs pa'i// theg pa che chung rim pa dang // yo ga bzhi sogs go la sgrib rnams// so so'i khyad par rtogs chud
158b7(tsha): nas/ mi gnas spongs mi theg pa'i mchog/ lhun po bzhin 'phags rtse brgyad nyid// che ba rtogs phyir khyad par 'byed// sprul pa'i gsung rab rgyu yi don// 'dul dbang
159a1(tsha): blong bzhin grang ba dag/ bsdu ba'am che chung gnyis kyis so// chung bsdus nyan thos rang rgyal gnyis// nyan thos bye brag smra ba ni// rang gi shes rab lha/
159a2(tsha): ba'i dngos// spyir na yang dag lta ba nyid// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// mi rtag la sogs dngos su 'dzin// kun rdzob bye brag 'dod gzhung nyid// snod kyi rdzas rnams
159a3(tsha): dngos po 'di// rdul phran sil bu phan tshung pas// ma 'dres ni 'u sing lta bu ste// mthu 'am stobs kyis 'dus par 'dod// don dam shes pa skad cig ma// re re yod par
159a4(tsha): 'dod pa'o// mdo sde kun rdzob phra rab rnams// 'dus pa'i rnam pa gcig tu 'dod// don dam shes pa mthun par 'dod// spyod pa rang don 'ba' zhig go
159a5(tsha): rang rgyal don dam nyan thos mthun// kun rdzob snang ba'i khyad par ni// gzugs kyis bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun// rten 'brel rgyu rkyen dbang gyur pas// rmi lam tshul te
159a6(tsha): logs na med// des na kun rdzob khyad par 'phags// spyod pa lus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis// gzhan don shas 'ga' spyod pa'o// theg pa chen po dbu ma pa'i//
159a7(tsha): theg pa phyi nang rnam pa gnyis// phyi ba rnam par rig pa la// kun kyang rang rig yul med 'dod// de yang rnam bcas rnam med gnyis// rnam bcas pa yi lta ba ni// yul ltar snang
159b1(tsha): ba 'di dag kun// rab rib bsgrib mthong rmi gzugs ltar// shes pa 'khrul pa gzugs brnyan phyir// de yang de yi ngo bor 'dod// rnam med pa yi lha gzhung gis// rang rig
159b2(tsha): gnyis med shel ltar dag/ de nyid dam par yod par smra// nang pa'i rnal 'byor dbu ma ni// kun rdzob sgyu ma brdzun tsam du// yul sems gnyis med yul snang sems//
159b3(tsha): kun rdzob rnam rig 'jig rten pa// don dam ma skyes stong par blta// de kun byang chub spyod pa'i mchog/ rgya cher gzhan don spyod par byed// gzhan la dmigs pa'i mtshan mo'i me//
159b4(tsha): rbargas pa lta bur bdag don 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bka' lung rgyud// yo ga phyi ba'i rim pa gsum// bya byed rgyud dang gnyis ka'i rgyud// rnal
159b5(tsha): 'byor rgyud dang rnam pa gsum// gdul bya'i shes rab dbang pos phye// de dag lha spyod khyad par 'gyur// bya byed kri ya'i don dam du// kun kyang dag pa'i chos nyid la//
159b6(tsha): mtha' yi dri ma ya nas med// kun rdzob rang bzhin rigs gsum sku// kun kyang dag phyir dug gsum gsum// lha yi dkyil 'khor yin par 'dod// ma grub tshul gnas
159b7(tsha): 'jig rten chos// mthun par bya phyir rje kho la lha// dam tshig cho ga rdzogs byas nas// gshegs dang mchod bstod drug ldan pa'i// bzlas pa'i sdig sgrib dag pa'i sems//
160a1(tsha): chu dngas lta bur grub shar ba// lha mchod rgyud phyir lha btsal sgra// khrus dang gtsang sbra'i mchod pa 'bad// gnyis ka rgyud kyi 'dod
160a2(tsha): pa ni// spyod pa bya ba'i rjes mthun yang // lta ba rnal 'byor rjes 'jug phyir// rigs dang lta bas khyad par 'phags// rnal 'byor pa yi 'dod pa nyid// rang rig dngos ston
160a3(tsha): mtshan ma gnyis// dbyer med dbyings dag ye shes las// byin rlabs rdo rje dbyings kyi lha// shar lta grogs po'i tshul du mchod// ma grub tshul gnas 'jig rten dag
160a4(tsha): grogs la brten nas nor 'tshol mtshungs// spyod pas ting nge 'dzin gtsor byed pa'o// lhun grub bka' lung bskyed rdzogs gsum// thog mar bstan pa'i rnal 'byor tshe//
160a5(tsha): lus kyi dngos po gnyis bsdus nas// rang rig nyid phyir snang ba kun// ye nas ye shes skur gsal ba// dkyil 'khor gnyis drug la sogs shar// snang ba nyid na rang bzhin
160a6(tsha): med// de nas mtha' yi skyon dang bral// snang stong 'bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// ngang las rig pa lhar bskyed pas// tha ma rtog tshogs ma spangs dag/ gser 'gyur mun snang ji lta'o// /
160a7(tsha): cir snang rang gis rigs pa'i phyir// lha dang lta ba yongs kyis med// ting nge 'dzin ye shes skur shar ba// sus kyang ma byas byed med te// ngo bos gzhan nas 'ongs pa med//
160b1(tsha): de na bdag nyid chen por blta// spyod pa bzang ngan gtsa ba sme sogs// gang la yang chags sdung blang dor med// bde myong mi 'gog mi 'dzin phyir// tshogs nyid rgyun du rdzogs
160b2(tsha): par byed// rjes su rnal 'byor 'dod pa nyid// snang srid zab mo'i mkha' glong na// ma skyes dkyil 'khor kun la shar// shar ba nyid na shar ba med// yab yum sras
160b3(tsha): bcas bde chen po// lhan rdzogs ngang nas skad cig gis// snying po dran brjod skur shar ba// 'di la rim pa'i rtsol ba med// rgya mtshor nyi zla shar ba 'dra// don gnyis
160b4(tsha): ma rtsal rdzogs par byed// spyod pa blang dor med par spyod// de ltar nus na nyam mi nga // rdzogs pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa// gza' gtang med pa'i lha mchog la//
160b5(tsha): de nyid pa la lta ba me // ga la te 'dod na dmigs lha med// thams cad mkhyen na lta ba'i mchog/ ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// ces gsungs so// glang po cha rab
160b6(tsha): 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ theg pa thams cad kyi lta spyod ya ma bral bar bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'chang gis dbang po tha
160b7(tsha): ma'i rnal 'byor pa lha'i skus rtogs par bya ba 'di gsungs so// stong pa nyid du gsal sgom pas// snying rje sgyu mas kun la khyab// hUM las byung ba rdo rje sems//
161a1(tsha): mthing nag rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsgo ma// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par 'gyur// yu ma yang 'du 'bral med
161a2(tsha): par 'khril// rtag tu sngags la 'bad nas bzlas// oM badz+ra swa ta d+ha du shwa ri hUM/ sku gsung thugs rje hUM las skyes// zhal brgyad rab tu 'jigs pa ni// sngo dang dkar
161a3(tsha): dang dmar ba dang // ser dang ljang dang dud kha dang // thal ba'i mdog dang sprin mdog brgyad// phyag ni bcu drug gnas pa nyid// g.yas pa rdo rje dril bu g.yon// g.yas
161a4(tsha): g.yon gos kyi g.yang gzhi ni// tshangs pa'i pags pa brkyang nas 'dzin// rtse gsum mdung thung dgra sta dang // ral gri cang te'u gri lug dang // lcags kyu g.yas na 'dzin pa
161a5(tsha): la/ thod pa kha nA mgo bo dang // zhags pa tho ba sdigs mdzub g.yon// yum 'khril kha Ta thod pa bsnams// zhabs brgyad lha ma nan drug thod chas// sku ni sngo zhing drag la
161a6(tsha): 'jigs// yumaM ni byu ru lta bur dmar// shar du oM las gsal byed ma// byang du ba las stag gdong ma// nub tu dza las mkha' 'gro ma// lho ru he las ma mo nyid//
161a7(tsha): dmar dang sngo ba ljang dang shar// ljang khu ser dang sngo ba lho// sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar ba nub// dkar dang ljang khu sngo ba byang // dang po'i phyag na mda' dang gzhu// bar ma zhags
161b1(tsha): pa lcags kyu dang // tha ma thod pa kha nA la// me yi phyogs su shar ba ri// bden bral phyogs su gsus 'phyang ma// rlung gi phyogs su drag mchog ma// dbang ldan phyogs na sngon
161b2(tsha): 'byung ma// shar lho dmar la lho nub sngo// nub byang sngo bsangs byang shar ser// dkar dang ser ba'i zhal dang ni// ser dang dmar dang dmar dang ldang // dmar dang dkar ba'i
161b3(tsha): zhal gsum ma// dang po thams cad kha T+Ta khA// ba rab gri khug cang te 'u dang // tha ma rdo rje lcags mdung dang // shar sgor ba ma las dam tshig ma// sngo dang dkar dang dmar ba'i
161b4(tsha): zhal// phyag na lcags kyu cang te'u dang // bar pa thod pa kha Ta kha// tha ma mgo dang sdigs mdzub can// lho sgo ra ra las ro ga tu ma ma// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // dang po
161b5(tsha): zhags pa cang te'u nyid// bar gnyis thod pa kha Ta khA// mtha'i gnyis sdig sra mdzub gri gug mgo/ nub sgor swa las 'bar ba mchog/ dmar dang sngo dang ljang khu ste// dang
161b6(tsha): po lcags sgrog gri gug dang // bar gnyis thod pi kha TA kha// tha ma mgo dang sdigs mdzub bsnam sa// byang sgor ha las phreng rgyas ma// ljang khu dkar sa ra dmar ba'i mdog
161b7(tsha): dril bu gri gug dang po gnyis// kha T+wAM cang te'u bar pa gnyis// mgo dang sdigs mdzub tha ma rnams// bcu gsum lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// ga sa la nas spyan drangs
162a1(tsha): bstims pa dang // mchod pa bdud rtsi gtor ma dang // rak+ta 'bul zhing bstod pa bya// gsang sngags yi ge 'phreng ba bzlas// rlung dang sngags dang
162a2(tsha): yid kyi rdeg/ oM shri badz+ra he he ru ru ka ma hUM/ DA ki ni dz+wa la sham pa ra hUM phaT sU hA/ zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// bcu drug stong pa bcu drug nyid// phyogs bzhi'i sor sor
162a3(tsha): yang dag rig/ mtshams ni mi 'jigs rnam pa bzhi// sgo yi tshad med bzhi dang ldan// de yang ji lta bu zhe na// gzugs rnams lta ba'i stong pa dang // nang dang phyi rol gzug
162a4(tsha): rnams lha// sdug dang mi sdug lta ba dang // nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lha// rnam shes mtha' yas lta bas stong // ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang // 'du shes med
162a5(tsha): min skye mched dang // 'du shes tshor ba 'gog par lta// zhal gyis rnam par thar brgyad rtogs// stong pa bcu drug mtshon pa'i phyag/ dang po nang ni stong pa nyid// gnyis pa phyi
162a6(tsha): yi stong pa nyid// gsum pa phyi nang stong pa nyid// bzhi pa stong nyid stong pa nyid// lnga pa chen po stong pa nyid// drug pa don dam stong pa nyid// bdun pa 'dus byas stong pa
162a7(tsha): nyid// brgyad pa 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid// dgu pa mtha' las 'das pa stong // bcu pa thog ma tha ma med// bcu gcig dor ba med pa stong // bcu gnyis rang bzhin
162b1(tsha): stong pa nyid// bcu gsum chos rnams stong pa nyid// bcu bzhi rang mtshan stong pa nyid// bco lnga mi dmigs stong pa nyid// bcu drug dngos po med pas stong // bcu
162b2(tsha): bdun dbyer med ngo bo nyid// yum ni gzugs med nam mkha' nyid// chag pas mdog dmar kha T+wAM thogs// chos brgyad bsdus pas phyag mtshan gnyis// so so yang
162b3(tsha): phyogs bzhi ni// phyag byed ma'i mkha' 'gro ni// don ni so so yang dag rig/ stag gdong ma'i mkha' 'gro ma// chos ni so so yang dag rig/ mkha' 'gro rdo rje drag mo ni//
162b4(tsha): nges tshig so so yang dag rig/ mkha' 'gro ma ni gser mdog can// spobs pa so so yang dag rig/ dkyil 'khor skyong byed phyogs bzhir gnas// mtshams kyi lha mo mi
162b5(tsha): 'jigs bzhi// shar sgo lha mo mngon 'byung ma// bcom ldan 'das la 'jug mi 'jigs// lho nub dran pa mchog ma ni// chos rnams nye bar ston mi 'jigs//
162b6(tsha): nub byang na ni sus 'phyang ma// mya ngan 'das lam 'jug mi 'jigs// byang shar 'phreng ba rnam rgyal ma// zad pa med la yongs mi 'jigs// sgo ba bzhi yi lha mo
162b7(tsha): ni// rnam par gtsigs ma byams pa shar// rol gtum ma ni snying rje lo// 'bar 'phags ma ni dga' ba drug/ rnam par rgyal mchog btang snyoms byung // kun
163a1(tsha): gzhi nyon mongs yid gsum ni// ting 'dzin gsum las rnam par skyes// zhal gsum dkar dang sngo dang ldang // rnam thar gsum dang ldan pa la/
163a2(tsha): stong nyid mtshan med smon pa med// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'i sku// phyag drug rdo rje dril bu dang // bar gnyis thod pa kha TA kha// mgo bo dang ni gri gug rnams// sbyin pa
163a3(tsha): tshul khrims brtson 'grus dang // bzod pa bsam ga tan shes rab yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi dgas gdan// sems dpe'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// shes rab
163a4(tsha): stong pa nyid dang ni// thabs ni snying rje chen po nyid// yum ni sku la rnam par 'khril// dmar mo thod pa kha nAM kha// ye shes spyan drang sti ma mchod nas// gsang sngags srog
163a5(tsha): dang ldan par bzlas// yid kyis gsal ba'i 'phro 'dus sbyangs// oM shri he ru ka ya big ma he b+hi ra Da dz+nyA ye d+hi ma he te na/ bi re pra dzA ta ya a hU/ stong phrag gsum gyi thun
163a6(tsha): mong gi/ dngos grub thams cad thob par byed// dus gsum don ni rtag tu sgra// zhi rgyas dbang drag las bzhi 'grub// dus min 'chi bar thar par 'gyur// zhes gsung
163a7(tsha): so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ dbang po tha ma lha skus mtshon pa ste le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang
163b1(tsha): chen pos nor ba'i dmigs pa bsal nas ma nor ba'i don nyams su blangs pa 'di gsungs so// skye bo 'khor ba tha mal pa// dug lnga 'jol lkog spyod cing 'khor/
163b2(tsha): lha dang mi yi theg pa ni// dge ba bcu la kyang 'dod byed// nyan thos pa yi theg pa yis// bden pa bzhi la spong len byed// rang sangs rgyas pa'i theg pa ni// rten
163b3(tsha): 'bre la rgyu dang 'bras bur 'byin// dbu ma theg pa chen po la// bden pa gnyis la spong len byed// kri ya dam tshig ye shes lha// rje dang khul po lta bur lta// cha gnyis
163b4(tsha): 'dzin pa'i theg pa ni// lta ba spyod pa yang char gyur// rnal 'byor phyi ba thub pa'i rgyud// lhun gyis grub pa'i don ma rtogs// theg pa'i chos dang 'khor ba'i chos//
163b5(tsha): thams cad gsang sngags ngo bo yin// chos rnams cir yang snang lugs snang // gser la dri ma bral ma bral// thams cad gser du gcig pa ltar// kun kyang
163b6(tsha): gsang sngags ngo bor gnas// rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po yis// lta bas de ltar rtogs par bya// lam ni rim par bgrod pa rnams// lha mi mtshan nyid theg pa rnams//
163b7(tsha): gsang sngags lam gyi rtog byed pa// phul dang bre dang kha la dang ni// lta ba ma nor la ma srong bas// thams cad sngags kyi lam stegs 'gro// de phyir gsang sngags mchog gi/
164a1(tsha): lam// khyad par 'phags par shes par bya// lta ba'i gol 'grib gcod pa'i phyir// theg kun sngags kyi cha rkyen yin// cha yod do shes zas kyi
164a2(tsha): dug/ dug yod spong la dug med za// lha ngan dri me spangs byas nas// lta ba bzang po dang du len// theg pa ma lus thams cad kun// gsang sngags che ba 'byin phyir bstan//
164a3(tsha): gsang ba'i ngo bo mtshon phyir bshad// 'gro ba'i lam stegs bsgod par dgos// gol sgrib skyon yon shes phyir bshad// de phyir gsang sngags thun mo de yin// thabs dang
164a4(tsha): shes rab theg pa'i lam// thabs lam dbang gis bgod gyur pa// bla ma'i man ngag gnad du bsnun// sgro 'dogs yongs gcod bla ma yis// bum pas rig pa'i dbang/
164a5(tsha): lnga bskur// lus gnas dbyibs kyi rtsa rnams nyid// bskyed pa'i rim pa lha yi sku// lus kyi dri ma dag par byed// sa drug rdzogs nas spru la sku thob// bla ma rang byung ye shes
164a6(tsha): ston// gsang ba'i dbang ni bskur ba yis// gtum mo'i lam du 'bar 'dzag pas// ngag gi dri ma dag par byed// sa drug rdzogs nas longs sku 'grub// rdo rje 'chang sa ra
164a7(tsha): 'gro ba'o// bla mas lhan skyes ye shes ston// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur bas// dga' ba mchog dga' dga' bral dang // lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba yis// yid
164b1(tsha): kyi dri ma dag byas nas// sa ni phyed dang gnyis rdzogs pas// rnal 'byor mi srid 'bras thob pa// chos kyi sku la sbyor bar byed// bla mas chos rnams rnam dag ston// khams dgu
164b2(tsha): 'dus pa'i dngas ma rnams// srog shing gsum las grangs pa yis// rdo rje rba rlabs lam sbyangs te// lus ngag yid gsum sgrib dag pas// snying po'i rlung rnams rang
164b3(tsha): grol bas// sa phyed ngo bo nyid sku thob// bcu bzhi rdo rje 'dzin gnas pa// nyon mongs 'chings pa'i las spyad pas// sku bzhi thob pas thabs kyi 'am// dbang po dman pas
164b4(tsha): sngags bsgrub phyir// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsungs pa yin// phyi rab sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas// nyams su blangs na sangs rgyas 'grub// rang lus gsang sngags rgyud
164b5(tsha): bde rtogs// shes rab la ma ni lta ba rtogs// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor 'jug pa yin// de phyir thos bsam sgom gsum gyis// shes rab can dang ldan par bya// thabs
164b6(tsha): lam grol lam tha dad na// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa med// thabs kyi lam la gtsor byed yang // grol la ma lta ba med gyur na// 'jig rten thabs dang khyad par med//
164b7(tsha): ma hA de ba'i bde bar 'gyur// grol lam rkyang ba sgrub byed na// thabs dang bral phyir dbu mar 'gyur// dbang ma thob par 'jug 'gyur zhing // rang gzhan thags la nges shes
165a1(tsha): med// rtsa sngags thag le rlung dang bral// thabs kyi lam dang shes rab la ma// gang rung cig la yongs rdzogs 'dod// zag bcas lam pa'i shes rgyud
165a2(tsha): la// lam gnyis du sa gcig skye mi srid// rtse gnyis gcig tu mtshon pa 'dra// nges par gcig gam tha dad pa// blo dam na rnams la thabs lam nyid// dbang po mchog la
165a3(tsha): grol ba'i lam// dbyibs dang kha dog lta bu nyid// kun rdzob mtshon par tha dad kyang // nges don gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur// grol ba'i lam ni 'bras bu 'dra// thabs lam
165a4(tsha): mtshon byed rgyu rkyen mtshungs// lta ba gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir// grol lam thos pas ma sgom pas sbyangs// yang dag lta ba mi go bas// rang lus thabs kyi gnad du bsnun//
165a5(tsha): rtswa rnams dbyibs su gtan la dbug// lus khams bdud rtsi bde bas te// grub pa sngags ni bzlas pa nyid// rdo rje rlung ni 'phro 'dur 'gyur// snying po lam blta ba cig cha
165a6(tsha): rtogs// thabs la ma dbang gi rims kyis smin// de phyir gsang sngags lam 'dod pas// thabs kyi lam dang grol ba'i lam// gsang sngags rgyud bzhin rtogs par bya//
165a7(tsha): de skad ston pa rigs lngas gsungs// dad ldan brtson 'grus rab 'bad na// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' thob// ces gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/
165b1(tsha): gsang sngags thams cad kyi lam gyi rtsa ba ma nor ba gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos lam gyi markyen
165b2(tsha): yongs su rdzogs par gtan la phab pa 'di gsungs so// lta ba dben pa dbyer med pa// rang rig dngos gsum rtogs pa yis// lta ba rang gis mtshan nyid mthong // de la
165b3(tsha): lam gyi rim par mthong // dbang po gsal ba'i spyod yul la// gzugs mthong rgyang nas mthong gyur yang // drung nas gsal bar 'gyur zhing rtogs// de phyir rims dang
165b4(tsha): cig car ba lha// lam gyi spyod pa gzhi gcig la// so so tha dad spyod pa yang // kun tu rgyu dang khyim gnas dang // glang chen stobs kyis che chung ltar// rang bzhin ting 'dzin
165b5(tsha): mngon byung ba'i// sgrol sbyor la sogs rim par spyod// mnyam par bzhag pa'i don nyid las// rjes kyi spyod pa de bzhin spyod// dkyil 'khor ngo bo kun gcig yang // lam
165b6(tsha): gyi byed lugs mi 'dra bas// ting 'dzin sgom dang gzugs brnyan bri// tshad kyi bye brag che chung sogs// gdul bya lam dang mthun pa ru// rgyal ba sa gsungs bzhin rtogs/
165b7(tsha): par bya'o// dbang bskur rgyu lam 'bras kun dgos// rdzas la brten nas bskur ba dang // lta bas bskur dang ting 'dzin dbang // bla ma slob ma'i rims dgongs shes//
166a1(tsha): rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// bsrungs mtshams bcas pa'i dam tshig dang // don la mi mda' gnas pa ste// dam tshig khyad par rtogs par bya//
166a2(tsha): zag bcas zag med la sogs lam// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub pa'i// 'phrin las kun gyis spyod 'gyur yang // ro gcig nus mthu khyad par che// ma sgrub bsgrub chen
166a3(tsha): bsgrub dgos pa// mngon sum rtsol bas sogs pa'i rdzas// ting nge 'dzin yid kyis sogs pa'i rdzas// ting nge 'dzin yid kyis dmigs pa'i rdzas// rigs pa sa gang/
166a4(tsha): btso'i shes pas bsgrub// mya ngan 'das pa mchod byed na// 'khor ba mchod pa'i rdzas yin pas// zag bcas yo byad sngags rgyas mchod// zag med lta ba ting 'dzin
166a5(tsha): mchod// gsang sngags bzlas shing phyag rgya bca'// sngags kyi skyon spong sgra brten bzlas// yid skyob rdo rje'i zlas pas 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi la mos pas bslab// dngos
166a6(tsha): su zhi khro'i rgyal chab byed// rnal 'byor rim pas brtogs par 'gyur// kun kyang zhi khro'i ting 'dzan bsgom// zag bcas mtshan nyid so sor bsgom// zag med ting
166a7(tsha): 'dzin yongs rdzogs bsgom// mtshan bcas mtshan med kun bsgom yang // rtsol ba yod med khyad par las// lam gyis bye brag rtog par bya// zhes gsungs so//
166b1(tsha): glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ lam gyi cha rkyen gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos rnal 'byor
166b2(tsha): pa thams cad kyi lam 'di dag 'gro ba'i ched du brjod pa'o// gsang sngags la ma ni bskrod 'gyur ba// rims bskyed pa dang cig car ba// mos slob dang ni smon slob dang /
166b3(tsha): thar chag pa dang thod rgal ba// zag bcas lam dang zag med la ma// gang zhig rim gyis bgrod 'gyur ba// dang por bzhi nas gzung byas nas// tha ma
166b4(tsha): 'bras bu'i gnas su 'gro// bar gyi lam rnams rims pas slob// rims smin srid pa mngal skyes 'dra// cig char ba yi lam bgrod nas// lta sgom dbyer med 'bras
166b5(tsha): pubur gcig/ mtsho la gza' skar shar ba lhar// srid pa rdzas skyas smin pa 'dra// mo sa spob lam ni bzang po'i dus// nya stong tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la// mtshams
166b6(tsha): nas rdzogs rim bar du sgom// sred pa sgong skyes smin pa 'dra// smin slob lam ni dang po'i rgyu// de bzhin nyid la mthar phyin pasgom// de nas kun snang rgyu dang ni//
166b7(tsha): tshom bu tshogs bsgrub spros pa dang // rigs 'dzin sangs rgyas sar 'gro ba// sngan ma smin nas phyi ma'i lam// rang sa'i drod tshad rtag ldan pa// bzo bo mkhas pa'i
167a1(tsha): lde bzo 'dra/ thar chag pa'i lam sgom pa// tshogs kyi lam la rnal 'byor bzhi// sbyor ba'i lam la bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// ma
167a2(tsha): lam rnam smin tshe dbang dang // bsgom lam phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor dang // mthar phyin lhun grub rigs 'dzin yin// stong pa chen po'i rnal 'byor ni// rnam pa kun ldan stong
167a3(tsha): pa ste// dpe ni yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// snying rje chen po'i rnal 'byor ni// yongs la khyab pa'i sgyu ma ste// dpe ni nyi ma'i snying po ste// phyag rgya chen po'i rnal 'byor
167a4(tsha): ni// a nyid zhi ba 'tshangs pa 'dra// hUM las khro bo srin phrug tshul// dpe ni chu la nya ldang 'dra// spros pa'i rnal 'byor sgom pa ni// rang gnas rtsa las dkyil 'khor
167a5(tsha): spros/ sngags kyi yi ge tshom bur spros// khams kyi bdud rtsi zhal phyag spros// snying po rlung las rnam grangs spros// bsnyen pa zhi ba'i bsnyen pa ste// nye bsnyen zhi ba'i
167a6(tsha): bsgrub par gsungs// bsgrub pa khro bo'i bsnyen pa nyid// sgrub chen khro bo'i bsgrub pa yin// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin ni// yid kyi ting nge 'dzani lha skur smin// khyud
167a7(tsha): phrug sgong nga'i nang gnas bzhin// bag chags lus nang lha yi sku// tshe la dbang ba'i rigs 'dzin ni// rang gi tshe la dbang thob pas// 'khor bar bzhugs sam
167b1(tsha): sangs rgyas 'gro/ skye shi rang dbang thob pa yin// bsgom lam phyag rgya yi dam lha// rigs lnga gang bsgom cha lugs 'dzin// sa brgyad non pa'i byang sems tshul//
167b2(tsha): bsgom la tshad 'dzin yod par bzhugs// mthar la ma sa dgu sa bcu pa// sku lnga lhun grub cha lugs nyid// rgyal tshab 'dzad pas sangs rgyas dang // mnyam par
167b3(tsha): bzhag pa dgongs mnyam 'gyur// thod rgal lam la sbyor ba ni// bar du sa lam bor nas 'gro// phyag rgya gcig pa'i sa nas ni// mthong lam mtha
167b4(tsha): thug sbyor ba dang // spros par rigs 'dzin mthar thug sbyor// tshogs bsgrub phyag rgya mthar thug sbyor// tshe dbang lasA ni sku lngar sbyor// zag bcas lam gyis thod rgal
167b5(tsha): gnyis// phyag rgya gcig dang phyag rgya spros// zag med lam gyis thod rgal gnyis// tshe dbang phyag rgya'i rigs 'dzin yin// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang // bden
167b6(tsha): pa phyogs de bsgom pas na// thod rgal ba la yongs sa med// tshogs bsgrub rnam smin rigs 'dzin dang // lhun gyis grub pa thod rgal med// 'byung lugs nges pa
167b7(tsha): med pa ste// bar du sa la ma nges med mdo// thod rgal 'byung bar gyur pa ni// lta ba gnyis med kha longs dang // rtogs pa btsan thabs skyes pa dang // thar lam la dor
168a1(tsha): bya yod pa dang // sa la sbyangs pa yod na 'byung // rim sbyor lam la bar chad 'byung // thod rga la lam la 'gro bas na// mda' ka ma yin man
