168a2(tsha): ngag bsgoms// de phyir thod rgal shin tu gces// zag bcas lam ni rnal 'byor bzhis// lus ngag yid gsum 'bad nas bsgrub// yul khams
168a3(tsha): phung po skye gnas kyi// 'bras bu bzang la dmigs nas bsgrub// zag med rigs 'dzin rnam pa gsum// ston pa sku gsum zhal gzigs pas// yul khams phung
168a4(tsha): po skye gnas dang // sgrub pa zag pa med shes bsgrub// lam gyi rnam pa gang bsgru ba yang // shes pa'i rgyu ni lta ba bas// lta bas gtan la pha ba nas bsgrub// gang zhig/
168a5(tsha): lta bas ma zin na// 'dus byas rdzas la zad pa yod// 'dus ma byas kyis lta ba yis// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par shes// 'khor 'das gnyis med rtogs 'gyur/
168a6(tsha): ba// da lta nyid nas grub pa yin// sangs rgyas sa la the tshom med// rang sems sangs rgyas ma shes na// lam gyis rim pa gang bgrod yang // mngon par byang chub ga
168a7(tsha): la srid// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na// theg pa ma lus thams cad kun// ma sbyangs rgyal ba'i dgongs par shes// kun tu 'od kyis non nas// pad+ma can//
168b1(tsha): gyis la byin// yi ge 'char la tshogs chen bsgrub// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung las// theg pa gcig gi nang du 'jug/ theg pa bzhi las nges par 'byung //
168b2(tsha): rmad byung theg gcig nang du gnas// theg pa thams cad 'gro bas na// mthar thug theg pa'i thug sa yin// zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las//
168b3(tsha): lam gyi rim pa lta ba bstan pa ste le'u nyer lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsang ba'i lam yongs su rdzogs pa 'di gsungs
168b4(tsha): chos dbyings 'gyur ba med pas na// de bzhin nyid du bsgom par bya// don dam bden pa spros dang bral// mya ngan 'das pa'i dgongs pa bsgom// chos sku bri ma med pas
168b5(tsha): na// 'bras bu bsam rdzogs bral bar bsgom// kun tu 'od kyis gnas pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa bsgom// kun gzhi mtha' dang bral bas ma//
168b6(tsha): skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin bsgom// lam la bar chad byung bas na// 'khor 'das stong pa'i ngang la 'phro// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
168b7(tsha): bzhin du sgom// kun rdzob bden pa rdzun pas na// 'khor ba'i chos la snying rje sgom// longs sku ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// dngos po gnyis la longs spyod bsgom// pad+ma can gyi
169a1(tsha): sa la gnas// smin pa rgya mtsho'i dgongs pa bsgom// nyon mongs yid kyi kun la chags// 'od dpung dmar smug 'bar bar bsgom// lam du blo bur
169a2(tsha): bar chad 'byung // longs spyod rdzogs sku'i zhing du 'pho// chos kun rtsa ba byang chub sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu ru bsgom// bden pa gnyis su dbyer med pas// kun
169a3(tsha): rdzob don dam zung 'jug bsgom// sprul sku ci ra yang snang bas na// zhi khro 'phra mo'i sku gnyis bsgom// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen pa// zhi khro'i sprul pa'i 'phro ba bsgom//
169a4(tsha): yid kyi rnam shes kun tu rgyu// byed pa kun gyis rtsa bar bsgom// ma 'byongs la ma la bar chad 'byung // lha yi sku yi thugs khar 'pho// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha'i
169a5(tsha): tshad// sor bzhi pa dang mdzub gang bya// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor khru gang ngam// lus gang ba yi tshad du bya// lus do dang ni lus gsum pa// dpag tshad rgyang grags nam
169a6(tsha): mkha' mnyam// spyi mgrin snying kha lte ba'i rtsa ba// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor 'phro// zhi ba yab yum gnyis bsgoms la// khu ba las ni 'khor rnams 'byung //
169a7(tsha): sgeg mo 'phreng ba glu gar bzhi// lha lnga'i tshom bu bsgom par bya// zhi khro yab yum bsgoms byas nas// lhan cig sbyor bas 'khor brgyad 'byung // phyogs mtshams mkha' 'gro
169b1(tsha): bskor byas pa'i// lha dgu tshom bu bsgom par bya// zhal brgyad bcu drug phyag ldan pa// lha grangs bcu mtshom bu bsgom// rang gi yig 'bru la byung bas// sa bon 'bru re dag la
169b2(tsha): bskyed// zhal gcig ma dang phyag gnyis pa// zhal gsum pa dang phyag drug pa// zhal brgyad bcu drug phyag las ni// bco brgyad nyi shu mang por bsgom// lus kyis bdud rtsi
169b3(tsha): bde dang ldan// rlung gi bye ba du ma las// rnam grangs pas ma yas spro bar bya// zhing bcu bkug nas brod bskyed bsnyen// ngan song lam sbyangs nye bas te// phung po rdzas mchod
169b4(tsha): bsgrub pa la// sems nyid gnas pa bsgrub chen po// yum btsal chas kyi sgeg pas bsten// rdo rje pad+ma bsgoms 'jug nye// bsrub shing gar byed bsgrub pa la// lhan
169b5(tsha): cog skyes rgas bsgrub chen no// byang chub sems bskyed nye ba nyid// yab yum bsgom pa nye ba nyid// 'khor rnams skye ba bsgrub pa yin// spyan drangs bstim mchod bzlas
169b6(tsha): bsgrub che// rnal 'byor bzhi bsgoms bsnyen pa nyid// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi po nye ba la// rigs 'dzin thob pa bsgrub pa ste// sangs rgyas sar 'gro bsgrub chen rdzogs//
169b7(tsha): bsnyen pa 'od zer dkar po spro// 'gro ba'i sgrib skyongs 'phags pa mchod// nye bsnyen dkar po spros byas nas// dmar po tshul la brgyu bar bya// bsgrub pa mi spro dmar po bsdu/
170a1(tsha): bsgrub chen dngos grub len par byed// zhi ba bsnyen la rgyas pa nye// dbang ni bsgrub pa bsgrub chen drag/ dang po bsnyen par bya ba yang //
170a2(tsha): rlung nyid phyir la 'gro ba na// o zhes bya ba'i yi ge la// rlung lnga 'dod yon lha mo lngas// sna yi dbugs la byung nas ni// 'gro ba sgrib pa sbyong byed cig/ sangs rgyas rnams
170a3(tsha): yi mchod pa 'bul// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad do// dri ni rin chen 'byung ldan la// rA ni snang ba mtha' yas nyid// sgra ni dz+nyAn med thub pa la// res ni rdo rdza
170a4(tsha): dpa' mchod// gnyis pa nye bar bsnyen pa yang // hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge la// byol song rnam snang mdzad la 'dus// yi dgas rin 'byung sku la 'dus//
170a5(tsha): mi ni sdang ba mtha' las 'dus// wa dang lha min don grub nyid// dmyal ba rdo rje sems dpa' 'dus// spyi'i rtswangs dngas grub ye shes ni// chu ba'i rgyan skar rtswa dz+ra
170a6(tsha): nas/ nang du 'dus nas thims par bya// gsum pa bsgrub par bya ba ni// a zhes bya ba'i yi ge nyid// kun gzhi skye med gnas gyur pa// chos sku
170a7(tsha): dri ma med par gnas// chos sku'i ngang nas gzugs skur 'char// skye med ma skyes yi ge a// rnal 'byor khong gnas chos kyi sku// bzhi pa bsgrub pa
170b1(tsha): chen po ni// gzugs kyi phung po las byung ba// bdag nyid snang mdzad 'khor lo 'chang // 'dzin 'dzag la srog 'dzin rlung // 'gyur med gnyis kar rang lus rdzogs//
170b2(tsha): tshor ba'i phung po la sa byung ba// sA rlung ser po rin 'byung nyid// ra d+ha d+hig la nor bu 'chang // lte ba sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rnam shes phung po gnas gyur pa//
170b3(tsha): badz+ra 'drig las mi dkar// chu yi rlung las rdo rje 'chang // snying kha chos kyi dkyil 'khor bzhugs// 'du shes phung po las byung ba// a ro lig ces brjod pa'i sku//
170b4(tsha): rang sngags rlung las skyes pa ni// snang ba mtha' yas pad+ma 'chang // dmar po me yis rlung las byung // longs spyod dkyil 'khor gnas na bzhugs// 'du byed phung
170b5(tsha): po gnas gyur pa// don yod grub pa ljang ser ni// prad dz+nya drig las rlung gi rlung // ral gri rgya gram 'dzin pa ste// spyi bo bde chen dkyil 'khor na// zhugs nas tshangs
170b6(tsha): pa'i bu ga ru// dkyil 'khor 'byung lnga yum du snang // bzhugs pa'i rlung lnga yab tu snang // g.yas kyi srog shing yum du snang // g.yon gyi srog shing yab tu snang //
170b7(tsha): de gnyis dbus kyi srog shing thim// pad+ma'i rnal ma phra mo yis// srid pa gsum po bcings gyur pa// til gyi sgron mes mun pa sel// n+ya skyegs me tog 'dra ba yis//
171a1(tsha): snying rje chags pa chen po yin// 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad pa// lha ni a dkar srog tu 'dus// lha ma yin gyi pu ser po// mi yi nr-i yig sngon
171a2(tsha): dang // byol song tri ni dud ka dang // yid rtags spyi dmar gnas pa dang // dmyal ba'i mi gle rkunag po// gzugs khams bsam gtan oM dang bcas// de dag gzugs
171a3(tsha): a la 'dus// skra gsung thugs kyi 'bru gsum nyid// zung 'jug hUM gis drangs nas ni// chu shing snying po ltar drang ba'i// spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gtsug tor du// rtswa na dung
171a4(tsha): gi dbyibs su grub// yi ge hUM du rnam par snang // bdud rtsi dngas ma byang chub sems// 'gros bzhi thim pas gsang ba'i sku// phyi yi lus ni rigs 'dzin nyid// tshe ni
171a5(tsha): zla dag dang mnyam// nang gi dgongs pa sangs rgyas thugs// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams ni// longs sku chos ni gsang ba nyid// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo gnas// zhes
171a6(tsha): gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ lam mchog yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
171a7(tsha): mchog gi 'bras bu mthar phyin pa 'di 'gro ba'i ched du gsungs so// rnam par rjod pa snang ba'i sku// smra rjod 'byung bar smra bas gsung // thams cad mkhyen par gsal bar
171b1(tsha): bya// 'dod dgur 'byung bas yon tan la// bya ba byed pa'i 'phrin las so// 'di dag ma 'dres yongs rdzogs bzhugs// spros dang bral bas chos kyi dbyings// gzung 'dzin
171b2(tsha): bral ba'i rig pa sa rtogs// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// skye shi med pas ga yu rdung sku// chos sku dri ma med pa nyid// sku rnams kun gyi rtsa bar gnas// chos
171b3(tsha): sku'i ngang las ma g.yos bzhin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// bde skyid longs spyod sna tshogs la// ma 'gags sku mnyam ga tar byas shing // ji ltar 'dod
171b4(tsha): bzhin dbang bskur ba// zad mi shes pa'i gter du gyur// kun gyi bde ba spyad pas na// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru bzhugs// dbang bskur longs spyod tsam nyid na//
171b5(tsha): sems can lta bur chags zhen med// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin du// ma chags ma gos rtog pa ni// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// mngon par byang chub sku ru
171b6(tsha): bzhugs// ma g.yos bzhin du 'gro rnams la// sprul pa sna tshogs snang ba ni// 'gro ba ji bzhin 'dul don mdzad// skye bar 'dul la skye bar ston// shi bar 'dul na
171b7(tsha): mya ngan 'da'// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// sprul pa chen po'i sku ru bzhugs// don mdzad pa yi dus nyid ni// skye shi'i sdug
172a1(tsha): bsngal ma gos te// rdo rje ltar gnas 'gyur ba med// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// gzhan 'joms rang la gnod med pas// rdo rje lta bu'i sku ru bzhugs//
172a2(tsha): chos sku gcig gi ngo bo las// thugs rje'i mdzad tshul sku bzhir snang // sku gsum sku bzhi sku lnga sogs// gdul bya dag dang 'thun par snang // yi ge med pa chos sku'i
172a3(tsha): gsung // don gyi gsung ste skye ba med// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// ma gsungs don gyi skye med go/ rig pa'i gsung ni longs sku'i gsung // dgongs pas 'khor
172a4(tsha): la go bar byed// ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // yi ge med pas rig pa'i gsung // tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni mngon byang gsung // re nyid med par 'gro kun gyi// go zhing /
172a5(tsha): yid du 'ong ba ni// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// yan lag dbyangs ldan sprul pa'i gsung // gsung gi sprul pas 'gro don
172a6(tsha): mdzad// bsam gyi mi khyab kun tu khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// gnod pas mi tshugs rdo rje'i gsung // phar la 'joms shing tshur mi gnod// bde ldan gsung gi don
172a7(tsha): byung bas// thams cad pad+ma'i ngang du gyur// nges par gsung mchog gcig la med// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// gdul bya rnams la tha dad snang // sna tshogs sgra rnams/
172b1(tsha): gsal bar 'byung // gcig tu 'dod la gcig tu snang // tha dad 'dod 'gyur sna tshogs snang // sangs rgyas gsung gcig bsgrags pa las// gdul bya so sor sna tshogs so//
172b2(tsha): chos sku rnam par mi rtog thugs// ye shes kyi ni chos rnams kun// mtha' yi yod med rtag tshad dang // gzung 'dzin rnam par mi rtog bzhugs// longs sku thugs kyi snang
172b3(tsha): ba ni// cir yang sal la mkhyen pa'i thugs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor me long ltar// rgyu 'bras
172b4(tsha): so sor sa le mkhyen// mngon byang 'gro ba sgrol ba'i thugs// 'dod chags bral bas 'gro ba sgrol// sprul pa'i thugs kyi dgongs pa ni// mnyam pa chen po mchog gis
172b5(tsha): thugs/ 'dod chags tha mas cad bral ba dang // 'dod chags gnas su dag pa yis// don la mnyam par bzhag pas ni// sems can kun dang mnyam par mkhyen//
172b6(tsha): rdo rje'i thugs ni 'gyur med pa// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i dus nyid na// bsgral pa med par shes pa ni// thams cad 'joms pa rdo rje'i thugs// thugs lngar snang bas ma 'dres
172b7(tsha): pa// nam mkha' 'ja' tshon bzhin tu gnas// gcig tu rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs// stong nyid nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs// yon tan lnga nyid zhing khams
173a1(tsha): ni// rang snang zhing khams phyogs med snang // brdal khya ba chen pos nam mkhar khyab// bde ba can nyid 'og min zhing // mos pa can gyi rigs drug
173a2(tsha): gnas// rig pa rang snang phyogs bcu kun// pad+ma can ni yum gyi mkha'// gzhal yas khang du snang ba ni// rang snang gzhal yas bzung ba'i yul// yongs rdzogs
173a3(tsha): gzhal yas phyi nang med// 'og min mngon par dga' la sogs// sprul sku'i tha dad ma nges gnas// rig pa'i gzhal yas 'od khang re// skye gnas gzhal yas yum
173a4(tsha): gyi mkha'// rgyun du snang bar byung ba ni// rang snang rgyan ni tsun ma spangs// don rgyun rig pa rang snang dang // rtags kyi rgyan ni mtshan dper ldan// khrims rgyan stod g.yogs/
173a5(tsha): smad dkris dang // rang bzhin chos rnams ma spangs rgyan// lus rgyan khu bu ye shes sku// 'od zer rnam pa snang ba ni// 'od gsal bsgrib pa med par gsal// ye//
173a6(tsha): shes 'od zer kun khyab don// rtag 'od rang rang kha dog drug/ 'gro 'dul dbu dang phyag zhabs 'byung // rang bzhin 'od rig thams cad kun// bde chos gsang dbang dkar
173a7(tsha): dmar 'phro// gdan khri rnams su snang ba ni// spyi gdan 'bras bu'i chos rnams rdzogs// sems can seng ge glang stag bya// khro bo gdan ni nyi ma brag/ thub pa'i pad+ma yum gyi
173b1(tsha): tshul// 'bras ldan chos nyid ji bzhin rtog/ gsang gdan nyi zla'i thig le nyid// lus gdan phung po'i rtog tshogs lha// rig bsdus yon tan nyi shu lnga// spyir na grangs nyid
173b2(tsha): bsam yas 'phro// shas che chos sku nam mkha'i zhing // longs sku gzhal yas khyim du snang // mngon byung rgyan du phug pa dang // sprul pa 'od zer dpag med 'gyed// rdo rje/
173b3(tsha): 'gyur med gdan gyi rtag/ ma 'dres yongs rdzogs bye brag spyi// che bas mdzad pa'i 'phrin las lnga// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun gyis grub// chos sku'i 'phrin las rnam pa
173b4(tsha): lnga// mtshan ma thams cad ngang gi zhi// de nyid shes bya thams cad rgyas// 'bras bu'i chos rnams dbang du 'dus// rtog pa ngang gis rlag par byed// ye nas bzhi ka/
173b5(tsha): rang gsal 'grub// ye nas gnas pa'i las bzhi yis// chos kyi sku yi 'phrin las rdzogs// longs sku'i 'phrin las rnam lnga ni// rnam snang zhi la mi bskyod drag/ rin
173b6(tsha): 'byung rgyas la snang mtha' dbang // don grub lhun gnas dngos las lnga// mngon par byang chub las lnga no// zhi ba rtog pa dag pa dang // rgyas pa'i las ni bde ba rgyas//
173b7(tsha): dbang ni ye shes rang shar ba// drag po mtshan ma zil gyis mnon// lhun grub rig pa rang la shar// dngos kyi las lngas byang chub rtog/ sprul pa sku ye 'phrin las lnga/
174a1(tsha): byams pa zhi ba snying rje rgyas// dga' ba dbang ste btang snyoms drag/ lhun grub bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi// phan 'dogs pa yi las lnga yin// rdo rje/
174a2(tsha): ye 'phrin las lnga// zhi ba stong pa rgyas pa gnas// dbang ni chags pa drag pos 'jigs// lhun grub rig pa rang snang ba// 'jig chags stong gnas bskal pa lnga// sku
174a3(tsha): lnga 'phrin las ming tsam mthun// don gyi so sor gnas pas na// rigs mi mthun pa rnams spangs nas// rigs 'thun las ni rtogs par bya// 'bras bu nyi shu rtsa lnga
174a4(tsha): po/ rnal 'byor rang la gnas pa bzhin// 'gro ba kun la gnas pas na// snang srid bzhi bzhengs mngon sangs rgyas// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'bras bu nyid// nyi ma'i dkyil
174a5(tsha): 'khor ji bzhin du// gcig gis gling bzhi'i bya ba byed// yul khams re na nyi ma re// theg 'og rang gis sku gsum thob// 'bras thob sku lnga'i ga lha dgos// theg chen
174a6(tsha): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhugs// de phyir go phye'i 'khor zhes bya// theg pa so so'i sku gsum ni// rang rang sman pa thob pa yang // nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems//
174a7(tsha): kri ya u pa yo ga dang // ma hA a nu a ti nyid// chos longs sprul pa so sor ga nas// nyan thos pa yi chos skra ni// zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'o// longs sku shAka thub
174b1(tsha): mtshan dper ldan// sprul sku byams pa nyan thos sprul// rang nyid sangs rgyas sku gsum ni// chos sku zhi ba mya ngan 'das// longs sku shAka thub chos dbang phyug/ sprul
174b2(tsha): sku rdzu 'phrul ya ma zung // byang chub sems dpa'i sku gsum snang // chos sku don dam kun tu 'od// longs sku rnam snang ye shes 'od// sprul sku shAkya thub pa nyid//
174b3(tsha): gsum nyid rtse ston sku gsum ni// dag pa chos nyid mngon byas chos// longs ska rigs gsum ma gon por snang // zhing khams tha dad don byed sprul// cha gnyis 'dzin
174b4(tsha): pa'i chos sku ni// 'od gsal mngon byas rdo rje 'chang // longs sku rigs bzhin rdo rje 'dzin// zhing khams tha dad don byed sprul// rnal 'byor sku gsum chos sku ni//
174b5(tsha): dbyings dag thug po bkod pa'i sa// longs sku rdor dbyings rnam snang yum// tha dad zhing khams don mdzad sprul// rnal 'byor chen po'i sku gsum ni// chos sku rang
174b6(tsha): 'byung 'od gsal nyid// longs sku rgyal drug yum dang 'khril// sprul sku zhi khro thub pa drug/ rjes su rnal 'byor chos sku ni// ye shes dbyings 'brel bde chen
174b7(tsha): sras// longs sku kun bzangs yab dang yum// sprul pa thub drug khyad par khro// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor sku gsum ni// ye nyid smra bas ma 'das pa'i chos// longs
175a1(tsha): sku lhun grub thun mong min// de kho na nyid yang spru la// 'og ma'i sku gsum thob pa yin// da gdod blo sems 'dir skyes pas// gong ma'i las
175a2(tsha): kyi rtogs su 'gyur// gong mas 'og spyad gol bar 'gyur// sku rnams lhun grub sku lngar thim// de las 'du 'phro snang ba ni// rgya mtshor chu bran 'byung 'jug 'dra//
175a3(tsha): nyi shu rtsa lnga kun bzangs dang // dbye ba med par gang gyur pa// sangs rgyas spyi yi gzugs can yin// rgyud kun ston pa'i rtsa bar shar// sku lnga kun bzangs dbyer
175a4(tsha): med pas// rgyal ba drug pa zhes kyang bya// rigs lnga kun bzangs dbyer med pas// rigs drug pa yi ston pa nyid// grol dang ma grol gnyis su 'dod// de ni gnyis
175a5(tsha): 'dzin mthar thug pas// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// gnyis 'dzin mtha' la mi gnas pas// tha snyad tsam du grol zhes brjod// brjod pas gzhi don
175a6(tsha): skye med rtogs// rang gnas zhen bral mngon byas pas// de la ming du grol zhes brjod// ngo bo 'di 'drar bstan par dka'// don ma gro ba'i 'og ma la// tshig phyir
175a7(tsha): blo 'breng tshig la zhe na// gang zhig nang bar khas blangs yang // de la rtogs pa'i lta ba med// tshig phyir 'breng la don med pas// tshig gis don nyid mtshon 'gyur
175b1(tsha): yang // tshig la ma gnas don la rtog/ don rtog sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'grub// tshig shes rtog ge'i spyod yul 'khrul// don la 'dra shes dpe phye ba'i// blo dman byis//
175b2(tsha): pa'i chos rnams la// yang dag lta ba ga la yod// don rnams ma nor rtogs pa ni// sems bskyed lam dang ldan pa yin// dge ba'i chos la zhugs pa yin// lta
175b3(tsha): dgongs don 'jug skal ldan yin// don rtogs ston pa'i slob dpon ni// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen yin// slob ma sa de thob byang chub sems// gang zhig don go gas
175b4(tsha): sngags chos// de gsungs gnas de 'og min nyid// de ltar sdud shes gsang bdag nyid// ces gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ 'bras bu
175b5(tsha): mthar phyin pa'i rgyud kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis ston pa dang bstan pa la bstod pa
175b6(tsha): 'di bstod do// a ma ya mtshan ngo mtshar gyis// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gyis// bstan pa bzhi nyid mngon sangs rgyas// glang chen rtsal gyis gcod
175b7(tsha): 'gyur ba// rab 'bog mtshan gyis rtog par byed// rang bzhin snang ba bcings grol bral// gzhi yi gnas lugs ye sangs rgyas// ma rig snang lugs chen po yis//
176a1(tsha): 'khrul pa'i 'khor ba gtan la 'bebs// mya ngan 'das pa'i dgongs pa yis// sku gsum sangs rgyas mdzad par shar// 'khor 'das snang
176a2(tsha): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// snang ba ma lus rtogs par 'gyur// theg pa'i khyad par rab phye ba sa// gong 'og dbye gsal rtogs par byed// thugs rje chen po'i skye tshul
176a3(tsha): gyis// gdul bya yal bar mi 'dor byed// 'dul tshul theg pa'i byung tshul gyis// chos kyi 'khor lo snang bar 'gyur// rgyan bdun rnam par phye ba yi// gsang
176a4(tsha): sngags rgyud kyis don dper rtogs// lhan cig go phye'i dri lan gyis// lhun grub ka dag don rnams rtogs// theg pa'i lha dgodras so so yi// 'khor 'das rang
176a5(tsha): snang rtsol ba dral// skal ldan rang bzhin sbyangs pa yis// gzhal yas gtan la phebs par byed// sku lnga dgongs pa bstan pa yin// dngos lngas bstan tshig
176a6(tsha): ba zhi shes byed// rigs 'dzin chos kyi byung tshul gyis// tshul lnga'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// sku lnga'i tshig la rtog pa yis// spyad du yod med shes par byed// /
176a7(tsha): gtan tshigs grangs drug phye ba yis// chos rnams gtan la phebs par 'gyur// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu bstan pa yis// shes 'jug mthar phyin rtogs par byed//
176b1(tsha): zhing khams ye shes rang shar bas// rang bzhin ye shes dab pa rab dron// tshad ma sgra mthun dbye ba yis// gtan tshags thams cad rgyas par ba shad// theg pa'i
176b2(tsha): lta spyod so so yis// chos kyi rang gzhung so sor phye// rnam gsum lha yi rim pa yis// tha mar lha skus grol bar 'gyur// theg pa'i khyad par shes bya'i phyir// lam
176b3(tsha): stegs gol ba'i che ba 'byin// cha rkyen bcu yi khyad par gyis// zag bcas zag med so sor spyod// lam gyi rnam grangs dbye ba yis// bsgrol tshul bye brag shes par
176b4(tsha): byed/ lam gyi bzlol tshul bshad pas ni// 'bras bu'i don la gnas par 'gyur// rang bzhin 'bras bu rab bshad pas// sku lnga lhun grub sku gsum shes// de bzhin
176b5(tsha): ting 'dzin ji bzhin pa// stong pa nyid dang gang ma grub// smra bsam 'das dang brjod du med// chos dbyings skye med 'dzin med dang // blo 'das spros bral de kho na// ma nor ma bcos
176b6(tsha): gzhan ma yin// don dam kun rdzob 'khrul snang dang // de bzhin gshegs dang bcom ldan 'das// mnyam nyid dbyer med gnyis med dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen
176b7(tsha): dang / rtsal med la sogs thun mong mtshan// 'og ma ji bzhin sor bzhag las// 'dir ni nges blo bzhag dka' yang // brgyad kyi dgrol ba gcig tu dbab// sgra ni rje
177a1(tsha): bzhin ji bzhin nyid// thun mong khyad par grangs nges dang // ldem dgongs de la 'ang bye brag brgyad// tshig rnams bzhi la'ang ming 'dogs phye//
177a2(tsha): de dag ston pas bka' stsal pa// rgyas par mi phye dka' ba khrol// de dag ji ltar shes 'gyur ba// glang po rab 'bog bshad pa'i rgyud// rab gsung khyed la phyag
177a3(tsha): 'tshal bstod// ces ni 'khor gyis brjod gsan nas// de nas bde gshegs rdo rje 'chang // dgongs pas rab tu gsal bar byas// snang phyogs stong phyogs
177a4(tsha): gnyis med 'bras// snang phyogs ji bzhin bshad tshul ni// de la'ang gong 'og khyad par yod// 'khrul snang blo bur spang dgag sbyang // rig pa sgyu ma'i rtsa la rang
177a5(tsha): snang // stong phyogs snang du rung mi rung // gnyis med don dam la brtsis dang // de mi 'dor la kun rdzob yang // ngan spangs bzang rtsis 'bras bu'i grangs// bzhi
177a6(tsha): nas lam gyis hril mo'o// gang gis 'dod pa'i rgyab logs ni// ji bzhin ma yin mi spongs pa'o// zhen kyang de kun thun mong bas// 'dir yang mi spong nam mkha'
177a7(tsha): bzhin// khyad bshad tshig gcig ngo bo la// don ni du ma 'byung bar shes// mtshan rnams thun mongs gsungs pa ni// 'og ma drangs phyir nges tshig 'grub// nges
177b1(tsha): don tshig gcig don la yang // blo dpag dka' bar khong du chud// dgongs pa bzhi dang ldem po bzhi// brgyad kyis gtan la phab ste bshad// glang po rab 'bog pasha/
177b2(tsha): pa'i rgyud// me shel bzhin du dag 'gyur zhing // nyi ma sprin dang bral 'gyur bas// smra ba rlan med reg pa sa ni// de la me ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bla ma chos kyi sdong
177b3(tsha): po nyid// rab 'byams bka' yi nyi ma shar// slob ma bla ma'i thugs la reg/ sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur// thos bsam sgom la brtson byas nas//
177b4(tsha): blo nyid sbyangs par ma gyur yang // bla ma'i gdam ngag stobs kyis ni// thabs kyi man ngag 'chad 'gyur bas// sngon du dbang rnams rdzogs byas la// rtsa sngags thig le
177b5(tsha): rlung la skrangs// dbang po shin tu dman pa dang // shes rab chung ba dad brtson gyis// 'grub 'gyur thabs kyi lam la sbyang // glang po rab 'bogs bshad pa'i
177b6(tsha): rgyud// mu shel dri ma med pa dang // zla ba sprin bcas tshogs dang bral// 'khar ga zhong dag pa'i nang bzhag na// chu yi rgyun rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// bla ma rgyud
177b7(tsha): lung lta bas bsgyings// bstan pa rgya mtsho'i chu yi rgyun// slob rgyud 'khar gzhong nang du 'bab// thos pa'i shes rab sgra la dmigs// rna ba'i dbang po nyan par bya//
178a1(tsha): bsam pa'i shes rab sgra don 'dres// lce yis phyung la yid la brtags// bsgom pa'i shes rab yid la gnas// don phyir rang gi mtshan nyid
178a2(tsha): rtogs// grol la ma rgyud la lta ba skye// rang gi shes rab nyams su myong // mtsho 'gram pad+ma'i sdong po 'bar// nags kyi bung bas pa da sbrang len// rang ki lus
178a3(tsha): dang bu rnams ga so// chu ya sbal pa pad+ma yi// spu gzugs nyi ma'i bsi la grib bsnyeg/ skyon du bltas nas 'byar ma nus// bla ma pad+ma'i me tog rgyas// snod
178a4(tsha): ldan thag rings gdam ngag bcud// blangs nas rang bsgoms 'gro rnams 'dul// chos kyi sgron mas mun pa sel// snod ngan sbal bu tsar gnas pas// yin
178a5(tsha): tan mi shes skyon rnams mthong // gshe skur sgros spong skyur yang 'debs// chos kyi bdud rtsi skam par 'gyur// ngan song gnas su gnas par byed// nam mkha'
178a6(tsha): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na// sprin nag phung po rab tu 'thibs// 'brug gi sgra yang thog ser 'khrugs// lo tog 'joms shing yul mkhar brlag/ char gyi rgyun
178a7(tsha): 'bab sa gzhi bsnam// rtse bcud 'khrungs pas gsos 'gyur bas// 'gro rnams bza' btung phun sum tshogs// dgongs ldan rtogs pa'i slob dpon la// yul khams
178b1(tsha): slob ma'i sprin 'dus nas// bsgom bsgrub gsang sngags sgra sgrags pas// pho nya sprul pa'i thog ser gyis// dngos grub lo tog 'phrog pa'i bgegs// gnas brten
178b2(tsha): rang lus rdul du rlag/ dngos grub char gyi rgyun 'bab pas// yul khams bkra sha sa rang rgyud bsnu ma// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub gsol// zag med skom gyi
178b3(tsha): dmyal tshogs zhi// bde chen zas kyis yid btag bral// dngos grub rang gzhan bde la bkod// rgya mtsho nas 'ab ba gang+gA chu// bu mos blangs nas mi gtsang
178b4(tsha): 'khrud// me long nang shar dri ma med// byad kyi bkrag ma dngas 'bar 'gyur bas// kun gyis srid spong de la 'khor// de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par smon//
178b5(tsha): sangs rgyas dgongs pa rgya mtsho nas// bla mas dbang gi chu bo rdzogs// rigs ma bu mo mtshan ldan la// mi gtsang 'khru ba sa bu la sbyin// snod ldan bu la bde ba
178b6(tsha): rgyas/ tha mal 'dod chags dri ma med// chags pa nyid kyis grol gyur pa// kun tu lus ni bu chung 'dra// tshe ni nyi zla dag dang ma nyam// mi rnams bu bzhin kun yi
178b7(tsha): 'ong / ma dang mkha' 'gro'i 'khor gyis bskor// sku gsum 'bras thob mi 'bral zhing // mkha' spyod gnas su 'gro bar smon// bde chen 'du 'bral med pa yin// kun
179a1(tsha): bzangs yab yum sras dang bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'byin par byed// mthong yul kun tu bzang mo nyid// yum lnga chos dbyings gzhal yas
179a2(tsha): khang // yid ni kun tu bzang por gnas// yab lnga ye shes chen por gnas// dbyings dang ye shes dbyer med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rgyud// rgyu
179a3(tsha): spun 'khrugs pa'i thags btags pas// na bzas drang ba skyob cing mdzes// theg chen dam chos bcud za ba// lus la drod 'bar phyi rol brjid// sdug bsngal nad
179a4(tsha): sel sman 'dra'i rgyud// bcud len mdangs bzangs tshe srog 'dzin// dam chos sman gyis gcong nad sel// lus gzhon tshe yi dngos grub brnyes// rgya mtsho che las
179a5(tsha): chu rgyun 'bab// 'gro ba rnams kyi gsos gyur nas// skom nad tsha ba'i gdung ba bral// slar nyid rgya mtsho nyid du thim// chos dbyings rgya mtsho ye shes chu// 'gro
179a6(tsha): baba'i lus ngag yid bkrus nas// dug lnga rgyal ba rigs lngar smin// dug gsum sku gsum thob par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngang na bzhugs// glang po rab
179a7(tsha): 'bog bshad pa'i rgyud// 'gro ba'i don du khyed rnams zung // de skad ston pas gtad gyur pas// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis// mgrin gcig smras pa
179b1(tsha): 'di gsungs so// chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na// chos sku dri ma med pa bzhugs// lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs 'dzin gyis// rgyal tshab ston pa zhal gyis bzhes// de la
179b2(tsha): 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// chos sku bstan pa rgyas par 'gyur// 'og min gnas kyi bla ma na// longs sku rigs lnga sangs rgyas bzhugs// phyag rgya chen po'i rigs
179b3(tsha): 'dzin gyis// rgyal chab ston pa zhal gyis bzhes// de la bdud pa'i byang sems 'khor// longs sku bstan pa rgyas par 'gyur// 'dzam gling bye ba phrag brgyan//
179b4(tsha): sprul sku thub pa drug rnams bzhugs// tshe la dbang thob rigs 'dzin gyis// rgyal tsha ba ston pa'i rgyud gzung nas// khams gsum sems can ma lus la// sprul
179b5(tsha): sku'i bstan pa rgyas par 'gyur// rgyas mdzad rnam smin rigs 'dzin gyis// chos kyi sgron me 'bar ba la// sdud pas bsdus bzhin rgyas mdzad pa// ma mo mkha' 'gro
179b6(tsha): bka' bsrungs byed// 'khor ba sangs rgyas sa la 'dren// rgyud mchog gsungs la rje yi rang // zhes gsungs so// glang po che rab 'bogs kyi rgyud las/ rjes su ye
179b7(tsha): rang ba ste le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // glang po rab 'bog bshad pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi paN+Di
180a1(tsha): ta bi ga mu tral dang / lo tsha ba 'jing gsal 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
180a2(tsha): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams
180a3(tsha): cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi sdom pa/ gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i dbang brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
180a4(tsha): khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skal ba dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams
180a5(tsha): cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ mtha' med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gsang ba/ zla gsang thig le'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
180a6(tsha): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rin po che rdo rje/ mchog tu gsang ba chen po zla gsang thig le chen po'i bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so// sangs
180a7(tsha): rgyas kyi zhing nam ma pa'i dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa 'ordo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rdo rjenam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mtha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang /
180b1(tsha): skal ba dang ldan pa dang / 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba chen po'i g.yog dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha yi tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong
180b2(tsha): gis kun tu khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor/
180b3(tsha): gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / so so kun tu rtogs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal
180b4(tsha): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor
180b5(tsha): gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi da pab phyag chen po dang / rlung gi yang shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
180b6(tsha): chen po dang / me'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / chu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sa'i ye
180b7(tsha): shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi ye shes chen po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gzugs
181a1(tsha): kyi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sgra yi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
181a2(tsha): dang dri'i dbang ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / reg gi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /
181a3(tsha): glu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gsung gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / thugs kyi ye shes rdo
181a4(tsha): zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / kun tu bzang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
181a5(tsha): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gsung gi dbang po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya
181a6(tsha): ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / zhi ba ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / gdul dka' ba 'dul ba ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal
181a7(tsha): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / me tog gi mtshon cha'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal
181b1(tsha): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rab tu dga' ba ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyu
181b2(tsha): chen po dang / nyi ma'i khro bo'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal mtshan bsgreng bya ba ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
181b3(tsha): chen po dang / rdo rje sgra chen bzhad pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang
181b4(tsha): phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyu yi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang
181b5(tsha): gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / go cha'i
181b6(tsha): ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / yang dag par za bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'dus
181b7(tsha): pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / byang chub kyi
182a1(tsha): sems ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / pad+ma dmar po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /
182a2(tsha): dam tshig gi ye shes rdo rje zhes zla ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khya
182a3(tsha): rnams dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa tshad med pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba ye shes rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i
182a4(tsha): rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / gdung bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya
182a5(tsha): ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / myos par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma chen mo drang / gsod par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i zhes bya ba'i
182a6(tsha): rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang / rdo rje dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / ye shes dbyings byug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
182a7(tsha): chen mo dang / rin chen dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / pad+mo dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang /
182b1(tsha): las kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mos nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu khyab pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gnon
182b2(tsha): par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang / 'dzums par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang / rmongs par byed ces bya/
182b3(tsha): ba'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang / rgyas 'debs par byed ces bya ba'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dang / 'dren par byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la
182b4(tsha): 'gro ma dang / gsod byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / 'bigs par byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / bcud byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha'
182b5(tsha): la 'gro ma dang / bsdigs byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / tshig byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed ces
182b6(tsha): bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / 'jib byed ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / khrag la dga' ma zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / gcod byed
182b7(tsha): ces bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / 'phyan ma zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / ngag 'phrog pa zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / zas sha rlon
183a1(tsha): pa za zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / srin mo zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin mo zhes bya ba rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang
183a2(tsha): 6gnod byed mo zhes bya ba nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / sbrul dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ri dwags dang / phag dang / spre'u dang / khyi dang / byi la dang / ra dang / bya rog
183a3(tsha): dang / kha ta dang / bya rgod dang / sre mong dang / mi'i keng rus dang / 'bu chen po'i ro dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / ma
183a4(tsha): dang / ba glang dang / 'ug pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa chen mo dang / de dag la sogs pa mtha' yas pa mchog/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo/
183a5(tsha): nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po rnams sgra ca co 'byin cing / nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byams chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi
183a6(tsha): mchod pa byed pa na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' chen po shin tu dges pa gdon mi za ba'i dam
183a7(tsha): tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbapa mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos rab tu rnam par rol pa dang / spo ba chen po'i gar dang /
183b1(tsha): glu dang / sil snyan dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa'i bde ba chen po dang / bde ba 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i dga'
183b2(tsha): bde la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chul chen pos 'phags par gyur pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnon pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
183b3(tsha): 'khyud pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gar byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis za bar byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun
183b4(tsha): tu 'jib par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dpa' bar byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bzlog par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis myang bar byed pa dang //
183b5(tsha): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'gyur bar byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'phrog par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtsom par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dus
183b6(tsha): kun tu 'debs par byed pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs chen po shin tu dgas pa'i bde ba nye bar stobs shing / reg pa bde ba'i ros bskal pa brgya stong mang po bye ba phrag brgya
183b7(tsha): stong tshad med par nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jug pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyong ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
184a1(tsha): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ mi dgongs/ dgongs pa yang nye bar mi 'jog/ thams cad thabs dang shes rab stong par yang
184a2(tsha): mi mdzad/ shin tu dga' ba phyin ci log nye bar 'jog par yang mi mdzad/ ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul brdzal dul ba yang mi mdzad/ nye bar gtses pa rnams
184a3(tsha): 'tshe bzhi par yang mi mdzad/ mA 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam
184a4(tsha): par rmongs pa sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa mi 'gyur bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar ma gyur pa dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ ma khros pa khros par yang mi
184a5(tsha): mdzad/ mi gdug pa gdug par yang mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen po la sogs pa dang / drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang /
184a6(tsha): lha ma yin dang / log 'dren dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i dug chen po dang / tsha ba'i gdon dang /
184a7(tsha): nad dang / sprul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par 'dul ba yang mi mdzad do// de nas de bzhin
184b1(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/ spyan gnyis ka mi 'dzum pas gzigs shing / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin
184b2(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i
184b3(tsha): dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa ste/ rnam dag byang chub sems dpa' rgya che sras su bcas pa rnam//
184b4(tsha): yun rings stong pa nyid bsgoms pas ni shin tu gdungs pa la// dga' ba'i yid 'ong bde ba chen po nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// kye 'dod chags de ni dri med spyod pa kun tu bzang po
184b5(tsha): spyod pa ste// dag pa rdo rje 'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas// dga' ba rnam pa drug po spyod pas shin tu dungs pa yis// rab tu dges dbang 'dod pa med la nyid kyis 'jog
184b6(tsha): par mdzod// rnam dag rdo rje las ni byung ba'i ye shes chus// rin chen 'bar ba byang chub sems ni rnams phyung nas// rgyal ba thams cad kun gyi dbu ni sgoms pa la// dri med
184b7(tsha): rin chen char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod// mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pas// pad+mo'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod mthong bas// sna tshogs sems dpa' sems
185a1(tsha): can brlag 'gyur ba// sbyor ba gzhan med ma thogs bshad par gsol// rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde bar byed pa'i mdzod// rdo rje pad+ma dbye ba'i tshul
185a2(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dgos pa bde ba chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbyangs des
185a3(tsha): bskul bar thugs su chud nas bzhengs te/ brjid pa dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing zhal 'dzum pa/ 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan mdzes pas smin
185a4(tsha): ris bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+mo phyag gi sor mo g.yas g.yon gar gyi 'phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa yi ngos la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskum pa dang /
185a5(tsha): 'jog cing ldeg pa'i rnam par gnon pas/ nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ rlung la kun
185a6(tsha): tu khyab nas/ me'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de yang kun tu khyab nas/ chu'i khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ chu'i khams kun tu khyab nas/ sa'i
185b1(tsha): khams chen po kun tu khyab par mdzad/ de yang kun tu khyab nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kum tu khyab par mdzad de/ ri dang / sems dang / sna tshogs dang /
185b2(tsha): pra ba dang / sdom pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / rgan po dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skar ma dang / gshi
185b3(tsha): rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung po dang / 'byung po las gyur pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin gyis
185b4(tsha): kun tu rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar cher gyur nas/ yang 'dus nas
185b5(tsha): phyug gar dang bcas pa khong stong du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po la gtsug gis 'dud pas gsol ba btab pa/ dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba
185b6(tsha): mis// blu gsang thig le dga'abyod pa// gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol// sems can kun ni ma skyes pas/
185b7(tsha): skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ dri med nam mkha' dang
186a1(tsha): 'dra ba'i// rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bya ste// nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur ba'o// chos kyi longs spyod yang dag 'byung // pad+ma dmar po mchog gi mdog
186a2(tsha): 'dod chags de nyid gsang chen pa// thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi'i mchog/ la dang ar ni yang dag ldan// yang dag mdzes pa'i 'gying ba'i ros// sna tshogs ye shes sna
186a3(tsha): tshogs che// zla gsang thig le mchog nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs
186a4(tsha): pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug
186a5(tsha): so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po lade kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul te/
186a6(tsha): bzhengs par mdzad do// o A hU/ ma hA su ka a la la ho/ ma hA su ma tash+lA/ su ra ta su ta/ a ta b+ha ya g+ha/ su ra tod ta ma b+ho d+hi su ka na/ su ka ma nu sid d+h+ya he/ su ra ta a
186a7(tsha): ti ba so kya ma ya/ oM hUM a ho/ b+ha ga ban ma hA su ka/ ud d+ha ra ud d+ha ra/ sarbod ta ma so/ krA ya ma hU/ a la la hU/ ma hA su ka shAM/ ba ra ma su ka ma len du byi byo tog ta
186b1(tsha): dza le su kha na/ a la la ho/ su ra ta so'u khya gu na/ oM hUM aM/ mi skye ye shes bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i ro la man ba su gsol/ a la la ho/ sems dpa' bde
186b2(tsha): mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslang ba'i phyir// chags pa med pa'i bde mchog kun tu myangs mdzad bzhengs shing mnabs// mchog tu gsang ba'i bde la rol
186b3(tsha): cing dam bcas 'dzin sgrol// byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig ho/ sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang nyon mongs sngo skams
186b4(tsha): gzir ba yis// rmongs byed bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis skul te go bar mdzod// 'gro kun mtshungs par spyod pa'i sgo mor byang chub lam ston cing // bde
186b5(tsha): mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig/ a la la ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po nam mkha'i
186b6(tsha): dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po zla gsang thig le skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
186b7(tsha): snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i thig le 'di las shin tu dgos pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
187a1(tsha): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla gsang thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du yang snang bar byas te/ steng dang
187a2(tsha): 'og tu yang zhugs te ma lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang sems can rnams la gsal bar byas nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te slar de nyid du log
187a3(tsha): nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu mnyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po snying po'i gsang ba mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus na bde bar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
187a4(tsha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis 'phreng ba mchog tu bde ba chen por gyur pa'i snying po des bskul ba dang / gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge
187a5(tsha): 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i thugs kha'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dges pa chen po'i bde bar gcig
187a6(tsha): tu stug por gyur par sgrubs te/ rang rang gi sku la bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas mngon par 'byung bar gyur to// de nas la la ni spyan
187a7(tsha): pad+ma 'bar ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur cing bzlog ste/ smin ris rab tu g.yo bas/ sangs rgyas tshul gyi gar mdzad cing // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil du// rdo rje rab
187b1(tsha): dges gdon mi za// sems dpa' che la dges mdzad cing // sangs rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yis// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bzhugs par gyur// smin ma bsgyur
187b2(tsha): cing zhabs bsgyur ba// spyan bsgyur shin tu gnod pa yis// sor mo tha ma rnams bsgyur bas// rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad de// rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad cing // rdo rje rnal
187b3(tsha): 'byor ma dkyil tu// skad cig skad cig bskul ba yis// bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur// brjid pa'i zhabs dang rin chen dbu// dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing //
187b4(tsha): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsgyur bas// bde byed chen po myang bar mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis// pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing // bde chen
187b5(tsha): bdag po chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// shin tu dgyes gsal bde dam pa// pad+ma dmar la che mdzad de// 'dod chags bral dgyes rnam bsgyur
187b6(tsha): bas/ pad+mo 'dra bas gar mdzad cing // pad+mo rnal 'byor ma dkyil gyis// brjid pa'i phyag gis kun gzigs te// bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing // bcom ldan
187b7(tsha): 'das pad+mor gnas par gyur// phyag gi rtse mo sor mo'i mtha'// rnam par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing // phyag sbyar khong stong pad+mo yis// glog bzhin dpral dang
188a1(tsha): spyi gtsug tu// mchod ma'i sprin gyis long long po sa// sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing // sna tshogs
188a2(tsha): bcom ldan 'das gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chen po sa/ de bzhin gshegs
188a3(tsha): pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po ni
188a4(tsha): dang pad+ma dang / las kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad bzhed pa bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/ 'od zer chen po'i sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
188a5(tsha): mchog las phyung ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di dag thams cad la snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi sku dang lug yus kyi zla ba'i thig le la stug po gcig tu
188a6(tsha): gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su/ 'od zer des dgyes pa skyed cing / drangs bcug/ bcings/ dbang du byas/ nyid kyi sku dang /
188a7(tsha): gsung dang / thugs shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za bar rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
188b1(tsha): kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po/ shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
188b2(tsha): gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyis su// cho ga sbyor bas spro byas te// theg dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor don// sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar bya zhing // ji ltar yang
188b3(tsha): dag brtag par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na// zla gsang thig le'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang // dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags
188b4(tsha): pa/ snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs kyi// lha yi sbyor bas rgyas btab pa// cho ga shes pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan//
188b5(tsha): thig bzhi yongs su bris pa ste// ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas// kun tu yongs su zlum pa yis// zla ba de yi dbus bcas pa// bde ba chen po mi phyed pa// gtso
188b6(tsha): bo de steng bri bar bya// de ni tsheg drag bcas pa yi// yi ge bcu gsum ldan pa yis// yi ge mchog tu bde ba ste// rlung gi dkyil 'khor yang dgra 'byung // shes rab
188b7(tsha): can gyis de'i mdun du// mi phyed yid phyung bri bya ste// drag po tshig dang ldan par bcas// bzhi yi gtsug tu byas pa'o// de yi lho yi phyogs su ni// mi smra ba yi yi ge
189a1(tsha): tshogs// phyag rgya ye shes mchog thams cad// sgrub par byed pa'i yi ge bris// ha dang rang ldan tsheg drag bcas// bzhi pa yis ni dbur
189a2(tsha): byas pa/ sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ge ni// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// khro bo yi ge yang shes che// yi ge phyag rgya rmad byung ba// brjid du bcas pa dgod pa'i
189a3(tsha): yid/ byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya// sems can thams cad mchog dag dang // dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub phyir// nga yi de ni gsung gi ni// dkyil 'khor de
189a4(tsha): nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can mchog gis ston byed na// de nyid sangs rgyas
189a5(tsha): byang chub 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa
189a6(tsha): chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la gar mdzad cing rab tu spros pa'i spyan gdangs nas/ zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis// sdud cing 'dor ba 'dzugs
189a7(tsha): pa mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis// brjid pa rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan// mdzes pa'i sman tshug
189b1(tsha): rnams bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pas// 'gro la rgyas btab 'dus par 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la// dbyangs 'di yis ni bsku
189b2(tsha): mdzad cing // shin tu dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par gyur// shin tu dgyes chen rdo rje bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po//
189b3(tsha): dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yis// de nyid bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bshad do// la na d+ha 'u phra 'i su ra a ma hA su pU ag gu/ a la la ho/ ma hA su hus ya
189b4(tsha): lu ta thA ga tu di pu/ rnam pa kun tu skye ba med pa yis// bde bas rol cing chub par mdzad pa yi// bdag cag gzungs kyi dam dang bcas pa rnam dpyod 'gyur ba med pa'i
189b5(tsha): yid// bde mchog byang chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te// che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog ldan pade spyod bde la rol pa mdzod// 'di
189b6(tsha): ni glu ru blangs pa yis// shin tu srid las mya ngan 'das// dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlob// de
189b7(tsha): nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas/ rgyas pa spyan ut+pa la kha phye ba bzhin tu smin ma dang sku rnam par 'gyur ba glog dang chu rlabs
190a1(tsha): bzhin du 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor dkyil
190a2(tsha): 'khor zhes bya ba// rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog nyid ni/ bdag nyid sbyor bas brtags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yin//
190a3(tsha): dkyil 'khor zla ba grang 'dra ba// 'od zer dkar po'i 'phreng bas mdzes// byang chub sems mchog 'dra ba yin// shin tu dgyes pa'i mchog sgrub pa// rdo rje rin
190a4(tsha): chen dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi// 'bar dang bcas pa nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor rgyas mchog 'gyur byed pa// pad+ma dbang po'i 'dab
190a5(tsha): ma 'dra// 'dab ma brgyad pa gyes pa yis// ge sar ze bas mdzes byas pa'o// thams cad las ni grub byed pa// rdo rje las ni dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil
190a6(tsha): 'khor gru gsum ste// rab tu 'bar ba'i me dang 'dra// de la stsogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtags bya ste// skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis//
190a7(tsha): ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang bzhengs nas brjid pa'i rdo rje'i gar gyis gar mdzad
190b1(tsha): nas/ glu dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / bi wa nga dang / rdza rnga dang / tu na wa dang / pan pa dang / ba la kya dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang / rnam pa sna/
190b2(tsha): tshogs kun tu brdung ba dang / sil snyan sna tshogs pa'i rnam par rol pas/ lha'i ro dang / ro yi zas dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang
190b3(tsha): theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / ldeg pa dang / bzhib pa dang / 'jams pa la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal
190b4(tsha): rdo rje 'dzin la bstabs nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas pad+mo'i sor mo khong stong du mdzad de/ g.yon du 'dud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/
190b5(tsha): yang de kho na nyid skul bar byed pa'i dbyangs 'dis bskul bar mdzad do// ho pa ra su ra ta su kha wa/ ha khra su ka mad tA ya su'u kya ma ya/ sa ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ su ra ta
190b6(tsha): so'u kya pa ste/ sha ma tsa rid tAM su ga ta shan ta ma ya ma pra b+h+ri kur rba ku rArba/ su ra ta tI ba ba/ badz+ra dza le/ phra bi badz+ri ma badz+ri ma pa/ su ra trod su kha rad na dza lo/ phra bi
190b7(tsha): nar rta nar ta/ su ka sa tan badz+ra dza le/ phra bi ma ra d+ha mar d+ha/ su ra ta b+h+yi sha b+h+yi sha dza laM/ ho ha hUM d+hi/ ho ho nga ya ma hA su ka te tsa ma ya/ ra ma ra ma ho/ su ra ta ka tu su
191a1(tsha): #ka ba hu b+hid te tse mu tra dza ya te tsa d+ha ra/ ha ha ha ho/ ba ra ha sa su kha ho/ hU ho ho su ra ho d+ha ra ga su kha/ ra ti ra ti ra ti ta pa ra ma shri d+ha ti ho ho pa ra ma he du
191a2(tsha): ma hA su ka ho/ su ka ma nu mo'u na pa ra mo shwa ra ho b+ha ga ba na ma hA su ka hU ho ho/ pa hu bi bi ta bi sha dzA la rad tib+h+yi/ sha ma ho su ra su kha ma ga tsi tra pa ra ma hA su ka ho/ su kha ma
191a3(tsha): nu krin na ho/ su ra to ta ta ma san ti su ka hU/ badz+ra la li hU ma hA su ka grin na ho/ ho shin tu bde ba'i byams pas kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje'i spyan mnga' ba// byang
191a4(tsha): chub chen po'i snying por 'gro ba sgrol bas skyo yid mi mnga' ste// mthun pa'i lam bstan nyon mongs dug las bsgral ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i tshul du gzungs kyi rang
191a5(tsha): bzhin bde gshegs kun la stob// e ma ho bde ba kun tu rgya yis btab pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing mnabs// sa yi khyad par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid
191a6(tsha): stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin// chos nyid ji bzhin pa de la reg pas sku nyid che ba kun ston te// snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro la thabs kyi sgo mo bsam gyis
191a7(tsha): mi khyab bstan// dpal gyi snying po gzungs su bstan te rigs lnga'i gtso rnams mnyes mdzad cing // dgyes pa drongs la mnabs shing rab tu dges pa sa rol mo
191b1(tsha): mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde brno bas bying ba'i gnasnga nas bslang ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gag med pa'i tshul dang rnam par ldan// snying rje
191b2(tsha): chen pos rgyun dang bcas nas bde ba chen po smyon pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin// dgyes pa mchog gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo bskyed pa dang // rol pas
191b3(tsha): 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog sprul pa mdzod// ha ha ha ho bde med mnobs hUM dgyes pa mchog dang dpal ldan pa'i mi skye bde mchog de nyid char pa rab tung bab tu
191b4(tsha): gso la// rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// dpal gyi rgyal po 'i tshul bzhin ji ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas
191b5(tsha): bsgrubs su gsol// ngo mtshar byang chub tshe 'dir 'gro dang rten bzhin pa de thob pa// pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la 'ang mi rten par// mi skye mya ngan 'das
191b6(tsha): pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan// mtha' dang bral ba'i bde bas chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yis// rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'gro la
191b7(tsha): snying rje'i chus khrus mdzod ho// shin tu dges mchog mi chags pa// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// yid dang 'thad pa'i bde chen po// dngos grub myur du thab
192a1(tsha): par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
192a2(tsha): cad kyi gsol ba'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba gnas nas/ yang chu skyes kyi 'dab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun tu gzigs shing / 'dzum pa dang
192a3(tsha): bcas pa'i zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phran gyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa sprin
192a4(tsha): gyis rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin
192a5(tsha): gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin chen po thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po
192a6(tsha): dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon pa dang / dbang ba dang / sgom mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo'i g.yog gi tshogs dang / tshad med pa 'dren
192a7(tsha): par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs dang / grangs
192b1(tsha): med pa'i rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor gyi
192b2(tsha): dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang
192b3(tsha): bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas brdeg cing tshems kyis 'debs dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'bre
192b4(tsha): pa'i phyag gi gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par bsgyur ba dang bcas pas sgeg pas bgying ba dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa rnams dang / kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam
192b5(tsha): par gnon pa'i 'khor tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs nas/ dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po
192b6(tsha): 'di nyid kyis sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang // de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang // sngags dang phyag rgya'i de nyid ni//
192b7(tsha): de yi dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das// rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa// 'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das// 'di ni
193a1(tsha): dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya// chos dang chos min rnam dpyod pa// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yis//
193a2(tsha): dkyil 'khor 'di ni brtan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam// chu yis pad+ma dmar po 'dra// rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags// 'di ni dkyil
193a3(tsha): 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pa// gang khams kun la 'jug gyur pa// sems ni chu dang skul byed pa'i// dkyil gyi 'khor zhes bya ba'o//
193a4(tsha): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa/ pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang /
193a5(tsha): nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad/ yang bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa gtso bo chen po la phyag 'chal nas
193a6(tsha): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma hor ba dgyes sems dpa'i mchog/ kye ma 'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mchog gis// dkyil 'khor
193a7(tsha): gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor ba che// rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med// 'jigs gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur ba'i// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
193b1(tsha): nyid kyis gsungs// rin chen pad+mo sna tshogs che// sna tshogs sbyor ba gar mdzad pa// rnam grangs thig le 'jig rten du// rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid du gsungs//
193b2(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+mo'i sor mo 'dab ma kun tu 'brel ba'i rdo rje thal mo dang / ga
193b3(tsha): rnam par 'gyur bas brjid bag tu bcas pas mtha' 'grol cing / ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas/ chu skyes sar pa'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs pas bzhad pa dang /
193b4(tsha): glu'i phyag rgya dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig bskul ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa la 'debs shing g.yas dang g.yon gyi rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyis
193b5(tsha): oM a la la hau/ ag gu'u ra a ma hA su hu/ ag gu'u/ a la la ho/ ma hA su hu A ga'u ra a ma hA su hu tud du/ kun tu snang zhing mi chags pa ra// mi chags
193b6(tsha): pa yi bde mchog gis// bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzungs kyi rnams// stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// a la la ho/ bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin
193b7(tsha): de/ bzhengs cig gzhan la stobs la grub par mdzod// chags pas migs dngos po'i bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol/
194a1(tsha): de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs chen pos bskul bas thugs sad par gyur/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun
194a2(tsha): tu longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgos pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis dkyil
194a3(tsha): 'khor chen po 'dir tshogs pa shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rnam par gnon pas gar mdzad/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyi mgur len/ rdo rje rnam par
194a4(tsha): rol pa chen pos rnam par rol// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i bzhad pa bzhad cing zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil nas/ ma hA su ka hUM zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
194a5(tsha): kyis bdag mo ye shes dbyings phyug ma byung ngo // de steng zla gam ldan pa yis// gnyis po yi ge ma lta bu// mtshan du tsheg drag ldan byas pa// ye shes gsal ba rnal 'byor ma'o//
194a6(tsha): A li kA li 'dren bya ba// dbus su ri mo brtag bya ste// de yi mgo dang mjug nyid du// khro bo gnyis po mchog bsam bya// 'di ni btsun mo rab gsal ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal
194a7(tsha): 'byor ma'i// 'di na dran pa tsam gyis kyang // bsod nams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// a li gnyis dbus ri mor bri// ldan pa 'dren dang yang dag ldan// steng du zla gam thig le
194b1(tsha): dga'/ mgo mjug tu ni gzhan yang traM// 'di ni don dam gsal ba ste// rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin// dran pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par
194b2(tsha): byed/ a li gnyis dang ldan byas te// tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad// 'di ni rab dga' kun chags pas// chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang por skal ba chen mo yis//
194b3(tsha): tsheg drag po dang bcas pa gzhan// sangs rgyas kun gyi a li 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la 'am yang na gzhan// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste//
194b4(tsha): bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub byas na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog/ yi ge phyag rgya mngon gnas pa// 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci
194b5(tsha): 'dra ba// bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur// e ma ho bde ba ye shes che'am// de yis ye shes tshe 'di la// 'dod byed bde la rten byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur//
194b6(tsha): khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las phyag rgya mchog gzhan med// sgrub pa po dang sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// zla gsang thig le
194b7(tsha): gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun
195a1(tsha): mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang po rdzogs so//
195a2(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dges pa'i yid che ba'i bde ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba bskyed nas/ gar dang shin
195a3(tsha): tu dges pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa mdzad cing / yang shin tu dgos pa chen po'i bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol
195a4(tsha): ba 'debs par gyur to// bde byed chen po bshad pa shod// bde ba chen po bshad pa shod// gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod// dgyes pa chen po bshad pa shod// khyod las 'dod
195a5(tsha): chags yang dag 'byung // khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste// khyod las bde byed sdug bsngal dang // khyod las khams gsum thams cad byung // khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang // khyod
195a6(tsha): las 'dod gzer bud med dang // khyod las 'dod pa rnam grol dang // khyod las bla med byang chub 'byung // khyod las nam mkha' rlung dag dang // khyod las gzi brjid me yi rnams//
195a7(tsha): khyod las de bzhin chu dngas// khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun// khyod las sangs rgyas dpa' chen po// yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod las chos dang dge 'dun
195b1(tsha): dang // khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen dang // ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung // khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang // khyod las dri med pad+ma dang //
195b2(tsha): khyod las rin chen tshad med che// de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung // khyod las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams// khyod las rig pa'i skying nas 'byung // de nas bcom ldan
195b3(tsha): 'das spyan mi 'dzum pas smin ma bskyang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen
195b4(tsha): mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang /
195b5(tsha): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa kun nas 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig tu
195b6(tsha): kun tu gzigs nas/ brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam po sa/ nyid kyi snying kha'i rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rdo rje rjes su chags pas rab tu rgyas pa chen
195b7(tsha): po'i lta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ nyid kyi thugs kyi pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas 'od zer phyung ste/ kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlas
196a1(tsha): nas shin tu dges pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dang po
196a2(tsha): yi ge bcu gsum pa// thig ler bcas pa bsam bya ste// bde chen tshul bzhin bzhag byas la// gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler bcas// yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru// tshul
196a3(tsha): bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag/ 'di ni gsang ba chen po ste// rmad byung yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// bde chen bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags pa yin// ye shes kyis
196a4(tsha): ni phyag rgya 'dis// skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa'o// ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// bde ba chen po skul byed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
196a5(tsha): rtogs par byed// yi ge'i ye shes 'grub pa yis// ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// 'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che// mig shes sdigs pa 'joms par byed// rdo rje
196a6(tsha): sems dpa' nyid 'dra ba// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po'i rig pa che// sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed do// shes rab ye shes dngos grub che// byang chub
196a7(tsha): myur du thob 'gyur te// rigs pa 'bum phrag brgyas bskor cing // sems dpa' chen po de dag btsen// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// thal mo bskyang ste rol pa yis//
196b1(tsha): dang lang tsho skal dang ldan// dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa yi ni dgos pa rnams// myur ba nyid du 'grub 'gyur te// 'og dang steng gi nam mkha' la// bdag
196b2(tsha): 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed// sa yang rnam par phug nas su// stobs chen 'dir ni 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de// byang chub pa ni gdon mi za// bde ba chen po
196b3(tsha): rnam mdzad pas// gzhom zhing de bzhin myang ba yin// rdo rje blo yis bdud kyis rnams// rnam par 'gyur ba thams cad bsgral// bde ba chen po mthong ba yis// skad cig nyid du
196b4(tsha): gso bar bya// grub pa rdo rje 'dzin pa che// dpa' bo chen po dgug par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par// rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen
196b5(tsha): po/ gnon byed stobs kyi mngon par ni// rab tu rnam gzhom gnon pa yis// gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bar bya// mtshon cha lnga yi rnam gnon pas// gzhan gyi bud med
196b6(tsha): btson par bya// kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i// sems can chen po grol byas te// byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// dam tshig
196b7(tsha): rjes su ldan pa yis// rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// skad cig mtho ris 'gro bar byed// skad cig bde ldan 'gro bar byed// rdo rje shugs kyis thams cad du// sems
197a1(tsha): can skad cig 'dri ru 'ong // sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su 'gyur// sems can rnams dang grogs chen po// thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang // pha
197a2(tsha): rol phyin rnams skye gnas te// de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin// de dag 'di la rab tu gnas// dbang por gyur pa brtan chen po// yon tan tshogs ni nam mkha' bzhin// de nyid
197a3(tsha): dngos po thams cad la// thams cad dus gsum munyam gnas te// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde// sems dpa' thog ma mtha' med yin// bcom ldan 'das dpal
197a4(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba/ yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che// ye shes thig le
197a5(tsha): ldan pa ste// rdo rje yid byung lha ma yis// ha la ra btags dbu sgor bya// de ni yid las skyes pa ste// shin tu dgas che mdzes pa yis// yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che// gtso
197a6(tsha): bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa'o// gsang ba'i snying kha'i pad+ma la// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de ni de ma thag nyid du// shin tu dgos par mnyes par 'gyur// mtsho chen
197a7(tsha): rdo rje sems pa la// de yi bde bas mnyes mdzad de// dbang po yin sbyor ba yis// de dang rol pas myur du 'grub// de gnyis phan tshun dgos pa las// shin tu dges pa'i gzhi
197b1(tsha): gyur te// rigs 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang // lha mi kun gyi mchog par 'gyur// de dang lhan cig rol pa na// lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams// phyag rgya sbyar
197b2(tsha): ba'i tshul gnas pa'i// bdag nyid che la phyag byed pa'o// nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi// shin tu sbyor ba'i rgyus btab pa// sems can gang zhig byed pa na// sems can tshe/
197b3(tsha): la mnyes par byed// de ni sa dang nam mkha' la// bde ba gnas shing 'gro bar byed// lha tshogs lha mo bde byed yis// sna tshogs bde bas gar byed do// phyag rgya'i gar gyis
197b4(tsha): gar byed cing // sems can myur du rtogs byed do// ral grir gyur pa gzi chen po// nam mkha' kun tu phan tshun 'gro// lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang // lha min klu yi bu mo dang //
197b5(tsha): gzhan yang 'phrul dang mi'i bu mo// de yis bud med kun sgrub bya// phyag rgya ye shes rab gnas pas// de nyid kun tu 'gro byed pa'i// ji tsam 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje
197b6(tsha): sems dpa'i tshe gnas so// sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub// thams cad chos ni bde chen po// dge 'dun chags med thams cad rnams// de dag thams cad de yin
197b7(tsha): no// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi// thog med stobs kyis bkug nas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs gnas pas// gzhan gyi bud med btson par bya// de la sogs te
198a1(tsha): mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste// skad cig skad cig brten pa yis// bdag gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// de yis dngos grub kun 'gyur te//
198a2(tsha): bdag med nga rgyal med 'gyur te// snang ba med cing yi ge med// shin tu dgegos pa chen mo'i yid dang rjes su 'thun par mdzad ma zhes bya ba yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so//
198a3(tsha): lha mo rdo DA kI lA'i kA'i la// dang por oM gyis rnam brgyan pa// bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni// dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad ma ste// 'di yi bud med
198a4(tsha): snying khu ru// bdag nyid kyi ni byin brlabs te// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas rnal 'byor chen mo de// rnal 'byor dbang
198a5(tsha): phyug byin brlabs pas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu// mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro// bdag gram 'on te gzhan dag la// phyag rgya de yis rgyas btab
198a6(tsha): rdo rje pad+ma che ba yis// sgrub pa pos ni myur du sgrub// pad+ma rnam par phye ba ste// phyag rgyu'i sbyor bas rol bya yis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'gro dang 'ong
198a7(tsha): ba gdon mi za// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// lag gis phyag rgya gzung bya ste// sbyor ba chen po bsgom byas na// de ma thag tu nam mkhar 'gro/ bdag nyid gan
198b1(tsha): rgyul gnas byas te// nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya glas// nyid kyis byin brlabs phyag rgya la// sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyed par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag
198b2(tsha): dgas dang 'dza' bar gnyis zhugs pas// mi g.yeng phyag rgyar gzhag byas te// bdag nyid shin tu dgos par sgom// 'di yis dngos grub thob gyur te// 'di dang lhan
198b3(tsha): cig 'grogs pa yis// gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur// 'di dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis// nam mkha'i bdag po sangs rgyas
198b4(tsha): bzhin/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// de ni sangs rgyas ngo blor 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// nub gcig bdud rtsi dbyung byas te// gzungs
198b5(tsha): ma'i phyag rgya la brten nas// rmad byung nyid ni thob ces bshad// mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mthar// dang po gnyis ka 'du byas na// sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar
198b6(tsha): 'gro ba// de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gro// phyed dam yang na nam phyed na// rig pa'i dbyings su reg bya zhing // myur bar 'phros pa'i sgra rtogs pas// gyad kyi 'gye
198b7(tsha): par brtsam par bya// bkye ba'i 'jug tu de ma thag/ 'o ma mchog ni btung byas na// de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub// zla gsang dkyil du 'gro bar byed// bya ba bzhin du zlog pa
199a1(tsha): dang // ci bder brtan pa byas pa las// byang chub sems ni char ma thag/ 'phrogs pa yi ni dngos grub bo// 'di yis rin chen bcug nyid du// mi
199a2(tsha): g.yeng tshad ma byas gyur na// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'phrog byed de// sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis 'thob// 'di yis snying kha'i zla gsang du// thig le nyid du brtag
199a3(tsha): byas na// da ni de ma thag tu yang // zla ga srang thig le mchog 'drar 'gyur// 'di yis reg pa tsam gyis kyang // dngos grub gang dag 'thob byed de// rdo rje phyag rgya gzi chen
199a4(tsha): blo/ rgyal chen 'di ni rnam par rgyu// 'di ni sgrub pa'i dus dag tu// rnam par rtog pa yongs mi bya// rtag tu mi rtog gyur pa yis// nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// sdug bsngal ba
199a5(tsha): yi sems can la// sbyin pa bzhi ni rtag tu ster// de la bde ba sbyin bya ste// mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya// shin tu dgos pa'i sems dpa' chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa dang ldan
199a6(tsha): ma zhes bya ba/ rdo rje kI li kI la shin tu dgos pa'i bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'o// thog mar o ste 'anga' chen mo// rdo rje shin tu dges dang 'brel// 'di ni
199a7(tsha): chags pa thams cad la// 'dod chags bde byed snyoms pa 'thob// rol pa'i sbyor bas bud med la// 'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya// 'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tu// dngos
199b1(tsha): / grub myur du 'thob par byed// pad+ma kha phye rgyas pa'i spyan// sngags mkhan du ni skad cig 'gyur// gtso bo yi ni bde mchog gi/ a li kA li mnyam sbyor bya// spyod pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
199b2(tsha): btab ste// skad cig skad cig spyad par bya// dus dag tu ni reg pa dang // gzhugs pa yang ni rtag tu bya// bskyod dang mnyes pa de bzhin du// mnyam du 'grogs pa'i cho gar bya//
199b3(tsha): bskyed pa ni sbyang ba dang // skad cig skad cig bsnyen pa bya// gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang // 'jib dang 'thung ba de bzhin te// the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig dang
199b4(tsha): ni bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// mi g.yo tshe 'dir dngos grub ste// sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang // bskal par gnas pa smos ci dgos// 'dri ni dngos
199b5(tsha): grub thob ma thag/ pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rjer 'gyur te// lag na pad+ma 'bar khyer zhing // blo ldan mi g.yengs bskal par gnas// brjid par dpal dgas lhan cig tu// bde ldan zhing du
199b6(tsha): 'gro 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po der phyin nas// bde ldan gyi ni mchog gtso bo// pad+ma gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// de ni bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs
199b7(tsha): 'gyur ba// dngos grub ye shes bde myong 'gyur// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// pad+ma las skyes gzungs gzung ste// byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na// pad+ma bde ba'i bdag por
200a1(tsha): 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsnyen byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du// sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi
200a2(tsha): za/ sdug cing lang tshos brgyan pa yis// nyi ma'i 'od zer gsal 'byung bzhin// dri med yangs pa'i lta ba yis// pad+ma sems dpa' tsher 'grub bo// ji tsam nam na kha' nye bar
200a3(tsha): ni/ dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de// rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi// lha mo yis ni mchod pa byed// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid
200a4(tsha): mchod// 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe// 'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// sman gyi phye ma'i sbyor ba dpes// sbrul ni
200a5(tsha): gsod par 'gyur ba bzhin// zla gsang thig le dga' byed 'di// tshe 'di nyid la thob 'gyur te// 'di ni mthu yi ngo bo yis// dgos pa thams cad dngos grub bo// gang 'dod dngos grub
200a6(tsha): don yod pa// 'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi// mthu chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// dran pa can gyis de dngos grub// shin tu dges pa'i pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya
200a7(tsha): ye shes so// dang por oM dang yang dag ldan// tha mar bsgyings pa'i hUM nyid de// dbus su rab dges rdo rje gzhag/ yi ge 'di ni rmad byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yis
