200b1(tsha): rgyas btab pas// sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di ni dngos grub che// dpal gyi dgying pa thob par 'gyur// bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa// mi thogs par ni
200b2(tsha): rgyal byed de// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas// de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed// bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te// de yis khams gsum longs spyod do// phyag rgya 'di/
200b3(tsha): yis rgyas btab ste// pad+ma rdo rje rab ldan bya// 'phreng byed 'phreng ba'i tshul gyis su// 'phreng ba bsku ma ste 'dzin pa bzhin// 'di yis byin gyis brlab bya ste// bsnyen na myur du
200b4(tsha): dngos grub bo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin sgyur bas// chu skyes spyan ni brgyas byas te// phyag rgyas btab snga rol byas na// bla ma'i dngos grub thob par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor nye
200b5(tsha): ba yis/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid mchod byed de// de dag kun gyis bskor byas nas// dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo yis// 'jigs shing skrag pa
200b6(tsha): 'byin byed pa// rang nyid kyi ni phyag rgya'i gzugs// nyid kyi dngos grub stobs par byed// gzhan yang dag pa pha rol phyen// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyan// de yang de la
200b7(tsha): 'jigs skad nas// rang gi dges mchog stob par byed// bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang // che ba'i pha ni ngo ba'i dang // rdo rje 'dzin dang rtogs 'dod rnams// rang gi
201a1(tsha): sdug pa stobs par byed// gshin rje sha ka rgyal po yang // rdo rje 'dzin rje dngos grub la// 'ongs nas bdag gi gdug pa rnams// srog gi phyir ni stobs
201a2(tsha): par byed// gzhan yang 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams// khams gsum lam la gnas pa dang // myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang // bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed// sna tshogs
201a3(tsha): gnyen ni rgyal po che// dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed// de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug btud de// rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed// gnod sbyin srin po gzugs la sogs// sha za
201a4(tsha): yi dgas bu mo rnams// sbyor ldan phyag rgya blangs byas te// brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya// thams cad las byed dge ba yi// 'di yis dngos grub myur du 'gyur// lha dang
201a5(tsha): klu yi bu mo dang // lha dang lha min mngal skyes pa// phyag rgya 'di yis byin brlabs na// bsgrub pa myur du dngos grub bo// gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung // gang de bud
201a6(tsha): med gzungs byas te// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis su// phyag rgya'i sbyor brtag par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid du// skad cig skad
201a7(tsha): ciceg rgyas btab pas// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgos pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i 'phreng bzhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// nga ro bcu
201b1(tsha): gsum steng nyid du// de bzhin thig le rgyal po ste// rab dges rdo rje lha che bde// mthar ni yi ge hri sbyar ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde chen spyan ni dga' byed yin//
201b2(tsha): phyag rgyu yi ge 'di yis ni// mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // bla med 'phrul gyi spyan du 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi// sangs
201b3(tsha): rgyas shin tu phra ba mthong // smin ma'i rnam 'gyur rgyas pa yis// lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing // 'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rdo rje 'dzin kun dang /
201b4(tsha): pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// sdung pa brgyad la ldan pa ni// de ni cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du
201b5(tsha): 'jigs byed pa// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun tu yongs su bskor// gzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung // de lta bu yi stan la gnas// gzhan mi sdug la
201b6(tsha): dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro mo rnam sgyur bcas// de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang
201b7(tsha): phyug chen po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ yang dang yang du rang rang gi mngon par gar byas pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor ma
202a1(tsha): yis sngags tshogs dang // phyag rgya ma ni TI rigs par// gsang ba'i gar gyis bde chen mo// bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyis gsungs//
202a2(tsha): nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang / phyag rgya
202a3(tsha): dang sbas pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / gsang ba rnams nyid kyi thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba badz+ra d+ha d+ha ra a nu ra ki ni ma gro ti shwa ri hU phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra a ka ra sha ni/
202a4(tsha): mahA kro d+hI/ shU ri hU~M hU dz+rad+da dun+tu/ oM sarba badz+ra d+har kul Ana?rA ga ni mahA badz+ra kr-i d+hi shwa ri hU ha he ho ts+tsha laT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ro thA ba ma n+takro dz+ha n+da ri d+has sa d+g+ha paT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+har
202a5(tsha): ma hA de tsa a bi she ke hU tra hU/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA su ru b+hi ku ti ka ro ge tra da tra da hU phaT/ Ta ta/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra ke tu kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA bi tsa yod tsa ra ye hU hU trad tra nga traH
202a6(tsha): tratraT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha rA ma hA kro d+ha ad ha ha si ni hU hU trid hri da tro ta ya/ tro ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+hak+Shi ni hUM hUM hUM bkra bak+Sha hU hri/ oM sarba ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra
202a7(tsha): tig sh+tsa kro ti shwa ri tsan da tsi nad/ hu hU badz+ra te ga sh+na ha ta tshed ya ched ya hU hu ma Ta ma rba/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ri ni ma ho/ gra ru bi ni/ hU hU pa ta ya pa ta ya ma hA badz+ra tsa ke
202b1(tsha): natsur+tha tsu r+Na ya phuhU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA wa ga dra ba dzA na hU hu ma tha ma tha phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA bi sha su khe hUM pU phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA pa te h+yA hU hang hang phaT phaT/
202b2(tsha): oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra yak+ki ni hUM hUM/ kha kha kha hi a bi ba a pi ba hUM phaT/ oM sarba badza d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra ban d+hi ni ma hA kro d+hi ban d+ha ya ban d+ha ya/ pi ta ya pi ta ya hU pharba/ oM sa
202b3(tsha): badz+ra d+ha ra had ni ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M hU/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi ma li ni hUM hu g+hu g+hung g+hu/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha kan d+ha/ b+ha ga wa dza hri hU hU gang gang grI/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ri ma hA
202b4(tsha): kro d+hi shA ri ma hA ma ho la ka d+ha ri ni d+hi pa ya d+hi pa ya d+hi pa ya hUM hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ho shwa ri ma hA la sme hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma la d+ha ma la d+ha ri hU/ oM sarba badz+ra d+harA
202b5(tsha): ma hA kro d+ha g+han nirmA.oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha nin+ta ki hU~M hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha a kar+ha ni dza dza dz+ra dzungadza/ oM sarba badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+ham hA badz+ra pa sha pra be sha ni hU~M thuH
202b6(tsha): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha g+ha ma hA kro ta bAn de bAn de b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya hU hUM ba/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ba sh+ye hUM hU hoH/ oM hU tra hri a/ de nas
202b7(tsha): rnal 'byor ma chen mo de dag mgu rangs dga' bar gyur te/ yang dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so// rab 'u ma hA gu hUM dza i ni dza la su hu ba'u ma'u/ ma hA su hu dze//
203a1(tsha): i ni dza la su hu b+h+yA/ dza'u ma bA su hu dza a ni/ dza la su hu u dza a'u ma hA su dzo i ni dza la su hu/ a la la ho/ ma hA su phur ma ra ma ma hA su gu/ a
203a2(tsha): la la ho/ ma hA su khe te nA/ bde ba mchog gi rgya chen dgongs su gsol// bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyangs dang ldan// mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan
203a3(tsha): pas/ gzungs la rol cing bde bas bzhengs su gsol// ngo mtshar che ba'i cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing // snying po byang chub 'gro ba rnams kyi lam ston te// rgyu rnams yang dag
203a4(tsha): grang la'ang mi rten par// bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i
203a5(tsha): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA
203a6(tsha): badz+ra d+ha ra hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra kro d+ha g+ha ni hUM phaT/ o ta ki ni ma hA he ma ba ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni ku ru ma ra bri la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni dro sha ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta
203a7(tsha): ka ni ma hA badz+ra muSh+Ti ni pi ta ya pi ta ya/ su ma b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ra la li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA mrid ta ka pa la ha te hUM phaT/ oM
203b1(tsha): badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA mrid tod pa d+hi ke hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA su lu mya kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra dan ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA ma ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA/
203b2(tsha): mri ta ka ba la hasta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki nI ma hA so'u mya kro d+he shA ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA mrid pu d+ha na d+ha ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta kI ni badz+ra bing ga li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ne
203b3(tsha): ma hA ma ni pi pa pi pa ru ni ra ma hA badz+ra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki na ma hA badz+ra ba
203b4(tsha): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ne a na ya a na ya hU phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA be gri ni gu gu mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la ya ba sbyi ku ru hU phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni
203b5(tsha): ma hA badz+ra bi ka ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni ma hA badz+ra da she hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni ma hA badz+ra ka li pra be sha pra bi sha hA pha/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni ma hA pu ti mngasang ka ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha
203b6(tsha): ka ni ma hA ma ka ra badz+ra ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha ki ni ka ra sha ni ma hA bi ga ra la mu khi hUM dza dza hUM phaT/ oM ta ki ni a me ka ni hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA ba na d+he hU b+h+rUM ba/ oM badz+ra
203b7(tsha): d+ha ki ni ma hA d+ho sha ne sa ma ya hUM phaT a a/ oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha sa mang sa ru ti ra ma dri pra ya ma hA ku b+ha ka ra na hUM hUM hU nr-i k+She/ oM badz+ra ma rak+Sha sa a kad N+ya pra bi sha ya sarba badz+ra
204a1(tsha): ka la pa shi na b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hU hUM hU phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha sa b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya b+hi sha ya b+he sha ya/ bi b+he sha na bi b+hi sha na sarba na hU hUM phaT/ o badz+ra
204a2(tsha): ma hA rak+Sha sa/ b+han d+ha ya b+han d+ha ya/ sarba ma hA bi ki ta na nad sha gri ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de
204a3(tsha): dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas/ yid dga' bar gyur te/ dbyangs chen po 'byin par gyur to// kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje sbyor ba rab tu brtan// mkha'
204a4(tsha): la 'gro ba'ang sangs rgyas nyid// ci bde ba sa ni sgrub par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos/ yang rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma
204a5(tsha): de dag mgu ba dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // o ta ki ka ra sha ya pra be sha ya ban d+ha ya to sha ya sarba na badz+ra
204a6(tsha): ta ki ni hri da ya hU dza dza hUM bi ho ta ki hU dza/ o he ru ka ma hA badz+ra a gad ta a gad ta/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ ba na d+hA ya ban d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya hUM hU phaT/ oM badz+ra pad+ma
204a7(tsha): ma hA ba ta ba mu ka/ a gad d+ha ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ha ha hi/ khros pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di yis/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
204b1(tsha): mkha' la 'gro ba ma dang / rdo rje phrog mar byed pa la sogs pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i byas te/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs
204b2(tsha): pa'i dam tshig/ dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / Tak+ki'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te las thams cad la sbyor ro// rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin du
204b3(tsha): bcings te/ khro mo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar/ zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu sbyar te/ lhag ma rnams bskyangs te/ 'od zer lhar
204b4(tsha): btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no// phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// bsngags shing mchod
204b5(tsha): pa byas pa yin// bcings pa nyid kyi 'bebs pa dang // thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed// gdug pa thams cad gsod byed ma// srin po thams cad za bar byed//
204b6(tsha): rnal 'byor dam la gnas pa yis// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// mi ldan dngos grub mi 'gyur te// 'dod chags zhe
204b7(tsha): sdang gauti mug rnams// bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje bcings pa pa gnyis su bya ste/ rgyab kyis rgyab sbyar te/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste/ phan
205a1(tsha): tshun du bsnol te/ khros pa gnyis bsgreng ste/ snying khar bstan nas brkyang bskum pa'i tshul du gnas pa 'di yis las byed pa'o// 'di yis
205a2(tsha): thams cad las kyi rnams// ci tsam yid la 'dod pa byed par 'gyur// tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// de dag thams cad myur
205a3(tsha): 'gyur te// dngos grub rin chen yid bzhin 'ong // ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phur bar byed// rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshan mor yang //
205a4(tsha): cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong // thal mo mnyam par sbyar te sbom po gnyis su sbyar// lhag ma 'dab ma kha phye ba ltar byas pa pad+mo'i stan sbom po gnyis kyi rtse mo thur du btud
205a5(tsha): pa ni rta'i gdong gi'o// gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur ba// 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro//
205a6(tsha): sa la sogs dngos grub 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya yi ni sbyor ba dge/ nga yis bstan te rgyal ba rnams//
205a7(tsha): rnal 'byor pa yis drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang // phyag rgya 'di yis yan lag mchog der sbyar// de nas mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo de dag 'dod pas
205b1(tsha): gzir ba rnams rangs te/ rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis// bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing // dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du// mgu ba chen pos rtags par byed// phyag na thod
205b2(tsha): pa gri dag dang // rdo rje kha Ta rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan rang gis phyag rgyas mtsham// dbu smug rnam par gnyer ba'i zhal// bde ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yis// bde ba dam pa
205b3(tsha): longs spyod myong // rab tu rmongs pas gnyen byed cing // rab dges khro la gsol ba 'debs// ra ma ra ma hon tan sa ra a ma hA su hu badz+ro i ni/ ka ma la suM hu a la la ho/ su ra o tra
205b4(tsha): mu hU a hu sid dza'u wa ra dzo i ni dza la ma ho/ a yi ha a ra ho/ a ru he byi su b+ha d+ha a na ha a su ra a su hu de hi ba ra Ta i ni dza la su hu pi sa/ sa pa nad ta pa nad tA nu nad ta nu nad ta na/ e na
205b5(tsha): de hi ma hA su hu mad dzu hu mug khu/ pa lag kha hUM/ thud du sa du na/ i su hu tsad dza'u/ mug khu su hu/ na be dug khe la ba b+hi mug khu su hu/ pa sa ri hU/ pang ka'u mad dzu ta nu/ ne ba ra
205b6(tsha): a pa rad ta'u tud dzU tA nu mun dza ma ha su hu a li ba ra pa a'u ma hu ba ra ba a smi a da'u mo sa ra/ zla ba dri med stong pas shin tu rdzogs pa'i spyan mnga' bas/ thugs rje chen pos
205b7(tsha): dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag ma lus bskyed// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshabs gdungs pa'i byang chub des ni kun tu tshim par mdzad// a la la ho/ mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo
206a1(tsha): 'byed cing // byang chub mchog gi lam 'di snying po nyid kyi don// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan te// rmongs shing bying ba rnams la thugs rjes sgrol/
206a2(tsha): a la la ho/ che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis sngar ldan pa// phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du// mya ngan 'das la
206a3(tsha): longs dang rten par 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bstan kyang // rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi dngos ma mthong // kye ma hom skyes chos des snying
206a4(tsha): po las byung ba// bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha' mtha' dang mnyam// rab tu dgas pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rin chen 'bar ba'i tshogs kun 'dus pa 'di la
206a5(tsha): gzigs// sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzod cing // dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings nas bskyed par mdzod// a la la ho//
206a6(tsha): ji ltar pad+ma 'dam la chags pa med pa bzhin// stug pa'i 'ching bas mi zin rnam grol te// 'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di
206a7(tsha): la 'dus shing snang ba'i snang // mnyes mdzod nyid du bde ba bzhes su gsol// 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas//
206b1(tsha): khams kyi rang bzhin bsnams shing nam khro yang // byams pa'i thugs rjes kun tu gnas khyab mdzad// kye ma ho/ bde bas bde sbyin che la phyag 'tshal te// rang bzhin grub
206b2(tsha): pa'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis// dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol bar mdzod// thugs rjes gsal ba'i byang chub
206b3(tsha): sems chen des// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnams kyang sbyongs// rgyu dang rkyen las ma rten rang bzhin grub// ma chags dri med yongs su gsal ba zla ba bzhin// 'jig
206b4(tsha): rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad// thams cad mkhyen gyi ye shes kun tu bde bas brtson// 'di las gtso la bskul byas na// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo/
206b5(tsha): yid gdungs gnyen po'i nga ro yis// dpyid kyi rgyal po glu blangs te// mkha' 'gro dra ba dri med pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad stan byas te// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba'i// dngos
206b6(tsha): grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde byed chen po 'di yis ni// bskul bas dges pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dus su rab tu sbyar bar bya//
206b7(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro la 'gro ba thams cad kyi shin tu dgos pa chen po'i longs spyod dpal bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
207a1(tsha): de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba'i mgu bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas bzung byas te// gsang skyes pad+ma phye ba la// rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis//
207a2(tsha): bcug na mchod pa thob 'gyur te// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dra ba 'di// mnyes pas de nas dngos grub thob// oM dang oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde// mtha' ru phaT kyi stobs rab sbyor ba yis//
207a3(tsha): kye ma'o bde ba mkha' 'gro dra ba che// rab dges dbang mo bde byed bde brtags mdzod// rnal 'byor ma mchog gsal rnams la// 'di yis btsun pa rnams byas na// bde chen
207a4(tsha): bde ba dgyes pa yis// rab dgyes dngos grub grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma'i che ba'i che ba rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so//
207a5(tsha): 'gro la thal mo ched bzhin te// chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje bcings pa yang dag ldan// pad+ma dkyil mo bcing bar bya// 'di yis btson par byas na ni// bud med
207a6(tsha): mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// bde ba chen po gar byed cing // rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed dang // kun tu 'khyud dang sprod byed dang // sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te// thams
207a7(tsha): cad zas dang ros dngos grub// mchog gi bde ba 'grub par 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing byas te// sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po// myur ba'i thal mo bsgrub par bya// gsum
207b1(tsha): gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing // mkhur tshos so yis gad byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du bzung // 'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnyes// g.ya' byed sor mo ma zhi bya// pad+ma phyi
207b2(tsha): phyir rab mnyes shing // ze ba chen pos rab tu sbyar// sen mo 'phyan khung gsum mdo dang // rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs// dal nas rdo rje gzhag bya zhing // khro bo'i rgyal pos
207b3(tsha): bskyod par bya// g.yas kyi shin tu bskyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni btang bar bya// sbyor ba 'di yis brtson pa yis// mkha' 'gro 'khor lo mchod par bya// kye ma bde ba
207b4(tsha): zhes brjod de// bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul// yang dang yang du 'dzin pa dang // blo dang ldan las bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po spro ba'i ye
207b5(tsha): shes so// de nas de dag rab mgu nas// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs// nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams// bde bas bde ba sgrub
207b6(tsha): pa'o// sna tshogs chen po bgo bar gsol// bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas// gdon mi za bka' brtag bgyid pa// gar gyis myur du mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab
207b7(tsha): tu rnam bsgyur bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o// nye ba'i kha
208a1(tsha): zas zas rnams ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrubs// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa ni//
208a2(tsha): mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// bus pa'i sha las rab bsgrubs pa'i// 'o ma dam pas thod pa bkang // mkha' 'gro ma kun dbus byas na// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni
208a3(tsha): dngos grub 'gyur// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te// phyag mdzad nas yang gcig tu stug
208a4(tsha): por 'du ba mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba//
208a5(tsha): bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgos pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang / 'brel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
208a6(tsha): snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba dang mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod chags smras yin
208a7(tsha): te/ gti mug stongs pa ma byin na// myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pas brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brgyad byas
208b1(tsha): te/ rang gi nu ma rab bstan nas// mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas na// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yis// lag pa g.yon pa skur bstan nas// de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon
208b2(tsha): pa mgo ru bzhag pa yi// g.yon du mdud pas phyag lan no// g.yon gyi smin ma bskyod pa yis// myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis// g.yas kyi
208b3(tsha): smin mas phyag lan bya// g.yas kyi lag pas snying kha ru// sbyor dang ldan pas mnyes byas na// 'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ 'di yis mtshan ma shes par bya// g.yon gyi
208b4(tsha): blo mo sgreng ba yi// nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na// lus che de ni khros 'gyur zhe// rnal 'byor pa yis rtags shes bya// g.yon du 'gying ba'i bsgyings pa yis// lag pa
208b5(tsha): snying khar brkyang byas te// dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan na// de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag/ chung ngur rtse mor byas pa yis// nam zhig bskyod par mthong ba na// de tshe rigs ma
208b6(tsha): rnal 'byor dpang // rdo rje pad+mas brtsen par 'dod// sbom po nam zhig mthong gyur na// de la ston mo sbyin par bya// gang tshe shin tu mthong ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu
208b7(tsha): brtag/ khro mo lcags kyur drang byas te// gang che sngags mkhan gyis bstan na// de tshe nges par 'ong bya ste// gzhan du byas na dmyal bar ltung // de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar//
209a1(tsha): sngags mkhan gyis ni brtan pa na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams// gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa
209a2(tsha): yis rnam bskul na// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yin// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// 'dren pa med pa'i yi ge kun// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu
209a3(tsha): brtag/ rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba// 'dren chu la rnal 'byor pa yi'o// oM ni thig ler bcas pa'i brda// sbyor ba sngags rig rnal 'byor brtag/ de la sogs pa mtha'
209a4(tsha): yas mchog/ sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// rjes su mnyes par gang byed pa// dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so//
209a5(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
209a6(tsha): la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
209a7(tsha): phyung ngo // rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// sbom po dkyil mor bcing bar bya// khro mo gnyis ni sbyar byas te// lhag ma 'od bzhin gtang bar bya// snying khar phyag rgya 'di gzhag
209b1(tsha): nas// thams cad las ni sbyar byas te// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// gdon mi za bar dngos grub byed// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// mcho ga gnyis
209b2(tsha): rdo rje mnyam du sbyar// chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de// snying kha de bzhin sbom po sbyar// 'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams// dam tshig 'jigs byed rab mdzad cing //
209b3(tsha): sems can thams cad pha na mdzad ma// de yis dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid las ni rdo rje dang // mchog gnyis sbreng ba'i tshul byas te// rdo rje thal mo gnas
209b4(tsha): pa yi/ drang ba'i tshul gyis drang byas nas// mi g.yeng de nas dngos grub bo// gnod byed yang dag ldan pa yis// rgyal ba mchog yang 'dren gyur na// lha dang mi yi bu
209b5(tsha): mo dang / lha min las byung smos ci dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste// sngags kyi bzlas pa ma nyam sbyor bas// mchog tu myur
209b6(tsha): du 'dren par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam dgug byas te// lhag ma 'od kyi rtse mo bzhin// des ni myos byed thob pa yin// 'di ni bcings
209b7(tsha): ma thag tu ya // bde bar gshegs kyang dbang 'gyur na// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag nas//
210a1(tsha): bcing ba dam po sa bcing bar bya// sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug/ khro mo gnyis kyang bskum par bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'jug
210a2(tsha): par rab tu byas par 'gyur// skad cig nyid du gnon byed pa// de bzhin bsdus dang bcing bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos
210a3(tsha): grub chen po'i bdag po dang // thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yi rgyas btab pas// rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed// lo gcig tsam gyi sbyor ba yis//
210a4(tsha): las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma kun gyi las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshar
210a5(tsha): du gyur te/ rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing // hi hi zhes par glu ru len// ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// he he zhes pas 'bod par
210a6(tsha): byed// hUM hU zhes pas gang bar byed// ho ho zhes pas skyong bar byed// phaT phaT ces pas gsod par byed// hu hu zhes pas phur bus 'debs// dza dza zhes pas 'dren par
210a7(tsha): byed// sa so zhes pas dam par byed// bde ba dbang phyug nga ro mchog/ hUM bru zhes pas gsod par byed// hru bruM hU~M bru zhes pas 'bar bar byed// t+yu dz+ya zhes pas gzi brjid
210b1(tsha): byed// trid tring zhes pas 'dren par byed// tra tra zhes pa mchod par byed// dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin// hrung hwang zhes pas rmongs par byed// hring phreng zhes pas
210b2(tsha): 'jug par byed// hing hing zhes pas 'dren par byed// hUM hU zhes pas 'phyan par byed// drong grong zhes pas rmongs par byed// hra hra zhes pas gnon par byed// ha ho zhes pas
210b3(tsha): mnyes par byed// haM ha zhes pas bsrung bar byed// hUM hU zhes pas gsod par byed// hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed// tang tang zhes pas gdug par byed// klung byung zhes
210b4(tsha): pas 'phreng bar byed// gang gang zhes pa sa dri ru byed// rang rang zhes pas rgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i
210b5(tsha): tshogs rnams ngo mtshar chen por gyur/ rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ rang rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang /
210b6(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po la phyag byas te/ gsol ba 'debs so// gnyis
210b7(tsha): med mchog tu rmad byung ba// bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can sgrub pa 'di// gsang ba sbas pa 'grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che//
211a1(tsha): rol pa bde ba'i mchog/ sil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs// brda dang rgyud rnams rab sbyor ba// gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu 'phrul
211a2(tsha): blo yis che ba che// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yi// sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshid du gsol// de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad bdag po rgyal po che//
211a3(tsha): thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung // sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che// mtha' med chos kun dbang po ste// rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mchog/
211a4(tsha): blo rmongs phyag rgya sangs btab ste// sangs 'debs rmongs byed za ba'o// gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che// skyong ba sdig pa 'phrog par byed// sdig pa'i chos rnams sel
211a5(tsha): bar byed// dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po// gti mug chos rjes 'dom pa po// sa dang bar snang bde byin bde// de bzhin rnal 'byor sbyor ba sbyin// tshangs dang gtogs
211a6(tsha): 'dod dbang chen pos// de la phyag dang mchod pa byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che// zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po
211a7(tsha): gsang ba ston// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje// bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad de// skal ldan nye bar longs spyod kun// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// rang byung mtshan
211b1(tsha): du thig le ste// bcu gsum drang ba dbu ru ldan// 'di yis bud med bskyed byas te// sa bon gyi ni rgyal po 'du// 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba can// ra las myu gu 'dra ba
211b2(tsha): yis/ 'og gi phyogs su bzhag pa ni// hrang byas myur du drang bar bya// dang po drang ba gnyis drangs nas// tsheg drag pos ni lcags kyur bya// lha dang lha min mchog gi
211b3(tsha): bdag/ khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed// 'di yis tshul du sbyor ba yis// phan tshun du ni bsgrub byas na// rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dngos grub byed pa
211b4(tsha): sbyin par byed// bdag nyid rang rang mthong bya ba// sbyor ldan zla ba gzugs nyid du// de stengs sa bon gzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas// sngags kyi sbyor ba
211b5(tsha): rab sbyar bas// de nas sngags mkhan de sgrub bo// de nyid sngags dang snying po dang // phyag rgya rigs dang mi ldan pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang // grub pa nyid du yongs ni/
211b6(tsha): 'gyur// snying po snying khar sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// sngags dang sngags kyi 'bru bsgoms te// rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar// 'di yis myur du dngos grub
211b7(tsha): / mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyis chen po// 'byung dang 'byung las 'gyur nye bar// rnal 'byor sbyor don grub pa po// dpa' bo chen po 'gro bar
212a1(tsha): byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di bsgrags so// kye ma ho kun tu bza
212a2(tsha): po yis// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// bshad pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba// de nyid don kun grub pa ste// snying po phyag rgya dam mchog ni// sngags rigs rang gi lha nyid de// bdag
212a3(tsha): gi de nyid ji bzhin pa// gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs// dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang // gsang ba sbas pa nyid de// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dud pa'i rim//
212a4(tsha): dpa' bo chen pos rab tu sgrogs// rdo rje pad+ma rnams mdzad pas// rig ma dang ni lhan cig brtsen// gdug pa thams cad nye bar dang // dam pa zhe sdang bza' ba dang // slob dpon spyod
212a5(tsha): pa bsgral ba dang // gzungs ma'i bdag nyid sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed bya dang // rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang // sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang // bud med
212a6(tsha): thams cad 'dod bya dang // bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang // rdo rje kun tu gzhug bya dang // pad+ma'i gnas ni gang bya dang // sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor
212a7(tsha): dang // sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor skye ba// de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa po// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs// sgrub pa'i sbyor ba sbyor ba che// sbyor dang sbyor mar yang dag sbyor// de nyid gsal ba
212b1(tsha): sems dpa' che// phan par dgongs pa nyid kyi gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba'i mdo yongs su dris pa/ rang gi thugs
212b2(tsha): la bzhag ste nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan// de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// ye shes lnga
212b3(tsha): yis rjes su bskyed// dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// phyag rgya chen po rjes su sgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de// kye ma ho bde ba rnam par 'byung // snying po ye shes zhes
212b4(tsha): bya ste// ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya shes pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di mis
212b5(tsha): sgrub pa byas pa'i gzugs// bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid// de dag de nyid ji bzhin par// nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags// dam tshig ma yin mi shes la// sngags rigs pa ni
212b6(tsha): bstan mi bya// phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin// de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni// gsang ba gsang la rab tu bsgrub// rdo rje pad+mar rnam mdzad pas//
212b7(tsha): rol pas phyi nang sbyor ba yis// rig dang lhan cig btson bya ba// sprospyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang // de bzhin mchu ni so yis bzung // rdo rje bstan pa gzhag par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul
213a1(tsha): gyis ni// bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o// sdug pa thams cad mnye byas te// nu ma 'phyan khung mkhur tshos dang // 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab// rkang pa
213a2(tsha): lag pa 'jam po gnyis// mnye ba'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mdza' ba chen mo 'di 'grub bo// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod pa// dam la zhe sdang bza' bar bya// zhe sdang can gyis
213a3(tsha): zos gyur pa// khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'// rtag par rim 'phrogs smra ba dang // bla ma snod rnams bsgral bar bya// sha dang khrag dang klad pa rnams// drangs te tshogs kyi
213a4(tsha): mchod ston bya// 'di ni bsad pa drag po ste// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // bla ma smod byed brtson pa la// dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya// gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal
213a5(tsha): ba yang thob 'gyur te// thams cad nad dang 'khros chen dang // 'jigs byed nye bar 'che ba yis// bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru// sdug bsngal chen po rten byed cing // 'o dod 'bod/
213a6(tsha): par sbrul gyis bdag/ btir med chen por brlag par 'gro// lus dang ngag sems bde dam pas// rig ma kun las bskyed byas te// byang chub chen po bde ba yis// tshul bzhin
213a7(tsha): du ni sngags pas bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di smras te// dzA zhes skad cig skad cig tu// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid la ni bskyod par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang //
213b1(tsha): dag ldan// zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me thog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya// de ni bskyod par 'grub pa ste// de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya// rgyun
213b2(tsha): gyi 'phreng gi 'dod gsal bzhin// blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya// bdud rnams thams cad 'brel ba ni// lha mo rnams kyi snying por bshad// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang //
213b3(tsha): de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o// sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste// rjes su bsgrub pa lha mo'i don// bsgrub pa chen po gnyis ka'i rgya// mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje mchog/ nye bar sgrub pa
213b4(tsha): gnyis ka gnas// shin tu sgrub pa bde dam pa// so rtses ma ma chu ba zung ba ste// ma mchu'i mchog ni bsdam par bya// sbyor ba rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i// rab dgyes ro myang ba de
213b5(tsha): dam pa/ lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyis su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste// bdag ni sems dpa' 'o zhes
213b6(tsha): bsams nas// 'di ni gnyis med myur du 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i lha// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor che ba// rgyal ba kun gyi mchog
213b7(tsha): gis gsungs// bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste// rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro// phyag rgya de dang rab sbyor ba// sbyor ba chen pos bsgrags pa yin// 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad
214a1(tsha): dang // sangs nas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba dbang po bde ba che// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rdo rje bdag
214a2(tsha): por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis// 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis// drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang // rdo rje brtan pos
214a3(tsha): bskul byas te// shin tu 'dod pas gnon pa bskyed// mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan// rgyas dang de bzhin zag par bya// 'di ni yang dag sbyar bas sbas// sbas pa
214a4(tsha): rnal 'byor mi dkyil lo// 'di ni yang dag dngos grub blang // rdzu 'phrul chen po'i 'bras bu 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen dang // byang chub mchog rab 'bras bu
214a5(tsha): 'thob// gsang ba chen po rmad byung ba// de dag de nyid sbas pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya// nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang /
214a6(tsha): bdag po chen po mchod byed na// de yis ston pa kun mthong ste// rgyal ba mchog la mchod par 'gyur// srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur// de
214a7(tsha): la lha kun mchod byed cing // skad cig skad cig phyag kyang byed// ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// phan byed 'jig rten skyes 'gyur ba// sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas//
214b1(tsha): rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur// gang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde skye ba// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'byor ldan pas// dngos grub chen po des thob
214b2(tsha): bo/ rdo rje sems dpa' tshan btab la// cung zad mi 'grub yongs med de// phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che// bdag nyid so sor rjes su sgrub// rab dgyes mtshan dang mdza' chen mo//
214b3(tsha): ro dang reg gi che ba'i che// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen la// sbyor ba
214b4(tsha): 'dod pas gzir ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad// ra ma ram sa ma ho// ma hA sa twa/ rab dgyes gdon mi za la gnas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//
214b5(tsha): zlagasang thig ler yang dag ldan// bdag cad kun kyang dam tshig ste// skal ldan dri med rab dgyes kyis// rnal 'byor snying po mchog nyid du// sbyor ba nyid kyis rol par mdzod//
214b6(tsha): theg pa chen po bde che yas// pad+ma rdo rje rin chen gyis// rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes longs spyod nyid brten mdzod// bdag cag thams cad nyes bral
214b7(tsha): te/ dngos med de ni gser dang 'dra// de nyid thams cad grub chen po// rab dgyes bdag nyid rten par mdzod// spros pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang // bzhugs pa dang ni stong pa
215a1(tsha): mchog/ de nyid sgyu ma bsten pa yis// ded dpon rab tu brtan par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos
215a2(tsha): 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma
215a3(tsha): thams cad kyi shin tu dgos pa chen pos gsol ba/ kun tu 'khyud pa dang / sprod pa dang / 'jug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul ba dang / ma nye ba dang / 'thigs
215a4(tsha): pa dang / tshor bar byed pa dang / bskyod pa dang / kun tu bskyed pa dang / bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma chen po nyams su sbyor ba la yang dag par bzhugs te/ shin tu dgos pa
215a5(tsha): chen po'i bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gzungs ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang / rab tu rgyas pa dang / rab tu rnam par
215a6(tsha): 'byin cing / shin tu dgos pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi tshogs kyis/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun tu rgyas par byas te gnas so// de nas rnal 'byor
215a7(tsha): ma shin tu dges pa'i bdag nyid che ba de dag dga' mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/ rdzogs ni mgu ba che// bde ba chen pos rangs par 'gyur// kye ma'o bde bas bde ba che// bde
215b1(tsha): ba nyid kyis phyag byed de// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// mgu ba chen po de dang ldan// kye ma ho bde bas bde ba che// 'jigs shing skrag pas sdud par byed// khros
215b2(tsha): pa chen mo mkha' 'gro ma// rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra// bde byed chen po rol pa yis// bde byed che la mchod par byed// skal pa chen mo sring mo yang // bde byed bde bas/
215b3(tsha): rab rmongs pa// mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i// rgya che mchog gis mchod par byed// drag mo chen mo ma lta bu// rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba// 'ongs nas bde byed
215b4(tsha): chen po yis// gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed// lha dang lha min thams cad kyang // klu mo dang ni rta ga dong yang // 'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yi// yid du 'ong bas mchod par
215b5(tsha): byed// de nas dbang po nye dbang bcas// bdag nyid chen po lha yi lha// kye ma'o bde byed sna tshogs nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che// mgu zhing rab tu rangs pa yis//
215b6(tsha): yis lha ni sngun du 'gro// dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te// kye ma ho bde ba bde ba che// rang gi bde bas mngon mchod cing // 'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed// tshad
215b7(tsha): med rangs pa bzhad pa che// glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang // bza' dang bca' ba sha chen dang // sil snyan 'phreng ba ro chen dang // gling bu rgyud dang rdza rnga dang // pi wang ka la kig
216a1(tsha): ha le// gteg dang dpa' dang 'jig pa dang // bzhi dang rmad byung 'jigs byed dang // bgra dang khro dang spyan rgyas pas// skad cig skad cig mchod byed dang //
216a2(tsha): byed pa dang ni bzlos pa dang // 'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // srid ches pa dang hU hUM dang // ha ha zhes pa mnyes byed cing // rab dges bdag nyid bde ba yis// rang gi chung
216a3(tsha): mas mnyes par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos rab tu dges pa bde ba chen pos/ nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i skabs thams cad la
216a4(tsha): gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal dang / nyan thos dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang / ngo bo med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas
216a5(tsha): pa rnams/ shin tu dgas pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang shes rab kyi bskul te/ dbang bskur nas shin tu dgos pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog
216a6(tsha): pa dang / shin tu dges pa chen pos bde ba'i chos kyi rgyal po'i rjes su skyong zhing / mi mnyam pa dang / nam mkha' snyams pa'i sems 'jig rten gyi khams chen po dang //
216a7(tsha): ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dang /
216b1(tsha): ri thams cad dang / spyod pa dang / ma spyod par bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang /
216b2(tsha): brtsegs pa dang / dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa dang / shes bya dang / bdag dang / bdag gi ba dang / sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs ma yin pa dang / bus pa dang /
216b3(tsha): rgan pa dang / gzhon nu dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang // srog dang / rab tu zad pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mig
216b4(tsha): dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / l+le dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / rtsub pa dang / khyab byed dang /
216b5(tsha): zla ba dang / dbang chen dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus srul po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
216b6(tsha): lha mo dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan ma dang / ma rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / rin po che dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang
216b7(tsha): dbyigs pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba dang / stong pa dang / stong pa chen po dang / mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu sto
217a1(tsha): pa dang / stong pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang / drang ba dang / sdug ma dang /
217a2(tsha): cha dang / cha med pa dang / thig le dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang / thar pa dang / thar byed dang /
217a3(tsha): grol ba dang / rig pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu stug por gyur te rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul
217a4(tsha): du gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / smon lam gyi pha rol
217a5(tsha): tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dges pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba
217a6(tsha): chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzad de/ mngon du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/ su ra tas+thA hi so// gang gis 'dod pa bde che ba// gang
217a7(tsha): gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur// 'dod chags bral na ji ltar bde// gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug gti mug rgyal// gang gis 'dod chags pad+mor gyur//
217b1(tsha): gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag/ gang gi phrag dog gdon mi za// byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde// gang gis don byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub//
217b2(tsha): ji ltar gzugs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchod ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// bsnyen pa yis ni myur du 'grub// ji ltar gsang ba ma nyam sbyor
217b3(tsha): bas// rmad byung ba yi dbang skur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu 'jug par 'gyur// ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang // dmar dang snang mdzad chen po
217b4(tsha): yis/ dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgos pa chen po'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen pos//
217b5(tsha): rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes pa byas te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa chen po/ mchog tu
217b6(tsha): gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ngan song gsum gyis 'jigs byed du// sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas// de yis
217b7(tsha): phyir ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes mi bsgrags pa yis// ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru// sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de yi phyir ni gti mug che// rtag pa thub pa mchog
218a1(tsha): yin no// thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing // pad+mas pad+ma phye ba'i phyir// de phyir chags zhes bya'o// bde chen sbyin
218a2(tsha): pa'i sprin gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed// nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir// de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin// ro la rtsogs pa ma nyam sbyor bas// phrag
218a3(tsha): dog rdo rje gdon ma za// sna tshogs pad+ma rab 'jug phyir// de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che// 'dod chags bral dga' mo phyir bdag ni dges sbas pa che// 'dod pa ma rtogs bde
218a4(tsha): byed med// bde chen 'dod pa nga yin no// 'dod chags med par byang chub med// byang chub med na 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na'ang chags bral te// sangs rgyas bde/
218a5(tsha): mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dod chags 'di las bde byed kyi// bde ba mchog tu rmad byung 'gyur// byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir
218a6(tsha): med do// thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo// bde byed thams cad thob par 'gyur// bo zhes pa ni rdo rje bshad// d+hi zhes pa ni gzungs ma mchog/ tsa zhes pa ni zag par
218a7(tsha): bshad// ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// mchod pa med pas bde byed med// bde ba med pas mgu ba med// mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// grub na bde byed rtag pa yis/
218b1(tsha): phyag na rdo rje bde ba che// 'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing // tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bde byed thams cad mnyam bzhag pas// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin//
218b2(tsha): rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma ste// d+ha zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yis// yi ge myur du grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun// rdzogs
218b3(tsha): sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin// kha lo bsgyur ba'i longs spyod de// de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// 'di yis bsnyen na 'grub par 'gyur//
218b4(tsha): sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// dbang phyug mchog gis sngags bshad do// rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes// mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad// de dang
218b5(tsha): mnyam du sbyor ba yis// mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par byed// blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur na//
218b6(tsha): dam tshig spras pa tshogs kyi rnams// dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog/ sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis// lus la kun tu khyab gnas te// de yis phyir ni dam tshig che//
218b7(tsha): dam tshig 'di yi dngos grub ste// dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis// sbyor chen sbyar dang bskyed byas nas// zos na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin ma
219a1(tsha): kun// pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs pa yis// 'dzum bag g.yon nas gar byed cing // brtag pa la ni yang gsol pa// rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan//
219a2(tsha): ji ltar sbas pa gsum du bgyi// sna tshogs chen po de dag kun// bde la granas pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
219a3(tsha): kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid las/ de bzhin gshes
219a4(tsha): pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo // nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' don chen 'byin// rigs kyi khyad
219a5(tsha): par lnga rnams kyis// spyod bcas mi spyod rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen 'byung // 'jigs dbang ga don mi za 'grub rnams// rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bstan te//
219a6(tsha): mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum// rdo rje nga ni de nyid gsum// bde ba'i gnas la rab tu rol// de nas
219a7(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rang gi sdom pa la gsol pa 'das so// sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa// brtul zhugs
219b1(tsha): dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi// dam tshig mchog tu bsrung ba rnams// bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po mchog
219b2(tsha): tu dges pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu rgyas bzhad nas/ nyid kyi sku dang /
219b3(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs smras pa// nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya// bsrung ba yis ni bsod nams che// dngos grub shin tu
219b4(tsha): skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i// yid kyi kha dog dbyibs chen gyi// phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab// sbas pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje gsung du rab
219b5(tsha): sbyor bas// chos kyi ngo bo'i phyag rgya brjod// ngag sba sA gsal bar brjod pa ni// nga ro smras pa rdo rje'i gsung // rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis// zla bar rdo rje rnam par
219b6(tsha): bsgoms// rang gi ngo bo gsum gcig bsgom// 'di ni yid sbas chen po yin// 'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/ rgyun du bsgom pa rnam bya ste// gsum bsgom pas ni 'grub
219b7(tsha): par 'gyur// gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sbas
220a1(tsha): gsum rnam par sba bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang // gtso bo chen pos byin gyis brlabs// blun po gang gis 'da' byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa skad
220a2(tsha): cig 'jig/ sems dpa' che dang bral gyur nas// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang // ji tsam nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bar// shin tu mi zad smin par 'gyur// des na dam
220a3(tsha): tshag de dag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu 'gyur te// 'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // g.yon gyi phyag byas blar gsol ba// gar dbang rnam gnon gnon pas gar mdzad
220a4(tsha): cing // mtha' yas phyogs bcu pa'i bgyings pa yis// pad+ma lo ma 'jam po brgyad phye nas// gnyis med bde ba rdo rje 'jog mdzad de// sbas pa de nyid mi mnyam gsang
220a5(tsha): bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag tu// thabs dang shes rab dgos pa bde byed tshogs// bde gshegs rnams kyis sbas pa nyid kyis shod// sbyor dang sbyor ma yang dag sbyor//
220a6(tsha): zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde// 'dod pa lnga yis yon tan 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//
220a7(tsha): de nyid sbas pa skul ba yis// sbas pa ma lus 'chad par mdzad// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas// cho gar ldan pas gsang dbang bskur// bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis//
220b1(tsha): de nyid de ni de la bstan// 'di la khrus med nges pa med// dka'adub med de dga' ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// lus
220b2(tsha): dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na// ji tsam 'dod pa nam mkhar 'phur// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur bcings// rdo rje
220b3(tsha): blta bas rnam bltas te// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas na// rdo rje sems dpar skad cig 'gyur// rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas// rab dgyes ser ni 'gro byed
220b4(tsha): sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang // grub pa yis kyang mchod byed mthong // rdo rje sems dpa' rgya che mchog/ 'gying pa'i long pas gar byed pas// bde byed zla ba'i khod 'dra
220b5(tsha): zhing // las kyi khyad par la sogs gnon// sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas// sbas dang sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar bya dang // lag pa mang
220b6(tsha): po'i rnam bsgyur dang // phyi kyang skyibs su ldan pa dang // khros 'bar dri med palta ba yis// gdul dka' gnod pa'i 'jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal
220b7(tsha): 'gyur// me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro bo hU~M mdzad bsgom byas na// myur du 'jig rten don grub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// lha mo bzhi dang
221a1(tsha): mnyam sbyor bas// su ra ta tA zhes smra zhing // har thig le'i tshul sbyar nas// rab dgas de ma thag tu 'gyur// rab dgyes mchog tu rtag pa yis// sa
221a2(tsha): chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// sems can rnams kyi don kun byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag
221a3(tsha): bzhes nas gsol ba/ thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te// phyag rgya de nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs// bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod pa shod// gzugs dang
221a4(tsha): sgra dang dri che dang // ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// thugs rje chen pos bsrubs pa yi// dpa' bo chen po nyid kyi shod// de nas bcom ldan pade byed che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
221a5(tsha): po// phyag rgya bcings pa bde ba che// de nyid mchog gis bshad par mdzad// dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// gsum pa phyag rgya chen po yin//
221a6(tsha): bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// ji ltar dbyibs bzhin bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs ye shes rjes 'dud pa// sna tshogs chen po'i ma chad
221a7(tsha): par mdzad// rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste// mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin// nam mkha'i snying po mthing kha yin// tshe dpag med pa pad+ma dmar// sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog
221b1(tsha): 'od zer 'phreng ba rmad byung ba'i// gdon mi za ba rdo rje che// don chen byed par bsam par bya// rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du// myur du nam mkhar 'gro byed cing // rigs kyi lha mo
221b2(tsha): bzhi rnams kyis// rol pa dang ni mchod par byed// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che yis// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sbyor ba bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa'
221b3(tsha): bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rje la sogs gdan bzhugs par// rang gi 'khor lo mchog gis brgyan// rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam//
221b4(tsha): pad+ma'i gdan gyis tshul gyis ni// rtse dang ldan pa bsgom byas te// snying po sbas don gar byas pas// sbas pa che la bde byed na// 'gying ba'i bde ba ldan pa yis// rdo rje chen por de
221b5(tsha): 'grub ste// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye bas// sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad sgrub pa'i sbyor ba bde ba chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rab
221b6(tsha): tu rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag rgya ba cing bshad de// rtag la sogs pa de kho na// gang gis myur du bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro// thabs ni
221b7(tsha): g.yas kyi logs su byas// de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyis// sbyar ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya// sor mo thams cad par bar du// snyam
222a1(tsha): du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin// rdo rje yi ni thal mo yis// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du 'grub// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // nam mkha'i snying po'i
222a2(tsha): gnas su 'gro// 'di ni shin tu bcings pa yis// gsum du sbyar bas mchod par bya// 'di nyid las ni sor mo kun// kun tu bskums te bcings par bya// rdo rje bcings pa
222a3(tsha): brdungs pa na// bcing pa ldan pa rnam sgyur te// de nyid sbom por rab bcug nas// khros pa'i rtse mo rab tu dgug/ 'dis ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing // rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
222a4(tsha): 'grub byed// de bzhin bcing ba mnyam bzhag ste// sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni bcing ba bcings pa che// nam mkha' 'gro ba nye bar 'grub// de nyid bcing ba bcings
222a5(tsha): byas te/ khro mo gnyis po'i mtshan bzhin du// rtse mo phrad de dgug bya ba// bcing ba 'dis ni pad+ma sgrub// bcings pa de nyid rab tu sbom// bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te//
222a6(tsha): las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i rigs kyis mchod par 'gro// bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te// sbom dang khro mo'i gtso mor sbyar// g.yas pa'i sdom po rdo rje yis//
222a7(tsha): de yi dbus su bcug bya ba// de 'di bcing ba chen po ste// rab dgas ro ni sgrub byed pa// gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// rab tu dgos pa nyid 'thob bo// dngos grub
222b1(tsha): thams cad badre ba che// de yis 'di tshe thob 'gyur te// phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas// phyag rgya bcing ba'i yang zhes rnam par rgyal ba'o//
222b2(tsha): bcing ba lnga yis cho ga yis// gcig gis rnal 'byor sgrub mi bya// dug gi sbyor bas sbyar byas na// de ma thag tu rab dges 'gyur// bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin
222b3(tsha): bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon gyi snying khar gzung bar bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo bsgreng byas te// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde// sangs rgyas
222b4(tsha): thams cad nyid du 'grub// gdon mi za bar tshe 'di nyid// rtag pa 'dra ba 'thob par byed// g.yon pa de nyid snying khur gzhag/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pa// sa le bde bar rol
222b5(tsha): pa yis// 'di yis mi zad thob par 'gyur// de bzhin snying khar g.yon pa gzhag/ rtag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan rtsogs// nam mkha'
222b6(tsha): nye bar 'grub par byed// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar gzhag/ g.yas kyang bkan te ting 'dzan gnas// 'di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de bzhin//
222b7(tsha): g.yon pa snying khar sbyar// lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin// sbyin pa ma lus rab sgrol ba// sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed//
223a1(tsha): gdon mi za ba nges pa che// de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya// g.yas ni snying khar gzung
223a2(tsha): bya ste// brjid par rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 'di yis rab dges nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa'o// tshe 'di nyid la the tsom
223a3(tsha): med// de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te// sbyor dang ldan pas bstan par bya// sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo yi// g.yon gyi khro mo rtse mo sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis//
223a4(tsha): mngon sum rdo rje sbyor ba yis// bcug nas bde ba bskyed bya zhing // skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dges pa dgyes mchog sgrub
223a5(tsha): pa po// 'di nyid bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa thob// rab dges longs spyod bde mchog gis// btsun mo dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// g.yas kyi
223a6(tsha): mtshan ni drang byas te// lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu ste// rdo rje 'dod byed btsun mo'o// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// rab dgyes la
223a7(tsha): sogs ma lus pa// rab dgyes rol pa bgyings pa yis// skad cig nyid du 'dren par byed// de bzhin sbom po'i rtse mo sbyar// snying rje chen mo dar bshag pa// skal ba chen mo
223b1(tsha): rdo rje can// de nyid don kun ston byed ma// 'di ni yang dag bcings pa yis// rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur// yod dang med pa rnams spangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//
223b2(tsha): rdo rje thal mo bstan byas te// khro mo'i rtse mo zlum po yis// mthon por mtshan dang 'dra bya ste// sbom por rdo rje bstan pa che// de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje pad+ma bde thob byed//
223b3(tsha): rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sbas pa chen po'i dgegos pa thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spro ba che bas gar mdzad cing // rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// 'dud dang bcas
223b4(tsha): pas phyag byas te// chos kyi yi ge thabs gnas pas// de nyid kyis ni gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan pashad du gsol// bsgrub pa pos
223b5(tsha): ni rab bsgrim swa nas// gang gi sa lha ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis myur du byin brlabs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub ste// bde byed kun gyi spro che ba// de bzhin
223b6(tsha): gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
223b7(tsha): sbas pa las/ chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa che// thig le ltar ni yang dag ldan// tha mar ha ra thig ler gnas// bar du dga'
224a1(tsha): ba rdo rje dgyes// snying khar phyag rgya 'di byas na// dga' byed lhan cig btson byed cing // spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te// rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro
224a2(tsha): de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod ma khyo ba mchog/ ha ra thig le yang dag ldan// cha gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pas// 'di ni snying khar gzhag byas na// bde bar nam
224a3(tsha): mkha' 'gro 'gyur te// bde ba bzhin tu rtag par 'gyur// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo// 'dren pa de nyid thog ma bzhag/ ltos ltos zhes pa hU dang ldan// skal ba chen
224a4(tsha): po rdo rje can// dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur// 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' nor che ba// 'dis ni rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje byang chub dges pa che// sangs rgyas
224a5(tsha): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag/ tha ma ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde thob byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa
224a6(tsha): yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grog pa yis// lus ni 'di tsho 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor ba yang dag sbyor// phyag rgya 'di dag
224a7(tsha): mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la sogs spyod pas// bcom ldan 'dod pa grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o//
224b1(tsha): de nas bcom ldan sbyor che ba// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje khro bor de gyur to// mudun du thog ma'i lha nyid kyi// rdo rje hUM mdzad nyid
224b2(tsha): ma 'bar// nyi ma bcu yis gzi brjid che// me bzhin rab tu 'bar bar ldan// 'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyan de 'dul ba'i
224b3(tsha): tshogs rnams dang // de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad// khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di// sngags rigs rang gi snying khar sgom// khro mo'i bu mos mdun du bskor// khro bo chen
224b4(tsha): mo de 'grub bo// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams// hUM byas myur du brdegs par bya// de nas gdug pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jigs/
224b5(tsha): skyobs shig skyobs shig ces smra zhing // rdo rje gtso la dran par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam pazhag nas// 'gro ba thams cad dbang byas te// las mchog thams cad dbang
224b6(tsha): byas te/ las mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos// dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya// sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te// las rnams thams cad byed pa na// gdon mi za
224b7(tsha): bar kun 'gyur te// rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub par nus// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// de nas sangs rgyas che
225a1(tsha): de dag/ sangs rgyas nyid skye thams cad mchog/ gzungs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// phan tshun bde bar
225a2(tsha): ldan pa yis// dga' bas 'khor rnams 'phags 'gyur te// rang gi bde byed skyes pas 'brel// bskal pa chen mo brtson par byed// de nas bcom ldan
225a3(tsha): 'das rdo rje shin tu dges pa chen pos/ rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams yang dang yang du gzigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rigs ma'i
225a4(tsha): snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do// oM badz+ra a g+hu shi tu ru tu ru/ e h+ye hi kad d+ha kadad+ha/ bi kad dz+nyA bi kadad+d+ha/ sarban pa ra shad tsug k+ka san tsa yam/ badz+ra Ang g+h+rA shi hUM phaT/
225a5(tsha): 'di ni phyag rgya rdo rje yis// bcing ba gnyis ni dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya// rdo rje smyo ba zhes bya'o// 'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams// 'dis ni de dag kun
225a6(tsha): 'gugs te// 'dod pas 'gying ba yid rtag rnams// mi'i bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcing ba mnyam gzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin gzhag/ dbus su
225a7(tsha): sbom po gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas te// rdo rje sbom po rtse mo sprad// bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgo zhing // bcing ba de ni dgrol
225b1(tsha): bar bya// de nyid bcing ba dam byas te// dbang dang chu ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams// rdo rje sbom pa nub byas te// rab dges bdag nyid bskyed par bya// de bzhin gzungs ma'i
225b2(tsha): tshogs rnams dang // rnal 'byor ma dang nam mkha' 'gro/ phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang // lha mo kla mo gnod sbyin mo// lha men dngos grub lus kyi mchog/ grul bum mi
225b3(tsha): lam yi dgas dang // sha za 'phrul gyi ma bu mo// 'di ni snying khar gzhag pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang // pad+ma 'i dra ba sna tshogs blo//
225b4(tsha): lha dang lha men mi dag dang ni// gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang // bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi// gzhan gyis dbrog par yongs ma nus// lha dang lha min gyis mchod
225b5(tsha): cing // dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed// lha dang lha min bteg byed cing // skad cig nyid du 'ong bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen pa'i yul// sangs rgyas
225b6(tsha): kyis ni zhing kun du// rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang // de ni brtson cing 'gro bar byed// 'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa// thog ma tha ma med 'gyur te// sangs rgyas
225b7(tsha): rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas// dges pa'i sman mchog gcig tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur// rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur// pad+ma'i nang na pad+mar 'gyur// sna
226a1(tsha): tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ ma nyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs pas//
226a2(tsha): dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// gzugs mi sdug pa'ang gzugs mchog 'gyur// mig med pa'ang mig ldan 'gyur// rna ba 'on pa'ang sgra thos te// glen pa yang ni yid rnor
226a3(tsha): 'gyur// de la sogs pa dpag med pa'ang // mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// de yi 'og dang de 'og tu// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas// de ni skad cig 'gro bar
226a4(tsha): byed// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor du// sngags mkhan 'gyings pas gar byed pas// bde chen po bskyed pa yis// sems can de ni 'jug par byed// mi g.yeng blta
226a5(tsha): ba bsgyur ba yis// las rnams thams cad de yis byed// brdeg pa dang mi btab pa dang // gar dang rnam par spong ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de// ri dang sems
226a6(tsha): can thams cad la// smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang // ci dga' bar ni bdag par byed// gdug pa'i lta bas srog chags rnams// brdeg pa dang ni bsgral bar byed// gtum dang gdug
226a7(tsha): dang 'jigs che dang // khro bo'i blta bas bsgral bar byed// shin tu dgos pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan dang ldan ma zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i don thams cad grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i ye
226b1(tsha): shes kyi mthu chen po'o// dang por o gyis rnam par brgyan// tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// rdo rje rab tu dgos pa'i sku// bde ba skyed byed bshad pa yin//
226b2(tsha): phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgya sma sku ni rab tu 'grub// grub nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bud med kun dang brtsen byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// sems
226b3(tsha): can dman pa'ang dngos grub bo// shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang // sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur te// skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyis// chu skyes zhabs la
226b4(tsha): bsnyen par byed// lha dang lha min bu mo yi// rigs mas mthong na dga' byed de// phyag rgya ye shes brgyan pa yis// sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur// spyod
226b5(tsha): dang mi spyod mi dag dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yi// dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus// de la sogs pas bstod byed de// 'jigs par
226b6(tsha): gyur pa'i sems kyis ni// bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing // kun gyi mchod pas bsti stang byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i mtha' klas lha rnams
226b7(tsha): dang // nyi ma bcu yis 'od zer bzhin// rnal 'byor chen po 'grub par 'gro/ sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu// 'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing // sangs rgyas byang
227a1(tsha): chub sems dpa' rnams// zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnams bdud cing phyag byed do// lha dang
227a2(tsha): lha min grul bum dang // tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha chen po// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs der// 'jigs shing skrag par 'ong bar byed// bcom ldan dngos grub
227a3(tsha): bka' stsal gsol// ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin// spyi bos bka' blangs gdul dka'i rnams// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi
227a4(tsha): po yi// dam chog rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi// zla gsang thig le mchog nyid kyi// dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyis te// rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid// rnam pa bzhi
227a5(tsha): po thams cad blang // chu skyed dngos grub zhabs drung du// 'tsho yi bar du bdag cag 'bangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar zhabs 'bring du// ci bgyis zhes pa'i bka' nod do//
227a6(tsha): phyag rgya 'di yis rgya btab na// spyod bcas mi spyod dga' byed de// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kye mchog/ shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong // rdo rje shin tu dgas pa'i sku chen
227a7(tsha): mo bde ba dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dang po o steng thig le ste// gzhan gyis mi phyed khror bcas pa// gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni//
227b1(tsha): gsung gi rdo rjeng ka na tu dges// bde gsungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mchog tu ro ni myong byed pa// dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'i// gsung gsal rna bar dga' bar
227b2(tsha): byed// yi ge'i phyag rgyas chen po 'di// byang chub chen po sgrub byed de// yon tan yon tan stug mtho ba'i// tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'i// dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab
227b3(tsha): ni// dpal kun bdag po des mthag/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob// phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan// rgyus
227b4(tsha): btab 'dod pa spyad byas na// dngos grub rmad du byung ba yis// de yis myur du thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa po yi bka' nyan te// ci ste
227b5(tsha): rmongs pas 'da' byed na// de yi srog ni tha ma yin// de yis bsrung ba byas na dpal// tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin// gdon mi
227b6(tsha): za ba thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas// sgrub par mi byed cung zad med// bdag nyid thams cad sprul par ni// mchog gi ye shes dngos grub
227b7(tsha): 'gyur// phyag rgya ya shes byin parlabs la// sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang // chos dbyings mi mnyam rab klas pa// dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang //
228a1(tsha): shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sems dpa' chen po de khrid do// rang gi ting nge 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe// dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bar bya// ji snyed
228a2(tsha): nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dod pa thams cad des spyod de// rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing // ngan song du yang 'gro mi byed// de ni 'og ma'i sdug bsngal yang //
228a3(tsha): 'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur// rdo rje gsung ba de rmad byung bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sngags byed de// bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol nas// nam mkha' rim par
228a4(tsha): 'gro 'ong byed// lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang // bo de byed kun gyi bdag nyid dge/ gnas dang //
228a5(tsha): zas dang 'thung la sogs// nam mkha' la ni skad cig rnyed// bud med rin chen mchog mkha' las// bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi dbyings phyug ma
228a6(tsha): lus pa// de yis khams gsum thob par byed// rnal 'byor grub chenA 'phrogs par 'gyur// 'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med// dka' dub 'di dang 'dra med de//
228a7(tsha): bud med mchog tu bde ba la// 'dod pa'i yon tan spyad 'grub// dge ba'i pad+ma rig kun tu// sems dpa' chen por ngag dbang skur// gzungs ma rnams kyi bde che ba//
228b1(tsha): rgyal po chen por 'gyu'o// gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa rdo rje shin tu dges pa chen po'i bde ba thob par byed pa khams gsum kun snang bar grags pa
228b2(tsha): pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gris dgongs pa thams cad grub par byed pa'o// oM bcus mi phyed thams te// bAr du sems ni bde ba dang /
228b3(tsha): rdo rje rab dges bde byed che// dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni dngos grub che// byang chub sems ni rab bsgrub pas// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag
228b4(tsha): bdud rtsi mchog ni chud par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas nas// de ste thams cad sems kyang rung // bde ba chen pos sems thams cad// sngags mkhan
228b5(tsha): reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang // lha'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs pas// skad cig tu ni thob par 'gyur// lha mo
228b6(tsha): rnams dang grar byed cing // des ni rab dges bdag po khrid// pho brang dga' byed rab dges che// rab dgas chen po bde thob tu// seng ge'i gdan ni rab 'jog byed//
228b7(tsha): bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi// rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis// de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
229a1(tsha): che// yod dang med pa mi 'dod pas// de la phyag gi byed par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jog byed de// rang gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin ma
229a2(tsha): thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mdun du bskor// sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni// sems dpa' chen po ston byed pa// res 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod dang // res
229a3(tsha): 'ga' khab na 'byung ba dang // res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums// res 'ga' skye dang res 'ga' 'pho// res 'ga' spyod tshe rol pa dang // res 'ga' bdud las
229a4(tsha): rgyal bar mdzad// ras 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub// res 'ga' 'khor lo bskor mdzad de// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug por mdzad// res 'gra' dus su shin tu
229a5(tsha): mdzes/ res 'ga' bud med res 'ga' skyes// res 'ga' lha dang skyes dgu'i bdag/ res 'ga' 'dodaspang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs// res
229a6(tsha): 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag/ res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad do// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// ci dgar dngos grub 'dod/
229a7(tsha): pa la// bdag gi ngo bo ston par byed// mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis// 'dren pa mi phyed nye bya ste// phan tshun reg pa chen po yis// rdo rje can gyis bde 'bigs na// gzungs
229b1(tsha): ma mang po tshogs kyi rnams// bde byed chen po smos ci dgos// spyod dang mi spyod pa de dam pa// 'bad pa mi dgos thob par 'gyur// brjed pas byang chub snying po ru//
229b2(tsha): rtag par ru ni gnas 'gyur te// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// sbyor ba rjes su ldan pas so// thams cad tshwa ni rnam bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog
229b3(tsha): bzhin du// yi ge 'di ni sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen mo tshim pa yid las skyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba//
229b4(tsha): yi ge'i phyag rgya ste las thams cad 'grub par bya'o// dang por o ni sbyor byas te// tha ma ra gnyis po rdza R+Sha sgra// rab dgyes rdo rje byin brlabs
229b5(tsha): pas// lha mo mngar byed dbus su bzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma// rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa'i// dngos
229b6(tsha): grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis// bdag gam gzhan la rgyas btab ste// rdo rje 'dam skyes bcug byas na// de nas de myur
229b7(tsha): dngos grub bo// thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan// tshe dang lang tsho skal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra thob ste// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grub// sangs
230a1(tsha): rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi// sangs rgyas kun dang brtsen byed cing // sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi// 'phrul gyi bud med 'phrog byed do// rdo rje rab tu
230a2(tsha): skyes pan+den mo mngar bye kun tu byung ba me tog gi rgyan mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yI ge'i byug kyi ste/ sgrib pa thams cad sel bar byed pa/ lasra thams cad byed pa chen
230a3(tsha): mo gdon mi za ba gzhan gyis mi phyed pa'o// tshangs pa gsung gi nga ror bcas// tha mar dri la bu nga ro gnyis// dbus su ming gi 'phreng ba ste//
230a4(tsha): yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yid kyi dngos grub thob byed de// 'dod pa yi ni thams cad rnams// yi ges skad cig 'grub par byed//
230a5(tsha): 'di yis rgyas btab bud med dam// bdag nyid rang gi slob ma'ang rung // de nyid sbyor ba sa bosnyen byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag
230a6(tsha): bror ni// myur du mkha' 'gro 'gyu byed de// tshangs pa dpa' bo gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang // lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lha mo'i tshogs dang btsen byed
230a7(tsha): cing / lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che// 'jigs par byed dang rku byed pa// sems can kun gyi mchog dam por// sems can chen/
230b1(tsha): po de 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni// brjid la sogs pa sbyor bar 'gro// brjid byed pad+ma chen po yis// thams cad du ni brjid pa yis// brda byed chen po
230b2(tsha): myong byed de// rab tu dgas pa sgregs pa bzhin// rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas// rnal 'byor chen po de gnas te// 'di ni snying la bris pa yis// ci 'dod par ni
230b3(tsha): 'dod pa 'thob// phyag rgyas chu skyes btab bya ste// de ltar byas na phyag rgya dges// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa sdug pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi
230b4(tsha): ge'i phyag rgya ste thams cad las byed dge ba'o// dang po yig du oM bya ste// thig le rgyal pos nye bar brgyan// tsheg drag dang bcas 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa
230b5(tsha): tha mar gzhag byas te// rdo rje rab dgyes brgyan byas pa// rdo rje stong kha dbus su bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snang bar rab bsgrub pa// yi ge yi ni
230b6(tsha): phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying khar rgyas btab na// sangs rgyas ye shes ma rgod byed pa// 'di yis ston khwa ma dngos grub// snga dbang lhar bcas lha rnams dang // gnod sbyin
230b7(tsha): srin por ba cas pa dang // sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa// thams cad 'di yis g.yog tu 'gyur// de yis 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba yis// sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs
231a1(tsha): ldan de 'gro ste// sna tshogs shes rab 'byung dpal yang dag khyab// chos mchog dam pa byed pa mthong byed cing // spyad bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang
231a2(tsha): byed de/ sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed// mkha' dbyings rnam par 'gyings pas rab dga' bas// A li kA li pad+ma'i bde mchog la// myong zhing mchod
231a3(tsha): byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de// 'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yis badre ba'i ngo bo de// 'di yis dngos grub 'grub par
231a4(tsha): 'gyur/ skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyub phyogs pa// tshe 'di nyid lnga thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgos pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang /
231a5(tsha): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed pa'o// dang po oM ni yang dag ldan// tha mar dgyes pa'i yi ge
231a6(tsha): gnyis// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// dbus su bsil ba'i yi ge bAsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro/ sna tshogs chen mo
231a7(tsha): 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin brlabs pas// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te/
231b1(tsha): bsod nams kun gyi bdag nyid dge/ kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni// 'di nyid kyi ni rab tu 'grub// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis// sna tshogs chen po bskal par gnas//
231b2(tsha): rdo rje bdag nyid brgyan pa yis// bud med kun drang btson par 'gyur// de nas de ni chos dbyings gnas// dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub bo// pad+mo'i mdun du thog/
