231b3(tsha): ma'i lha// byas te rdo rje bsgrub bya// mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste// kha yi nang du gzhag par bya// chang bzhin myang bar byas nas ni// mod la 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur//
231b4(tsha): A li kA lI rab sbyor bas// bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya// bsil ba dga' byed chen po ste// sna
231b5(tsha): tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas// dang por o ni gnas pa ste// tra ta ldan pa tha ma ra sbyar// rdo rje shin tu dgos pa che ho// sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas
231b6(tsha): thams cad kyis// bsgag par bya ba sprul pa yin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yi// sgeg mo ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtan
231b7(tsha): pos yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mar gzugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa 'dod par spyad// 'dod pas myur du dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal des// bde byed thams
232a1(tsha): cad nye bar sgrub// sems can kun gyi 'dod bskyed pa// bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin ma'i mchog/ pad+ma'i tshul sgeg pa yis/
232a2(tsha): rdo rje sbyor ba thabs gnas pas// rdo rje chen po de dngos grub// ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i lam dang yan lag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyi rjes 'thun spyod
232a3(tsha): bsgrubs na rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun tu bzang zhes bya// da ni dngos po kun yin te// dgos pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa//
232a4(tsha): sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa yis// sangs rgyas chen po de dngos grub// dpal ldan thog ma tha ma med// chos thams cad rjes 'thun pa// 'di yis dngos po thams cad
232a5(tsha): kyis// sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang // 'di la khyad par cung zad med// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po'i
232a6(tsha): dpral shin tu dgyes ma sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba yi ge'i phyag rgya mchog gi sku'o// drang po o bcas lha mo yI// tha mar tsheg drag mi phyed de//
232a7(tsha): gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du// he zhes bya bas rnam par brgyan// shin tu dgos pa'i rdo rje che// bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying la
232b1(tsha): rgyas btab na// 'phreng ba rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// yid kyis ji ltar bsam pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro/ de ni der phyin
232b2(tsha): sangs rgyas mthong // chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas 'dus pa dgyes gyur te// sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba che// dngos grub
232b3(tsha): rnal 'byor da la sbyin// bde ba chen po 'phrogs pa yis// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la// gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// thabs bcas shes rab chen po la//
232b4(tsha): rgyal ba nyid kyi stobs byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bar// bde ba chen po mgu bar byed// bde ba'i thabs kyi dngos grub rnams// sgyu ma 'a tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi
232b5(tsha): ge 'di ni phyag rgya 'dis// shin tu dngos grub mchog tu btag/ rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i 'phreng brgyas pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba yi ge'i phyag rgya ste// las
232b6(tsha): thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// o ni dang por gtsug tor bya// te te skad snyan tha mar te// dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba// bde chen dga' ba rdo
232b7(tsha): dbyangs// rdo rje shin tu dgyes tshe yis// phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang // dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ste// sdig pa kun las grol byed
233a1(tsha): cing // bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro/ mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing // sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ges brgyan te 'gro/ 'jig rten
233a2(tsha): thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed// rig ma stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing // rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yo ba
233a3(tsha): pa yi// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel pa 'thob// blo ldan nam mkha'i ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'dzin gyis dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma// yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni
233a4(tsha): rgyas pa dang // rnal 'byor yod pa'i bde bas 'brigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rol pa sra rtsen par byed// pi wang gling bu sA ya mtshan sgra snyan gyi// glu
233a5(tsha): blangs dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed// ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag gi/ 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag/ bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed pa'i rnam bsgyur ba//
233a6(tsha): de dang mthun pa 'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed// sha dang shardza'i dbyangs// glu ru blangs pas pad+ma gnas// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di yis byin brlabs
233a7(tsha): dag pa dang // 'di yis byin brlabs bde ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems
233b1(tsha): dpa'i mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyangs dpe med ma dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya'o// de bzhin o ni dang porarA te// dbus su he dgyes bde
233b2(tsha): ba che// rdo rje gar byed 'bigs pA gnyis// 'di ni thams cad bde byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rab dgyes nyid// rnal 'byor 'di yis rgyas btab na// bde ldan
233b3(tsha): gur ni byed cing 'gro// 'og min gyi ni gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs// bde byed chen po dbang chen dang // chos kyi rgyal po bde chen 'thob//
233b4(tsha): ji snyed grar gyi gtsug lag las// bsgyur bar byed pa bshad pa dang // ji skad de snyed phyag rgya'i gnas// gnyis med 'dus pas 'di dngos grub// kye ma ho dgos pa
233b5(tsha): bde byed che// kye ma ho bde ba bde chen po// kye ma ho 'dod pa 'dod chags che// kye moM ho sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyi ni yo
233b6(tsha): byad rnams// pad+ma gas la gar gyis ni// rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di// sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pa// myur du gar ni ma
233b7(tsha): byas pas// gar gyi rtsug la dngos grub bo// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i dpal chen po'i dpal bde ba chen mo dga' byed kyi gar zhes bya ba yi ge'i phyag rgya phan tshun gcug/
234a1(tsha): rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa ma ba dan gsum pa'o// bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid// spyi bor thig le ldan byas te// rdo rje shin tu
234a2(tsha): dgyes pa che// rdo rje sku ni sna tshogs che// tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza// namA mkha' zla sgrar 'dra ba yis// phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad byung 'di// 'di nyid thabs kyis
234a3(tsha): mnya ma gzhag ste// gzung ba gsal bar bzung ba yis// che ba gser gyi gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shes snying khar bsam bya ba// nam mkha'i nyi ma 'bum 'dra bar//
234a4(tsha): de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel ba// rdo rje mchog blo dngos grub bo//
234a5(tsha): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi// sna tshogs chen po tho ba 'gyur nas// 'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo// 'dod pa chen po bsnyen par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
234a6(tsha): cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma lus lus pa med pa rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o//
234a7(tsha): de bzhin oM ni gzhag bya ste// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje sgra ni bde 'brel pa// tha mar khror bcas sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste/
234b1(tsha): bar chad pa yang thos 'gyur te// khams gsum ngo bo thams cad na// sgyu yi thos pa dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub
234b2(tsha): ste/ bud med pad+ma ut+pal dang // ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang btson// rdo rje pad+ma sbyor bas na// dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo// rab dgyes chen po dpral rdo rje sems
234b3(tsha): pa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa'i ldan zhes bya ba/ don gyis dpal thams cad grub par byed ma'o// oM yi gtsug tu thig ler bcas/
234b4(tsha): rab dgyes chen po rdo rje can// rdo rje dri bde 'brel ba yis// tha mar gnas zhes rab sbyar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro/
234b5(tsha): sna tshogs chen mo 'dri yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rdo rjes brgyan pa yis// 'di ni mtshan ldan kun dang btson// de nas chos dbyings
234b6(tsha): gnas pa de// A li kA li rab sbyar bas// dga' byed lhan cig brtson byas na// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yis// blo ldan rab
234b7(tsha): tudagyes zhes bya// rdo rje dri med dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// oM mchog gtsug tor rnam bya ste// shin tu dges chen dbus nyid du/
235a1(tsha): rdo rje ron sbyor che ga/ tha mar ho ste thig le gnyis// 'di yi sa rab tu dgyes par 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang // bcom ldan rdo rje sem
235a2(tsha): dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis// mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad//
235a3(tsha): nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgos pa'i dbang po shin tu dgos pa chen po rol mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don grub
235a4(tsha): pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor
235a5(tsha): gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
235a6(tsha): rdo rje las shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
235a7(tsha): kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gsang ba'i gzugs dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'a
235b1(tsha): dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' lnga 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang
235b2(tsha): gri pho nya dang pho nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs dang dgyes pa chen po yi// brjid pa'i phyag
235b3(tsha): gris gar mdzad cing // thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// gzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed// bskul ba yi ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gtso la mnyes par byed
235b4(tsha): kye ma chos ni ngo mtshar che// kye ma ho spyad pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma ho spras pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma he bde byed yang dag 'gyur// kye ma ha kun tu bzang po don//
235b5(tsha): kye ma hor ba dgyes yang dag 'grogs// kye ma ho bde ba dag pa che// kye ma ho bde ba'i bde mchog ste// kye ma ho sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma ho snying po yang dag
235b6(tsha): bsdus// kye ma ho phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs// kye ma ho sgrub pa rmad byung ba'o// kye ma ho pha rol phyin ma yis// kye ma ho ji ltar mthun rig ma// kye ma ho sna
235b7(tsha): tshogs dgongs pa che// kye ma bdag pa gsum sbyar ba// kye mi bo rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma ho pad+ma rnam phye bas// kye ma ho dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i// kye ma
236a1(tsha): mchog dang mnyam pa'o// kye ma ho gar ni dag pa che// kye ma ho glu rab dri ma med// kye ma ho si la snyan rnam par 'brel// kye ma ho brda dang mun pa
236a2(tsha): sel/ kye ma ho dga'abyed me tog 'phreng // kye ma ho pag snod dge ba ste// kye ma ho mar mes mun pa sel// kye ma ho dr-i ni shin tu gsil// kye ma ha rnal 'byor mnyam
236a3(tsha): sbyor ba/ kye ma ho sgyu ma nam mkha' 'dra// kye ma ho sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog/ kye ma ho rin chen bde mchog bskyed// kye ma ho sna tshogs pad+ma mchog ldan// kye ma ho
236a4(tsha): sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye ma ho ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang // kye ma he ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams// kye ma ho ngo mtshar sems dpa'i rnams// kye ma ho ngo mtshar lha yi rnam//
236a5(tsha): shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la// rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying ba yis// dga' dang bde ba skye bar 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin thams cad// 'khor
236a6(tsha): gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te// sems dpa' tsho la phyag byas nas// mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par byed// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i smyan
236a7(tsha): gyis gar mdzad de// phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma sbyar// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas brla ni nu mar 'dud// rkyed pa
236b1(tsha): dbyibs ni rnam par yangs// bsnam gyi ngos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon// tshems kyi 'phreng ba kun dazla// mi drag bzlos pa'i dbugs 'byin
236b2(tsha): cing / rab tu dga' che dgyes pas bstod// ra ma ra ma na ho/ ma hA su hu/ ma dzu ma hA su ra a na se na ho/ pa i ad dz+yA a la la ho/ pa ra mu ma hA su hu/ tud dzu na ha mu ha da ha/
236b3(tsha): na ta ma I/ kha dzas ad dzu ho/ b+ha ga ba na ma hA su khe du sh+ya ho/ oM badz+ra sa twa su ra ta s+t+raM/ sarba ra sa ra sa gra/ ma hA s+phu ra ta su kha shu me/ sid N+ya nid t+yan/ ra sa ram/ sarba ra ma
236b4(tsha): sarba yo ki ni na/ ra kA ya ho/ b+ha ga wa na ma hUM/ a la la ho/ b+ha ga wa na ka ma ru ra ta s+thA/ ka ma hi man dzu/ b+hi a si a ba ra ma hu ma/ a la la ho/ ba ra g+hu la sha sa ha ra sa
236b5(tsha): a la su ha/ a ru bi a si/ a ma hu pa hu ma pa ra ba huma?/ ra ka ya bi bo ha n+ya ma lu sa ru/ ma hu ra ra ma a ho/ ma hA su hu ad dzu/ pe sa he ku li sa da ta mu/ su ra ha
236b6(tsha): sad dz+nyA/ kid dza hi sa tsa lu su ra ga mu gad dz+dzA/ bo d+hi sa ma ga mu la/ bi sa i a dadz+dzA/ a la la ho/ sa ma a od ta mu kad dz+dza/ a la la ho/ su ra a od ta mu sad dz+nyA/
236b7(tsha): de bas bde ba la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas
237a1(tsha): 'dul mdzad cing // gsang ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bstan te// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes btson pas dga'
237a2(tsha): bas spyad pa rtsol// a la la ho/ dam tshig rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid sdug bsngal zhir mdzad cing // 'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar bya ba'i chos dang bde gshegs don
237a3(tsha): du mdzad// ngo mtshar yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab ldan pa dam tshig de las byung // bde mdzod bde spyod dag la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig
237a4(tsha): le'i dkyil du bskyed mdzod de// byang chub snying por 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bas bskul zhing bsnyen par mdzod// ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rigs pa che la
237a5(tsha): dgyes shing bzhugs// bdag tsug 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod mdzes bcas pas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang dang ldan pa sa kyang na de la rag lus/
237a6(tsha): so/ a la la ho/ yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus// byams pa'i gzungs
237a7(tsha): ma bdag nyid che dang rab tu btsen mdzod la// dam tshig chen po gsum po 'di la gnas nas ni// zla gsang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dgongs med 'gro bar bgyi//
237b1(tsha): dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// shin tu srid la skyo ba yis// sangs rgyas kun dang 'dod pa bzhin// glu blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
237b2(tsha): 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis bstod pas shin tu dges te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de rnams
237b3(tsha): thams cad la/ rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang /
237b4(tsha): byang chub sems dpar bcas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs su bcas pa rnams/ phyi dang nang gi rdo rje'i rigs las skyes pa
237b5(tsha): rnams la/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang / dbyangs dang / brdung ba dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rab tu rnam par mdzad nas/
237b6(tsha): dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde bar cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to//
237b7(tsha): de nas de dag kun dgyes nas// shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sa stengs su// pus mo'i lha nga 'dzugs mdzad de// chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs//
238a1(tsha): dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag nyid la// bcom ldan dgyes par bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyi// bde bas dkyil 'kho
238a2(tsha): sgom par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas dkyil
238a3(tsha): 'khor bshad pa mdzad do// phyag gnyis gar dang bcas pa yis// mdun du thal mo gzhag par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la// pha rol phyin ma'i tshogs rnams
238a4(tsha): bsams// de dag ming gi brda yis ni// sor mo thams cad brtag par bya// sbom pa phan tshun bsnol byas te// shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag/ rdo rje mchod rten sbyar
238a5(tsha): byas te// lhag ma 'od bzhin spro bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma dge/ gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas byang
238a6(tsha): chub byin brlab bo// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed// sangs rgyas rnam snang dpal dang ldan// btso ma gser gyi kha dog 'dzin//
238a7(tsha): shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na// 'di yis myur du dngos grub bo// skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la// 'di yis byin brlabs gar byas te// rdo rje pad+mar gzhag byas nas/
238b1(tsha): sems ni zhugs pas sgrub byas na// de nas sems de blang byas te// blo ldan de yis btung byas na// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar
238b2(tsha): byed// shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi'am// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrul rtag thob// sangs rgyas rdo rje blo can gyis// kun tu 'phrog par yongs mi nus// shin tu dgyes
238b3(tsha): pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o// thal mo de nyid khro skye ba// sbom po dkyil dkrul gzhag byas te// sna tshogs 'phreng ba 'bar
238b4(tsha): byed pa/ rnal 'byor gyis ni lha mo spro// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal// phyag rgya 'dri yis rgyas btab pas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med//
238b5(tsha): 'di yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye shes
238b6(tsha): skal// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang // rdo rje 'dzin par de 'gyur te// rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab pa// sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro
238b7(tsha): bar byed// 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje'i rigs// rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang // rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sems nyid thob par 'gyur// ji ltar dngos grub
239a1(tsha): 'jugs pa dang // sa sa r+b+bas rju dpa' bo rnams// skang cig gis ni 'dren par byed// bsgral dang mnye bar bya ba dang // rgyas btu ba de bzhin
239a2(tsha): / ba dang / gas par byed dang za ba dang // ban+d+ha tshun du ni bskyed par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje nan po'i dbang bsgyur ba rdo rje 'bring ba zhes bya ba sa
239a3(tsha): dgyes pa bad pa thob par byed pa/ dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ rdo rje thal ma de nyid las// khro mo'i rgyu ba ni bkrum byas te// sor mo lhags
239a4(tsha): rdza ma bzhin// phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bsgyur ba'o// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs// de ma thug tA 'khro bar byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs
239a5(tsha): rgyas kyi ni dgyes pa 'thab// 'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang // 'di nyid kyi ni bde dam pa// 'di nyid kyi ni rgyal po che// 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dag pa// 'di yis brnye/
239a6(tsha): ba byas pa yis// rab dga' 'gugs pa dngos grub 'thob// mI la 'di yi byin brlabs te// nyi ma byed na spyad byas na// 'di ni de ma thag tu yang // dpal ldan rdo rje gzi
239a7(tsha): brjid 'dzin// nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od 'dra bar// zhag bdun gyis ni 'gyur gzhan min// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dul ba dang // dge ba thams cad dbang du byed// grol 'dod
239b1(tsha): rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po gzi brjid dpe med pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bden gsum
239b2(tsha): 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'i dam tshig 'bar ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// pha rol phyin ma'i phyag rgya nyid// dge ba khro mo dang bral ba//
239b3(tsha): rol phyin ma chos yin te// tshig dang tshig tu rnam bral ba'o// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur bas//
239b4(tsha): dbang phyug dam par bde 'gyur te// thams cad dag pa mos pa yis// pad+ma dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo sgyu ma rnam mdzad pas// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro//
239b5(tsha): sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog byed cing // sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags chen po nye spongs te// de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gar
239b6(tsha): byas pas// grub par mi byed cung zad med// 'di ni pad+ma'i sbyor ba yis// bde mchog rtag pa thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen por myos par byed pa'i dpal
239b7(tsha): pad+ma'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba/ thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid gnyis pa spyi gtsug tu// bsgyur nas gzhag pa byas pa
240a1(tsha): ni// ma lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa// sna tshogs chen pos de 'gyur ro// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ khams gsum sna tshogs byed par 'gyur//
240a2(tsha): sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/ bsgrub po thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgya la// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub
240a3(tsha): byed pa/ thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo// bud med 'di yis byin brlabs na// sngo bsangs mkhur tshos dkar mo dang // 'di dang lhan cig gar byed pa// sna tshogs bdag
240a4(tsha): po chen por 'gyur// sngon sangs zhing ma phrel ma dag/ byin gyis brlabs nas gsum du// mtshan gyi mthar ni bsnyen byas na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
240a5(tsha): rigs ngan dang ni rme ma dang // gar mkhan de bzhin gar byed dag/ phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs te// bsnyen nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs
240a6(tsha): bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba/ 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de dag bstan pa rnams// gar gyi tshul gyis rang bzhin
240a7(tsha): gnas// dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub chen po'i 'thur 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcings bcas bcing bar bya// de nas dga' byed
240b1(tsha): dbang bskyed de// mda' yi tshul du gzung bar bya// 'di ni rab dgyes gtso bo yis// pha rol phyin mchog bskud pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi myos byed pa// dpa' bo thams
240b2(tsha): cad rmongs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // mi shes byed pa 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi don ni bka' bzhin du// gnas nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur//
240b3(tsha): 'di yis byin gyis brlabs pa yis// bad chen rgyal po la dra bar 'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing // 'dod dbang bar ni 'gro bar byed// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
240b4(tsha): kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen mo bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// snying khar gzugs pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di
240b5(tsha): yis las kun byed 'gyur te// bdud rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun yang // thams cad 'di
240b6(tsha): yis slong bar byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas// myur du las la sbyor bar byed// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyis// gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de//
240b7(tsha): 'jigs byed drag po chen po yis// gdug pa thams cad brdung bar byed// rdo rje pad+mar bcug pa yis// mche bas ma mchu bzung byas te// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba yis//
241a1(tsha): dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya// sna tshogs chen por rab rgyas pas// bde ba chen po bde 'thob bo// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang thar
241a2(tsha): pa sgrub byed de// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed// rab dgyes 'brel pas gar bya zhing // nam mkha'i gzungs ma'i thabs nyid kyis// phan tshun
241a3(tsha): bcu pa'i gnon pa yis// bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo// 'di ni de ma thag tu yang // lha dang lha min mchod byed de// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang // nyi zla gshin rje chu
241a4(tsha): dbang rnams// spyi bo yis ni phyag byas na// rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang // nyid kyi dpal can stobs pa yis// bstan pa de la mgu byed cing //
241a5(tsha): sangs rgyas dgongs pa rab sgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// las dang rjes su 'thun 'gyur te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun
241a6(tsha): dang ma nyam sbyor te// gzugs dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed// 'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang // spyod pa'i gar gyis byas pa'o//
241a7(tsha): gzhan dag kyang ni dngos grub che// pad+ma'i 'dab ma rnams phye bas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa pos ni pad+ma sgrub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba
241b1(tsha): gnyis su med pa dpal shin tu dgyes pa'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba thob par byed pa'o// thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis//
241b2(tsha): bcings pa gyen du gzugs byas te// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya// de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya// phyag rgya 'di yis chu srin zhes// rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa
241b3(tsha): yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i sprul pa ste// 'dod bral chags par sgrub pa yis// phyag rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyis// pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// de phyir chos kyi 'khor lo
241b4(tsha): dag/ bla med par ni skor bar byed// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor// sdig spangs pa rnams kun nas kyang // spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar bsnyen
241b5(tsha): par byed// yang dag byang chub rab gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas 'di yis bsnyen par byed// de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yi// rang gi dam tshig
241b6(tsha): bsrungs pa yis// sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed// bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang // 'di yis thams cad sgrub par byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin brlabs te//
241b7(tsha): snying kha nye bar bsams byas nas// las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las ni byed du gzhug/ gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dag dang // sil snyan brdung ba rnam byed dang // pi
242a1(tsha): wang gling bu rdza rnga yis// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya// dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'o//
242a2(tsha): thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas// 'gying zhing 'gying bas gar byas te// bcing ba chen po bcing byas nas// sbyor ba chen pos gnyis su bya// khu tshur gnyis
242a3(tsha): po sku nyid du// g.yon du 'gying bas brtan par bya// phyag rgya 'dis ni rgyal la sogs// bde ba dam pas mchod byas te// 'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas nas// dngos
242a4(tsha): grub thams cad 'grub par byed// 'gying ba tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// 'gying bas thams cad 'phrod par byed// lha dang lha min rig ma yin// 'bum phrag brgya yis mchod
242a5(tsha): par byed// rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che// kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur// klu mo dang ni lha min dang // de bzhin mi 'am ci bdag 'gyur// nam mkha' 'gro
242a6(tsha): ma'i khyor 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che// gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pa bdag/ gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje// las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// thams cad las
242a7(tsha): nimi byed par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// gsang chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad 'gro ba sbas pa zhes
242b1(tsha): bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cadra du grub bo// phyag rgya de nyid mnyam bzung ste// lag pa'i 'drab ma gar dang bcas// myur du steng du dor ba yis// mgyogs su 'gro
242b2(tsha): ba dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa// sbyor ba gar gyi mchod pa yis// thams cad las byed dngos grub bo// gang dag dngos
242b3(tsha): grub med pa dang // gang dag bde ba med pa'i rnams// de dag phyag rgya 'dis btab na// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di yis thams cad las rnams ni//
242b4(tsha): rmad byung dam pa 'grub par byed// btsun mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs// de yis de ni sgrub par byed// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings//
242b5(tsha): btsun mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog gri 'phreng ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
242b6(tsha): de nyid 'og gi dngos su der// steng du cung zad bsgyur bar bya// 'de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde mchog yid ni tsha ma byed pa// kha di ni bcing ba tsam gyis
242b7(tsha): kyang // bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings te bsdig pa yis// skrag nas dngos grub sbyin par byed// sangs rgyas dam tshig gsum gnas pa// 'di yis
243a1(tsha): mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de nas gtso bo 'di mnyes nas// mchog gi thabs ni stob par byed// phyag rgya bcing ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yis thams
243a2(tsha): cad byed par 'gyur// rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa// dgongs pa thams cad byed par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed de// bde ba dam pa thob byed cing // tshe 'di dang
243a3(tsha): ni pha rol tu// phyag rgya'i gnas su de 'gro'o// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dri ma thams cad spong ba dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o//
243a4(tsha): thal mo de nyid sbom po bsgred// lhag ma gsal ba nyid ma bzhin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o// thog ma med nas dri mas
243a5(tsha): bgos// 'di yis gti mug 'phrog byed de// mnyam par bzhag nas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang // pad+ma'i dra ba/
243a6(tsha): dga' ba che// sna tshogs dri ba dpal chen po// bde byed chen po 'thob par 'gyur// rdo rje shin tu dgos pa chen po dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
243a7(tsha): g.yas dang g.yon gyi lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyi gar bya zhing // thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bor gzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di//
243b1(tsha): mchod pa thams cad don sgrub byed// thams cad don rnams sgrub pa dge/ bkra shis rnam rgyal thob par byed// gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // mchod pa'i sprin ni rgyas pa che//
243b2(tsha): mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos grub bo// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas sbyar byas te// skad cig gcig gis gar byas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog
243b3(tsha): kyang // 'di yis thams cad 'bab par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yi// sna tshogs gar gyi gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'grub// phun sum tshogs pa 'di yis thob/
243b4(tsha): dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs kyi
243b5(tsha): bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag po nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
243b6(tsha): gsang ba/ zla gsang thig le mchog tu phyin pa/ gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/ shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal
243b7(tsha): pa'i mthas klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa'o// rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye
244a1(tsha): shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar bde bar gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad pha
244a2(tsha): rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / nam mkha' la 'gro dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur
244a3(tsha): nas/ phyi dang nang gi rdo rje'i rigs su gtogs pa dang / 'phrogs par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de nas bzhengs te gar mdzad cing / rab tu dgyes
244a4(tsha): pa'i spyan rgyas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang blta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog gi bde ba 'dis glur blangs te dgyes par byed do// a ti na ra ta hi su ra/ a ha su hu ba ra ta
244a5(tsha): i ni ma hA dz+wa lA i/ ku la swa ba ru dza lu b+hi a i/ a ka ma la si sa si/ a id tsa ho/ pha ri ud dzA na/ i dzi ti dzi i ni man Ta lud tha na i/ Na da Ta hi Na da Ta hi/ Nad
244a6(tsha): Ta nu su ru g+ha na/ ad dza tha/ i b+ha ma a re na/ man da la pha ri e sa he/ pa ra ma a/ e hi na i/ sarbad dza i dzo/ i ni ma a/ 'un dza ba na si ba pa ma ni/ ma u d+he hi de/
244a7(tsha): de ad dza ho/ man d+ha la dzo'i ni sa ru a/ mu a ras/ a nu sog khu'i sa ru ra ma ra ma ran/ a i/ ra a ra a pa rig kha hi/ ra ma ra ma me/ sa ru sa ru/ rnam mang bde
244b1(tsha): ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po yis// skye dang mi skye chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bstan pa// shin tu bde bas chub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir phyung ste// rang bzhin
244b2(tsha): dag pa'i gzung ma'i dkyil nas bskyed par mdzod// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid bde bas rol mdzad cing // bdud rtsi rang bzhin 'dus pa rnams la dbugs 'byin
244b3(tsha): pa// gsang ba'i thig le dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra la rnam spyod de// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyun la dbang mdzad cing // byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha'
244b4(tsha): dang rnam bral zhing // bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+ma rnam dag pa// nyon mongs mi gos sgyu mas gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// e ma ho kun tu bzang po'i
244b5(tsha): rigs pa rgya che bsam gyis mi khyab pa// dngos nyid med pa'i chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzugs su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi ra sa yan// ji
244b6(tsha): ltar bde la brten cing kun tu snang bar mdzad// kyai bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzad// sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i lam can bde bas tshim par mdzod// byam pa'i
244b7(tsha): sman can thugs rje nyi mas 'gro ba rnams la shar mdzad nas// gti mug 'thibs pa'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar mdzod// de ni tshogs la bde sbyin rol pa'i
245a1(tsha): rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems de snying po mchog tu dbang bskur cig/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yi ni skad cig skad cig bskul byas na/
245a2(tsha): rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis// mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyin// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag po kun tu bzang po zla/
245a3(tsha): gsang thig la chen po la/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen po
245a4(tsha): rnams kyis bstod cing bskul bar byas pa dang / gsang ba thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa la longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di
245a5(tsha): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo
245a6(tsha): rje las phyung ngo // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta bab rnam pa bzhi yi brgyan// dur dang dril bu'i chun po dang // nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen mu tig 'bras bus
245a7(tsha): spras// do shal rkang gdu ba rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bres pa// sna tshogs 'phreng ba gos kyis brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ka ba brgyad
245b1(tsha): mchog yang dag gnas// dbus kyi dga' byed gdan la ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad bstan de dag
245b2(tsha): ces bya// dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes// stan de la ni gzhag par bya// tshad med pad+ma dmar 'dra ba// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid bzhin nor bu dbu brgyan/
245b3(tsha): ldan/ rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes// tshad med dar ni bcangs pa yi// dbu la chun pos mdzes par byas// sangs rgyus kun gyis sna tshogs bdag/ sna tshogs
245b4(tsha): ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam rgyas// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che// snying khar gsor la shin tu gson//
245b5(tsha): de la sogs pa yon tan ldan// thog mo nyid du rnam par brtag/ slob ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la// tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs byas
245b6(tsha): te/ dbus kyi dkyil du gzhug par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam pazhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab dgyes zhes
245b7(tsha): su smra// der ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'i// gsang ba yi ni dbang bskur ba'o// rab dgyes la sogs yon
246a1(tsha): tan ldan// yid 'ong bu mo btsal byas te// snying kha dpral ba mgrin spyi bo// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgya rab 'bar
246a2(tsha): ba// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzhug par bya// mdun du lha mo myos byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pa'i rol dgyes//
246a3(tsha): dkar dmar kha drog 'dres pa yis// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyi mdun du gzhag/ g.yas su lha mo bsod byed ma//
246a4(tsha): mtshon cha'i zla ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems
246a5(tsha): dpa' chel mnyes mdzad cing // de ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad+ma dmar po'i mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa mo// sku tshe'i
246a6(tsha): chad ni nyi shu gcig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i rol dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs pad+ma sbyor la sogs//
246a7(tsha): gar gyi bya ba rab brlabs gzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgongs pa rjes brlabs pa// sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor la sbyor shin tu
246b1(tsha): brtson// khwa dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos mdzad ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs dar gyis na bza' gsol// grwa rnams
246b2(tsha): ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams// bdug pa me tog bsung ldan dang // gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan// ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs/
246b3(tsha): rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// skal ldan dag la rnam mos pa// sgo srungs bzhi ni gzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// pi wang
246b4(tsha): gling bu gdab pa dang // r+dz+dza rnga rnga chen mun d+ha dang // mu ra dza dang d+hA ra d+ha// gur dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che// rol pa'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor
246b5(tsha): gzhag par bya// phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol tu// rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma gzhag/ yi dgas phyag rgya yang gzhag go/ dpa' bo
246b6(tsha): 'jigs byed gzungs 'dzin 'di// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing // sha dang khrag dang rgyu ma dang // rkang dang tshil bu
246b7(tsha): za spyod ma// dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed// bsod par byed dang spro bar byed// rdo rje mkha'
247a1(tsha): 'gro tshogs rnams kyi// shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste// gtsug lag mthong ba'i
247a2(tsha): rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// chags chen mo drang chags bral dang // 'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// rab tu sbyor bas sbyar byas te// ci rigs
247a3(tsha): nub tu gzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang bsrung ba dang // gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag 'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te// sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du
247a4(tsha): gzhag/ shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni// bya rog gdong ste mig 'bru zhing // 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong // ji ltar rjes su 'thun byas te// yi dgas stan la yang
247a5(tsha): dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog ni 'dzin pa ste// lag par gri dang mkhar gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o// nub dang lho yi mtshams bzhag pa// bzhad dang
247a6(tsha): 'ug pa'i gdong rIng ma// khros pas khyi dang phag gi gdong // sus mo che la lto 'phyang rnams// nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin ma// khros
247a7(tsha): pas ra dang byi la'i gdong // rgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams// shar dang byang gi gnas dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin byed de// khros pa rus pa 'phreng bas klubs//
247b1(tsha): lto 'phyang ba la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yis// lce lcang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche bas 'byin// rnam par sgyur ba'i gzugs
247b2(tsha): 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu// sgo bzhi rnams su gzhag bya ba// byang gi phyogs su 'bod sgrogs te// bum pa sna ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam pa 'joms
247b3(tsha): pa'o// lhor ni gshin rje rgyal po gzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor// bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// gser dang dngul las
247b4(tsha): byas pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sman sna lnga dang yang dag ldan// rin chen
247b5(tsha): lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru sna lnga yis brgyan pa yi// bum pa bcu drug gzhag byas te// bcu gnyis brgyad dam yang na phyed// tha na chung ngu gcig tsam yang // ji ltar
247b6(tsha): rim bzhin gzhag byas te// dbus su bum pa'i ro mchog gzhag/ dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa// gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung // lcags dang sa la byas pa//
247b7(tsha): zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // btung ba bsnum por ldan pa yis// dbang po kun las byung ba rnams// sha srang cig gis rab bsres pa// kun las 'phags pa'i ro yis
248a1(tsha): mchog/ tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub bya ste// btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yis// rdo rje blo ldan skal bar gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas//
248a2(tsha): bza' ba dang ni 'cha' bas mchod// mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang // tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la// skad cig skad cig mchod
248a3(tsha): par bya/ sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam gzhag ste// 'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin// lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la// rdo rje he ru ka'i phyag rgya yis// nyid kyi
248a4(tsha): gtor ma byin rlabs te// spyan drang gtsang sbra byas nas dbul// gzugs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la// mnyes par byas nas slar gshegs gsol// rnal 'byor ma
248a5(tsha): chen dkyil 'khor du// slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya// mtshungs par spyod pa rab mdzes ma// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// lag pa g.yon gyis bzung
248a6(tsha): byas te/ rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis// bcug nas sgo yi grwa nyid du// blo ldan chag 'di bsgrags par bya// 'di la mi bya cung zad med// thabs dang shes rab
248a7(tsha): sems dag gis// rtag tu dgos pa med byas te// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyod// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang // skye bo gang dag dam la gnos// brtul zhugs
248b1(tsha): spyod pas de drangs te// khrag chen po ni btung bar bya// gang dag slob dpon smod byed pa// gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa// de dag khros nas khrag chen po// blo ldan snying
248b2(tsha): las btung bar bya// dkon mchog gsum l-i gnod byed dang // slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa// rdo rje khro bo bsdus pa yis// dam tshig bsgoms te bskul bar
248b3(tsha): bya// de nas dam chu blud byas te// rdo rje bdud rtsi ro yi mchog/ dung chen por ni bzhag byas pa// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blud do// kye dmyal ba yis ni chu 'di ste// khyod
248b4(tsha): kyi snying la kun tu gnas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dri 'thung // oM badz+ra u d+ha hUM tha/ dam tshig la ni brgyar bzlas pa'i// byin
248b5(tsha): gyis rlabs te 'thung du gzhug/ gzhan gyi dam tshig mi 'gyur te// dngos grub nyid du ldang 'di 'gyur ro// bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes// slob ma sngags 'di brjod/
248b6(tsha): du gzhug/ sgo grwa gnas nas dri bya ba// kye khyod ni dga' ba ci la dad// 'jug pa yis ni smra bya ba// bdag ni skal ldan bde chen la// rab dgyes 'phrul bdag dga' ba
248b7(tsha): / mchog tu dga' la bdag dga'a'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma mchog gis// dkyil du me tog dor byas te// me tog gang la lhung ba yis// lha de nyid ni dngos
249a1(tsha): grub bo// dbang bskur ba yis phyag rgya yis// de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya// bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang // mnyam par gzhag ste lnga po
249a2(tsha): yis/ pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gzhug bya ste// de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya// ci rigs par ni gzungs ma rnams// bdag gi skal ldan zhes su smra// gang dag mgo bar
249a3(tsha): 'gyur ba yis// lha de nyid ni bstan par bya// dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs ma 'di// khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang gi sbas pa bsdu ba
249a4(tsha): yis// gsad pa mnyam par 'jug pa yis// sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje pad+ma lngas drang ba// sbom po dang ni dbang gis blangs// rdo rje rkun du gzhag bya ste//
249a5(tsha): rtag pa dge ba bde ba che// kye ma ho dam tshig bde brjod cing // kye ma ho bde ba blangs par bya// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste// dbang bskur ba'i thabs mchog go/ rdo rje slob
249a6(tsha): dpon bdag nyid che// rang gi khar ni rdo rje gzhag/ sems dpa' chen pos drang byas na// sems kyi byang chub bde ba 'thob// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// dbang bskur
249a7(tsha): ba yi bde ba'o// slob ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thams cad bsgrags mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba// yang nas yang du brtag par bya// 'di yis dbang ni
249b1(tsha): bskur ma thag/ slob ma tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dpa' bo'i// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzungs ma rnams kyis dag pa bdag/ sangs
249b2(tsha): rgyas rnams kyi rjes bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te// rang dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes dbang // slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya//
249b3(tsha): gzungs ma de yis bdag nyid la// bla ma nyid kyis byin brlabs te// dngos grub 'bras bu myur thob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyin par bya// dbang bskur shin tu smras pa yis//
249b4(tsha): rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin// blo ldan the tshom med bya'i phyir// rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no// de tshun chad ni slob ma la// rgyud kun las ni gang cung zad// yi ge tshul gyis
249b5(tsha): sbas pa rnams// gsang ba mchog ni bstan par bya// de nas de nyid las bya ste// slob dpon rkang par gtugs byas nas// rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa// thams cad
249b6(tsha): yon ni dbul bar bya// gzungs ma dgra ni thams cad la// ci dga' bar ni yon yang dbul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// yid la bsams pa'i yon yang
249b7(tsha): rung // dam tshig zla bas 'jigs pa yis// de dag thams cad dbul bar bya// slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par dbul bya ste// seng ge'i gdan la
250a1(tsha): nyid kyi ma// sangs rgyas phyir ni yon mchog yin// glang po rin chen gser dgra dang // sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te//
250a2(tsha): yon de mchog gi yon yin no// rin chen pad+ma chung ma dang // shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa// mu tig 'phreng ba shin tu mdzes// bu mo rIn chen
250a3(tsha): 'dra ba yis// brgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o// rgyal po yi ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyi gzhon pa sna tshogs rnams// glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan
250a4(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje// nun tan bla ma dbul bar bya// bla ma yon gyi phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje blo ldan slob ma yis// ci ste bde byed kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i
250a5(tsha): sems kyis bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis myur du 'thob 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur// chos rnams/
250a6(tsha): kun gyi dbang phyug rgya la// rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal// de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun gyi// pad+ma'i rigs su dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i
250a7(tsha): rigs kun bdag po ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang // rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gar// nyid dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas
250b1(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje che ba'i thabs gnas te//
250b2(tsha): mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yis sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas btab dbul
250b3(tsha): bar bya// lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya// 'dod pas rol pa'i ro myang ba'i// myangs na mchod pa thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun
250b4(tsha): gyi cho ga yis// rang rig khyad par shes bya ste// sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas nas// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas//
250b5(tsha): dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs// bde byed chen mo'i dkyil mo rgya// rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga//
250b6(tsha): lha rnams kyi ni re re yang // sems dpa' khyad par mchog mtha' yas// de sa hi na hu ma ha su hu/ ad dzu dze la ba b+ha'i so ka khu ma hA su hu kada? dzu pa sA ra'i ka ma lu ba ra na Na mA dzu bes
250b7(tsha): hi gu li sa ba ru dzu dzes hi sa dz+dza/ 'das pa'i dus na ma byung ba// mtha' yas chos ni yangs pa bstan// 'dod chags rnams kyis bkris pa yis// sdug bsngal gzir ba
251a1(tsha): mtha' yas dgrol// 'dod pa mchog gi longs spyod rnams// mos pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyad// kun tu chags pas mi 'gyur zhing // bde bas
251a2(tsha): longs pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// dmu bcas rnams dang sems kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi
251a3(tsha): babadag po kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu bzhad cing / spyan zur gyis gzigs pa' thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo krungs kyis dpal zhes bya ba'i
251a4(tsha): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ skyil mo krungs chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba/ rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
251a5(tsha): g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te// bdag nyid brla ni mi snang bar// rtsa ba'i skyil mo bcing bar bya// sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni//
251a6(tsha): gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gdan ni bde ba che// 'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad// skad cig gis ni smos ci dgos// rab tu
251a7(tsha): dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis// yang dag byang chub myur du 'thob// mi phyed pa ni thig ler bcas// 'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas//
251b1(tsha): byung ba'i tshe ni phaT ces bshad// pad+ma mi phyed 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa sbyar bar bya// mi phyed pa ni thig ler bcas// 'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/ shes rab can
251b2(tsha): gyis bskyod cing bzlas// byung ba'i tshe ni phaT ces bshad// pad+ma mi phyed 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa sbyar bar bya// mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan// tsheg drag bcas
251b3(tsha): pa bde 'byung na'o// bud med la ni zhag bdun du// 'di yis brtson pa byas pa na// nam mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong // rab dgyes
251b4(tsha): longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de// gzungs kyi pad+ma las byung ba// bde byed mchog gi dbang bskur ro// de nas rab dga' bde 'thob pa// sems
251b5(tsha): dpa' de ni dngos grub bo// thog ma dang ni tha med par// 'dod pa thams cad bde longs spyod// tshe dang dpal dang phun tshogs ldan// gdon dang dug dang 'tshe ba'i nad// mkha'
251b6(tsha): 'gros nye bar gces pa dang // sdig can 'khor ba las grol te// sa rnams kun las rnam par bsgyur// gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra// sna tshogs dra ba 'bar byed pas//
251b7(tsha): sna tshogs thams cad snang byed cing // de yis sems can thams cad kyi// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs pa 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis// ye shes lnga ni bsnyen par bya// rtsa
252a1(tsha): ba'i dkyil mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po las kyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu// de yi rkang pas
252a2(tsha): bcings byas te// sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang
252a3(tsha): gi lha yi sbyor brtson pas// bsgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang rung // sngags mkhan 'di yis dngos grub ste// sngags kyi sems 'dzan gtsang ba yi// zhag bdun sgom pa bsgoms
252a4(tsha): byas pa// yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// sbyor ba shin tu bsnyen byas na// gdon mi za bar rgyal po thob// yid bzhin dgongs pa thams
252a5(tsha): cad byed// rdo rje'i skyil mo'o// gzungs ma bzung ste bcing ba ni// rin po che ltar sbyar byas te// rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya// rin chen kun gyi skyil mo krung // 'di ni rin chen thams cad
252a6(tsha): kyis// dbul zhing 'phongs pa 'joms byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i dug kun gcod par byed// gdug pa thams t+yad rmongs byed de// dgra rnams
252a7(tsha): thams cad 'joms par byed// khro bo thams cad 'dzum byed de// gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs ma// mi g.yang zla ba gcig gis ni// 'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo//
252b1(tsha): yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// ji ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru// mchog tu rmad byung sgrub 'dod na// rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon
252b2(tsha): pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla phyed tsam gyis sgrub par bya// rin po che yi skyil mo'o// de bzhin rkang pa gnyis gzhag pa// pad+ma 'dra bar sbyar byas te// bdag
252b3(tsha): gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung // blo ldan pad+ma bde ba sgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang // mdor na sangs rgyas rnam dag dang // rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang // dbang du
252b4(tsha): 'gyur bar gdon mi za// bde ldan pho brang chen po yis// bde byed 'di yis thob par byed// sems can khams thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed// pad+ma/
252b5(tsha): skyil mo'o// de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te// sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyor ba bya// sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yis// sngags kyi yi ge shin tu brtson// bzlas pa byed
252b6(tsha): cing rnam sgom na// dngos grub rtag par thob par 'gyur// mi ga yeng sngon gyi gdug pa yi// las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed// sna tshogs dkyil du gnas pa yis//
252b7(tsha): bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi skyil mo'o// de nas mkha' 'gro'i skyil mo rgyas// thams cad khrag na 'phrog bya ste// gzungs ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis//
253a1(tsha): nyid kyi gnya' bar rkang pa gdeg/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro sbyor ba yis// bsnyen na khrag rnams 'phrog par byed// mnyam par gzhag nas gzungs ma yis//
253a2(tsha): rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du// sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas na// zas rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de// btung dang bza' dang bca' ba dang // gos kyi rgyan gyis
253a3(tsha): klubs pa yis// de ni zhig bdun nyid kyis kyang // thams cad las byed gdon mi za// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang po yis// dpal can mchog ni 'phrog par byed//
253a4(tsha): dbyigs ma sbreng pa'i tshul gyis ni// khams gsum rim pa brgal bar byed// mig ni 'tshums pas byed 'gyur ba// 'gro ba gsum po rnam par 'jig/ rus sbal bzhin /
253a5(tsha): du mnyam gzhag ste// mi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas na// gdug pa'i srog chags thams cad dang // dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod 'phrog/ sbal pa bzhin du mnyam gzhag
253a6(tsha): ste// dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya// ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed de// khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar byed// gtogs 'dod kyi ni mnyam gzhag ste//
253a7(tsha): sa gsum rnams ni rgyas gdab bya// gar dbang gis ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gar byed gzhug/ dril bu yi ni mnyam gzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni
253b1(tsha): dbab par bya// gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen thob par bya// skyil mo phyed ni mnyam gzhag nas// gnyis pa yis ni mnan byas na// khams
253b2(tsha): gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur cing // 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo// dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas// skyil mo rab tu dga' thob ste// dga' byed ma ni yid
253b3(tsha): 'ong ma/ khams gsum thams cad dngos grub po// rig 'dzan rnam pa gzhag bya ste// khams gsum skad cig gnon par bya// dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal
253b4(tsha): bAba'i// mdor sdus gzungs ma'i bcings pa yis// 'jig rten gsum du rnam rgyal te// skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par phran tshun 'brel ba
253b5(tsha): yis// dpung pa gnyis ni sku ma byas te// thams cad sgo ni 'degs pa yis// mche ba sbom po rab tu sbyar// g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni// gnon pa'i gnas
253b6(tsha): pas bsdigs byas te// mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yon gyi brkyang bskum sbyar ba yis// myur du gnas pas bteg bya zhing //
253b7(tsha): mtheb chung 'dod pa'i lcags kyu yis// mdzub mo lce la reg bya ste// sa bon tsheg drag d+hi ldan pa'i// thig le spyi bor brgyan byas pas// bdud rtsi'am rig ma drang bar bya//
254a1(tsha): lce yi thog mar spro bya ste// 'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam gzhag ste// kha yis phyogs su mche ba yis// sbom po
254a2(tsha): dudang 'dra byas te// khro bas mche bas sbyor ba yis// sor mo thod pa bzhin byas nus// khrag mang de ni 'thung bar bya// yi ge dang po oM dang ldan// spyi bor thig le ldan byas
254a3(tsha): 'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdug so// u 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya// 'di ni khros pa'i snying po ste// mchog tu thams cad lngas byed pa'o// gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa
254a4(tsha): kun// dbang dang rnam par byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang // tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig bzlums nas// rang gi
254a5(tsha): lus ni bskum byas te// bum pa lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yis// dgra rnams thams cad bsgral bar bya// nga ro dang por yang dag ldan// bdag nyid ngo bor thams cad bya//
254a6(tsha): sangs rgyas chen po bsgom byas te// zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro// de yis lus ni zhi bar 'gyur// 'di yis sems can thams cad kyi// tshwab gradon dang drug pa
254a7(tsha): sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro brtse ba dang // 'jigs byed thams cad bral bar byed// shes rab pha rol gyin mnyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du/
254b1(tsha): 'di yi thams cad nad kyi rnams// sdug bsngal dog pa 'phrog par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha' sa stengs las kyi rnams// snying khar rdo rje
254b2(tsha): sems gzhag ste// yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'grub// myur du rdo rje slob dpon la// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus pas zhe sar byas pa yis// shin tu
254b3(tsha): lhag par phyogs par bya// nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// sems dkrug par ni mi bya ste// ci ste shes rab 'chal bas byed// myur du na rag ltung bar 'gyur//
254b4(tsha): nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang // gdon dang tsha ba dug nyid kyis// slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa// gti mug chen po de 'chi'o// bla ma las ni dngos grub thob// bla
254b5(tsha): mas mtho ra sa blams bde// de bas nan tan thams cad kyi// bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
254b6(tsha): rdo rje'i bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po chen po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig
254b7(tsha): gi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa chen po zlagasang thig le
255a1(tsha): rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po las rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyis 'khor lo bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
255a2(tsha): gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mkha'
255a3(tsha): la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog gi dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po
255a4(tsha): brjod par gyur te/ k+She maho rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma ho kun tu bzang
255a5(tsha): po yis// dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che// gang bde phyir na rig ma yin// pad+ma la ni gnas par mdzad// kye ma ho rig pa shin tu zab// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde//
255a6(tsha): sems can kun la shes rab kyis// mun pa 'thib po sel bar mdzad// kye ma ho thams cad ngo mtshar che// mkha' 'gro thabs gar mdzad cing // rnam par mdzad
255a7(tsha): dang myang ba dang // mnye ba dang ni dbrog pa'i mchog/ kye ma ho shin tu rab tu dgyes// skal ldan skal la spyod pa dang // sna tshogs skal ldan bde byed che// sna tshogs
255b1(tsha): rdo rje shin tu mdzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa/ 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba
255b2(tsha): chen po la gnas pa la/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad dang mchog gi pha rol tu phyin ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi stan las bzhengs te/
255b3(tsha): shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po yis 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes
255b4(tsha): pa ra mdzad do// phra ba ru ma hA su hu pra i ki/ a pha Na sa a lu ta tha ka tu ma an b+hig tha lu ra mu kad ti bi ab pa nu ra ma nu dze ma ma nu/ phra sad tan tu re e a b+ha nu/
255b5(tsha): ma'i bde ba nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yi// sprul pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod mchog gi bde ston de// rjes su chags pa'i pad+mas bde ba kun khyab cing // chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu//
255b6(tsha): btang snyoms mdzad// kye ma ho 'di lha gzungs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan pa// byams pas phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di
255b7(tsha): rnams chos nyid rnam par dag/ dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi spyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod// de nas bcom
256a1(tsha): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas/ de dag thams cad la yud tsam yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje pad+ma gnyis su
256a2(tsha): med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung ba mnyam pa la bzhugs te/ dbugs mi rngub/ dbugs mi 'byin/
256a3(tsha): dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad/ kun tu mi gzigs/ kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ gshegs par yang mi mdzad/ gsung bar yang mi
256a4(tsha): mdzad rnam par rtog par yang mi mdzad bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen po yis/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i
256a5(tsha): bde ba rtsal de rgyas par mdzad nas/ der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs bcug bcing dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs
256a6(tsha): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po thams cad 'du bar mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba
256a7(tsha): chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang / gnyis su med par longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs
256b1(tsha): khar bzhugs te/ yang byang chub kyi sems chen po la yang dag thim par gyur pa/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'jug par byed pa dang / bstan pa la
256b2(tsha): gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la 'jug par byed pa yang med/ khros pa dang / gtum po dang / rngam pa chen po dang /
256b3(tsha): rab tu gdug pa chen por sems dpa' dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog
256b4(tsha): 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi bud med kyi chums pa dang / brdzun dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang //
256b5(tsha): nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang / gcig shu gcig gis za ba dang / thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma ho 'jig rten gsum
256b6(tsha): po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so// thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rdo rje'i smon lam chen
256b7(tsha): ponam mkha'i dbyings su kun tu 'jug pa'i yang dag par gnas pas/ 'di lta bur 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin
257a1(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba la yang dag par bzhugs pa/ kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
257a2(tsha): la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do// ho pra i pra bi a u tri bu ba na sog khu/ a la la ho/ ka ma la ka ru mun tsa hi badz+ra pa ru/ ma hA su hu dzi na sa ma ba ru a la
257a3(tsha): lA hophra mun tsA ta tha ga du/ da ha di ha sa ru pa yi sad pa sa ba bu hi/ sA rakra na d+ha b+hu ru/ a sa ma ga mu tri b+hu ba nu sa ru a la la ho/ su ra a ti b+hu mun tsa pa mun tsa ma ho/ tsa ya dzA na
257a4(tsha): tib ho/ ho rang bzhin dag pa'i pad+ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba// thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad pa// bskal pa'i mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i
257a5(tsha): byams pa'i gzugs kyis brjid pa dang // byang chub snying por 'gro ba'i chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus// a la la ho/ pad+ma'i 'byung gnas de ni bde gshegs kun gyis
257a6(tsha): skal ba mchog dang ldan// sdug bsngal kun sel ba'i thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs// dga' ba'i rol pa gar dang bcas pas bzhes shing dbang du mdzod// a la la
257a7(tsha): sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgrags pa yis gsang ba yi// 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'dir phyung ste// rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyis mi 'phrog
257b1(tsha): nam mkha' la// dngos med rol mo gzhan las 'phags pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol// a la la ho/ skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'di// mun pa thams cad bsal
257b2(tsha): ba'i phyir// gzhan la thugs brtser dgongs nas su// bying ba'i lha rnams bslad du gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa bskul bas na//
257b3(tsha): pad+ma dra ba rdo rje dang bde bar sbyor bas bzhes su gsol/ bde ba chen po bde gnas pa// gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs gyur to// rgyal ba
257b4(tsha): thams cad 'don par mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag par ldan pa'i bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i
257b5(tsha): dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas 'byam klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu gzigs nas/ ngo mtshar
257b6(tsha): du gyur te/ a ma ho khams gsum 'di stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar
257b7(tsha): gtses gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / nad dang / 'tsha ba dang / gdon chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yang dag
258a1(tsha): par thos zhes dgongs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po'i dpal
258a2(tsha): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsang dang / thugs rdo rje ma shes kyi bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang bad+ma las/ byang chub kyi sems
258a3(tsha): bar bsdu bar byas te/ nyid kyi klu dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // thog mar oM ni thig ler rabacas byas pa'o// rdo rje sems dpar bcangs
258a4(tsha): 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// mi byed 'dren pa gnyis dang yang dag ldanub ste// 'di ni ston pa'i mchog sa rdo rje'i rigs nyid do// byung nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du// gang
258a5(tsha): spobs snang byas te// slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas s+ho// yang smyo ba dang brngub byas nas par 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgyu ga
258a6(tsha): dang thugs rdo rje sems dpal myur nas/ shu kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rlabus su brgyugs pa 'gyur ba na/ b+hUdz+dza n+tu/ zhes pa 'drub chen pos bdad
258a7(tsha): ma tshun sems rgyam ma pan du dul tha rje/ ma ga 'as pa
258b1(tsha): rgyas pa che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa// phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa// dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa// kha dog rnam lnga gzi
258b2(tsha): brjid che// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje sgyu ma rab tu gnas// mkhas pa gang gi snying kha nyid// mnyam par gzhag ste 'dzin byas te// rdo rje pad+ma bde chen
258b3(tsha): gyi// rdo rje sems dpa' de myur thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkhar 'gro ba kun tu longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
258b4(tsha): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las/ mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zla gsang thig le nas/ nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa
258b5(tsha): thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // a yi gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig le ra bcas pa yis// 'og tu
258b6(tsha): gzi brjid yang dgra bcas// mthar ni traM te tsheg drag bcas// 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang //
258b7(tsha): sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang // 'od zer sprin phung brgyan byas te// slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur// de ni thugs khar zhugs nas kyang // lnga yis tshul gyis
259a1(tsha): bzhugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i spyan// chu skyes
259a2(tsha): bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi snying khar rin
259a3(tsha): chen 'dzin// brgyad gnyis phyag gi ngo bo yis// dri ma gsum spangs brgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur//
259a4(tsha): rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig pa// nad kyi slongs pa 'jig par mdzad// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gzi brjid chen po mdangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gdon
259a5(tsha): chen po/ sems can kun gyis 'phrog par byed// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang // nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du// nyid kyi snying khar 'di byas te// nor bu rin chen
259a6(tsha): bsgoms byas na// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // dngos grub nor mang sbyin mdzad de// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// kye ma ho bde bas dbang bskur bya//
259a7(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang gis dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge
259b1(tsha): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma chen mo kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal chen po zhes bya ba/ snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi
259b2(tsha): ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le las 'di phyung ngo // dang por oM dang ldan byas te// mi phyed rang rtags 'dren par bcas// tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te//
259b3(tsha): bsam pa thams cad yongs su skong // sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam gzhag ste// snying khar 'di ni sbyar byas nas// bdag ni 'dod chags zhes sems shing //
259b4(tsha): pad+ma sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mtshan gyi tha ma'i dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na// zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su// dbang phyug mos ni dngos grub thob// pad+ma/
259b5(tsha): che las byung nas kyang // thams cad du ni rgyas gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// pad+ma'i tshul gyis gnas par gyur// kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas//
259b6(tsha): sems dpa'i tshul gyi sprul pa yis// de nas 'dod chags bcas nas kyang // pad+ma'i dbus su bzhugs par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis// rgyab nas
259b7(tsha): rjes su mnyes mdzad cing // 'dzum bcas pad+ma phye ba yis// thugs kha'i dbus su yid tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin// phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma
260a1(tsha): bltams// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yis// zla chen bzhin du rnam grol ba// brjid pas gar ni
260a2(tsha): mdzad cing bzhugs// 'di yis pad+ma'i gnas nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// /
260a3(tsha): 'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyis// gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba kun tu bzang pos/
260a4(tsha): yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
260a5(tsha): mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po las 'di phyung ngo // sna tshogs chen po o chen po'i// steng du thig ler yang dag ldan// de yi dbus te lta 'og khro//
260a6(tsha): sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya// sna tshogs 'di ni thugs khar grags// sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas// de nyid
260a7(tsha): slar 'khor rab zhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzung mchog gnas// skad cig sems dpa' sku gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan// 'gying bcas
260b1(tsha): thugs khar sna tshogs 'dzin// sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong // phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs// mkha' byed sna tshogs mtshon cha dgod// zhal lnga sna
260b2(tsha): tshogs yangs che ba// bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gang bar mdzad nas byang du gnas// sna tshogs bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis//
260b3(tsha): thugs khar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas// sngags mkhan zhag bdun du ni bsgoms byas na// sna tshogs 'gyur de sna tshogs de la bab// sna tshogs las ni
260b4(tsha): sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te dbyangs chen po len cing /
260b5(tsha): dkyil 'khor chen po 'dabus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes par mdzad do// gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga yi ngo bo dge/ rgyal ba nyid kyis
260b6(tsha): bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun la bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags rigs phyag rgya'i yan lag bcas// lha yi de nyid pha rol phyin// bdag gis de nyid sna tshogs
260b7(tsha): che// sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// gzungs kyi pad+ma yang dag ldan// 'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i
261a1(tsha): ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi de ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa// yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me long
261a2(tsha): ye shes yang dag 'byung // bya ba nan tan sems can don// rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod// de nyid rig pas sems can kun// rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pas//
261a3(tsha): gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ sangs rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po gnyis su med pa'i
261a4(tsha): mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob pa'i yi 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
261a5(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM b+hu stong pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra tsat+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra kA ya oM/ oM badz+ra bAk+ka aM/ oM badz+ra a bi shiny+tsa tra/ oM
261a6(tsha): badz+ra sa ma ya ho/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad shin tu mgu rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol
261a7(tsha): to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen pos/ de bzhin
261b1(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o// bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do// dge'o dge'o rgyal ba kun// dge'o dge'o legs pa'i las// dge'o dge'o
261b2(tsha): sngun 'gro ba// nyid kyi snying khar drang byas te// rang gis gsang ba bshad par mdzod// gang gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur//
261b3(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid ye shes rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pas/ rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ oM
261b4(tsha): sarba ta thA ga to/ ma hA shu n+ya ta dz+nyA na/ badz+ra swa b+hA wa ad ma ko&ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das me long ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku
261b5(tsha): drang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a d+ha ra sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das so so kun tu gzigs pa'i
261b6(tsha): ye shes rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pra ta be k+Sha dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+ha
261b7(tsha): wa at+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
262a1(tsha): las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin
262a2(tsha): gshegs pas/ rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kri ta a nuSh+TA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&ha/ de nas
262a3(tsha): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dgegos pa'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de/ oM dge'o dge'o stong pa che// oM dge'o dge'o thugs chen po// oM dge'o dge'o/
262a4(tsha): sku chen po// oM dge'o dge'o gsung chen po// oM dge'o dge'o rin po che// oM dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
262a5(tsha): pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yis// dga' byed
262a6(tsha): bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor tu thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba// rgyal ba'i bdag pos
262a7(tsha): gsang bar gsungs// bdag gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
262b1(tsha): zhes bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba bcom ldan 'das nyid gsungs// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor snying po
262b2(tsha): zhes bgyi ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par// gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil
262b3(tsha): 'khor rab dgyes thob byed pa// tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi
262b4(tsha): dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid
262b5(tsha): sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gzugs dang la nga tshos brgyan pa yi// bu mo mig yang gzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byin rlabs 'brus//
262b6(tsha): mnyam par gzhag ste byin brlabs nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo gzhag/ gnyis pa mdun du gzhag bya ba// brtson
262b7(tsha): 'grus pha rol phyin ma'i gnas// rdo rje sems kyi btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin// gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid
263a1(tsha): gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che// dbang bskur yon tan thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag
263a2(tsha): gnas// rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste// de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no// bzod pa chen mo byang du ste// bsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za//
263a3(tsha): dam tshig gnas kyi skyong byed ma'o// grA dag ni thams cad du// snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sgo srungs rnams ni rnam pa bzhi/
263a4(tsha): ci 'dod par ni mchod byas te// slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya// phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyi ni rnam
263a5(tsha): par klubs// spro ba che bas gar bya zhing // lha mi 'gying ba 'dud pa yis// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis// g.yogs te lag
263a6(tsha): pas bzung nas kyang // sgo yi grwar yang gzhag byas te// smon lam mchog ni sma ru gzhug/ rdo rje chen mo bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rab dgyes
263a7(tsha): gnas las byung ba yi// bde byed chen pos mnyes par bgyi// ji lta bzhin du mnyam nyid thob// me tog 'phreng ba dor byas te// lha mo chen mo bzhengs su gsol// khyod kyi
263b1(tsha): dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo// lha mo gang la ltung ba yis// de yis lag nas bskor bar bya// lha mo 'di ni khyod dang 'thun// sems che khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis// de nas
263b2(tsha): slob ma de yis ni// bdag ni rab dgyes smra bya zhing // de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyis mi phyed phan// mthar na ho yis sbyar bar bya// 'byung ba'i dus su
263b3(tsha): bya ba ni/ a ho su khA bde zhes smra// de nas rdo rje phyung ba yis// mkhas pas de ni blang byas nas// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub rdzas// bla ma la ni dang po dbul// de nas
263b4(tsha): de nyid kun la yang // ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya// spyi bos zhabs la btugs byas te// bla ma las ni dbang blang bya// shin tu spras pa 'phags pa'i dbang // bcom ldan
263b5(tsha): bdag la brtsal bar mdzod// de nas sbyor ba chen po yi// snyoms par zhugs te de'i bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te// spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya// lag pa
263b6(tsha): yis ni ma reg par// kha la rab tu sbyin par bya// khyad par du ni drang byas te// ci bde bar ni btung bar bya// gzungs ma de dag thams cad la// rdo rje yis ni sbyin par
263b7(tsha): bya// de nas slob ma'i mchog nyid kyis// bla ma la ni yon dbul ba// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma dang ni rang gi bu// bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang // de bzhin
264a1(tsha): longs spyod dbang phyug dang // rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang // glang po rta dang shing rta brtseg/ bla ma yi ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid gyur
