264a2(tsha): dbul bar bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di// ci ste rmongs pas smras byas na// slob dpon
264a3(tsha): gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myur du zla ba phyed tshun chad// brtan pas rnam par 'jigs par 'gyur// dang por dam tshig gzhag bya ste// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan par
264a4(tsha): bya// gzhan du byas na dpa' bo rnams// dmyal bar bskal pa grangs med skye// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya// sngags kyi dngos grub don
264a5(tsha): 'dod pas// dam tshig bsrung la brtson par bya// gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi// sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub// lha rnams kyi ni dam tshig gi/ gsol byang
264a6(tsha): bzhes su mi snang ste// 'jig rten 'dir ni sdug bsngal che// 'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba rnams// dam tshig spyod pa 'das pa'o// rmongs pa bdag nyid de 'thob bo//
264a7(tsha): slob ma de yang de bzhin du// blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te// de ni sngags kyi don min byed// lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde// dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la// nams
264b1(tsha): kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// de bas dam tshig gtso yin te// thog mar byas nas sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang // de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams//
264b2(tsha): dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang // sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis// dmyal ba ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir// bu dang slob ma sbyin par// sngags kyi dngos grub bsod/
264b3(tsha): nams byed// gtsang sbra dogs pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dam// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bris byas te// gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lon//
264b4(tsha): dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du// gzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya// dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te// sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i ro tshan dang // rdo rje
264b5(tsha): las byung chu sgrub rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/ dam tshig yi ge gzhag pa yis// myur du dam tshig sgrub byas na// dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub
264b6(tsha): ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru 'gyur// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang // rdo rje sems
264b7(tsha): dpa' bdag po cher// blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yi// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi thob 'gyur te// dbang bskur ba'i yid du 'gyur//
265a1(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya bya/ mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o//
265a2(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po'i yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// gdug
265a3(tsha): pa thams cad rnams gdul ba// 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di// rdo rje khro bo chen po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam bshad phyir// 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul
265a4(tsha): dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyis// khro bo dam tshig ded dpon gyis// gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems
265a5(tsha): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i
265a6(tsha): ye shes las 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA na ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
265a7(tsha): khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
265b1(tsha): chen pa dang / gnad sbyin dang / srin po rnams thams cad 'khrug pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thang du lhags so// @
265b2(tsha): byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas/ tshangs pa'i thad du phyin no// tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gam du phyin no// gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen
265b3(tsha): po'i gam du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen pos bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul
265b4(tsha): gyis kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs shig/ gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig
265b5(tsha): dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga yi rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bus/ gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu rdzi nus
265b6(tsha): sam/ khyed rnams ci dga' bar spyod pas gnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
265b7(tsha): cad kyi gzi brjid chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba/ khro bo chen
266a1(tsha): po'i snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku Ti/ ma hA kro d+hA han ha nA/ g+h+rib+da g+h+rih+na/ ma ra mra
266a2(tsha): ra/ ban dza ban dza/ da ha da hA/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM b+hI hUM b+d+hi/ b+h+yA ma ya b+hU ma ya/ b+h+r-i gu du na sarba ma ra nAM/ sarba duSh+TA na/ ma tha ma ta/ mo ta mo Ta/ hU~MSh+ming / N+yai dan+yA da/ b+hI
266a3(tsha): Tang hUM/ Tang zang Ta Ta/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas/ dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi
266a4(tsha): che ba nye bar ston cing / gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyod kyang mthu che ba'i chen po ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin na/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye
266a5(tsha): bar snyan pa sa/ gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/ de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthus/ 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo nag po chen
266a6(tsha): por bsgyur nas/ rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bu drag pa 'byin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang
266a7(tsha): po ya / khro bo chen po pad+ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ pad+ma'i brabs 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar
266b1(tsha): log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar zhugs so// zhugs nas khro ba chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis rlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung
266b2(tsha): dang thugs rdo rje'i thugs kha nas phyung ngo // oM pad+ma dz+wa la ya ma hA kro d+ha/ b+ha d+ha ba yu kha/ kha kha sarba duSh+TaM kha hi kha hi/ sarba duSh+Ta nam/ pra du duShA na ma/ dam dam/
266b3(tsha): badz+ra dang d+d+hod ka ta/ ma tha ma tha/ k+Sho dak+Sho badz+ra khA ra/ tsa pa la ru ra ga beg/ tra sa tras/ ma hA badz+ra ba da bu ka/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ hU phaT d+hi/ ha ha hi hi/ tsa tu ra muH
266b4(tsha): b+hi phran shaM na hUM hri/ hUM hUM/ hu hi haH/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ tshangs ris chen po lhar phaT phaT cing kha bub tu 'gyel to// brdeg 'chos so// de nas tshangs pa
266b5(tsha): ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar du snang ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul pa/ khyod ni sems can kun
266b6(tsha): gyi gtso bo g+ha/ lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod na 'jig rten gsum mthong bar byed pa po/ rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir khyod kyi gdug pa'i sems
266b7(tsha): can dang / gdug pa'i lus thams cad brlag par gyis/ de nas tshangs pa rang nyid kyi mthus/ tshangs pa chen po srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/
267a1(tsha): 'jigs byed chen po lta bu gdong bzhi pa/ me lce stong gis gzi brjid can gyi lus mgu ba dang bcas pa/ bdag pa chen 'byin pas/ lha'i tshogs
267a2(tsha): kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang / lha thams cad rab tu gzhom pa zhes
267a3(tsha): bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje rin po che'i 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
267a4(tsha): thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi snying kha nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+hai ra bA ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya ba ga k+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra yak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de nas 'di phyung ma
267a5(tsha): thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par zhig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yab char 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas gnas par gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang
267a6(tsha): bcas pa yang kha bub tu 'gyel te/ de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul pa/ khyod ni lha yis tshogs thams cad kyi
267a7(tsha): bdag po ste/ chen po mthu che ba yin la/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang / khyod la mnyes pa byed pa yin na/ de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdza
267b1(tsha): 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig/ de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthus gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gzugs su nye bar ston cing / gdug pa'i
267b2(tsha): tshogs thams cad la/ gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig/ nga yi rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu mthong na/ sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so// zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do//
267b3(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang / sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lha de thams cad kyi ska
267b4(tsha): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes la 'jug par mdzad de/ bcug nas kyang / khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas/ bdag nyid kyang wa
267b5(tsha): po thams cad 'byin pa'i gzugs su dmigs te/ mche ba chen po 'khyil pa/ zhal mi sdug pa spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can/ rab tu zad par byed
267b6(tsha): pa'i me rlung gis brngas pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po dpal can gyi phyag cha/ ma'i kang rus dang / khrag dang / sha dang / klad pa dang / rkang dang / tshil
267b7(tsha): rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i pags pas gnam g.yogs te/ bsdams pa'i mi mgo'i 'phreng ba dbu la 'dzan pa/ seng ge dang / glang po che dang / bong bu
268a1(tsha): dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / lce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byil dang / gzig dang /
268a2(tsha): stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis/ shar phyogs na 'jig byed chen po 'artul
268a3(tsha): ba rnam par mnyes pa 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar/
268a4(tsha): phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho'i dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje khro gnyer can chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang bcas pa 'khyil pa
268a5(tsha): gyur te gnas so// nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yang pad+ma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil du gnas so// byang gi dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje
268a6(tsha): bur 'ur chen po khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po yang / khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya
268a7(tsha): stong mang pos bskor nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/ khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po kun tu spyod cing / zla lo
268b1(tsha): chen po'i rnam pa brgya stong mang po ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed byung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
268b2(tsha): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so// de nas gdug pa'i tshogs kyis de mthong nas/ 'jigs dngangs skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thad
268b3(tsha): du dong ste/ rje cig rje cig nyid kyis bdag cag la skyobs shig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag/ bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas/ ma 'jigs
268b4(tsha): shig ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos// khro bo'i tshogs rnams ku
268b5(tsha): la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rad na tra yA yA/ na ma tsaN+Da badz+ra pA na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bo bo ma hA be ra ra ba na/ d+ha ra pa pa ha ri/ ha ra ha ra/ g+hIts+tsha
268b6(tsha): g+h+rid+d+ha/ mA ra ma ra/ b+han dza b+ha nA dza/ shi g+hA na ma hA badz+ra tsar+t+ta sarba duSh+Ta na ta ka/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ta ma ta/ hUM phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu
268b7(tsha): 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pas/ rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do// khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par gnyer ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te/ 'khyil
269a1(tsha): cing bsgyur ba/ phyag brgya stong mang pos mtshon cha sna tshogs pa rnam pa/ zhal sna tshogs brgya stong pa/ me lce bzhin rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong
269a2(tsha): rnams 'jigs byed chen po gang na bar der song ste/ rdo rje drag po yid gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhad cing bdun du gnas so// oM ma hA badz+ra a Ta ha sa ha sa/ hA hA
269a3(tsha): hA hA s+t+waM ha a hi/ de nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po'i bzhad pa chen po de thos nas/ g.yog dang bcas pa kha bub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur nas/ slar yang bslang
269a4(tsha): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su bskor du bcug nas/ 'jigs byed gdug pa/ nga la skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang / skyabs su 'gro ba khas mi len cing //
269a5(tsha): slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas/ ri rab tsam gyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing bgrad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin
269a6(tsha): par byed do// oM ma hA b+hai re ba b+heshrIng krIng / TA TA/ TAng DAng / ha ha/ i hi/ 'on kyang ba spu'i rtse mo cung zad tsam yang ma 'gul te/ de nas yang 'jigs byed
269a7(tsha): chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des/ he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin mgo bor lhas mnan nas bsnun te/ rdo rje he ru ka'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos/ 'jigs byed chen po'i nga
269b1(tsha): ros 'byin cing / sgyu ma'i sbu gu drangs nas/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston pa mdzad de/ u ma dag g+ha g+ha
269b2(tsha): yang rnam par bcom/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas/ khro bo'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen po nye bar spel zhing / 'khor thams cad kyang btul
269b3(tsha): skyabs khas len du yang bcug/ dam tshig la yang gnas par byas te/ yang dag par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po
269b4(tsha): khro bo chen po drag po bzhad par bzhad cing / rdo rje khro gnyer chen pos 'gro la zhabs kyis bsnun te bstod par mdzad do// oM badz+ra b+h+ri gu Ti/ ha na ha na/ g+hina? g+ni na hUM/ ma
269b5(tsha): TA ma Ta/ kin tsI ra ya si/ suR+ya ma hA sa pra ti re ka su rA dza la la ra tsat+pa pra dzA li ta ma hA mur ti/ a grad ta a gad d+ha/ a b+hi wa b+hi bkri ta san/ tsakra be ra ba ya/
269b6(tsha): d+hi d+ha yan hUM b+hI/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po bzhad pas bzhad cing / 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor lo can gyi mdun du
269b7(tsha): ston to// de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyen te/ kha bub tu 'gyel nas/ rab tu brgyal zhing / rje cig bdag skyobs shig ces smra zhing / rgyas
270a1(tsha): med par bdag nyid mthong nas 'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo // de na byi sdus kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po ri rab tu nye bar ston cing / shin tu
270a2(tsha): dgyes pa chen po'i mdun gnas te/ rgyal ba la zhus so// kA ya kA ye/ gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyi snying dral te/ ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar de srid rang gi gnas
270a3(tsha): su song zhig/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po de rab tu 'khrugs/ gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma khro gnyer chen po/
270a4(tsha): gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad do// oM badz+ra sur+ya b+h+ri ku ti kro d+ha ma hA tad pa ta ra pA/ s+ya su d+hi ra mangs/ m+mad d+ha ma tse na/ oM b+hA b+h+ra b+hId+d+ha
270a5(tsha): b+ha/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlag par gyur te gnas so// de yi chung ma rug mig ni dang / ma hA shrI dang / lag mi ni yang g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa'i
270a6(tsha): bcom ste/ tshogs rnams rnam par brtul nas bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rta'i gdong chen po khro bo chen po'i rgyab tu gcig
270a7(tsha): bsnun nas/ mthong bar mdzad do// oM badz+ra ba da ba mu ka/ kha khA/ kha hi kha hI/ tsa tu ra mu kham/ pi ba pi ba/ a s+ya ru d+hi ra ma/ a kad d+ye kad da/ hrid yan tran
270b1(tsha): tam/ he badz+ra ba ta ba mu kha hi/ nyi sha hI shra mahA shwe shA ra hi hI/ de nas rdo rje gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas
270b2(tsha): tshangs pa'i 'khor kha bub tu 'gyel nas/ rje cig skyobs shig skyobs shig ces par smras so// de nas tshangs pa de tshangs pa'i srin po'i bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas
270b3(tsha): rgyal bar byed de/ kA ye kA ye gdug pa'i gdong myur du song song / khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma brtul re zhes smras so// de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po khros pa chen po rab tu 'khrugs/
270b4(tsha): gtum por gyur nas tshangs pa de yis mgor brdzis nas/ 'di'i snying dral nas khrag 'thung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa rnams myangs
270b5(tsha): nas/ phyogs bcur gtor to// de'i chung ma shrI dang / sa ra swa ti dang / shan tu rnams kyang rnam par bcom/ de'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyang rnam par brtul nas/
270b6(tsha): dam tshig sdom pa la gnas par byas te bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po/ khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pas lha
270b7(tsha): bas gzigs te/ mthong bar mdzad do// oM gu lu gu lu/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ a kar sha ya a kar sha ya/ sha kra hi da yaM/ ma hA badz+ra dang shwA ya/ hU b+ha ga k+Sha b+ha ga k+Sha ya/
271a1(tsha): kli shang hUM/ rdo rje gnod sbyin chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste/ brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas brgya byin 'gying ba chen
271a2(tsha): pos bgyings te/ mi bzad par khros pa'i gnod sbyin khyod su'i bran yin/ zhes de la smras so// zhes nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros/ 'khrugs/ rngam par gyur te/
271a3(tsha): snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyung / snying kha yang dral te/ de'i khrag dang / sha dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa bza' ba rnams za ba la zhugs so// de nas de'i
271a4(tsha): 'khor rnams 'jigs shing spangs pa'i yid du gyur te/ skyabs su nye bar dong ngo // de'i lha mo'i tshogs kyang rnam pa bcom nas/ de yi gnas la gnas par gyur to//
271a5(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pa chen po/ rnal 'byor ma rnams dang rol cing / rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor
271a6(tsha): chen po na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du bar mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul ba mdzad do// oM ma hA ru ra ta badz+ra mahA
271a7(tsha): kro d+ha/ pa sang ha ro la sang ha ras mgro dam sha ma sha ma/ pra shas pra sham sa sa gro d+ho/ yul po rno/ swa sa ma ye/ ma hA mam N+Da le/ s+tha pa ya swa pa ya/ sam duSh+Ta/ rba duH
271b1(tsha): kro d+ham/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ shA kra b+hat+mab+hI pU ra ma he shwa ra ma ho/ b+ha ga ban su ra ta/ sau kya khro d+ha sarba ta thA ga ta/ sad t+ye na ma me tsa ho/ su ra ta sa ma ya id ti/
271b2(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen pos/ khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku
271b3(tsha): dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM dza hUM baM ho/ rbak+ki hUMdz+dza/ TakrI pUdz+dzA/ d+hu ta ki hUM/ ta ke hUM/ oM ta ki hUM dza/ a kar sha/ pra pe sha ya/ b+han d+ha ya na
271b4(tsha): ban+d+ha/ sarba krad+hA/ sa rba ya/ dza ba ho/ dz+ra dzA/ mu~M ti ka ts+tsha/ de nas khro mo chen po dmachog de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'am
271b5(tsha): 'khyil bar gyur te// kye mA bcom ldan nyid kyis bka' sbrul du gsol/ zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi
271b6(tsha): bka'i 'khor lo rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo khro bo chen po phyung ngo // oM suM b+ha ni su b+ha ni ma hA krod+ha
271b7(tsha): sha hUM phaT/ de nas de dag la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to// de dag gis bcom
272a1(tsha): ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa rnams gso bur gsol zhes gsol nas/ de dag cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo
272a2(tsha): shin tu dgyes pa/ khro bos phyag bsnol te btsir nas/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i khro ma'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma ha kro d+hi shwo ri/ ud srid dzA sri dzA badz+ra a mr-i te hU
272a3(tsha): a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bdud rtsi chen mo de kun tu khros te/ smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ ru lu ru lu zhes 'byin cing / rang gi pad+ma la bcom
272a4(tsha): ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas/ bdud rtsi yang dag par sgrub pa'i rig ma phyung ngo // oM a mr-i ta sa tsi ba ni ma hA da ta su me khe pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sarban badz+ra pad+ma nas
272a5(tsha): ma yo gi nyir ma hA bo d+hi tsAt+ta/ bi ta pi ta mur ti a/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te
272a6(tsha): sems dran nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas/ ngo mtshar bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs su
272a7(tsha): dong nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin/ khro bo'i 'khor lo rnams gnas par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
272b1(tsha): la bstod par byed do// khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab// phan byed de bzhin yum yin te// gtso bo 'dus pa bdag cag rnams// 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste// rje bo sdug
272b2(tsha): bsngal thams cad sel// khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po che// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang mthong // che ba che khyed skye bo skyong // thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs// nga ro'i steng ni
272b3(tsha): cha yang med// gtso bo dpag ma da bdud rtsi yis// rab dgyes bde byed mthong ba yi// 'gro la phan pa mdzad pa'i phyir// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams// rab dgyes
272b4(tsha): grol ba bde ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis mthong bar mdzod// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing // bla na med pa'i byang chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad
272b5(tsha): phyir// sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'khor ba rba klong grol mdzad de// myur du bde ba 'god par mdzad// dngos po kun gyi thams cad du// rgyal ba kun
272b6(tsha): gyis mi dpogs te// zhi ba'i rnam pa zhir gyur pa// rdul dang bral ba 'dzums pa spangs// nam mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te//
272b7(tsha): sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun las rgyab phyogs pa// gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dregs pa med pa 'jigs med la// byang chub mchog ni thob
273a1(tsha): pa'i bar// bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi// ji srid 'tsho ba mchis pa dang // dmyal ba rtsub pa'i 'jig rten du// ltung bar gyur pa de ji srid//
273a2(tsha): khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang // dri med skal bar 'gyur ba'i gtso// rdo rje 'dzin pas bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bde ba chen po
273a3(tsha): rtsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos/ de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi
273a4(tsha): bde ba'i gnas shes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang /
273a5(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du
273a6(tsha): gtugs nas bskor ba byas te ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa de bzhin gshegs
273a7(tsha): pas/ yang rdo rje gzungs ma shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po'i dam tshig dang sbyor ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar bzhugs
273b1(tsha): nas de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo'i dbang mo chen po zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta
273b2(tsha): ma hA badz+ra kro d+hi shwa rI sarba dus ta su dra ni ma hA pra la ya na la/ smA sha ni bi sha ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha dang / sh+tsa ka ra bi la kri ta ba spa ne sarba sha dru/ pa sha ma ni hUM hU/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri
273b3(tsha): hUM phaT/ 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug pa la/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pasnams pa/ zhal
273b4(tsha): gsum pa/ mdog in+d+ra ni la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod pa'i mkhar ba dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum
273b5(tsha): pa dang be con dang / mu su la dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / tha ma ra dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / sha ka ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i
273b6(tsha): 'phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang me 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa/ rig pa 'dis
273b7(tsha): gzhag par bya'o// oM badz+ra ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA smA sha ne byi sha nau ni la dz+wa la ma hA sa sra pa dza li ta/ mu ra ti da re ka pa ha la ma la bu shi ta ma kusta na ra ru di ra ra tra/
274a1(tsha): pa tsi pu ri tag pa la a sa te/ kha D+ga ga badz+ra ti shu la gan d+ha/ ma 'gro na/ hUM hru h+ma/ hU hU hU/ he he run ta mun ta pra be hU phaT/ de nas
274a2(tsha): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po gzi brjid chen po mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi ma khro ma'i dbang chen mo
274a3(tsha): 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ma hA su r+ya badz+ra kro b+hi shwa ri pi/ d+ha ma d+ham/ ma tam ta/ gra sa gras/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta haM hUM phaT/ o hU r+thang
274a4(tsha): du/ rmyab / za mtshan ma 'dis sgo phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par byas/ gzi brjid chen po rang ma tho na // shinaH'a
274a5(tsha): pa me bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba che// dbu rgyun thod pas brtsegs par byas// spyan ni rab 'bar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par brtson//
274a6(tsha): gdug pa thams cad 'phya byed cing // yi dgas chen po'i stan+da la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i 'byung gnas
274a7(tsha): bkod pa'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
274b1(tsha): las phyung ngo // oM hri badz+ra pad+ma hA ba Ta ba mu khe/ kha khA/ kha hi kha hi/ ma hA ma ho da ra bi kro pe hU hi/ hUM hU/ ha ha/ hUM hUM/ hri hi sha ma badz+ra ba da na la ma ha d+h+ya te hUM hU/ hi hi/
274b2(tsha): hUM hU hi hu/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// 'di yis rgyab tu gzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro mo chen mo dbu bcu drug/
274b3(tsha): rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi gdug gdong // mi ro'i stan la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa dbu rgyan thod pa rtse ga
274b4(tsha): 'od zer bsngon po 'thor byed cing // g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan de gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes kyi khrom
274b5(tsha): gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma chen po zhes bya ba khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di/
274b6(tsha): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarbA a mo g+ha ma hA be she shA ri/ hUM hU hU ha ha ha/ ma hA kro d+ha gra mu khe/ ma hA bI sha ru pa d+ha ri ni sarba duSh+Ta ma?/
274b7(tsha): sha ma ni hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du// g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig gzhag bya ste// sna tshogs
275a1(tsha): gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas// gnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong // rab tu drag por ro myang zhing //
275a2(tsha): gdong snyer thod pas rtse mor byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gdong gsum ma// za byed me bzhin blta ba yis// de yi ngo bo thams cad kyi/
275a3(tsha): g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag/ de las rdo rje mchog nyid bskyed// 'dud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// gzhug pa dang ni
275a4(tsha): 'dren pa mchog/ 'dri yis thams cad dngos grub pas// rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// drangs te bkugs nas bcing byas te// dbang du byas nas bsgrub par
275a5(tsha): byade nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' bo bskyod nas rang gis rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos rang gi rgyal srod rjes su sbyang zhing dzA
275a6(tsha): rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis tshul chen po// dga' byed zla gsang thig le yis// rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di// sems dpa' chen po
275a7(tsha): khyod kyis zung // de nas gdan la myur bzhengs te// thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhengs nas// chos kyis ngo bo'i tshig smras pa// bde ba chen po bdag gis blang // rab
275b1(tsha): bde longs spyod gar byas te// rdo rje che yis 'di skad smras// rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs pad+mo gar rab byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// rab dgyes longs spyod gar
275b2(tsha): byed cing // bde byed chen po bdag nyid rje// legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de// legs so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so legs so sna
275b3(tsha): tshogs che// legs so legs so dgyes pa che// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag
275b4(tsha): mngon par dga' bar gyur to// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// // gsung rab don
275b5(tsha): ston slob dpon gyis// lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la// ci rigs bskur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems bde thob par smon// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sam
275b6(tsha): b+ha wa dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o// / phyis kha che'i paN+Di ta te dza de ba'i zhal snga nas dang / lots+tsha ba 'phags
275b7(tsha): pa'i shes rab kyi skad gsar bcad kyis kyang gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ gu h+ya san+d+hi/
276a1(tsha): shrI a shwod tal la te sa ma tan tra/ nA tra/ nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal
276a2(tsha): rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal
276a3(tsha): rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas/ sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du
276a4(tsha): gyur pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa/ bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun por brtsegs shing / yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs
276a5(tsha): rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo/ zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi chos ma lus pa'i mthar phyin pa/ kun tu 'phrin las/
276a6(tsha): rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid/ dpal bde chen pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa la/ med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang sgyur
276a7(tsha): ba de nyid/ lha thams cad kyi 'du ba'i gnas gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa/ 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'bar ba'i
276b1(tsha): khang bzangs/ 'dod pa'i yon tan dang / gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang / sgyu snyan pa sna tshogs dang / dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang / ro bro ba sna tshogs dang / reg bya
276b2(tsha): 'jam pa sna tshogs dang / chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa/ rtse mo mtho zhing mtshams kyis rnam par phyes pa/ sgo bzhi sgo
276b3(tsha): khang dang bcas pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug
276b4(tsha): cho 'phrul bkod pa dang / rnam par gzigs dang / mi bskyod rdo rje dang / mngon par snang ba dang / brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang / 'brug sgra dang / dri ma med pa
276b5(tsha): dang / rin chen phung po dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / dkon mchog rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen tog dang / 'od zer snang ba dang / tshe mtha' yas dang / chos kyi
276b6(tsha): dbang phyug dang / chags pa med pa'i 'od dang / dga' ba'i spyan dang / don thams cad yod pa dang / brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul pa dang
276b7(tsha): gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang / sna tshogs dbang phyug go/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang / rgya mtsho sgra dbyangs dang
277a1(tsha): gzi brjid bkod pa dang / 'khor ma rnon po dang / shes rab snang ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / drag shul can
277a2(tsha): dang / dri ma sel ba dang / sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa dang / rin chen rgyal po dang / dra ba can dang / lag bzang dang / gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snye ma dang /
277a3(tsha): chos kyi mtho ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / mun pa sel ba dang / dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon nu rin chen dang / rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / gar mkhan
277a4(tsha): dang / klu'i rgya mtsho dang / thogs med bkod pa dang / pad+mo dga' ba dang / sa la'i dbang phyug dang / rin chen spungs pa dang / sprin gyi 'phreng ba dang / yid
277a5(tsha): 'ong me tog dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo bsgyur ba dang / dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i blo gros dang / las 'byed
277a6(tsha): pa'i stobs dang / snying po blo gros rnams so// de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo dang 'khyil pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// gzhan yang pad+ma 'phro ba dang /
277a7(tsha): pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma sgrog pa dang / pad+ma skyod pa dang / pad+ma tshim byed dang / pad+ma 'thor ba dang / pad+ma snang ba dang / pad+ma dag byed rnams kyang rang rang gi
277b1(tsha): 'phrin lngas kyis 'khod do// gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug dang / brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang / rnam par sgrol ba'i dbang phyug dang /
277b2(tsha): grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang / smra ba'i dbang phyug dang / spyod pa'i dbang phyug dang / mthun pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyang rang rang gi rig ma
277b3(tsha): dang bcas pas 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa snang ba dang / 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
277b4(tsha): dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/ pad+ma chags pa'i
277b5(tsha): spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs kha'i dpal gyi be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas/ 'od zer gyi rgyal po gzhan gyi dkyil
277b6(tsha): 'khor gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba bkye'o// des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang / ya mtshan gyi lhas chen po bco brgyad
277b7(tsha): byung bar gyur to// des snod dang bcud du bcas pa gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs
278a1(tsha): bskul te/ de dag gis kyang rlung nyid kyi cho 'phrul rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgya che ba rang gi 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu yang spro bar mdzad
278a2(tsha): do// des kyang zhing khams rnam par sbyong zhing slar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so// de ltar mdzad pa rgya chen po'i rnam par
278a3(tsha): 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las/ 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to// de'i dus na mthun
278a4(tsha): par gleng ba ni// kye ma'o ya mtshan sna tshogs chos// rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ngo mtshar che// cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi// dgongs pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// rgyu rkyen med par
278a5(tsha): sangs rgyas ni// gsang gsum dam tshig spro mi mdzad// de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba// gsang ba'i bdag pos bskul bar mdzod// khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras// dgongs
278a6(tsha): don rgya mtsho'i don mnga' bas// bka' yi bdag pos dgongs mdzad dag/ legs par zhus shing gsol gdab mdzod// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag
278a7(tsha): na rdo rje lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang / rang nyid kyi snang ba'i sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun ngos nas langs te/ phyogs gcig tu
278b1(tsha): 'khod nas/ mchod pa'i tshogs rgya mtsho chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing rtse gcig tu gus par phyag 'tshal nas/
278b2(tsha): dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa/ e ma'o rgyal ba kun gyi sku// rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor dag/ ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung // dga'
278b3(tsha): mdzad dkyil 'khor 'dus pa dang // byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis// nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing // thugs rje chen po'i ye shes kyis// 'tshogs
278b4(tsha): pa'i 'bras bu legs sbyin mdzad// sku madrangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas// gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol// khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'// zab
278b5(tsha): cing bral rgya che bas// 'khor rnams the tshom ri bos gnon// thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod// 'di dag thams cad bstan pa'i snod// mgon po btang snyoms lhur
278b6(tsha): ma mdzad// dus 'dir rtsol ba don chen te// smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid
278b7(tsha): kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad la thugs mnyam pa nyid du rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs mo rnam par gzigs
279a1(tsha): so// kun tu gzigs so// de ltar dgongs nas/ dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bas ma las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par spros shing de
279a2(tsha): nyid kyis dngos po dang bral bar gzigs na/ gzigs pa'i mtha' dang / dgongs pa'i mtha'/ mdzad pa'i mtha' kun las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
279a3(tsha): bzhugs te/ bkod pa dang / rnam par bkod pa dang / bshad pa dang / rnam par bshad pa dang / dgongs pa dang / rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang /
279a4(tsha): rol pa chen po dang / mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs mdzad pas kun tu spro bar byed de/ 'jig rten drug gi rnam par bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag/ sangs
279a5(tsha): rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang ba mi dgongs so// de'i dus nas dang sa'i khyad par/ dkyil 'khor gyi bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs kun tu mi
279a6(tsha): gzigs// gzigs shing dgongs pa la yang mi 'gog/ de dag gi mtha' la yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin la ba zhugs ma
279a7(tsha): thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag gis kyang / chos thams cad dkyil 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par gyur to// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag
279b1(tsha): po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar ba'i sgo nas bskul zhing / gzhan dag gi don la thugs g.yo bar mdzad pa'i glus bslang bar mdzad de/ tshul can don gyis rgyal po che// 'dren pa
279b2(tsha): kun gyi rgyu nyid las// nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor las// thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston// kye ma'o 'gog pa don gnyer nas// zhi ba'i lam dman 'jug byed
279b3(tsha): pa/ byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam// gdos bcas chos dang 'drar gyur cig/ zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang / cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so//
279b4(tsha): de nas yang yum gzi ldan pad+mo can zhes bya bas/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la slong ba'i glus bskul bar mdzad do// mi dmigs ting 'dzin pasam
279b5(tsha): 'das brjod dang bral// bde ba chen po'i ye shes byang chub sems// mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis// rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya cher bstan du gsol//
279b6(tsha): de skad du yang bskul ba'i rjes// mgon pos gnas rnams la dgongs nas// 'od zer rnam bkod 'dzum mdzad de// 'khor la legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad//
279b7(tsha): legs so legs so rdo rje can// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas// yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na// gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la// dga' ba'i spyan
280a1(tsha): mdzes dang bar gyis// gang 'dod rtog pa dri bar mdzod// ma 'ongs rtog pa mtha' dag rnams// thugs rje'i shugs kyis gzung mdzad de// don khyab
280a2(tsha): pa yi snang ba yis// gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog/
280a3(tsha): rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pa// dga' ba'i bzhin mdangs
280a4(tsha): rgyas mdzad de// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin// thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gzung // de nas gzi ldan pad+mo can// 'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul
280a5(tsha): mdzad pa// 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pas// dga' zhing chags pas rnam par 'gyur// e ma rigs pa'i rgyal po khyod// thugs rje chen po nyid 'od bzhin// phyogs
280a6(tsha): ris med pa' sgo 'byed pas// yul du gyur par rgyud kun dgongs// mi dmigs cho 'phrul nam mkha' las// bkod pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phung bzhin// thugs rje sprul pa'i
280a7(tsha): char chen pos// sna tshogs la rgyud dag par mdzod// de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang // ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de// rang gi mtshan ma sa rab mdzes pa// rgyal po
280b1(tsha): zi la gnon gzi brjid can// phyag gi 'khor lor rab bskor cing // phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad de// mi dmigs nam mkha'i dkyil dag nas// rdo rje sprul pa'i sku
280b2(tsha): mngon phyung // gzi ldan pad+ma chen po dang // rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de// 'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis// 'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do//
280b3(tsha): oM AHhUM/ ma hA ba sme sha ku bar+t+tin hra d+hA ye b+ha ba hri/ a la la ho/ gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyi// dkyil 'khor sbyong zhing bsdu bar mdzad// bsod nams ye shes
280b4(tsha): tshogs rdzogs sku// rdo rje gar gyi rol mdzad cing // dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+mo'i gnas// dkar 'tsher dag pa'i rang bzhin te//
280b5(tsha): dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par// gsal khyab kun tu spros pa las// dkyil 'khor sprul pa bsam yas thon// zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang // byang chub dgon gnas
280b6(tsha): lam zhes dag/ gnyis med gnyis su sgrol mdzad cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bkod// ngo mtshar sprul pa sa rnam par rol// brjid dang bcas pa sa ga ra mdzad
280b7(tsha): cing // 'dzum par mdzad dang dor ba dang // bskul dang 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam// smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang // rdo rje phur pas g.yon par slong // 'dor zhing
281a1(tsha): bskum dang 'jo ldeg dang // rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang // rigs kyi 'phrin las sna tshogs 'phrul// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par mdzad//
281a2(tsha): rnam par rol pa de 'byung ba// byang chub sems tshogs zha zhing gas la// rol pa'i char nyid mngon phab pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcun// brtan dang g.yo ba ma
281a3(tsha): lus pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas na// byang chub sems tshogs rol pa las// steg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa dang // sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang // kun
281a4(tsha): tu rab rgyas ye shes thim// sna tshogs snang ba'i nyi ma'i 'od// yang dag bde ba rab gnas mdzad// de tshe 'dus pa'i tshogs chen po// phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de//
281a5(tsha): thabs dang shes rab byin rlabs pa'i// byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyi mchod// rnga dang sil snyan sogs sgrogs shing // dbang po tshim pa'i rol can dang // gar dbyangs glu sdug
281a6(tsha): la sogs kun// stong gsum grang bar sprul byas te// bcom ldan 'das mo bde ba che// gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod// e ma'o 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus na//
281a7(tsha): thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin// 'khor lor kun rgyud grol mdzad pas// rang gis dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad// rdo rje 'chang bas gsol btab bzhin// dkyil
281b1(tsha): 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs// pad+ma'i dpal ldan sems dpa' che// 'phrin las ye shes gnas kun skyong // khyod zhabs bskyod pa'i thugs rje'i stobs// khams gsum
281b2(tsha): ma lus dag pa'i sku// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog/ mgon pos bka' drin mdzad pa legs// de skad gsol btab dgyes par gyur// phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la
281b3(tsha): bzhugs// de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems// zhi las sprul pa lha mo yi// sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams// dgongs shig thugs rje'i ye shes shugs
281b4(tsha): rang gis de bzhin gnas dgongs te// phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad// kye kye mchog gsum bde chen sku// byams pa'i thugs mnga' kun gsal mdzad// rdo rje
281b5(tsha): las rgyal byang chub sems// bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad// kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs// thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che// rgyal po 'khor lo'i dbang phyug
281b6(tsha): nyid// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod// kye kye rnam dag pad+ma sku// dga' ba rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas// so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed// chos rnams kun
281b7(tsha): gyi de bzhin nyid// kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag/ btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs don// bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag don//
282a1(tsha): rang dga' bskul bas g.yo mdzad de// phyogs bzhir byang sems dga' gnas 'jug/ kye ma'o 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid// byang chub sems kyi
282a2(tsha): rnam sprul pas// nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis// rang gi thar lam 'gog par byed// 'di dgra thugs rje'i gnas su rung // ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos//
282a3(tsha): thams cad dus gcig sgral byas na// rang gi bde chen don bstan mchog/ ces gsungs pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin// sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad// de
282a4(tsha): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ thugs rje bskul bar rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
282a5(tsha): / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang bstan las lang // bde gshegs bsngags pa rjod byed cing // bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis
282a6(tsha): gsol ba btab// kye ma'o mchog gsum dam tshig sku// ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag/ byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rnam sprul thugs rje'i bdag nyid pas//
282a7(tsha): rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med rku// de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs// thugs rje chen po yal dor na// ci phyir theg chen mchog tu bsngags// yang dag zhus pa'i tshigs
282b1(tsha): gsan nas// thugs rjes dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad// mgon po pad+ma'i sku de nyid// gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing // bri med ye shes phyogs bcur gzigs//
282b2(tsha): dmigs med byang sems dkyil 'khor gsal// theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i// lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bcas sdud mdzad de//
282b3(tsha): gzhan 'phrul gnas sogs g.yo mdzad cing // stong gsum 'di dag rnam sbyong ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug ste// skra las 'od zer 'phro bar mdzad// de khyab
282b4(tsha): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku// gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug/ phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku// zhal
282b5(tsha): gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs// dmar gsal pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ g.yas g.yon zhal gnyis sngo dang ser// rigs brgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes// phyag na
282b6(tsha): pad+ma bum pa dang // rdo rje rtse lnga dpal gyi be'u// mtha' yas mda' gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang // phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol par mdzad/
282b7(tsha): gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang // rin chen rgyan tshogs rta babs bcas// dra ba dra phyed mu tig 'phreng // ba dan dril bu sogs kyis spras// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor
283a1(tsha): cher 'phags pa'i// pho brang ka bu gdung rnams la// pad+mo rdo rje sogs pas spras// 'dod pa'i yo byad phun sum tshogs// gnas rnams
283a2(tsha): kun tu rin chenA khri// pad+ma 'khor lor nyi zlas mtshan// phyi rol par khyams 'khor ba dang // sgo rnams kun tu pad+ma la// thubs dang shes rab bye brag gis// nyi ma
283a3(tsha): zla ba brkyang pa'o// de nas pad+mo rnam dag sku// dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de// dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs bkod pa'i mthus// thabs dang shes rab rol par
283a4(tsha): mAdzu/ de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems// mkha' klong rnam par dag pa nas// rigs pa bde ba chen po'i sku// sna tshogs snang thag shar ba de// gsung nyi
283a5(tsha): yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs// 'byur ba'i 'od zer rtse lnga pa// cho ga'i yan lag rig bzhin du// thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig tu// sngags bcas 'gro zhing 'du
283a6(tsha): ba'i tshul// rgyal ba bde gshegs yab sum dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems mdung // lus mdzad khro bo yab yus dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rgyur gyur
283a7(tsha): nas// rigs kyi rgyan 'phreng mtshan mas mdzes// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing // rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod// de'i tshe mgo rna ba bde chen po/
283b1(tsha): rigs bdag 'gyur ba zhes bya bas// pad+mo rnam par sprul pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'phrin las mdzad// byang sems grang las rnam 'phrul pa'i// bde
283b2(tsha): gshegs 'od zer sbyang ba'i sku// zhal dang phyag lnga sogs pa'i rgyan// gtso bo'i cha lugs ji lta bar// rang 'od yum dang 'khril bar mdzad// bkra shis kyis mtshan
283b3(tsha): bde hi lA// ra ga pad+mo hUM zhes po// sngags mtshon yi ge 'bru brgyad de// las kun 'grub par mdzad pa yin// gang gis pad+ma shA rI dang // bud+d+ha hU gis mnan byas
283b4(tsha): na// zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang // grub chen brgyad kyis tshogs sogs rnams// sbyor ba tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing // yun rings gnas par 'gyur ba yin//
283b5(tsha): 'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la// yi ge dza yis bdags byas na// rnam 'phrosra rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyong // rigs bdag sku nas dgyes par bzhugs//
283b6(tsha): thugs rje sprul pa'i glu dang sngags// 'od zer tshogs kyis bskul bar mdzad// dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus// dgyes chags bstan pas gzi dang ldan//
283b7(tsha): oM rnam dag pad+mo bde ba'i dbyings// ye shes byin rlabs gsal ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che// mnyam nyid rig bdag thub pa che//
284a1(tsha): byin rlabs 'dor bar mi mdzad pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku// rang gi ngo bos gnas
284a2(tsha): pa yin// gtso bo'i sngags kyis bskul byas te// 'od zer brgyan bcas thugs kar bsdu// yi ge a nas a aH'i bar// bcu drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas//
284a3(tsha): 'gro kun sangs rgyas skur bkod cing // rigs 'thun dkyil 'khor kun gsal 'gyur// sngags kyi 'od zer sgra bcas pas// chos can bcu drug dag pa'i dbying
284a4(tsha): rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gsum rdzogs// de bzhin ka nas k+Sha yi bar// sum cu rtsa bzhi rim bzhin gsal// bsnyen pa'i
284a5(tsha): yi ge drug dang bcas// 'od 'phros thums cad sangs rgyas sku// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas// chos mang
284a6(tsha): ye shes zag pa med// slar nyid sku yi gnas bzhugs pas// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs// gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang // bkra shis brgyad sogs
284a7(tsha): kun gyis spras// khams las rnam sprul che mtha' yas// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dam ra mdangs// pad+ma brtsegs dang ral gri 'dzan// chos kyi snang
284b1(tsha): ba'i rgyan gyis klubs// pad+ma rgyan 'bring rang gzhan mchog/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// gang las 'phrul ba'i chos dbang phyug/ dmar ser zhal
284b2(tsha): gcig phyag bzhi pa// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bum pa 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// g+ha las 'phrul ba'i chags mad 'od// zhal gcig phyag
284b3(tsha): bzhi byi ru'i mdog/ pad+ma gnas glegs bam ma lo ba 'dzani// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// raM las 'brul ba'i spyan dga' ba// zhal gcig phyug
284b4(tsha): bzhi btsod kyi mdog/ rin chen 'phreng ba bA si la yab 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// tsa las 'phrul ba'i mi bskyod pa// zhal gcig
284b5(tsha): phyag bzhi chu shel mdog/ rdo rje dril 'dzin 'khril ba'i tshul// dpal be'u bu ma brtsegs 'od 'phreng brgyan// tsha las 'phrul ba'i mngon snang mdzad//
284b6(tsha): zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar ti lA// rin chen dra ba glegs bam 'dzin+da// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// dzaM las 'phrul ba'i brtan dbang phyug/
284b7(tsha): zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DUR+Ya// rin chen snyem dung por 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// d+hi las 'phrul pa'i 'brug kla ni// zhal gcig phyag
285a1(tsha): bzhi gur kum mdog/ rin chen chags shing gaN+DI 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// nya las 'phrul pa'i dri med dpal//
285a2(tsha): zhal gcig phyag bzhi margad mdog/ rin chen pad spungs za ma tog/ byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// Ta las 'phrul ba'i rin chen spungs// zhal
285a3(tsha): gcig phyug gnyis gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dril bu yum dang 'khril// rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo brtsegs// praM las sprul pa'i nam mkha'i mdog
285a4(tsha): zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i madrangs// rin+da chen gling bu pad+mo 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// Dal las 'phrul pa'i dra ba can//
285a5(tsha): zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ka'i mdog/ rin chen 'phreng dang bsrung skud 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// D+ha las 'phrul pa'i dkon mchog
285a6(tsha): rgyal// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud mangs 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// NaM las sprul
285a7(tsha): pa'i rin chen tog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra gad mdog/ dgos 'dod bum pa dpag bsam shing // byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// taM las
285b1(tsha): sprul pa kun tu snang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ 'khor lor dril 'dzin yum dang 'khril// gtsug tor dri med rdor phyed 'dzin// tha las sprul pa'i
285b2(tsha): 'od kyi dpal// zhal gcig phyag bzhi shel gyi mdog/ 'khor lor dra ba ral gri 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// de las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug/ zhal

285b4(tsha): bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma so 'phrang rdo rjes spras// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// na las sprul pa'i rnam par gzegs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'o
285b5(tsha): mdangs// ku sha'i chun po a mra'i 'bras// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhug/ pa las sprul pa'i don yod po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngon mdog/ rgya gram dril
285b6(tsha): bcas yum dang 'khril// rdo rje gdengs po ral gri 'dzin// pha las sprul pa'i brtson 'grus shugs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ka ra ta ri// rgya gram 'phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin//
285b7(tsha): shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// pa las sprul pa'i las chen po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog/ pad+ma 'phreng ba nor bu 'dzan// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas
286a1(tsha): la bzhugs// b+ha las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma'i mdangs// phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la
286a2(tsha): bzhugs// ma las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dbang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldang ser mdangs// zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// bde
286a3(tsha): gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang // 'khor los bsgyur rgyal cha lugs dang // mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs brgyan// rigs mthun btsun mos mdzes byas pa'o// ya las byams
286a4(tsha): pa'i dbang phyug ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ro'i mdog/ rdo rje sdengs dbyug ral gri dang // tri shUl thod bcas pad+ma'i dbyug/ rnga ma brjid khro bcas yum dang 'khril//
286a5(tsha): drag po'i rgyan bcas shar gyi sgor// wa las sprul pa'i brtse ba'i dbang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dbyug pa pad+mo dang // thod rnga rdo rje dbyug myu
286a6(tsha): gu// ra las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal// pad+ma 'phreng ba dril bu dang // thod sbrul ral sngon pa dan 'dzin// la las sprul
286a7(tsha): pa'i grol dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdangs// rdo rje rgya gram pad+mo dang // gri gug gtun shing 'phreng ba 'dzin// rigs kyi 'phreng bas mdzes byas
286b1(tsha): nas// khro bcas rngam pa'i mdangs bcas pa'i// lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru// gzhan 'joms drag po'i las kyi 'khod// sha las sprul pa'i sbyin dbang phyug/ zhal
286b2(tsha): gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'od// rtse gsum ba dan rin chen dri la// me thob thod pa ri mos mtshan// sha las sprul pa'i dbang phyug ma// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser
286b3(tsha): skya'i mdangs// rin chen rtse dgu bgrang 'phreng dang // pad+ma'i lcug ma sdigs mdzub mdzad// sa las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyug bzhi dmar skya'i
286b4(tsha): mdangs// dbyug pa rtse gcig pad+ma dang // dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin// ha las sprul pa'i dbang phyug ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i sku// ral gri lcags
286b5(tsha): kyu dgra sta dang // me yi 'phreng ba 'khor lo 'khor 'dzin// gzhan 'joms 'jigs byed khro bo'i tshogs// rang 'od rigs mthun yum dang 'khril// drag po'i rgyan tshogs
286b6(tsha): chu lugs kyi// pad+ma'i tha ma bzhi ru bkod// ka las bde ba'i blo gros te// zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs// yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang // nam mkha'i mdzod
286b7(tsha): sprin 'od dkyil 'khor// kha las rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu sha ra// rin chen pi wang 'phreng ba dang // rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs// ga las
287a1(tsha): gzi brjid bkod pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skyegs mdog/ pad+ma'i lcug ma zla ba dang // 'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa thogs// g+ha las
287a2(tsha): 'khor lo rnon po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra dang // 'khor lo byug pa mi 'jig shing // tsa las shes rab snang ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs//
287a3(tsha): rin chen phung po pad+ma dang // rtse gsum dril thabs 'od dkyil 'khor// cha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen gdugs
287a4(tsha): mdzes nyi ma dang // dpa' bo longs spyod pad+ma'i spyan// dza las 'od zer 'phro ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal// pad+ma 'khor lo mchod sdong dang //
287a5(tsha): mu tig chun po zum tog/ dz+ha las sprul pa'i drag shul can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldang ser mdog/ 'od kyi phung po me long dang // ral gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon//
287a6(tsha): DA las sprul pa'i dri ma sel// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i 'phreng ba gan+d+he brdeg/ chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog byed pa'o// prA las sgyu ma'i sprul pa ni//
287a7(tsha): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sha/ seng ge rgya mtsho rin chen rdzing // rin chen bum pa bde bcud bcas// Ta las rin chen rgyal po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs
287b1(tsha): ri bo pad+ma chu gri dang // gser nya phyo ba'i rdzing bu 'dzin// D+ha las sprul pa'i dra ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog/ rgya gram dril bu 'phreng ba dang // b+han+d+ha s+thang
287b2(tsha): yab 'dzag pa'i rgyun// rta las sprul pa'i lag bzangs ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti 'od// pad+ma'i rgyal mtshan dkar mdangs dang // ri yi gzhon pa ku shi'i chun//
287b3(tsha): tha las gser 'od khrod 'phro can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ba'i mdog/ glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang // rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od// de las rin
287b4(tsha): chen snye ma ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdog/ pad+ma sngon po dpag bsam shing // bAdun rtse gsum zla phyed gzugs// d+hA las chos kyi mthong ba ni// zhal gcig
287b5(tsha): phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku// gro chum shel sgron ma dang // dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu'i tog/ pa las sprul pa'i dri ma med// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar gsal
287b6(tsha): ma dngas// chu shel sdong bu pad+ma'i rdzing // rlung ras rdo rje dra ba 'dzin// pha las sprul pa'i nun pa'i sel// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmA ra ser 'phro// nor bu 'phreng
287b7(tsha): ba dri yi snod// ral gri pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dzin// ba las sprul pa'i dga' sbyangs ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar gad mdangs// sna tshogs sprin phung ser pa bcas// man
288a1(tsha): ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin// b+hA las gzhon nu rin chen ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ldang ser mdog/ n+ya gram 'khor lo 'phreng ba dang // 'od zer
288a2(tsha): rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum// sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams// rgyan 'phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang // yum bcas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi// gtso la 'khril ba'i
288a3(tsha): tshul du bzhugs// nga nyan ma las sprul pa'i// rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs// rigs kyi mtshan ma ji bzhin du// pad+ma rA ga karta'i mdangs// bai DU ra gser mdog
288a4(tsha): in dra bzhin// pad+ma rdo rje rigs sogs mtshan// zhal gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril// 'og ma'i phyag mtshan mthun pa yi// rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang //
288a5(tsha): pad+ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyi// rang gis
288a6(tsha): dkyil 'khor gnas su bkod// ya wa ra las sprul pa yi// pad+ma 'phro ba la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser// dmar ljang pad+ma me long dang /
288a7(tsha): rin chen 'phreng ba pi wang gar// mchod pa'i las mdzad nang gi mtshams// sha ba a ha las sprul pa'i// pad+mo tshim byed la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis
288b1(tsha): rigs gnyis gzugs// bdug spos me tog ma ra me dri// 'gying tshul sri zhu las kyi tshul// mchod rdzas phyi yi mtshams su gnas// de dag gi gsang sngags ni//
288b2(tsha): o de hi ra ga pad+ma shwa ri bu d+ha hUM hUMswA hA/ oM pad+ma d+ha ba ra bu na si d+ha ma hA d+harma hri d+ha hU hUM/ pa tri ta ya dza swA hA/ da bus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o// oM tsakra a lo ka na maHrak+Sha sa ma
288b3(tsha): b+ha rA rakya sa ma b+ha ra d+ha na hri ti pA ya ti dza swA hA/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra pa kri ta ya ni she ra ti pa sha ma ni dza swA hA/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o// oM rad na mu
288b4(tsha): ku ti ku man ta b+han+na du na du na b+hi ba dza hU taM dza swA hA/ lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o// oM bi shA tshan+na ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba kur b+ha ni hUM phaT dza swA hA/ byang gi dkyil
288b5(tsha): 'khor gyi'o// oM ma ma A ba lo ki na ru ru sU ru d+ha na sid+ha bo d+he sa twa ma ma hU dza swA hA/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// o bi lo ka na maHsi d+ha ma ma ku
288b6(tsha): ru ku ru bo d+hi satwa b+ha ra gu na hU dza swA hA/ rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// oM bid d+ha bid d+ha sarba ka ma bid d+ha de bi ku ru b+hu d+ha sa ma b+ho ra hUM a aM
288b7(tsha): dza swA hA/ lha mo rnams kyi'o// oM A sa sma ra kro ta ba ra sid ya ga sha hUM hUM hUM bi ta pa ka phaT dza swA hA/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// gsang sngags rgyal po mi zad pas// rnam
289a1(tsha): par 'phrul pa'i sku yis ni// stong gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad// de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin//
289a2(tsha): bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs na// dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing //
289a3(tsha): rigs kyi bdag po gsal bar mdzad// gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas// rnam ga sum snang ba gnyis med gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya wa ka tsit+ta ma hA
289a4(tsha): bo d+hi n+ya su traM tri shar shrAd+ha so nak+Sha d+hu h+yA hUM/ sarba bud d+ha ku rU/ rad na ma ku Ta a aHbid+yA ma ma ku a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM a pU swA hA/ oM pad+mo A mo g+ha swa ma ya shri ha ha ha ha
289a5(tsha): tshib+h+yA ma ni/ uSh+NIShabi ma la ts+tsha hU~M hU~M/ sngags gsum gyis gsal bar byed pa'o// oM bi sho chen d+ham ni a ba sam bo d+hi/ ma ma ku ru si la ta sI na bin nung padz+ra
289a6(tsha): da ra hUM hU hU/ rnam par sprul pa'i sngags so// oM maN+Dal ni bi shA tsakra mu ku Ta b+hUd d+ha he na ma pi la ru kra ma sa ma hUM phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so//
289a7(tsha): o a a bi na du sha ma la shan du na d+he ta thA ga ta bo d+hi pad+ma ku ru aHhU swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// o pa na mu kham sa pad+ma swa ba dir ya ma ku ru hUM hUM ha ha d+ha ra sha ra swA hA/
289b1(tsha): snying po'i sngags so// oM na ma su ti b+h+yo ga ga na gu ma le sam par hUM phaT swAhA/ rigs mchog gi sngags so// oM a ba ga ban sam b+ho pad+mad e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru pad+ma
289b2(tsha): ru ki si dza dza/ spyan 'dren pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma sa ma mo ga ga su ra ta reg sa ma ye stAM/ gdan gyi sngags so// o a mo g+ha si na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pU tsa me g+haH
289b3(tsha): me tra swA hA/ mchod pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma bi lo ku lo su na ma/ su traM b+ho d+hi swAh+mA la saM hiM hi/ dgyes par bya ba'i sngags so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog
289b4(tsha): rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba'i// sku gsung thugs dang gsang sngags che// byin gyis brlabs pas don bshad mdzad// bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog/ de nyid
289b5(tsha): dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mdzad// dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po// thabs dang shes rab
289b6(tsha): rol pa'i tshul// rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las// rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs chen po// 'gro ba'i snang ba dag pa'i mchog/ rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos /
289b7(tsha): dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa yi// phung po khams tshogs rnam dag sku// e ma'o kun chos mya ngan 'das// e ma chos rnams byang chub sems// e na/
290a1(tsha): chos rnams ye shes sku// e ma'o chos kun rnam par 'phrul// rgya chen sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che/
290a2(tsha): thabs mang mdzad pa sna tshogs sku// sngon dang da ltar 'brel don 'byung // thabs mkhas pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes dga' ba'i shugs// sa
290a3(tsha): dpas 'das don chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin brlabs dbyings// la lar sku dang gsung dang thugs// zab pa'i de nyid rang gi mthus// gas pa gsum
290a4(tsha): gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam 'phrul sku la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes so// de bzhin
290a5(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
290a6(tsha): / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// dga' ba chen po'i ngo mtshar gyis// rgyud gsum po dag tshim gyur nas// dgyes pa'i dbyangs
290a7(tsha): kyis gsol ba btab// e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan che// bcom ldan 'das pa ya mtshan che// gnyis mad rol pa ya mtshan che// dri med dag pa ya mtshan che// 'od/
290b1(tsha): 'phro 'du ba ya mtshan che// byang sems sprin phung ya mtshan che// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che// 'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro mo 'byung ba ya mtshan che//
290b2(tsha): byin brlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che// tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che// 'gog pa'i slong mdzad ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa rnams// dam tshig
290b3(tsha): can du byin brlabs mdzod// bla 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba gral du 'khod// de nas bcom ldan bde chen po// chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku// sku dang gsu
290b4(tsha): thugs gnyis med pa'i// 'khor rnams rab tu byang ba'i phyir// rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyi// rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad// de'i tshe byang chub sems chen
290b5(tsha): po/ 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des// dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis// gnas kyi mtshan ma gsal bar mdzad// 'du shes dang ni 'gog gnas sogs// rang gi
290b6(tsha): rtog pa'i mtha' zhen rnams// brim med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen chu des dbang bskur ba// rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste// 'gro ba'i don byed nus dang
290b7(tsha): ldan/ las la spyod pa'i sa gnas rnams// rang las skyo ba'i sems dag gis// thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dir gnyer ro//
291a1(tsha): byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis// 'dus pa'i gnas lnga rig par bya// oM gu byas ma ya ste/ a la la ho/ rdo rje rol pas gsungs pa yi//
291a2(tsha): gsang ba dam tshig chen po rnams// rigs kyi bdag pos dgongs pa mdzad// rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas// skal bzang dam tshig chen po ste// de las 'das
291a3(tsha): na brlag par 'gyur// bka' yi bsgo ba don chen pos// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam rang byas// dam tshig thob nas gral 'khod do//
291a4(tsha): de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid// dbang thob las mdzad chen po des// bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag/ rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni// phyi nang gsang
291a5(tsha): ba'i mchod pas mchod// mnyes 'gyur gsol ba rab tu gdab// 'di ltar rmad byung ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che// mngon spyod ya mtshan
291a6(tsha): ston par spyod// bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa nyid// smra bsam brjod las rab 'das kyang // ngag gi lam las rab ston cing // dpe mtshon snang ba la brten nas//
291a7(tsha): yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis// gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod// a la la ho snang bar mdzod// ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des// gsol ba
291b1(tsha): btab pa' don dgongs mdzad// brjod bsam 'das pa' ting 'dzin la// snyoms par bzhugs nas mi gsu bzhugs// de nas 'dus pa 'i 'khor tshogs kyis//
291b2(tsha): stobs mchog seng ge chen po la// logs su btud de phyag 'tshal nas// rmad byung mchod pa la sogs byas// gsol btab stobs mchog seng ge khyod// bdag
291b3(tsha): cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye// stobs mchog seng ge gsang ba dag gis// gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs khyod nyon cig
291b4(tsha): bdag la zhus shig spobs par byos// slar nyid gsol ba btab pa'i don// kun gyis mthun pa'i tshig smras pa// mgon po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod// sangs
291b5(tsha): rgyas rgyal ba sras kyi mchog/ byang chub sems dpa'i rje btsan lags// chos rnams ston pa'i gnas lags na// bcom ldan gras pa mchog dam pa de//
291b6(tsha): gsang sngags lam rnams mi ston cing // dgegongs don 'brel pas mi mdzad pas// rgyu dang rkyen rnams gang lags pa// 'khor gyi tshogs la bstan du gsol//
291b7(tsha): gsal zhing dbye bar mdzad pa'i rigs// zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa// rgyal ba kun ni gsang ba'i mdzod// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje dngos// sna tshogs
292a1(tsha): gsal zhing snang bar mdzad// de nyid brjod pa'i gsang sngags can// bshad las 'das pa'i don de nyid// dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi
292a2(tsha): mdzad// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog gis// rnam par brjod pa mi mnga' bas// yang dag don gyi snying po nyid// rgya cher bka' ni stsal ba yin// 'dus pa'i 'khor
292a3(tsha): tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni// smra bas ma las 'das brjod med las// tshig tu brjod pa legs pa yin// gnyis mtha'i rtogs pa
292a4(tsha): las gzhan dag/ tshig gi snang bas the tshom skye// grol ba nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes// 'das dang ma byon thams cad dang // da ltar byung ba'i dgongs pa'i
292a5(tsha): don// ma gra sungs mi gsung gsungs mi 'gyur// des na sems dpa'i snying po ni// spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems// kun rdzob bden pa'i dbang tsam du//
292a6(tsha): mtshan ma tshig gi rnal 'byor rnams// don dam bka' yang bkri ba'i phyir// rgyal bas tshig sgor bstan pa yin// 'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus
292a7(tsha): pa/ stobs mchog seng ge de ltar na// bdag sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pa// tshig gi rjes su 'breng ba dag/ gsang ba'i lam brjod gsal byed pa// ci lta bu yis
292b1(tsha): mtshon par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras// dbang bskur thob pas zhu bar spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// zhus shig stobs mchog seng
292b2(tsha): ge khyod/ des kyang 'khor gyis gsol ba bzhin// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la// phyag 'tshal rmad byung mchod mdzad nas// rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol// kye
292b3(tsha): ma'o ston pa thub chen po// phyogs bcu'i rgyul ba kun 'dus pa'i// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na// ma 'ongs sgra la brten pa
292b4(tsha): dradag/ don la reg par mi 'gyur phyir// mtshon bya mtshon por byas nas ni// snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon ma thad pa sgrub byed cing // gsang ba'i de
292b5(tsha): nyid bstan du gsol// de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes lnga dang rtag ldan pa'i// phyag gi mtshan ma gsol mdzad cing // rmad byung ya mtshan ston par
292b6(tsha): / mdzod// thams cad pad+mor gyur pa yi// rmad byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrog/ o A hUM swA hA/ b+ho d+hi tsit+te gu h+ya sa ma ya a/ a nu bo da ta hi/ a nan tag ra pa/ ma hA satwa pri
292b7(tsha): ya ta pas hUM/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dag/ rab tu skrag cing brgyal gyur na// gzhan lha ma lus smos ci dgos// bcom ldan
293a1(tsha): 'das kyis yang dag bka'// bshad kyi rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par// yang dag bden pa'i don bstan pa// de ni
293a2(tsha): dngos po'i mtshan nyid de// mkhas ldan chen po rnams kyi gdeng // ji srid blo yi chos dag tu// gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la// bsam brjod kun rdzob zhes bya ste// de las
293a3(tsha): 'das pa don dam yin// sku gsum gnyis su med pa yi// snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gag pa// dus gsum rtag pa chen por gnas// yang dag bden pa'i don nyid do// thams
293a4(tsha): cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul// thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid// zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni// de nyid bla med mchog dam pa// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// a la la yi
293a5(tsha): tshig brjod do// stobs mchog seng ges dri ba dris// de ltar lhag na bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi lta ba glo gnas gang // spyod la gnas pa gang dag gis// phan tshun
293a6(tsha): 'grel gyur ji lta bu// blo yi rim pas 'jug bya 'am// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i
293a7(tsha): don// mtshan nyid rnam dag legs gnas pa// bgrang dang bgrang las 'das pa yis// dngos po'i mtshan nyid de bzhin no// legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing //
293b1(tsha): rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad nas// 'brel pa shugs kyis sgrub byed na// lha spyod gnyis ldan bde ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor sa la legs gnas shing // bden gnyis
293b2(tsha): 'brel pa'i don bsgrub nas// yang dag rtag pa gsal 'gyur ba// rnal 'byor sa spyod sa thob shog/ ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
293b3(tsha): dbyings// bden gnyis 'brel pa med pa'i sa// yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku// kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyis su// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul nyid de// med pa ma yin
293b4(tsha): mtshan med de// rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro// slob ma'i rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas// lhun gyis 'grub pa'i sa bsgoms pas// brten 'gyur bden pa gnyis
293b5(tsha): la gnas// che chung mthu yis grub pa yin// sgra yi rjes 'brang rnal 'byor pa// don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur// yang dag kun rdzob bden gsal bas// gnyis
293b6(tsha): med don dam bden par gnas// sna tshogs chos kyi g.yul ngo bzlog/ rig pa'i skyes bu dam par grags// zhes dgyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
293b7(tsha): kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ de kho na nyid ston pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rig pa'i
294a1(tsha): skyes bu mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// bcom ldan snying po byang chub sems// dgongs pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// las dang nyon modra
294a2(tsha): dag byed pa'i// ye shes sgron ma ji lta bu// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i byang chub sems// rdo rje lta bur mnyam bzhag nas// mi rtog ye shes gsal mdzad de// sgra mi
294a3(tsha): snang bas mtshon par mdzad// sna tshogs chos rnams byang chub sems// bde ba che las gzhan med do// lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa'i tshogs// chos rnams kun
294a4(tsha): gyi rgyu yin te// rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid// sku gsum gsal ba'i rnam par snang // dngos po gsal ba'i chos med de// gcig las rnam sprul sna tshogs nyid//
294a5(tsha): phyag rgya gar thabs dbang bskur bas// 'ching ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i// phung khams skye mched rnam par non// gzung
294a6(tsha): 'dzin rtog pa'i yul bral ba// bdag med pa yi ngo bo nyid// rnam gsum chos kyi don las byung // 'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
294a7(tsha): don// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// skye dang skye med sna tshogs par// phyogs 'dzin mtha' yas 'ching bar byed// de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o//
294b1(tsha): bde ba chen po'i ting 'dzin rgyal// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad kyi chos// me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod// 'gag pa med pa'i
294b2(tsha): chos rnams la// byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur// mnyam nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum// ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang med gnas
294b3(tsha): sgrol ba/ rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub sems// gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba yis// gnas dang gnas med byang chub tshul// ya mtshan rmad kyi don 'byung ba'i//
294b4(tsha): rgya cher so sor gsal ba'i ngang // kun rtogs byang chub sems chen po// dmigs med gsang ba las byung ba'i// dmigs med dmigs pa sna tshogs nyid// bde/
294b5(tsha): ba'i ye shes gsal ba nyid// 'gags pa med pa'i chos nyid de// bya ba grub pa'i tshul can du// spros med spros pa sna tshogs snang // spro 'du kun dang yongs bral
294b6(tsha): ba'i// mdzad pa'i byang sems bstan pa las// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med// ye shes rgyal mtshan rmad du byung // rang gi de nyid gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal bas
294b7(tsha): bshad pa'i dgongs don la// 'khor rnams ya mtshan dam par 'gyur// mchod dang gzha'i sgra 'byin cing // rang gi de nyid gsal gyur nas// byang sems de nyid
295a1(tsha): sbyong par byed// e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems// e ma drag pa dri ma med// e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che// e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer
295a2(tsha): med chos// e ma'o so so rang rig sems// e ma'o byar med lhun gyis grub// de bzhin nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems//
295a3(tsha): byang chub sems nyid thugs kyi mchog/ bdag cag rigs 'dzini 'tshogs pa rnams// byang chub sems nyid smon pa dang // 'jug dang lung dang gnas pa ste// rang
295a4(tsha): gi byang sems g.yo bar bgyi// reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi// nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na// thugs rje che dgongs byin gyis brlabs// bde bar gshegs
295a5(tsha): pas byin gyis rlobs// de skad tshig tu gsol btab pas// bcom ldan snying pos 'di skad gsungs// sna tshogs rnam dag ngo bo nyid// chos can 'phro ba'i chos rnams ni//
295a6(tsha): rang bzhin brjod bral rtog med ma// rang gsal rtogs par dka' ba'i don// srid gsum ye nas rnam dag chos// bdag rdzogs 'khrul pa'i nyes dmigs kyis//
295a7(tsha): dus ring 'khyam 'gyur 'gro ba rnams// rang rtogs dngos po'i las la spyod// log pa'i sems kyi kun brtags kyang // rang bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med// ye nas
295b1(tsha): don gyi sangs rgyas la// 'khrul pas bde sdug 'khor bar 'khyams// log rtog dngos med byang chub sems// 'khrul 'khor mi zad rgyan gyi mchog/ thar pa'i gnas nyid
295b2(tsha): byang chub zhing // srid dngos sangs rgyas mngon rdzogs sku// 'dzin rtog byang chub snying por gsal// brtan g.yo'i dngos po thams cad dag/ bde chen sku las gzhan
295b3(tsha): du med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
295b4(tsha): / de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yisra// dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phros pa'i don// mtshan nyid phra zhing rtogs dka' ba// rgyal bas bshad phyir bskul
295b5(tsha): 'debs mdzad// bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don// rgya chen mdzad pa'i mthu ldan pa// rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi gnas/
295b6(tsha): rab rgyas mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin// cho ga'i yan lag bstan du gsol// de nas mgron po gsang ba'i bdag/ gnyis med ye shes rang grol ba'i//
295b7(tsha): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// rgya cher sprul pa'i don bstan mdzad// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// ri bong rgyun 'dzag ris mtshan can// dbyings kyi yi ge tshul
296a1(tsha): 'jug pa'i// rta bdun 'od sogs gsal byed ldan// skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba las// mnyam nyid 'od kyi gong bu'i gzugs// snang ba'i 'od zer
296a2(tsha): tshul// myug r+b+ha'i mtshan ma sngags dpab cas// rnam 'gras rang dag zhi khams stong // de dag gong bu'i gzugs mtshungs par// gca bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i zla/
296a3(tsha): nyid snying rje chen po yis// ma lus rgyud rnams gsal mdzad nas// nam mkha' dngas pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// thugs rje chen po'i rkyen slong mdzad// sa bon gsang ba
296a4(tsha): las byung ba'i// mkha' snang gsal ba kun khyab pas// sna tshogs chos kun so so nyid// 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ram bzhin bkod// kun 'phrul sa bon las bskyed pa'i
296a5(tsha): ye shes rin chen sna tshogs gzugs// shar bu do shar 'phreng ba dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga yab sogs// me long rol mo'i tshogs bsam yas// 'khor lo rin chen
296a6(tsha): rdo rje pad// tA ra Na bzhi'i rgyan mdzes pa// sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nyi zla'i tshogs// 'khor lo ra ba 'khyams 'phreng ba dang // bum pa 'dod yon lha mo 'khyigs// rin
296a7(tsha): chen 'bar ba'i khri brtsegs gnas// nyi zla pad+ma rin chen brgyan// gnas rnams khyad par ci bzhin 'bar// dkyil 'khor khyad par lhun gyis grub// a A/ i I/
296b1(tsha): U y+Ya/ ostAM/ ma ma/ aMsa?/ rAr/ ma9/ kA khagab+ha / tsa chadar+N+Nanya/ Targa r+d+haN+Da/ taHdar+d+han/ pa pa bAr+d+ham/ ya ray+YA wa/ shUHsak+Sha/
296b2(tsha): de bzhin nyid dbyings rmad byung ba'i// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs gsang ba// byin brlabs ya mtshan rnam 'phrul sku// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kun gyi gnas//
296b3(tsha): sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// phung po'i chos rnams sangs rgyas te// 'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi rgya// khams dang skye mched
296b4(tsha): sems dpa' dang // sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i sku// phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i// dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che// gzugs phung rnam par snang
296b5(tsha): mdzad che// tshor ba rin chen 'byung gnas sku// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas rgyu// 'du byed don yod grub pa yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste// thams cad
296b6(tsha): bde gshegs lnga yi sku// sa khams sangs rgyas spyan yin te// chu khams lha mo ma mA ki/ ma khams na bza' dkar mo ste// rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma'o//
296b7(tsha): nam mkha' kun tu bzang mo'i sku// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o// dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun// thams cad bde gshegs rigs kyi sku// mig la
