297a1(tsha): rnam par snang mdzad de// rna ba rin chen 'byung gnas che// sna la snang ba mtha' yas te// lce la don yod grub pa'i sku// lus yid rdo rje sems dpa'
297a2(tsha): yin// de ltar nang gi dkyil 'khor nyid// ya nas lhun grub gnas pas na// rnal 'byor gsal bas don shes bya// phyi rol don shes yul drug ni// yum chen lnga
297a3(tsha): yi phyag rgya dbyings// gzugs khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste// sgra tshogs lha mo ma ma ki/ dri rnams na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings// ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin// reg
297a4(tsha): chos kun tu bzang mo'i sku// dus kun mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor byas// rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // thams cad ma lus
297a5(tsha): sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las rol pa'i rgyan// rang nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog/ sa yi khyad par ma
297a6(tsha): lus pa// rdo rje chos kyis sbyong mdzad de// yon tan 'phrin las mthar phyin pas// tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig che// rang gi mthu mi
297a7(tsha): sbyor ba byed// rtag tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te// dri med byang chub sems kyi chus// 'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag
297b1(tsha): par byas// rtag tu gsang sngags brjod bya zhing // rdo rje mgon po'i sgo gas la brtag/ rtag tu gtor sbyin gtang bya ste// khams mang 'dzin pa med par grol// rtag
297b2(tsha): tu lha la mchod byas te// rang gi bdud rtsis mchod cing rol// rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba// rnam grol thams cad brag cha'i sgra// pha rol phyin bcu dus gcig tu//
297b3(tsha): pad+ma'i cho gas rdzogs par 'gyur// zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang // pad+mo rigs ku na mnyam par sbyor// pad+ma'i dam tshig la gnas pas// pad+ma rang gi gnas su sgom/
297b4(tsha): 'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi// mgon po rang gi gnas nagasal// dri med dag pa'i thig le las// 'od 'phro lnga yi snang ba bcas// rang gi gnas nas 'phro
297b5(tsha): mdzad cing // de ni mgon po'i sku mdog gzugs// kun tu pad+mo chags med pas// gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams
297b6(tsha): dang / dpe byad rdzogs par 'gyur nas ni// yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// dus kun 'dren pa'i sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje dam tshig la gnas pas// rdo rje
297b7(tsha): rang gi gnas su sgom// 'od 'phro 'du gnas phyag rgya yis// ye shes mnyam nyid kun ston mdzad// thugs rje rnam mang yul bral zhing // 'joms par byed pa'i
298a1(tsha): khro ba'i sku// rang gis dkyil 'khor sgrib bral ba// mngon sum gsang ba'i ye shes sku// 'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas// 'khor lo
298a2(tsha): rang gi gnas su bsgom// rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che// 'od 'phro nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs// phung tshogs khams rnams rnam dag cing // 'phrin las ye shes bla na med//
298a3(tsha): byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sgyu// dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gnas//
298a4(tsha): rnal 'byor dang brtson+da ting 'dzin gas la// 'grub 'gyur ring por thogs med spyod// ces gsungs pas/ 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes
298a5(tsha): par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o//
298a6(tsha): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gaur stabs kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes pa
298a7(tsha): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab bo// kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// sangs rgyas sras tshogs bskyed pa'i yab// khyod kyis dkyis
298b1(tsha): 'khor sprul byas pas// gdul bya'i khams ni grol byas na// phyi ma'i 'gro ba ji ltar bzung // gang dag dbang po ma smin+da pas// dkar po'i chos rnams mthon
298b2(tsha): mi 'gyur// de dag thugs rje chen po yis// bzung zhing lam la zhugs par snang // ma 'ongs 'gro bral la dag/ 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor ma mthong rnams//
298b3(tsha): ci lha'i dkyil 'khor bstan pas 'dul// zhes gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba
298b4(tsha): rnams theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi lam la 'jug par 'dod pa dag gis ni/ rdo rje slob dpon la brten nas gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// /
298b5(tsha): rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog/ dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan// bstan bcos ma lus shes gyur nas// skyabs 'gro byams sems sdom pa spangs//
298b6(tsha): byams sems snying rje chen po dang // dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi bzhi nas// sems can thams cad mgron du gnyero// slar nyid byang chub lam la 'god//
298b7(tsha): pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang // bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas// theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing // dngos po'i de nyid brtan par gnas// nyan thos la
299a1(tsha): sogs smod pa'i blos// gsang ba'i theg pa don gnyer zhing // dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan// gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing /
299a2(tsha): de nyid bcu la goms gyur pas// rang gi ye shes rnam grol ba'i// mu stegs tshogs kyi mi bskyod kyi// theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med// rtag tu 'gro ba gzung
299a3(tsha): ba'i blos// dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi// grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon// 'jig rten grags sogs tshes brgyad/
299a4(tsha): dag/ btang snyoms spong len med pa nyid// dmun long tshogs kyi mig bya bas// bla ma'i gtso bor gzung bar bya// 'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs// zhi des
299a5(tsha): gsong por smra ba dang // 'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid 'ongs pa// rtse gcig dad brtson 'gyur ba med// blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug/ lha drang bla ma la sogs kun//
299a6(tsha): theg pa chen po la ma dga' bas// ngan pa'i tshogs spang gzhan du gnas// de ni grogs bzang yon tan can// theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod// sa phyogs shin tu
299a7(tsha): dben pa'i gnas// ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang // me tog chu rgyun phun sum tshogs// gnod byed skye bo'i tshogs sgral ba// rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga'
299b1(tsha): gyur pa'i// dag dbang bar chad med pa mchod// bsnyen pa ji bzhin rdzogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya// phun sum tshogs pa bdun ldan pas// bdag
299b2(tsha): gnas sa gzhi grogs bcas dang // mchod rdzas yo byad mA lus pa// bsrung zhing byin gyis brlabs par bya// rdo rje'i sa gzhi rA dang // gur dang bla rer bcas pa yi//
299b3(tsha): khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tshogs// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom// sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i blos// bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par byas// phyag
299b4(tsha): 'tshal mchod pa 'bul ba dang // sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // lus dbul byang sems/
299b5(tsha): bskyed pa dang // lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams// rgya cher yongs su bsngo bya zhing // sems can don phyir smon lam gdab// dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis//
299b6(tsha): de dag rtsol bral nam mkha' bzhin// nam thar sgo gsum las 'das pa'i// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang
299b7(tsha): mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i rnal 'byor pas// don kun mnyam pa nyid du gsal// de las rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul byas pas//
300a1(tsha): rigs kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing // rnal 'byor chen po'i las kun 'grub// sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i// grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa
300a2(tsha): 'am// ri phug nags tshal gang rung bar// nyams dga'i yan lag brtag par bya// gang du bza' shing 'bras bu bcas// ne sing me tog chu rgyun dang // dpal rdzogs
300a3(tsha): yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// der ni rab gus brtag par bya// nam mkha' 'khor lo 'dra ba dang // sa gzhi pad+ma 'dra ba ni// bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhi//
300a4(tsha): bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin// saswa gzhi zhom sde ba med pa yin// dbus su mtho la phyag rgya che// shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni// 'phrin las rnam bzhi'i dngos
300a5(tsha): grub 'gyur// lho dang nub tu gzhol ba ni// 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// nu ba dang byang du gzhol ba ni// phra mo 'i las gzhan 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig
300a6(tsha): shar phyogs mtho ba dang // dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya// sa dwer pus mo nub tsam na// rkos te slar yang spang bar bya// 'phel bar 'gyur na dngos grub mchog
300a7(tsha): gang bar gyur kyang shis par 'gyur// dma' zhing ma khengs gyur pa yi// sol du ma rus sogs byung na spang // yang na chu yis gang bya ste// slob dpon rdo rje dri la 'dzin
300b1(tsha): pas// mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing // shar du mi drag gom pa brgyad// song ste slar log lta bar bya// sgrib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur// snang dang mi snangs
300b2(tsha): yi bdag/ mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang // blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir// bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya// bar chad med pa'i sa dbus su// rigs kyi
300b3(tsha): bdag po'i sbyor ldan pas// chas gos lnga sogs rgyan thogs shing // pad+ma'i skyil krung legs bzhugs te// 'khor los sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis// mchod sogs
300b4(tsha): / bya zhing byin rlabs te// rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas// sa yi lha mo brtan mo rnams// spyan drangs mchod pas mnyes
300b5(tsha): par byas// khyad par sa yi ba dge po dang // 'gro drug bgegs rigs ma lus rnams// 'gug cing bu lon mchod sbyin btang // dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing //
300b6(tsha): sngags dang phyag rgyas byang bar bya// gang zhig dngos grub las tshogs 'dod// rab 'bring tha ma grub don du// lho 'phye brtag pa'i cho ga bzhin// ya na lag kun
300b7(tsha): dang rgyab spang bya// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i// sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du// brkos te sa yi skyon bsal zhing // sa gzhan mdog bzang 'jam sbyin
301a1(tsha): pas// dgang zhing dri zhim chur bcas pa'i// sngags gdab 'thas par gang zhing bcag/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor bstod// rgyar ni
301a2(tsha): kyikhru drug pa yi tshad// tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod// mtha' skor khru brgyad pa yi tshad// dbang skor sor bzhi chad stod de// ci ltar grub pa'i rgyur bskyed cing //
301a3(tsha): dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas// tshad snyam grog bur la sogs gsal// ran chen sna lnga sman lnga dang // snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag/ dri chu sngags kyis
301a4(tsha): btab byas pas// dkyil 'khor snying por gzhug par bya// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te// stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang // dri zhim sngags kyis byin
301a5(tsha): brlabs pa'i// chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor byas shing // sna tshogs mchod gtor gnyer sbyar te// lha sogs mgron rnams mnyes par bya// slob dpon rigs kyi
301a6(tsha): gtsor gnas pa'i// rgyan chas cha lugs rdzogs byas la// bsgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan// tshul bzhin gzhan gyis gsol ba btab// dbus kyis
301a7(tsha): yi cha gnas pas// kun 'byung nam mkha' dag pa'i sngags// brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las// dkyil 'khor rim brtsegs bsgom par bya// rdo rje sngams pa/
301b1(tsha): sar bzhag cing // byams pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag cing // rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas// phyag 'tshal dran pas thog mthar brgyan// rdo rjes gzhi rab dang
301b2(tsha): gur sogs khro bo'i me 'od bcas// gtso bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus// phaT ces thal mo lan gsum brdabs// 'od 'phros gnas kun g.yos pa las// lha
301b3(tsha): mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes// me tog 'phreng ba bum thogs pa'i// lus phyed sa las ston byas te// mdun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas// mchod gtor zhal
301b4(tsha): bsil la sogs dbul zhing // ji srid las rnams ma rdzogs par// de srid mi 'gyur bzhugs gyur nas// bdud sogs rgal ba'i ngag bcog mdzad// skyobs pa
301b5(tsha): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyis// bdud kyi sde
301b6(tsha): rnams bcom mdzad nas// de bzhin bdag gis bdud las kyang // rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor brtsam// de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs pa'i// rdo rje dril 'dzin
301b7(tsha): 'gying bcas la// dam tshig nye bar bskul ba yis// glu dag phyogs bzhi'i gnas nas 'don// rgyal ba 'gro ba'i mgon gyur pas// chos kyi me long gsal bar
302a1(tsha): ston/ bdu gshegs rnams kyi thugs gsang bas// rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig mchog/ ye shes bris med pa'i tshul// sgri ba sogs
302a2(tsha): ma lus bral byed pa'i// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam pa'i dbyings// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas ston mdzad// rgyal ba'i sgyu rnams rnam 'phrul pas// gsang gsum
302a3(tsha): dam tshig 'khor lo'i mdangs// mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs// chos dbyings ye shes dri ma med// 'khor dkyil nyi ma'i snying po ltar// kun khyab
302a4(tsha): gzi brjid nyi ma can// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ji la bu// gzugs brnyan gsal bar mdzad pa'i rigs// rgyal ba gsung dbyangs drug d+hA'i bdag/ theg chen
302a5(tsha): chos kyi 'khor mo'i mdzod// gsang gsum pad+mo dag pa'i dbyings// so so'i gsal bar don bstan cing // rdo rje lta bus gnas kun skyong // zab cing rgya cher
302a6(tsha): sna tshugs// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i dus// rgyal ba yon tan dpe dang bral// rin chen lhun po'i mdzod mnga' ba// nyams dga' thugs rje'i zhing rnams
302a7(tsha): dgongs// bdag med mnyam pa'i ye shes can// 'phrin las dag pas las zad mdzad// gsang gsum sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/ rigs mchog shes rab
302b1(tsha): brtson byed cing // spyan bzang dga' bas 'gro la gzigs// slar nyid khro bo chen po'i sku// zhal mangs phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin// 'jig byed 'bar ba'i skur
302b2(tsha): gnas te// mgur nas hUM sogs sgra sgrogs shing // rdo rje pad+ma'i lta ba yis// lha rnams bdag la bsdu byed cing // ma dang Ta las byung ba yis// mig gnyis nyi
302b3(tsha): zla'i dkyil 'khor brjid// 'bar zhing thams cad dag byas nas// slar nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs// shangs kyi rlung sgrom 'bar ba nas// 'jigs byed thams
302b4(tsha): cad 'thor bar byed// rdo rje 'gros las byung ba yi// sna tshogs sa gzhi brtan par bya// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ni hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na grIh+na hUM phaT/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya/
302b5(tsha): a na ya ho b+ha ga l+la na/ bi d+ya ra dza hUM phaT/ phyag gi mtshon cha kun 'khrol zhing // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro bar bskyed// hUM/ lha dbang klu dbang 'byung po'i rnyogs
302b6(tsha): gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang // sha zag shin rje ma mo'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma lus rnams// gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa// srung bar byed
302b7(tsha): pa'i bdag po'i bka'// thos pa tsam gyis myur du dengs// nga yi bka' las 'da' mo byed// gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che// pad+ma rdo rje kha T+wAMgs// thal ba'i
303a1(tsha): tshogs bzhin bshig par byed// rab 'a bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'o// pad+ma 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// gal te gang gis bdag
303a2(tsha): tshig bcas// 'dod gsum skye gnas gsal byas te// 'jig par 'gyur phyir gzhan 'dis med// sA la yongs su bskor byas te// bgegs med bya phyir phur
303a3(tsha): pas gdag/ oM g+ha g+hA g+hA tA ya sarba duSh+Ta phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM phAT/ hU h+yA NAM/ badz+ra kI li kI la badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya wAka tsit+ta badz+ra kI lA ya
303a4(tsha): hUM phaT/ lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod// ngo mtshar khro bo'i zur mig bzhin// smin ma khro gnyer g.yo mdzad cing // kha yi pad+ma 'dzum bcas pas// so yi
303a5(tsha): 'phreng zlu ma ljags 'gyur zhing // khros pa'i mche ba gnyer byas te// 'bru tshugs bzhin du gzigs byed dang // phyag rgya gar bsgyur spyi bor 'jog/ mtshon cha rdo rje
303a6(tsha): 'tshol ba dag/ so so'i phyag rgya gnas su bsgyur// 'ging bag bcas pas gzhan la bstod// rta mchog khro bo'i gar stobs kyis// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag
303a7(tsha): po'i tshul// ba yi rnam lngas dri bsres chus// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyer byugs nas// lha rnams gnas su dri yi chus// thig le gru bzhi zlum por bya// rang
303b1(tsha): gi sngags dang me tog rnams// so so'i gnas su dgram par bya// bla rgyan rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs// sta gon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes// dkyil 'khor lha rnams
303b2(tsha): nye ba yis// mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par byas// cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa dang // bzod gsol bskang ba'i don ched du// rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis//
303b3(tsha): phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya// oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu prA la ya/ badz+ra satwa twe no pa tiSh+ThA/ driD+ho me b+ha ba/ su toSh+ya me b+ha wa/ su po myo me b+ha wa/ a
303b4(tsha): nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi ma pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shri yam ku ru hUM/ ha hiM ha ha hab+ha ga wa na/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra mA me muny+tsaHba dzI b+ha ba
303b5(tsha): ma hA sa ma ya satwa a/ gsang sngags rgyal po bla med dam tshig 'di// lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa ma lus zad byed cing // las rnams thams cad
303b6(tsha): 'grub par byed// pus mos la btsugs byas te// lag pa g.yas pas spros 'dzin cing // g.yon pas dril bu dkrol byas te// tshig 'dis gsol ba btab par
303b7(tsha): bya// oM/ bde gshegs stobs bcu'i rtsal ldan 'gro ba'i mgon// mi 'jig la sogs yon tan rtsol med ldan// rigs gnyis thabs kyi rgyud pa'i dkyil
304a1(tsha): 'khor che// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' thugs rje'i shugs chen po// dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs chen po// tshul khrims la
304a2(tsha): sogs phung pos mnyes gyur cig/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i// dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni// nyes pa'i tshogs rnams kun las
304a3(tsha): rnam grol zhing // bde legs yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// 'dod don 'bras bu phun tshogs bsgrub pa dang // 'gro rnams ma lus rjes su bzung byed
304a4(tsha): cing // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgya chen rtsom lags na// mgon po bka' drin rjes su brtser dgongs la// rab tu gnas
304a5(tsha): par mdzad pa 'os pa lags// me tog dri bzang 'phra ba tshogs 'di bzhes la// ji srid 'gro ba'i don rnams ma 'grub par// de srid thugs rjes gzung zhing bzhugs
304a6(tsha): nas ni/ bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis brlabs// de na slob mA la bos te// kye/ rigs kyi bu khyod theg chen snod// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyon//
304a7(tsha): da gus dga' ba'i shugs phyung zhig/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// cho ga zab mo 'di bstan byas// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dang //
304b1(tsha): ma byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// de bzhin da lta'i sangs rgyas kun// 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te// gsang ba zab mo bla na med// cho ga bzang po 'di
304b2(tsha): spyad pas// skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du// kun mkhyen ye shes bad chen brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med pa// pad+ma grwar dbang dkyil 'khor gyis//
304b3(tsha): bdud tshogs shin tu mi bzad pa'i// dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad// de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi// blo gros mchog ni khyod kyis gyis// sangs
304b4(tsha): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// kun tu skyabs su 'gro bar bgyis// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gsang sngags can// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi// 'khor
304b5(tsha): lor bzhugs pa kha tshogs rnams la// kun nas skyabs su 'gro bar bgyis// dpa' bo pho mo 'khor bcas dang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che//
304b6(tsha): khyad par du yang slob dpon la// khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro bar bgyis// de nas legs spyad slob ma yis// skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa bzung // dkon mchog
304b7(tsha): gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum po bzung bar bya// bdag gis sdig pa bgyis pa dang // bgyid la rjes su yi rang ba// mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis
305a1(tsha): nas su// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// rgyal ba sras bcas tshogs rnams dang // rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis// sgom bzlas
305a2(tsha): la sogs bsod nams la// dang bar rab tu yi rang ngo // sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang // chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed cing // tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa
305a3(tsha): la// bdag ni rab gus skyabs su mchi// sangs rgyas rnams byung ji lta bar// skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yi// byang chub sems mchog dri med pa//
305a4(tsha): 'gro ba rgya chen tshogs la dmigs// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i mgon rnams kyis// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa// de bzhin nyid dbyings byang chub
305a5(tsha): sems/ dus kun dag tu btang mi bya// rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing // dus kun tu na yon tan bzung // rnal 'byor gsang ba smod mi bya// rdo rje spun la mig
305a6(tsha): bzhin lta// gsang sngags phyag rgya'i rnam pa dag/ brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya// de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir// spyi gtsug la sogs gnas rnams
305a7(tsha): // rang rang mtshan ma yi ga sngags// byin rlabs mo shes bskyed par bya// slar yang 'dug pa matog dang // mar mo dri chepa la sogs pa// rang gi gnas
305b1(tsha): su 'dug cing dbul// bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can// lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// rlon pa drang zhing 'bu rjes med// chag gas med pa'i tshems shing
305b2(tsha): ni// sor tshad bcu gnyis dri bzang byugs// rtse mor me tog 'phreng btag pa// sngags bzlas dri chus bsang bar bya// rigs kyis mtshon char byin brlabs te// oM
305b3(tsha): sarba pA pa d+ha d+ha ni badz+ra sho d+ha na swa hA/ yi ge gsum bcas sngags brjod cing // shar phyogs kha bltas slob ma la// bden pa bdar te sbyin bya zhing // des kyang mi smra
305b4(tsha): smyung bar bya// gri rtswa lta bus lce bzhar cing // rtse mo'i phyogs kyis so brus te// sa gaN+DI du m+bis byugs pa ru// phan tshun mI blta 'dor bar bya// shar la sogs pa
305b5(tsha): phyogs kun gyi// zhi sogs dngos grub mtshan ma brtags// gyen 'thur rab dang 'bring gi ltas// 'tshams kyis 'jig rten pa rnams 'grub// las rnams dag
305b6(tsha): pa'i sngags bzlas nas// sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'i// chu gtsang dri sbyor khyor ba gsum// nye reg mthor 'thung tshul du sbyin// o pra bi shud d+ha sarba d+harma pA paM
305b7(tsha): ni Sha bi sho d+ha ya/ sarba bi kalpa a pa na ya hUM/ gtsang ma'i ras las legs bkal ba'i// bsrung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa// yi ge gsum gyi sngags bzlas nas/
306a1(tsha): de yi dpung pa g.yon par byin// ku sha rtse mo ma grums pa'i// bam po gnyis su sbam byas pa'i// yab yum sngags kyis byin brlabs te//
306a2(tsha): sngas dang stan du byin par bya// oM sarba ru te ku ru ku ru swA hA/ dga' ba'i gtam gyis gzengs bstod cing // mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas// lha tshogs rnams
306a3(tsha): la bsngo byas nas// bden pa brjod de ci bder nyal// mi smra dga' ba'i sems bcas pas// rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya// slar nyid slob dpon nang bzhugs te// /
306a4(tsha): dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// lha rnams mchod cing bstod byas te// dge ba'i sems kyis nyal bar bya// de nas skya rengs shar dus su// slob dpon slob
306a5(tsha): ma'i gnas 'ongs te// kye kye bzhin bzang rnams longs shig/ rmi lam mtshan ma ci mthong ba// bden pa brjod pa'i dus yin no// des kyang ji bzhin smra bar bya//
306a6(tsha): rab 'bring mtshan ma'i ltas brtag cing // ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog par bya// sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs dang // ba yi rnam lngas dag par bya// dngos rnams
306a7(tsha): mtshan ma las grol ba'i// stong la ye shes chen po bsgom// rin chen rgyu las byung ba yis// bum pa mgrin ring lto ba zlum// kha khyer zhabs bteg 'phel ka che//
306b1(tsha): ni mtshan da/ legs byug sdu das// pang+gAd dkyil 'khor smrag rgyas pa'o// mapa' mtshan ma yigs brgyan// rlu rgyam thum pa la sogs rnams// mchod pa ma
306b2(tsha): gdan lta dgram par bya// rin chen rdza lnga 'bru lnga dang // snying po lnga dang ldan lnga dang // bkra shis rdzas lnga bzhugs byas na// mgul chings gzung zag la rgyan som
306b3(tsha): dam tshig lha rnams gsal byas nas// ye shes sku dang gnyis med par// mchod bstod sngags kyis bzlas brjod rdzogs// sngags chas chu dang gnyis med gnas//
306b4(tsha): kyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i dus dag tu// rang rang gnas kyi phyogs su dgram// dam chog dkyil 'khor gsal byas shing // ye shes lha dang gnyis med pa'i// thabs
306b5(tsha): dang shes rab 'brel byas pas// dkyil 'khor thig gdab las bya'o// shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug pa'am// yang na nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa// ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs
306b6(tsha): nas kyang // dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i las bya'o// gtsang ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i ras// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'am// lnga las byung ba'i skud pa dag/ byin gyis brlab cing
306b7(tsha): bsgril bar bya// stong pa nyid kyis sbyang byas nas// rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dag/ rin po che yi snod bzhag ste// ye shes lha dang gnyis med mchod// mchod bstod
307a1(tsha): sngags bcas dril bar bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya su tra ma ti kra ma hUM hU/ oM AHhUM/ dza gsum gdags pa'i sngags brjod cing // rdo rje slob dpon
307a2(tsha): thugs ka nas// slob mas smin mtshams drang por 'dren// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi nub dang shar// 'od 'phro byang sems thugs rje che// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor
307a3(tsha): mngon par bya// rdo rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams// dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par brtag/ stobs mchog dpakha bo dgongs su gsol// rdo rje thig gi sgra ldan
307a4(tsha): pas/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing // 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzad// oM a n+yo n+ya a nug ta/ sarba d+harma pa ra s+pha ra a nug ta/ sarba d+harma
307a5(tsha): d+yan+ta a nu pra biSh+Ta/ sarba d+harma hU/ lha rnams mdun du bzhugs gyur nas// mchod bstod dpa' bo'i tshul du dgod// rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing // shwa ra nas
307a6(tsha): nub tu brgyangs pa yi// tshangs thig dang po gdab byas nas// de nyid bzhir bkod tshad kyi ni// zur bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal// rdo rjes lho byang gnyis po
307a7(tsha): dang / mtshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya// logs thig gru bzhir mnyam gyur nas// brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu bgo/ bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs//
307b1(tsha): bapa'i// gzhan dag cha bran bzhi bzhir bgo/ thig gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang // ye shes skud pa mchod cing bstod// rdo rje khu tshur sngags bcas kyis// rang gi gnas su
307b2(tsha): gshegs gsol bya// oM badz+ra gats+tsha/ dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis// mig gnyis ma Ta las byung bsam// dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun lta ste//
307b3(tsha): sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis// sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas// cha bran dag kyang blo yis brtag/ rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis// ri mo nam mkhar bteg byas te//
307b4(tsha): 'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag/ rnal 'byor brten pa'i yid kyis bya// oM badz+ra be ga kra ma hU/ oMpad+ma'i rang bzhin rnam dag pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i
307b5(tsha): gnas chen po// thugs n+de ye shes rnam 'phrul tshogs// khyab mdzad byin rlabs ston pa'i gtso// rgyal ba kun gyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las rmad du byung /
307b6(tsha): ma lus sems can kun gyi phyir// pho brang dag par byin gyis brlabs// phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas// byang chub ye shes gsal bar 'gyur// nyon/
307b7(tsha): mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'i// thugs rje chen po dri med shugs// ye shes byin brlabs las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod//
308a1(tsha): rin chen sna lnga'i phye ma dang // sa tshon la sogs gang 'byor pa// rin po che yi snod blugs te// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar bzhag
308a2(tsha): byang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas nas// rigs lnga'i sku sogs yum bcas la// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dgugs sogs dang // mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes par
308a3(tsha): bya// oM badz+ra tsit+ta ma ti sa ma ya hUM/ dkar dmar mthing ka ser po dang // ljang khu'i tshon rnams rim bzhin du// dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsa ma byas te// pany+tsa ra
308a4(tsha): ga 'dren par bya// g.yas pas pad+ma'i rdo rje gzung // g.yas pas 'dren pa'i legs bya'o// de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing // bden pa bdar te bkab par bya'o//
308a5(tsha): 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag/ sems can khams ni rab grol byed// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// yang dag bden pa'i
308a6(tsha): byin brlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzod// dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsa ma ste// dang por slob dpon gyis bri zhing // phyis ni ci dga' shes pas
308a7(tsha): bri// mtho dman med snyoms drang por bya// de nas mtshan ma'i ltas brtags te// chad cing dma' bas ma 'grub cing // yon pos gdung ba'i las rnams skye//
308b1(tsha): chud pas slob dpon slob ma dang // shi shing na bar gyur pa yin// lhag dang chad pas yul 'khrugs shing // phyogs 'khrul yid smyo bar 'gyur// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor/
308b2(tsha): gnas dag tu// re mig nyi shu rtsa lnga las// bde gshegs gtso bo rigs su bcas// phyag rgya yi gres mtshan pa bri// phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab gnas pas// nyi shu rtsa
308b3(tsha): bzhi'i tshogs rnams la// byang sems khro bor bcas pa dag/ shar nas rim bzhin bri bar bya// phyi dang nang gi mtshams rnams su// mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams
308b4(tsha): gzhag/ bar khyams bskal bzang sems dpa' rnams// sgo bzhir khro bo'i tshogs bzhag go/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste// bde gshegs 'od zer snang
308b5(tsha): ba yi// pad+mo rdo rje dril bcas rnams// rang gi kha dog mtshan bcas nas// de yi shar sogs re mig la// tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang phyug/ tshad med 'od dang spyan
308b6(tsha): dga' ba'i// pad brtsegs pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang // pa da ga nas rin chen glegs bam rin chen 'phreng // rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa bzhag/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor
308b7(tsha): dbus gnas par// bde bar gshegs pa mi bskyod pa// rdo rje dril bu sngags bcas pa// rang gi 'od bcas gdan la bzhugs// de yi shar phyogs re mig la//
309a1(tsha): 'brug sgra dri med pa'i dpal// mngon par snang mdzad bstan dbang phyug/ chags shing rin chen pad spungs la// rin po che ya dra ba gnyis//
309a2(tsha): rim bzhin rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan// lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bde gshegs rin po che dbyangs kyi// rin chen brtsegs dang dril bu la/
309a3(tsha): rang mdog sngags kyi mtshan byas pa'o// de yi shar phyogs re mig la// nam mkha' mdzod dang dra ba can// dkon mchog rin chen rgyal mtshan tog/ rin chen gling bu
309a4(tsha): rin chen 'phreng // rin chen rgyal mtshan rin chen bum// rang gi 'od bcas sngags kyi sna brgyan// nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bde gshegs
309a5(tsha): kun tu snang ba yi// 'khor lo dril bu mtshan ma la// rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan pa bri// de yi shar phyogs re mig la// 'od dpal dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang // tshe
309a6(tsha): 'phrul bkod pa rnam gzigs dang // 'khor lo'i dra ba rgyal mtshan dang // nyi ma ku sha'i chun po la// rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan pa'o// byang gi dkyil 'khor
309a7(tsha): dbus gnas par// bde gshegs don yod grub pa ni// sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu la// rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal// de yi shar phyogs re mig la// brtson
309b1(tsha): 'grus shugs chen las chen po// gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs snang // rgyu gram 'phreng dang pad+ma'i 'phreng // rdo rje sngangs pa zla ba khams// rgya gram 'phreng dang pa
309b2(tsha): 'phreng // 'od 'phreng sngags kyi mtshan byas pa'o// mtshams kyi re mig bzhi rnams la// pad phro pad+ma 'dzin pa dang // pad+ma sgrog dang pad spyod kyi// me long rin chen
309b3(tsha): 'phreng ba dang // pi wa dgar gyi phyag rgyal// rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par byas// phyi rol pad+ma'i shar brtsams te// rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas//
309b4(tsha): bde ba'i blo gros rgyal mtshan sgra// gzi bkod 'khor lo rnon po yis// nam mkha'i mdzod dang rin po che// pad lcug 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams// rang 'od sngags kyi
309b5(tsha): mtshan par gnas// shes rab snang ba rdo rje rgyal// 'od zer 'phro ba drag shul gyi// rin chen phung po rin chen du// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba 'od phung bri// dri ma'i tshogs
309b6(tsha): sel sgyu ma'i 'phrul// rin chen rgyal po dra ba can// nyi ma'i 'phreng ba seng ge dang // rin tshun ri bo rgya gram bri// lag bzang gser mdog 'phreng ba dang // rin chen
309b7(tsha): skesnye ma chos mthong dang // pad+ma'i rgyal mtshan glegs bam dang // pad+ma'i sdong po go cha gri/ dri med mun pa sel ba dang // dga' ba'i dbyangs dang gzhon nu yi// chu she
310a1(tsha): nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang // sprin phung rdo rje rgya gram bri// de yi rigs lnga'i sems dpa' ste// rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan byas pa'o// de'i mthar
310a2(tsha): khro bo bzhi rnams kyis// dri med mun pa sel ba dang // phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bya ste// sbyin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang // spyod dbang mthun pa'i dbang phyug ni// rtse
310a3(tsha): gsum rin chen rtse dgu dang // dbyig pa rtse gcig ral gri bri// gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bri// bdug spos me tog mar me dri// phyi rol bar khyams gnas dag la/
310a4(tsha): phyogs rer sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste// rdo rje rnam gnon gar maldan dang // blo yis rgya mtsho thogs med bkod// rdo rje mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gnas gdan
310a5(tsha): dag la bri// pad+mo dga' ba'i sa la dbang // rin chen spungs pa sbyin gyi 'phreng // rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'odra gdan la gnas pa bri// yid 'ong ma
310a6(tsha): tog ye shes sgron// spobs brtsegs kha lo sgyur ba yi// pad+ma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang mdog gdan la gnas pa bri// dran dbang pad+ma'i blo gros dang //
310a7(tsha): las byed snying po blo gros dang // rgya gram mtshan mi sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri// shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su// khro bo 'jigs pa'i rgyal
310b1(tsha): po yis// rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje sngangs// rin chen dbyug pa pad+ma'i 'phreng // rang 'od yi ge gdan gnas pa'i// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// phyogs bzhi'i rgyan 'phreng
310b2(tsha): ka ba dang // 'dod yon lha mo la sogs pa'i// rgyan rnams pad+mo rdo rje dang // rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram gyi// 'phro bas mtshan ma'i kha dog sngags// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'o/
310b3(tsha): bcas pa'o// phyi rol rta babs dra sogs dang // ba dan dril bu nyi shu bzhi// gdugs dang bum pa bya ba'i 'phreng // dpag bsam rdzing bu drang pa dang // nyi zla me long
310b4(tsha): rgyal mtshan sngags// chos kyi 'khor lo ri dgas rnams// mdzes byas phyi mtha' pad+ma dang // rdo rje me 'od tshogs kyis bskor// dbus mig kha dog nyi shu lnga// pad
310b5(tsha): 'phreng dmar mo bar khyams dkar// sgo bzhi rin chen sna bzhi'i 'od// gru chad gser gyi kha dog can// mchod pa lnga dang bum bkram shing // bla rgyan na bza' phyogs
310b6(tsha): brgyan bre// me tog tshom bu sngags bcas pa// so so'i gnas su dgram par bya// gtor ma'i tshogs mang sbyar byas pas// phyi rol phyogs dang mtshams su
310b7(tsha): bkod// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste// bsrung ba'i 'khor los mtshams gcad nas// dgug gzhug gnyis su med
311a1(tsha): par bya// rdo rje pad+mo stong bya ste// rang gi gsang sngags rjod byed cing // mchod cing bskor nas bskang byas pas// dkyil 'khor shis pa'i las 'grub
311a2(tsha): 'gyur/ de nas lha rnams bstod byas te// rdo rje pad+mo dam tshig gzhug/ thugs kyi sngags kyi dgug byas te// mgron rnams tshim par 'gyur ba dang // dam tshig sngags kyis
311a3(tsha): bskul bya ste// rang gi 'phrin las bcol bar bya// zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba// dpal rta mchog rol pa'i/
311a4(tsha): rgyud las/ gzugs brnyan brtsams pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang sogs mgu gyur nas//
311a5(tsha): rgyal ba slar yang bskul bar mdzad// kun don thugs rje chen po' shugs// ma 'ongs gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor chen por gang 'jug pa// dbang
311a6(tsha): bskur tshul nyid ji lta bu// de bzhin rab tu gnas pa gang // bdag gzhan don gyi yan lag tu// sbyin sreg rim pa ji ltar lags// gtso bo thugs rje che ldan pas//
311a7(tsha): ma lus 'dul bya kun gyi phyir// dus 'dir snang ba mdzad nas kyang // cho ga'i yan lag rgyas par gsungs// de nas byang chub sems tshogs kyis// gus pas gzung
311b1(tsha): ste spyad par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan gar gyi dbang // phyag rgya shes gnas rab bskyod cing // rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas pas// rigs rnams
311b2(tsha): kun la gzigs mdzad de// mchog gsum sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i// dron 'di rab tu gsungs par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa'i// ma 'ongs gdul
311b3(tsha): bya gang dag gis// gnyis med gsang ba'i theg pa 'dir// smin pa'i lam la 'jug 'dod pas// gang gis mnyes pa'i las rnams kyis// rdo rje slob dpon mgu
311b4(tsha): byas nas// yang dang yang du gsol btab ste// dkyil 'khor gsang ba don du gnyer// ma lus sdug bsngal las sgrol phyir// byang chub sems mchog rgya chen blos//
311b5(tsha): phyi nang sbyor ba'i yo byad dag/ thams cad byang chub don du bsngo// 'dod chags rnam dag pad+ma'i dbyings// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// ye shes sprul pa'i
311b6(tsha): dkyil 'khor mchog/ de ring yid 'ong don chen gnyer// oM A ta thA ga ta sa ma ya sto// pad+ma dga' ba'i sku mchog mdzes// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i
311b7(tsha): gnas/ mtshan dpe phun sum tshogs pa yi// bde gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chen pos gzhan rnams 'joms// mi shes dri ma kun sel cing // thugs
312a1(tsha): mchog gsal ba'i chos mthar phyin// rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags snying po gsang ba'i chos// rang snang pad+ma'i dbyings nas 'phrul/
312a2(tsha): byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rin chen char 'bebs shing // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan 'gyur ba// dpal tshogs bkra
312a3(tsha): shis phun tshogs pa// theg pa che la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu gnas kun khyab pa po// las mdzad rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ mi mthun gnas rnams rab 'joms mdzad//
312a4(tsha): rdo rje 'joms mdzad phyag 'tshal lo// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas nyid du// dbang bskur gnas las byung ba yis// dam tshig ye she
312a5(tsha): rab grub mdzad// shes rab chos nyid las 'phrul ba'i// rjes su 'jug pa'i skyeng rje'i tshogs// yang dag bden pa las byung ba'i// byin rlabs 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs//
312a6(tsha): bde gshegs sprul pa rigs tshogs kyi// dbang bskur rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rigs// me tog 'phrang ba la sogs pas// slob ma brgyan par byas nas ni// phyir phyogs
312a7(tsha): stegs bu la bzhag ste// sgo ba'i bum pas khrus bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor mchod byas te// gtor ma phyogs bcu kun byin nas// kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya
312b1(tsha): zhing // slob ma bzhugs pa nyid du bya// ras gtsang dmar po'i rgya las byung // gnas gzhan ma smad ma nyams par// rang gis sngags kyis byin brlabs nas// legs
312b2(tsha): par gdong gi yol ba bya// pad+mo thal sbyor rin chen 'phreng // sngags brjod gzung 'dzin rtse gcig tu// brtan po byang chub don gnyer bas// dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa
312b3(tsha): skyed// de nas slob dpon blo ldan pas// theg chen lam la zhugs pa'i phyir// slob ma dag la slar smras pa// gsang sngags lam mchog zab mo 'di// shin tu gzung bar dka'
312b4(tsha): pab yin// khyod kyis bzung bar 'dod pa rnams// mi bsnyen pa yi blo bskyed nas// lha spyod mchog la gnas dgongs so// kye ma'o rdo rje gsang ba'i don// theg chen snying po bla na
312b5(tsha): med// tshe 'dis byang chub 'grub byed kyang // rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur// ngang tshul bzang po 'di rtogs pas// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//
312b6(tsha): byin rlabs ngo mtshar mchog brnyes te// sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan// khyod kyis sgro skur dang bral zhing // dad brtson the tshom med par bzung // de nas
312b7(tsha): slob mas slar gsol ba// gang dag thugs rje che mnga' ba'i// mgon mchog rnams kyis bdag cag mchod// 'di dag bdag la gtol med pas// khyod kyi gsung
313a1(tsha): bzhin bsgrub par 'tshal// slar yang rab gus gdung ba'i yid// tshul chen mi mnyam dam tshig mchog/ slob dpon che la bdag skyabs mchi//
313a2(tsha): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs// thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs// bdag gi byang chub don gnyer bas// pad+ma'i spyan rings rgyangs nas gzigs
313a3(tsha): gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen mchog/ mgon gyur rnams la skyabs su mchi// mya ngan las 'das pho brang 'dir// bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs// de nas
313a4(tsha): las kyi rdo rje yis// g.yas pa'i mthe bong nas bzung ste// yol ba'i nang du zhugs byas la// shar phyogs sgo ru gzhug par bya// oM pad+mo sarba ta thA ga ta swa ma ya /
313a5(tsha): ga tsit+ta ud pa ta ya mi hUM swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i gnas bzhugs pas// mchod mnyes rgyun bshags la sogs kyis// snod du rung bar gyur pa dang // dam tshig gsum/
313a6(tsha): bsgrog chu blud cing // rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrog cing // phyag rgya sngags kyis gnas gsum sbyangs// o/ rgyal ba kun gyis khyon nyid ni// byin gyis brlabs shing
313a7(tsha): brtan mdzad pas// pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor 'di// dam tshig rnams ni spang ba dang // dad med brtson 'grus nyams pa dang // blo dman shes rab chung ba dang //
313b1(tsha): blo mangs rtog 'dzin lam gnas la// srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya// bde chen mgon po pad 'chang sku// khyod kyis snying khar zhugs pa sra na// gsang ba'i ye shes
313b2(tsha): gzhan brjod dus// snying khrag 'thung zhing gzhan du gshegs// bdag ni gar gyi dbang phyug sku// khyod la thugs rjes bzung byed pas// nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag
313b3(tsha): 'da' bar rung ba ma yin no// bdag lnga brnyas shing 'khu byed na// rab gtum khro bo chen po'i skus// klad pa tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing // lus sems ngag sogs
313b4(tsha): rdul du byed// gnas bzhir 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas// dbab pa'i gas pa sngags la na stong du// dri zhim bdug spos dril
313b5(tsha): dkrol zhing // ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya// des ni mtshan ma'i rtags ston 'gyur// sku yi ye shes phyogasra bcur g.yo// gsung gi ye shes snang ba brjod//
313b6(tsha): thugs kyi ye shes mngon nas gsal// sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par gnas// bden pa yi ni byin brlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin//
313b7(tsha): bdag gi skal ba ji lta bar// dus 'dir dbab par mdzad par rigs// nor bu 'phreng ba gang la bab// rigs kyi lha de'i dam tshig nyid// sngags kyi 'phreng ba ma lus
314a1(tsha): pa/ slar nyid de la sbyin par bya// gser gyis thur ma byin brlabs pas// ma rig ldongs pa'i mun nag bsal// phyogs bcu'i sangs
314a2(tsha): rgyas thams cad kyis// khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad// ma rig sgrib g.yogs bsal byas nas// pad+mo spyan bzangs dri ma med// oM pad+ma tsak+She dz+nyA na pra be
314a3(tsha): sha pha Ta/ der rjes gdong g.yogs bsal byas nas// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bstan par bya// legs par ltos shig blo gros che// sngon gyi rgyal ba la sogs
314a4(tsha): rnams// gsang sngags snying po dkyil 'khor 'dir// legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin// me tog gang la babs pa yi// lha de rigs kyi dam tshig yin// shar
314a5(tsha): gyi sgo drung nas brtsams te// sngon gyi rgyal ba la sogs rnams// gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan// zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas// bla ma blo ldan mnyes
314a6(tsha): par bya// yi dam lha sku phyag rgya sngags// gsang ba'i ming dang bcas pa bstan// di ring dus nas gzung byas te// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par// rab 'bring
314a7(tsha): tha ma'i blo ldan pas// dus kun tu ni gzung bar bya// kye ma'o zla gros mchog gnas pa// 'gro brgyab pa'i don brtson pa// khyod zhabs pad+ma la btud de// pho
314b1(tsha): blang glong mchog nyams dga' 'dir// dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod// gnang mdzad lus la babs pa lags// rim bzhin thugs rjes brtser gnas pas//
314b2(tsha): dri ma'i skyon sel byin rlabs sogs// gnang bar mdzad pa'i dus lags pas// skyobs pa'i sku mchog thob par 'tshal// shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyub/
314b3(tsha): dbang bstegs dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad// pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas// dmar po'i tshon gyi nyer byug ste// seng ge'i khri bshams pad+mor bcas// 'khor lo sgyur
314b4(tsha): rgyal tshul gyis bzhag/ spyi bor gdugs mdzes rgyal mtshan g.yas// dung dang zangs dung sil snyan rnams// rol cha mchod bcas phyogs mtshams dgod//
314b5(tsha): rgyan 'phreng gos kyis mdzes par klubs// dri chu sngags bcas nyungs kar dang // ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya// oM ma hA b+hin d+ha ha na da ha hUM phaT/ de nas rigs kyi lha/
314b6(tsha): bskyed do// bkra shis dga' ba'i glu blangs shing // rol mo rgyan 'phreng bkod byas te// bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya// de yis phyi nang sgrib tshogs dang // bag
314b7(tsha): chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas// lha yi chu rgyun bsil ba'i mthus// ye shes phung po dbang phyug mchog/ oM/ lha yi chu ni rnam dag pa// rdo rje gsang gsum
315a1(tsha): gnas las byung // byang sems chu bo tshogs rnams dag/ dbang bskur bde ba'i don thob mdzad// rin chen ye shes rnam dgra mchog/ rigs lnga'i
315a2(tsha): sku yi rgyan byas pa'i// dbu rgyan bzang po cod pan+da bcas// kun 'byung rin chen phung po mchog/ NAM/ yon tan ma bcos rang bzhin brlan// rigs kyis dkyil
315a3(tsha): 'khor gsal bar byed// khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po yis// mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzogs sku// ye shes rdo rje rtse lnga pa// 'od 'phreng sngags kyis brgyan bcas
315a4(tsha): pa'i// byin rlabs shes rab phun sum tshogs// rtog bcas chos rnams kun las rgyal// hUM/ bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas// khams gsum gnasA nas
315a5(tsha): 'dor mI mdzad// byang sems ye shes rtse lnga pas// rang rig ye shes gnas gsal byed// chos rnams skye med dbyings kyi don// sgra brjod dngos po brag cha bzhin//
315a6(tsha): stong pa'i dril bu yum rang bzhin// de las rgya chen sna tshogs chos// ha/ chos kun rgyu las rnam grol zhing // de bzhin skye med 'bras bu'i tshogs// rang bzhin pad+ma/
315a7(tsha): dga' ba'i dbyings// nges pa'i theg pa ston byed gsung // kye ma rdo rje che ge mo// rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bskur te// chos kun 'od gsal bde ba che// pad+ma'i sgra dbyangs
315b1(tsha): ming dang bcas// oM/ phyag rgya chen po gsang ba'i gnas//
315b2(tsha): d+hAs m+b+ha/ / mi m+b+ha na ma sa sa// pa s+yAng sa ban
315b3(tsha): oM badz+ra pab+ho ma b+hi Shi k+Sh+ya mi/ oM rad na mu ku Ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM a d+hi pa tista a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM na mo shri che ge mo a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM/ slob dpon lha la rab gus pas/
315b4(tsha): tshogs bcas yon tan bzung byed cing // rdo rje dam tshig gcig pa'i spun// mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du bskyangs// 'di dag la 'khu smod byed pa// tshe srog rdo rje gtun//
315b5(tsha): po sa 'phro ga/ sngags na dus su brjod bya zhing // phyag rgya rgyun du bcing bar bya// gsang ba'i chog dang mtshan ma'i tshogs// dus kun dag tu sba byas te// bdud rtsi lnga
315b6(tsha): po sha sogs rnams// mnyam par shes pas rgyun du spyad// bro drug glu zug stabs byas pa'i// brtul zhugs gnas skabs dag tu bya// nyon mongs chos lnga 'dod yon//
315b7(tsha): lnga// dam tshig mnyam par shes par spyad// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya che// gnas gsum brtul zhugs la gnas shing // lung bstan rjes gnang dbugs 'dod pa'i//
315b8(tsha): chog bzang po spyad par bya// des ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ yon tan bzang po'i gnas thob 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya sku// gang dag sngags kyis byin brlabs te/
316a1(tsha): ma 'ongs bzung ba'i blo gnas pas// gsang ba'i dam tshig rjes su bzung // oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ swa ga satwa badz+ra pad+mo sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM d+hA tu shA
316a2(tsha): re ba\u0f88\u0f90shAn+na 5/ sa h+nu ts+tshas sa t+ta ga k+ShA pyA lA kAm+me/ b+h+ya5/ mchad dpal bag shes bzung las rmugs// brgyas thugs ma tshags pa sbyin
316a3(tsha): pabadag dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i// dngos grub thun mo nga mchog gi las// zhe rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // sdang gnod rangs pa'i las kun dang // da bya rmongs
316a4(tsha): bskrad pa'i cho ga dang // bsad pa la sogs las rnams kun// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di yi tshul// khyod kyi gang 'dod bsgrub par bgyi// de nas rang bzhin 'od
316a5(tsha): gsal ba'i// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor rab sbyor bas// 'khor ba'i cho rnams zil gnon cing // phyogs bcur dam chos gsung sgrogs shing // pha rol phyin drug gnas
316a6(tsha): 'phags te// sgro 'dogs the tshom gcod par byed// lung bstan bde gshegs sras rnams kyis// rigs mchog mdzad pa bla na med// rgyal ba kun gyis lung bstan mdzad//
316a7(tsha): khams gsum 'dzin bcas kun las grol// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ khams gsum na ni gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod kyis
316b1(tsha): nam yang ma byed cig/ oM mra hA sa ma ya hU pha Ta/ gsang sngags rgyud rnams 'dzin bya dang // lha dang slob dpon gzung bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsung
316b2(tsha): gcig sgo nas gsungs pa yin// 'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i blos// dkyil 'khor la sogs brtson par gyis// dad brtson shes rab mchog ldan pas// 'dod yon 'bras
316b3(tsha): bu'i tshul la sbyor// mchog tu gsang ba'i grong khyer 'dir// gang zhig 'dod don 'bras gnyer ba// des ni sgrib sogs kun spangs shing // mchog gnas ye shes gsal
316b4(tsha): bar sbyor// bde chen gsang ba'i theg pa che// tshe 'dis byang chub grub par byed// nyon mongs dgra tshogs las sgrol ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gnas thob pa'o//
316b5(tsha): de nas lha dang bzhugs gnas kyi// rnam dag de nyid bstan bya ste// mchod sbyin gtor tshogs mgron gnyer zhing // bkra shis 'gro ba'i tshogs bsags bya//
316b6(tsha): slar yang slob ma blo ldan pas// yon mchog bla ma la phul te// maN+Dal mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes byas gsol ba gdab par bya// shes rab yan lag phun
316b7(tsha): sum tshogs// bcu drug yang na nyi shu bzhi// rdo rje bla ma la phul te// byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga bya// khrus byas dri zhim rgyan gyis klubs// sna tshogs sngags dang
317a1(tsha): phyag rgyas sbyangs// rigs kyi lha dang ldan byas pa// dam tshig bskul ba'i brdas mtshon te// gnyis med ye shes snyoms 'jug bya// byang chub
317a2(tsha): 1/ sems kyi chu rgyun gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod byas nas// slob ma'i tshogs la dbang bskur bya// ji ltar rgyal ba sras tshogs kyis// 'jug pa po rnams tshim mdza
317a3(tsha): pa'i// gnyis med ya shes gsang ba'i don// dbab pa'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i// a lA la ho oM AHhU/ a ho su kha rang gi gnas// a ho ra ti tshim par mdzad/
317a4(tsha): dkyil 'khor sgyu ma bzhin du gnas// shes rab mtshan ldan byin brlabs pa// slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya// rang bzhin badre ba'i ye shes nyid// zag pa med pa'i
317a5(tsha): don gsal 'gyur// rnam rtog med pa'i sems kyi ni// rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra zhing // rdul bral thar pa zhi ba'i chos// rang gis dngos po mthong bar 'gyur// e
317a6(tsha): ma'o 'gro ba'i gla nas 'di dag/ de bzhin nyid la gzhan du 'khrul// de nyid bde chen ye shes te// gzhan du 'gyur ba ci yang med// ye shes 'di ni shin tu phra// rdo rje snying
317a7(tsha): po mkha' 'dra zhing // rdul bral thar pa zhi ba'i chos// rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do// da ni sbyin sreg gsang ba'i don// khyod rnams kun la phan phyir bshad//
317b1(tsha): dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi 'am// gzhan yang gnas gzhan gang 'thad par// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod pa// las kun zhi ba'i thab khung brtsams// zlum po
317b2(tsha): gru bzhi zla kham dang // gru gsum la sogs dbyibs can no// de dag dkar ser dmar dang nag/ snang bzhi kun gyis mtshan byas pa'i// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma'i rgyan// sna
317b3(tsha): tshogs rdo rje'i mtshan ma can// khru gang bzhi dang gnyis pa dang // khru gsum zabs su de yi phyed// bud shing yam shing so so yi// mtshan nyid lo 'bras kha dog ro// rtse rma
317b4(tsha): rma las sor bzhi dang // sor brgyad bcu drug nyi shu tshad// sbams la so so'i mar gyis byug/ rim bzhin rtsa bas brus pa ni// zlum dang gru bzhi zla kham dang // gru gsum tshang
317b5(tsha): du brtsig par bya// lha rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid// me lha'i gnas su bzhag bya ste// so so'i lus dang mthun pa yi// ag+ni rA dza 'bod par bya// g.yas pa mi 'jigs
317b6(tsha): phyag rgyas g.yab// g.yon pa bgrang 'phreng bzung bar bya// oM e h+ye hi ag+na ye/ ma hA b+ha ba hri swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal pos bsrung byas te// me lha'i gdan mchog pad+ma 'bul
317b7(tsha): derdo rjes mchod pa rnam lnga dang // sreg rdzas ma lus dbul byas nas// lha rnams mchod pa'i phyag tshad du// mchod cing gsol ba btab par bya// g.yas g.yon dgang gzar
318a1(tsha): thugs gapar gyis// chu bcud 'dzug pa'i rnam grangs dbul// oM mahA ya na la mAhA bud+yA d+hA/ dz+wa laHs+thi ku ru sarba duSh+TA nahUM ban+ta/ me lha mchod
318a2(tsha): pa'o// oM ma ma sarba ku ru hU/ dgang blugs dbul ba'i sngags so// oM sarba pA pa da hA na badz+ra swAhA/ til gyi'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ me tog gi'o// oM sarba brik+Sha na
318a3(tsha): hUM swA hA/ yam shing gi'o// oM badz+ra pU dza me ga lo ka shwa ra hU/ 'jig rten dbang du byed pa'i mchod pa'o// oM badz+ra d+hU pe dI pa puSh+pe ge na d+haM/ sbyor ba'i mchod pa rnams
318a4(tsha): oM badz+ra a pra ti badz+ra ye swA hA/ ku shA'o// oM badz+ra A yu she swA hA/ du ra ba'i 'o// gzhan yang rdzas rnams gang tshogs pa/ rung ming yi ge gsum sngags
318a5(tsha): dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor kun mchod cing // 'dod pa'i don la gsol bya gdab// sdig tshogs bag chags kun byang bas// lha yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
318a6(tsha): tha mar me lha mchod byas nas// 'phrin las so so'i sngags brjod bya// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya ku ru hUM/ lha rnams gnas su gshegs gsol zhing //
318a7(tsha): dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsdu bar bya// de nas rab gnas bzang po ni// 'gro la phan phyir bshad par bya// sa phyogs nyams dga' mdzes pa ru// gzugs brnyan dkyil
318b1(tsha): 'khor legs byas te// mchod tshogs rdzas kyis mdzes byas nas// slob dpon chas su bzhugs par bya// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrubs byas nas// rten sogs
318b2(tsha): sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// dga' ldan du ni gnas pa las// lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs ltar// de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su
318b3(tsha): gsol// mgon mchog gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang // me tog la sogs mchod bzhes la// 'di ni gzung bar bya ba dang // byang chub sems mchog spel
318b4(tsha): bar mdzod// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug sku// mchog gi lbu la phyag 'tshal bstod// mgon po thugs rje che ldan pas// rab gnas nang par bgyid par 'tshal// slob ma
318b5(tsha): rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan thugs rjes bdag nyid can// bka' drin cho ga mdzad par 'os// 'gro drug gnas kun
318b6(tsha): sgrol byed pa// thams cad dus 'dir dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang // gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnams kun// 'jig rten mchod
318b7(tsha): pa'i don phyir du// rab gnas bzang po mdzad par 'os// de rnams kun gyis rnam sbyangs nas// byin brlabs yongs su rdzogs byas te// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta
319a1(tsha): bar// dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs par bya// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang zhing // dam tshig lha dang gnyis med bzhugs// mchod bstod rgyun 'phreng
319a2(tsha): na bza' dbul// phyag la sogs rnams bsil byas nas// 'dod don 'bras bu gsol gdab cing // yun rings 'gro don bzhugs par gsol// de nas snga ma'i cho ga
319a3(tsha): bzhin/ dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas// sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs btang // zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na
319a4(tsha): med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ lam khyad par du 'phags pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de ltar bde bar gshegs
319a5(tsha): pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i tshe na/ bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu mya ngan skyes te/ kye ma 'o sangs rgyas 'dis ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom zhing
319a6(tsha): rlag par byed na/ thabs ji lta bus 'di 'dul bar bya// 'on kyang 'di nyid la ni bdag gis ci yang bya ba'i gnas med/ shin tu dman par gyur pa bdag dang mtshungs
319a7(tsha): pa 'gran nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum po ni srid mi brlag par bya ba 'phrin las yin pa thams cad la bka' bsgo zhing las ngan pa 'di dag las bzlog par
319b1(tsha): bya'o zhes pasamA mo// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas na mthu che ba dang / dbang dang gzi mdangs che ba thams cad bsdus nas/ kye khyed rnams bdag gi bka'
319b2(tsha): nyon cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ni rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na/ thams cad kyi srid 'jig par 'gyur ro// de bas na phyogs thams cad kyi 'khor
319b3(tsha): thams cad 'dus la bdag gri bka' nyan par mdzod cig ces bsgrags so// de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi dregs byed chen po'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul bstan
319b4(tsha): cing smras pa/ khyod ji lta bu'i nga rgyal can zhig yin/ nged rnams re re yang 'khor dpag tu med pa skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed cing
319b5(tsha): gzhan gyi re gnas dam par gyur pa lags pas/ khyod rang zhi ba la gnas na legs so zhes 'thun par brjod pa las/ bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu nyon mongs rgyas te
319b6(tsha): gzhan dag la smras pa/ lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag kun// nga yi bka' la gnas pa yin// skye 'gro ma lus gang dag kun// rgyal po'i bka' stsa lnga mnyan par
319b7(tsha): bgyi/ khams gsum bdag po lha yi lha// sa gsum kun gyis stengs pa// bdag gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshad// kun gyis 'gran par nus ma yin// nga yi bka' las
320a1(tsha): 'da' byed na// srog srid brlag cing gnas kyang 'thor// zhes brjod do// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal pos rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te/
320a2(tsha): de dag gi dbus na srin po chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i khro bor gnas nas/ rang gi mthu la sa 'phrul pa'i khro bo dang mtshon cha'i tshogs spro bar mdzad do// de bzhin du khyab
320a3(tsha): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / b+hA ga ri ti dang / gzhon nu gdong jug rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa
320a4(tsha): bsdus te/ de dag gi dbus nas 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa spros te dbang dang rdzu 'phrul ston no// ri rab kyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang
320a5(tsha): rang rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na 'gyi bzhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad do// gser gyi ri la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgya byin dang / dbang ldan dang / me lha dang / gshin
320a6(tsha): rje dang / bden bral dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / nyi ma dang / sa'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha
320a7(tsha): dang bcas par 'khod do// nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / lhag pa dang / phur bu dang / pa wa sangs dang / spen pa dang / gza' chen rnams kyis kyang
320b1(tsha): rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang mtshon char bcas pas 'khod do// mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / stobs rgyu dang / rigs
320b2(tsha): ldan dang / nor rgyus dang / dung skyong dang / pad+ma dang / chu lha rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor g.yog dang 'jigs pa'i sprul pas 'khod do// de bzhin du khams gsum
320b3(tsha): gyi dregs byed kyi tshogs gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / 'gro ba drug gi gtso dang / che zhing mthu yod pa rnams dang / ma mo rnams dang /
320b4(tsha): gAshrIn rje rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / 'dab bzang dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / rgyu skar gyi tshogs su bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor
320b5(tsha): gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis nga ro dang mtshon char bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu nyon mongs pa'i tshogs
320b6(tsha): skyes te rang gi 'khor rnams bsdu bar mdzad cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa ci yod pa dag dus gcig tu bstan nas/ mtshon cha sna tshogs kha bar ba'i gzhal yas khang na drag po
320b7(tsha): 'bar ba 'jigs pa'i sku ston te/ khro ba'i tshogs dang rol pa mdzad pa las 'khor gyi tshogs mtshon ma ma 'od dang bcas pa phyogs bcur spros te/ nam mkha' thams cad
321a1(tsha): grang bar byas nas thog dang / ser ba dang / nad dang / 'tshubs nag thams cad phyogs bcur bkye'o// des 'jig rten gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs
321a2(tsha): par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad nas 'khor ba me 'od 'bar ba'i mtshon chas pasad cing gtubs pa las/ so so'i tshogs rnams
321a3(tsha): brebyed par gyur te/ rang rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabs su gsol lo// de nas lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa'i bdud kyi rgyal po sa de dag la mna' 'dor zhing dam tshag
321a4(tsha): sbyin no// so so'i snying po slongs te/ 'khor tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te/ lha chen po brgyad ni ri rab kyi rtse la bkod/ rgyal chen bzhi ni shar du bkod do//
321a5(tsha): ga nod sbyin dang phyogs skyong dag ni shar gyi gling phran gnyis su bko da/ 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams ni lho ru bkod/ dri za dang ma mo rnams ni lho'i gling phran
321a6(tsha): gnyis su bkod do// lha ma yin rnams ni nub tu bkod do// gshin rje dang 'dab bzang gnyis ni nub kyi grong khyer gyi gling phran gnyis la bkod do// gza' dang rgyu skar
321a7(tsha): rnams ni byang du bkod do// klu dang grul bum rnams ni byang gi gling bran gnyis la bkod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba//
321b1(tsha): dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bdud kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid shin tu dga' zhing
321b2(tsha): 'khor thams cad la bsgo ba/ rgyal po gcig gi 'khor du gnas pas ni yid mthun par spyod pa gcig tu gnas par bya ba yin pas/ khyed rnams kyis kyang ngas ji ltar
321b3(tsha): bsgo ba'i bka' nyon la/ thar pa'i lam 'di spyod cing ston pa gzhan la gus par ma byed cig/ kho bo'i 'jig rten 'di ni stongs par 'ong ngo // bsam pa rgya chen po
321b4(tsha): med pa'i 'gro ba dag ni gti mug can gyi rang bzhin byol song lta bu yin pas/ bde legs kyi gnas thob pa'i don med pa yin no// yang tshigs su bcad te smras pa//
321b5(tsha): kye/ 'du shes med pa'i 'gro ba dag/ rang gi bde ba spong byed cing // thar pa'i lam bde sgrub byed pa// de dag 'khrul pas rang rgyud brlag/ nye 'dod bde ba spong byed
321b6(tsha): pa// rmongs pa'i 'gron rnams snying ra rje// re zhig thugs rje skal ldan pas// bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa yin// gnas gzhan gong ma thob 'dod pas// bdag la dad
321b7(tsha): sems gus par gyis// zhes bsgo'o// de dag gis kyang de ltar nyan te/ rang rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyi sems skyes kyang ci ltar bya ba'i thabs med do// de ltar
322a1(tsha): 'khod cing gnas so// de nas bdud kyi rgyal pos rang gi gnas su song ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dga' ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
322a2(tsha): la spyod cing dgyes pa'i glu gar dang rol mo spyod do// 'di ltar khams gsum kun gyi bdag po ni bdag yin pas/ 'di las lhag pa'i bsgrub bya ni gzhan dag yod par bdag
322a3(tsha): gis ma mthong ngo // da sangs rgyas kyi tshogs byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bsdu bar bya na/ thabs ji ltar bya bsam zhing / rang gi 'khor dag la yang
322a4(tsha): dri bar byed do// de nas yang bdud kyi grong khyer kun la bskor ro// sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor rnams la mi dge ba'i ltas dang mtshan ma ngan pa rnams la cho 'phrul sna tshogs
322a5(tsha): kyi bsgrub pa thams cad la rab tu gcod cing / ci 'dod pa rnams ma grub par byas/ bdag cag la mos par byed do// de'i rjes la de dag gi gtso bo rnams bdag gi
322a6(tsha): 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshe/ thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas 'dus par bya'o// gal te 'ong bar ma nus pa dag ni kho rang gi gnas de nyid dang bcas pa bcom par bya'o/
322a7(tsha): zhes brjod do// de'i tshe stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa'i tshogs kyi khro bo mtshon cha'i tshogs dang bcas par sprul nas/ de dkar po'i rigs la dga' ba'i 'gro gnas
322b1(tsha): ma lus par sprul nas/ de dkar po'i rigs la dga' ba'i 'gro gnas ma lus par bcom zhing / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlag par bshan
322b2(tsha): pa las bde ba'i mthus gang yang gnod par ma gyur to// de nas rab tu khros te/ bdag gi khams gsum 'di dag dus gcig tu 'dul bar spyod pa las ngan pa'i sde
322b3(tsha): tshan g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam/ da rang gi sde tshan sa 'og ma la gnas pa bskul te/ thar pa'i lam la gnas pa 'di dag rim gyis btul bar bya'o/
322b4(tsha): zhes brjod do// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa bsgo bar mdzad pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa dang mtshon cha rnams phyogs kun tu spro zhing / rang gi gsang sngags
322b5(tsha): drag po'i tshogs dag kyang rjod par byed do// des 'jig rten 'khrugs shing g.yos nas thams cad bred par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla
322b6(tsha): na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ bdud kyi sde dang bcas pas shug phyung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom
322b7(tsha): ldan bde chen mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzad cing // rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs// de bzhin nyid las
323a1(tsha): ma g.yos kyang // thugs rje che dang smon lam mthus// so so'i las rtog mthun bzhin du// sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul mang ston// 'dod
323a2(tsha): chags la zhen rmongs pa dag/ chags pa chen po 'dul bar mdzad// de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog 'dul phyir du// 'thun byas snang ba sna tshogs
323a3(tsha): dang // mi mthun sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad// pad+ma bde gshegs rdo rje'i rigs// ran chen rigs chen la sa sna tshogs// phyag rgya che sogs 'khor lo sgyur// ji lta ba
323a4(tsha): bzhin dag par mdzad// thabs chen rnam dag pad+ma'i mchog/ shes rab 'phrul pa'i mchog gyur pas// gar gyi dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje de nyid 'phrul bar mdzad//
323a5(tsha): gzhan yang mdzad pa rgya chen po// sna tshogs mthu yi 'dul mdzad de// dag pa'i 'gro ba mthun byas sku// gser mdog mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// go 'byed theg pa bla na med//
323a6(tsha): zab mo gsang sngags ji bzhin par// rgyal ba bde gshegs phyag rgya'i sku// rab 'phrul dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// la lar byang sems rgya chen mchog/ la lar
323a7(tsha): lam lngar dag par sbyor// la lar pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs// la lar 'bras bu'i don la sbyor// la lar dga' ldan lha yul 'phags// lhums su gshegs dang bltams/
323b1(tsha): pa dang // 'jig rten spyod mthun rol rtse sogs// gzhan gyi skur yang bya ba rnams// bcas ka can gyi bas ma 'phrul pa// mthun 'jug thabs kyi bya ba mchog
323b2(tsha): dka' thub mdzad dang dka' ba spyod// rdo rje gdan la yang sangs rgyas// bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas shing // rtse gcig ting 'dzin bskul gnas bzhugs/
323b3(tsha): 'phrul mdzad pa kun 'dul zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo rim bzhin bskor// mya ngan 'das tshul ring bsrel ston// zhi tshogs khro bo 'khyil pa drang // rab byung dud 'gro'i
323b4(tsha): gzugs sna tshogs// snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthun sku// tshungs dbang khyab 'jug 'jig rten skyong // bdud dang srin po'i gzugs tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i las rtog
323b5(tsha): dag mdzad cing // rang gis ye shes don bkod kyang // de'i tshe 'gro ba'i gnas chen sogs// las kyi stobs tshogs mthu brtas rnams// de bzhin nyid mthu tshogs
323b6(tsha): chen pos// yang dag lam la rab gol zhing // nga rgyal chen po'i dregs tshogs skyes// rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston// nyon mongs las kyi gnas la zhen// rang
323b7(tsha): gis rigs tshogs bsdu bar byed// 'jig rten gsum 'jig a la la// khams gsum gtso bo bdag cag rnams// su zhig 'phrul pa a la la// 'jig par
324a1(tsha): / myangang pa'i 'os ma lhags// rang kyi ka thub pa de gnas pa// mA ngan las 'das pa'i lam mchog ste// gzhan gyis bstan pas ci \u0f7f
324a2(tsha): bde tshogs 'joms pa'i yan lag go/ su zhig rang gi bde spong zhing // gzhan gnas sdug bsngal don du gnyer// gzugs ma sprul pa bsam yas kyang // rang gi
324a3(tsha): sku mdzes bsgyur bar dka'// sgra mang 'phrul pa bsam yas kyang // rang gi gsung snyan phrog byed dam// sems rtog bya ba'i 'od bcas kyis// ting 'dzin rtse gcig
324a4(tsha): 'gyur ba med// drag po'i stobs mchog gzi ldan rnams// rang gi gnas spyod bden par bstod// de nas bdud dang srin po dang // dbang phyug
324a5(tsha): tshangs pa khyab 'jug che// brgya byin ku dang dregs byed rnams// rab tu khros te rang gi mthu// ston cing drag po'i gsang sngags dang // gtum tshig nga ro 'bod
324a6(tsha): grogs byed// de'i tshe rgyal ba'i byin brlabs mthus// 'thun 'jug thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de// theg pa gsang ba bla med mchog/ khyad par sgo gsum gsal
324a7(tsha): byed cing // yang dag don la pad bkod phyir// thugs rje chen pos don mthun mdzad// 'jug pa'i lam rings bde bstan cing // dge ba'i sgo nas bder mdzad kyang /
324b1(tsha): rang gi nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus// don 'jug 'thun pa'i spyod sgo 'jig/ gti mug chen po'i mun 'thibs nas// nga rgyal ri bos kun tu gnon// zhe sdang
324b2(tsha): me 'bar sreg bya zhing // phrag dog rlung gis bskyod byas nas// 'dod chags chu bor bying bar 'gyur// dregs pa'i mthu yis rab khros te// tshogs rnams
324b3(tsha): gcig la gcig bsgo zhing // gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul stobs phyung nAs// rab tu drag po'i mthu yis ni// 'jig rten gsum dag 'khrug par byed// mi nad mu
324b4(tsha): ge 'khrug pa dang // mtshon cha lo tog 'bras bu 'phrog/ 'byung po 'jigs gzugs nyes tshogs rnams// rgyun mi 'chad du 'khor bar 'byung // sa gzhi me
324b5(tsha): 'bar chus dag byed// dug dang dbyig dug rlung bzhin g.yos// bde lam mtho ris thar lam gcod// mi dge'i sems kyis non gyur cing // 'gro rnams sdug
324b6(tsha): bsngal las byas pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs khrel bskyed// de nas byang chub sems bcas pa'i// 'khor rnams dus gcig stan
324b7(tsha): las bzhengs// gtso bo'i phyogs su 'dus byed cing // lan grangs bskor zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// mgon po bde bas mnyes byed cing // mchod nas gsol ba
325a1(tsha): gdab par byed// thugs rje che mnga' lha yi lha// byams sogs dga' ba'i bdud rtsi'i chus// gdos bcas tha ba rlan mdzad pa// thi ma gyur
325a2(tsha): rdo rje ye shes tshogs// rnam 'phrul dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// 'di dag nyon mongs brlabs 'khrug pas// rang gzhan thar lam bde ba 'joms// khyod kyi
325a3(tsha): thugs rjes bzod lags sa ma// byang chub sems kyi brlan bral la ma// srid gsum yal bar 'dor byed na// thugs rje chen po gang la gdags// e ma'o/
325a4(tsha): / rab tu mya ngan 'das// e ma'o byung sems pad+mo'i rdzing // e mra'o brjod bral ku mu ta// e ma'o me tog 'bras bcas shing // 'di dag dkyil 'khor rnam
325a5(tsha): dag pas// rigs mchog mtshan nyid yon ta na gnas// dus 'dir dag par ma mdzad na// thugs rje chen po ga nga la gdwags// 'di dag skal ldan gsang ba'i
325a6(tsha): snod// rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin// da lta rnam rtog ri bos non// thabs kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur pas// shugs kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir// dkyil
325a7(tsha): 'khor sna tshogs bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
325b1(tsha): las/ mdzad pa rgya chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
325b2(tsha): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings nas phyung ste sprul pa mdzad do// gru bzhi
325b3(tsha): la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rgyan tshogs kun gyis smras// rin chen nor bu 'phreng tshogs dang // ba dan dril bu 'dod lnga'i tshogs// mchod pa bla re rgyal mtshan
325b4(tsha): gdugs// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngas spras// 'khor lo re mig dgu pa la// seng ge la sogs gdan gyis spras// kA khA ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dzA dz+ha nya/ Ta tra DaD+ha
325b5(tsha): ta tha da d+ha n+sa/ pa pa ba b+ha ma ya ra la wa/ sha ShA sa hak+Sha/ ye shes ma 'dres bde chen gsal// rnam sprul phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor che// rigs mchog gzungs
325b6(tsha): kyi dram tshig dang // 'khor zhing 'dres pa'i mdangs kyis gnas// rigs kyi lung gi rgyud pa'i sku// dmar na gzhal gsum phyag drug pa// ser dkar dmar
325b7(tsha): ba'i zhal gnyis dag/ zhi mdangs chags pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dbus ma khro 'dzum brjid bag can// pad+mo rdo rje 'khor lo dang // dril bu rin chen rtse gsum
326a1(tsha): dang // rin chen 'phreng ba chu na 'phyang dang // mu tigra dong shal dpu rgyan smras// stod g.yog smad dkris na bza' klubs// dbu rgyan snyan cha
326a2(tsha): sor gdub sogs// mtshan bzang dpe byad mdzes pas brgyan// rigs kyi mchod pas dbu skra bsil// rang 'od btsun mo'i sku bcas pa// phyung na phyogs bcu
326a3(tsha): sngags kyis smras// T+Ta b+h+yaHdz+dza/ oMr+thar+d+ha ts+tshid+ha rdza skabs mad+h+ye/ mdzad pa'i 'byin las rdzogs byas nas// sgyur 'odus padrug pa hU~M la tha/
326a4(tsha): durnam snang phyag rgya che// gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa// 'khor lo rtse gsum be con dang // pad+mo ral gri b+han+d+ha 'dzin// g+ho ru rin chen 'byung ldan nyid/
326a5(tsha): mthing kha zhal gsum phyag drug la// rin chen pad+mo gri gug dang // tI shUl bum pa rtse gsum 'dzin// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas sku// dmar po zhal gsum
326a6(tsha): phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rtse gsum pad+mo dang // dgra sta 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// byang du don yod grub pa nyid// ljang khu zhal gsum phyag drug la// ral gri rdo
326a7(tsha): rje dbyug pa mdung // rdo rje rtse gsum gshin rje'i rkang // kun gyi g.yas dkar g.yon pa ni// dmar ldang ser dang le brgan mdog/ rang gi btsun mos mgul
326b1(tsha): nas 'khyud// zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag po ltar// sku mdog gsal ba'i mdangs dang ldan// rgyan dang cha lugs kun gyis mdzes// o dzi na dzig/ la de shwa ra ri/
326b2(tsha): swa rat+na d+hika/ ma mo ha ra ting / aM a ro li ka/ pyaM ra ga rA ti/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+rig/ raM badz+ra ra ti hUM phaT swA hA/ 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs bcas pas// rigs kyi dkyil
326b3(tsha): 'khor gsal bar mdzad// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyi// dgyes pa'i skyil krung tshul gyis bzhugs// khyams kyi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su//
326b4(tsha): sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// thugs kyi ye shesa? yi ge las// rang gis gsang sngags dag gis 'don// sa snying dkar se ra rin chen 'dzin//
326b5(tsha): nam snying mthing kha ral gri 'dzin// spyan ras dmar skya pad+mo 'dzin// gsang bdag ljang skya rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa sa pad+mo yu ba can// bsnyems pa'i tshul
326b6(tsha): kyis phyogs su 'dud// sgeg mo 'phreng dang gar dang dbyangs// dkar ser dmar ljang 'od gsal mdog/ me long rin chen 'phreng ba dang // dbyangs snyan gar
326b7(tsha): stabs mdzes pa'i tshul// oM k+Shi hI rA dza ya/ hUM lA sa sa ma ya staM/ tra a ga ra b+ha ya/ traM mA le sa ma ya ho/ hri pad pa rnam/ hri gi ra ti ra ho ya s+t+r-i/ dza ku
327a1(tsha): ru pa ni traM A nir ti rA ga ya mi hUM phaT/ byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel mthing kha 'khor lo ste// 'jam dpal dmar
327a2(tsha): skya ut+pa la// kun bzang ljang ser rin chen snying // g.yon pa pad+ma'i lcug ma 'dzin// sems dpa'i stabs kyis gdan la gnas// bdug spos me tog 'thor ba
327a3(tsha): dang // gsal me dri chab lha mo rnams// dkar sar dmar ljang go rim bzhin// mtshan dang mthun pa'i grangs kyis mdzes// o me d+ha ra ni/ dza d+hA pa pra be sha/ thim ni
327a4(tsha): sa ra ma b+ha ya/ hUM pu Sh+pa A be sha/ hUM s+pha ra dza ya/ ba ma rI pa su khI ni/ mu sha ri rA dza ya/ ho gan+te tsit+ta ya hUM phaT/ sha ra skor ga shin rje gshed chon ni// mthing nag be
327a5(tsha): con rtse gsum 'phreng // lho sgor stobs chen ser skya mdangs// rdo rje zhags pa rin chen rtse// nub sgor rta mchog 'jigs byed rgyal// thod sbrul rdo rje lu gu rgyud// byang sgor
327a6(tsha): bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// ljang skya rdo rje rtse gsum mdung // khro bo'i cha lugs rnga ma brjid dang // dur khrod rol pa'i chas kyis brgyan// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog
327a7(tsha): dril// spyan dmar 'jigs byed 'od phung dang // rdo rje mche gtsigs khro gnyer can// yab yum 'khril bas brkyang bskum sku// hUM phaT ru lu'i gsung 'don cing // las
327b1(tsha): kyi 'khor lo gnon pa'i tshul// o hUM ya man ta krid phaT dza/ badz+ra kro ti shA ri/ hUM pradz+nyA na ta krid phaT/ hU rat+na kro ti shwa ri/ hUM pad+mA na ta krid hU phaT/ baM pad+ma kro ti shwa ri/ hU
327b2(tsha): big+ha nAn ta krid phaT/ ho karma kro ti shwa ri hU phaT swA hA/ phyi nang med par dkyil 'khor che// thugs rje ye shes che las sprul// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab cing // dbu la
327b3(tsha): rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// 'od phung sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // tshangs sogs lha chen brgyad rnams dgug/ rdo rje brjid
327b4(tsha): gnon sngags kyi mthus// de dag dran pa med par 'gyur// mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis bsgral byas te// dug gsum phung po bso bar mdzad// 'phrin las khro bo'i brjid
327b5(tsha): glu yis// lha chen 'khor rnams dbang du bsdus// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhag byas nas// snga ma'i sha rus rnams nas bAton// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis//
327b6(tsha): lha chen rnams kyis slar lus gso// 'khor bcas gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing // rdo rje 'chang gi gral bkod de// dam tshig gsang ba'i brda ba sgo zhing // 'phrin las
327b7(tsha): bka' nyan gnyer gtad de// gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du bzhag/ kun gyis tshig dpyangs mthun pa'i sgo// dam tshig ma nyams srog snying phul// oM na mo g+ha na nu/ b+hi ha
328a1(tsha): ra ma hA b+hai ri brah+ma/ tsakra ma hA de bas ma ya ti sa me nar kan hU phaT/ gang gis gsang ba'i dam tshig las// 'das na dum bur chad 'gyur zhing /
328a2(tsha): 'jigs byed 'bar bas sgrol ba dang // dman par nyam thag myong bar 'gyur// zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba
328a3(tsha): dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas pad+mo chags pa'i skus/
328a4(tsha): gsung gi gzi madrangs rgyas mdzad de// phyag rgya'i rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas// gser mig 'dab bzang grong khyer dang // lang ka'i gnas tshogs srin po ste// klu rgyal
328a5(tsha): dbang du bya ba'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul kun ston 'khor lo yis// lto 'phye la sogs 'dul bar dgongs// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs nas// pad+ma rta mchog sprul par
328a6(tsha): mdzad// de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug las// sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi yab// rdo rje 'dzin pa thub dbang nyid// rigs gnyis brgyud pa'i lung las grub
328a7(tsha): sku mdog pad+ma rA ga'i mdog/ zhal gsum rta mgo ljang khu can// phyag ni gri gug kha TA ga/ thod pa sbrul zhags me dpung rnga// gnas brgyad klu rgyal thod 'phreng dang // glang
328b1(tsha): chen stag gi pags pa gon// sgra skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrog/ sgeg la sogs pa'i cha lugs can// drang srong khros pa'i cha lugs kyis// klu yi 'gro ba rmongs mdzad pa/
328b2(tsha): pad+ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum gyis// yum chen lha mo dag dang sbyor// oM pad+mo ku ru ha he ru lu hUM phaT/ 'khor lo 'brar ba'i phyogs mtshams su// ye shes khro bo chen po
328b3(tsha): brgyad// hri las grub pa'i 'jigs gzugs can// rta mgo ljang lus brjid pa'o// shar du pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni// dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o// rdo rje pad+mo rlung
328b4(tsha): zhags dang // rin chen dbyug pa ral gri mdung // seng ge rgyal mo'i sku dang 'khril// sna tshogs mi thung zhabs kyis gnon// nyi ma zla ba'i snyan chas brgyan// sbrul gyi
328b5(tsha): 'phreng bas gnas kun brgyan// lho ru brji de drag rgyal po ni// mdog nag ral gri rtse gsum rnga// rdo rje rtse gsum mda' dang gzhu// drag mo gnas kyi sku dang 'khril//
328b6(tsha): me re 'bar bas kun tu khyab// stag mo bcings pas gzhan gnas 'jigs// sprul pa'i pho nya ma dpung gi/ khro bo me rlung dkyil 'khor thogs// nub tu rdo rje rab mchog
328b7(tsha): dmar ser rdo rje dbyug pa gri// 'khor lo sbrul zhags ma glog chu// lha mo 'jigs byed zhabs kyis gnon// 'od mangs glog gi 'phreng ba can// sprul pa'i pho nya lce sbyang
329a1(tsha): gdong // 'bum phrag gri dang thod khrag 'dzin// byang du 'od 'jigs chen po'i sku// ljang khu rtse gsum mda' bo che// nor bu lcags kyu mdung kha Ta/
329a2(tsha): raro mig dmar zhabs kyis gnon// rgyal bdag khro mo'i sku dang 'khril// cod pan klu mgo'i gdengs ka can// dus mtshungs phud kyi sgra chen sgrog/ kun kyang thod 'phreng
329a3(tsha): g.yang gzhi dang // dur khrod gnas phyung gtsang sme med// mtshams kyi khro bo chen po bzhi// rigs kyi phyed gzugs thig les mtshan// zhal gsum phyag drug 'od ma dngas
329a4(tsha): can// rdo rje thod dbyig klu yi sgra// lho spyang bya khyung gnam lcags sprin// 'odra 'phreng ne'u le dbyug gu'i rgyun// rnam 'phrul grub thabs un d+ha rA// 'dod yon lha mo
329a5(tsha): tshogs kyis bskor// kun tu spyan dmar rdo rje'i mtshon// gnas gsum 'jig pa'i hUM sgra sgrog/ klu yi rgyal po'i gnas la zhugs// gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'joms par
329a6(tsha): byed/ oM ma hA ha ya grib pad+ma du ru nam b+hin d+ha ha ra ha ra hU phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM nA mo mu da ta ma he he ru ru kam pa mu kha A kAr sha ya rag sha na ga gu ru hUM phaT/
329a7(tsha): snying po'i sngags so// oM pad+ma rag sha ma ma ma ku ru bin ka ma ru lu ru lu hU phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru// lcags kyu lcags sgrog zhags
329b1(tsha): pa rnams// dkar dmar ser ljang 'od mdangs 'tsher// seng ge lce spyang stag 'brug dang // mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas// rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dag
329b2(tsha): 'jigs pa'i cha lugs rnga ma gzugs gnas// las mdzad klu yi dkyil 'khor 'dul// klu chen brgyad sogs bsdus byas nas// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byas//
329b3(tsha): rang gi dam tshig dran pa'i shugs// sngags rnams spyan sngar 'don par byed// oM na ga dris me g+ha na ra sa ma ya hUM/ dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur nas// 'od
329b4(tsha): gsal gzi mdangs me lta bu// rigs kyis dbu brgyan gsal byas te// ye shes gsal ba'i 'od mchog gnas// dkyil 'khor gsang bar sgom shugs kyis//
329b5(tsha): tshul 'dzin dkon mchog mngon du byed// tshogs rnams ma lus mgrin gcig tu// gar dbang sgyul skyabs gsol zhing // 'dod yon gsol 'debs dam bcas
329b6(tsha): pras/ bsod nams phung po'i gter la spyod// kye ma dkyil 'khor ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor gnas las grol mdzad// rgyal ba'i thugs rje dpe bral ba/
329b7(tsha): nyi 'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas// bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs// da lha thugs rje'i byin gyis rnyed// rnal 'byor gsang ba 'dzin byed kyis// ji ltar bsgo ba'i
330a1(tsha): bka' bzhin bgyi// rdo rje gsang ba'i don 'di las// gal te 'das na nyams par shog/ ces so// ces dam bcas so// de bzhin gshegs pa
330a2(tsha): thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//
330a3(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan pad+ma'i skus// yum la chags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis// bka' yis bsgo bas dgyes mdzad de// mi shigs ting 'dzin la gnas mdza
330a4(tsha): phyogs skyong dri za rgyal chen po// rang gi chung ma tshogs bcas pas// gnas gzhan 'jigs par mdzad pa dag/ rang gi mthu bcas 'dul bar mdzad// sku ni pre
330a5(tsha): DUr 'tsher ba'i madrangs// zhal gsum phyag rgya drug gi rol// rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lkug/ 'khor lo'i 'phreng ba ma ga ta// rgyan 'phreng cha lugs rin
330a6(tsha): chen 'phreng // dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo// dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du bzhugs// 'dra 'phreng sdug pa'i sems dpa' 'phro// rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan rin
330a7(tsha): chen 'phreng // phyag rgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo khang rta babs brgyan// bar khyams 'khor lo'i dbus gdan gyi/
