330b1(tsha): pad+ma'i lte bar skyil krung bzhugs// shar du 'jigs byed rdo rje'i sku// dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lho ru rin chen blo gros sku// dpal be'u gdugs mdzes 'od
330b2(tsha): mang ser// nub tu chos kyi rgyal ba tog/ dkar dmar pad+mo glegs pa ma 'dzin// byang du 'jig rten kun grol ba// ljang skya rdo rje rgya gram gri/ shar lho dra ba'i dbang phyug
330b3(tsha): ni/ ser skya rin chen zing dgar// lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog/ rtse gsum pad+ma'i lcug ma 'dzin// nub byang rgyal ba me shes tog/ rdza s+ya seng ge bum pa 'dzin
330b4(tsha): byang shar sgyu 'phrul rdo rje brtsegs// ljang ser sprin phung rdo rje mtshan// 'di dag 'khor lo sgyur rgyal bzhin// mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs brgyan// skyes bu chen po'i
330b5(tsha): longs spyod 'phel// cha mthun yum dang 'khril bar bzhugs// oM bid+yA dz+nyA na sam b+ho ga ta hU pha Ta/ oM d+harma mu ni na sa na hU/ o b+hi ha ra pra mo ta na hU phaT oM dz+nyA na so tra
330b6(tsha): sam b+ho ga ya hUM phaT/ oM rad nA ma rud te ha sa gum hU phaTu/ oM ma ma shu d+hi bi mu sa mo ha hU phaT/ oM bud+d+ha bud d+ha sa d+ya na ku ma ra hU phaT/ oM na ma ga ga na sid ta yo ga hUM phaT/
330b7(tsha): oM ni sa sa ha he he ru mu ga b+ha ba'i hUM phaT/ 'khor lo'i gsang sngags brjod byas pas// lha rnams phyi yi gnas su spro// drag po rgyu 'bras skyong byas te// gnas kun
331a1(tsha): dag pas ye shes che// rigs mchog ye shes 'od gsal bas// shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs// gnas mgon skyabs gnas dbang du mdza/
331a2(tsha): nyon mongs las kyi dregs pa'i tshogs// rang rgyud zhi nas byang sems bcas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod// snying po mdongs gsol phul bar gyur//
331a3(tsha): trag sha ka sa b+ha ra ma ma sa hU hU swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis rlab tu gsol/ bstan pa myur du spel zhing rgya chen po'i sngags kyis thams
331a4(tsha): cad bsrung bar 'gyur ba/ bde legs su gnas pas bdag cag dus thams cad du dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing / de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung bar bya ba dang
331a5(tsha): bran bzhin gnas par bgyi'o// slar yang bdag cag rnams mgon pos bzhes la byin gyis brlabs te/ dbang bskur ba dang grol bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes gsol
331a6(tsha): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i snying po 'di byin gyis brlabs so// oM U a mr-i ta bi gra dz+nyA na shud d+ha swA hA/ zhes gsungs pas/ de dag drang po'i
331a7(tsha): sangs rgyas shin tu 'od zer dang bcas par gyur nas/ gzhal yas khang gi brgyan du 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba//
331b1(tsha): dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ thugs ye shes sems dpa' dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bde byed
331b2(tsha): gar gyi dbang // pad+mo 'tshogs pa'i sku chen pos// yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs nas// mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas gshin
331b3(tsha): rje rnams// rgyal po rgyal chen rgyal mor gnas// 'khor bcas bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro chen mo'i tshogs 'phrul mdzad// thabs dang shes rab
331b4(tsha): gnyis med las// gzi ldan ga rA gyi dbang phyug mA// pad+ma ra ga nam mkha'i sku// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi ste// pad+ma'i sdong po bdud rtsi'i snod// rdo rje kha
331b5(tsha): Ta zhags pa thogs// rin chan 'phreng bas brgyan gyis klubs// khro ba zhad 'dzeg sa mdangs tshul kha dzan cing // brkyang ba sku ma zhing mchog nyi ma khi dkyil//
331b6(tsha): gi yang gzhi rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba sa brgyan// oM ma hA pad+ma kro ting shA ri hUM phaT/ dpal gyi lha mo mchog brgyad dag/ aM las 'phrul te phyogs dang mtshams// pad+ma'i
331b7(tsha): gdan la zhing gis brgyan// brkyang bsku ma sku mdog sngon mo'i tshogs// phyag na gri khug thod pa khrag/ 'bar ba'i cha lugs sgra 'bar ba// phyi rol sprul pa'i tshogs
332a1(tsha): bcas pas// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su rol// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // las dang sgyu 'phrul mkha' la bzhad// sna tshogs sgyu ma
332a2(tsha): bzhin rgyas spyan// kha dog phyogs mtshams ji lta bur// gsal zhing mun pa'i rdul gyis gos// zhing gi dbyug pa rtse gsum dang // gser gyi mda' gzhu rje rje'i
332a3(tsha): / chu srin rgyal mtshan zhags pa dang // zhing can rdo rje rtse dgu sngangs// gri khug rgyu ma'i zhags pa bsdog/ rdo rje sngangs pa rtse gsum khrag/ zhing che na khong phyes snying 'dren
332a4(tsha): cing // de bzhin rlung ya ba thod pa'i chang // oM badz+ra DA kaM ma hA hu la hri ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki me da ra hU phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki kum pa ya hUM phaT/
332a5(tsha): oM badz+ra DA ki ni he b+he sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki b+hi la sa hU phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki b+hI ma kun ha ma la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ phyi rol pad+ma'i Shadab ma la/
332a6(tsha): seng ge stag dang lce s+yA ng+ra wa// bya rgod kang ka bya rog 'ug/ mgo brnyan mche ga shog chen po brgyad// haM las 'phrul te mdog dmar mo// phyag na gri khug thod pa
332a7(tsha): thogs// rdo rje ral gr-i rtse gsum thogs// khakhor lo dgra s+tha be con mda'// ga tu na shi zhing khog ga yang gzhi sprul// ne 'u le gzhong pa rin chen khyung // zhal
332b1(tsha): mdangs so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin// kun kyang khro bcas rngam pas gnas// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi thod 'phreng sbrul// khrag zhags sbal pa'i tshom bus
332b2(tsha): brgyun/ mkha' 'gro rigs mthun sprul pa'i tshogs// mcheg shog 'bar ba phyogs bcur 'khrugs// oM sel ba ran hUM phaT/ oM nir de sha b+h+ra mu kha hUM phaT/
332b3(tsha): oM ku ma b+huM du na du hUM phaT/ oM u kaR+Sha sha na ma hUM phaT/ oM su r+yas mo ga hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sneg sha bruM hUM phaT/ oM ni sha ku r+ya rar+thaM hUM phaT/ oM re lam su bag
332b4(tsha): shA hUM phaT/ mkha' 'gro bcu drug 'di dag kyang // 'od 'bar glog gi 'phreng ba can// DA ki ru lu sgra 'byin cing // spyan myur khro gnyer mche ba can// zhal
332b5(tsha): gcig phyag bzhi rol pa'i stabs// dbyings dang ye shes rang brtags las// so so'i las rnams mdzad pa'i phyag/ zhal dang sku gnyis so so'i mdog/
332b6(tsha): oM ru lu sa na ta 'gu ra ma g+he ta sa mo ra ga hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so// badz+ra DA ki dzA la shaM ba ra/ ku ma ra hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// au DA ki hUM sa ma pa ra
332b7(tsha): lam su kha ma maHhUM phaT/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor spros pa'i mthus// de dag dran pa med par brgyal// slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus//
333a1(tsha): dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por bkod// de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bcas pas// gdul bya rnams kyis mna' dor nas// rgyal ba'i
333a2(tsha): bstan pa srung byed cing // rdo rje theg pa spyod par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
333a3(tsha): las mkha' 'gro 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso// gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs/
333a4(tsha): gzi ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sprul pa yis// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs nas// phyogs kyi bgegs tshogs 'dul byed pa'i/
333a5(tsha): khams gsum gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gnas// rin chen 'bar ba'i khang bzang na// rin chen pad+ma se ngage'i gdan// dri
333a6(tsha): med zla rgyas spras pa la// dbus kyi lha mchog chen po ni// zhal brgyad phyag ni bcu drug pa// dmar ser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// sgeg la sogs pa'i tshul
333a7(tsha): dang ldan// pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dril// thod pa rin chen dgra sta ras// yum chen dbang phyug sgeg mo dang // rgyan tshogs rin chen 'phreng ba bcas// dri med
333b1(tsha): pad+mo rab klubs pas// oM b+ha ga wa te du rug sa b+ho ga ta ya hUM phaT/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' na// dkar ser rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.yas su rim chenA sems
333b2(tsha): dpa' ste// ser po 'khor lo rin chen thogs// rgyab tu pad+ma'i sems dpa' nyid// dkar dmar rtse gsum bum pa thogs// g.yon du las kyi sems dpa' nyid//
333b3(tsha): ljang se ra ral gri tri shu la// oM badz+ra satwa phruM phaT/ oM rad na satwa hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma satwa hUM phaT/ oM karma satwa hUM phaT/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse bzhi la// yum
333b4(tsha): dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis 'khod// phyi rol pad+ma'i rim bdun na// bde gshegs yab yum gnyis stong tshogs// bde gshegs rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+mo rgya
333b5(tsha): gram sna tshogs mdog/ sku mdog pad+ma rA ga dang // in+ta la sngogs rin chen bdun// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pa da// ral gri rtse drug mdzod bum pa// lcug ma
333b6(tsha): dril bu glegs bam dang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'phreng ba 'dzin// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rin chen rgyun 'phreng 'od mdangs bcas// phyag mtshan
333b7(tsha): gri khug thod pa dang // pad+ma'i 'phreng ba rtse gsum bsnams// lhag ma'i phyag bzhis 'dzin par mdzad// dang po rang rtags phyag rgya bsnams// oM badz+ra du kaM
334a1(tsha): sri she ka t+ya kum drig ma hris bu ga ta hUM pra mo ta hUM phaT swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi'o// oM badz+ra pad+mo yo ga ha se ra la su
334a2(tsha): sta ma hU phaT/ rin po che'i rigs rnams kyi'o// oM pad+ma bru sid+d+hi haM he he mu ma sa ba ri hUM phaT/ pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyi'o// o ka ra ma b+h+yo hUM hUM rak+Sha mu ru sa hUM
334a3(tsha): phaT/ las kyi rigs kyi'o// o badz+ra tsakra bru ma sid ta yo gi shA ri hUM/ 'kho ra lo'i rigs rnams kyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa dag/ phyogs rnams
334a4(tsha): kun tu spros byas pas// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya yis// phyogs kyi rgyal po'i gdon rnams 'gugs// skrag cing bred pa'i sgra 'bod cing // so so'i rigs byed
334a5(tsha): 'khrugs pa dag/ rdo rjegasang ba' sA gas kyis gzar// zade ma tshwa gi rjes su dran// srog gi skasnying po 'bul bar byed// rdo rjegs nga ba' dam tsug gis//
334a6(tsha): dbang bskar byin pa rlabs rdzogs byas nas// dkyil 'khor gsang ba' gnas su 'khod// gsang ba khadzan pa'i man 'dor nas// rang nyid lus su gnas
334a7(tsha): byas te/ gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du bzhag/ de dag gi snying po ni/ o sa ma mu da ra dzi na su tra b+ha wa si tisni sha hUM b+h+yAM/ zhes pa'o// slar yang gsol ba'i
334b1(tsha): sngags ni/ oM su me ge tAM saM myag he he ru ru sa las haM dzi hUM phaT/ lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni/ oM sar+b+ba sang kar brum nag k+Sha saM me bram mu rak+Sha hUM/
334b2(tsha): zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rtsa mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ khams gsum gnon pa'i le'u ste
334b3(tsha): bcu drug pa'o// // de nas pad+ma gar dbang skus// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus mdzad nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprul byas te//
334b4(tsha): gnod sbyin grul bum 'dul bar mdzad// gzhal yas mthing nag gru gsum pa// dbus su 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan// dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/ dur khrod che
334b5(tsha): po'i rgyan gyis brgya na// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ste// sku mdogang+ga rA ga'i mdangs// rtse gsum gtun shing ral gri dang // pad+ma zhags pa thod rnga 'dzin//
334b6(tsha): glang chen ko ba thod 'phreng sbrul// yum dang zhal sbyor 'khril ba'i tshul// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// yi ge las 'khrul khro bo brgyad// shar du rnam rgyal mdog
334b7(tsha): dkar sngo// zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje mdung // 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri me 'od kyis mtshan pa// lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni// sngon gzhal gsum
335a1(tsha): phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rin chen ne'u le dang // rtse gsum me dpung thod rnga 'dzin// nub tu rta mchog 'khor lo'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug
335a2(tsha): dmar skya'i mdog/ 'khor lo sdigs mdzub rtse gsum dang // ral gri thod pa Da ma ru// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// ljang sngon zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rgya gram gri
335a3(tsha): gug pad+ma dang // be con rtse gsum seng ge 'dzin// shar lho dbyig pa sngon po ni// sngo skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dbyig pa 'khor lo pad+ma dang // rnga yab ba dan dril bu
335a4(tsha): 'dzin// lho nub mi ga yo mgon po'i sku// zhal gsum ser skya phyag drug pa// rin chen ral gri gtun shing 'dzan// pad+ma thod khrag mdung rtse gsum// nub bya nga 'dod//
335a5(tsha): pa'i rgyal po ni// dmar skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rdo rje dbyig pa'i rin chen bum// thod pa bdud rtsi snying 'dzin pa// byang shar stobs chen dud kha'i mdog
335a6(tsha): zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mdangs// rdo rje rtse gsum bam chen khog/ sna tshogs rdo rje ba dan khrag/ 'jigs pa'i cha lugs khro 'phreng dang // gyad kyi dor
335a7(tsha): stabs rol pa'i stabs// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya man ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mri ta kun Da li hUM phaT/ oM
335b1(tsha): badz+ra kro d+ha nI la da Na Da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Tak+ki rA dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM phaT/ phyogs skyong rgyal po gnod sbyin dang /
335b2(tsha): grul bum tshogs rnams dbang bsdus te// gsang sngags drag pos bsgral byas te// slar gso ye shes lus su gyur// dkyil 'khor gsung bar dbang bskur zhing //
335b3(tsha): dam tshig la bzhag dkyil 'khor tshul// kun gyis srog snying phul ba ni// dam tshig chen pos byin brlabs mdzad// slar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags// 'khor rnams
335b4(tsha): kun la sbyin par mdzad// o tr-i ka raM mu da sin ba mu ka hUM phaT/ oM A hUM badz+ra su ga ta ba mo ga tra a la la hUM phaT/ lha rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni// rdo rje gsang ba
335b5(tsha): gsum las byung // rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po'i sku// khams gsum dus gcig dbang bskur bas// 'khor ba'i chos las rgyal byed cing // byang chub sems kyi de
335b6(tsha): nyid gas la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa 'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ khro bo 'phrin las rol pa'i lekhu ste/
335b7(tsha): bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang skus// gzi brjid rol pa'i rgyan bkod cing // lha min grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir// yum/
336a1(tsha): kyi rdzu sgyul par ma nga// ro sma kyings 'phrul pa'i gnas pazang sats+tsha// rgyal ba'i rang bzhin rnyi chen b+hUg/ rdzu gi sangs
336a2(tsha): bcas// rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis brgyan// dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdun bzhugs pa// gnyis med rol prAs yus kyi sgra// mdog du mar rgyan dang tshangs chen gzugs
336a3(tsha): la cig ga pa'i mangs pa'i mangs// la su khrig 'arji dang // rin nA nA 'byur ba rtse dgu 'din// napad+ma'i 'phreng btsas/ khyod ldaldan papa
336a4(tsha): krung grubs// oM pad+ma rag pan mu sha rag tas mo ga ta hU phaT/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su// pad+ma dbyings phyug gsal ba mo// rin chen 'bring ba klu ma na
336a5(tsha): dkar dmar ser dang ljang khu'i mdog/ rdor gsum pad+mo rba ba dang // na ra si ha'i sdod chen tshags// rang gi dkyil 'khor mdzan zhing // sna chags bad+ma'i gdan la
336a6(tsha): oM can te hU~M saT+Ta/ oMdr-i ni N+ya nu baT/ oM shrI sha badz+ra saM zug paT/ oM bits+tsha swAd te d+hU ban+d+ha/ mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dub ma la// de bzhin bde bskyed
336a7(tsha): yumatshon bani// spyan migs dkar lha mo dang // drab mo dang glog 'gyu rgyal// dam tshig smon ma sa sA ki/ gshog can bya dang 'dod pa mo// dkar ser dmar rgya
336b1(tsha): sangs dang // ljang khu'i mdog tu legs bzhugs nas// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // ut+pal ljang khu legs mdzad pa'o// oM pu ta su no tsa kru hU phaT/ oM s+ya b+ho ga ta
336b2(tsha): su te bya hUM phaT/ oM ma ma ki bruM he he hUM hUM phaT/ o ta re ga ga na a ma la hU phaT/ phyogs rnams kun tu mkha' khyab pa// til gang bzhin du ga nas gyur pa// ma mo
336b3(tsha): gshi ni rje'i tshogs rnams kun// 'khrugs rnga ma rod rod por gyur nas// thugs rje can la skyabs su gsol// srog gi snying po 'bul bar byed// de nas dkyil
336b4(tsha): 'khor bsdu byas te// rang gi gnas su dbang bskur zhing // dam tshig dga' ba'i sdom pas bsnyen// bde gshegs ye shes gsal bar gyur// kun gyis mthun
336b5(tsha): bapar khas blangs te// dam tshig bzung zhing rnal 'byor skyong // oM ma ma rag ta ya sU ti i dam sa bud+d+ha hUM phaT/ o trag sha ra la ra la si bad ra Ta phaT/ ma mo dang/
336b6(tsha): 'byung po rnams kyi snying po'o// oM yu me sid du ru du ru du hU phaT/ gra nod byed rnams kyi'o// o a hU yo ka bri ku me ha sa ha sa hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ slar gso zhing byin
336b7(tsha): gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ rin chen dbyings
337a1(tsha): kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dab 'phyug nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas
337a2(tsha): thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// sa 'ogs stengs sa bla rnams// 'joms pa gza' dang rgyu skar rnams// bdud dang de rigs 'khor
337a3(tsha): tshogs kun// 'dul bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms bzhugs 'khor lo 'phrul par mdzad// thabs dang shes rab 'phrul byas pa'i// 'od zer gsal
337a4(tsha): bas stong gsumu gang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sgo bzhi rta babs 'phreng mdzes brgyan// 'khor lo rim gsum gdan dang bcas// rdo rje
337a5(tsha): pad+ma rin chen gyi// khor yug seng ge glang chen mchog/ nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad+ma'o// dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje rinra//
337a6(tsha): pad+ma ral gri 'dzan par mdzad// dmar ser kun tu rgyu ba ni// ljang sgyu pad+ma dril bus 'khyud// mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan 'phreng klu bas// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu
337a7(tsha): rgyan dang // phyag rgya bzhi yis mdzes byas pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo 'i rtsibs rnams la// rigs kyi sems dpa' nyi shu bzhi// dkar dang da mar dang ser ba'i mdangs
337b1(tsha): rdo rje dril bu pad+ma sbom// 'khor lo rin chen snye ma bsnams// dang po'i phyag gnyis mtshan byas shing // lhag mas gri khug thod pa thogs// khro zhing sems dpa'i
337b2(tsha): cha lugs kyis// rgyan 'phreng rigs kyi bdug po gsum// rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyan gyis klubs// oM badz+ra satwa klod+h+we he he ru lu hU phaT/ rdo rje rigs kyi'o// oM
337b3(tsha): pad+ma te sho satwa nA mra ku ru ku ru hU phaT/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// oM i ku ri tsakra b+han d+h+ya b+han d+ha saM ti phaT/ d+h+ya k+Sho b+haM shwa ri hU phaT/ de bzhin
337b4(tsha): gshegs pa'i rigs rnams kyi'o// sgo bzhir mdzes gzugs khro bo dag/ mi thung blo gros dpal chen mo// ye shes mkha' dbyings bzhi rnams te// dkar
337b5(tsha): ser dmar ljang rim pa bzhin// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bus mtshan pa'i phyag/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ pA sha hUM/ swo Ta ba/ g+han+d+he
337b6(tsha): ho hUM phaT/ dgug gzhug 'ching ba'i las dag dang // dbab pa'i tshogs mnyes par byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs kyi
337b7(tsha): dkyil 'khor 'dus// rigs gsum sems dpa'i khro bo dag/ 'jigs byed cha lugs rngam pa'i stabs// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// rdo rje 'joms
338a1(tsha): pa yid 'phrog byed// rdo rje rab bzang blo gros mchog/ rdo rje brtan pa g.yul las rgyal// pad+ma'i sprin chen 'brug sgra'i dbyangs// pad+ma'i blo
338a2(tsha): gsal mya ngan 'joms// pad+ma'i sdom pas ra ro myos// pad+ma'i 'od zer bdud rtsi 'od// 'khor lo brtsegs pa myur du bzlog/ 'khor lo dga' ba sbrang rtsi'i mchog
338a3(tsha): 'khor lo bsgrod dpal rtse gsum 'ching // 'khor lo rol pa dag byed stobs// 'di dag sprul pa'i tshogs bcas skus// gnas gsum po dag 'dul bar mdzad//
338a4(tsha): de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnams// gdung ba'i nga ro mchi ma shugs// sgra cher sgrogs shing sprul byas kyang // mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par gyur// dkyil 'khor
338a5(tsha): chen por skyabs gsol zhing // bstan pa bsrung bar dam bcas pa'o// de dag so so'i srog snying dang // lus sogs dad pas phul byas nas// dkyil 'khor chen
338a6(tsha): bor dbang bskur zhing // rang gnas gdan la bzhag par gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i
338a7(tsha): rgyud las/ sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dbang gi lha// pad+ma bde chen yum bcas
338b1(tsha): pas/ 'gro drug rtog rgyun gdul bya'i phyir// bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor 'phrul// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba// rin chen 'phreng tshogs 'jigs
338b2(tsha): byed brgyad// dur khrod chen po'i gnas bzhin brgyan// dbus kyi 'khor lor gdan bcas la// rigs lnga'i he ru bzhugs mdzad de// yum chen lnga dang khro bor sbyor//
338b3(tsha): kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dmar nag dkar ser ljang khu'i mdangs// rdo rje kha TA ral gri dang // tri shul zhing dbyug gtun shing bsnams// g.yas pa'i dang
338b4(tsha): po g.yon thod khrag/ bar mas gri gug pad+ma'i steng // tha ma yum dang 'khril bar bzhugs// spyan dgu sdang mig dmar po bzlog/ khro gnyer ral pa gyen du brdzes//
338b5(tsha): thod sbrul khrag drang thal bas brgyan// g.yang gzhi ri sha'i rgyan gyis mdzes// oM badz+ra shrI hau ru ka hU phaT/ badz+ra kro d+hI shwa ri hU phAT/ oM bu d+ha shi he ru ka hUM phaT/
338b6(tsha): bud \u0f7fkro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM rad na shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rad na kro d+hI shA ri hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka/ pad+ma kro d+b+ha shA rI hU~M phaT/ oM karma shrI he ru ka/ kam kro d+hI shwa ra
338b7(tsha): hUMphaT/ bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgyun// rol pas kun tu khyab mdzad// khams gsum 'gro ba rnam dge dbyings// bde ba chen por gnyis med 'gyur/
339a1(tsha): dbang bskur byin brlabs rigs kyi bskur// bskyed de dbu la bdag pos brgyan// smon 'jug g.yo ldad bskyed pa yi// lha mo bzhi dang mnyan
339a2(tsha): par sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ bde ba chen po'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// /
339a3(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid la bzhag ste bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud kyi rgyal po ma trang ru tras rang gi rdzu 'phrul
339a4(tsha): chen po bstan zhing 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs bcur rgyug cing / rigs 'dzin dang rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bar gcod byed cing bde 'gro'i badre ba thams cad rgyun bcad
339a5(tsha): pa dang / rang nyid kyi nyon mongs pa skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
339a6(tsha): nas/ rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas pa zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi 'jig rten thams cad skad cig gis gsal bar mdzad do// rgyal ba'i dbang pos stong gsum
339a7(tsha): 'dir khang bzang mdzes par byin brlabs te// rin chen ka ba'i 'phreng ba dang // gzugs mdzes la sos kun gyis spras// nyi ma zla ba rin chen khri// pad+mo
339b1(tsha): sre ge la sogs ga dan// sgo bzang khyams su bcas pa yis// rnam dag gzhal yus khang bzang sprul// de nas bcom ldan bde chen po// pad+ma gar
339b2(tsha): gyis dbang phyug skus// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs tshogs rnams// dgra' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar mdzad// bde ba chen po gnyis med mthus//
339b3(tsha): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur// yongs rdzogs gsang ba rgya chen po// dkyil 'khor rgya chen 'phrul par mdzad// dbus su pad+ma'i rigs rgyal ba// gtso bo
339b4(tsha): pad+ma rdo rje mdangs// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed rgyu// rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan dang 'khril// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su// bde gshegs rdo rje sems
339b5(tsha): dpa' mchog/ rnam snang rin 'byung don grub rnams// rin chen phyogs kyi tshon mdangs gsal// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // ral gri pad+mo pad sna tshogs// gtso
339b6(tsha): bo pad+mo'i drug mtshan can// stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g.yon// sangs rgyas spyan mdze sa ma mA ki/ dkar po dam tshig sgron ma dag/ mdog bzang brgya phrag
339b7(tsha): gtso bo bzhin// sangs rgyas ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs// thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshogs// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la// rigs kyi mtshan ma so
340a1(tsha): so'i tshul// dmar mdangs dkar dang gser gyi mdog/ nir dga' ti'i mdog 'tsher shing // pad+mo rdo rje 'khor lo can// pad mtshan dril bu
340a2(tsha): bcas pas 'dzin// g.yas nas 'khor ba'i go rims kyis// rdo rje skyil krung legs brgyan brjid// gzhan yang khro bo'i tshogs 'bar ba// phyi rol 'khor lo bar
340a3(tsha): khyams dang // sgo la sogs par 'jigs gzugs kyis// rngam pa'i mdangs bcas 'khod pa ni// 'khor tshogs yang sprul mtshon cha dang // rigs kyi sprul pas de//
340a4(tsha): byed pa'i// khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang // mkha' 'gro drag po'i tshogs bcas rnams// dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing // rigs kyi kha dog mtsho/
340a5(tsha): cha dang // 'od zer 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i tshul// gsang sngags drag po brjod mdzad pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor khro zhi'i tshogs// skad cig gsal bar rdzogs
340a6(tsha): byaswa nas// phyi yi gnas su spro byed cing // gsang sngags rgyun gyis skul bar byed// o a la la ho/ ma hA pad+ma hri da ya a a o AHhU ma hA pad+ma ku ru ha la ha
340a7(tsha): la bi sha na hU hU phaT/ stong khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// rab 'khrugs bred brgya la rmongs pa dag/ 'bar ba'i 'od kyis bder byas shing // rang gi
340b1(tsha): sangs rgyas zhing la bkod// dkyil 'khor gnas su bsu byas nas// rang gi 'khor lo mdzes byas te// dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs gyur nas// dbu la rigs
340b2(tsha): kyi bdag pos brgyan// oM padz+ra kun+na DA li hr-i da ya b+h+ri kuru han daha hUM phaT/ gsang sngags kun gyis brjod byas nas// 'jig rten gsum po bsdu ba yi// phonyardo
340b3(tsha): kI lA ya/ drag byed gtso rnams dag ring byas// de nas bcom ldan bde chen skus// sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba'i phyir// rdo rje se gol lan gsum brdabs//
340b4(tsha): dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams// ting 'dzin bsdu ba'i rdo rje la// gcig tu gnas nas 'gro la gzigs//
340b5(tsha): dregs byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams// rgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing // sangs rgyas bstan la dad mi 'gyur// log lam dngos lamangon zhen cing // mngon pa'i
340b6(tsha): rgyal mthu snyems nas// 'jig rten gsum dag phung byed na// zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// khro bo rol pa'i mdzad spyod kyis// 'dul bar gzigs nas bka'
340b7(tsha): bsgo mdzad// kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs chen dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar// da lha'i dus 'dir 'byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// log
341a1(tsha): pa'i lam du 'khrul pa ste// khro bo'i tshul du 'byung 'gyur ba// de'i tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro drag gtum par 'gyur// de ltar
341a2(tsha): gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// ma nar me da la sogs gnas ngan len// mi bzod sdug bsngal mtha' la brten// ci lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul// shin tu gti mug rmongs
341a3(tsha): pa'i tshogs// der bzhag bag chags ngan pa yis// rigs 'dzin bdun brgyud gcod byed cing // bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi mun pas
341a4(tsha): 'gro bar 'khyams// dug nad rims nad phra men ma// gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren nyid// srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig bral// ci lta bu yi thabs kyis ni//
341a5(tsha): sangs rgyas thugs rje'i rnam 'phrul bstan// nga rgyal chen por bdos pa yis// lta ba'i ri bo mthu snyams tshogs// da lha'i tshe 'dir 'byung 'gyur dag/ rgyal ba 'das
341a6(tsha): dus sbyor byed cing // ci bzhin lam las 'khrul bar byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod// mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'di dag sgrol ba'i
341a7(tsha): dus la bab// shin tu gdug cing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo laso// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i
341b1(tsha): tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// rang bzhin dag pa'i
341b2(tsha): ngo bo las// phrag dog 'khrugs pa'i rlung dag gis// 'jig rten phyin ci log tu 'khyams// ci bzhin gnas kyi lam bral bas// khams ma dang rlag pa'i lam la
341b3(tsha): zhugs/ 'jig rten 'di dag snying rje zhing // mngon zhen 'dul dka'i rmongs tshogs rnams// khro bo'i tshul gyis sbyang bar mdzod// ces bgros so// de bzhin gshegs/
341b4(tsha): pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//
341b5(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug skus// ma tra ru tra la sogs pa'i// bdud kyi tshogs bcas 'dul ba'i phyir// yum
341b6(tsha): chen bskul zhing rol mdzad de// byang chub sems sprin phyogs bcur 'phros// dkyil 'khor rnam bsdus dkyil 'khor gsal// dkyil 'khor 'dul tshogs dkyil
341b7(tsha): 'khor che// dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid sku// dgyes chags gar bcas gdan la bzhugs// zhal gsum gangs ri'i mdangs ldan pa// rdo rje 'khor lo rin
342a1(tsha): dang // pad+ma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs// rin chen rgyan tshogs dbu brgyan bcas// dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// snod
342a2(tsha): bcud dus gcig sprul par mdzad// mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun// drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor rtsibs par khyams
342a3(tsha): nyis rim ldan// kun tu zla kham sgo khyud gru bzhir bcas// rin chen 'bar ba thod sbrul rgyan dang bcas// tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la rten cing // 'jigs byed khro
342a4(tsha): bopo'i rgyun tshogs mang po grubs// nam mkha'i mtha' snyam lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten drug drang dus
342a5(tsha): bzhi'i phyogs bcun// gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba dang // drag po'i lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir// lha brgyad rol pa'i gzhal yas rmad du bting //
342a6(tsha): gti mug mun tshogs ye shes bskyed pa dang // byol song klu rnams dge la gzud pa'i phyir// klu brgyad bzung nas khang pa'i gdung du bres// 'dod khams ma lus dbang
342a7(tsha): du bsdu ba dang // phyogs mtshams srin po dregs pa gzhom pa'i phyir// rgyal chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas// sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir//
342b1(tsha): rgyal chen rigs bzhi bzung nas ka ba byas// theg pa'i khyad par gzhan las 'phags pa'i don// glang chen ka la bi nga kas ka gdan byas// glang bzhi'i mi rnams dgos
342b2(tsha): 'dod bskang ba'i phyir// gza' skar mig tshags byas pas 'gyur ldog med// 'jig rten thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// seng ge ka la sha yi ka gzhu byas//
342b3(tsha): 'khor ba'i gcong snying gtan nas sbyang ba'i phyir// seng ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'dzag/ thod rus par khyams gnam lcags gzer gyis brgyan// zhing chen bla res rnga
342b4(tsha): yab 'phan gdugs dang // thugs rje'i byang sems kun tu khyab pa'i phyir// nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyan bcas gsal bar ldan// sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye//
342b5(tsha): khro bo'i 'byung gnas tug chem sgra dang bcas// rin chen khri dang pad+ma nyi zla'i gdan// gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum ral pa can// gru bzhi rtsa la 'phags me 'jigs nyi shu brgyad//
342b6(tsha): khri rkang brgyad kyi bar khyams dag la gnas// thugs rje che bas nyi ma nyi shu brgyad// 'jigs pa spangs po'i seng ge nyi shu brgyad// sprul sku thon pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// kun
342b7(tsha): tu 'od kyi sa la rab gnas pas// rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan// dgon gnas dben par gzhan dag gis// mthong ka sbas pa'i chos nyid lung // 'phrin
343a1(tsha): las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung he ru ka/ bzhugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku// de nyid kun tu 'od kyi lung // pad+ma le
343a2(tsha): brgan phyogs bcur 'od// sangs rgyas thams cad skye bzhi'i tshul// chags par gyur pas pad+ma ste// che ba'i yon tan lung du ston// mkha' dbyings rnam dag dri med pas// ma
343a3(tsha): rlags pad+ma can gyi lung // stong nyid gsal bas zhabs gang 'phags// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen sa// thabs dang shes rab ye
343a4(tsha): bral bas// spros med dang gi zlum pa ni// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung // 'od zer gsal bar 'tsher bsla na// yang gsang sbas pas ye shes lung // 'phro 'du khyab par
343a5(tsha): gyur pa'i tshogs// shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor chen po yi//
343a6(tsha): bdag po khro bo chen po'i sku nyid du// gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya// oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri hU ma hA tsan+na sarba duSh+Ta na hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor bdag
343a7(tsha): po rnga ma brjid cha lugs dang // 'bar ba'i me 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs// dbu lnga phyogs bzhir las kyi tshul du gzigs// dbus ma mnyam nyid bde ba'i tshul
343b1(tsha): du gzigs// ral pa'i srid rtse me 'od bzhin du 'phro// smin ma khro gnyer smar sogs myur ba// lus thung sku rgyas gyad kyi cha byad la// bco lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yum rnams
343b2(tsha): gzigs// rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshog pas gtams// bcu drug rol pa'i phyag dang phyag mtshan ldan// sgeg pa'i zhal brgyad chas dang bcas par gnas// 'jig rten
343b3(tsha): gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// khro bo'i tshogs bcas 'gying bag yum bcas gnon// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna
343b4(tsha): tshogs ston// rang gi zhing sbyong drag po'i gnas 'dul zhing // thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che la bkod// phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis//
343b5(tsha): yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bskyed par mdzad// gnas su nyi zla pad dkyil zla ba la// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra
343b6(tsha): swa b+ha ba ad ma ko ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ad ma ko ha/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ang+ga ma ko ha/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la/
343b7(tsha): mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo khams brgyad chen mo drug/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// rigs drug mtshan ma'i cha lugs ji lta ba// bud d+ha badz+ra
344a1(tsha): o/ satwa badz+ra hUM/ rad na badz+ra traM/ d+harma badz+ra hU/ kar+m+ma badz+ra ha/ gu na badz+ra phaT/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor khyab par spros byas te// 'gro rnams
344a2(tsha): sdud la sogs pa'i khams dag byas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad+mo dang // ral gri kha T+wAM rtse gsum dril bur bcas// g.yon pa thod pa bdud rtsis bkang ba thogs// mkha'
344a3(tsha): 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// rang gi 'phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis klubs// las kyi khams brgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs// dpal chen thugs kyi
344a4(tsha): dkyil 'khor nas// long ba brgya sbrel brgyad rnams rdzogs// sku mdog mtshan ma sna tshogs la// phyag brel zangs gri thod pa thogs// oM shrI khA hi hUM/ oM shrI khA hi
344a5(tsha): tra.o shrI khA hi hri/ o shrI khA hi haM/ dmus long 'khor ba drug cu dag phyung ste// thod rus par khyams gnas su bkod par bya// oM shrI khA hi hUM/ shrI khA hI hU/
344a6(tsha): lcags kyi spyang mo brgyad rnams yang sprul bcas// ye shes sprul pa'i khro bcu rngam par 'khod// me ri sprin ltar 'thibs pa ra rol cing 'khrug/ bar khyams phyi ma'i
344a7(tsha): gnas la kun tu 'khod// oM tig ta tsakra shA na mu kha mu mor kho hUM phaT/ ku ku ra tsa yag sha hUM phaT/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dza hUM baM ho'i phyag rgya
344b1(tsha): las// mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig dang // mgo brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang // mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang // mgo gsum lag gsum rkang gsum po//
344b2(tsha): dkyil 'khor kha bar ba'i sgo bzhi ru// tshad med sprul pa'i phyag rgyas rol// de dag rol pa'i byin brlabs las// steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i// thabs
344b3(tsha): dang shes rab byang chub sems// me 'brug rlung 'brug phyag rgyar gas la// rab tu rdzogs pa 'tshul du byung // oM dzi na la to tsa rA ra ga sha ku baM dza hUM phaT/ gzhan yang
344b4(tsha): sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// bse yi lan bya dmar po dang // dur bya khrung khrung la sogs rnams// 'jigs chen rngam pa'i tshogs kyis 'khod// o ha ha ru lu/
344b5(tsha): me hA can de sha ri bi sha na ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ kun gyi rtsu ba'i sngags so// oM pad+ma ti ha he tsa kra b+h+yo hU hU hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so// oM ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ e a ra li
344b6(tsha): hUM hri dzu/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM b+h+yo e a ra li dza/ zhes brjod pas/ khro bo'i 'khor lo ma lus pa byon zhing / rang gi dkyil 'khor dang gnyis su med par gyur nas/
344b7(tsha): he ru ka chen po nyid dkyil 'khor dgu'i bdag nyid du gsal bar gnas shing / rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams dam tshig la bkod par mdzad do// de nas sprul pa khro bo'i
345a1(tsha): tshogs// ma lus rol pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bdud dang dregs byed rmongs byas shing // rang gi gnas su bsdu bar mdzad// o ru lu ru lur
345a2(tsha): dz+wa la e a ra li dzaHhUM ba ho/ a la la ho/ oM trang tu tra ha la ha la hU phaT/ dug gsum dngos po sbyang ba'i phyir// rngam pa'i khro tshogs phyogs bcur spro// khro
345a3(tsha): 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzad cing // ha he ru lu'i gsang sngags brjod// ha la'i rdo rje gad rgyangs kyis// bdud dang srin tshogs brgyal bar mdzad// oM sarba pA paM ka ra he/
345a4(tsha): tapa bi sha ma tang ru ru hUM phaT/ oM sarba pa pa he ra ba byi stA a kar sha ru tra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pA paM/ ka ra he ta pa byi sha ke tong kha ru tra hU pha Ta/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil
345a5(tsha): 'khor pho nya'i tshogs// dbang chen rdo rje tho thogs ser chen 'bebs// hU dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jigs// hUM phaTaHhUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab//
345a6(tsha): rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem// rdo rje mtshon chag nam lcags mchu 'dra bas// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// rdo rje ser chen thogs
345a7(tsha): bcas char bzhin 'khrugs// nyams pa'i snying dang dbang po thang la lhogs// ye shes rngam pa'i thugs rje a la la// oM pad+ma shri he ru ka b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ gaR+Sha gaR+Sha/
345b1(tsha): ha la ha la hUM phaT/ de nas bdud dang ru tA ra bcas// rdo rje mtshon chas sgral byas nas// 'khor gyis longs spyod rol mdzad cing // sha khrag nang
345b2(tsha): rol bdud rtsi dang // rus rkang dbang por bcas pa la// tshogs kyis longs spyod ston mor mdzad// kun gyis dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i glus// mthun par sgra dbyangs
345b3(tsha): gcig gis bstod// chos nyid rnam dag pad+mo'i rang bzhin las// thugs rje sprul pa'i thar lam byang chub sems// phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i dbu mchog
345b4(tsha): grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen lnga ye shes lnga// dpal ldan khyad par 'phags pa'i zhal gyi skyibs// dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i brda skad can// thar
345b5(tsha): la ma thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yis// ye shes byin rlabs khro rgyal 'bum du sprul// smin mdzad smon lam yun rengs las grub pa'i// dmigs pa'i mtha/
345b6(tsha): bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul// chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa yis// chags med thugs rje pad+ma'i spyan gyi tshul// sgra skad thams cad sgra las sgrol bar mdzad//
345b7(tsha): zab dang rgya chen chos kyis mtshan nyid gas na// shangs kyi rlung sgom dug gsum rtsa nas gcod// zhal gyi haM lngar 'brel bar rgyud lnga sgrol// rno dpal mche bas
346a1(tsha): skye shi rtsad nas gcod// le brgan ljags kyis gsung rab rgya mtsho 'chad// rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul bar mkhas// gshog bzhi bskyod
346a2(tsha): pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad// zhabs brgyad rol pas gzir gnon mdzad pa'i tshul// sku chen yan lag rags pas ri bo bzhin// thugs mchog ye shes stong
346a3(tsha): gi nyi ma brdal// ye shes lha mchog byin rlabs 'byung ba'i gnas// ngo mtshar rol pa khro bo kun gyi rje// dpa' bo stobs mchog lnga la phyag 'tshal bstod//
346a4(tsha): de nas bde chen dbang gi skus// 'khor la dam chog sgrog mdzad de// rdo rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs// ga sa la bar byin rlabs skyed par mdzad// o AHhUM
346a5(tsha): sarba pany+tsa a mri ra ta sa ma yo ga sid+d+hi hUM/ pa ho ka ma la su d+ha ra sa hU/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma thA kro d+ha au AHhUM/ ma hA yo ga tsat+taM ram ba ga ta ma lA kha hi kha hi hUM/ oM khA
346a6(tsha): kha le le ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM d+ha na sa ma ya a la la ho/ zhes rde tra'i glu spangs so// pad+mo'i gar mdzad do// bde ba chen po'i mchod pas tshim par gyur to// de'i
346a7(tsha): dus na bdud la sogs pa sgral ba'i tshogs rnams byang chub sems kyi bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te dbang bskur ba'i mthus/ tshogs kyi bdag po rigs 'dzin
346b1(tsha): thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar gyur nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu 'khod cing gsang ba'i dam tshig 'dzin par gyur to// de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig
346b2(tsha): gi snying po spangs nas bran du mdzad par dam bcas so// snying po brjod pa ni/ ma ma rag sha ru tra ma ma b+h+yo/ zhes pa'o// slar bsgo ba'i sngags ni/ oM ru lu ru lu
346b3(tsha): hU b+h+yo pad+ma hri d+ha ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gasdang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ tshogs
346b4(tsha): chen 'dul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gis// rig pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas// bdag
346b5(tsha): dang gnyis ma da rol pa'i thugs// khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku chen bstan// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor
346b6(tsha): dgu yi bdag nyid sku// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor rab mdzes pa'o// chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal med khang // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs lnga'i
346b7(tsha): cod pan 'dzin// rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro ma lus sgrol// rdo rje bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che// dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan// shes rab/
347a1(tsha): thabs dang mi gnyis 'du 'bral med// dus gsum gcig char sprul bas tshar gsum brgyan// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad phyir rgyan du
347a2(tsha): chetsheche/ mi gnas myang 'das gsung rab rgya mtshor sgrog/ ma sgribs ye gsal go 'phangs mdzes par mthong // mi ldog g.yul grol stobs drug 'gros su mgyogs//
347a3(tsha): gang yang thogs med byin rlabs shugs dang ldan// 'tsher skad gdangs snyan ma sring sprob bskyed// kham dmar ral pa'i dbus nas dbu byung ba// dpral bzhur po/
347a4(tsha): brjid pa'i khyad par dang // rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni// don mchog khyad par yon tan rmad du byung // ljang khu me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin no//
347a5(tsha): 'gyur med ye shes chos sku ji bzhin gsal// byams pa'i gdangs kyi khams gsum khyab par gzigs// rdog ma le brgan 'bar ba'i khyad par mchog/ stug
347a6(tsha): po bkod sogs zhing khams rab 'byams dang // rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun// zhing khams rab 'byams ma lus dbang du sdud// shes rab thabs
347a7(tsha): su 'brel ba'i rta skad ni// grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i dbyangs yin te// dang ba'i mdangs kyis rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs// gdangs skad gnyis pa ri
347b1(tsha): rab rtse la 'tsher// gsung dbyangs gdangs su snyan pa'i khyad par ni// rgyud drug smad ma'i ngan rtog thar lam ston// spyan mig glog ltar 'gyubs cher 'phags shing
347b2(tsha): sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms// 'tsher bag yid la gdungs pa'i rta skad ni// mu mtha'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad// rgyu dbyibs grangs dang gzigs
347b3(tsha): thabs rtogs pa'i don// hUM las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// gnas ni sna yi bugs rings bro ba las// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa
347b4(tsha): 'byung / shangs kyi rlung sgrom yangs pas ye shes srog/ gsang ba'i tshubs mas sdug bsngal gcong rnying sbyong // rgya cher sprul pas bag chags tshar gcod de/
347b5(tsha): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho lugs las bzlog pa yi// rigs kyi rlung gis dug lnga dbyings su sgrol// zlum dkar zangs rings rno 'deg tshems// zhal du gtar ba'i byang chub
347b6(tsha): sems/ ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol// zhi rgyas dbang sdud drag po yi// cir yang 'gyur ba'i hom khung ste// las lnga 'brel ba'i zhal zhes bya// 'khor ba'i yongs
347b7(tsha): su smin pa dang // las mang nyon mongs dbang btsan dang // dge ba mi dge lung ma bstan// de ni smin pas mdzad chen po// 'jog ldeg cir yang 'gyur ba dang // brjod
348a1(tsha): byed gnyis ka'i brtan 'gyur bas// 'char zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do// yig 'bru'i rgyu nyid bde gshegs thugs// rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin
348a2(tsha): rten// 'od kyis nyon mongs rnam rtog 'joms// rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang // yig 'brus sa bon phyag rgya dang // yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// rig pa gsum
348a3(tsha): ste lta ba dang // rgyu dang las kyi rig pa'o// de phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings// snying po phyag mtshan phra mo dag/ brtan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings// chos rnams
348a4(tsha): yi zla ba bzhin// sna tshogs snang ba rang bzhin med// dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun tu// grar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rol// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni//
348a5(tsha): khro gnyer snying 'byin kha T+wAM 'bar ba dang // rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pas rol// de bzhin lto la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi// thod rlon khrag bkang rdo rje lug gu
348a6(tsha): rgyud/ rdo rje be tsom thod rlon 'dzin pas rol// me yi zhags pa dag dang khyung gi khra// sdigs mdzub rtse la ye shes ma chen 'bar// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ni rab tu 'khrol//
348a7(tsha): rdo rje rtse dgu bsdengs dang rtse lnga dang // rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ ye nas skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston// ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni/
348b1(tsha): rin chen dra bas sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan// klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i thabs dang shes rab kyis// lte ba rnam thar sgo gsum sku gsung thugs// sprul pa sa don mdzad
348b2(tsha): dkyil 'khor thams cad ston// gsang ba'i yum bzhis sku la 'khril byed cing // byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed// rdo rje dra bas rin chen glog 'gyu ma//
348b3(tsha): khyung gshog a mo theb gshog e mo can// sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar// thabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa g.yas nas brkyang // srid gsu ma ma rig
348b4(tsha): mun pa sel byed pa'i// shes rab zla stong rtswa gnyis g.yon nas brkyang // thabs dang shes rab 'brel pas byin rlabs che// sprul pa'i 'phreng ba dus gsum rgyun
348b5(tsha): mi 'chad// sna tshogs rnam par rol pa'i rgyan zhes pa'i// 'phrin las brgyad kyi bdag nyid sku che ba'i// dpa' go stag gi steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyan// sra
348b6(tsha): mnyen lcags kyi shar lho'i zhabs brgyan te// rdo rje tshol bas lho yi phyogs brjid nas// bas khrab smug pos lho nub brkyang ba'i brgyan// sna tshogs gzil chas byang
348b7(tsha): shar mtshams su gon// mthing nag dar gyis byang phyogs zhabs mdzes shing // mche ba dmar po sa nub byang brkyang ba'i gdan// sbrul nag 'khril chas 'og phyogs
349a1(tsha): 'dul bar mdzad// khro brgyad gnan cing gzir bas zhabs 'degs shing // dung chen bcom zhing sgal tshags mnan pa dang // brang gnon lhag pa
349a2(tsha): bcom zhing 'jigs mdzad dang // 'khor nyid sku la sbas pas ye shes gsal// sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings kyi rgya// thugs rje rol pas gzhal yas khang du
349a3(tsha): bstan// 'phrin las rol pas hUM mdzad hUM gis brgyan// sa bcu gzil gnon stobs bcu'i dbang dang ldan// de bas khro bo sna tshogs rol pa yin// de nas gar gyi dbang
349a4(tsha): phyug che// dam tshig rang gi byin rlabs kyis// rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin ldag nas// yum chen gzi ldan dgyes par mdzad// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ni// mnyes mdzad
349a5(tsha): gzi ldan dbang phyug ma// ci snyed bud med sna tshogs dang // gsung gis rdo rje mi smad do// gtso bo rab tu sdug pa la// drang du smra ba gar byed pa// sgeg pa'i tshig gis
349a6(tsha): brgyan nas su// sri zhu'i sems kyi gdung ba la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i// lha mo'i tshogs rnams bsdu byas te// rang gis phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du//
349a7(tsha): gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya bzhis gdab// byang chub sems tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal// dbyings byung 'phrul tshogs bsam
349b1(tsha): yas dag/ nges pa'i ye shes rol mo sku// stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang rten//
349b2(tsha): phyogs dus dkyil 'khor thams cad na// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid mdangs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa'i// thams cad pad+ma'i rnam dag pas// cho 'phrul rnam
349b3(tsha): kun de bzhin nyid// thugs rje chags pas 'phrin las kyis// dbang drag 'phrin las snod dbyings nas// gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg/ las dang bag chags/
349b4(tsha): sgrib tshogs kun// gnas nas sreg mdzad ye shes tshogs// lhun gyis grub pas kun tu 'joms// snyigs ma lnga brgya dus kyi mtha'// srid gsum sems can
349b5(tsha): 'dul dka' bas// 'phro 'du 'khyil ba'i 'od mdangs sna tshogs pas// yud tsam cig la gnas su dag par byed// bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka'i// sku gsung thugs kyi
349b6(tsha): dkyil 'khor ni// ji ltar 'phrul zhing cir yang snang // mtshan nyid gcig tu nges med pas// sku gsu thugs 'phrul bsam mi khyab// rang bzhin las dang yon tan
349b7(tsha): gyis// byin rlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gsal// khams gsum kun las rtsal 'phang phyir// rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams gsal bas// byin rlabs 'gro la rgya chen
350a1(tsha): ston// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // sprul skus sna tshogs 'dul ba'o// tshig gri gsung dang rig pa'i gsung // don gyi gsung gis
350a2(tsha): go bar mdzad// 'jig rten mkhyen dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen// de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par ni// 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du//
350a3(tsha): rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum bstan// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing ka/ ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pa rdo rje rnge'u chung dang // mdung rtsa
350a4(tsha): gsum pa 'dzin pas rol// dril bu rgyu zhags thod rlon g.yon// bskal pa'i me ri sbrul nag dang // thod rlon 'phreng bas rgyan du bcas// sgeg pa dpa' ba 'jigs
350a5(tsha): su rung / rgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rjes rngam dang zhi ba yis// sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can// 'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal// skye ba
350a6(tsha): med pa'i chos dbyings su// mtshan ma med pa' chos bshad pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal// longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis// mi 'jigs stobs mchog
350a7(tsha): gdan stengs na// sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du// zab mo rgya chen chos mang bstan// dngos dang dngos med gsal byed pas// me long lta bu'i ye shes
350b1(tsha): so// sprul pas 'gro mang don gyi phyir// phal mangs bkod pa'i sa rnams su// dngos po mtshan ma'i rnam 'phrul gyis// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs// thams
350b2(tsha): cad mtshan med nam mkha'i dngos// de nyid sgros btags chos dang bral// kun ldan byung sems de kho na// rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med// he ru ka yi bde chen dbyings//
350b3(tsha): chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te// 'od gsal ba yi gnas 'jug pas// rnal 'byor chen po zhes byar bshad// ces gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
350b4(tsha): kyi dgongs pa bla ni med pa'i' gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dkyil 'khor dgu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// /
350b5(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan dpal gyi sku// gar gyi dbang phyug lhun grub mchog/ thugs rje brjid pa'i stobs ldan pa'i// yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir//
350b6(tsha): nam mkha'i ri mo'i phyag rgya rngom// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs rngom// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan mchog rngo ma// tsham rngam chen po'i stang stabs rngom//
350b7(tsha): sku mchog rgyan gyis brjid pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya don dang ldan pa'i sku// hom lnga 'phreng bar gyur pa'i zhal// zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags// skye shi rtsa da nas
351a1(tsha): gcod pa'i tshems// rngam pa'i 'brug ltar sgrog pa'i dbyangs// ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar tshogs bzhin// 'phrin las rgya mtsho'i rlabs tshogs
351a2(tsha): wAltar/ byin rlabs cho 'phrul sprin phung tshogs// mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam// bdud dang srin po 'joms byed rnams// khams gsum zil gyis gnon
351a3(tsha): pa'i gdan// stong khams dus gcig sgrol ba'i zhing // rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs mchog/ sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan gyis// rnga ma pa'i
351a4(tsha): brjid pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga'// sku che yan lag rags pas brjid// grangs mang rkyen dang mtshan pas brjid// bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid// khyad zhugs
351a5(tsha): bla ma yin pas brjid// gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid// tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid// don la nye tshor ston pas brjed// gsal bas mtha' gnyis
351a6(tsha): spangs pas brjid// thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid// ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjed// ma 'gag sa ler mkhyen pas brjid// med pa zad mi shes
351a7(tsha): pas brjid// gcig la 'dod dgur bsgyur bas brjid// gnod sbyin pham par mdzad pas brjid// thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid// snyems bral nyam thag
351b1(tsha): rol pas brjid// 'khor ba yun rings mgon mdzad brjid// gcig par zil gyis gnon pas brjid// bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin
351b2(tsha): las thugs// bzhi lnga sum cu drug gis brjid// dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs// sdug bsngal bde ba chen po sra gcad// dbyings drang ye shes rol pa'i
351b3(tsha): mthus// skye 'gro ma lus rgyas btab nas// rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su sbyor// rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang // 'di la skyabs su yod ma yin// srid pa gsum/
351b4(tsha): du byas nas ni// pad+ma'i phyag rgya gsal bas 'debs// thig le chos sku'i rig pa mchog/ gar gyi dbang phyug ces su bsngags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
351b5(tsha): dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ dpal rnga ma brjid bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// // de nas
351b6(tsha): 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing // mchod pa rgya chen phul byas te// 'gro la brtse ba'i sems
351b7(tsha): bcas pas// bsgrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad// bcom ldan dngos grub kun gyi bdag/ gdul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir// thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur// de bzhin
352a1(tsha): mchog gi dngos grub dag/ bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang // las kyi cho ga ji lta bur// yan lag 'tshogs par ldan byas nas// tshe 'dis
352a2(tsha): mngon du 'gyur ram ci// thabs mang chog bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan gar gyi dbang // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// ma 'ongs
352a3(tsha): 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las// ngo mtshar sprul pa 'di gsungs so// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che// rnam gsum phyag rgyal gnas pa// /
352a4(tsha): dpal gyi dngos grub sgrub pa ni// gnas bzang dag tu brtsam par bya// phyag rgya'i grogs la brten bcas nas// bzlas brjod yan lag ma nyams par// gsang sngags
352a5(tsha): yi ge bcu bzhi pa// sum 'bru ma dag tu brjod nas kyang // ro langs mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i phyir// mchog chen mtshan ldan ma nyams pa// rab brtag dur khrod gnas
352a6(tsha): nas blangs// khro bo chen po'i tshams rngam gyis// yungs kar thal ba la sogs pa// sum b+ha ni yi sngags brjod cing // yi dgas gshin rje'i tshogs bskrad bya//
352a7(tsha): de nas dri zhim sbyar ba yis// dag byed chu yis legs bkrus te// me tog 'phreng sogs rgyan gyis brgyan// gsung gi phyag rgyas byin brlabs shing // dpa' bos rang gi
352b1(tsha): khyim du blangs// glu drug dbyangs drug dang bcas pa'i// khro rgyal rol pa'i bro yis sbyang // bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga' mchog/ rgyu khyon 'dom gang khru yis
352b2(tsha): bstod/ ci bzhin pa sogs cho ga yis// rdzas dang sa gzhi dag byas shing // sta gon gnas pa'i las rdzogs nas// bsrung bzhin dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// yab yum
352b3(tsha): bsgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung ste// mchog chen dkyil 'khor mkhar gzhag nas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo legs bstan
352b4(tsha): pas/ stong nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te// dkyil 'khor mnyes sogs las rdzogs nas// ro langs 'gug cing gzhug byas te// bar chad med pa'i bzlas brjod/
352b5(tsha): bya// o ni ba ra na tAg sha ha la ha le pi mo ta ya man tra hUM phaT/ ting 'dzan khrod zer gsal ba'i rgyun// zur ma chag par brjod bya ste// 'bum tsho gcig gisA g.yo
352b6(tsha): 'gyur zhing // gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang // 'bum phrag gsum gyis sgra ston zhing // langs te kun tu lta bar byed// de'i tshe rnal 'byor dpa' bo yis//
352b7(tsha): sgra nas bzung ste bsgyel byas la// rta mchog sngags kyis dbang du bsdu// rdo rje khyung gshog phyag rgya yis// zil gnon nga rgyal bcag par bya// de dus ro de'i kha nas ni//
353a1(tsha): glog 'gyu'i lce ni lan gsum 'byung // so 'am sen mos gcod par bya// de nyid ral gri bzang por 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin
353a2(tsha): 'byung // de thog nam mkha' la song nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod byas// oM bu ru ra mu ta ya hUM phaT/ gar gyi dbang phyug nga rgyal gyis// gang 'dod
353a3(tsha): gnas su 'gro byas shing // drag byed tshogs rnams zil gnon te// brtul zhugs spyod pas glu blang zhing // brtul zhugs spyod pas bro yang brdung // ting 'dzin sngags
353a4(tsha): dang yan lag rnams// ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs te// dkyil 'khor tha mar gar byas pas// mchod pa bro glu dang bcas pa// lha rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya//
353a5(tsha): de nas brtul zhugs chen po yis// mgon la lung ka gnas pa'i bro// la sogs cho ga rdzogs byas pas// ro de gser du 'gyur ba yin// de ni mchod dang byin pa
353a6(tsha): dang / rang la dgos pa'i yo byad bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/
353a7(tsha): ro langs kyi bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing // 'khor gyis
353b1(tsha): zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas// thun mong dngos grub bzang po nyid// ma 'ongs 'gro la phan bdag phyir// rim pa bzhin du bstan pa mdzad// dbang thob dam tshig la
353b2(tsha): gnas pas// yid mthun gnas mchog bzang po ru// mig sman sbyor ba bsgrub bya ste// byin brlabs ldan pas 'gro don spyad// rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas pas//
353b3(tsha): rang gi gsang bsngags 'bum rdzogs nas// mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang // bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yis// phyag
353b4(tsha): rgyagasang sngags ting 'dzin ldan// rigs pa chen po'i bzlas brjod ni// 'bum phrag gsum du gdon par bya// oM pad+mo ma ma tsakra a la sa ra sa ta yo na hUM phaT/
353b5(tsha): dkyil 'khor gnas kyi rtags mthong nas// grong mtha'i gnas su 'gro byas te// sus kyang ma mthong mtshan mo ru// lha 'dre gtum pa'i grong du bsdad// rang gi
353b6(tsha): 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis// mi rgod gcan gzan bsrung bar bya// de ni b+han+d+ha mtshan ldan du// gzi chen me mar btang nas kyang // slar yang b+han d+ha bzang pos dag
353b7(tsha): mtshan gcig yal bar sngags bzlas shing // ting 'dzin ma nyams sbyor bar bya// skya rengs dang po shar dus su// dud pa bsdus te bcang bar bya// glu dang bro yi
354a1(tsha): brtul zhugs dang // lha rnams kun gyi stang stabs kyis// gnas de'i bdag po dbang du bsdu// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas// slar
354a2(tsha): nyid mig sman shas cig byug/ de nas 'khor gyi tshogs bsgo zhing // skye 'gro kun la gsang bar bya// pad+mo bsgrub pa'i an dza lis// ci 'dod dngos po mthong bar 'gyur//
354a3(tsha): gzhan ya 'i lu'i sgrub thabs ni// bdud rtsi lnga las byung ba yis// rdzas dang sha lnga dang bsras te// thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas// dkyil
354a4(tsha): 'khor rgyan dang ldan nas su// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// gar gyi dbang phyug skur sgom zhing // yi ge bcu bzhi'i gsang sngags kyis// 'bum phrag gsum du
354a5(tsha): bzlas byas te// mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang // bdud rtsi gong bur dril byas te// rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du// rin chen za ma tog tu gzhug/ dkyil
354a6(tsha): 'khor 'bar ba'i dbus gzhag pas// bsrung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bya zhing // rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag lnga ru brjod byas pas/
354a7(tsha): 'od zer lcags kyu 'byung bar 'gyur// oM ma hA pad+ma sa ma b+ho ta ru lu ru lu hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas ri lu de blangs te// kha 'am lag tu bzung byas nas// gang 'dod
354b1(tsha): gnas su 'gro byed cing // ci 'dod las dag grub par byed// lha yi gnas mchog nyams dga' bas// snga dro gcig gis 'khor bar nus// gzhan yang bcud len bzang
354b2(tsha): po nyid// skyes bu gang gis bsgrub 'dod pas// bdud rtsi'i rgyal po a ru ra// gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa mchog/ nyi shu rtsa gcig ra kor sla// rang sangs rgyas par
354b3(tsha): gyur pa dang // ba gcin phur mo'i thal ba dang // ser skya ba yi 'o mar btso// de nyid sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba// nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag gi bar// zho re'i tshad du bskyed cing za//
354b4(tsha): dkyil 'khor gsang ba la brten nas// gar gyi dbang phyug skur sgom zhing // rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod cing // mtshan brtags gsal bar ma mthong bas//
354b5(tsha): yan lag ma nyams brtson 'grus bskyed// oM pad+mo bi ha ra/ ra ra pa na hU phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags sum 'bum rdzogs par bya// a ru ra yi 'bras bzang stong gi chad//
354b6(tsha): legs par sbyor te zos pa'i mthus// nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing // tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// bgegs la sogs pa'i skyon sel cing // rigs
354b7(tsha): 'dzin gnas su 'gro bar byed// de bzhin dbang po lag pa dang // star bu ram nye'u nye shing pa// dngul chu mu zi la sogs pas// rang gi cho ga shes pa yis// rig pa
355a1(tsha): 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis 'grub// gar dbang dkyil 'khor la brten te// so sor ma nyams sbyor byas pas// ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar zhing // ba yi mar gyis
355a2(tsha): gzungs btab nas// mtshan ma ma byung bar du sgrub// des ni rigs 'dzin dngos grub thob// oM pad+mo in+d+ra a ta de wi na hu phaT/ oM pad+mo rA ga so kya a gar sta dar sha hU phaT/
355a3(tsha): oM pad+mo sa ma na ta bi sha le hU phaT/ oM gu li sa b+ho da ma gar na hU phaT/ oM pad+mo sha a na nad ta ya ka ra hUM phaT/ de dag las rnams grub pa dang // rtag tu rang gis 'chang byas shing /
355a4(tsha): gsung ba'i sngags lam la rab brten// tshe 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol
355a5(tsha): pa'i rgyud chen po las/ thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// phyag rgya rol pa'i sku bcas
355a6(tsha): kyis/ snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ mchog gi dngos grub skyed byed pa'i// rigs 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad// dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du//
355a7(tsha): b+han d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad// pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bkram nas// tshe gnas sngags kyis brgyan par bya// der ni bza' btung longs spyod tshogs// ma nyams
355b1(tsha): phun sum tshogs par spyad// gar dbang lha la mos pa yis// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byed cing // sum 'bum bzlas pa'i grangs tshang nus// mtha' sngags gzhan gyis
355b2(tsha): / brgyan byas te// rtags mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsam// oM pad+mo a yu She o AHhU hU swA hA bruM/ 'od zer du ba lta bu dang // phyag rgya'i dbyibs dag byung ba'i dus/
355b3(tsha): blo drug glu dang gar byas pas// brtul zhugs chen pos bdud rtsi spyad// sku gsung thugs mchog phyag rgya che// gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po'i mchog/ oM a ka te
355b4(tsha): bi ka te mA tang ka re swA hA/ mnyam pas mnyam pa'i phyag rgyar gsal// gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i phyir// rdo rje pad+mar ldan byas pas// thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul
355b5(tsha): la/ gzi ldan gsang bar a gru gsum// nyi ma pad+ma shes rab ldan// so sor gsal ba'i brdas mtshon te// o b+h+yA pad+ma a yu she/ byin rlabs rnam par 'phros pa yis//
355b6(tsha): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs bskul zhing // byang chub sems mchog tshe yi rgyun// sgrub pa po la gsol bar mdzad// pad 'dab brgyad pa nyi mar bcas// dbus
355b7(tsha): su gsang ba'i rdo rje che// hUM gis gsor zhing a yis bskyod// yang nas yang du bskul ba ni// sku gsung dbyings su gyur pa'o// de nas byang chub sems sogs rgyun//
356a1(tsha): b+han d+ha mtshan ldan nang du gzhug/ rnal 'byor gar dang legs bcas pas// bkra shis tshigs bcas glur blangs shing // bkra shis gar dang
356a2(tsha): dbyangs su bcas// longs spyod ston mo kun gsol zhing // dngos grub don phyir gsol ba btab// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gas
356a3(tsha): ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ tshe bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// // de nas gar gyi lha mchog gis// thams cad
356a4(tsha): bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// rigs lnga'i sku ru bsgrub pa'i phyir// rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang // dngos grub snying po kun
356a5(tsha): bsdus bshad// chos rnams ma lus rnams brtags nas// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor tshul du gnas// de las byung ba'i dngos rnams kyis// de nyid lha ru sbyor bar
356a6(tsha): bya// dang por bsod nams tshogs bsag cing // rdo rje bla ma mnyes byas pas// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas drag tu// lha nyid nye bar go mas byas pas// dkyis
356a7(tsha): 'khor chen po brtsam par bya// rigs kyi lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis// rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i phyir// dri dbyibs kha dog ro la sogs// sha lnga bdud rtsi bcas
356b1(tsha): pa dag/ b+han d+ha de ni mtshan ldan lngar// dkyil 'khor dbus dang phyogs bzhir dgram// rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// so so rig pa sbyang byas te// phyag rgya sngags
356b2(tsha): dang ting 'dzan mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub// oM pad+ma b+ha da hri gu na sid+d+hi sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta au A hU swA hA/ de nas 'od dang du ba dang // dri sgra
356b3(tsha): lha mo'i rtags dag ni// bzlas brjod thun mong khyad par dag/ 'bum 'tsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas 'grub pa'i rtags mthong nas// de dag rtag tsam byang
356b4(tsha): bya zhing / mkha' 'gro rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// gnas sogs sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs// dkyil 'khor bkod pa rgyan dang bcas// khro bo 'bar bar zhal bsgyur
356b5(tsha): zhing // yab yum gdung ba'i glu bcas dang // byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas bzhugs par// bdud rtsi gar gyi dbang phyug bskyed//
356b6(tsha): slar nyid khro bo'i de kyil 'khor gyis// 'jug 'dul gtso bo'i thugs khar gzhug/ ya shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas// dam tshag bdad rtsa gnyis mad 'gyur// slar
356b7(tsha): byung pad+ma'i rgyal ba'i sku// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// mchod bstod dga' bas mnyes byas nas// bro gar glu yis thugs dam bskang // khyad par
357a1(tsha): gsang sngags rgyal po'i mthus// ye shes lnga ldan 'od zer bcas// oM ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta pany+tsa a mr-i ta hu lu hu lu hUM phaT swA hA/ ji srid mtshan ma
357a2(tsha): ma byung bar// sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya// de nas rta mgrin phyag rgya yis// dngos grub kun la mnga' mdzad nas// sgrub pa chen po'i gsang ba'i don// rdo rje rta
357a3(tsha): mchog phyag rgya che// bdud rtsi rdzas kyi dbang bskur zhing // rnal 'byor grogs bcas tshim par bya// phyogs rnams kun nas gdung ba'i glus// dkyil 'khor lha dang bla
357a4(tsha): ma bstod// dngos grub gsol ba'i tshigs brjod cing // dga' ba'i longs spyod rgya cher bya// lha rnams kun la dgyes 'bul bya// dam med 'byung po sngags kyis bslad//
357a5(tsha): bdud rtsi gtor bas lus brlags 'gyur// rang gi ye shes las las bskyed// de nas las mdzad bsrung ma dang // mgron tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te// bsod nama?
357a6(tsha): ye shes tshogs chen po// rab rdzogs 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyu
357a7(tsha): chen po las/ bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// // de nas rta mchog rol pa'i sku// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshul gyis// 'tsha
357b1(tsha): rnams kun la bsgo mdzad cing // 'phrin las gsal ba'i don bshad mdzad// bsam gtan las kyi byung ba yis// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang // mnan bzlog
357b2(tsha): rings dang bsgral sogs dang // ting 'dzin gsal nas goms pa'i mthus// bdag gzhan don du las la sbyor// zhi la zhi ba'i yid kyis te// bsgrub bya zla dkyil
357b3(tsha): bzhag nas// rnam par snang mdzad 'od sngags kyis// dus gsum lha dang mnyam sbyor zhing // byang chub sems kyi bde ba skyed de// zug rngu'i rtog pa rnam par sel//
357b4(tsha): yun rings goms pa brtan pa'i mthus// me 'bar gnas kyang zhi bar nus// rgyas la rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis te// rin chen 'byung ldan las byung ba'i// 'khor lo
357b5(tsha): sgyur rgyal cha lugs can// ser po 'od phung 'bar bas brjid// rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas// bde gshegs byin rlabs kun sdud cing // sku gsung thugs dang
357b6(tsha): yon tan dang // 'phrin las sgo rnams gsal bar yang // sngags dang 'od zer snang ba yis// rin chen sna bdun gter la sogs// mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du
357b7(tsha): 'bebs// tshogs rnams rang gis longs spyad cing // 'gro rnams gzhan la sbyin par byed// thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyir// 'od phung dmar po mtha' yas sku//
358a1(tsha): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs shing // chags pa chen pos 'gro 'dul ba// rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus// lha tshogs 'gro rnams
358a2(tsha): dbang sdud cing // 'khon byas dang bar 'gyur ba yin// gang zhig snang ba'i sems yod pas// phrad pa bzhin rgyus chags par 'gyur// gang zhig bsad pa'i las 'grub
358a3(tsha): 'dod// des ni dkyil 'khor mthing nag la// las kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin las// khro bo sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis// bsgrub bya lha dang phral yid 'gug/ ma yi dkyil 'khor
358a4(tsha): la bzhag ste// shin tu ma rungs mtshon char ldan// dkon mchog gsum la bsngo byed cing // skye bo yongs la 'tshe byed cing // slob dpon sku la smod pa dang // sangs
358a5(tsha): rgyas thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad// las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis// mtshon cha me 'od 'bar spros nas// sdig pa can de bsgral mdzad cing // bya khyi lce skyang sha zan dang /
358a6(tsha): khrag 'thung mang po 'dus pa yis// bstod pa'i tshul du rol zhing dgyes// til tsam med par zos pa dang // sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas// de dag ting 'dzin
358a7(tsha): gsang sngags dang // dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pas sgrub// oM bud d+ha tsakra sa ma pa ka tan lo tsan che ge mo shAn ting ku ru swA hA/ oM rat+na saM b+ha ba ku ru ma ma ki che ge mo pa
358b1(tsha): ku ru swA hA/ o a mi de ba sa ra ba ra hi che ge mo bshang ku ru swA hA/ oM karma sid+d+hi kro ta ni che ge mo ma ra ya phaT/ rang gis dkyil 'khor gnas bzang por// rang gi dkyil
358b2(tsha): 'khor la gnas te// sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i mthus// cho ga sngon du grub par bya// gzhan yang rmongs dang rengs pa dang // dbye zhing dgug dang bskrad pa dang //
358b3(tsha): mnan la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang // rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan sngags kyis bsgrub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
358b4(tsha): bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa ste le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas
358b5(tsha): sbyor ba'i rgyal po yis// 'phrin las kun gyi mchog gyur pa// rdzas la brten pa'i mtshan ma nyid// 'dod don 'bras bu grub byed pa'o// gar gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya'i sku// /
358b6(tsha): rnam spros lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis// so so'i 'dod don grub byed pa// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram sogs thogs te// las kun lha yi nga rgyal gyis//
358b7(tsha): mtshan rtags ma byung bar du sgrub// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gzhir bzhag nas// lha yi dkyil 'khor dgug byed cing // mtshan ma'i rdzas la bstim byas te//
359a1(tsha): brtan par mchod cing mnyes pa dang // las kun pa yi gsang sngags brjod// oM ma ma sarba byi t+ya ha ra ku ru ku ru swA hA/ sarba sa mo ku ni lam pa
359a2(tsha): shAn+ting ku ru badz+ra dan ta ni hUM phaT/ puSh+Ti ma ku rU ra da na ma ku ru srA hA/ ba shang ku ru pad+mo hri da ya au/ sta ma b+ha ni mo sha ya karma sa ni hUM phaT/ cung zhig gzugs mi 'bul
359a3(tsha): ba'am// 'od 'phro ba skyed par gyur pa dang // nga rgyal ldan pas lag thogs te// gsang sngags drag tu brjod par bya// gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa dang // dbang sogs
359a4(tsha): las kyis bsgrub 'dod pas// de dag de dang mthun pa ni// las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam// phyag rgya'i mtshan mas bskul byas te// rang gi las la rnam par
359a5(tsha): gnas// dgug la sogs pa'i las dag dang // lcags kyu la sogs las kyis dgug/ rten gyi mtshan ma ma bral bar// ci 'dod bya ba mthar phyir 'grub// 'grub
359a6(tsha): par byed pa'i gsang sngags la// so so'i las kyi mtha' rgyan te// yi ge bcu bzhi'i rjes thogs su// sum 'bum sngags kyis bsgrub par bshad// oM bi lo gzhi
359a7(tsha): ma ma duSh+Ta na ga gan du lu hu lu hUM sarba si ti ba ra na ku ru ku ru hU phaT/ dang po rtsa ba'i gsang sngags ni// sum 'bum dag tu bzlas nas ni// slar yang de yi grangs
359b1(tsha): mthun pas// gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
359b2(tsha): las rten gyi sgo nas spyad pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // 'gro rnams thams cad bsrung byed cing // phan gdag cho ga bzang po nyid// rgyal
359b3(tsha): ba'i byin rlabs gnas pa'i thabs// rnal 'byor pa yis brtsa ma bya ste// grong khyer la sogs bsrung 'dod pas// chu dang bye ma la sogs la// gas bsngags rgyal
359b4(tsha): po brjod par bya// o na mo ku ru sarba bi da ra ni na mo sa da ne ra sha na rA sha ra kra gra hUM phaT/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor//
359b5(tsha): gang bsrung ba dag shis gyur cing // 'byung po gnod sbyin tshugs mi 'gyur// gzhan yang re chad dgu po yi// 'khor lo shing shun tshogs la bri// mu khyud kyis ni/
359b6(tsha): mtha' bskor nas// gsang sngags rgyal po 'god par bya// dbus dgod pa'i gsang sngags ni// yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bcas// de mthar o dang he he dang //
359b7(tsha): ru ru ka pa bi ka pa// ban sha ha ha ma ma si// hUM phaT swA hA dgod par bya// de mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed dag/ bsrung ba'i ming dang bcas par bri// gur kum bzang
360a1(tsha): bos byug byas te// rdo rje rgya gram dbus su gzhug/ gang gis ming bcas 'bum bzlas shing // rtag par bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/
360a2(tsha): gzhan yang bum pa bzang po ru// bdud rtsi 'o mar sbyar ba dag/ rang gi gsang sngags yungs kar bcas// gar dbang chags pa'i skur bsgoms shing // sngags stong
360a3(tsha): grangs 'thob bsrung ba 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bsrung ba'i le'u
360a4(tsha): ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di nyid bshad pa las/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'
360a5(tsha): yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad dga' mdzad cing // lha rnams kun la slar sgo mdzad// de dag dad pa'i lugs kyis ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bzung zhing // de 'dzin
360a6(tsha): gzhan la 'byams par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud ces bya ba las/ bsrung ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
360a7(tsha): gnyis pa'o// // dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra
360b1(tsha): agra bi ru tan tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
360b2(tsha): 'das dpal mgon po ye shes kyi sku dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'khor chen po 'dus pa'i tshogs ma lus pa
360b3(tsha): rnams legs par nyon/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don phyin ci ma log pa bstan no// sku gsung thugs gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i rgyud bstan par bya'o//
360b4(tsha): sku gsung thugs gsang ba rmad du byung ba/ sku gsung thugs yon tan rmad du byung ba/ sku gsung thugs 'phrin las rmad du byung ba lus/ gsung rmad du byung ba'i
360b5(tsha): gsung gi rgyud/ 'phrin las mthar phyin pa rdo rje rtse mo/ don thugs su chud pas 'dus pa zhes bya ba 'di la/ bcom ldan 'das mi mnyam mgon pos/ kye 'dus
360b6(tsha): pa'i tshogs pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dus mi mnyam pa nam mkha' med pa'i sngon rol na/ gnas mi mnyam pa chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ ston pa mi mnyam
360b7(tsha): pa sangs rgyas 'od dpag med/ chos mi mnyam pa gsang ba rig pa'i rgyud lnga/ 'khor mi mnyam pa rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa/ 'dus pa'i tshogs mi
361a1(tsha): mnyam pa sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye kye 'dus pa'i tshogs nga yis bshad/ nga yis bsnyad/ nga la nyon cig
361a2(tsha): e ma ho ngo mtshar che ba'i chos// brjod pa kun las rab tu 'das// chos rnams kun la mi 'das so// chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i chos// zhes bka' stsal to//
361a3(tsha): nga rang byung gi ye shes chen po la sku mi gnas pa'i sku bstan pa/ ye shes kyi sku dri ma med pa'o// nga'i gsung 'gag pa med pa rang byung gi ye shes/ nga'i thugs rdo rje lta
361a4(tsha): bu 'gyur ba med pa'o// nga'i yon tan nor bu rin po che ltar zad mi shes pa'o// nga'i 'phrin las nyi ma'i snying po ltar lhun gyis grub pa'o// nga rang byung gi ye shes chen/
361a5(tsha): po la mi gnas pa'i chos bstan pa/ 'khor chen po lnga 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la/ rang rare 'dus pa'i 'khor du gsung ba'i rgyud lnga gsungs/ kye/ 'dus pa'i
361a6(tsha): tshogs rnams nga la nyon// nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi sku// ye shes lus can dri ma med// nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // yi ge med pas tshig las 'das//
361a7(tsha): pa ni sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs// dran rtog med pa'i mya ngan 'das// nga ni yon tan dpag med sku// nor bu rin chen dri med mnyam// nga ni 'phrin las mthar phyin sku//
361b1(tsha): 'gro ba'i mgon po de bzhin gshegs// de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// rang rang rigs kyi rgyud shes pas// mgrin gcig thal mo mnyam
361b2(tsha): sbyar nas// legs sa dpal ldan mgon po che// legs so legs so dri legs so// dri ma med pa'i rgyud chen lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su chud// 'gro
361b3(tsha): ba'i mgon po de bzhin gshegs// 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams dbugs 'byin nas// legs so shes rab dri ma med// gcig tu gsungs pas don shes nas//
361b4(tsha): ye shes lnga yi mtshan nyid 'dzin// chen po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// mgon po ye shes dri med sku// rnam dag gsung gi tan tra la// gsal ba'i sgron ma bstan pa
361b5(tsha): yin// rin chen dra ba'i sgo mo la// 'byed pa'i lde mig bstan pa yin// rin chen spras pa'i rdzong chen la// gnas pa'i rangs bstan pa ni// nor bu dri ma med pa'i
361b6(tsha): rgyud// mgon po nga yis bstan pa yin// de phyir mgon po dri med nga // mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin// rdo rje 'dzin pa nga la nyon// chos pha rol tu phyin pa lnga/
361b7(tsha): la yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ dri ba dang po pa rnams nyon cig/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te/ chos kyi sku las 'das pa'i sku rnam par dag
362a1(tsha): pa mi thob bo// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khong du chud na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro// de'i
362a2(tsha): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ bstan du med pa'i sku/ bshad du med pa'i rgyud/ sgom du med pa'i chos/ btsal du med pa'i las/ 'bras bu gzhan
362a3(tsha): khal re ba med par gnas pa'o// rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa las/ mgon po dri ma med pas ye shes rang byung du bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//
362a4(tsha): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs las bkrol ba'i phyir
362a5(tsha): rgyud/ zhal nas gsungs pa'i phyir na lung / rna ba nas rna bar rgyud pa'i phyi ru mun ngag 'di las spyi don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te/ rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud
362a6(tsha): 'di/ rgyud yin pa'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa lngas bstan/ lung yin pa'i phyir lung gi che ba lngas bstan/ man ngag yin pa'i phyir man ngag gi mdzod gsum gyis
362a7(tsha): bstan to// de la dus phun sum tshogs pa snang ba bkod pa'i zhing khams/ gnas phun sum tshogs pa lcang lo can gyi pho brang / ston pa phun sum
362b1(tsha): tshogs pa sangs rgyas 'od srungs/ chos phun sum tshogs pa gsang ba'i rgyud lnga/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sangs rgyas rab bdun no// lung yin
362b2(tsha): pa'i phyir lung gi che ba lngas bstan te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i phyir/ lung gzhan la ma rten pa'i lung gis yid chas pa'i che ba'o// sku rnam par
362b3(tsha): dag pa la dang po rgyu med/ bar du rkyen med/ tha mar mi 'gyur 'gyur ba med pa nam mkha'i lung gis che ba'o// ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i tshig 'bru go nyer
362b4(tsha): legs shing don de bzhin nyid las mi 'gyur bas lung gi che ba'o// mi las khyad par du gyur pa dga' rab rdo rje'i don du/ ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa las lung ma
362b5(tsha): nor bar rin po che gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya zhun mas rang nan du bris pas lung gis che ba'o// bskyed rdzogs rnam pa gsum lo ma dang me tog 'bras bu tha mi dad du
362b6(tsha): bstan pas/ gsang sngags mtha' dag gi lung 'dus pa lung gis che ba'o// man ngag yin pa'i phyir man ngag gri mdzod gsum gyis bstan te/ sku'i rgyud
362b7(tsha): nas sku rin po che dra ba'i mdzod phyung ste/ 'khor ba thog mtha' bcad/ gsung gi rgyud nas gsung rig pa'i khu byug phyung ste/ yi ge dang thugs su spyad/ thugs kyi rgyud nas
363a1(tsha): thugs nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i rgyud phyung ste/ chos med pa'i chos la bzhag go// ston pa dga' rab rdo rje ngas// rdo rje sems dpa'i
363a2(tsha): thugs brtol te// skye ba med pa'i rgyud chen lnga// phyi rabs 'byung ba'i don du rgyud// 'jam dpal gzhon nu khyod la gtad// gcig las gnyis su ma spel bar// byang chub
363a3(tsha): 'byung ba 'a shing drung du// rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya yis thob// 'chi ka'i ma yi gsang gter 'di// rang gi rgyud las gzhan du me na// med pa ma yin lung gis grol// dpal
363a4(tsha): ldan mgon po dri med kyis// thugs kyi klong nas rgyud lnga gsungs// sangs rgyas lnga yi rgyud du bzhag/ nyon mongs lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'dzin
363a5(tsha): pabs bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dgongs pa sems can gyi gzhi la gnas pa'i phyir/ sku'i rgyud pad+mo 'khyil pa bstan/ bla ma'i man ngag dkyus su sbyar
363a6(tsha): ba'i phyir/ gsung gi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa bstan/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa la bzla ba'i phyir/ thugs kyi rgyud rin po che spungs pa'i rgyan bstan/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems
363a7(tsha): can yid ches par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa nyid nas nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/ yon tan gyi rgyud bsod nams byams pa'i brtsegs pa bstan/ sems can
363b1(tsha): rnams la 'bras bu'i don bstan pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ 'phrin las kyi rgyud kha gsal nyi ma bstan/ spyir sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i rgyud lnga la/ sgo brtsegs su
363b2(tsha): phye ba'i dpe chung nyi shu rtsa gcig tu che ste bstan no// spyir rgyud nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ man ngag gi rgyud gsum/ gdams pa'i rgyud bcu drug/ bshad pa'i rgyud gnyis te nyi
363b3(tsha): shu rtsa gcig go/ byang chub sems pad+ma 'khyil pa'i rgyud 'di ni rgyud kyang yin/ lung yang yin/ man ngag kyang yin/ no bi ka yang yin no// kun tu bzang po rtsa ba'i rgyu//
363b4(tsha): chen po yi ge med pa'i rgyud nas gsungs so// gang zag gi rna ba nas rna bar rgyud pas lung yang yin no// rgyud de lta bu ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i lung bstan pa de
