363b5(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma nor bar bris te/ phyis 'byung ba rnams la bstan pas lung yang yin no// lung des gang zag rnam par grol ba'i ye shes thob
363b6(tsha): par byed pas ma na ngag kyang yin no// man ngag de spyod du mi ster ba'i mu stegs log lta can tshar gcod pa'i phyir/ sgrub thabs kyi le lag bstan pas no bi ka yang yinano/
363b7(tsha): de'i phyir pad+ma 'khyil ba'i rgyud 'di sangs rgyas kyi rgyud lnga'i rtsa ba yin no// rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba bsdus pa las rgyud ji ltar byung
364a1(tsha): ba'i khungs dang / yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo//
364a2(tsha): byang chub sems mun pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ chu bo chen po sinA ng+ku dang / chu bo chen po gang+gA'i mtshams su / sangs rgyas 'od srungs gzigs pa rnam pa gnyis gzigs
364a3(tsha): te/ sems can gyi glo'i bye brag dang sbyar nas/ rgyu 'bras kyi chos gnyis bka' stsal ti/ las kyi mtha' brtsi ba dang / las kyi mtha' mi brtsi ba gnyis las
364a4(tsha): de la las kyi mtha' brtsi ba dang / las kyi mtha' rdzogs pa dang / las kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'o// de la las kyi mtha' bcu ba la pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i lam nas
364a5(tsha): 'jug ste rgyu'i chos su bstan/ las kyi mtha' rdzogs pa khyad par can du gyur pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan te/ lung gser gyi phur pas bstan no//
364a6(tsha): las kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi lung gis bstan te/ ci ste las kyi dbang gyur na zhes pa'i tshig gis bstan te/ las kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'o//
364a7(tsha): las kyi mtha' la mi gnas bya ba tsam la yang mi gnas med de/ rang bzhin chen po'i mtha' dang bral ba ni/ re zhig bstan na byang chub sems rin po che spungs pa nas
364b1(tsha): bstan no// don de thugs su chud par bya ba ni byang chub sems pad+ma 'khyil pa'i dbu zhabs nas bzhugs te/ de yang byang chub sems rdo rje rtse mos dgrol bar bya'o//
364b2(tsha): man ngag gi rgyud gsum gtan la dbab cing yid ches par bya ba'i ched du/ gdams pa'i rgyud bcu drug gis bstan nas bshad pa'i rgyud gnyis kyis mtho dman klong du
364b3(tsha): khud bsnyams te gdams pa'o// de la pad+ma 'khyil pa'i rgyud ni rin po che ga tsa ra la brgyus pa bzhin du bshad do// rdo rje 'dus pa'i rgyud ni/ gyi gling sgrog bkrol ba'am
364b4(tsha): rin po che bang mdzod kyi sgo lcags bkrol ba'i tshul du bshad do// rin po che spungs pa'i rgyan ni/ khyung nam mkha' la lding ba'i tshul du bshad do// bsod nams byams
364b5(tsha): pa brtsegs pa'i rgyud ni/ mchod rten gyi khri 'phangs kyi tshul du bshad do// mkha' gsang nyi ma'i rgyud ni/ nam mkha' dang nyi ma'i tshul du bshad do// sangs rgyas kyi rgyud
364b6(tsha): rnam pa lnga po 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos bka' stsal nas/ paN+Di ta dga' rab rdo rjes dbu zhabs kyi don bsdus pa ni/ pad+mo 'khyil pa zhes
364b7(tsha): gdams so// byang chub kyi sems mun pa'i sgron ma 'di la dbu zhabs su spyi don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas brgyud pa/ rigs 'dzin brda yis
365a1(tsha): brgyud pa/ gang zag rna bas brgyud pa gsum las/ dang po chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur bas/ longs spyod rdzogs
365a2(tsha): pa'i sku rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams la bshad kyang sa mA d+his bshad/ mnyan kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis mnyan to// de nas 'og min gyi gnas rdo rje dbyings
365a3(tsha): kyi dkyil 'khor du/ rigs lnga'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis/ 'khor sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bshad kyangs ma tis bshad/ mnyan yang
365a4(tsha): sa ma d+his mnyan// de nas sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/ lhung lo can gyi pho brang du sprul pa'i sku sangs rgyas 'od srungs la 'chi med rdo rje'i lung bstan
365a5(tsha): nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// paN+Di tas brda sgo nas bstan pa la yang gsum ste/ brda dang sgra'i sgo nas bstan pa dang
365a6(tsha): ngag dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas bstan pa dang / shes rab dang rang rgyud kyi sgo nas bstan pa'o// brda rnam pa gsum gyi sgo nasu bstan pa dang / sgra rnam pa drug gi sgo nas
365a7(tsha): bstan pa dang / ngag 'jam pa'i sgo nas bstan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'o// shes rab ni theg pa thams cad kyi sgo nas ston pa yin no//
365b1(tsha): rang rgyud ni gdams pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'o// de nas bod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen skyes chen khyad par can gyi gang zag sems dang chos su 'dres pa rnams kyis bshad pa
365b2(tsha): la yang spyi don gsum ste/ phyi nang gsang ba gsum du bstan no// de la yang phyi la gsum ste/ lung dkyus su bshad pa dang \u0f7f/ lung man ngag tu bshad pa dang // man ngag
365b3(tsha): man ngag tu bshad pa'o/ 2/ de yang dkyus su bshad pa spyi ba tsan/ lung man ngag tu bshad pa ni/ skabs bzhi pa dang / man ngag man ngag tu bshad pa yongs su
365b4(tsha): rdzogs pa'i skabs gcig pa rin po che sgron ma snang byed du shes par bya'o// nang ltar bshad pa la yang gnyis te/ nang gi phyi dang nang gi nang ngo // nang gi phyi bkri drang don/
365b5(tsha): du bstan to// nang gi nang la don lngas bstan/ gser mig nas dus snyam bdun pa yan chad/ man ngag gi thugs kyi rgyud dam par khong 'grel lo// rang re'i skor
365b6(tsha): tshoms dang 'khrul 'dod ni dkyus btsan dpe chung dang sbyar la shes par bya'o// de bzhin du gsang skor kyang shes par bya'o// don gyi man ngag khong 'grel gsang bar
365b7(tsha): bstan pa la don bdun gyis bstan te/ de yang ston lugs gsum ste/ rgyas par bstan pa dang \u0f7f/ bsdus te bstan pa dnga'/ shin tu yang bsdus te bstan pa'o//
366a1(tsha): de yang bsdus pa ni dkyus su bshad/ bsdus pa ni dpe chung ngu bshad/ shin tu bsdus pa ni lung gser gyi phur bar bstan to// de la don bdun
366a2(tsha): gyi bstan pa'i dang po rgyas bstan par/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi'i gnas lugs kyis 'khor ba thog mtha' bcadaH/ rin po che za ma tog sbag mas thog ma'i sangs
366a3(tsha): rgyas po sprad/ lta ba kha 'byam gyi rgyal pos gany+dza' man+dan la/ rin po che skyi bcings kyis don nyams su blang/ pad+ma 'khyil pa'i dpe chung nyi shu rtsa gcig gis don
366a4(tsha): mAn ngag tu bsdus/ lung gser gyi phur pas tshig dang yi ge'i mtha' bcad// mdo rnam pa gnyis kyi las kyi mtha' bsdu'o// byang chub sems pad+ma 'khyil pa'i rgyud
366a5(tsha): kyi rtsa ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o// rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa las/ slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mun pa'i sgron ma bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
366a6(tsha): / sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro mgon 'jam dpal gzhon nungs// thog ma'i sangs rgyas bstan pa// mgon po dri med ye shes
366a7(tsha): sku// rin chen dra ba'i mdzod na gnas// 'gro drug kun gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ye shes su gcig kun tu shar// ye shes lnga la phyag rgya ste// rdo rje mu gcig gsum
366b1(tsha): du bsdus// yon tan so sor dpe ru bstan// mgon po bri med ye shes sku// 'khor ba thog mtha' bdag med pas// gzung 'dzin gnyis med mya ngan 'das// phyi nang snod
366b2(tsha): bcud rang grol la// gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin// glang chen 'dam du bying ba dang // skyes bu rang gis bcings pa gnyis// gzhan gyis yang dag ga la 'gyur//
366b3(tsha): snang srid rnam dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor na// rang byung ma bcos rdo rje snying po'i sku// dus gsum 'gyur ba med par rtag par bzhugs// bde ba chen po bde la rtag
366b4(tsha): spyod pa// rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa kun tu bzang // ji ltar brjod pa rtsol bas nad// chos kyi yang dag don de brjod nus kyang // chos kyi yang dag don la gnas
366b5(tsha): mi nus// de phyir chos spyod sangs rgyas don la sgrib// chos kyis blo yi thu tshom kun gsal la// chos la mi gnas tha ma la shes rab bzhag/ tha ma la shes pa blo yis/
366b6(tsha): bcos pa yin// bde dang sdug bsngal blo la rtog pa med// mgon po dri med sku ni de bzhin no// rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhi'i gnas lugs las
366b7(tsha): rin po che dra ba'i mdzod kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa la phyag 'tshal lo// man ngag 'dus pa'i
367a1(tsha): spyi 'chings 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ste// rnal 'byor kun gyi thugs la gnas// man ngag 'dus pa'i tan tra yin// tshig dang 'bru
367a2(tsha): gnyer dkyus btsan te// sku yi rgyud du shes par bya// yang dag don gyi spyi bcings 'di// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// mgon po dri med ye shes sku//
367a3(tsha): sku 'jam gsung 'jam thugs 'jam ste// sku yi ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// gdos pa'i mtha' dang bral bas 'jam// gsung ni brjod du med pa'i gsung // tshig dang
367a4(tsha): yi ge'i mtha' las 'das// thugs ni dran rtog med pa'i thugs// gzhi la rang bzhin med pas 'jam// sangs rgyas ye shes sku yis mchog/ mgon po dri ma med pa
367a5(tsha): yin// mgon po dri med ye shes sku// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po 'dus// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin med pas na// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// brjod du med
367a6(tsha): pa'i don shes na// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// sangs rgyas med pa'i don shes na// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// chos la blo ni mi gnas na//
367a7(tsha): 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// ces 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pas bka' stsal to// de nas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis
367b1(tsha): zhus pa legs so dpal ldan mgon po che// byams pa'i thugs rje ma bral bas// sa gzhi lta bu'i ye shes sku// snying rje thugs rje ma bral bas// chu bo lta bu'i ye
367b2(tsha): shes sku// dga' bar byed pa'i ya shes sku// nyi zla lta bu'i ye shes sku// btang snyoms thugs rje ma bral bas// nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes sku// sku bzhi 'dus
367b3(tsha): pa'i 'jam dpal ni// theg pa kun gyi snying po yin// 'gro ba kun la rang bzhin gnas// lung ldan skyes bu dam pa de// ye shes bzhi la rtag spyod na// bdud bzhi/
367b4(tsha): rnam par dag pa'i lam// 'jam dpal ye shes 'dus pa yin// 'jam dpal dri med ye shes sku// rang byung lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir// sgom pa'i tshig dang bral ba
367b5(tsha): yin/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pas// spyod pa'i mtha' dang bral ba yin// snying po rang la rdzogs pa'i phyir// grub pa'i mtha' dang bral ba yin// rdo rje rtse mo 'das pa
367b6(tsha): las bcom ldan 'jam pa'i ye shes 'dus pa las rin po che'i spyi bcings lta bur bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // bskal pa dang po'i
367b7(tsha): sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa gsum gyi sangs rgyas ni// rang rig ma bcos de bzhin nyid// thog mar ye shes rang byung bas// rgyu med
368a1(tsha): myu gu me tog 'bras// rten med mkha' la nyi snang tshul// ye shes lnga yi gzugs brnyan can// gnas med gnas la 'od gsal ba// rang
368a2(tsha): bzhin rnam dag rtog med sku// 'dzan rtog mi mnga' sa le mkhyen// ma btsal lhun gyis grub pa'i 'od// dpag med gsal ba'i ngo bor gnas// mi 'byed shes rab/
368a3(tsha): 'od gsal ba// snang la dngos med 'ja' tshon sku// 'gag med mi g.yo bde ldan thim// de nyid ye shes rang byung sku// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i sku// de nas
368a4(tsha): rig pa'i ngo bo ni// 'gag pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// 'gyu ba med las 'gyu ba yang // skad cig ma yi tshul du 'byung // de shes pas rtas pa la// skad cig ma
368a5(tsha): yis shes pa 'byung // de la sems kyi rnam pa 'byung // skad cig ma yis rnam pa de// gcig 'gag gcig skye gcig gnas pas// skad cig phyi ma skye ba de//
368a6(tsha): nam mkha' stong la sprin la ngas tshul// de las bdag tu snang ba'i blos// cung zad 'khrul pa'i rkyen bzhir shar// ye shes snang ba'i gzhi la thim// de nas par
368a7(tsha): gyi bskal pa la// ye shes che'o lung ma bstan// ye shes kyi snang ba nang bu nub ste 'char mo nus so// 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yang skye ma nus so// de gnas pa'i dus
368b1(tsha): su rdo rje mi bskyod pa zhes bya ste/ rig pa rang gi so la gnas so// ye shes bag la zha'o// bskal pa bar ma la snod kyi 'jig rten chags so// de nas bskal pa tha
368b2(tsha): ma la skye ba rnam bzhi'i srid pa chags so// gzugs kyi bye brag so so tha dad chags kyang / rdo rje mi bskyod pa ci la gnas so// mi bskyod pa ma bgos ci la gnas/
368b3(tsha): ma bgos so sor khyab bo// rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas 'od srungs chen por skur sprul nas/ sangs rgyas dang sems can rgyab gyes te bstan pa la gnas so// thog ma'i
368b4(tsha): sangs rgyas 'od kyi sku ru snang / bar gyi sangs rgyas nam mkha' lta bur snang / phyis 'byung gi sangs rgyas gzugs kyi skur gnas so// de rnams kyang don so so tha mi dad/
368b5(tsha): do// phye snod kyi 'jig rten 'byung ba lngar bcas pa/ dang po 'od dpag tu med pa las byung / mi bskyod pa'i bskal pa la chags so// 'od srungs bskal pa la
368b6(tsha): gnas so// bskal pa gsum du gnas mod kyang // snying po don la 'gyur ba med// rdo rje lta bu'i sku brnyes pas// bcom ldan rdo rje dbyings mi bskyod// rang byung lhun rdzogs/
368b7(tsha): sku gsung thugs// sku gcig kun tu khyab pa'i sku// nyi ma'i snying po lta bur gnas// man shel lta bur rang snang bas// snang ba'i bye brag snang mod kyang // rang gi ngo
369a1(tsha): po 'gyur ba med// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ rnam par dag pa'i sku bde ba chen po la/ ye shes kyi grogs byar med do// rang rig pa'i ye shes
369a2(tsha): dngos po'i mtha' las 'das pas/ nyon mongs pa'i rnam rtog gis sgrib tu med/ rang gi ngo bo shes bya ba bas kyis grub pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan gyi bstod
369a3(tsha): du med do// ka dag pa'i ye shes rang snang ba la// bslad par bya ba'i chos med do// thabs kyi rgyal po stobs kyi rig pa shar bas// che ba'i yon tan gzhan gyis dpag tu
369a4(tsha): med do// shes rab zab mo gang+gA'i rgyun bzhin mi 'chad pas/ thugs rje la dbri bkol med do// rig pa'i ye shes su gsal bas// dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
369a5(tsha): dang mi phyed do// snying rje sna tshogs su snang bas// khams gsum gyi sems can dang 'brel lo// rgyu 'byung ba chen po lngam spangs gnas su dag pas// snod bcud
369a6(tsha): kyis gsos byas so// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la chos med do// ci ste ngan song gi mtha' las grol ba'o// yang dag par
369a7(tsha): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la lam med do// ci ste bgrod par bya ba'i mtha' las 'das so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshogs pasag tu med do// ci sna
369b1(tsha): dngos po'i mtshan ma gang la yang mi gnas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sgrib pa sbyang du med do// ci ste nyi ma'i snying po la mun pa'i gzhi med do// rdo rje rtse
369b2(tsha): mo 'dus pa las/ rdo rje sems dpas rin po che za ma tog sbag ma'i man ngag rdo rje thugs kyi nyid khu phyung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // bcom
369b3(tsha): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub kyi snyems kyi nyi ma la bzhi ste/ gzhi'i gnas lugs bstan pa dang 1/ de la
369b4(tsha): 'khrul pa byung ba'i rkyen bstan pa dngal/ 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i thabs bstan pa dang la/ rang gi ngo bo lam 'a bras bu dang bcas pa bstan pa'o// de la gnas lugs la
369b5(tsha): drug ste/ chos kyi sku'i gnas lugs dang \u0f7f/ rang byung ye shes chen po'i gnas lugs dang2/ sku'i gnas lugs dnga'/ gsung gi gnas lugs dang
369b6(tsha): thugs kyi gnas lugs dang ra/ dbyings kyi gnas lugs so// / rkyen bstan pa bzhi ste/ byang chub kyi sems nor bu dri ma med pa'i rgyud kyi nying khur lta'o// 'khor ba
369b7(tsha): zlog na gzhi nas bzlog/ ma rig pa nyid rtsa da nas bcad// rang rig dang po'i so la bzhag/ ces 'byung ngo // de'i sa bon la bdun te/ chos kyi mthar gtug
370a1(tsha): man ngag gi klong brtol / sems kyi gdar sha ba cad 'a/ lam gyi ngo bo bstan/ skyon gyi mtha' bsal/ spyod pa'i gdong du bzhuga'abras bu
370a2(tsha): med par thag bcad do// de la chos kyi mthar gtug pa la drug ste/ sku'i ngo bor gtug pa dang / dbyings kyi ngo bor gtug pa dang 2/ rgyu'i ngo bor gtug pa dang 2//
370a3(tsha): lam gyi stobs su gtug pa dang spang bya'i rgyur gtug pa dang 'bras bu'i gra deng du gtug pa'o/ 5/ man ngag gi klong brtol ba la gnyis te/ yul gyis ye shes
370a4(tsha): kyi klong brtol ba dang !/ yon tan gyi sku'i klong brtol ba'o/ 2/ yul gyis ye shes kyi klong brtol ba nr-i ye shes lnga ste/ da lta bzhi ldan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes da rung med do//
370a5(tsha): yon tan gyis sku'i klong brtol ba la gnyis te/ gzhi'i 'dug tshul bstan pa dang / gzhi'i 'dug tshul bstan pa la gnyis te/ yon tan gyi rnam grangs bstan pa
370a6(tsha): la brgyad do// sems kyi gdar sha bcad pa la gsum ste/ lhag mthong rig pa'i ye shes kyis ma rig pa ga dar sha bcad pa'o// / chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
370a7(tsha): the tshom gyi gdar sha bcad/ lam gyis ye shes kyi gdar sha bcad pa'o/ 2/ man ngag gi rdzong chen po gsum la 'bras bu'i gter chen po gsum sbas so// byang chub
370b1(tsha): kyi sems rdzong la thig le nyag gcig gi gter sbas/ thig le phyi nang gi rdzong la kun bzang rol pa'i gter sbas/ yid kyi rnam shes kyi rdzong la rang byung ye shes kyi gte/
370b2(tsha): sbas so// mnyam pa chen po mi g.yo ba'i rgyas btab bo// byang chub kyi sems thugs kyi nyi ma zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po ro langs bde bas chu bo chen po na
370b3(tsha): rany+dza na'i 'gram nA/ shing chen po bzhi 'dus pa'i gnas su/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bshes gnyen la bka' stsal to// rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa
370b4(tsha): las stong thun gyi ma bzhi chung shos la man ngag tu bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
370b5(tsha): phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma 'das pa'i dus ma 'ongs pa'i sngon rol na/ gsang ba'i rgyud lnga rang bzhin gyi ngo bo lngar gnas te/ cung mi gsung / cang mi grags/
370b6(tsha): byed pa po'i mtha' las 'das so// nga med pa'i dus su snang ba med do// byed pa po'ang med la dper na snying po myu gur gnas pa bzhin te/ sa bon myu gur gnas pa'i
370b7(tsha): tshe sa bon kyang med la/ 'bras bur yang mi snang / myu gu rang 'ba' zhig tu gnas so// de bzhin du nga bskal pa dang po la sa bon gyi tshul du gnas so// bskal pa
371a1(tsha): bar ma la myu gu'i tshul du gnas/ bskal pa tha ma la 'bras bu'i tshul du smin no// kye rigs kyi bung ma 'ongs pa'i dus su rgyud chen po lnga rang la snang /
371a2(tsha): rang las grol ba'o// rang gi rnam pa lnga po yang // rang gi phyag rgya lnga ru snang // de phyir rgyud chen lnga po yang // de lnga'i don du de lngas gsungs// de lnga rnam par grol ba'i lam//
371a3(tsha): de phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa ngas// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// dri ma med pa'i drang srong khyod// legs par yid la bzung bar gyis// mgon po dri ma med pa ngas//
371a4(tsha): ma skyes pa yi klong yangs nas// gsang ba'i rgyud lnga bstan pa 'di// chos sku gcig la tha dad pas// lnga ru phye ste bstan pa yin// phyag rgya lnga ru bstan pa yang // don du bdag
371a5(tsha): nyid chen po'i sku// rgyud chen lnga yi mdor bsdus pa// nor bu dri ma med pa'i rgyud// mgon po dra yis bstan pa yin// legs so mgon po dri med sku// ye shes dri ma med
371a6(tsha): pa'i chos// drang srong bdag la bstan du gsol// sems can rnams la smran slad du// bdag gi de bzhin bstan par bya'o// kye/ sems can kun gyi rang rgyud la//
371a7(tsha): sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gnas pas// sku ning med 'od kyi sku// dngos po'i mtha' las 'das pa yin// thog ma'i rangs bstan pa'i phyir// sku yi rgyud du bstan pa yin//
371b1(tsha): rnam par snang mdzad khyod la gtad// sems can kun gyi rang rgyud la// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gnas pas// gsung ni 'gag med tshangs pa'i dbyangs// brjod pa'i
371b2(tsha): mtha' dang bral ba'i phyir// gsung gi rgyud du bstan pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas khyod la gtad// sems can kun gyi rang rgyud la// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs gnas
371b3(tsha): bas// rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ba med// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su chud// thugs kyi rgyud du bstan pa yin// rdo rje mi bskyod khyod la gtad// sems can kun gyi rang
371b4(tsha): rgyud la// sangs rgyas yon tan ma 'gags pa'o// rtogs pa'i don la yid ches pas// yon tan rgyud du bstan pa yin// rin chen 'byung ldan khyod la gtad// sems
371b5(tsha): can kun gyi rang rgyud la// sangs rgyas 'phrin las 'gags med 'char// nam mkha'i mthongs na nyi shar bzhin// de phyir 'phrin las rgyas pa'i rgyud// don yod grub pa
371b6(tsha): khyod la gtad// de phyir mgon po dri med ngas// drang srong khyod la gdabs pa yin// dper na seng ge dkar mo'i 'o ma 'di// rin chen gser gyi 'dzin 'gyur gyis//
371b7(tsha): snod ngan gzhan du blugs pas na// snod 'jig 'o ma 'pho bar 'gyur// de bas gzhan du bstan pa men// kye rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ ngas gdams pa'i chos la don
372a1(tsha): re thugs su chud par mi byed cing / tshig dang sgra phyir 'brengs nas ra tshod dang gzu lums byas na/ de lta bu'i sku rdo rje dmyal ba chen por 'gyur ro//
372a2(tsha): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang / 'khor ba'i khadam rdzab chen por 'gyur ro// tshad med pa'i thugs rje chen po bzhi 'char ba yang rtsa ba'i bdud chen por 'gyur/
372a3(tsha): ro// chos kyi dbyings mtha' klas pa'i ye shes kyang / 'khor ba'i mun rum chen por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan rnam pa lnga yang / rang gi rgyud la dug
372a4(tsha): lnga'i me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyang / bdag tu rtog pa'i bag chags kyi gzhi ma rig pa kho nar 'gyur
372a5(tsha): kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ khyad par du rdo rje theg pa gcig tu 'dus shing dang du blang nas rdo rje dam bral na/ 'jig rten 'dir yang mi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang
372a6(tsha): nad mi bzod pa lus la 'byung zhing / tshe thung rab tu 'phongs te/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'das nas kyang nye 'brel dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de las tshe na ma 'phos par
372a7(tsha): dgra yi dam par gyur nas kyang // 'jig rten phyi mar ngan 'gro yi// gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs
372b1(tsha): pa'i sku bstan pa ni/ u du ma 'bar ba'i me tog ltar shin tu dkon no// lo gcig lo gnyis lo gsum du// phyi nang snod brtags sems kyi dam pa bstan// rgyan
372b2(tsha): u dum 'bar ba'i rigs gcig gam// gnyis sam yang na gsum yang rung // grong zad mtha' dang nags tshal dgon pa ru// de nyid rna ba rnam gsum sna ba sems la
372b3(tsha): sbrad// phyi nang dbang chen rab rdzogs pa// rdo rje lta bu'i sku gsum sprad pa yin// yid bzhin rin chen gter bstan bus la// gus pa'i tshul gyis lus dang srog kyang
372b4(tsha): phul// ces lung bstan to// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos zhus pa/ kye kye dpal ldan mgon po dri ma med// rgyud kyi skyon yon bstan pa legs// rgyud kyi che ba
372b5(tsha): bstan du gsol// kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa nga la nyon// rgyud kyi che ba rnam pa lnga// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// bcom ldan rdo rje dbyings mi bskyod// mun sel sgron ma ya
372b6(tsha): she sku// rdo rje'i sku ste sku yi rgyud// ye shes sku ste dri ma med// rgyud kyi dang por bzhag pa yin// mtshon gyi sgo nas che ba ni// smag mun rum du nyi shar shes bya ste//
372b7(tsha): rgyud kyi che ba'o// sku gsung thugs kyi don bstan pa// rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud// 'gag med rdo rje sems dpa'i gsung // ma 'gags shes rab sbyor ba ni// rig pa
373a1(tsha): khu byug gsum gyis bshad// rdo rje lcags kyu pad+ma rgyud kyi che ba'o// rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes ni// nam mkha' lta bur dngos po med// gol sgrib rtag
373a2(tsha): chad mtshan ma'i yul 'gags pa// gnyen pos mi shigs rkyen gyi dbang 'gyur min// dge dang sdig pa de yi spyod yul min// rang da bang thabs kyis rdzogs pas rtsa la
373a3(tsha): gsum lus la tshang // mtho dman klong du tshang bas ye shes bdag med sku// sa dang lam mi bgrod pas ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// rtsol sgrub zil gyis non
373a4(tsha): pas bde 'jam ye shes slu// byang chub sems seng ge 'khyil ba'i rgyud kyi che ba'o// sangs rgyas che ba'i yon tan sku gsung thugs// sangs rgyas rol pa ma 'gags/
373a5(tsha): ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas thugs rje ma 'gags 'byung ba lnga// sangs rgyas mdzad spyod spyan mnga' bcu drug pad+mo 'khyil// dgos dgu rang la rdzogs pas nor bu
373a6(tsha): rin po che// mtshan mchog so sor bstan yang yon tan gcig tu gnang // sku gcig kun tu khyab pas snang gsal thugs rje khod kyi me// zhes bya ba rgyud kyi che ba'o//
373a7(tsha): nam mkha' stong la lho sprin gtibs pa bzhin// chos sku gcig la yon tan don brjod pa// sku gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mthar phyin sku// rgya mtsho che la chu bran 'dus
373b1(tsha): pa bzhin// byang chub sems la ye shes dpag med 'du// ma spangs ma blangs ched du byar med kyang // byang chub sems la rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// bstan pa'i snying/
373b2(tsha): po gadra na gnas pa na// dus gsum bde gshegs rnams kyang rang bzhin yongs kyi 'du// gang zhig bstan pas snying po med pa na// dus gsum bde gshegs rnams
373b3(tsha): kyang mi chags mi gnas so// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud chen gnas pa na// chos rnams kun kyang de bzhin nyid la sbyor// yon tan 'phrin las 'bras bu mthar phyin/
373b4(tsha): rgyu 'bras chos kun shes rab pha rol phyin// rdo rje rgya gram mkha' dbyings dgra dang sbyor// 'phrin las mthar phyin ye shes rgyud kyi che ba'o// byang chub kyi
373b5(tsha): sems rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya ba las/ gdams pa bstan pa dang rgyud kyi che ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // bcom ldan
373b6(tsha): 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs rgyal ba'i man ngag ngo bstan na// mchod pa'i phyag rgya gsum gyi rang don sprad// grong zad mtha' dang nags
373b7(tsha): tshal dgon pa ru// maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi legs rtsigs te// spos dang tsan dan dri dang chu gtsang 'o ma dang // ba yi rnam lngas byi dor legs byas la// me
374a1(tsha): tog 'bru dang rin chen chom bu dag/ de nas nub gsum tha ma la// maN+Dal khrag dang chang gis chag chag gdab// mchod pa'i yo byad tshogs
374a2(tsha): dang rol mos mchod// ar+ya sArba a pri ta tsakra e ka/ sa pa ri bo d+hi satwa a pri ti tsakra e ka ma hA ma ni sa dA nA/ lo ka d+harma d+hA du A pra ti tsakra e ka/ bri ba dang po la
374a3(tsha): tshogs bsag/ de nas thog ma'i sangs rgyas ngo sprad/ de nas sku gsum gyi snang ba ngo sprad/ de nas rgyud dang man ngag ngo sprad do// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur te
374a4(tsha): man ngag tu shes par bya'o// nor bu dri ma med pa'i rgyud kyi dbang bskur/ lung gser gyi man ngag gi mjug bcad/ lung ma bstan pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i
374a5(tsha): ya shes so// chos su snang ba ni sems can gyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas la chos med do// chos kyi sangs mi rgya'o// chos kyi bde ba tsam thob nus kyis/
374a6(tsha): chos las 'das na rnam par grol// ces dga' rab rdo rjes gsungs so// da ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi g.yo ba'i sa las thugs dam gyi dbang gis spyan
374a7(tsha): drangs par bya ste/ ma g.yel ma 'phang ye shes lha// rgyal po'i pho brang dang rin chen yod pa na// btsan khrom dmag dpung tshogs kyang de na rab tu 'du ba bzhin//
374b1(tsha): gang gis bstan pa'i snying po med cing ma chags mi gnas pa de na// dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyang den yongs su 'du// gang zhig bstan pa'i snying po chags shing yod pa na//
374b2(tsha): dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyang de na rab tu 'du// nyi ma'i snying po gang na shar ba na// 'od zer mang po 'phro zhing 'du ba ltar// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gang na gsal
374b3(tsha): ba na// rgyal bzhi khro'i tshogs kyang de na rab tu gsal// nam mkha' stong la lho sprin gtibs pa bzhin// dum can rigs 'dzin tshogs kyang rab tu 'du// rgya mtsho
374b4(tsha): chen por chu bran 'du ba bzhin// ma srid rgya mtsho'i tshogs yang 'du zhing gshegs// lhun gyis grub pa'i rigs 'dzin ma g.yel cig/ phyag rgya ma skyes de bzhin
374b5(tsha): gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin dang // bdud rtsi sman gyi rigs 'dzin dang // sgrub pa chen po'i rigs 'dzin ma g.yel cig/ 'bras bus smin rigs 'dzan ma g.yal
374b6(tsha): cig/ yo ga tshe yi rigs 'dzin ma g.yel cig/ slob dpon dga' rab rdo rje dang // slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis// bya rgod phung po'i ri bo la//
374b7(tsha): byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// de yi 'khor du ma mo chad pa cis te btang // rgyal po d+ha he ta lo dang /
375a1(tsha): sras kyi thu bo rA dzA ha sa ti yis// chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor
375a2(tsha): bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// klu'i rgyal po 'jog po dang // gnod sbyin ma byang chub kyis// chu bo ngo 'dzan gyi 'gram phug tu//
375a3(tsha): byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// kha che mkhan po
375a4(tsha): rab snang dang // smad 'tshong ma ni bdag nyid mas// kha tshe'i yul he chen brdal ba'i dur khrod du// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun
375a5(tsha): par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// o D+yan mkhan po ma hA rA dzA dang // sras mo mgo ma de byi yis// o D+yan
375a6(tsha): gyi yul a su ra'i brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
375a7(tsha): byin gyis rlobs// a tsa ra mar me mdzad dang // drang srong chen po ba sha ta sa// ri rab rtan 'dzin gyi brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin//
375b1(tsha): de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// a tsa ra d+ha ra ma rA dzA dang // smad 'tshong sangs rgyas dngos grub kyis// za hor
375b2(tsha): gyi yul dur khrod mtha' yas brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil
375b3(tsha): 'khor byin gyis rlobs// slob dpon ku ku ra dzu dang // sring mo pu ru sha zhes pas// sa la'i yul gsang chen rol pa'i dur khrod du// me ri 'bar ba'i brag phug tu//
375b4(tsha): byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// slob dpon
375b5(tsha): 'jam dpal phyi ma dang // rgyal po de ba rA dza yis// chu bo nai rany+dza ra'i brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag
375b6(tsha): sgrub na/ gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// slob dpon bud+d+ha ku b+ha dang // swasti dpal 'phreng ma zhes pa// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du//
375b7(tsha): g.ya' ri gong gi brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin
376a1(tsha): gyis rlobs// slob dpon shri sing ha dang // dge slong ma ni kun dga' mos// dur khrod chen po sku la rdzogs// se sing 'du rgya mtsho dkyil gyi brag
376a2(tsha): phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// slob
376a3(tsha): dpon pa ma mi tra dang // slob dpon dz+nyA na ku ma ras// rgya na sa bod du byon pa'i tshe// ba la yul yang la shod kyi brag phug tu// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gras la
376a4(tsha): ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// slob dpon bai ro tsan dang // rgyal po g.yu sgra snying po
376a5(tsha): yis// tsha ba yul gyi mkhor shod du// byang chub sems kyi dgongs pa gsal ba bzhin// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub na// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil
376a6(tsha): 'khor byin gyis rlobs// gtsad po khri srong lde ba tsan dang // myang ba na chen po sha yi sbyin ldan pas// mchings phu brag phug dag gi dben tsa ru// byang chub sems
376a7(tsha): kyi dgongs pa snyeg pa ltar// de dang 'thun par rnal 'byor bdag sgrub kyis// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs// de yan chad rgya bod 'brel ba'i chos
376b1(tsha): so// 'di man chad rims kyis sgrub pa'i man ngag dang sbyor/ byang chub kyi sems rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa las/ gdams pa bsgrags pa'i dus su tshogs kyi 'khor lo
376b2(tsha): bskor ba dang / rgyud 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang nas bskul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das
376b3(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' lnga phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa dga' rab rdo rjengs// bya rgod phung po'i ri bo la// lhung lo can gyi pho brang du// rdo rje sems dpa'i blugs brtol lo//
376b4(tsha): byang chub sems kyi lde mig gis// gsang ba'i man ngag sgo phye ste// rgyud sde lnga yi rta pho la// rig pa'i ye shes sgra yis gtad// ngo sprod gsum gyi ma pho zhon// shes
376b5(tsha): rab 'gyur med lam du zhugs// 'khor ba'i lam chen+da bsgral nas su// yul ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mkhar ni 'gyur ba med pa'i mkhar// pha ni rig pa'i
376b6(tsha): rgyal po yin// ma ni shes rab skye med yin// bu ni rang byung ye shes yin// de lta bu yi sangs rgyas dang // nga yis rtogs pa'i shes rab 'di// 'jam dpa'
376b7(tsha): bshes gnyen khyod la gtad// 'od ma tshal gyi nags tshal du// ma g.yel rang gi babs su zhog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya yis thob// de nas rim par brgyud pa
377a1(tsha): ni// las 'phro skal bar ldan pa'i lce btsun sang dbang bdag/ yi dam lha yi dngos grub thob pa yin// sangs rgyas thugs kyi dgongs pa
377a2(tsha): nyid brgyud pa// sems can ma rig sgo lnga'i sbugs 'byed pa// mun pa snang bar bsgyur ba'i rgyud sde lnga// mthong ba tsam gyis shes rab pha rol phyin// sangs
377a3(tsha): rgyas 'dus pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud// bskal pa bgrangs nas gter gsum brgyud pa yin// mi nub rgyal mtshan gter gyi 'byung gnas 'di// sa dang
377a4(tsha): lam du bgrod pa'i chos men te// shes rab rmongs pas 'chi bdag bdud pas 'jigs// skal ldan rnams kyi btsas su bzhag pa yin// gsang ba'i rgyud
377a5(tsha): gsum man ngag ma tshol bar// sems sde bco brgyad 'chad pa'i ston pa ni// rang bzo rigs spyad byas pas lce la zhing du rmo// gsang brgyud gsum shes rab
377a6(tsha): ma 'khor bar// bco brgyad dkyus dang don du sbyor shes na// rin chen gser la g.yu yi 'phra bcug 'dra// man drag snying gi pu ti smyu gu 'di// rlung dang ser bus
377a7(tsha): thos su mi rung ste// sangs rgyas spyan gyi dbyings su sbas te bzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyas gdab bo// thugs kyi dgongs pa shes rab blo ldan la// dad ldan
377b1(tsha): brtson 'grus che ba'i sgom pa la// nyid nas nyid du gdams te rgya yis gdab// sems smad bco brgyad gdams ngag mdor bsdus pa// blo ldan shes rab can la bstan par
377b2(tsha): bzhag/ ces rdo rje rtse mo 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gang zag la gtad par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // gsung gi rgyud rdo rje rtse mo 'dus
377b3(tsha): pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bai ma la dang / lo tsa ba ka cog gsum gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa rdzogs so// /
377b4(tsha): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+yas ma dza tan+ta rA dza na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
377b5(tsha): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig ra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying
377b6(tsha): bo rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la/ brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang bar+Nasku mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
377b7(tsha): po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam tshig rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sku rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
378a1(tsha): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsung rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
378a2(tsha): chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje dang / byang chub
378a3(tsha): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rlung rdo rje dang /
378a4(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
378a5(tsha): dpa' chen po sgra rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro rdo rje dang / byang chub sems
378a6(tsha): dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg bya rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems/
378a7(tsha): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjod kyis me lang bas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab ji snyed rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i
378b1(tsha): dbyings dang mnyam pa la yang 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin
378b2(tsha): chen tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang
378b3(tsha): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i dbyings
378b4(tsha): thams cad shin tu gang bar snang bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags
378b5(tsha): chen po'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bgrod pa de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku la zhugs par mdzad do//
378b6(tsha): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po yongs su mnyes par bya ba'i phyir
378b7(tsha): nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i sku las mngon par byung bar gyur to// de la la la ni sangs rgyas spyan
379a1(tsha): m+b+ha/ la la ni m+b+has kI b+h+yan+d+ha/ la la ni gsu / ra mo s+yA sa/ la la ni dam tshig blon mas su/ kha la ni gzugs kyi dbas phywa/ mA la ni sa
379a2(tsha): bo lta bu/ la la ni dri'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni ro'i ngo bo lta bu/ la la ni reg bya'i ngo bo lta bu der yang dag par gnas par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
379a3(tsha): pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdul med pa gru
379a4(tsha): bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid// sna tshogs gzugs kyi kun tu rgyas// sangs rgyas sprin gyi kun tu khyab// 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ gas
379a5(tsha): ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i
379a6(tsha): bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su bzhag par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
379a7(tsha): pa rin chen dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams
379b1(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thugs la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
379b2(tsha): cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/
379b3(tsha): de nas nam mkha'i dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems
379b4(tsha): can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
379b5(tsha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
379b6(tsha): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs so// byin gyis brlabs ma
379b7(tsha): thag tu bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to//
380a1(tsha): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kha nas phyung ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
380a2(tsha): e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni rab byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
380a3(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
380a4(tsha): mchod pa spros pa de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig rin po che'i sprin gyis yang dag par mchod de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba//
380a5(tsha): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje snying po 'dus pa yi// de nyid bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo
380a6(tsha): rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so legs so// 'on kyang 'di ni de bzhin//
380a7(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyang the tsom skye bar byed pa yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
380b1(tsha): mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/ the tsom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang
380b2(tsha): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can du gyur pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang //
380b3(tsha): thugs kyi gsang ba ston par mi spro ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byin gyis brlab par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
380b4(tsha): dam tshig 'byung ba'i tshig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang mngon
380b5(tsha): par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar gyi phyir yang dag par bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
380b6(tsha): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa de mkhyen nas/ ye shes kyi sgron ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
380b7(tsha): par zhugs te/ zhe sdang gi rigs kyi mchog gi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // badz+ra d+h+r-ig/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom
381a1(tsha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs
381a2(tsha): kyis nag po dang dkar po dmar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
381a3(tsha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshag 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gti mu ga ga rigs mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di
381a4(tsha): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dza na dza ga/ de nas 'di phyung ma thug tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
381a5(tsha): gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor ba'i thabs kyis dkar po nag po dmar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
381a6(tsha): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i dpal
381a7(tsha): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung
381b1(tsha): ngo // rat+na d+h+r-ig/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu rin chen dpal
381b2(tsha): gyi phyag rgya chen por sbyor bas nam mkha'i gnas kyis ser po nag po dkar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i rdza
381b3(tsha): phyogs su bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags chen po'i 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
381b4(tsha): 'dod chags kyi rigs mchog gi snying po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // A ro lig/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom
381b5(tsha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rig pa'i bdag po'i phyag rgya chen por
381b6(tsha): sbyor ba'i thabs kyis dmar po nag po dkar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i rgyab tu bzhugs so// de
381b7(tsha): nos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i mchog dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig 'gug
382a1(tsha): pa'i rigs mchog gi snying pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pradz+nyA TIg/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag/
382a2(tsha): tubacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu grub pa gdon mi za ba'i phyag rgya chen por sbyor
382a3(tsha): ba'i thabs kyis ljang gu nag po dkar po'i tshul du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i byang phyogs su bzhugs so//
382a4(tsha): zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang // yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste// rigs lngar gtogs pa 'di rnams kyis// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrub pa'o//
382a5(tsha): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
382a6(tsha): rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dwe Sha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom
382a7(tsha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te// shar phyogs kyi grwar
382b1(tsha): bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
382b2(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mo ha ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan
382b3(tsha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ lho phyogs kyi grwar
382b4(tsha): bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa rjes su chags par byed pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
382b5(tsha): par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'dzin pa btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rA ga
382b6(tsha): ra ti/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / go sung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med
382b7(tsha): kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ nub phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
383a1(tsha): slu ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab 'chang ba'i btsun mo'i mchog
383a2(tsha): 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // badz+ra ra ti/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
383a3(tsha): dang gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid bud med kyi gzugs 'dzin par gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi grwar bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa
383a4(tsha): thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog phun sum tshogs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
383a5(tsha): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlob pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsu dang / thugs
383a6(tsha): rdo rje las phyung ngo // ya man+ta krid/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig
383a7(tsha): pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsnyeng bar byed pa'i tshul du shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
383b1(tsha): thams cad kyi mngon par byang chub pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes
383b2(tsha): bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // pradz+nyA ta krid/ de nas 'di phyung mu thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
383b3(tsha): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid rdo rje dam tshig bsnyengs par byed pa'i tshul bu lho phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas
383b4(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rin po che 'byung gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
383b5(tsha): pa thams cad kyi 'dod chags 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
383b6(tsha): pad+ma ta krid/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin
383b7(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung srid par byed pa'i tshul du nub phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
384a1(tsha): dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
384a2(tsha): gsung dang / thugs kyi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlob pa khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // big+ha nAM to kr-id/ de nas de phyung ma
384a3(tsha): thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i skyes bu de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
384a4(tsha): dang thugs mnyes pa'i tshul du byang phyogs kyi sgor bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyes par byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor
384a5(tsha): gyi dam chog sems dpa' rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
384a6(tsha): thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
384a7(tsha): sku dang gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
384b1(tsha): sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // bla na med pa'i byang chub sems// bcom ldan snying pos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom
384b2(tsha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa mkhyen cing
384b3(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa yang thugs kyi mkhyen nas// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed
384b4(tsha): kyi sems lus lta bu dang / lus sems lta bu dang / sems tshig tu brjod pa lta bur skyed cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po
384b5(tsha): de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nam mkha' lta bur sbyar nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma hA
384b6(tsha): kun tu bzang po yis// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje can// skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis su// skye ba 'di ni rab tu sgrags// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
384b7(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i tshul
385a1(tsha): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po med la sgom pa med// bsgom par bya/
385a2(tsha): bsgom pa min// de ltar dngos po dngos med pas// sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o zhes// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
385a3(tsha): dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon
385a4(tsha): par rtogs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po khams dang
385a5(tsha): skye mched dang // gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam med pas// rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pas// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// zhes
385a6(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
385a7(tsha): thams cad kyi mi zad pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes pas// chos
385b1(tsha): dang chos nyid med pa ste// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas gsungs so//
385b2(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag med par rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
385b3(tsha): zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams thams cad dngos med cing // chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par spangs// bdag med chos las kun tu byung //
385b4(tsha): byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dpal gyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
385b5(tsha): dpag tu med pa/ 'od zer 'bar ba rdo rje sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams
385b6(tsha): la/ ngo bo med cing sgom pa'ang med// nam mkha'i gnas su sbyor ba yis// de ltar dngos po rab tu bsgrags// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
385b7(tsha): dpag tu med pas gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rdo rje/
386a1(tsha): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa
386a2(tsha): nam mkha' bzhin// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// byang chub tshul 'di bstan pa'o zhes// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa gdon mi za
386a3(tsha): bas gsungs so// de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
386a4(tsha): thugs kyi gsang ba'i chos de kho na nyid kyi yi ge thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho sangs rgyas e ma ho chos//
386a5(tsha): chos bshad pa ni ngo mtshar che// yang dag don ni dag pa'i don// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag med pa yi chos las byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs
386a6(tsha): mdzad pa// rnam par mi rtog dmigs su med// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang po thams cad don// byang chub sems ni rab paskor ba// byang chub
386a7(tsha): spyod pa rdo rje che// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ston pa//
386b1(tsha): byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ byang chub kyi sems kyi
386b2(tsha): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
386b3(tsha): cad kyi 'phro ba'i sprin bkod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u 'di gsungs so// oM shu n+ya tar+b+ha
386b4(tsha): na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sgom pa ni// 'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po// sangs rgyas 'bar
386b5(tsha): ba'i 'od dang mnyam// 'od zer sna lngas kun tu khyab// kun nas yongs su zlum po ste// gzungs kyi lha mo lnga la sogs// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab// mchod
386b6(tsha): pa rnam pa lngas brgyan pa// mdor na de ltar sgom nas su// gzugs ni dbus su bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan pa'o//
386b7(tsha): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// phyag rgya 'am ni bsgom par bya// bsdus dang gcig tu sbyor ba yis// mi bskyod pa yi rgyal mchog dang // dkon mchog dpal gyi phyag rgya che//
387a1(tsha): tshe dpag med pa'i 'od byed dang // thogs med grub pa'i rgya chen rnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// in+d+ra nI/
387a2(tsha): la'i kha dog 'dra// rab 'bar phyag na rdo rje bsnams// rnam par gtsigs la 'jigs 'jigs lha// shes dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa//
387a3(tsha): rab 'bar phyag na 'khor lo bsnams// sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan// 'dzam bu chu bo gser 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu 'khrigs// de yi phyag
387a4(tsha): nardo rje che// rtse mo dgu pa rnam par bsgom// margad ta yi 'od 'dra ba// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// kun tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis khyab// phyag na rin chen rnam pa
387a5(tsha): bsgom// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// gtso bo 'dod chags 'bar ba lnga// rab 'a bar phyag na pad+ma ba snams// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// 'od zer sna lnga'i 'od 'dri
387a6(tsha): sku// gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje can// zhi ba phyag na ral gri bsnams// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
387a7(tsha): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
387b1(tsha): byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma d+ha tu swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&ha/ rin chen chen po kha dog lnga// yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshod tsam// sna yi rtse mor nAn tan du//
387b2(tsha): rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsgom// rin chen brtan par gyur nas spro// brtan par ma gyur yongs mi spro// sangs rgyas 'bar ba 'dra ba'i 'od// mchog rab sprin rnams smra/
387b3(tsha): pabapar bya// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma ral gri mtshon cha 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnams// spro ba'i bdag nyid can gyis spro// nam mkha'i dbyings
387b4(tsha): kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i dkyil
387b5(tsha): 'khor 'dra bar ni// bzlas pa sgom pas bsgom par bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni// rin chen brtson pas bsgom par bya// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las
387b6(tsha): byung ba/ nam mkha' 'dra ba bri bar bya// 'di dag sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog/ sku gsung thugs ni bsgom pa yis// dkyil 'khor rdo rje las byung ba// thams cad mkhyen/
387b7(tsha): pa'i tshul thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
388a1(tsha): gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
388a2(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs
388a3(tsha): pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad yang dag
388a4(tsha): spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba// kun tu bzang po
388a5(tsha): gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur//
388a6(tsha): dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum la khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtso// 'jig rten gsum
388a7(tsha): mchog ston pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul// dkyil 'khor rab tu nyam
388b1(tsha): dga' bshad// de nas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad
388b2(tsha): pabapar bya// lus ngag sems ni bsgom pa yis// shes rab can gyi thig btab bya// thig skud gsar pa legs bkal ba// tshad mar rab tu mdzes pa yis// thugs kyi
388b3(tsha): dkyil 'khor dam pa de// khru ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// ngos bzhi dang ni grwa bzhir ldan// sgo bzhi pa ni rab tu brtag/ de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni// rab tu zlum po bri
388b4(tsha): par bya// de nas las kyi cho ga ni// mthong bas phyag rgya dgod par bya// de dbus rdo rje bri ba ni// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// 'bar ba chen po rtse lnga pa// 'jigs pa
388b5(tsha): dag kyang rab 'jigs byed// 'khor lo chen po shar phyogs su// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen chen po lho phyogs su// 'od zer mang pos rab tu 'khrigs/
388b6(tsha): pad+ma chen po nub phyogs su// pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// ral gri chen po byang phyogs su// 'od zer mang po rab tu 'khrigs// dbus na sprin dang 'dra ba'i 'od// spyan
388b7(tsha): ni shar phyogs kA ru bri// mA ma ki yi rigs byung ba'i// rdo rje de bzhin lho phyogs su// pad+ma kha phye sdong po bcas// nub phyogs su ni bri bar bya// ut+pal mdzes pa byeng
389a1(tsha): phyogs su// mthing kha sprin dang 'dra bar bri// tho ba 'bar ba 'od gsal ba// shar phyogs sgor ni bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar sogs 'od bzang ba//
389a2(tsha): be con lho yi phyogs su bri// pad+ma 'bar ba 'od byed ni// nub kyi phyogs su bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khyil pa rdo rje can// byang gi phyogs su rdo rje bri// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa
389a3(tsha): de// yongs su gsal bar shes byas nas// lus dang ngag sems mchod pa yis// nan tan du ni mchod pa bya// bud med rab tu mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu
389a4(tsha): drug lon pa ni// dri dang me tog 'phreng brgyan te// yon tan ska rag mA ma kir// shes rab can gyi byin brlabs la// de yi dbus su mnyes par bya// sangs rgyas zhi
389a5(tsha): ba'i gnas spros pas// nam mkha'i dbyings ni rab tu brgyan// bshang gci khu ba khrag la sogs// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas dang //
389a6(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' grags chen mnyes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs
389a7(tsha): pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni// kun gyi sku dang gsung thugs kyi// rdo rje 'chang
389b1(tsha): ba'i rgyal po ni// gnas kyi dbang phyug dkon mchog gis// spyod pa kun mchog chos kyi don// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal to// rnam par mi rtog don las phyung //
389b2(tsha): 'dod chags zhe sdang ga ti mug rigs// theg pa mchog ni bla med pa'i// dngos grub ra ba mchog sgrub par byed// rigs ngan smig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod don
389b3(tsha): don gnyer sems dpa' rnams// theg chen bla na med pa yi// theg mchog 'di la 'grub par 'gyur// sems can mtshams med la sogs pa'i// sdig pa chen po byed
389b4(tsha): pa yang // rdo rje theg pa rgya mtsho che// theg pa mchog ni 'di la 'grub// snying nas slob dpon smod pa dag/ bsgrubs kyang 'grub par yongs mi 'gyur// srog gcod pa yi
389b5(tsha): sems can gang // brdzun du smra la dga' ba dang // gzhan gyi nor la chags pa dang // rtag tu 'dod la spyod pa gang // bshang gci zas su za ba ste// de dag grub pa'i snod du
389b6(tsha): 'gyur// ma dang sring mo bu mo la// 'dod pa pas ni brnyes byas na/ theg chen mchog gi chos nyid kyi// dngos grub rgya chen de thob bo// sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag
389b7(tsha): la/ rnam par mi rtog blo can gyis// brnyes par byas kyang mi gos te// des ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
390a1(tsha): sel ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
390a2(tsha): kyi bdag po ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'di lta bu'i tshig ngan pa gsung zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
390a3(tsha): kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshig gsan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka
390a4(tsha): stsal to// rigs kyi bu rnams thong de skad ma zer cig/ snying po ye shes can rnams kyi// sangs rgyas chos nyid dag pa 'di// snying po chos kyi don las byung //
390a5(tsha): byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// de nas yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab la sogs pa'i rdul phra mo snyed kyi byang
390a6(tsha): chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs skrag nas brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag
390a7(tsha): brgyal bar gyur pa gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to//
390b1(tsha): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bslang bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
390b2(tsha): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ bcom
390b3(tsha): ldan 'das sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi gdan la gnas par gyur
390b4(tsha): to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur/ dgyes pas khyab par gyur nas/ chos kyi dbyangs 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma ho
390b5(tsha): chos e ma ho chos// e ma ho chos kyi don 'byung ba// chos don dag pa bdag med pa// rdo rje rgyal po phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku dang gsung thugs rab tu dag/ nam mkha'
390b6(tsha): dang ni mnyam nyid gnas// rnam par mi 'gyur snang ba med// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtso// dus gsum dag pa'i lam
390b7(tsha): du byung // nam mkha' chen po dbyings gyur pa// nam mkha'i lam la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha'i sku la yang dag byung // nam mkha'i lam la gnas pa'o//
391a1(tsha): nam mkha'i thugs de chos kyi mchog/ spyod pa'i gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi
391a2(tsha): gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ kun tu spyod pa'i mchog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs/
391a3(tsha): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so//
391a4(tsha): oM sarba ta thA ga tarbat+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdul dang bral ba'i rdo rje'i gnas zhes bya ba'i
391a5(tsha): ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
391a6(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa mnyam pa nyid mi gnyis pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gsung byin gyi rlob pa'i sngags 'di
391a7(tsha): gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ rdo rje gsum po de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // gnas ni gnas kyis rnam par bsgom par bya//
391b1(tsha): sngags kyi mtshan gyis shin tu mtshan byas la// mchog rab 'di yis sgrub pa nyid du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog to// ye shes smon
391b2(tsha): ma rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga nA badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ko&haM/ de nas bcom ldan
391b3(tsha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU tsa badz+ra
391b4(tsha): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&ha/ rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin mchod par bya// mchod pa rnam pa lnga rnams kyis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob
391b5(tsha): 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de nas
391b6(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags
391b7(tsha): kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni// ngag dang yid kyi skul nas su// yid ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis// dngos grub rab mchog
392a1(tsha): bsgrub par bya// sems la dmigs pa bdag med pas// ngagra dang lus kyang rnam par sgom// nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas//
392a2(tsha): sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgrub par bya// lus dang ngag dang sams dmigs na// ngo bo nyid ni dmigs su med// sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la// byang chub med cing sgom
392a3(tsha): papo med// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid du// 'di ni mdor na rnam dpyad pas// sngags kyi rtags pa'i ting nge 'dzin// byang chub sbyor ba bsgom par bya// de nas
392a4(tsha): dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mchod// sangs rgyas kun mchog kun mkhyen gyis// bsgom pa'i mchog ni bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i
392a5(tsha): dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab sgom nas// phra mo'i sbyor ba kun tu brtsam// sna yi rtse mor
392a6(tsha): yungs kar bsam// 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar la// ye shes gnas ni nyams dga' ba// gsang ba'i ye shes rtag par sgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
392a7(tsha): gnas par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi gnas bsgoms te// de yi steng du gnas gzhag go/ hUM/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas
392b1(tsha): par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la// rdo rje pad+mor rnam par bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rin chen
392b2(tsha): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dang po'i sbyor ba nan tan gyis// de yi stengs su yongs su bsgom// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
392b3(tsha): par bya// gsung gi rdo rje tshul sbyor bas// 'dod chags rdo rje can bsgom bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
392b4(tsha): sangs rgyas tshul ni zhi ba spro// 'khor dang khyad par dag tu spro// ut+pal mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rtse mo lnga pa khyad par du// nas ni 'bru tsam nan tan gyis// sna yi
392b5(tsha): rtse mor rnam par bsam// rtsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// sna yi rtse mor 'di shes te// sgom pas byang chub gzhol bar 'gyur// 'khor
392b6(tsha): lo la sogs khyad par du// bsgom pa de ni brtag par bya// dngos grub thams cad yon tan gnas// nyams dga' byang chub gnas 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub
392b7(tsha): gnas rnams ni// de ru mdor na spro bar bya// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma yi// chos kyi tshig rnams rab tu brjod// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid don kun ston pa
393a1(tsha): pos// spyod pa kun mchog legs dag pa// gsang ba dam pa bka' stsal to// gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan par// shes rab can gyis zla drug bsgom//
393a2(tsha): gsang ba'i de nyid mchod chen gyis// legs par mchod nas bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'bras bu 'dod pa yi// zas su bshang gci zos na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub skyon
393a3(tsha): med pa// yang dag bla med 'grub par 'gyur// zas su sha rnams za ba dang // sha chen dgra ni rab brtags na// sku dang gsung thugs gsang ba yi// dngos grub thams cad
393a4(tsha): 'grub par 'gyur// glang po'i sha dang rta yi sha/ de bzhin dam pa khyi yi sha/ zas kyi phyir ni bza' bar bya// zas gzhan dag ni ma zos na// byang chub sems dpa' blo can
393a5(tsha): dang // sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'dod khams dbang phyug 'jig rten na// go 'phangs
393a6(tsha): las ni byed par 'gyur// gtso bo gzi can stobs dang ldan// mdangs bzang mthong na yid du 'ong // mthong ba tsam gyis bskal pa yis// 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du
393a7(tsha): gyur/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba byang chub dam pa ste// yang dag sngags kyi gsang ba ni// lus ngag sems las 'das pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
393b1(tsha): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsub dang / thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs byin gyis rlob pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
393b2(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po da ma chog chen po'i de kho na nyid sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog
393b3(tsha): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u 'di gsungs so// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la'ang // ji ltar 'dod par bsten na ni// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yas//
393b4(tsha): sangs rgyas myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// 'di ltar 'dod pas bsten byas te// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// pa dag dang gzhan la
393b5(tsha): mchod par bya// dka' thu ba sdom pa mi bzad pas// bstan kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi// kha dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// bsten na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
393b6(tsha): slongs mo za zhing mi bzlas te// slongs la'ang dga' bar mi bya'o// 'dod pa dag la longs spyod cing // sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams bzlas// lus dang ngag dang sems
393b7(tsha): rnams ni// bde bar gnas na byang chub thob// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
394a1(tsha): sngags kyi spyod pa mchog spyod rnams// chos mchog mi g.yo brnyes pa yang // 'dod pa thams cad bsten pas so// chags can ye shes 'dod pa yis/
394a2(tsha): rtag tu 'dod yon lnga rnam bsten// byang chub sems dpa' brnyes par bya// byang chub nyi ma chags par bya// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas// mchod par byed
394a3(tsha): pas mchod par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad bzhi// sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//
394a4(tsha): de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gtso// dril rnam gsum shes byas nas// sangs rgyas tshogs la dbul bar bya// de nyid
394a5(tsha): bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// 'dod chags chos kyi 'byung ga nas gtso// ro la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid sangs rgyas sna
394a6(tsha): tshogs pa// sangs rgyas thogs med rdo rje 'dzin// reg la rnam gsum shes byas nas// bdag gi rigs la dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// mi bskyod
394a7(tsha): pa yi tshul brnyes pa'o// gzugs sgra dri la sogs pa la// rtag tu sems ni sbyang bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i snying po 'dus pa'o//
394b1(tsha): gzugs sgra la sogs bsngags pa yi// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// yang na de la sgom pa ni// rigs kyi tshul du rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas rjes su dran par sbyor//
394b2(tsha): chos ni rjes su dran bsgom bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams bsgom// rdo rje rjes su dran bsgom pa// rigs ni rjes su dran par sbyor// khro bo rjes su dran bsgom pa/
394b3(tsha): lha ni rjes su dran par bsgom// bsgom na byang chub thob par 'gyur// bud med gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyi rlob kyi gnas
394b4(tsha): gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo'i mchog/ spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas//
394b5(tsha): sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// yi ge hU dang a dag dang // phaT kyang rab tu bsgom par bya// 'od zer rnam lngas khyab pa yi// pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar
394b6(tsha): bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor la sogs// byang chub 'dod pas bsgom par bya// de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran
394b7(tsha): pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling+ga gzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro//
395a1(tsha): de la chos rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// kha spu rnams kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas
395a2(tsha): chos kyi sprin rnams spro// de la rdo rje rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// ba spu rnams kyi bu ga nas//
395a3(tsha): rdo rje sprin rnams spro bar bya// de la rigs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom// baspu rnams kyi
395a4(tsha): bu ga nas// mkhas pas rigs kyi sprin rnams spro// de la khro bo rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ b+ha ga la ni ling ga gzhag/ khro bo'i dbang po rab tu bsgom// ba spu rnams
395a5(tsha): kyi bu ga nas// mkhas pas khro bo'i sprin rnams spro// de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ bdag gi rdo rje pad+mor ldan// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te//
395a6(tsha): rang gi khu ba'i thig le yis// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' mchod// de la dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste//
395a7(tsha): mkhas pas rang gi khu ba dag/ sbyor ba pas ni rtag tu dbyung // dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor tshul du bya// de la sku rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku
395b1(tsha): gang yin// phung po lnga yis rab tu brgyan// sangs rgyas sku yi rang bzhin gyis// bdag kyang de dang 'dra gyur cig/ de la gsung rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rdo rje
395b2(tsha): chos kyi gsung gang yin// gsung de nges tshig phun sum tshogs// bdag gi tshig kyang de 'dra ste// chos 'dzin pa dang 'drar gyur cig/ de la thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar
395b3(tsha): bsgom zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po blo ldan pa// kun tu bzang po'i thugs gang yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni// bdag gi sems kyang de 'drar gyur// de la sems can
395b4(tsha): rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' dang mtshungs par
395b5(tsha): spyod gyur cig/ de la sngags thams cad kyi gzugs dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ sngags kyi rdo rje sku gang yin//
395b6(tsha): gsung gi sku yang rnams bsgoms pa// bdag kyang rtag tu de 'dra bar// sngags 'dzin pa dang mnyam gyur cig/ de la dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ dam
395b7(tsha): tshig khungs chung cho ga bzhin// 'bras bu 'dod pas btung bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad nas// dngos grub rab tu thob par 'gyur// de la shes rab kyi pha
396a1(tsha): rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal ba// thams cad ma skyes zag pa med// byang chub med cing mngon
396a2(tsha): rtogs med// khams kyang med cing kha byung ba'ang med// de la ma skyes pa rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom zhe na/ thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// mtshan med mi 'gyur
396a3(tsha): nam mkha' bzhin// gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi// shin tu dri med nam mkha' bzhin// de la zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i mchod ma rjes su dran pa ji ltar bsgom
396a4(tsha): zhe na/ bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la// rigs kyi sbyor bas rab bsgom ste// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin
396a5(tsha): gshegs pa'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs dang ni// chos 'dzin mchog gi gsung dag kyang // tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang 'grub//
396a6(tsha): gang gzhan phra mor bshad pa rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom ste// bzlas pa tsam gyis de 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
396a7(tsha): dang thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
396b1(tsha): pa rdo rje dkon mchog tog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la bstod pa 'di gsol ba btab go/
396b2(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' theg pa che// nam mkha'i spyod pa rnam skyong ba// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i mchog/ rgyal mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
396b3(tsha): che// rdo rje theg pa rab ston pa// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ rgyal gzhi mchod pa bshad du gsol// thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa// theg pa gsum
396b4(tsha): gyi lam la gnas// sangs rgyas skal mchog dag pa'i bdag/ mi mchog mchod pa bshad du gsol// byang chub sems ni rgyas pa'i spyan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor
396b5(tsha): ba/ sku dang gsung thugs shin tu dag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje theg pa la'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad
396b6(tsha): dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rdo rje rin chen 'dzin// rgyal ba 'byung bar gyur pa bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum gnas
