396b7(tsha): pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs skal mchog/ na chung gzhon nu mig yangs pa// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan pa ni// lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon rnyed// byol song
397a1(tsha): las kyang rab tu brtag/ sa phyogs gtsang zhing rnam par dben pa 'am// rgyal nyid skyes zhing zhi ba'i gnas rnams su// bshang gci chu la sogs
397a2(tsha): pas byugs pa 'am// rgyal ba mchod phyir rtag pa rab tu bya// nu ma'i dbus par spyi gtsug mtha' yi bar// chog shes pas yang na rkang pa'i bar// lte ba rked pa gas
397a3(tsha): ba ra rgyal ba'i sras// rigs lnga rnams ni dgod par rab tu bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes rgya mtsho bsgom par bya// bdag nyid zla ba'i
397a4(tsha): dbus gnas par// mkhas pas snying khar bsgom par bya// zhi ba rdo rje 'dzin 'dod na// bsdu ba dag kyang rab tu bya// rin chen sna bzhi'i mchod rten la// 'od zer
397a5(tsha): 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// ye shes rgya mtsho dus gsum gyis// gnas de yin par rnam par bsam// bdag gi ba spu'i bu ga nas// mkhas pas mchod pa'i
397a6(tsha): sprin rnams spro// mkhas pas ut+pa la dag dang // pad+ma rnam pa lnga shes bya// dza ti rnam gsu ma shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// me tog kar
397a7(tsha): ni ka ra dang // ma li ka dang yu ti ka/ me tog ka ra bi ra bsam// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor
397b1(tsha): bsgom byas la// rnam par mkhas pas rtag par ni// rigs rnams rab tu dgod par bya// de bzhin pad+mo rdo rje dang // ral gri ut+pa la mkhas pas bsgom// dpag tshad brgya
397b2(tsha): yi khyon tsam du// gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa yi// mchod rten rin chen sna bzhi pa// gsal zhing rang bzhin dri ma med// rigs rnams thams cad mchod pa'i
397b3(tsha): phyir/ shes rab can gyi gnas gsum bsgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// de la mchod pa rgya mtsho brtsa ma// rin chen na bza' la sogs pas//
397b4(tsha): / byang chub 'dod pas rtag tu mchod// mchod pa rnam lnga'i mchog rnams kyis// rtag tu lha rnams mnyes par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas na chung mchog/
397b5(tsha): rin chen sna tshogs mchog gis brgyan// sgrub tshe rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya// zhing 'di rin chen sna bdun gyis// mkhas pa dag
397b6(tsha): gis yongs bkang nas// dngos grub 'dod pa sa sbyin pa'i phyir// nyi na re shes rab can gyis dbu la// bdag po'i phyag rgyar mnyam bzhag la// sangs rgyas
397b7(tsha): dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// 'dod chags blo can sangs rgyas la// reg pa'i sbyor bas dbul bar bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor
398a1(tsha): bkod pa bsgom par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gi lus// bla ma bshang dang gci bas mchod// bzhin bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi// na chub
398a2(tsha): skal ba mchog ldan pa// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas bsam ste// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu brtag/ mig bzang brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas bza'
398a3(tsha): bar bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa sten// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gas pa // sngags rnams dngos grub byed par gsungs
398a4(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gas pa chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ bshang gci'i dam tshig gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// /
398a5(tsha): / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog/ dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis//
398a6(tsha): sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dkyil 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes can gyis gsang // nyams dga'i mchog ni rab tu bshad// nam
398a7(tsha): mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje mi bskyod rab sgom na// lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'od 'phro mang po 'ab rang
398b1(tsha): dang // 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang // dus gsum pa yi sangs rgyas rnams// sgom na rdo rje phye mar rlag/ sku gsung thugs kyi longs spyod ni// rdo rjes phyer brlags med
398b2(tsha): gyur pa// bsam gtan mchog de bsgoms na ni// thugs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang ba 'di lta bus// sems can thams cad bsad na ni// mi
398b3(tsha): bskyod sangs rgyas zhing dag tu// rgyal ba'i sras su skye ba 'gyur// 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de/ rigs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho yin par shes par
398b4(tsha): bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes thar pa rab sgrub pa// ngo bo nyid dag gos pa med// byang chub spyod pa rab ston pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa yis//
398b5(tsha): yang dag dam tshag bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// 'khor po rid kyi la 'khor bsgom par bya// rnam par snang mdzad rab bsgoms te//
398b6(tsha): sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par sgrosgom// rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gzugs ni rab tu brtag/ nor rnams thams cad phrogs nas su// rdo rje gsum du rnam
398b7(tsha): sgom na// nor gyi rgya mtsho gang ba yin// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras rnams dang // thub pa'i skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni rigs
399a1(tsha): kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las// gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig yang dag pa nyid du shes par bya'o// de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags thar pa rab
399a2(tsha): sgrub pa// gas pab dag pa dmigs med par// dkyil 'khor ra ba tu bkal stsal to// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par
399a3(tsha): bya// dpag med tshe ni rab sgom ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad dag // bud med lta bur sbyar ba ni// dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de ru bsgom
399a4(tsha): par bya// 'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog go/ dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// mi phyed sku gsum bsgom pa'o//
399a5(tsha): 'di ni 'dod chags kyi yang dag pa'i dam tshig ste/ sngags pa rnams kyis bsgom par bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sngags kyi don sgrub pa// bdag med
399a6(tsha): ye shes las byung ba// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje thogs med rab
399a7(tsha): sgoms te// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas// rdo rje tshig gi rdzun smra bas// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas rnams dang // rgyal
399b1(tsha): ba thams cad bslu bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i gsung de dri med pa// ye shes blo can kun gyis gsang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par
399b2(tsha): bshad/ 'di ni dam tshig gus pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid de/ don ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyas gnas
399b3(tsha): rdo rje dngos grub rab ston pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dam tshig dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// dkon mchog
399b4(tsha): tog ni rab sgom ste// gzugs rnams kun gyi 'di dag bkang // rtsub pa'i ngag la sogs pa ni// bsten nA ye shes thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
399b5(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i bkod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje tog la sogs
399b6(tsha): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ngo mtshar du gyur cing smad du gyur nas/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
399b7(tsha): cad kyi bdag po khams gsum las 'das shing 'jig rten thams cad las 'das pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad kyi
400a1(tsha): 'khor gyi nang du/ 'di lta bu'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gi lam rdo rje'i tshig ci'i slad du gsung / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
400a2(tsha): pa thams cad kyis/ brjod kyis mi lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam chog rdo rje tog la
400a3(tsha): sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dman pa'i 'du shes dang smad pa'i 'du shes 'di lta bu a skyed
400a4(tsha): cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni spyod pa'i mchog go/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi spyod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'o// rigs//
400a5(tsha): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ste/ chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khongs su gtogs pa'o// chos de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i
400a6(tsha): khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas// 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu chos thams/
400a7(tsha): cad kyang de ltar rjes su rigs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni don gyi dab 'di lta bu mkhyen cing / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas chos 'chad par
400b1(tsha): mdzad do// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i tshig de ltar nges par brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig de dag la rjes su rig par bya// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na
400b2(tsha): gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / mi'i lag pa bskyod pa'i rkyen gyis du ba myur du 'byung zhing me 'byung ba 'gyur mod kyis/ me de yang gtsub shing la yang mi gnas
400b3(tsha): gtsub stan la yang mi gnas/ mi'i lag pa bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig kyang 'gro ba dang 'ong
400b4(tsha): ba la sogs pa rjes su rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du gyur/ smad du gyur nas/ ngam zhing gdangs te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so//
400b5(tsha): rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa dang // rnam par mi rtog dag pa las// kun rdzob tu yang bshad pa mtshar// de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas
400b6(tsha): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gas pa chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig gi le'u ste dgu pa'o// /
400b7(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dam tshige chen po rdo rje de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa sku dang /
401a1(tsha): gsung dang / thugs gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de nyid sngags snying kun bsdus pa// sku dang gsung
401a2(tsha): thugs gsang bar bsgrags// dngos grub chen po'i tshul gyi mchog/ yang dag bcom ldan bshad du gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// nyon mongs kun gyi
401a3(tsha): rgya mtsho gtso// 'bar ba drag po spyan yangs pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lus dang dag dang sems rnams ni// rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pa// gang na'ang mi
401a4(tsha): gnas mnyam pa nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa pha rol tu phyin pa sngags kyi tshul rdo rje zhes bya
401a5(tsha): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
401a6(tsha): ces bos nas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rig pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs cig tu/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba la
401a7(tsha): rol pa ston par mdzad de/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyi rol cing dgyes pa yongs su spyod pa yod kyang / de dag sngags spyod
401b1(tsha): pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la/ kye ma 'di dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyis chos rdzogs par gyur to snyam nas/ spyan
401b2(tsha): ras kyis mi 'tsho ste/ de bas na skyes bu dam pa de dag la spyan ras kyis btsa' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i sngags
401b3(tsha): kyi gsang ba/ sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun tu skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ rab tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam
401b4(tsha): tshig la dmigs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
401b5(tsha): thugs kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa/ 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas/ sngags bsdus pa 'di lta bu gsungs so// oM
401b6(tsha): hU A swA hA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// de nas phyag na/
401b7(tsha): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dam tshig 'di gsungs so// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi
402a1(tsha): dbus gnas yi ge hU// rang gi gzugs su rab tu brtag/ rdo rje'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar// rnam par 'phro ba bsam par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gsung
402a2(tsha): thugs// drangs par de yi rab bsgom na// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog
402a3(tsha): rang gi dkyil 'khor rang rdo rje// skyed par byed pa'i tshul du 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// snying po rdo rje 'dus pa yin// rang sngags skyes bur bsgom nas ni/
402a4(tsha): gnas bzhi rnams su gzugs kyi tshul// zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// kha dog gsum du rab tu bsgom// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal
402a5(tsha): / de la 'di nyi rjem tshig gi gsang pag/ khyi pa'i dasam bram mo// dkyi latshar rnamapa ni thasas pa/ sa ma chos su myu ba'i che// dayi dbus srabs sa
402a6(tsha): bya// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gsum rnams bsgom par bya// de yi snying khar brdab byas te// lha rnams ji
402a7(tsha): snyed bskul bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa'o// rdo rje pad+mo rigs la sogs// rdo rje zhi ba rnams bsgom zhing // snying ka ru ni bskul
402b1(tsha): bar bshad// 'di ni rol mo'i 'byung ba ste// rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di// zhag bdun bar du byas na ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyi gsang // sku dang gsung thugs 'grub
402b2(tsha): par 'gyur// mchog gsol ba dag rnam par gzigs// yid ni 'jigs shing skrag 'gyur na// yid la mgu zhing dga' gyur pa'i// dngos grub rgya chen ster bar 'gyur//
402b3(tsha): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog bsgrub pas// rmongs pas 'da' bar byas na ni// de yi srog ni der zad 'gyur// de nas rgyal
402b4(tsha): po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje gsum gyi ston pa mchog/ 'jig rten gsum mchog rdo rje gtsos// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa// rdo rje gsum gyi
402b5(tsha): ye shes rdzogs// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yi// dngos po thams cad brtag par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi dam tshig sgom pa'o// rig mdapa
402b6(tsha): phyug zhugs pa la// rdo rje sbyor bas rab bsgom zhing // chags la chags pas blta bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin
402b7(tsha): gshegs pa kun gyi sras// thams cad dbang skur sangs rgyas gtso// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ji snyed yod pa kun//
403a1(tsha): phyag rgya che sogs sbyor ba yis// de dag thams cad nye bar spyad// bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro bya// bcom ldan 'das
403a2(tsha): byang chub kyi dam tshig gis de skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i// byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni rgyal rgya mtsho// rdo rje sems
403a3(tsha): dpa' tshe des thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsapa chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
403a4(tsha): snying po bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
403a5(tsha): rdo rje'i sngags kyi skyes bu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags rdo rje rigs pa'i skyes bu'i le'u 'di gsungs
403a6(tsha): so// rdo rje gsum yig sngags kyi mchog/ phyag rgya chen po rnam bsgoms pa// byang chub thams cad thob pa'i phyir// ye shes rdo rje dag gi bya// oM ni ye shes snying po ste//
403a7(tsha): rdo rje'i klu ni 'thob byed pa'o// a ni byang chub bdag med pa// rdo rje'i gsung ni 'thob byed pa'o// hU ni sku gsung thugs nyid de// rdo rje mi byed gsum thob pa'o// bcom ldan
403b1(tsha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung drang / thugs kyi sngags skyes bus de skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas par// dkyil 'khor rdo rje
403b2(tsha): kun skyes bsam// rdo rje sprin ni 'phro ba bskyed// de ru yi ge bruM bsam mo// de la 'di ni ye shes rdo rje'i snying po'o// bru/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hU zhes
403b3(tsha): bya ba rab tu bsgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge oM ni rnam par bsam// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge a ni rab tu bsgom//
403b4(tsha): / yi ge bru gyi gnas bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum 'byung bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gsum gyi gsang bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying po dus gsum
403b5(tsha): sangs rgyas kyi// sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa// oM ni sangs rgyas sku yi mchog/ a ni sangs rgyas gsung gi lam// hUM ni ye shes thugs kyi dbyings// hUM/ byang chub
403b6(tsha): tshul mchog 'di yin te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas byang chub ra ba bsgom pa// ye shes rdo rjes sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung //
403b7(tsha): 'di dag sangs rgyas skyes bu ste// sngags kyi rigs pa zhes kyang bsgrags// rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom pa'i// dam tshig dag gis rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa
404a1(tsha): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsu dang / thugs kyi dam chog de kho na nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
404a2(tsha): dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar// sbyor ba 'di ni kun brtsams na// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'grub// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam
404a3(tsha): pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus bsams te// rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed// yi ge oM ni snying khar gzhag/ 'od zer sna lnga'i sprin chen po// rnam par snang mdzad
404a4(tsha): mchog tu bsgom// 'di yis sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// rdo rje rnam snang rgya mtshor 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// sangs rgyas sku ni 'dra ba'i mdog/ rdo rje bskal pa
404a5(tsha): gsum du gnas// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang bas de skad bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje 'od zer
404a6(tsha): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus su bsam// rang gi sngags kyi skyes bu bskyed// a ni ngagra
404a7(tsha): gi lam gzhag ste// kha dog lnga pa'i pad+ma che// 'jig rten dbang mchog bsgoms pa yis// dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te// tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog/ chos kyi
404b1(tsha): dam tshig lam gnas pa// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gsang bas de
404b2(tsha): skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/
404b3(tsha): nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rang sngags skyes bu rdzogs byas la// sems la yi ge hUM gnas pa// dam tshig chen po'i de nyid ni// kha dog rnam lngar bsgom par bya//
404b4(tsha): rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba'i gnas// ye shes rdo rje dag gis bya// ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba// ye shes yon tan rgya mtshor gyur// ye shes lnga ldan bsten na ni// rdo rje bskal
404b5(tsha): pa gsum du gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thugs gas bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam
404b6(tsha): tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje chen po bsgom par bya// lus rnams kun la kha dmigs na// rdo rje me
404b7(tsha): shes mkha' mnyam 'gyur// khaM/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yang dang yang du mchod pa dang // bskal pa gsum du dam tshig gnas// sangs rgyas
405a1(tsha): kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sku dang / gsung dang /
405a2(tsha): thugs mi snang ba 'byung ba bkod pa 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rang sngags skyes bu rab bsam sa la//
405a3(tsha): snying kar rdo rje haM zhes pa// gzhag ste 'od zer rnam par bsgom// ha/ 'jam dpal dam tshag longs spyod la// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sa bcu dag la
405a4(tsha): gnas pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' de 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zla ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'od zer
405a5(tsha): 'bar ba'i yi ge hrI// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// mtshon mchog rdo rje'i lus dag gis// rdo rje sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// b+hI/ nam mkha'i rdo rje dam tshig bkod/
405a6(tsha): pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sangs rgyas mngon shes dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi//
405a7(tsha): sangs rgyas mngon shes mchog bsgrub bo// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje sems dpal rab bsgom la//
405b1(tsha): ye shes oM ni bsgom par bya// oM/ dam tshig rdo rje gsum bsgom pas// mi bskyod rdo rje gsum 'drar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka'
405b2(tsha): stsal to// mi bskyod pa yi sku 'dra dang // gsung dang thugs mchog 'dra ba 'dzin// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad du// mi bskyod rdo rje mchod par 'gyur//
405b3(tsha): bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i sku dang mnyam par mngon par 'byung ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus
405b4(tsha): su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od bzang bsam// nam mkha'i rdo rje rab bsgom la// rin chen oM ni bsam par bya// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms
405b5(tsha): pas// rdo rje gsum gyi dpal 'drar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// dkon mchog dpal gyi 'od dang 'dra// de ni bdag med byang chub dang // ye shes
405b6(tsha): gsang ba 'dra gnas 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dkon mchog tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// rin po che longs spyod rdo rje dam tshig longs
405b7(tsha): spyod rdo rje'i tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// 'jig rten dbang
406a1(tsha): phyug rab bsgom la// chos kyi o ni bsgom par bya// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgoms pas// rdo rje gsum 'drar dpag med 'gyur// lus
406a2(tsha): dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// 'od dpag med dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyis// theg chen lam ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu
406a3(tsha): med pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// yon tan 'od dpag tu med pa rdo rje'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su
406a4(tsha): ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje ut+pal rab bsgom la// dam tshig oM ni rab bsgom la// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum bsgom pas// rdo rje gdon
406a5(tsha): mi za bar 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rdo rje thog med 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni dpal ldan ye shes mtsho// sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom
406a6(tsha): ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za bas de skad ces bka' stsal to// gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'od zer ye shes kyi mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
406a7(tsha): nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// rdo rje snang mdzad rab sgom pa// sku gsum o ni rab tu sgom// oM/ rdo rje dam tshig gsum
406b1(tsha): sgom pas// rnam snang mdzad dang mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// rnam par snang mdzad 'dra ba'i 'od// de ni ye shes rdzogs byang chub// sku gsum mi
406b2(tsha): phyed sgrub phyed 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to// lus dang / ngag dang / yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa'i
406b3(tsha): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par dben pa'i ri bo dang // rnam pa sna tshogs ri bo dang // klung dang 'bab chu rnams dang ni// dur gyi khrod la sogs
406b4(tsha): par yang // bsam gtan bsdus pa 'di dag bsgom// mi bskyod ye shes dag la sogs// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil du bsam// mngon shes lnga po'i sbyor ba yis//
406b5(tsha): sangs rgyas mchog gi gnas su sgom// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// 'bar ba lnga yis
406b6(tsha): rnam par brgyan// gnas lnga dag tu sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// mi rtag mang po 'khrugs pa yis// rang sngags 'khor lo bsgom par bya// rdo rje lnga
406b7(tsha): pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mngon shes 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil nyid du// 'khor lo sangs rgyas 'bar 'od 'dra// sangs rgyas 'jug par rab bsgoms
407a1(tsha): na// sangs rgyas gnas dang 'dra bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdag gi lus la snang mdzad gzhag/ snying kar yi ge
407a2(tsha): oM bsam la// sngags la rnam par shes pa bsgom// 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// gang tshe de la skye 'gyur na// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa// yid bzhin dpal
407a3(tsha): ldan lta bur 'gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mi bskyod rab tu bsgom// snying kar yi ge hUM bsgoms na// sems ni thig ler gyur pa
407a4(tsha): grazhag/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// snying kar yi ge a bsam ste// rdo rje thig ler gyur pa gzhag/ 'di ni dam
407a5(tsha): tshig cho ga mchog/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum sgom pa// 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes te// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par//
407a6(tsha): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge oM// bsam na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// chos kyi dkyil 'khor
407a7(tsha): bsgom par bya// lus ngag sems la yi ge A// bsam na de ni bskal par gnas// rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// lus ngag
407b1(tsha): sems la yi ge hUM// bsam na de ni bskal par gnas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis de skad bka' stsal to// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi//
407b2(tsha): rnal 'byor 'dir 'gyur phyin chad ni// klog gam yang na sems kyang rung // de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
407b3(tsha): thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje rigs pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
407b4(tsha): / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// bskyed pa ye shes mchog bsgrub pas// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// rdo rje gsung gis bka' stsal pa// mkha' dang
407b5(tsha): mtshungs par mnyam 'gyur ba// rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa las// rol mo 'di dag rab tu bsgom// dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs sam// me
407b6(tsha): tog 'bras bu sogs kyis brgyan// ri bo dben pa'i sa phyogs su// dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa 'grub// mA/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje la// rdo rje 'jam dpal rab tu
407b7(tsha): sgom/ lus dang ngag sems las spros pas// rdo rje 'jam dpal 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od dag gis// rgyan rnams kun
408a1(tsha): gyis brgyan pa yis// dag pa'i bdag nyid snang bar 'gyur// tshangs pa drag po la sogs lhas// nam yang mthong bar mi nus so// rdo rje 'jam pa mchog
408a2(tsha): gi dam tshig mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje mi phyed gsum las byung // bshang gci dam tshig lnga rnams ni// lcags gsum las byung ldan byas te/
408a3(tsha): khar bcug nas ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi mi phyed pa'i// thugs ni de ru rab bsgoms na// rdo rje 'jam pa'i 'od 'dra bar// de ma thag tu de 'gyur ro// 'khor lo 'od
408a4(tsha): 'phro mdangs mchog can// rang gi sngags kyi rab bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgoms na sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug
408a5(tsha): gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba kun// de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
408a6(tsha): rdo rje chen po rang sngags kyis// dkyil 'khor dbus su rab bsgoms la// rdo rje kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul
408a7(tsha): phran ji snyed yod pa yi// ji snyed kyi ni bud med rnams// yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur// drag po dag gis phyag byas pa// khams gsum rdo rje chen por 'gyur// rdo rje'i
408b1(tsha): dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pad+mo chen po 'dab brgyad pa// rang sngags rdo rje bsams nas su// chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin par// bsams na chos
408b2(tsha): dang 'dra bar 'gyur// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas mchod mchog dkyil 'khor du// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'jogs par byed// pad+mo mnyam
408b3(tsha): pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ye shes lnga ldan rab brten na// bskal pa gsum gyi yun du gnas// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
408b4(tsha): gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed// 'od zer lnga yi mdog 'dra'i 'od// rang gi sngags kyi ral gyi sgom// sdig yangs lag na thogs na ni// rdo rje gsum rigs 'dzin pa/
408b5(tsha): 'gyur// khams gsum kun gyis rab mchod cing // tshangs dbang lha min phyag byas pa// stong gsum na ni gcig pu dpa'// mi mchog gsang ba 'dzin par 'gyur//
408b6(tsha): gang rnams 'od dang bsam pa dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje thugs las rab byung ba// de lta bu yi dngos grub ster// ral gri thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i
408b7(tsha): ting nge 'dzin to// oM gyi ri lu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsam nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnam bsgom ste/
409a1(tsha): de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mdog/ a ni ri lu tsa na
409a2(tsha): ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams na ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs// bsams te khar bcug rnams bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // byang chub ye shes 'od 'drar
409a3(tsha): 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam bu chu bo gser gyi mdog/ hU ni ri lu tsa na ka'i// 'bru tshad tsam du bsams nas ni// dbus su rang gi lha yi gzugs/
409a4(tsha): bsams te khar bcug rnams bsgoms na// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje sku dang 'od 'drar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser 'od 'dra//
409a5(tsha): mkha' dbyings gsal ba'i dbus gnas par// rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgom// lag tu 'khor lo rab bsgoms na// 'khor lo rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'khor lo chen
409a6(tsha): po'i rigs bsgom ste// sangs rgyas sku ni rab sbyor zhing // ye shes 'di ni rab bsgrub pa// ye shes rdo rje dag gi bya// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par// ye shes mi
409a7(tsha): bskyod rab bsgom ste// lag tu rdo rje rab sgom na// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsgom ste// rdo rje sku ni rab sbyor zhing // rdo rje'i mchog 'di bsgrub pa
409b1(tsha): ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gi bya// mkha' dbyings rin chen dbus gnas par// rin chen rdo rje rab tu bsgom// lag tu rin chen rab bsgoms na// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par
409b2(tsha): 'gyur// rin po che yi rigs bsgoms na// rin chen skur ni rab sbyor zhing // rin chen mchog 'di bsgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gi byas// mkha' dbyings chos kyi dbus
409b3(tsha): gnas par// tshe dpag med par rab tu sgom// lag tu pad+mo rab bsgoms na// pad+mo rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// pad+mo rigs chen sgom nas su// chos kyi sku ni rab sbyor zhing /
409b4(tsha): pad+ma'i mchog 'di bsgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gi byas// mkha' dbyings dam tshig dbus gnas par// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes sgom// lag tu ral gri rab sgom na//
409b5(tsha): ral gri rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dam rig chen po'i rigs bsgoms te// thogs med dam tshig rab sbyor zhing // dam tshig mchog ni sgrub pa ni// ye shes rdo rje dag gi bya//
409b6(tsha): rtse gsum ye shes lcags kyu sogs// rdo rje khyad par gyis bsgrub na// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis// bsam gtan des ni 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam
409b7(tsha): tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rjes de skad bka' stsal to// lam gyi bzhi mdo'am shing gcig drung // mtshan ma cig dang zhi gnas dang // rdo rje dgug pa'i khyad par
410a1(tsha): gyis// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// sbyor gsum rdo rje can rnams kyis// sbyor gsum sngags kyis skyes bur bsam// sangs rgyas ye shes blo ldan
410a2(tsha): gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi kyo ba btang // rlung gi dkyil 'khor mochog gnas pa// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa yin// dam tshig las byung phyogs bcu pa// rdo rjes bkug nas
410a3(tsha): nye bar spyad par bya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dam tshig rdo rje dgug pa'i cho ga'o// rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo'i mchog/ rdo rje pad+mo la sogs pas// rgyal ga nas lcags kyu/
410a4(tsha): bsams nas ni// dam tshig dgug mchog kyo bas bya// khams gsum dam tshig dgug pa'o// rnam pa'i mchog rnam kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgom la// lag
410a5(tsha): tu sku dang gsung thugs kyi// kyo ba la sogs rab tu bsgom// 'di dag lta bu'i sbyor ba yis// de ni gnas las byed par 'gyur// rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje
410a6(tsha): sku ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje'i sbyor bas lce sgom na// rdo rje gsung dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam bsgoms la//
410a7(tsha): lag tu sgrub bya bsam na ni// rdo rje dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur// gsang gsum dam tshig mchod pa'i mchog/ mchod pas mchod nas rab tu bsgrub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
410b1(tsha): kyis// gsang ba'i snying po bsdus pa yis// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po 'di cig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sha chen dam tshig mchog gis
410b2(tsha): ni// rdo rje gsum mchog bsgrub par bya// bshang gci dam tshig mchog gis ni// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// glang po sha yi dam tshig gis// mngon shes lnga dag
410b3(tsha): thob par 'gyur// rta sha dag gi dam tshig gis// mi snang ba yi bdag por 'gyur// khyi sha dag gi dam tshig gis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ba lang sha
410b4(tsha): yi dam tshig gis// rdo rje dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// sha rnams thams cad med na yang // thams cad bsam pa rnam par brtag/ rdo rje sbyor ba 'di byas na// sangs rgyas
410b5(tsha): thams cad byin gyis rlob// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig dang // dbu rgyan rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa//
410b6(tsha): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes 'gyur ba// dam tshig mchog gi bya ba ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa'i mchog/ dam tshig mchog gi rab tu bya// dam tshig thams cad ye
410b7(tsha): shes rdo rjer gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// lce yi dam tshig rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje can gyis glu sgoms na// bdud rtsi lnga yi sbyor ba yi// zos na rdo rje gsum
411a1(tsha): thob 'gyur// a dang o gyi dam tshig kyang // 'di ni rdo rje tshul mchog ste// 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mi phyed 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dam
411a2(tsha): tshig bdud rtsi'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dam tshig gsum grub mchog/ sku gsum rdo rje can du 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sems can
411a3(tsha): thams cad kyi// nor bu yid bzhin rgya mtshor 'gyur// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// rdo rje bdag nyid snang bar byed// 'khor lo'i dam tshig gsum grub mchog
411a4(tsha): sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed thams cad du// grub pa kun tu rnam par dpyod// dam tshig dam pa thams cad kyi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur//
411a5(tsha): rdo rje'i sku ni rab bsgoms pas// thams cad dam chog mchog tu 'grub// mi snang gyur pa thams cad la// stong khams dag ni snang bar byed// sangs rgyas kun las 'phrog/
411a6(tsha): pa dang / lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod// gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas bzhugs pa// rang lag skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje mig gis mthong
411a7(tsha): babar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing rnams na// smre grags pa ni ji snyed pa// dngos shes rna bas thos pa ni// rna ba'i drung na 'khod pa bzhin// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag gis//
411b1(tsha): sems can kun gyi sems rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan pa yis// rol mo las byung sems rig 'gyur// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du// 'khor ba dag na gnas pa yi//
411b2(tsha): sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan tshigs rnams// zhag gsum lon pa bzhin du dran// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi lus// sangs rgyas sprin la sogs brgyan pas// bskal pa gang+gA'i bye snyed du//
411b3(tsha): rdorje rdzu 'phrul mchog gis 'gengs// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pas de skad bka' stsal to// de la mngon par shes pa lnga ni/ rdo rje spyan
411b4(tsha): dang rdo rje'i snyan dang / rdo rje'i thugs dang / rdo rje'i gnas dang / rdo rje'i rdzu 'phrul lo// sangs rgyas mngon shes lnga don grub// sangs rgyas sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i
411b5(tsha): bye snyed grangs med pa'i// 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas su// rdo rje sku dang gsung thugs kyis// 'jig rten khams kun bgrod par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba dang //
411b6(tsha): nye bar bsgrub pa 'byung ba dang // bsgrub pa'i don gyi dam tshig dang // bsgrub pa chen po dag dang bzhi// rdo rje'i bye brag shes byas la// de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya//
411b7(tsha): bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor ba// byang chub mchog ni bsgom par bya// nye bar bsgrub pa grub mchog la// rdo rje skye mched rnam par spyad// sngags kyi bdag po bsgom pa
412a1(tsha): yis/ bsgrub pa'i tshe na bskul bar gsungs// bsgrub pa chen po byed pa'i tshe// rung sngags rdo rje can gyi gzugs// dbu rgyan la ni bdag po bsam//
412a2(tsha): ye shes rdo rje grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa'i ye shes bdud rtsi dag/ thams cad du ni brtag par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid don bsgrub pa'o/
412a3(tsha): dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs dang // rab tu rnam par dben pa dang // ri bo nags 'dab chu ngogs su// rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsgrub pa chen
412a4(tsha): bos de skad bka' stsal to// yang na rdo rje bzhi dag gis// brtul zhugs brtan pas bsnyen par bya// sku gsum mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// bsgom na dngos
412a5(tsha): grub thob par 'gyur// dus bzhi dag tu rab sbyor bas// blo dang ldan pas gnas lngar ni// ye shes rdo rje yi ge oM// bsgom na sdom pa yin par bshad// zhag bdun dang
412a6(tsha): ni zla phyed dang // zla gcig zla ba phyed dang gnyis// rdo rje dam tshig bsgrubs na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhag grangs bye brag rab bskul bas// nga yis
412a7(tsha): rgyas par rab tu bstan// phyogs kyi nang las dngos grub gsung // gsang ba mchog las byung ba la// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par gsungs// de la 'di ni nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom
412b1(tsha): pa'i yul lo// sangs rgyas sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pas// byin gyi rlabs kyis gnas byas te// rdo rje sku dang ldan par bya// mi phyed rdo rje gsum
412b2(tsha): bsgoms pas// phyogs bcu kun bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la sku yis mtshan pa yi// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni sgrub pa'i sdom pa'i yul
412b3(tsha): lo// chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyi rlabs kyis gnas bya ste// rdo rje gsung dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms
412b4(tsha): bapas// phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la gsung las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// de la 'di ni bsgrub pa chen po'i yul lo//
412b5(tsha): rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'byed pa// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas byas te// rdo rje thugs dang ldan par bya// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa//
412b6(tsha): phyogs bcu na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams// de la thugs las byung ba yi// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas mdzad do// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na chos kyi
412b7(tsha): sems dpa' rung // rmongs pas 'da' bar byed pa ni// tshal par 'gas pa gdon mi za// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gas
413a1(tsha): ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sbyor ba dam tshig sgrub pa'i mchog bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//
413a2(tsha): / de nas bcom ldan pa der gshegs kun// ye shes rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa// sems can don kun yang dag 'byung // byang chub sems dpa' blo
413a3(tsha): ldan gyis// thub pa don kun rdo rje can// ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas// dam tshig de nyid mkhyen pa la// mchod de rdo rje dbyangs 'di gsungs// e ma ho sangs rgyas tshul
413a4(tsha): re bzang // e ma ho byang chub tshul gyi mchog/ e ma ho chos kyi tshul re zhing // e ma ho sngags kyi tshul re bsten// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams ni// ngo bo nyid kyis khyad
413a5(tsha): par can// rnam par mi rtog yang dag las// ye shes 'byung bar rab tu bsgrags// yid 'ong sngags rnams kun bsdus la// rdo rje bzlas pa ye shes che// sku gsum
413a6(tsha): mi phyed dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'gyur ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa'i// rdo rje bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis
413a7(tsha): rlob/ rig dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan// gsang sngags zlos pa de ring gsungs// ye shes rgya mtshogasan pa dang // sku
413b1(tsha): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// sangs rgyas dus gsum las byung rnams// rdo rje sngags ni rab bsgom pas// ye shes mnyam med thob 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad
413b2(tsha): du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// nam mkha' rdo rje ye shes 'byung // byed skyed dam pa mchog gi gtsos// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di gsungs so// sngags kyi
413b3(tsha): don kun bzlas pa ni// rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyis mtshan// rdo rje dbye ba gsum gyi mthar// bkod pa rdo rje gsum zhes bya// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas rnams su// spro ba
413b4(tsha): rnam pa gsum dag bya// rdo rje bzlas pa 'di yis ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsgom nas mchod pa'i mchog brtag
413b5(tsha): pa// ye shes rdo rjes byas nas ni// rdo rje gsum gyi thugs 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// bsams nas mchod pa'i mchog bstan pa// ye shes rdo rjes
413b6(tsha): rab tu bya// 'di ni byang chub mchog thob pa'o// yang na dbye ba rnam gsum gyis// so so dag tu spro bar bya// sku dang gsung thugs bdag med par// ye shes sems kyi
413b7(tsha): yang dag spro// gdod nas rdo rje spro ba ni// rdzogs nas rab tu bsdu bar bya// 'di ni ye shes spyan phye ba'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni kun gyi yin// sku yi rdo rje rdzogs
414a1(tsha): byang chub// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad pa// sangs rgyas sku zhes bya bar bshad// de ni sku yi bzlas par bshad// gsung gi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub
414a2(tsha): sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa// gsung gi rdo rje zhes bshad pa// de ni gsung gi bzlas par bshad// thugs kyi dam tshig rdzogs byang chub// gnas pa'i rdo rje rnam dpyad pa// thugs kyi rdo rje
414a3(tsha): zhes bya ste// de ni thugs kyi bzlas par bshad// don gyi rjes 'gro bzlas pa ni// ngo bo nyid med bzang po yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas rnam dpyad pa// de ni rin chen bzlas par
414a4(tsha): bshad// sangs rgyas zhing rnams thams cad du// sku yi sprin rnams spro ba dang // bzhud cing byon pa rdo rje don// de ni thogs med bzlas par bshad// khro bo'i dam tshig ye shes kyis
414a5(tsha): rang gi rdo rje dkyil 'khor grags// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig thos pa// de ni khro bo'i bzlas par bshad// 'dod pa'i don gyis myos gyur pa// kun tu skyob cing phan par dga'// sems
414a6(tsha): can gti mug gnas la 'jogs// de ni gti mug bzlas par bshad// 'dod chags rdo rje las byung tshig/ lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can 'dod chags mtshod
414a7(tsha): gnas gzhag/ de ni 'dod chags bzlas par bshad// zhe sdang rdo rje las byung sems// lus dang ngag sems la gnas pa'i// sems can zhe sdang gnas la gzhag/ de ni zhe sdang
414b1(tsha): bzlas par bshad// dam tshig de nyid rdo rje gsum// dbu ma dam tshig rdo rje can// de nyid dam tshig rdo rje yis// bzlas pa ma ning zhes bya'o// 'dod chags de nyid don bsgom pa// rdorje
414b2(tsha): bdag po thams cad ni// sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// 'dod chags byang chub rdzogs par mdzad// rig pa chen mo spyan la sogs// rtag tu 'dod pa'i don brtson pa// 'od
414b3(tsha): pa'i longs spyod dag gi ni// ji ltar 'dod pa rten na 'grub// gti mug dam tshig las byung ba// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje can// ma ning dag gi gnas bsgrubs pa// dngos grub dam
414b4(tsha): pa rab tu ster// khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyos// gsod la rtag tu brtson pa dag/ bsgrub pa mchog gi chos can la// gsod pa'i don gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
414b5(tsha): skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ye shes 'khor lo can rnams kyis// 'khor lo snying gi dbus su bsgom// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor
414b6(tsha): dpung gnas par// dbus su 'khor lo'i don sgom mo// ye shes rdo rje can rnams kyis// rdo rje snying ka'i dbus su bsgom// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i
414b7(tsha): sngags don bsgom par bya// rin chen ye shes can rnams kyi// rin chen snying kha'i dbus su bsgom// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen sngags don bsgom
415a1(tsha): par bya// pad+mo ye shes can rnams kyi// pad+mo snying kwa'i dbus su bsgom// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+mo'i sngags don bsgom par bya//
415a2(tsha): ral gri ye shes can rnams kyi// ral gri snying kha'i dbus su bsgom// dam tshig dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ral gri sngags don bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi ngos rnams
415a3(tsha): su// sangs rgyas lnga rnams dgod par bya// 'od zer rnam lnga'i bye brag gis// spos na byang chub thob par 'gyur// sngags rnams thams cad spo ba ni// bye brag rnam pa gnyis su
415a4(tsha): bsgrags// sku gsum rdo rje'i bye brag gis// spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya// lus kyi sku yi ngo bo nyid// sems kyi thugs kyi ngo bo nyid// ngag gi gsung gi ngo bo nyid// mchod na mchod pa'i
415a5(tsha): gnas su 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yis// rdo rje lnga rnams bsgom par bya// dbus su bdag po bsam nas ni// sku gsung rdo rje rang gi gzugs// rang sngags
415a6(tsha): rdo rje'i gzugs dag gis// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi dag tu// kha dog rnam bzhir kun brtags pa// snying khar sngags kyi don bsgom na// rdo rje rnam pa bzhi yi las// bas ma gtan
415a7(tsha): rdo rje can dag byed// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu bzang po yin// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas pa pad+mo rdo rje can// dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas//
415b1(tsha): rdorje khro bo mngon spyod la// 'di de sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba sku gsum las byung ba// sngags rnams kun gyi sprul pa ste// bya ba'i rol mos mtshan pa'o// ma
415b2(tsha): dad smra ba'i sems can dang // rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // gdug pa'i sems can gzhan rnams la// rab tu bskul ba 'di bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen po 'khor lo rdo
415b3(tsha): rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// khams gsum gnas pa'i sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// dgra bos bsad par bsams nas su//
415b4(tsha): de nas las rnams brtsams par bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje rtse lnga kha bzhi pa// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpar rnam par
415b5(tsha): bsgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam bsgoms la// sangs rgyas 'khor lo stobs po che// lag pa g.yas pa 'di bya'o// phyogs bcu nas
415b6(tsha): byung sems can rnams// sangs rgyas sku yi bye brag gis// bsdus te gong bu'i tshul gyis su// rang gi lus la de dag gzud// sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje can// slar yang spro ba
415b7(tsha): rab tu bya// khros pas 'khrugs pa'i khro bo rnams// mi sdug 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs// mtshon cha sna tshogs mchog 'dzin pa// gsod pa'i don gyis don sems la//
416a1(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam// gdug pa chen po bsod par byed// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog gsol ba// rdo rje gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gnas//
416a2(tsha): nyi ma bdun du 'di byas na// sangs rgyas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur// rmongs pas dngos grub mi ster na// 'chi bar 'di ni gdon mi za// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi bka'i 'khor
416a3(tsha): lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// 'khor lo rdo rje 'bar bas brgyan// rnam pa'i mchog ni kun dang ldan// rnam par snang mdzad
416a4(tsha): rab tu sgom// dus gsum dam tshig las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen ni// rdo rje me stag 'od phro can// de yi phyag na rnam par bsgom// phyogs bcu nas byung sems can
416a5(tsha): rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gi lus la gzugs// spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog gi gnyen gyis bya/
416a6(tsha): sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la gson// bdag ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bka' yi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// gal te dam tshig las 'das
416a7(tsha): na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis// sku gsum las byung dag par bgyi// zhig par 'gyur ba'ang gdon mi za// 'khor lo dam tshig ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
416b1(tsha): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rdo rje can// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor che// rang gi rdo rje yin par brtag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas sems
416b2(tsha): dpa' rnams// sku gsum dkyil 'khor bzhugs pa dag/ gshin rje gshed kyi mdog 'dra ba// slar yang sangs rgyas spro bar bya// dus gsum las bzhugs sems can dang //
416b3(tsha): gdug sems can gyi dgra bo rnams// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor 'dir// khros pas thams cad gsod par bsgom// sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du// 'di ni rdo rje bka'i dkyil
416b4(tsha): 'khor ro// dam tshig thams cad las byung ba// sku gsum ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// rang sngags don gyi yon tan ni//
416b5(tsha): yang na gtsug tor dam tshig gis// bka' yi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// sngags kun bsrung phyir ye shes mchog/ rdo rje can gyis bya ba ste// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// byang chub bsrung
416b6(tsha): ba'i don chen bya// bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes de skad bka' stsal to// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// chos kyi snang mdzad sku mchog las// 'byung ba'i sku gsum dam tshig
416b7(tsha): dag/ bsam nas gdan du de rab brtag/ mkha' dbyings sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom// rang sngags yi ge'i gnas ye shes// thugs kyi
417a1(tsha): rnam par bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni sems tsam du// bsgoms nas slar yang rab tu bsdu// thugs kyi rdo rjer byas pa'i phyir// sku gsum la ni
417a2(tsha): de dag gzud // bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje'i sngags rin po che rab tu snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
417a3(tsha): rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// sangs rgyas rim par bkod nas ni// chu yi steng nas bcag par bya// rkang pa mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis//
417a4(tsha): spyi bo'i steng du rkang pa bsgom// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pas de skad bka' stsal to// rdo rje'i rgya mtsho rkang pas gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
417a5(tsha): dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas ni// dbus su khro bo rnam bzhag la// las kyi rdo rje'i rkang pa yis// de yi spyi bor gnon par bsgom// mu stegs can dang phas kyi rgol ba
417a6(tsha): thams cad kyi 'khrul 'khor gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje gsum mchog khro bo'i tshul// ge sar ser po'i mdog 'dra ba// thams cad ri yi rgyal po
417a7(tsha): ltar// bsams nas spyi bor rab tu bsgom// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon byed pas// mi dbang la ni dog pa med// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
417b1(tsha): dang gsung dang / thugs las byung bas de skad bka' stsal to// dpung thams cad gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dgra bo skrag pa'i dam tshig gi
417b2(tsha): bsam gtan rab tu brtag pa 'di// sangs rgyas dag gis 'das na yang // 'gas par gyur pa gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis de skad gsungs so//
417b3(tsha): hU las phur bu bsam pa ni// rtse lnga pa yi tshad du ste// rdo rje phur bu de yi ni// snying khar 'di ni rab bsgoms na// khros pas sangs rgyas dpung dag kyang // 'jig par 'gyur
417b4(tsha): ba gdon ma za// dgra rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// grong ngam yang na grong khyer ram// ljongs dag tu ni rab sbyar ba// nad kun spong ba'i zhi ba
417b5(tsha): yang // 'di ni rtag tu sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni// bar snang dag la rab tu bsgom// bskal pa bsreg pa ltar bsam nas// slar yang rab tu bsdu bar bya// spro ba
417b6(tsha): dag kyang de nas bya// rin chen yid bzhin nor bu 'od// chos kyi sprin ni bsgoms nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka'
417b7(tsha): ba yang rab tu 'gengs// sbyin pa'i rdo rje sgom byed pa// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas sprin dang chos chen dang // rdo rje sems dpa' der spro bya// bskal
418a1(tsha): pa gsum gyi yun gnas shing // sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i sku ste skyon med pa'o// nad thams
418a2(tsha): cad med par byed pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan las byung dam bcas pas// gnas gang du ni yang dag spyad// bsam gtan spyo ba
418a3(tsha): 'di yis ni// gnas na sangs rgyas byin gyis rlob// rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal po che// rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom// me stag 'bar ba 'dra ba yi// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gdab par bya//
418a4(tsha): 'gro ba dul bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs khams
418a5(tsha): nas// rang gi snying khar 'dod pa bzhag/ spyan la sogs pa mchog rnams kyis// mkha' dbyings yongs su gang bar bsgom// bsdus nas 'od kyi gong bu yis// nad pa la ni
418a6(tsha): dbab par bya// ba spu bu ga nas sangs rgyas// sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro// sangs rgyas sprin rnams de yi tshe// de la dbang bskur rab tu gsol// nad pa rdo rje dam
418a7(tsha): tshig 'dis// skad cig gis ni dpal ldan 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig bkod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//
418b1(tsha): dbang chen dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// chos 'dzin pa yi gzugs bsam nas// snying kar 'dod pa bzhag par bya// mkha' dbyings gnas ni nyams dga' bar// dkar mo zhes bya
418b2(tsha): rab tu dgang // 'od kyi gong bur bsdus nas ni// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen 'od// lus dang ngag dang sems gnas la// 'dod pa de la dbab par bya// ba spu bu ga nas rin chen//
418b3(tsha): sprin rnams brtul zhugs can gyis spro// chos kyi sprin ni bsgom nas su// dbang bskur ba ni yang dag bya// rdo rje'i bsam gtan 'di yis ni// dgang dka' ba yang rab tu 'gengs
418b4(tsha): sbyin pa'i rdo rje bsgrub pa ste// yid bzhin nor bu dpal ldan 'gyur// sbyin pa'i rdo rje rab snang ba'o// chos kyi sprin gyi dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
418b5(tsha): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zla gam bsam// rdo rje nam mkha' chos bdun gzugs// 'dod pa snying kar bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
418b6(tsha): dpa' yis// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dgang // 'od zer lnga yi sbyor ba yis// der ni gzi brjid dbab par bya// de ni de ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su
418b7(tsha): byon// 'jam dpal gyi ni mdog dang 'dra// las gnas byed pa de 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba ni dga' don byed// dges pa'i bdag nyid de stsol bas// ltas tsam bskyed pa
419a1(tsha): nyid kyis kyang // 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rin po che'i dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i
419a2(tsha): rdo rje'i srin po ni// drag cing khrol rabag tum dang // wa dang bya rog sna tshogs dang // bya rgod khyi yis gang bar sgom// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas par// dgra bo rnams ni rtag
419a3(tsha): par sgom// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed pa// bsam nas rnal 'byor sbyar bar bya// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pas gnan// rgyu ma rkang dang khrag la sogs// thams cad
419a4(tsha): drang bar rnam sgom ste// sgom na dgra rnams 'ching bar 'gyur// gal te de ltar rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// 'chi bar 'gyur
419a5(tsha): bapar gdon mi za// rdo rje dam tshig sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam par snang mdzad zhal gsum pa// ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba sa ma/
419a6(tsha): dkar po nag po rab tu dmar// thor tshugs dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// rdo rje can ni zhal gsum bsam// nag po dkar po dmar po'i zhal// 'bar ba'i thor tshugs dbu rgyan can//
419a7(tsha): 'jig rten khams rnams 'khrug byed pa// 'dod chags can ni zhal gsum bsam// dmar po nag po dkar ba'i zhal// thor tshugs dbu rgyan longs spyod can// bsgom
419b1(tsha): na nges par 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+mo che// g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams par bsgom// rdo rje phyag drug mtshon cha ni// bzang po sna tshogs rnam par bsgom//
419b2(tsha): sems can kun la phan bzhed ma// spyan ni zhal gsum dag tu bsam// dkar po nag po dmar po che// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rab tu bsgom// mkha' skyes spyan ni rgyal mo
419b3(tsha): che// zhal gsum du ni rtag par bsgom// gnag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i tshul// mdzes pa'i gzugs su rnam par bsgom// chu skyes spyan gyi rgyal po che// zhal gsum du ni
419b4(tsha): rnam par bsgom// dmar dang dkar dang gnag pa ste// kha dog mdzes par rnam par bsgom// rig ma rdo rje ut+pal bsnams// zhal gsum rab tu gsal ba'i mdangs// ldang
419b5(tsha): ser gnag dang dkar ba'i tshul// bsgoms na ye shes thob par 'gyur// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// zhal gsum zag po 'od bzang ba// rnon po 'jigs pa yang
419b6(tsha): 'jigs byed// kha dog nag po rab tu bsgom// gzhan gyis mi thub khre che// drag po bzhad pa'i sgra yang 'byin// zhal gsum 'od zer mang po dag/ rab tu 'phro ba rnam
419b7(tsha): par bsam// khro bo chen po rta mgrin ni// bskal pa'i me bzhin rab tu 'bar// zhal gsum gdug pa zhabs kyis mnan// sbyor ba can gyis rtag tu bsgom// rdo rje mi
420a1(tsha): 'chi khro bo che// 'od zer 'phro ba rab tu 'khrug/ drag po khro bo 'bar ba 'dra// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed// 'dod pa'i ye
420a2(tsha): shes khro bo che// zhal gsum pa ni 'jigs par byed// phyag bzhi 'jigs par byed pa'i mchog/ Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab tu bsgom// stobs po che ni rdo rje che// 'jig
420a3(tsha): rten gsum gyi mun sel ba// gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed// zhal gsum pa ni rtag par bsgom// khro bo chen po dbyug sngon can// khams gsum dag ni
420a4(tsha): 'jigs par byed// zhal gsum rdo rje gsum las byung // 'bar ba rnon po can du bsgom// rdo rje mi g.yo khro bo che// rdo rje las byung mi g.yo ba// zhi ba ral gri
420a5(tsha): zhags pa bsnams// brtul zhugs can gyi zhal gsum bsgom// gtsug tor chen po yi ge gcig/ 'od zer dag ni kun tu 'phro// zhal gsum 'bar ba 'khor
420a6(tsha): lo can// bsam gtan dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// gnod mdzes ye shes mchog 'dzin pa// 'jigs pa'i rgya mtsho yang dag byed// zhal gsum 'bar ba
420a7(tsha): 'od 'phro can// bsam gtan 'od bzang bsgom par bya// gzi brjid phung po gtsug tor rgyal// gang gzhan sngags kyi 'khor lo can// dam tshig longs spyod 'di
420b1(tsha): rnams kyis// so so dag tu bsgom par bya// ting 'dzin dag ni dpag med pa// sngags rnams kyi ni bshad pa yin// khro bo dgra ni re re yang // nam mkha'i steng du shin
420b2(tsha): tu 'phags// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rnam par snang mdzad
420b3(tsha): rnam par bsam// gsal zhing zhi pa zla ba bzhin// 'od zer sna tshogs 'dra ba'i 'od// me long lta bur yang dag 'byung // khams gsum dag gi dkyil 'khor du//
420b4(tsha): rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dag/ bsam na de yi byang chub mthong // bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsgom pa// 'di yi sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten thams cad
420b5(tsha): dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid kyi thob par 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba mdzes pa'i 'od rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje dkyil
420b6(tsha): 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgom la// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsam// khros pa gsal ba'i lus
420b7(tsha): dang 'dra// 'ba' ba sna tshogs mnyam pa'i 'od// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun dang ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// zhi ba'i ye shes gnas bsgoms na//
421a1(tsha): myur du rdo rje nyid thob 'gyur// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul ba// 'di ni rdo rje bdag nyid che// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// tshe 'di nyid la thob par
421a2(tsha): 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig thams cad 'byung ba mdzes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs
421a3(tsha): rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// chos kyi sems dpa' rnam par sgom// gsal ba'i lus 'dzin zhi ba ni// rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'od zer sprin gyi 'khor
421a4(tsha): lo che// rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bsgom// 'di yi chos kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsum mi phyed las byung ba// ye shes rgya mtsho rnam par brgyan// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur//
421a5(tsha): chos kyi sems dpa'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas
421a6(tsha): gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// spyan gyi mchog ni rnam par sgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mtshan rnams thams cad
421a7(tsha): rab tu rdzogs// bud med sgyu ma'i mchog ldan pa// khams gsum dag na dbang byed pa// ye shes thams cad 'grub par byed// 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu ster// phyag tu
421b1(tsha): 'khor lo bsgom par bya// spyan gyi dam tshig phyag rgya'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'od mchog can// mkha' dbyings
421b2(tsha): / rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms nas// nam mkha' rdo rje mchog rab bsgom// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// ut+pa la mthing ka'i mdog 'dra ba/
421b3(tsha): mtshan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs// nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog rab sgom// khams gsum dag gi phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ dngos grub rdo
421b4(tsha): rje can gyis gsangs// ut+pal sngon dmar phyug na bsnams// nam mkha'i yul gyi 'od kyi sprin rdo rje tshim par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
421b5(tsha): chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms lnga// rdo rje chos ma rab tu bsgoms// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu
421b6(tsha): yangs// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba'i// sgyu mas mtshan pa'i mchog las byung // 'dod chags chags pa 'dzin stug pa// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // rgyan
421b7(tsha): rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa// chos kyi ye shes 'byung gnas mchog/ dam tshig rdo rje can gyis gsangs// ut+pal dmar po phyag
422a1(tsha): na bsnams// chos kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dngos grub dkyil 'khor
422a2(tsha): dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// sgrol ma'i mchog ni bsgom par bya// zhal bzang spyan ni rab tu yangs// sna
422a3(tsha): tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// kha dog ldang ser 'dra ba'i 'od// bud med sgyu ma rab tu mos// rdo rje ting 'dzin las byung ba// sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa// ut+pal
422a4(tsha): ser po'i mdog 'dra ba// gsal ba phyag na rnam par bsgom// dam tshig sgrol ma'i mchog dang ldan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam
422a5(tsha): pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gshin rje gshed mchog rnam par bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// 'jigs
422a6(tsha): pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu khros// spyan dmar mche ba rab tu gtsigs// phyag na ral gri rnam par bsgom// snang mdzad dbu rgyan la sgom na// rdo rje spyan ni dges par 'gyur//
422a7(tsha): 'di ni ye shes rdo rje can// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yin// gshin rje gshed kyi snang ba bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yin//
422b1(tsha): nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// gzhan gyis mi thub rab bsgoms la// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po can// sbrul gyis brgyan cing
422b2(tsha): ske rags byas// rdo rje dgyes pa 'jigs 'jigs lha// kha dog dkar po rab tu bsgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsams na rdo rje can dag brnyes// 'di ni ya
422b3(tsha): shes blo can gyis// khro bo kun gyi dam tshig go/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'
422b4(tsha): rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje rta mgrin rab tu bsgom// khro bo'i 'od zer mang po dag/ thams cad du ni rnam par 'gro// gdug pa
422b5(tsha): thams cad zhabs kyis mnan// kha dog dmar po rnam par bsam// rdzogs sangs dpag med dbu brgyan la// bsgoms na rdo rje can dag mnyes// 'di ni rdo rje ye shes can//
422b6(tsha): khro bo kun gyi dam tshig yin// rta bskyed pa 'byung ba rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su
422b7(tsha): bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje mi 'chi rab bsgoms la// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje sprin ni kun tu 'khrug/ khros shing khro bcas
423a1(tsha): gnag pa dang // mche ba rnon po rab tu bsgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na khro bo 'dzin mnyes 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi//
423a2(tsha): 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus
423a3(tsha): su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// Tak+ki'i rgyal po rab sgom pa// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs gtum// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par byed//
423a4(tsha): / rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje 'od bzang bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu brnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi//
423a5(tsha): 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// bsam gtan rdo rje rdzogs par byang chub pa dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam
423a6(tsha): mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// stobs po che ni rab tu bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'phro// rdo rje gsum gyi gnas dkyil
423a7(tsha): 'khor// khros shing khros pas zhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje stobs chen bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu brnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro
423b1(tsha): bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// rdo rje gsum gyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha'
423b2(tsha): dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// rdo rje sngon po rnam par bsgom// khro bo 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par
423b3(tsha): byed// gzugs ni rab tu gnag la rno// rgya mtsho nag po skyed par byed// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// rdo rje dbyug thogs bsgom par bya// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu
423b4(tsha): rgyanu pa// bsgoms na rab tu brnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig gi/ rdo rje dbyug pa'i dam tshig mchog dang ldan pa'i ting po
423b5(tsha): 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bsgoms la// mi g.yo mchog ni rnam par
423b6(tsha): bsgom// khros shing 'jigs pa zur gyis lta// 'khrug pa ral gri zhags pa bsnams// 'bar ba'i 'od zer mang po 'phro// mi g.yo rdo rje can du sgom// mi bskyod rdo rje dbu
423b7(tsha): rgyan la/ bsgoms na rab tu brnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje nam mkha' dbyings dam tshig zhabs kyis gnon pa
424a1(tsha): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab
424a2(tsha): bsgoms la// rig pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bsgom// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje 'bar bas yongs su bskor// gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur dam tshag
424a3(tsha): rnam par 'phro ba rab tu sgom// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu brnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ gtsug
424a4(tsha): tor gyi dam tshig rig pa'i stobs 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas
424a5(tsha): gzugs su rab bsgoms la// rdo rje gsum pa rab tu sgom// me lce rnon po 'bar ba'i sku// rdo rje sprin ni rab tu spro// phyag na rdo rje rab 'bar ba// mi bskyod dam tshig dbu
424a6(tsha): rgyan la// bsgoms na rab tu mnyes par 'gyur// 'di ni khro bo thams cad kyi// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ rdo rje'i dam tshig gsum pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya
424a7(tsha): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'gog pa khro bo'i 'khor lo ni// sangs rgyas 'khor lo ston pa yis// ting 'dzin ye shes rdo rje rnams// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'grub par
424b1(tsha): 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ rdo rje dam tshig bkod pa de kho na nyid don bsgom pa mngon
424b2(tsha): par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam tshig gi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa
424b3(tsha): chen po zhi ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
424b4(tsha): thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // o ru ru phu ru dzA la tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi lo tsa ne sarba ar+d+ha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// 'byor pa kun la dgos pa rnams//
424b5(tsha): mnyes shing rab tu dges 'gyur na// sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing 'byung ba// lus rnams thams cad rab bsgrub cing // rdo rje dam tshig bskul
424b6(tsha): mdzad pa// shi ba sos par byed par gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku gsum gyi dam tshig rdo rje'i khro bo'i dngos po dang / dngos po med pa'i dam tshig rdo rje
424b7(tsha): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM shang ka/
425a1(tsha): re shA na ti ka ro g+hu Ta g+hu Ta ni g+hu Ta Ti ni g+hA ta yA/ b+hu Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sku gsum dbyer med rdo rje can// mnyes pa'i spyan
425a2(tsha): ni gdangs nas su// rdo rje thugs ni rjes su dran// rdo rje bsrung ba'i sbyor ba la// las rnams rtag tu rab bsgrub pa// rdo rje chen po 'jigs nyen la// rtag tu stobs ni byed
425a3(tsha): par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags chen po'i dam tshig la gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi sku'i
425a4(tsha): btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka Tang ka Te swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje chos
425a5(tsha): mchog 'dzin pa rnams// mnyes nas bsam gtan thob 'gyur nas// rdo rje'i chos ni rjes su dran// rtag tu chos rgyas stobs mdzad pa// rtag tu mdzod po che dang ldan//
425a6(tsha): rdo rje gsum gyi bka' bzhin du// bzlas pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig kun nas 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
425a7(tsha): snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig sems dpa'i btsun mo'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM tA re tud tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas
425b1(tsha): 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun bdag che las skyes// mnyes shing ye shes thob 'gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su dran// sangs rgyas rdo rje sde chen dang // sems
425b2(tsha): can khams ni ma lus pa// skad cig gis ni dran bzhin du// thams cad dbyer med dbang du byed// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
425b3(tsha): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa 'od zer gyi sprin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
425b4(tsha): zhugs nas/ rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed po rdo rje khro bo 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nam sa man ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra NA/ oM kha khA kha
425b5(tsha): hi kha hi/ sarba duSh+TA na satwa da ma ka/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu ba sha hasa?/ tsa tur mu kha/ tsa tu ra b+hu dza/ Sha rba tsa ra na/ A gats+tsha A grar+b+ha/ sarba duSh+Ta prA na/ a pa hA ra
425b6(tsha): Ni ma hA big+h+na g+ha ta b+hi kri ta A na na/ sarba b+hud ta b+hi yaM ka ra/ ar+thA D+hA/ hA sa nA d+hi ne/ byA g+h+rA tsa ra mi na/ ba san ku ru ku ru sarba karma ni/ ts+tshin+nats+tshan+te/ sarbe man tran/ bin+d+ha bir+d+ha/
425b7(tsha): pa ra mu tri na/ A ka ra Sha ya A ka ra Sha ya/ sarba b+ha ta ni/ me tha ma tha/ nir mA thA nir mA thA/ sarba duSh+TA na/ pra pe sha ya pra pe sha ya/ mar+d+ha la ma d+h+ye baM ba shAta/ dze bi tan/
426a1(tsha): ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kar+ya/ da had ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma bi lA ba ma bi la ba/ sa ma ya ma nusma ra/ hU hU phaT pha Ta/ bi s+pho Tu ya/ bi
426a2(tsha): sro Ta ya/ sarba sha pa ri pU ra ka sarban nA shA ya ri pUn/ ka ra ka ra he he b+ha ga wa na/ kany+tsa rA yA si/ ma ma sarba an+d+ha sA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/
426a3(tsha): sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas// rdo rje sems ni rjes su dran// thod pa ma chag ma gas pa// gzugs mdzes yid 'od rnyed pa
426a4(tsha): la/ rkang pas gnan pa tshul byas nas// sngags 'di rjes su dran par byas// mA ma ki 'am spyan yang rung // rdo rje rigs chen las byung ba// lan gsum gang du brjod
426a5(tsha): nani ni// de ma thag tu nges par 'gugs// bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rjes de skad bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa
426a6(tsha): snang mdzad/ dam tshig gi 'od zer stug po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khro bo mi 'chi ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
426a7(tsha): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na ma sa man ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra nan/ na mo kro d+ha ya/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA daSh+To ka Ta/ b+hai ra bA ya a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA shA has+thA
426b1(tsha): ya.o a mri ta kus+dza li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi tiSh+ThA tiSh+ThA/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da had ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho TA ya bi kro Ta yA/ sarga big+h+na/ bi na ya kA na/ ma hA ga
426b2(tsha): Na pa ti/ dzA bi ta s+t+waM ka rA sU hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas grags pa chen po kun// rgyal zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// rdo rje'i sku ni rjes su
426b3(tsha): rngargan// sngags rnams kun gyi sbyor ba dang // rdo rje sprad pa'i las rnams la// sangs rgyas nyid kyi dpung dag kyang // tshul bzhin byas na skrod par 'gyur//
426b4(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas 'od zer rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khro bo gzhan gyis ma
426b5(tsha): / thub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na ma sa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta/ badz+ra ShA/ o hUM dza nA ri rbi Ta hU~M hU hU phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni
426b6(tsha): gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas bdag nyid che skyes kun// 'jigs shing kun tu skrag gyur nas// byang chub sems ni rjes su dran// srin po ma rungs gtum po dang /
426b7(tsha): 'jigs pa chen po 'khrugs pa dang // rdo rje sems kyi rab sbyar ba// las rnams cho ga bzhin du byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa che
427a1(tsha): dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ pad+mo 'byung ba'i rdo rje khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung
427a2(tsha): dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na ma sa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra NA/ oM hU hU hu tu ru la bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka dz+wa li ta/ bi sU ling ka/ an+d+ra nA/ hA sa ke sha ri sa
427a3(tsha): Ta To pA Ta kA ra badz+ra khu ra nar g+hu tan/ tsa li ta pa su d+hA ta la/ ni shA sa me ru te ru tota/ k+Shi pa ta d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra b+hI Shi Ni aT+TaTa? Tu Ta hA sa/ a pa ra mi ta/ bai le ba rA kra ma/ Ar+ya
427a4(tsha): gai Na b+hI ta b+hU ta ga NA/ ad+b+ha Shi ta bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ ha ya gri ba khA da khA da/ be ra ma trAn/ ts+tshin+te ts+tshin+na/ b+hin+na b+hin+na/ ba ra mu dran/ sid+hi me A di sha A di sha A di sha/ a be sha ya a be sha
427a5(tsha): yabadz+ra dz+wa ra bi sha tsa dIn/ sarba gra he Shu a pra ti ha to b+ha ba/ badz+ra daSh+Ta ka tsi ra ya saM/ I da duSh+TaM gra ha duSh+Ta sarba ma pA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar da ma ra da/ pA Ta ya/
427a6(tsha): pA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma sa g+ha a nu dz+nyA ta kArma/ ku ru shI g+h+ri ha ya g+hi ba ya phaT/ badz+ra ye phaT/ badz+ra gA Ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ne tra ya phaT/ badz+ra daSh+TA ya phaT/
427a7(tsha): badz+ra khu rA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu ra ni raM b+hA ta na ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi nA shA nA ya phaTe/ trai lo kya b+ha ya ka ra ya phaT/ sarba karme Sha a pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san tra sa na ya phaT/
427b1(tsha): hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// chos kyi rdo rje che mchog skyes// 'jigs shing rab tu brgyal bar 'gyur// ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran// mkha' dbyings
427b2(tsha): dug gis yongs gang ba// rdo rje ha la hA lA'i 'od// khro bo rgyal po bskul ba yis// dug rnams thams cad med par byed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
427b3(tsha): gshegs pa gdon la bar grub pas/ gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje bertson sngon po khro bo'i rgyal po 'di nyid
427b4(tsha): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ o e hi e hi b+ha ga ba na/ nI la badz+ra daN+Da/ tu ru tu ru/ lu hUM lu hUM hA hA/
427b5(tsha): gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha gra ban/ byA yu be ga na/ b+hu tA na shrIg+man/ da ha dA ha/ dA ra da ra/ ba hA ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pAM taM ya
427b6(tsha): pa ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ mo Ta pa ya mo rba pa ya sarba karmA ni/ ts+tshan+na ts+tshin+na/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ am+bi me da a s+ya ru d+hi madz+dza me da mad dza ru d+hi rI pra ya/ e h+ya he/ b+ha ga ba na/ sarba big+h+na ni/
427b7(tsha): sarba bi d+yA ni/ sarba man+ta Ni/ sarba mU la karma ni/ kri tri ma Ni ShA dI ni/ sarba gra hAn/ ha na ha na/ bany+dza bany+dza/ mar da mar da/ i dam+me kAr+ya/ sA d+ha ya/ hU nI lA ya nI lA ya/
428a1(tsha): badz+ra dan TA ni la ma/ hu ru rba ru/ big+h+nA/ bi nA ya ka/ nA sha ya nA shwa ya/ tsu rurbaru/ dis tsat+tA ya/ sarba sha trud+d+hA/ prid yA ni/ pri ra ya/ ts+tshits+tshin+ta/
428a2(tsha): pa ra bi nA nA/ ts+tshe da ka d+hu bi d+h+wan shiSh+T+rA kA sa ma ya s+pha ra nu/ badz+rad rab tsanaH/ tsa ra ma Ni ni krin tu hU/ han ha na/ da ha hi/ btsA pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ ku ru tu ru/
428a3(tsha): phaT phaT/ hu hI kri tAn+ta/ de bai ri Shi bi drA pa ka/ ha na ha na/ badz+rad t+te na swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// gdug pa'i mchog las byung ba kun// 'jigs shing rab
428a4(tsha): tu skrag gyur nas// sems dpa'i rdo rje rjes su dram// khro bo rgyal po grags chen 'di// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa dang // cho ga'i tshul bzhin bskul ba yis// gdug pa thams
428a5(tsha): cad gsod par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ kun nas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
428a6(tsha): zhugs nas/ khra zo stobs po che 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nam sa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra r+N+Na/ oM hU hUM hU phaT baT phaT/ u gra shul pA ni/
428a7(tsha): hUMng+ku dz+dza/ phaT phaT/ oM dz+ya ti ni rand/ hU~M hU hU/ phaT phaTa.oM maH ba la swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs ma thag/ stobs po che yis klu rnams kun// 'di ni 'jigs shing
428b1(tsha): rab skrag nas// sku gsum rdo rje rjes su dran// bzlas pa tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// than pa byung ba'i dus su yang // chu bo'i dkyil
428b2(tsha): 'khor 'bebs par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
428b3(tsha): Tak+ki'i rgyal po khro bo chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // na ma sa man+ta ka ya bAka tsan+d+ra badz+ra NA/ Tak+ki hUM dza de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/
428b4(tsha): sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po kun// 'jigs shing dam tshig ldan 'gyur nas// rdo rje sku gsum rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// ling ka rkang pa g.yas pas
428b5(tsha): gnan// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags dag gis// sngags rnams thams cad dgug pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi 'phreng ba'i chu bo'i rdo rje zhes bya
428b6(tsha): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ mi g.yo ba'i rdo rje gtum po'i dam chag 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // nam sa man+ta ka ya bA ka/
428b7(tsha): tsat+ta badz+ra NA/ a tsa la/ kA Na tsa Na Ta/ na Ta Ta na Ta Ta/ man+t+ra man+tha/ mon+na moT+Ta/ saTu sa Ta?/ tan+ma tan+tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa/
429a1(tsha): badz+ra hAs ku ru/ ha sa hA sa/ ma ra ma raT/ ma ra ma ra Ta/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ ha na ha nA/ b+hUn+d+ha b+hAr+N+Na/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi sha/ ma sA man thAhA
