429a2(tsha): la ka/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ti ni ti ni/ khA na khA na/ big+h+nAn/ ma ra ma ra/ duSh+TAn b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha sarbe na ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ many+dza bi Sha ma badz+ra/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hUM ts+tsha hUM/
429a3(tsha): tri ba lA ti/ rang gan+na ta ka/ o o o/ hAM hA hAM/ a tsa la tse Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU hU/ a sa man+ta ka/ trana? ma hA ba la sha ta ya/ pa ra man ma tra na/ a au/
429a4(tsha): hA hA/ mA shu da d+h+ya tu lo ka/ tu Sh+ya tu badz+ra/ na mo stu a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yaHdzA la ya trA Ta a sa ha na ma swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// lha rnams 'khor dang bcas
429a5(tsha): pa kun// brgyal zhing yid ni rab skrag nas// rdo rje sku ni rjes su dran// khro bo chen po'i sngags 'di yis// lha chen dag la sogs pa'i lha// mthu chen dag kyang skrag gyur
429a6(tsha): nas/ kha sgyur lus su 'gugs par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rnam par 'khrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
429a7(tsha): nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig khro bo chen po sum pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM su rtsa ni su b+ha ni hU/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na hU/
429b1(tsha): grip+ta pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn/ bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// bu mo mthu chen thams cad ni// sgra bshig gos dang bral gyur
429b2(tsha): nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran// rdo rje sems dpa'i zhabs kyis mnan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun bdag po'i// rdo rje lcags kyu'i zhags pa yis// bu mo rnams
429b3(tsha): ni 'gug pa'i mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen
429b4(tsha): po'i rdo rje gsum gsang ba gsung gi dam tshig de kho na nyid kyi gnas 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sku gsum la// rdo rje
429b5(tsha): sems dpa' rnam par sgom// zhags pa rdo rje kyo ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas dgug pa dam pa'o// sangs rgyas sku gsum sbyor ba yi// 'khor lo chen po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems
429b6(tsha): dpa' rgyal chen po// rtag tu nges par dgug par 'gyur// mi phyed rdo rje gsum sgoms pas// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+mo che// rdo rje kyo ba'i khyad par gyis// sngags rnams thams cad
429b7(tsha): 'gugs pa'i mchog/ thams cad rdo rjer dngos zhi ba// rang sngags skyes bu bsgoms nas ni// mi yi bu mo mchog rnams kyis// snying kar rdo rje kyo ba sbyang // rlung gi
430a1(tsha): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// nges par rtag tu 'gugs par 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen bsgom// de
430a2(tsha): na sha tsa gnas par bsam// rdo rje mi 'chi sbyor ba yis// lan grangs lnga bcur brjod na ni// nges par rtag tu 'gug par 'gyur// rdo rje kyo ba gzugs chen po// 'bar ba rdo
430a3(tsha): rje 'dra ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms na ni// nam mkha'i bu mo 'gugs pa'i mchog/ rang gi khro bo rdo rje dam// rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa dag/ shu la rdo rje kyo ba'i gnas//
430a4(tsha): lha min bu mo 'gug pa'i mchog/ btsag gam rdo rgyus dag kyang rung // rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis// zla ba gzas ni zin pa'i tshe// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// tshangs
430a5(tsha): pa drag po la sogs lha// gang gi ming rnams bris nas ni// rdo rje gsung gi bka' bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur// rnam pa'i mchog ni kun ldan pa//
430a6(tsha): rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// rdo rje kyo ba rnam par bsam// bskal par bsreg pa'i 'khor lo che// bsgoms nas gnod mo dag spyad//
430a7(tsha): kun gyi phyag rgya'i khyad par dang // sngags kyi khyad par thams cad du// 'gug pa dag gi thabs su gsung // gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//
430b1(tsha): yang dang yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid sngags rnams thams cad kyi// rgyal po mchog tu brtag pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kun tu rnam par
430b2(tsha): 'phrul pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje thor tshugs gcig ma dam tshig chen mo'i rgyal mo rdo rje'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
430b3(tsha): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM shu li nI swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// klu yi bu mo mthu chen rnams// tshig par 'gyur zhing gos dang bral// sangs rgyas byang chub
430b4(tsha): rjes su dran// sngags kyi rig pa 'di yis ni// klu rnams thams cad 'gug par 'gyur// klu yi bu mo mig bzang dag/ bkug nas nye bar spyad par bya//
430b5(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje khro gnyer ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
430b6(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la sa phyung ngo // oM b+ha ya nA sha ni/ tra sa ni trA se/ tra sa ya b+hi ku Ta ta Ti bai ba ra Ti/ shwe te shwe ta dza Ti ni srA hA/ 'di ni gsung ma thag tu yang //
430b7(tsha): rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po kun// rab tu 'dar bar gyur nas ni// ye shes rgyal po rjes su dran// rig pa 'dzin pa'i bu mo mchog/ gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba rnams// sngags
431a1(tsha): kyi rig pa 'di dang ni// dam tshig la sogs pa'i kun nas// 'gog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje ni// yongs su rdzogs pa mdzes mchog gis// ye shes
431a2(tsha): rdo rje gsum las byung // kun nas de ma thag tu 'gugs// yang ni khro bo thams cad ni// dben pa'i gnas ni thams cad du// sngags pas 'bum du bzlas byas na//
431a3(tsha): lngas rnams thams cad byed par bshad// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa chen po smod pa dang // nan tan du ni gsad par bya// yang na gnas nas spo bar bya// 'di
431a4(tsha): yis byang chub mchog dang ni// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// yang gsung pa/ phyogs bcu'i
431a5(tsha): sems can thams cad kyi// lus dang ngag sems gsad par ni// gdug sems ldan pa'i dgra rnams la// cho ga bzhin du spro bar bya// khrag dang chu yis gsher ba yi//
431a6(tsha): bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// bgos nas ling ga rkang pas gnan// khro bo'i rgyal pos sbyar bar bya// brgya rtsa brgyad ni yongs rdzogs nas// sangs rgyas kyang
431a7(tsha): ni nges par 'jig/ yang gsungs pa/ chu yi gos ni gsher byas pa// khro bo'i mchog dag bcings pa yis// lha chen rkang g.yon gyis mnan na// sangs rgyas dag kyang
431b1(tsha): nges par 'jig/ bshang gcis gsher bar byas pa'i gos// ngan pa rul ba'i dri ma nam pa// bgos te sngags ni bzlas byas na// skad cig gis bskams 'chi bar
431b2(tsha): 'gyur// thal ba'i skyoms gsher ba'i gos// bgos na khro bas 'khrugs bzhin du// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang 'jigs par 'gyur//
431b3(tsha): yang gsungs pa/ gcer bur phud de skra bshig la// 'jigs pa'i tshul du gtsigs shing 'gyur// rkang pas ling ga mnan nas ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'jig
431b4(tsha): par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khang stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang // ling ga gcig ni shing gcig rdung // mngon par spyad pa brtsam par bya//
431b5(tsha): mi rus las byas phur bu ni// sor brgyad pa yi tshad dag la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas te// dgra yi sgo gar sbas na ni// sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa//
431b6(tsha): shes dang mi shes rnams spangs pa// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyis// bskams sam yang na 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na thod pa gang ba dag/ khyad par du ni mkhas pas
431b7(tsha): btsal// der ni sngags kyi tshig bris te// rdo rje tshig gi bzlas pa bya// dgra bo'i sgo 'am grong dag tu// sbas na nges par sprod par 'gyur// ta la'i lo ma 'am
432a1(tsha): gzhan la'ang rung // khro bo'i sngags ni kun bris la// dgra yi sgo 'am khyim dag tu// sbas na 'chi ba 'am skams par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das
432a2(tsha): dam tshig chen po dpal rdo rjes de skad bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs nges
432a3(tsha): par 'chi ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di
432a4(tsha): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAnA phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hU hU hUM/
432a5(tsha): badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro A dz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bAka tsat+te badz+ra ki la ya hUM hUM hU pheMT phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsung ma thag/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po kun// rgyal
432a6(tsha): zhing rab tu 'jigs gyur nas// nam mkha' rdo rje thugs dran 'gyur// mi yi rus pa'i phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng rtse las skyes// lkugs las byas pa'i phur bu
432a7(tsha): dag/ rdo rje sku gsum 'jigs par byed// 'od 'phro 'khrug cing mdangs bzang ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag la// rdo rje gsum gyi sku yi mthar// gzugs
432b1(tsha): brlan bsams nas sbyar bar bya// rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen nam// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// gshin rje gshed kyi rgya chen dag/ bsams na rdo rje gsum yang gnon
432b2(tsha): rdo rje bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yis// gdug cing khro bo tshar bcad la// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po dngos// rdo rje sbyor ba byas pa yin// snying ka nas ni rkang pa'i mthar// rdo rje
432b3(tsha): phur bu rnam par bsgom// go bdu' 'dam tshig de nyid bya// 'di ni phur bu'i rnam 'phrul yin// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'debs/
432b4(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// phur bu btab na nges par 'chi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ sku rnam par sprul pa'i rdo rje zhes
432b5(tsha): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i dam tshig tsham ngam gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
432b6(tsha): o tshin+na tshin+na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ dI pa ta badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun dkri ba'i tshul du bya// mthe bong bzhi ni rab tu bsdam// rnam par snang mdzad tshul gnas te/
432b7(tsha): rdo rje phur bus nges par btab// btab ma thag tu sems dpa' che// rdo rje sku gsum las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su
433a1(tsha): 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gsung rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
433a2(tsha): zhugs nas/ gsung gi dam tshig tsham rngam gyis gnon pa rdo rje'i sngags 'di nyid kyi glu dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM d+hI b+hur b+hub/ me shes
433a3(tsha): pad+mo kha rtse ga// rdo rje ser mo dris par gzhag/ 'dod chags rdo rje'i tshul gnas te// rdo rje phung bu nges par gdab// btab ma thag tu rdo rje rje// gru gsum dri med la
433a4(tsha): byung ba// btab pa tsam gyis ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thugs rnam par
433a5(tsha): 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ thugs kyi dam tshig tsham rngam gyis gnon pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs da
433a6(tsha): mas byung ngo // oM badz+ra rA dzA hUM/ rtse mo lnga par bcings nas ni// 'od 'phro mang po 'khrigs par bsgoms// rdo rje thugs kyi tshul gnas te// rdo rje phur bu nges par
433a7(tsha): btab// btab pa tsam gyis rdo rje che// rdo rje dri med gsum las byung // btab ma thag tu ldang bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba'i gnas su 'gyur// mug sung thus/
433b1(tsha): kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga legs par byas nas ni// mkha' dbyings rdo rje mtha' klas par// phur bu 'debs par gdon mi za// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje phur bu chen pos
433b2(tsha): de skad bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan mdzad pa// mnyes shing rab tu dgyes gyur nas// gsung ni 'di
433b3(tsha): skad bka' skul to// e ma hogs pa ba'i gnas kyi mchog/ e ma ho snying po kun bsdus pa// e ma ho chos kyi gnas zhi ba// e ma ho rdo rje rnam par 'joms// phur
433b4(tsha): 'debs sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' grags chen de// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// phur bus gdab pa yang dag bshad// 'di ni
433b5(tsha): sngags rnams thams cad kyi// phur 'debs nyid las byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi mchog sbyin pa'i// sngags kyi de nyid don bsdus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
433b6(tsha): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang chen gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rmad du byung ba'i sngags kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam
433b7(tsha): par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' mi 'gyur che// thams cad
434a1(tsha): dbang bskur kun mkhyen pas// rdo rje'i gsung ni bka' stsal pa// sme sha can ni bdag nyid che// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnas su
434a2(tsha): khyad par du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// bshang gci dam tshig la sogs pa// de ru cho ga bzhin du ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgoms pa
434a3(tsha): yi// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su dge/ rab tu bzang la bzhin ras mdzes// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// pang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgoms// dkyil
434a4(tsha): 'khor lnga yi 'khor lo yis// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par bsgom// sngags kyi 'khor lo can gyi gsang // mchod pa'i gnas ni nyams dga' sgom// sku gsung thugs ci/
434a5(tsha): rdo rje sgom// rnam par snang mdzad sku chen po// bsam gtan sngags kyi sbyor ba yi// sangs rgyas kyang ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yi// btso blag mkhan ni bdag
434a6(tsha): nyid che// bu mo ut+pal mthing ka'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub// sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//
434a7(tsha): dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' 'o// de ni de ma thag tu yang // rdo rje sams dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur// rgyal po chos rnams kun dang mtshungs// 'dod dang thar pa rab bsgrub pa//
434b1(tsha): rdo rje chos ni rnam sgoms pa// gar mkhan bu mo rlab mdzes shing // bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus ring ba// bsgrub pa pos ni rtag tu sgrub// de ni rdo rje chos kyi bdag/ sa bcu la ni
434b2(tsha): gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po gsung gi dam tshig 'dzin// mnga' dbang dam pa kun gyi mchog/ bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs dag gi bu mo ni// rdo rje
434b3(tsha): chos bdag bsgrub par bya// 'di ni gsang ba thob byed pa'o// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// bsgrub pa kun tu brtsam par bya// skya rengs shar ba'i dus su ni// bsgom pa mchog gi
434b4(tsha): 'grub par 'gyur// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogal// spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms nas// grub pa myur du thob par 'gyur/
434b5(tsha): 'di ni sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// sangs rgyas mtshan gyis mtshan par 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon tsam du// de yi 'od kyang snang bar byed// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis//
434b6(tsha): sbyor ba thams cad brtsam par bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' 'o// rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod na// bshang gci'i dam tshig bza' bar
434b7(tsha): bya// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// bshang gci'i dam tshig la sogs pas// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas
435a1(tsha): byang chub gnas zhi ba// de nyid bla na med pa 'grub// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa dang thar pa'i dam tshig rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to//
435a2(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje kun tu skrag par byed pa'i khro bo nyid
435a3(tsha): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hriSh+TiHbi kr-i tA na na sarba shaSh+TA nA sha ya/ sta b+hA ya/ tsU hU phaT phaT swA hA/ dug ni khrag dang kun tu sbyar// lan tsha skye tshe
435a4(tsha): de bzhin te// khro zhing tsher ma'i me la bsreg/ bu mo ming dang tshig tu bcas// nyi ma'i gung ngam nam phyed na// 'di ni yongs yi rab tu shis// shes rab can gyis gru gsum
435a5(tsha): du/ stong rtsa brgyad ni tshul bzhin bsreg/ bu mo dag gi don gyi phyir// 'di ni nyi ma gsum du bya// bskal pa grangs med gsum du yang // de yis rtag tu gnon par 'gyur//
435a6(tsha): sangs rgyas sam ni chos 'dzin nam// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang rung // gal te rmongs pas 'das nas ni// de yi tshe ni der zad 'gyur// bcu bzhi'am yang na tshes brgyan
435a7(tsha): la/ dur khrod sol ba blangs nas ni// cho ga bzhin du sngags btab na// de ni rtag tu ster bar 'gyur// sngags shes pa yis gang ba yin// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas
435b1(tsha): ni// bsam gtan dag gi bris nas ni// 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// tho ba bsam gtan sbyor ba yis// phab na nges par lhung bar 'gyur// hU ni rab tu 'bar dang
435b2(tsha): bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba rab tu bsgom// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs la ni// gdug pa thams cad 'jig par bshad// rdo rgyus sol ba la sogs pas// skyes pa'am bud med
435b3(tsha): gzugs bris la// lag par sta re bsam nas su// mgrin pa bcad par rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas sku gsum rin chen mchog/ sems can kun la phan 'dod pa//
435b4(tsha): 'di yis gdon par 'gyur ba'am// shi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// las kyi rdo rje rab 'bar ba// me stag mang po 'khrigs pa can// dbus su rdo rje bsams na ni//
435b5(tsha): chu rnams gnon pa'i mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dag ni 'di 'dra ba// rlung la sogs pa byung na ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas su// dgug pa'i dgra ni dran par bya//
435b6(tsha): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// gang zhig sprul par gyur pa yang // mthong ba tsam gyis 'gags 'gyur te// gzhan du byas na 'jig par 'gyur// sangs rgyas//
435b7(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' dang // skye bo gdug pa gzhan dag kyang // sngags 'dis skrag par byas na ni// 'chi bar 'gyur ba'ang gdon mi za// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad
436a1(tsha): kyi gsang ba'i snying po'o// phaT/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pa yis gnas bzhi ru//
436a2(tsha): bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing // pad+mo rab tu rgyas byas nas// sngags 'di rab tu
436a3(tsha): bsgom par bya// hU/ 'od zer lnga ni rab 'bar ba'i// rdo rje can gyis sbyor ba bsgom// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// phab na byang chub thob par 'gyur// de ni de ma
436a4(tsha): thag tu yang // rnam par snang mdzad 'od 'dra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs rgyas sku gsum rdo rje 'dzin// sems dpa' thams cad bskyed pa rdo rje zhes bya
436a5(tsha): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bzhin bzang phan par 'dod pa yi// bud med rnyed nas cho ga bzhin// dben par mchod pa brtsam par bya// gsang ba blangs nas
436a6(tsha): bza' bar bya// de ni de ma thag tu yang // 'jam dpal dang ni gzi rjid mnyam// mi snang bdag po dpal dang ldan// 'dzam bu gser gyi mdangs 'drar 'gyur//
436a7(tsha): bshang ba'am yang na bza' ba'am// sha dag kyang ni gzhug par bya// cho ga bzhin du bsngags nas ni// zos na sangs rgyas kyis mi mthong // zhes bcom ldan 'das
436b1(tsha): rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// bshang ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// kham phor sbyar mar gzhag par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du bskul na ni//
436b2(tsha): sangs rgyas nyi mas mi mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang rta sha dang // sha chen dgra ni cho ga bzhin// blangs nas sbyor ba'i thabs kyis ni// zos na de yis mi mthong ngo // bshang dang lhan/
436b3(tsha): cig sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // khyi yi sha dang sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum
436b4(tsha): gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // sha chen dang ni sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi
436b5(tsha): sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // ba glang sha dang sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis
436b6(tsha): mi mthong ngo // bshang ba las byung srog chags las// brtul zhugs can gyi ri lu bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yas// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi mthong ngo // ga pur tsan
436b7(tsha): dan sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // gi wa a ka ru sbyar ba'i// ri lu lcags gsum
437a1(tsha): gyis dkris pa// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje stobs po cher 'gyur ro// ga pur gur kum sbyar ba yi// ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa//
437a2(tsha): dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi mthong ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pa gang yang rung // phyag rgya chen por byin brlabs nas// de ni de 'dra'i dpal ldan pa'i//
437a3(tsha): stobs chen pha rol gnon par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba rdzogs pa yis// steng du rdo rje 'gro bar 'gyur// stong gsum bgrod pa'i dpal ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'od dang 'dra/
437a4(tsha): bar 'gyur// 'dod khams gnas pa'i bu mo dang // lha yi longs spyod rigs brtul zhugs// yang na gzugs khams gnas pa las// stobs chen gyis ni 'dod pa
437a5(tsha): spyod// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig mi snang ba'i rdo rje chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas rab dges dag/ sems 'khrugs yid la dang bdag
437a6(tsha): ngo mtshar gyur cing spyan gdangs nas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma ho 'di rab ngo mtshar che// e ma hogs nga gnas mi 'gyur ba// a ma ho ngo bo nyid kyis
437a7(tsha): dag/ e ma ho shin tu dri med chos// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// skye bar byed pa mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas rdo rje chos chen po// rdo rje gsung du bka' stsal pa// sems
437b1(tsha): dpa' rdo rje sbyor ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin rnams mnyes par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub rab dbye bas// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mnyes 'gyur// rdo rje can gyi gzugs la sogs
437b2(tsha): gtsug tor mnyes par byed par bshad// khro bo'i nang na de mchog ste// sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom pa// rigs kyi rgyal po chos mchog rnams// dkon mchog dpal
437b3(tsha): ni rnam par bsgom// rig pa'i rgyal mo sbyor ba la// tshe dpag med pa rab tu bsgom// thams cad las byed sngags rnams la// gdon mi za ba'i ye shes bsgom// sngags
437b4(tsha): rnams thams cad nyid la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// zhes gsungs so// gnod sbyin ma yi sngags rgyud la// gshin rje gshed ni brtag par bya// sngags
437b5(tsha): rnams thams cad nyid la ni// spyi bo nas ni bsku la ba shes// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// bAsam gtan 'khor lo
437b6(tsha): 'di yis ni// sngags brnyes pa yi dkyil 'khor dag/ dam tshig chen po sgrub byed pa// sgrub pa po la phan par gsungs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo chos
437b7(tsha): rnams kun dbang phyug/ sku dang gsung thugs yongs dag pas// ye shes rdo rje bka' stsal pa// ri rtse nyams ni dga' ba dang // nags tshal rab tu dben par ni//
438a1(tsha): bsam gtan rdo rje rab tu bya// bzlas dang sngags kyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// sngags kyi bsam gtan gyis bskul bas
438a2(tsha): gsung gi las kyi bka' bzhin du// las rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi gzugs chen po// pad+ma rA ga'i mdog 'dra ba// sku gsung thugs kyi
438a3(tsha): rdo rje la/ gnas gsum du ni rigs brtag go/ dbab pa'i cho ga thams cad ni// byas na gdon mi za bar 'gyur// rengs dang bskul dang lha chen po// 'phags la ma
438a4(tsha): bzhi pa dag kyang ni// rdo rje grub pa dag gis bya// de ltar byas na rtag par 'gyur// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis ma 'am// khye'u lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa'i// mtshan
438a5(tsha): nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// gzung nas dbab pa rab tu brtag/ cho ga thams cad byas nas ni// las rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya// rnam pa gzhan du bya na ni//
438a6(tsha): khams gsum skye bos dpyas par 'gyur// de la snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig ni 'di rnams so// hUM haHA d+hi dz+nye/ nam mkha' dbyings ni sems med cing /
438a7(tsha): rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyang // cho ga bzhin du byas na 'bab// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' ba dag/ haHni sku yi rdo rje can//
438b1(tsha): A ni chos 'dzin rgyal po ste// d+hi ni gsang tshig bstan pa'o// dz+nye ni skul bar byed par bshad// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo ba yin// 'di ni bskul ba thams cad kyi//
438b2(tsha): gsang ba yin pa 'di rab bshad// khru gang tsam ma ma khru do'am// khru brgyad tsam ma ma lnga tsam du// rdo rje rgyal po rab bskul na// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'phar bar
438b3(tsha): 'gyur// snga ma bzhin du thams cad 'gyur// 'di ni gsang ba thob pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ sku
438b4(tsha): gsum gnas ni yongs dag pas// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// rtse gcig ma gyur pa yis kyang // brtul zhugs bstan pas 'di dag bya// sbyor ba gzhan min
438b5(tsha): pas bya ba// gdug pa thams cad rnam gzhig pa'o// dur khrod sol dang phu ba lkugs las// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// skra bshig gcer bur byung ba
438b6(tsha): yis// khams gsum dag kyang 'jig par byed// dur khrod ro bsreg thal ba yis// dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas kyang //
438b7(tsha): bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas pa las// ba lang sha'am rta yi sha/ khyi yi sha 'am sna tshogs kyi// rdo rje'ang gdon mi za bar 'jig/ sha chen
439a1(tsha): gyis ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje las byung 'jig par bshad// 'di ni dgra rnams thams cad kyi// 'jig pa shin tu mi bzad yin// dgra yi gzugs
439a2(tsha): brnyan byas nas ni// bshang gci dag gi chos mchog can// tsher ma'i me la sros nas bsreg/ sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ ces gsungs so// chu bo'i
439a3(tsha): 'gram gyi sa yis kyang // dgra yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// til 'bru tsam gyis yan lag kun// dug las byung ba'i tsher ma yi// bskul ba'i tshig dang bcas pa
439a4(tsha): dag/ sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ ske tshe lan tshwa 'bru mar dang // dug dang da ngur dag ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsad pa la// 'di dag mchog tu 'gyur bar
439a5(tsha): bshad// sol khus gsher ba'i gos dag gis// gyon te sems ni khros nas su// rkang pas ling ga mnan na ni// srin pos 'khyer ba gdon mi za// rus phye khrag dang dug
439a6(tsha): rnams kyis// gzugs brnyan rab tu byas na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang // myur ba dag tu 'khyer bar 'gyur// skye tshe ba shang gci sbyor ba yis// ling ga yongs
439a7(tsha): su spogs par bya// blugs la rkang pas rab mnan na// tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i khro bo'i
439b1(tsha): snying po'o// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta badz+ra NAM/ o hu lu phu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+ThA/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/
439b2(tsha): sarba big+h+na bI na ya ka na/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzA pa ti a na ta ka ra ya hUM phaT/ sbyin sreg yang na ba sa ma gtan dag/ lus dang ngag sems 'jig pa ste// ma yang ba yi se ma sa
439b3(tsha): kyis bya// 'di ni gsod pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo che// rnam par bgrad pa 'jigs 'jigs lha// sta re tho ba phyag na bsnams// bsams nas
439b4(tsha): bsam gtan rab tu bya// de la 'di ni drag po chen po khro bo'i dam tshig go// nam mkha' thams cad sangs rgyas kyis// yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgom//
439b5(tsha): gdug pa de yi gsad par ni// bsams na de ma thag tu 'chi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// yongs su gang bar bsgoms nas ni// gdug pa'i sems
439b6(tsha): kyis bsad na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyang 'chi// sangs rgyas gnod byed dgra rnams la// skrag cing 'jigs pas dkrugs pas ni// sngags mkhan gyi ni mdun
439b7(tsha): bsams na// 'chi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za// srin po khro bo sna tshogs pa// gtum zhing khro bo mi bzad pa// der ni skrag par byas bsams na// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
440a1(tsha): kyang 'chi// 'ug pa khA dang bya rgod dang // mchu ring ba dang wa rnams ni// de yis zos par bsam na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig
440a2(tsha): sbrul nag rab tu khro ba ni// 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs byed pa// dug gi mchog gi dam tshig ni// dpral bar bsams nas khyad 'phags pa'i// sbrul de zos par
440a3(tsha): bsams na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad kyang // yams sam gnod par byed pa rnams// 'jigs pa nges par
440a4(tsha): 'bebs pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bskul ba'i mchog yin no// tho ba rab tu drag po yis// brtul zhugs can gyis rab tu brdeg/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' bzhin du// dgra
440a5(tsha): yi srog ni med par 'gyur// rdo rje'i sta re la sogs pas// gshag cing gtub par bsams na ni// sku gsum gyi ni mchog sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' drag po'ang
440a6(tsha): 'chi// bsrung ba la sogs sngags rnams dang // lha rnams kyang ni phur bus gdab// 'di ni gsod par byed pa'i mchog/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' 'o// rdo/
440a7(tsha): phung pos ji tsam du// sems can dkyil 'khor gnas pa la// gsad bdag nyid rtogs bsam na ni// mnyes par 'gyur te gzhan du men// ston pa sangs rgyas rdo//
440b1(tsha): 'dzin// rdo rje chos dang rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// bsam gtan sbyor bas 'chi bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po'i dam tshig khro bos de skad
440b2(tsha): bka' stsal to// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad nam mkha' thug chen po// thams cad dbang bskur rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes rdo rjes
440b3(tsha): bka' stsal pa// e ma ho ngo bo nyid kyi dag/ rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams las// rgyal ba rnams kyis skye bar bstan// de la 'di ni las phran
440b4(tsha): tshogs kyi rdo rje gsang ba'o// sbrul ni mi sdug 'jigs byed pa// nag po 'bar ba 'khrug cing khro// lce gnyis mche ba'i 'phreng can ni// rdo rgyus dag ga ma sol bas bri//
440b5(tsha): de la 'di ni klu khro bo bskul ba'i snying po'o// kha/ mi bzad par ni gyur pa'i dug/ rdo rje'i dbus na 'dug par bsam// bsreg pa me yi kha dog bzhin// bsgoms na 'gul
440b6(tsha): bar gdon mi za// de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'byin pa'i snying po'o// hrIHrnam pa sna tshogs las byung dug/ khams gsum na ni gnas pa kun// de yi khyer bar
440b7(tsha): bsgoms na ni// 'bab par 'gyur bar rnam par bsam// de ni de ma thag tu yang // mi bzad dug gi rgya mtshor 'gyur// reg ma thag tu skye bo kun// 'jig par 'gyur te/
441a1(tsha): the tshom med// sdig pa sbal pa la sogs dang // sbrul rnams sna tshogs pa dag kyang // sbyor ba byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis// cho ga bzhin du rab tu bya//
441a2(tsha): de la 'di ni dug thams cad 'pho ba'i snying po'o// oM/ lta ba rdo rje'i dug la sogs// gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug/ nam mkha' rdo rje dkyil 'khor du// bsams nas
441a3(tsha): ye shes rdo rjes 'dren// bcom ldan 'das dug gi dam tshig chen po rdo rjes de skad bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni dug gso ba'i dam tshig rdo rje'i snying po'o//
441a4(tsha): hUM/ rdo rje chen po'i snying po'o// kha dog dkar po rnam par bsam// 'od kyi sprin ni shin tu 'bar// zla ba'i 'od bzhin bsil ba ste// gnas bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yi//
441a5(tsha): de ma thag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// lan gsum legs par sgom pa ni// skyugs pa dag tu rnam bsams na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yang // de ma thag tu dug med
441a6(tsha): byed// ces de skad bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni nye ba'i dug thams cad drang ba'i snying po'o// AH'bras dang pho la mig 'brum bu dang // gang gzhan nad du bshad pa rnams//
441a7(tsha): phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// bsam pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur// pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad// zla ba bzhin du dri med pa// de yi dbus na 'dug bsam pa// 'od zer ldan
441b1(tsha): rdzogs pa'o// skud pa nA ni dam tshig gnag/ bskul ba nA ni dkar po 'dra// bsam gtan gnas ni gsang ba 'di// ye shes dri med gsang chen yin// de la 'di ni phyi nang gi nad
441b2(tsha): thams cad gso ba'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sngags kyi yi ge'i tshogs rnams so// nga na dzi ka/ a ro li ka/ badz+ra d+h+r-i ka/ nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// yi ge'i tshig ni gang 'dod pa/
441b3(tsha): dad pas yon tan thob 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gzugs ni bsgom par bya// nad kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// dam tshig spre'u dang 'dra ba'am// yang na khyi las byung yang rung // rang
441b4(tsha): gi lus dang ngag sems las// byung ba dag tu rnam par bsam// 'khor lo 'am ni rdo rje'ang rung // bsgoms na rdo rje'i go 'phang gnas// lus dang ngag sems dam tshig
441b5(tsha): rnams// des ni phye mar brlag par bsgom// de nas brtsams te rdzogs sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// byin rlabs go 'phang dam pa dag/ dgyes
441b6(tsha): pa'i spyan gyis rab tu gsol// 'di skad bka' stsal to// rang lus ngag sems rdo rje la// sangs rgyas sprin dag rnam par bsam// rdo rje rgyal po sprin chen po// nad las
441b7(tsha): thar pa bsgom par bya// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang // blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ de la khros par bsams na ni// 'chi bar byed pa dam pa yin//
442a1(tsha): bsam gtan sbyor ba 'di dag gi/ las skyes su yang gang grags pa// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas sbyor ba yis// nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig par 'gyur// yang na//
442a2(tsha): bdag gi sngags rgyal gyis// rdo rje bsam gtan cho ga bsam// 'di ni nad rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' 'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje
442a3(tsha): 'dzin// ye shes kyo ba 'od chen po// 'dod dang thar pa rdo rje ches// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu ste// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing //
442a4(tsha): rang bzhin dag pa'i de nyid la// 'khrul pa'i rdo rje rab tu gsungs// bsam gtan bzlas pa'i don brtson pa// bsgrub pa pos ni rtag tu mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sem/
442a5(tsha): dpa' rnams// dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su mthong // de la 'di ni rmi lam chen po'i dam tshig gi gnas te/ byang chub ye shes mchog thob pas// sangs rgyas 'od ni bzang
442a6(tsha): por mthong // sangs rgyas rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku// skur yang bdag nyid myur du mthong // sems dpa' chen po khams gsum pas// mchod pa byed par des mthong
442a7(tsha): ngo // ye shes chen po'i 'od 'dra'i gzugs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu mchod pa byas par mthong //
442b1(tsha): rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen dang // grags pa chen po rdo rje chos// gsang ba rdo rje grags pa cher// rmi lam dag na rang gzugs mthong // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje
442b2(tsha): can// sangs rgyas chen po phyag 'tshal ba'i// rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong 'gyur ba// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ster// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i//
442b3(tsha): lha yi bu mo yid 'ongs dang // khye'u dang bu mo dag mthong na// de yis dngos grub thob par 'gyur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // zhing na bzhugs pa nges
442b4(tsha): par mthong // thugs ni dgos par gyur nas kyang // chos mdzad yid du 'ong ba stsol// chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lus// sems can kun gyis yongs bskor ba// bas
442b5(tsha): gtan rdo rjer la gnas pa'i// dam tshig sbyor ba mthong bar 'gyur// kun dga' ra bskyed mos tshal// lha yi bu mo sogs pa sa brgyan// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs
442b6(tsha): pas// bsam gtan dam tshig can gyis mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yis// de ni mngon par dbang bskur mthong // rigs 'dzin rgyal po chen po yis//
442b7(tsha): mchod pa byas pa des mthong ngo // yang gsungs pa/ rdo rje las byung sna tshogs pa'i// rmi lam dri ma med mthong na// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// skyes pa bla med par
443a1(tsha): 'grub 'gyur// gdol pa khyi yi sbyor la sogs// gal te rdo rje blos mthong na// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sems kyi gnas ni 'grub par 'gyur//
443a2(tsha): de la 'di ni rmi lam rnam par dpyad pa'i dam tshig gi snying po'o// rang gi sems ni dmigs pa la// chos rnams thams cad rab tu gnas// nam mkha'i rdo rje gnas sems
443a3(tsha): 'di// chos med chos nyid med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
443a4(tsha): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig gi the tshom gcod pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ci zhig lags// chos rnams ngo bo med
443a5(tsha): pa la// chos kyi de nyid kun bshad pa// e ma ho ngo mtshar las byung ba// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
443a6(tsha): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
443a7(tsha): thams cad/ nam mkha' ni chos gang dang yang mi ldan te/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin no// nam mkha' de nga ni chos thams cad du rtogs la/ thams cad kyi rjes su lta'o/
443b1(tsha): snyam du mi sems so// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / rmi lam gyi dam tshig las byung bar rjes su rtogs par bya'o//
443b2(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la brtag tu med/ bltar mi snang ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
443b3(tsha): pa thams cad chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na lus dang / ngag dang / sems
443b4(tsha): dang / chos thams cad dang / rdo rje'i gnas kyi dam tshig ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i phyir te/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid do// lus dang /
443b5(tsha): ngag dang / sems kyi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams de dag gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
443b6(tsha): thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams la gnas te/ nam mkha'i khams de yang 'dod pa'i khams na gnas pa yang ma yin/ gzugs
443b7(tsha): kyi khams na gnas pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams na gnas pa yang ma yin te/ chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de ni skye ba med pa'o// gang la skye ba med pa 'di
444a1(tsha): ni chos gang gis brtag par mi nus so// de bas na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o// kye
444a2(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na byang chub kyi sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba rdo rje'i gnas byed pa ste/
444a3(tsha): byang chub kyi sems de yang lus la mi gnas/ ngag la mi gnas/ sems la mi gnas so// chos gang khams gsum na mi gnas pa de la skye ba med de/ 'di ni ye shes 'byung
444a4(tsha): ba'i rdo rje gnas yin no// kye bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmi lam de ni bdag gis khams gsum du rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// mi
444a5(tsha): yang bdag gis rmi lam mthong bar bya'o snyam du mi sems te/ khams gra sum gyi bya ba de rnams kyang rmi lam lta bu/ rmi lam dang 'dra bar rmi lam las 'byung ngo // de bzhin du
444a6(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed pa rnams dang / sems can
444a7(tsha): ji snyed pa rnams kyang / rmi lam la bdag med pa'i gnas su rjes su rtogs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na yid
444b1(tsha): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ste/ rin po che thams cad kyi gtso bo'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa gang yin pa de la/
444b2(tsha): sems can gang gis gser ram/ rin po che'am/ yang na dngul yang rung ste/ gang bslangs pa de thams cad bsam pa tsam gyis 'byor par byed do// rin po che la sogs
444b3(tsha): pa de dag thams cad kyang sems la yang mi gnas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu la gnas pa yang ma yin no// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ chos
444b4(tsha): thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang rjes su rtogs par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu dgas pa'i spyan gdangs nas
444b5(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang nam mkha'i khams
444b6(tsha): kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rjes su 'brang ba de ngo mtshar to// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
444b7(tsha): cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags thams
445a1(tsha): cad rdo rje'i dngos grub mdo btus te gsungs pa/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mdo btus pa'i dngos grub de dag gang la gnas/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de
445a2(tsha): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsungs
445a3(tsha): so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / sngags thams cad ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs la mi gnas
445a4(tsha): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / sngags kyi chos thams cad ni/ bdag gi
445a5(tsha): lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje la gnas so// lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje de dag thams cad kyang / 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas/ gzugs kyi
445a6(tsha): khams na mi gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams na mi gnas so// sems kyang lus la mi gnas/ lus kyang sems la mi gnas/ ngag kyang sems la mi gnas
445a7(tsha): sems kyang ngag la mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' ltar ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ sku dang /
445b1(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gang na gnas/ gang nas byung / rang gi lus dang /
445b2(tsha): ngag dang / sems las byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sems gang la gnas pa bka' stsal pa/ nam mkha' la gnas so// nam
445b3(tsha): mkha' gang na gnas/ gang na yang mi gnas so// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur/ rmad du gyur nas/ rang gi sems kyi chos nyid la
445b4(tsha): gnas nas sems shing cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ sems
445b5(tsha): can thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po'i rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
445b6(tsha): yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
445b7(tsha): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig gis gsol ba btab nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa'i tshogs kyi mtsha
446a1(tsha): pa byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor seng ge'i dam tshig gi rgyal po
446a2(tsha): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i sku'i dkyil 'khor 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de nas
446a3(tsha): sku yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya// khru ni bcu drug tshad du bya//
446a4(tsha): gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas kun gyi dkyil 'khor de// sku yi rdo rje rab tu gnas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// rdo rje tshogs bri bar bya// sngags rnams kyis
446a5(tsha): ni gsang ba mchog/ dbus su rnam par snang mdzad gnas// phyag rgya rdo rje'i gnas su bya// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'ang bri// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje mchog/ gru rnams
446a6(tsha): kun tu dgod par bya// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa yi// khro bo rnams kyang sgor bri'o// rdo rje gsang ba rab sgom pas// mchod pa sngags shes pa yi bya// 'di ni sngags
446a7(tsha): rnams thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' 'o// bshang dang gci ba la sogs pa// bye brag tu ni nges par dbul// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//
446b1(tsha): sku yi rdo rje las dam tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa gsung
446b2(tsha): rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sprin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
446b3(tsha): las phyung ngo // de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor mchog/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dra// dkyil 'khor rnams ni kun gyi mchog/ legs par rab tu bshad par bya//
446b4(tsha): khru ni nyi shu'i tshad du bya// gru bzhi lam pa cho ga bzhin// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// rdo rje bsgom pas thig gdab bo// nyid kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor nas// rdo rje sku yi yon
446b5(tsha): tan bskyed// rgyal po chen po rdo rje chos// rig pa'i dbang po dbab par bya// de dbus 'khor lo chen po ni// zlum por kun tu bri bar bya// mdo ru phyag rgya thams cad ni//
446b6(tsha): cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// tshe dpag med pa'i phyag rgya che// de yi dbus su gzhag par bya// rdo rje'i gnas mchog de nyid du// thams cad yongs su dgod par bya//
446b7(tsha): yongs su gsal ba cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor dam pa byas nas ni// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bya// 'on tang rdo rje can dag mnyes// bshang gci khu ba'i dam
447a1(tsha): tshig gis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' 'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
447a2(tsha): thams cad kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas sprin gyi tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
447a3(tsha): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje 'dzin mchog gang yin pa'i//
447a4(tsha): gzugs ni dbus su legs bris pa// de yi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang las byung // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /
447a5(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gnas ye shes gsang ba yin te rab tu gsang ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'khor
447a6(tsha): lo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsu
447a7(tsha): dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi snying po'i bdo'i yi ge'i tshogs rnams so// oM AHhU/ rdo rje'i thig ni btab pa dang /
447b1(tsha): tshon rtsi rnams ni dgye ba dag/ sngags kyi sems dpa' mi bya ste// byas na byang chub rnyed par dka'// de bas dam tshig tshul shes pas// sngags kyi lha rnams phab nas
447b2(tsha): su/ byin gyi rlabs par gnas bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor rnams ni rnam par brtag/ rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad dam// yang na spyan ni dbab par bya//
447b3(tsha): sku yi dkyil 'khor gnas yid 'ong // rdo rje sku yi yon tan 'thob// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// rang gi chos ma dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi//
447b4(tsha): gsang ba rab tu brtag pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mA ma ki yang dbab par bya// 'di ni sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba rmad du byung ba'o//
447b5(tsha): de ltar byas na byin rlob cing // yid la dbab pa nyid gshegs te// rab tu dges pa ru gyur nas ni// gsang ba dag ni mchog kyang gsol// 'di skad kyang gsungs
447b6(tsha): so// sngags kyi sems dpa' bya ba ni// rdo rjegs bab rmad po che// khro bo'i rgyal pos bkug nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// rdo rje dri med gsum
447b7(tsha): dag gi/ dam tshig mchod pa dus gsum pa// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas bya// sngags kyi dngos grub thob par byed// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// sngags rnams
448a1(tsha): thams cad nyid la yang // rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma 'bul// bshang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang // sems las byung ba'i tsan dan dang //
448a2(tsha): khu ba dag gi sngags rnams kun// tsham par byed pa kun tu bshad// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs byed pa'o//
448a3(tsha): thig gdab pa yi cho ga 'di// bdag nyid gang tshe spyod pa na// rnam par snang mdzad bsgom nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgo ma// ya nga na rdo rje mi 'chir grags//
448a4(tsha): slob ma rdo rje 'od po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi nges bstan pa'i// las kyi go 'phang bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rgyal chen lnga rnams ni// rdo rje thig skud dag la dgod// 'di/
448a5(tsha): ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba rab tu rmad byung ba'o// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// tshon rtsi dag kyang rnam par bsgom// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba
448a6(tsha): byang chub dam pa yin// sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang // rdo rje hU ni bsgom par bya// sku dang gsung gi dam chog mchog/ gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de ltar dag
448a7(tsha): tu byas na ni// rdo rje ma phyed gsum las skyes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan pa// 'jigs shing skrag nas byin rlobs mdzod// rdo rje bum pa bzhag pa ni// sngags rgyud
448b1(tsha): bdag pos shes byas te// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// brtan pa'i blos ni brtag par bya// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'dod pa'i// sngags shes pas ni sbyin
448b2(tsha): sreg bya// bshang gci 'bru mar sha la sogs// sbyin sreg tu ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje mi byed gsum dag la// rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg dbul// dbus su rang gi lha
448b3(tsha): yi gzugs// bsams te zhal du dbab par bya// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// dbang po gnyis kyi dam tshig gis// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas
448b4(tsha): thams cad kyi// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// rnam par snang mdzad sbyor ba yis// slob ma rdo rje gsum las byung // a ni lus dang ngag sems la// bsgoms nas
448b5(tsha): rdo rjes gzung bar bya// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // grags chen rnam par snang mdzad dag/ sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig tu// byin gyi rlabs ni rab tu gsol//
448b6(tsha): del 'di ni dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i tshig go/ a kha bi ra hU/ sngags 'di ni dam tshig thams cad kyi lus dang ngag sems rdo rje'i snying po'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i
448b7(tsha): dbang bskur ba'i ye shes gsang ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rab tu bsgoms// rdo rje'i rigs ni 'dzin pa
449a1(tsha): yis// sil snyan dri yi sprin rnams bsgoms// 'di skad kyang gsungs so// rdo rje sku gsung sngags kyi ni// yungs kar dag ni brdeg par bya//
449a2(tsha): de la de yi tshe na ni// bdag nyid dbang bskur rab tu gsol// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// yang na sangs rgyas bsgom par bya// bum pa'i dam tshig mchog rnams
449a3(tsha): kyis// bzung bar mkhas pa dag gis bsgom// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad bsams// slob ma rtag tu blo brtan la// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje can// sngags shes pas
449a4(tsha): ni dgod par bya// de la 'di ni dbang bskur thams cad kyi gsang ba/ slob dpon thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu smra bar bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi// rdo rje
449a5(tsha): gsang ba gsum las byung // khams gsum dag gis phyag byas pas// rdo rje dbang bskur chen po sbyin// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin par bya// de la 'di ni slob ma thams
449a6(tsha): cad kyis rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba bya ba'i cho ga gsang ba'o// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// mchod chen ji ltar stsal ba bzhin// bdag kyang rab tu
449a7(tsha): bsgral ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i rdo rje de bdag gsol// de tshe de la dbang bskur ba// rab tu dgas nas gsol bar mdzad// lha yi gzugs kyi sbyor ba yis// snying kar
449b1(tsha): bdag po gzhag par bya// rdo rje slob ma blo ldan la// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig byin la// dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yi// dam
449b2(tsha): tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang khyod kyis blang // bud med dag kyang brten par bya//
449b3(tsha): rdo rje lam gyi de dag gis// sems can thams cad bskul bar bya// 'di skad ces gsungs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dam tshig mchog tu brtag pa'o//
449b4(tsha): sngags kyi bskul ma smras pa yis// de la sngags kyang sbyin par bya// sngags kyi rgyal po ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba sbyin pa brtsam par bya// khu ba'i yang na bshad
449b5(tsha): ba'ang rung // cho ga bzhin du sngags pas ni// rdo rje blos ni bza' bar bya// 'on tang dngos grub rnyed mi dka'// rnam pa 'di bzhi gsang chen te// rdo rje can ni kun gyis
449b6(tsha): gsang // sngags kyi 'khor lo bud med gzugs// sems can don spyad phyir gnas pa'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sngags mnyes par bya ba'i gsang
449b7(tsha): ba'o// glang po'i sha dang rta sha khyi// sha chen dag kyang bza' bar bya// sngags rnams kun la dbul bar bya// de ltar byas na mgon po mnyes// nyin re rdo rje slob ma
450a1(tsha): la// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// bshang gci sha yi bya ba dang // rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig dag gis// sngags rnams kun gyi yi ge o//
450a2(tsha): bsgom na de ma thag tu 'bar// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa dang // dam tshig
450a3(tsha): chen po bsgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas byang chub nyid dag kyang // nan tan du ni bsgrub par bya// mi snang stobs dang brtson 'grus dang // rdo rje dgug pa mchog dag kyang //
450a4(tsha): rdo rje sku yi bka' bzhin du// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad 'grub// bshang gci dang ni sha chen rnams// cha ni mnyam par sbyar nas su// kham phor sbyar ma rA gzhug
450a5(tsha): na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig 'khod// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs te/ de la 'di ni gsang ba thams cad kyi rdo rje mngag gzhug pa rab tu bskul ba'i dam tshig gi
450a6(tsha): mchog go// hri ni 'bar ba 'od bzang po// nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams// yongs su gang bar rnam
450a7(tsha): bar bsgom// de yi sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// der ni sngags kyis dbab par bya// de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sngags rdo rje'i byin gyis rlobs pa'i
450b1(tsha): snying po'o// a kha d+hi/ phyag na rdo rje gzugs chen dang // phyag na pad+mo 'od chen dang // gzhan gyis mi thub gzugs chen dang // sgoms nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag
450b2(tsha): de la 'di ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mi bskyod pa ni rab tu brtag/ tshe dpag med pa 'khor lo che// rdo rje snang mdzad de bzhin
450b3(tsha): te// 'od chen sdug bsngal chen po yis// thams cad snying pos bskul bar bya// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po thams cad bskul ba'o// a mdung rtse che dang rdo rje che//
450b4(tsha): lcags kyu sna tshogs mchog rnams kyis// rdo rje cho ga bzhin bskul nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grub// 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so// nyams dga' ba yi ri
450b5(tsha): dag dang // chu gling rnam pa sna tshogs su// zla ba phyed ni tshun chad kyi// sangs rgyas thob pa gdon mi za// ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi/ rdul phran ji snyed yod pa yi// de yi
450b6(tsha): 'khor tshogs lhan cig tu// 'khor lo can gyi byang chub 'grub// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// zab mo'i chos kyang
450b7(tsha): thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig rdo rje'i bzhad pa chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// de la 'di ni mngag
451a1(tsha): gzhug pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes che// de bzhin gsung gi rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sku yi dgod pa tshe/
451a2(tsha): mngag gzhug pa dag rtag tu bskul// de la 'di ni rdo rje ye shes 'khor sngags kyi dam tshig gi gnas so// dam tshig bskul ba dang / dam tshig bod pa dang / dam tshig gtong
451a3(tsha): ba dang / dam tshig bcing ba'o// mkha' dbyings rgya chen dag pa ni// chos rnams thams cad rnam par spangs// gong bu'i tshul gyis byed pa ni// rdo rje rmad 'byung gzug
451a4(tsha): can no// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bu gcig pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' 'ang
451a5(tsha): rung // gal te dbang du bya 'dod na// rdo rje mchog gsum 'dzin pa che// gsang ba chen po 'di bsam mo// rdo rje 'jam pa stobs po che// nam mkha' rdo rje dbus su bsam
451a6(tsha): mda' lnga'i sbyor ba dag gi ni// dbu rgyan rtse mor yang dag sbyor// gnas lnga dag tu sngags shes pas// rdo rje khro bos rab tu dbab// spangs shing brgyal bar bsgom pa ni//
451a7(tsha): byis pa'i blo ni grags chen gyis// bsam gtan 'di ni zla phyed du// gsang ba'i bskul ba dag gi bsgoms// sngags rnams kun gyi rab gsang ba// rdo rje don gyi blo yi gsung
451b1(tsha): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsam pa// sngags kyi rdo rje hUM la soms// rdo rje gsum la sogs pas sgom// oM ni mig gi dbus
451b2(tsha): pabasam nas// 'di dag cho ga bzhin du bstan// sngags rnams kun gyi gzugs dag ni// sku gsum rdo rje can du mthong // bkres skom la sogs nyon mongs che// sbyor ba
451b3(tsha): 'di ni rnam bsams na// rdo rje thugs kyi bka' bzhin du// sdug bsngal thams cad byang bar 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// bsam na don rnams thams cad
451b4(tsha): 'byor/ ba ni kha yi nang du sgom// oM ni lce la 'dug par bsam// bza' bar bya ba kun gyi gnas// yid bzhin nor bus brgyan pa ste// zhi ba sdug bsngal thams cad
451b5(tsha): sel/ ye shes rdo rje las byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid bzhin gyi nor bus de skad bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
451b6(tsha): gshegs pa dpa' bo chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas/ rdo rje bsgom pa'i dam tshig gi mchog rdo rje'i gsung las phyung ngo // bI/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'od
451b7(tsha): bzang po// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// rdo rje sku gsum sbyor ba yis// bskyed de 'di ni rnam par bsam// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// cud
452a1(tsha): zad ser ba rdo rje 'gying // zhi ba thor tshugs dbu rgyan can// bsams nas thams cad brtsam par bya// rdo rje dpa' bo rlabs kyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i
452a2(tsha): ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas dbyangs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje chen po bsgom pa'i dam tshig
452a3(tsha): 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tsu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus su bsam// sangs rgyas sprin gyi tshe
452a4(tsha): g.yis// rdo rje gsum gyi grags chen che// lus dang ngag dang sems la dbab// bskul byed rdo rje ma bsgom mo// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// kha dog dka
452a5(tsha): mor rab tu bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// bsams la sngags kyi tshig dgod do// rdo rje'i dam tshig ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
452a6(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bsam pa thams cad du rdo rje longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting
452a7(tsha): nge 'dzin 'khor lo'i tshul 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dza/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dam pa dag/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su
452b1(tsha): bsam// sangs rgyas kun gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje sgom pas dbab par bya// dzam b+ha la ni nor bsgrub pa// gnod sbyin chen po bskyed par bya// zhi ba gnod sbyin gzugs 'chi
452b2(tsha): pa// thor tshugs dbu rgyan rdo rje can// sangs rgyas lnga yi cho ga yis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu de yis// bsam gtan gnas la 'dug
452b3(tsha): la dbul// rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis// dbu rgyan de la rnam par bsam// de ltar byas na gnod sbyin dbang // gnod nas dbang po 'od chen mnyes// rdo rje dam
452b4(tsha): tshig gi phyag rgya rdzas bsgrub pa'i tog gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'dod pa
452b5(tsha): nye bar spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin mo'i rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung
452b6(tsha): ngo // krI/ mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu bzang // thams cad rin chen bzhi las byas// me tog spos kyis kun tu 'khrigs//
452b7(tsha): gnod sbyin mo mi thams cad kyis// nam mkha' dbyings ni gang bar bsams// gzugs kyi sprin dag rnams bsam la// rdo rje gsum gyi sbyor bas dbab// gzugs
453a1(tsha): ni gcig tu bsam par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi bye brag gis// de yi bsam gtan bsgom par bya// rdo rje 'jam pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// dbu rgyan la
453a2(tsha): ni khro bo sgom// snying khar sngags kyi tshig bsgoms la// rdo rje sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa bsgom pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
453a3(tsha): ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
453a4(tsha): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub phra mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las phyung ngo // sku dang gsung thugs yang dag grub// sangs
453a5(tsha): rgyas gzugs 'dzan 'od bzang po// 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser 'od 'dra// dngos grub phra mo dag la gnas// mi snang ba ni yang dag 'grub// 'jam pa'i 'od dang
453a6(tsha): 'dra bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin rgyal po grub pa ste// rigs 'dzin dag gi dbang por 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub thams cad kyi gzugs gsang ba'i dngos grub
453a7(tsha): rnams so// sngags kyi dngos grub thob pa yi// mdzes pa'i gzugs rnams thams cad ni// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// mthong ba nyid kyi dga' bar
453b1(tsha): 'gyur// gtsug tor thams cad grub pa ni// yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag por 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas rdo rje rab bsgom mo//
453b2(tsha): bcom ldan 'das bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rjes de skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs/
453b3(tsha): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par len pa'i spyod pa nyid kyi sku dang /
453b4(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// lus dang ngag sems bsgom pa ni// rang tshul nyid kyis dbye bya ste// de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
453b5(tsha): de la 'di ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje rigs pa'i brtul zhugs so// thor tshugs dbu rgyan can gyi gzugs// chen po kha dog dkar po 'dra// sngags kyi sdom pas
453b6(tsha): kun tu bsdams// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bya// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyi rnam par klubs// bzhin sdug mig gi dkyus ring ba// rnyed nas rig pa'i
453b7(tsha): brtul zhugs spyad// spyan ni go 'phang longs spyod cing // rdo rje'i mtshan mas bsgom par bya// phyag rgya sngags kyi cho ga shes// sngags kyi rgyud ni legs par bslabs// de bzhin
454a1(tsha): gshegs pa'i btsun mor byas// sangs rgyas byang chub la rab gnas// brtul zhugs chen po sa dus bzhir ni// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu bya//
454a2(tsha): sdong bu rtsa ba 'bras bu yi// bza' dang bcas par spyad par bya// 'on kyang myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur// bdag po ye shes rgya mtsho che// zla ba drug gi de dag kun// gdon mi
454a3(tsha): za ba thob par 'gyur// rtag tu gzhan gyi nor rku zhing // bsad pa'ang rmad du byung ba dang // 'dod chags rdo rje'i gnas spyad pa// sdom pa 'dis ni kun tu bsdams// 'dod
454a4(tsha): chags rdo rje kyo ba mo// yon tan lug rgyud mA ma kI/ gsung gi rdo rje thugs mchog la// 'di ni rnam pa kun tu rigs// bas ma gtan yid gsum rdo rje can// rang gi phyag
454a5(tsha): rgya'am sems kyis bsam// de ltar sangs rgyas kun mkhyen pa// mnyes par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sgrub pa po ni blo brtan pas// nags tshal rtag tu bsod snyoms
454a6(tsha): blangs/ kha zas bzang po ster ba dag/ de dag skrag nas ster bar // rdo rje bdag nyid gsum 'das na// rdo rje'i yi ge 'jig par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo//
454a7(tsha): lha ma yin nam mi mo 'ang rung // rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya// rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes bsten// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de nyid gsang ba'i tshul tshon yin//
454b1(tsha): rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes byung // sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'jug pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa'i brtul zhugs dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo
454b2(tsha): rjes de skad bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rab shugasang ba gsang ba 'dus pa las/ dngos grub thams cad kyi
454b3(tsha): dkyil 'khor rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang
454b4(tsha): 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes
454b5(tsha): che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas pa che// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje'i dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che
454b6(tsha): rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje nam mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pas gos pa med//
454b7(tsha): rdorje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dpag med rgyal po che// mi rtog nam mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa rnyed// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// don
455a1(tsha): yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// dag pa ngo bo nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas
455a2(tsha): kun gyi bskul ba yi// bstod tshig zhi ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje'i longs spyod bstod pa ni// de yang sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//
455a3(tsha): sangs rgyas kun la thugs brtse bas// rdo rje gsang ba'i gsung dag pas// rdo rje gsung ni bka' stsal to// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi dbyings ni yi ge
455a4(tsha): rang bzhin 'od gsal yongs su dag/ nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin dri ma med// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams
455a5(tsha): cad kyi sku rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho yi// dam tshig bzhi ni bsrung bar bya// sha chen rtag tu
455a6(tsha): bza' bar bya// 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag pos/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi
455a7(tsha): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya// gsung gi rdo rje'i yi ge che// bshang gci dag ni rtag tu bza'// 'di ni gsang ba
455b1(tsha): rlu byung ba'o// de nas phyag mdo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi klu dang / gsung dang / tha
455b2(tsha): rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// dam tshig bzhi po bsrung bar bya// khrag dang khu bar sbyar ba dag/ brtu la zhugs ldan pas rtag tu bza'// sku gsung
455b3(tsha): thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam chog 'di ni rmad po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi brtag pa 'di// rdo rje 'dzin gyis bsrung bar bya// gang zhig dam tshig 'di bsrung ba// rdo rje sems dpa
455b4(tsha): 'od po che// de yi sku gsung thugs rtogs pa// de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rang
455b5(tsha): sangs rgyas kyi don dam gyi tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 'di lus kyi ston pa ni// rdo rje sku la rab tu gnas// sems can gzud
455b6(tsha): bA'i ngang tshul te// dam tshig mchog tu brtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i dam
455b7(tsha): tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dge ba bcu yi las kyi lam// byed pa ye shes spangs pa rnams// dman par mos pa thams cad kyi/
456a1(tsha): dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ tshangs pa'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang /
456a2(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gti mug lam gyi las gang rnams// byed pa 'jigs shing mi sdug pa// sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa ste// sku yi rdo rje nyid du 'gyur//
456a3(tsha): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ drag po'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khams
456a4(tsha): gsum dag ni gnas pa yi// bud med rdo rje las byung rnams// sna tshogs dngos pos spyad pa ni// dam tshig rab tu rmad byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
456a5(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ khyab 'jug gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can las byung ji snyed pa// dbyer med
456a6(tsha): sku gsum la gnas pa// rdo rje'i mkha' dbyings bdag nyid kyang // bsam gtan rdo rje gsad par bya// sku yi rdo rje tshangs par 'gyur// gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che// thugs
456a7(tsha): kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de nyid khyab 'jug rdzu 'phrul che// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam
456b1(tsha): tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khrag dang sha ni bza' ba dang // rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med spyod// dam tshig dka' ba 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje chen
456b2(tsha): po mnyes par byed// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
456b3(tsha): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // 'o ma 'thung ba phra ma can// de dag 'dod dang dri ma 'bad// dam chog 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du nges par nyon mongs 'gyur//
456b4(tsha): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag thos/ sgra ma yin thams cad kyi bu mo'i dam tshig 'di nyid kyi glu dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung /
456b5(tsha): zhing nga rgyal gsod pas gnon// spos dang me tog spyod la skyes// rdo rje sa 'og dam tshig ste// gdul dka' rdo rje 'jig pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
456b6(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ srin mo rnams kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // thod rus gdug pa'i 'bru mar dang // zhag
456b7(tsha): gis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'byung po kun gyi dam tshig ste// dag byed 'di ni don chen byed// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos//
457a1(tsha): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bshang gci dang ni khrag dag bza'// chang
457a2(tsha): la sogs pa rtag tu btung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// gnas kyi mtshan nyid kyis gsad bya// ngo bo nyid kyi kun 'byung ba// khams gsum dag la rnam par spyod//
457a3(tsha): sems can kun la phan 'dod pa'i// dam tshig ma lus spyad par bya// khams gsum thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// /
457a4(tsha): de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lus kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
457a5(tsha): lus kyi rnam gsum thams cad ni// rdo rje las ni 'byung bar bya// sems can khams ni thams cad du// rtag par sangs rgyas sku byed pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/
457a6(tsha): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ ngag gi dngos grub kyi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tshig gi lam gnas ma lus par// khams
457a7(tsha): gsum dri med dkyil 'khor te// tshig gi dngos grub yid 'ong 'di// dam tshig shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos
457b1(tsha): sems rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dngos grub 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // yid kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun// rdo rje brtan pa'i blo yis bsgoms//
457b2(tsha): rdo rje mi phyed gsum ldan pa'i// dam tshig bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kun tu mdzes dga' rdo rje sems dpas de skad bka' stsal to// de nas
457b3(tsha): phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po dam chog nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sangs
457b4(tsha): rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin te// sku gsung thugs su sbyor bas na// phyag 'tshal na ni ma rungs 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de
457b5(tsha): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje bsam gtan gyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang /
457b6(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // kun tu rdo rje sems dpa' yis// sku dang gsung thugs dkyil 'khor la// bsam gtan rdo rje gsum sbyor bas// sngags slob
457b7(tsha): pas ni bsam gtan bya// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags bsgrub pa'i dam tshig dang sdom pa nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
458a1(tsha): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mdor na sems can khams rnams ni// bsam gtan rdo rjes bskul bar bya// rdo rje gsum gyi phyag 'tshal mchog
458a2(tsha): dam tshig rdo rje las byung ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ bsnyen pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa dang / bsgrub pa
458a3(tsha): chen po'i skom pa nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // rdo rje bshang gci nam mkha'i dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam par bsam// dus gsum
458a4(tsha): rje dag la dbul// dam tshig rab tu brtag pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje mi snang ba thams cad kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang
458a5(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dus bzhi ji ltar mchog bzhin du// rdo rje mo ni nyin re spyad// yang na rdzas kyang rtag tu dbrog/ dam tshig rdo rje rdzogs byed pa'o//
458a6(tsha): denas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ nam mkha'i rigs 'dzin gyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku
458a7(tsha): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// dbu rgyan dag la bsam gtan bsam// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig ste// khros pa rnams kyi mi thub bo// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
458b1(tsha): thams cad kyi bdag pos/ sngags 'chang las dang po rnams kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sku yi rdo rje'i kha zas la// phyi rol rdo
458b2(tsha): 'dzin pa dang // mdo na chog bya ba la// rtag par rdo rje chos su bya// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid dag pa rdo rjes de skad bka' stsal to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
458b3(tsha): pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje mnyam pa nyid rnam par dgongs nas/ cang mi gsung bar gyur
458b4(tsha): to// de nas yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
458b5(tsha): rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di
458b6(tsha): ci'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
458b7(tsha): pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di nyid kyi sku
459a1(tsha): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ngo bo nyid gnyis su med pa'i yi ge'i tshig la/ ngo bo nyid dag pa'i yi ge'i tshig brjod nas/ cang mi gsung bar
459a2(tsha): bzhugs so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di sems pa na 'di snyam du gyur to// sku ni mi 'gyur ma skyes pa// gsung dang thugs kyang
459a3(tsha): mtshan ma med// nam mkha'i rdo rje rtogs las byung // log par bzung bas zin pa yin// de nas 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
459a4(tsha): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i
459a5(tsha): tshig la phyin ci log kun tu 'byung bar mi brtag tu gsol/ ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
459a6(tsha): tshacad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid spyod par gyur pa'i gshegs pa dang byon pa rjes su 'gro ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tshangs pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
459a7(tsha): sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes thob pa rnams/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid mi shes nas 'di snyam du rnam par rtog ste/ rdo rje'i
459b1(tsha): bdag nyid 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi rdo rje'i de kho na nyid yongs su ma shes nas/ gsang ba'i yi ge rnams 'chad dam snyam du sems pa yang mchis so//
459b2(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ste/
459b3(tsha): ci smos te/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba mi 'gyur ba rnyed pa yang sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi byung
459b4(tsha): chub mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba med pa'i rdo rje mngon par byang chub pa ni/ ngo bo nyid med pa mi 'gyur ba las byung ba'o// rigs kyi bu sems can chen po'i
459b5(tsha): khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub la gnas pas sangs rgyas rdo rje'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni sku
459b6(tsha): gsum rdo rje'i chos nyid kyi phyir sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes thob pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
459b7(tsha): thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so// rang bzhin dag cing bdag med pa//
460a1(tsha): chos kyi dbyings ni bdag med pa// rtog pa rdo rje las byung ba// smra bar byed pa smra ba yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
460a2(tsha): cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
460a3(tsha): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub ji ltar yang dag par 'jug/ gang na ga nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
460a4(tsha): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dang / khams gsum ji snyed pa dag rang gi sku dang /
460a5(tsha): gsung dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi rdo rje la gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
460a6(tsha): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub dang khams gsum thams cad gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po ye shes rdo rje'i bdag pos
460a7(tsha): gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dngos grub dang khams gsum pa thams cad ni nam mkha' la
460b1(tsha): gnas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa// nam mkha' gang na gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gsungs pa/ gang
460b2(tsha): na yang ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/ e maho rdo rje e rdo rje// e ma ho rdo rje'i sa
460b3(tsha): bshad pa// gang du lus dang ngag sems med// de ru gzugs ni rnam par bsgom// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag byas nas// rdo rje gsum mchog
460b4(tsha): mchog chen mchog/ rdo rje gsum gyi dbang phyug mchog/ rigs pa'i skyes bu sgom pa yi// dngos grub kun ni bshad par mdzad// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par
460b5(tsha): / mkha' dbyings rdo rje dbus gnas par// dadza\u0f89\u0fa4 ni rab klos nas// spyi bor rdo rje rab tu bsgom// zhal bsum klu gsum las byung ba// rnam par 'gro ba bsam pa
460b6(tsha): bya// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsams na// byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// thams cad rigs kyi bye brag gis// gsang ba 'di ni rnam par bsam// gzhan du rnam
460b7(tsha): par bsgoms na ni// de dag dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das rigs pa'i skyes bu rdo rje gsang bas de skad bka' stsal to// khams gsum las byung
461a1(tsha): rgyal po che// mnyes par byed pa rnam bsams na// rdo rje sku ni gsum gyi mtshan// khyu mchog des ni mnyes par 'gyur// gang zhig 'di dag
461a2(tsha): bsgom pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// zhag bdun gyi ni gzi che ba'i// sku gsum dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom
461a3(tsha): ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje bsdus pa'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig ni/
461a4(tsha): phyag rgya chen po'i don brtags pa// cho ga bzhin du kun bsgoms na// skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas thob// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi lus dang /
461a5(tsha): ngag dang / sems gsang ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gal te byang chub mchog 'drod na// lag pa'i phyag rgya mi bcing ngo // sngags
461a6(tsha): rnams kun gyi dam chog 'di// rgyal ba kun kyang mi 'da' 'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung
461a7(tsha): ngo // bshang gci khu ba khrag rnams ni// smad pa dag tu yongs mi bya// cho ga bzhin du rtag tu bza'// gsang 'di rdo rje gsum 'byung yin// de nas yang bcom ldan
461b1(tsha): 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khams gsum dag gi lam mchog na// bud med ji snyed yod pa rnams//
461b2(tsha): thams cad cho ga bzhin du spyad// gsung gi rdo rjes mi smod do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes thugs kyi dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje
