461b3(tsha): sku gsum la gnas pa'i// dam tshig ji snyed yod pa kun// rdo rje gsum gyi dam tshig gis// mgu zhing tshim pa dag tu bya// thugs kyi rdo rje mi smod do// bcom ldan
461b4(tsha): 'das dam tshig chen pos de skad bka' stsal to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
461b5(tsha): tshig gi gsang ba'i rdo rje nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu bsgrags// rdo rje skye
461b6(tsha): mched nyid dag kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje khams gsum gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
461b7(tsha): las phyung ngo // sa ni spyan zhes bya ba yin// chu yi khams ni mA ma ka/ dkar dang sgrol ma zhes bya ba// me dang rlung du rab tu bsgrags// mkha' dbyings rdo rje dam chag ni//
462a1(tsha): rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid yin// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos de skad bka'
462a2(tsha): stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
462a3(tsha): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas cad mi gsung bar gyur to//
462a4(tsha): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
462a5(tsha): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje gsang ba gsang ba 'dus pas mngon par dbang ba'i slob dpon de la/ de
462a6(tsha): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
462a7(tsha): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems rdo rje bzhin du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ slob dpon de ni byang chub kyi sems dang mnyam
462b1(tsha): zhing rnam pa gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi bu mdor bstan na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'khod cing
462b2(tsha): 'tsho la skyo ba de dag thams cad dus gsum du lhags nas/ slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
462b3(tsha): zhing der yang 'gro zhing / ngag rdo rje'i yi ge yang 'di skad du 'byin to// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha'o// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams
462b4(tsha): cad kyi ma'o zhes bya ba nas/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom
462b5(tsha): ldan 'das phyogs bcun ji snyed bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung
462b6(tsha): po ji snyed pa de bas kyang / slob dpon gyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig bsod nams khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs
462b7(tsha): rgyas kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'o// skye ba'i gnas su gyur pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i bar du'o// de nas yang byang
463a1(tsha): chub sems dpa' byams pa yid 'jigs shing skrag nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
463a2(tsha): pa dkon mchog tog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
463a3(tsha): rnams rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad
463a4(tsha): la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi rdo rje'i ye shes las byung
463a5(tsha): ba de rnams kyang / gsang ba 'dus pa'i slob dpon dang phrad nas mchod pa byed cing phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nyid ston pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
463a6(tsha): pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa
463a7(tsha): de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dngos grub rnams ci la gnas/
463b1(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsum gsang ba'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs ni/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems la
463b2(tsha): gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gsol pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rje gang la gnas/ gang la yang mi gnas so// de nas byang chub
463b3(tsha): sems dpa' de dag po mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/ cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba rdo rje'i
463b4(tsha): ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang
463b5(tsha): chub sems dpa' khyed rnams thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun 'byung zhes bya ba rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor nyon cig/
463b6(tsha): de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
463b7(tsha): dkyil 'khor chen po bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus bsams pa// gru bzhi lham pa rab tu mdzes// sangs rgyas
464a1(tsha): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan rdo rje rab bskul bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsam gtan gyis// 'khor lo can kun bzhugs par bya//
464a2(tsha): mchod pa'i cho ga de nyid kyis// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bya// slob dpon snying khar rab bsgoms nas// dbang bskur bar ni brtsam par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nam mkha'
464a3(tsha): dbyings// yongs su gang bar rnam bsgoms la// dbang bskur ba yi gnas gsum gyi// thams cad cho ga bzhin du dbab// sems can kun la phan 'dod pas//
464a4(tsha): byang chub 'di yis thob 'gyur zhing // ngo mtshar chen po dngos grub kun// sku gsung thugs kyi 'grub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig gi 'khor
464a5(tsha): lo zhes bya ba bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// // de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sbyor ba zhes bya ba sku dang /
464a6(tsha): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // hUM hrI khaM/ sha rus la sogs dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha' dbyings
464a7(tsha): kyi dbus su bsam// sku dang gsung thugs gsum snying po// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya// drag po mi sdug khros pa ni// ut+pal sngon po'i kha dog 'dra// phyag
464b1(tsha): bzhi pa yi cho ga yis// phyag na thod pa bsnams pa bsgom// 'od zer lnga rnams yang dag 'byung // ram lce brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// bsam gtan rdo rje'i sbyor ba
464b2(tsha): yis/ khrag drang ba ni mchog yin no// rtse gsum rdo rje dam tshig dang // phur bu drag po mchog dag gis// sangs rgyas nyid kyi sku dag kyang // rdo rje'i sbyor bas gdab par
464b3(tsha): bya// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i kha zas kyi bya ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bza' ba'am btung ba gang cung zad// brtul zhugs
464b4(tsha): can gyi gang bza' ba// bshang gci sha yi sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du yongs su brtag/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsu
464b5(tsha): dang thugs rdo rje mchod pa'i mchog 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mchod pa'i yo byad mchog lnga yis// mchod pas de dag mchod
464b6(tsha): bar bya// 'di ni sngags pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig mchog tu 'da' dka' ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang
464b7(tsha): thugs kyi mchod pa gsang ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi khu ba la sogs pas// cho ga
465a1(tsha): bzhin du kun mchod na// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa lus dang /
465a2(tsha): ngag dang / sems kyi sdom pa nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // sems can khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// dam tshig 'dzin pa ma rnams la//
465a3(tsha): dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje spyad// sdom pa 'di ni rmad po che// de nas phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad kyi sdom pa'i rdo rje 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung
465a4(tsha): ngo // lus dang ngag sems longs spyod kyi// gsang ba gsum nas rdo rje skyes// bzang po bdag gi bsgrub par bya// 'di ni yongs ye 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang
465a5(tsha): phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa po thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i sdom pa nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mtho gang tsam gyi pags par ni// spyi bor dkyil 'khor
465a6(tsha): brtag par bya// o ni dbus su gnas bsams nas// bdud rtsi lnga po dbab par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skad cig dag gis zi can 'gyur// lus dang ngag
465a7(tsha): sems bder gnas par// 'gyur ba 'di ni dogs pa med// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi gsang ba nyid kyi
465b1(tsha): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mchod rten dag gi las mi bya// glegs pa ma klags par mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor dag kyang yongs mi bya// rdo rje gsum
465b2(tsha): mchog phyag mi bya// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos dug thams cad 'byin pa 'am/ gnod pa dang 'dren pa'i gsang ba nyid kyi sku
465b3(tsha): dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM/ 'od zer dkar po'i 'phreng ba can// 'khor lo'i dbus su chud par bzhag/ 'od zer ser po 'khrigs pa ni//
465b4(tsha): ser po lta bur bsgom par bya// rdo rje gsum 'od dam tshig gis// sa bon gas gsum las phyung ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
465b5(tsha): pos lus dang / ngag dang / sems bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i sngags rdo rje dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hu lu hu lu/
465b6(tsha): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ dA ha da ha/ a mri te hUM phaT/ grog sogs las 'khor lo ni// las kyi rdo rje la gnas par// hi ni dbus su bzhag nas su// ming
465b7(tsha): ni da bus su bri bar bya// sngags kyi yi ge'i tshig rnams kyis// brgyan te rtag tu gzhag par bya// de yi sngags rnams thams cad kyi// gsang ba gsum gyi gnas bsdu
466a1(tsha): ba'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje a dza na'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
466a2(tsha): las phyung ngo // lam gyi bzhi mdo shing gcig drung // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// de ru rdo rje a dzA na// thod par rtag tu dbab par bya// tshil chen po dang
466a3(tsha): khrag dang / bshang ba dang / pad+mo'i skud pa dang / a ra ka'i skud pas me mar gyi snying po byas la/ chos nyi shu dgu'i nam phyed na/ rdo rje a dza na mkhas pas dbab par
466a4(tsha): bya'o// de nyid la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad btab na/ dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so//
466a5(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gas
466a6(tsha): ba'i yi ge du dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi spyod pa'i rdo rje 'di la dad kyi
466a7(tsha): sgom par 'gyur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das
466b1(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba'i yi ge gsum dang ldanan/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa rdo rje gang yin pa 'di la dad
466b2(tsha): cing sgom par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ gsum po gang zhig lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
466b3(tsha): thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje ste de gsum mo// de nas de bzhin
466b4(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas cad mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
466b5(tsha): thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
466b6(tsha): sngon byung ba na brjod kyis me lang ba'i yang brjod kyis mi lang ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa yang 'das nas/ gang bcom ldan 'das
466b7(tsha): mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar ma mdzad 'das pa nas/ thub pa chen po 'od srungs mngon par sangs rgyas
467a1(tsha): pa'i bar gyis kyang ma gsungs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i gnas kyi don ma bshad pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sems
467a2(tsha): can rnams la skal ba med pa'i phyir/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis
467a3(tsha): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rdzogs par byed do// gang+gA'i bye ma du ma snyed kyi bskal par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'bad cing btsal kyang byang chub thob par mi 'gyur ba
467a4(tsha): de/ gsang ba 'dus pa 'di la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// de nas
467a5(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsung rdo rje'i yi ge'i tshig 'di thos nas rab tu ngus so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems
467a6(tsha): dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams ma du zhig/ sdug bsngal gsum la ma sgoms shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de/
467a7(tsha): dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis 'di skad ces bya ba gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar mi ngu bar bgyi/ ji
467b1(tsha): ltar sdug bsngal gsum mi sgom par bgyi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i yi ge ming tsam thos pa'i skal ba yang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
467b2(tsha): cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad ma zer cig/ yi ge ni thun mong ste/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams kyis ji ltar mi shes pa dang ma thos pa de bzhin du/ nged de bzhin gshegs pa
467b3(tsha): thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang / rigs kyi bu gsang ba'i yi ge 'di dag ma thob cing / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na//
467b4(tsha): gsang ba'i yi ge ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
467b5(tsha): pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
467b6(tsha): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la dga' bas bstod pa/ sems
467b7(tsha): can khams na gnas pa'i dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba'i yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag la bskyab tu gsol// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par
468a1(tsha): mchis bzhed na// sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la dgos par mdzad du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
468a2(tsha): kyi thugs kyi btsun mo mA ma ki/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa dga' ba'i mchod pa'i mchog gi yi ge'i tshig
468a3(tsha): 'dis yang dag par bstod do// rdo rje sku khyod bka' yi 'khor los sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub don dam rjes su phan ston pa// mgon po gal te/
468a4(tsha): de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
468a5(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i spyan gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la 'dod pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i
468a6(tsha): dam tshig gis yang dag par bstod pa/ khyed ni rdo rje gsung ste kun la phan phyir thugs brtse ba// 'jig rten dag gi dgos pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon
468a7(tsha): po gal te de ring bdag gis gson par mchis bzhed na// rab dga'i mchod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dges par mdzad du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshes
468b1(tsha): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dam tshig rdo rje btsun mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la
468b2(tsha): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dga' ba 'dis bstod do// khyod ni rdo rje'i 'dod pa dam pa'i mchog gi phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung
468b3(tsha): mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter 'gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod//
468b4(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags thams cad la nye bar longs spyod pa'i rdo rje tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
468b5(tsha): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo de dag la dam tshig gi 'khor los 'dod pa spyod cing cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings
468b6(tsha): 'di dag thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi khu bas yongs su gang ste/ bum pa rdo rje chus gang ba ltar
468b7(tsha): gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings 'di na gang sems can sku gsum gyi dam tshig las yang dag par byung ba de rnams rdo rje tog gis reg nas/ thams cad
469a1(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes can du gyur to// de nas brtsams sems can thams
469a2(tsha): cad kun tu bzang po zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las bskur bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs
469a3(tsha): pa phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
469a4(tsha): mnyam pa nyid mthong ngam/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
469a5(tsha): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes kyi spyod pa mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
469a6(tsha): pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i b+ha ga las mngon par byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang 'dod chags kyi
469a7(tsha): yi ge'i tshig gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rjes su rtogs pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
469b1(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de skad du ma
469b2(tsha): zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ma yin/ tshor ba'i phung po ma yin/ 'du shes
469b3(tsha): kyi phung po ma yin/ 'du byed kyi phung po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma yin/ khams ma yin/ skye mched ma yin/ de bzhin du 'dir 'dod chags ma yin/
469b4(tsha): zhe sdang ma yin/ gti mug ma yin/ chos ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur to// /
469b5(tsha): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams lnga bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams
469b6(tsha): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje 'di sgom par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
469b7(tsha): phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la skal ba yod pa'i phyir ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
470a1(tsha): kyi bdag pos/ rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid 'di zung zhig/ khyod kyang de
470a2(tsha): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbang phyug rdo rje zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje chos kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o/
470a3(tsha): zhes gsol nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge gsum la rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs zhugs par
470a4(tsha): gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sku rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad khams gsum thams cad kyi lus rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
470a5(tsha): mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rdo rje'i khams gsum thams cad kyi ngag rdo rje la gnas shing / de bzhin
470a6(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung mnyam pa nyid la gnas nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rje khams gsum thams cad kyi sems
470a7(tsha): rdo rje la gnas shing // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs mnyam pa nyid la dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin
470b1(tsha): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba 'dus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdom pa rdo rje byin gyis brlabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya
470b2(tsha): ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang zhing / rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba to//
470b3(tsha): pa chen po'i rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shra d+ha ka ra warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te
470b4(tsha): gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis paN+Di ta bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i zhal snga nas chag lo tsa ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis zhus shing dag par bcos
470b5(tsha): gtan la phab pa'o// // de nas byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
470b6(tsha): bskur ba dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa la dngos po thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la khong du tshud nas
470b7(tsha): chos gzigs pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// oM ma ho kun tu bzang po yi// sku gsung thugs kyi nges pa dag/ rdo rtsa
471a1(tsha): gsum gyis kun tu ni// rdo rje gsum la kun tu bzhugs// sems can thams cad dus gsum gyi// rdo rje'i ngo bor yang dag byung // sangs rgyas
471a2(tsha): / rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub rdo rje'i gnas thob pa'o// e ma ho 'di rab ngo mtshar che// e ma ho zhi ba dbang po 'das// e ma ho 'khor ba dag gi rgyan// e ma ho mchog
471a3(tsha): tu mya ngan 'das// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka'
471a4(tsha): stsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin no// sems dpa' chen po de de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad yang
471a5(tsha): 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la gsang ba dang phyi'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas phyag byas te mgrin gcig tu 'di skad
471a6(tsha): ces gsol to// e ma ho shin tu rnyed dka' ba// byang chub bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di yin// rgyud kyi mchog gi mchog gyur pa// gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya'i rgyud//
471a7(tsha): sbas pa de ni rtogs phyir dang // sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// yang dag gsungs pas gang bshad pa// mgon po khyed la gsol bar 'tshal// de nas
471b1(tsha): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang zhig sbas pa'i rgyud tshig de// de dag thams cad
471b2(tsha): 'dri 'dod pa// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// yon tan 'byung gnas legs so legs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun// rab
471b3(tsha): tu dga' bas mig gdangs te// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal nas// 'di ye som gnyis zhus par gyur// gsang ba zhes 'di gang la bgyis// 'dus pa zhes ni
471b4(tsha): gang la brjod// rgyud kyi 'brel pa ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rgyud 'di ci la bgyi// de nyid rnam pa du ru bshad// de bzhin gsang ba rnam pa du// gsang chen zhes ni gang la
471b5(tsha): bgyi// dam pa rnams la du zhig mchis// byang chub sems zhes gang la bgyi// de bzhin rigs pa'i skyes bu ci// badz+ra d+h+rig ces ci la bgyi// de bzhin dzi na jig
471b6(tsha): ni gang / de la rat+na d+hI ka ni gang // de bzhin A ro li ka ni ci// pradz+nyA d+hIka ces gang la bgyi// rigs 'dir de bzhin gang zhig lags// mo ha zhes ni gang la bgyi
471b7(tsha): deSha zhes bya 'dir gang lags// rA ga zhes na ci la bgyi// badzu sngags ni gang la bgyi// ra ti zhes 'diregang la bgyi// phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig lags//
472a1(tsha): ya mA na ta krid don nI gang // de bzhin pra dz+nyA na ta krid ci// pad+ma na ta kri ta ming ci lta// de bzhin big+h+nAn ta krita ci// kun tu spyod pa gang ci lags//
472a2(tsha): de bzhin sngags kyi spyod pa gang // 'dir ni bzlas pa gang zhig lags// rgyas btab pa zhes gang la bgyi// chos la byung ba ni ji ltar bsgom// de bzhin sdom pa ji lta bu//
472a3(tsha): zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags ches// sems can don mdzad ci lta bu// dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bgyi// phyag rgya'i dgos pa ji ltar lags// 'dir ni me tog
472a4(tsha): ci zhig lags// mchod rten zhes ni gang la bshad// ye shes 'khor lo ji ltar shes// 'dir ni gnas shes gang la bshad// mgon po bskul ba ji lta bu//
472a5(tsha): gtong ba dag kyang ji lta bu// ji ltar de rnams spyan drangs bgyi// bcing ba 'dir ni ji lta bu// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar sku la// de bzhin rig pa'i brtul zhugs
472a6(tsha): gang / bdud rtsi lnga rnams ji ltar bza'// de bzhin dpa' bo lnga gang la// dngos grub tha mal ji lta bu// de bzhin mchog kyang ji lta bu// de la thabs ni rnam pa du//
472a7(tsha): de bzhin thabs byung ji lta bu// rnal 'byor rdo rje can kun gyi// bka' ni ji ltar bsgo bar bgyi// las kyi mchog gi tshogs rnams ni// sna tshogs ji ltar byed par
472b1(tsha): 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis zhus pa'i tshig nye bar gas na nas/
472b2(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa la dmigs par mdzad nas skad cig cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' che// snying rje'i bdag
472b3(tsha): nyid rab dga' nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde bar gshegs// mgon la yang dang yang rab bskul// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis//
472b4(tsha): byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// bzhag nas byang chub sems dbang
472b5(tsha): po// zhus pa rgya chen nyan par gyis// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis rjes su gsungs pa'i bka'
472b6(tsha): spyi bo sa rab tu mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// bde bar gshegs pa legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ rang rang gi lus dang /
472b7(tsha): ngag dang / yid rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi smra bar gyur to//
473a1(tsha): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi thugs thugs rje chen po la dmigs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
473a2(tsha): chen po dag rnams la zhus pa de dag gsung gcig gis bka' stsal pa/ sku gsung thugs ni rnam pa gsum// gsang ba zhes ni bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas
473a3(tsha): thams cad ces bya ba// tshogs pa 'dus pa yin par bshad// lnga pa dang ni dgu pa dang // bcu bdun pa dang bcu gsum pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams
473a4(tsha): kyis// bstan pa dag ni slu ba chen yin// bzhi pa dang ni bcu drug pa// brgyad pa de bzhin bcu gnyis pa// slob dpon spyi yi las dang ni// dngos grub brtul
473a5(tsha): zhugs sdom pa yin// drug pa dang ni gnyis pa dang // bcu pa dang ni bcu bzhi pa'o// drag spyod rjes su chags pa dang // nye bar sgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// bdun pa
473a6(tsha): dang ni gsum pa dang // bcu gcig pa dang bco lnga pa// dngos grub zhing dang mtshan ma ni// bsnyen pa bsgrub pa'i sdom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi las//
473a7(tsha): tshar gcod phan 'dogs spyod pa dag/ dul dang gdul dka' zhi ba yi// sems can rnams kyi 'jug pa'o// bskyed pa'i rim dang 'brel pa yi// bsnyen po rdo rje cho
473b1(tsha): ga ba ni// thun mong dngos grub 'brel pa yin// mchog tu gyur pa gzhung nyid do// dkyil 'khor brtul zhugs 'brel pa yi// gzhung ni slob dpon phun tshogs pa'o//
473b2(tsha): bla mas sngags kyi lam gyi ni// slob ma yongs su smin bya ba// brtul zhugs bzang dang dbang bskur ba// rang gi slob ma bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
473b3(tsha): rnams kyis// ston pas yongs su grol ba yin// thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa// rnal 'byor zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang zhig dngos med shes rab ste/
473b4(tsha): thabs dang dngos po'i mtshan nyid do// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar grags// rgyun de rnam pa gsum 'gyur te// gzhi dang de bzhin rang bzhin dang // mi 'phrogs pa yis
473b5(tsha): rab phye ba// rnam pa rang bzhin rgyu yin te// de bzhin mi 'phrogs 'bras bu'o// gzhi ni thabs shes bya ba ste// gsum gyis rgyun gyi don bsdus pa'o// rigs
473b6(tsha): ni lnga dang gsum dag dang // ngo bo nyid gcig rigs brgya'o// byang chub rdo rje bcas gsungs pa// de ni phyi ma'i rgyud du 'dod// de nyid rnam pa lnga ru bshad//
473b7(tsha): gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// lhag ma'i lha ni gsang chen te// dam pa rigs ni rnam pa brgya// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// dngos dang dngos med zad pa'i gtso//
474a1(tsha): stong nyid snying rje mi phyed pa// byang chub sems shes bya ba yin// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// mi phyed dbye ba'i ngo bo nyid// rigs dang lhan
474a2(tsha): cig ldan pas na// rigs pa'i skyes bu zhes brjod do// rgyu lnga dang ni 'bras bu lnga// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// 'chang ba 'dzin pas grags pa ste// badz+ra d+h+r-ig ni
474a3(tsha): rnam shes yin// yod dang med dang dbus las 'das// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur las byung // sems can kun gyi lus yin te// skye las rgyal ba dzi na dzig/
474a4(tsha): don rnams thams cad 'byung bas na// sems ni rin po che zhes bya// tshor ba po yis nges tshor bas// tshor ba rat+nad+h+r-ika tu 'dod// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid dngos po
474a5(tsha): yis// kun la kun gyis thams cad du// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mtshan bzhi ni// A ro lika ces bshad pa yin// rnam shes rab mthar phyin byed pa// gang
474a6(tsha): yin de ni shes rab ste// 'du byed sems dpa' 'dzin pas na// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ig ces bya bar bshad// rigs ni rgyud ces bya bar bshad// rgyud ni thog ma zhes brjod do//
474a7(tsha): mi 'jigs skye ba med gang yin// mgon po de bzhi yin par bshad// rgyu 'bras gnyis la sdang bas na// rnam shes zhe sdang yin par bshad// bems po bcing
474b1(tsha): pa'i rang bzhin pas// gzugs ni gti mug ces byar bshad// bdag tu rlom pa'i ngo bo bas// tshor ba zags pa yin par bshad// dngos la chags pa'i
474b2(tsha): mtshan nyid can// 'du shes yang dag chags bdag nyid// rkyen gyis drangs pa'i bdag nyid can// 'du byed rtag tu phrag dog yin// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo
474b3(tsha): nyid// srid pa kun 'byung thams cad du// 'dod chags zhe sdang rmongs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'dod pa'i zhes byar bshad// dam tshig sna tshogs 'dra ba yis// /
474b4(tsha): mngon tshogs las las skyes 'bras bu// gnyis med ye shes chos rnams la// nga rgyal byed pa rmongs shes bshad// de la phan tshun 'dzer ba ni// zhe sdang zhes
474b5(tsha): ni bya bar bshad// mtshan nyid 'dod chags zhen pa yin// ye shes thabs ni rdo rjer bshad// dga' ba rdzogs pa'i longs spyod mchog/ bud med bde mchog phun
474b6(tsha): sum tshogs// gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang // rdo rje la dga' rtag par gnas// des na sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs// rdo rje theg pa zhes bshad do// mi
474b7(tsha): 'jigs bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ma skyes pa yi ngo bo nyid// dngos po kun gyi dam tshig ste// de nyid gshin rje mthar byed do// rnam shes min bdag chos rnams ni//
475a1(tsha): don dam mi 'gyur dag gyur nyid// sems kun gyi ni dam tshig ste// des na rgyal ba zhes mthar byed// brjod med bdag nyid chos rnams ni// ming
475a2(tsha): 9/ dang gzugs blo dngos po med// chos rnams kun gyi dam tshig ste// de nas khyab bdag pad mthar byed// mi rtog bdag nyid chos rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni zhi ba'i
475a3(tsha): dngos// rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig ste// des na gtso bo bgegs mthar byed// mi 'jig rnam par mi shes pa// brjod du med dang rtog bral ba// sangs rgyas byang chub
475a4(tsha): ye shes 'di// shes na bde ba thob par 'gyur// gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas// gti mug zad phyir gshin rje gshed// des na lus mthar byed pa ste//
475a5(tsha): des na shes bya mthar byed 'gyur// nyes pa nyes pa longs spyod pas// nyes pa zad phyir shes mthar byed// des na sems ni mthar byed do// des na nyon mongs mthar
475a6(tsha): byed 'a gyur// 'dod chags 'dod chags longs spyod pas// 'dod chags zad pas pad mthar byed// des na chags pa mthar byed do// de bzhin snyoms 'jug/
475a7(tsha): mthar byed 'gyur// nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang // de bzhin las ni thams cad zad// sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs mthar byed ces bya bar bshad//
475b1(tsha): nyon mongs rdo rje'i sgrib dag na// las rnams thams cad rnam par dag/ las rnams thams cad rnam dag pas// las skyes 'bras bu rnam dag 'gyur// gzung dang
475b2(tsha): chags pa nyid dang ni// rnam pa de bzhin mi g.yo dang // rgyu nyid 'bras bu nyid dag ste// drug las thugs ni kun tu 'byung // 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs drug
475b3(tsha): khro ba'i dbang po rnam par grags// dam tshig rdo rje la sogs drug/ sa la sogs pa rnam pa lnga// 'byung dang 'byung las gyur par grags// rigs pa'i rgyal po
475b4(tsha): zhes bshad do// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs drug/ rdo rje'i bdag po zhes bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// bdag nyid chen po kun tu 'byung // thabs
475b5(tsha): dang shes rab las byung ba'i// phung po khams dang skye mched gzugs// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sngags la sbyor ba nges byas la so// thams cad
475b6(tsha): dag par mos pa yis// 'jigs pa thams cad spangs nas su// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyi ni// sngags pa seng ge bzhin du spyod// 'di la mi bya ci yang med//
475b7(tsha): de bzhin mi bza' 'ang yod ma yin// smra bar mi bya cung zad med// rtag tu mi bsam ci yang med// mnyam par ma gzhag sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du mnyam par
476a1(tsha): 'jog/ gang gis sems kun la spyod pa// kun tu spyod pa zhes bshad do// dbang po dang ni yul rnams kyi// rkyen gyis gang dang gang byung
476a2(tsha): yid// yid de man zhes bya bar bshad// tra ni skyob par byed pa'i don// 'jig rten spyod las rnam grol bar// gang bshad dam tshig sdom pa ste// rdo rje kun gyi//
476a3(tsha): bsrung ba ni// sngags kyi spyod pa zhes bshad do// rang rang gi ni ngo bo nyid// snying po yid kyi rnam bsams te// gsang sngags zlos pa'i dbye ba yis// zlos pa ra
476a4(tsha): byed cing spro zhing bsdu// sangs rgyas sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/ ye shes sa bon dag gis bsdu// byang chub bdag med sa bon gyis// brtul zhugs can gyi bdag med bzung //
476a5(tsha): sna tshogs bzhin du sna tshogs spro// dus gsum sa bon dag gi bzla// bzlas pa smra bar grags pa sa na// ngag kun bzlas pa zhes bshad la// sngags kun 'bod
476a6(tsha): papi zhes bshad do// de nyid bskul bar smra ba'o// ji ltar thugs sogs byin rlob pa// ting nge 'dzin kyang de bzhin no// de rnams spyi bor dbang bskur dang // de bzhin kun
476a7(tsha): tu mchod pa'o// rdo rje 'chang ba gang yin pa'i// rig pa yod pa'i sbyor ba dang // bdag byin rlab sogs de bzhin te// de yi longs spyod bzhire shes bya// dpa' bo
476b1(tsha): rdo rje gcig pu yis// spyi bor dbang bskur re re ste// snying po phyag rgya sngags tsam dang // rang rig rigs kyi rgyas gdab pa'o// 'bras bus rgyu ni rgyas gdab cing /
476b2(tsha): rgyu yi 'bras bu rgyas gdab par// bsgom zhing gzhan du dngos grub ni// bskal pa bye bar 'byung mi 'gyur// longs spyod bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rigs pa'i
476b3(tsha): skyes bu rdo rje can// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// gru gsum du ni rnam par bsgom// kun nas ser ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsartsi bas bcu de dbus rnam par bsgom//
476b4(tsha): rtsibs kun la ni khro bo bcu// ye shes bdag nyid bcu las byung // 'gog pa'i rdo rjes bsgom bya zhing // mchog tu mdzes pas bsgrub par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i sprin
476b5(tsha): spros pas// mi g.yo ba dang mtshungs par 'khor// de ltar chos 'byung ye shes ni// rang bzhin dri ma med zhi ba// bsgoms pas skad cig nyid kyis ni// sangs
476b6(tsha): rgyas sprin ni rab tu 'byung // rdo rje can gyi chos bstan pa// rim pa gnyis la yang dag brten// bskyed pa yI ni rim nyid dang // de bzhin rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o//
476b7(tsha): sgrub pa dang ni nan tan dang // dam tshig de bzhin sdom pa rnams// sngags ni de kun rgyas par ni// rim pa'i dbye bas phye ba yin// gzugs dang sgra sogs 'dod pa
477a1(tsha): ni// bde sdug gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// rtag tu snying la skye bar 'gyur// chags la 'dod chags/
477a2(tsha): rdo rje can// rdo rje 'dra bar rin chen 'byung // rin chen bzhin du dam tshig shes// 'dod pa de rnams dam tshig mtshungs// rnam bcas dang ni rnam pa med// kun 'gro/
477a3(tsha): yi ge gsum bdag nyid// bya ba dang ni dbrog pa dang // spro dang rang gi/ bzlas pa bya'o// de ltar zhe sdang gti mug dag/ sa gsum du ni bskyed par bya// gsang ba
477a4(tsha): dag pa rgyas btab cing // rdo rje can gyi don byed do// zhe sdang sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// zhe sdang 'khor lo bskyed nas su// rdo rje drag po brtsams nas ni// ye
477a5(tsha): shes rdo rje can gyis bsdu// de ni spro bas rtogs byas la// de bzhin slar yang bsdu bar bya'o// 'di lta'i sbyor ba sgom byas na// zhe sdang rdo rje bdag nyid 'gyur//
477a6(tsha): khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// bas da dang de bzhin gso ba dang // skad cig tsam gyis byed pa ra ni// mngon du nus par the tsom med// gti mu ga sbyor ba'i rnal
477a7(tsha): 'byor pas// gti mug 'khor lo bskyed nas ni// rgyan la sogs pa gang ci'ang rung // de dag thams cad rtag tu brku// gti mug sems kyi rgya mtsho bsgoms//
477b1(tsha): rin chen kun gyis rab tu dgangs// gti mug 'khor lo can kun gyi// sbyin pa'i phyir ni rab tu 'bebs// rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus par// rab tu sbyin dang
477b2(tsha): dbrog pa nyid// sems kyi rdo rje brtan po yis// skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// 'dod chags sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'dod chags 'khor lo bskyed
477b3(tsha): nas ni/ lha mo thams cad phrogs nas su// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas 'dod pa spyod// dga' sdug bde bas rangs pa yis// 'dod pa'i rtse mos rnam par 'phrul//
477b4(tsha): de nas 'khor lo can kun la// lha mo rab tu dbul bar bya// khams gsum dag tu byung ba yi// lha dang lha min chung ma yang // skad cig tsam gyis 'dod spyod na//
477b5(tsha): mi yi bud med smos ci dgos// dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang bskur dang // las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dag/ nyams su len cing byin rlob po// grub pa'i bgrod pa
477b6(tsha): gzhan yin no// b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes grags dang // byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang // lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa// gsum po dkyil
477b7(tsha): 'khor yin par gsungs// phung po skye mched khams rnams ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rgyas btab pa'o// de nas rtag par rgya dgod pa// dkyil 'khor zhes ni
478a1(tsha): bstan pa yin// lcags kyu dbyug tho rtse gsum dang // ral gri mtshams su rnam par dgod// 'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs mi g.yo//
478a2(tsha): steng du 'khor lo 'og gnod mdzes// rig rgyal rdo rje can rnams kyi// 'khor los sgyur ba drug gi rgya// sa la sogs pa sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya rang gi dkyil
478a3(tsha): 'khor pa// ma long pi wa nga dung dang ni// de bzhin snod dang sna tshogs rab// chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug/ rdo rje'i bdag po rdo rje can// sangs rgyas byang
478a4(tsha): chub sems dpa' dang // khro rgyal rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo// de nas gzhan yang dpa' bo gcig/ rigs ni kha dog dag gis brtag/ lha mo dgu dang nam mkha'i
478a5(tsha): khams// me tog ces ni bshad pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rigs kyi rim gyis dgod par bya// mchod rten sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bzhugs
478a6(tsha): gnas pho brang yin par bshad// ye shes sems dpa' gang reg pa// ye shes 'khor lo zhes bshad do// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsum yi ge/ sa bon yi ge gnas shes
478a7(tsha): bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi de nyid ni// sad par byas pas bskul bar bshad// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams su// 'od zer 'gyed pa gtong ba'o//
478b1(tsha): rdorje can kun spyan 'dren pas// rdo rje kun spyan drang ba'o// rdo rje can gyi gnas de yi// 'od zer gyi ni rdo rje kun// bsdus nas gong bu'i tshul gyis su// bcings
478b2(tsha): pas bcing ba yin par bshad// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab ste// ri mo'i dkyil
478b3(tsha): 'khor brtag par bya// dbang bskur dbye ba rnam gsum du// rgyud 'di la ni rab tu brtag/ bum pa'i dbang bskur dang po ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ga/
478b4(tsha): shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste// bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// mig yang sngags kyi snod du rung // me tog bcas shing sa bon byung // blangs nas gsang ba'i
478b5(tsha): dbang bskur ba// sngags pas slob ma dag la sbyin// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// dri chu rkang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje pad+ma'i sbyor ba yis//
478b6(tsha): rdo rje can kun yang dag bsdu// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// de dag thams cad snying khar bsdu// rdo rje'i lam nas byung nas su// slob ma'i kha ra ni dbab par
478b7(tsha): bya// 'di ni gsang sngags de kun gyi// dbang bskur ba yi go 'phang mchog/ las mchog gi ni tshogs rnams dang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
479a1(tsha): mchog tu dad cing shes rab che// gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'// sbyor ba cig gi bya ba goms// dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can// bla ma la ni
479a2(tsha): slob ma yis// yon rnams rab tu phul nas ni// bla mas de ni byin brlabs te// sgrub pa po la sbyin par bya// rmongs pa sa gti mug bdag nyid sbyor// gti mug dga' dang
479a3(tsha): yang dag ldan// gti mug rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// gti mug rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// zhe sdang ba yi bdag nyid sbyor// zhe sdang dga' dang yang dag ldan// zhe sdang rgyun
479a4(tsha): gyi dbang bskur na// zhe sdang rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// chags pas 'dod chags bdag nyid sbyor// 'dod chags dga' dang yang dag ldan// 'dod chags rgyun gyis dbang
479a5(tsha): bskur na// 'dod chags rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur// shes rab ye shes bdag nyid sbyor// rdo rje dga' dang yang dag ldan// ye shes rgyun gyis dbang bskur na// shes rab
479a6(tsha): ye shes bdag nyid 'gyur// rig pa'i lha mo de nyid ni// rdo rje can gyi slob mas blang // lag par lag pa bzhag nas ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang byas la// slob ma'i
479a7(tsha): mgo bor lag bzhag ste// bla ma rdo rje can gyis bsgom// thabs gzhan gyi ni 'tshang mi rgya// de bas rig pa 'di mchog yin// chos bdun gnyis su med pa la// dngos po
479b1(tsha): gnyis su brtags pa yin// de bas 'khor bar ma bral ba// rtag tu khyod kyis mi bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pa'o// rmongs
479b2(tsha): pa gang zhig 'das gyur na// de yi dngos grub mchog mi 'gyur// tha ma la lus kyi chos la ni// dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni// ye shes lnga yis byin brlabs pas// bdud rtsi
479b3(tsha): lnga yis bya bar bshad// spar dang de bzhin bsreg pa dang // snang bar bya dang gzugs snang ba// sngags kyi lus su rab sbyor bas// bdud rtsi lnga ni bza' bar bya// rdo rje hu
479b4(tsha): las byung ba ni// bar snang la gnas bsam par bya// A las byung ba'i pad+ma ni// de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya// o gyi mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi ni// de yi dbus su gzhag par
479b5(tsha): bya// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba// 'bar bas rnal 'byor tshim par bya// shel dang mtshungs par snang 'gyur zhing // ye shes nyi ma bzhi par gyur// phyogs bcu'i 'jig
479b6(tsha): rten khams rnams kyi// mtshon cha mchog gis spras nas ni// bdud rtsi de ru phan nas kyang // bzang ba'i sbyor bas bza' bar bya// bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis//
479b7(tsha): de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'// yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya// gzhan du de ni 'grub mi 'grub// mi snang la sogs dngos grub ni// tha mal pa zhes bshad pa
480a1(tsha): yin// sangs rgyas nyid sbubs sangs rgyas kyis// dngos grub mchog ces gsungs pa yin// thabs ni rnam pa bzhi po dag/ byang chub rdo rje
480a2(tsha): can gyis gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag par bsngags// bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang po ste// nye bar sgrub pa gnyis pa yin// sgrub
480a3(tsha): pa yang ni gsum pa ste// sgrub pa chen po bzhi pa'o// thun mong mchog gi bye brag gis// bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// rdo rje bzhi po thun mong ste// ye shes bdud rtsi
480a4(tsha): mchog yin no// dang po stong nyid byang chub ste// gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa yin// gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste// bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o// rdo rje rnam bzhi
480a5(tsha): 'di dag gis// tha ma la sgrub la bsnyen pa bya// mchog gi ye shes bdud rtsi nyid// sbyor ba drug gis bya ba yin// bsnyen pa yan lag drug gi ni// byas pas sgrub pa mchog
480a6(tsha): tu 'gyur// gzhan du bsgrub par gyur na ni// dngos grub mchog ni 'byung mi 'gyur// so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // srog rtsol de bzhin 'dzin pa dang // rjes su
480a7(tsha): dran dang ting 'dzin te// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug tu bshad// dbang po bcu po rnams kyi yang // rang gi 'jug gnas thams cad du// 'dod pa so sor sdud pas na// so
480b1(tsha): sor sdud pa zhes bshad do// 'dod pa lnga ni mdor bsdus nas// sangs rgyas lnga ru sbyor ba yis// brtag pa bsam gtan zhes bshad de// bsam gtan de ni rnam lngar 'gyur/
480b2(tsha): rtog dang dpyod dang dga' ba dang // de bzhin bde ba nyid dang yang // sems kyi rtse gcig nyid dag ste// lnga po der ni bsam gtan bsdu// gsang ba'i rgyud ni thams cad du//
480b3(tsha): rnam pa du ma ra yongs bshad pa// gsang ba gsum 'byung rtog pa ste// de yi longs spyod spyod pa'o// dga' dang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// bde bsdus pa ni bzhi pa'o//
480b4(tsha): shes dang shes bya byung zad pa'i// rang sems lnga par shes par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos zhi ba ni// 'dod pa kun la rab tu gnas// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin
480b5(tsha): dbug/ 'byung ba lnga yi ngo bo nyid// grong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung na ni// sna yi rtse mor rab tu brtag/ rin chen kha dog sna lnga pa// srog dang rtsol ba zhes byar bshad//
480b6(tsha): rang sngags snying khar bsams nas ni// srog ni thig ler gyur par gzhag/ rang dbang rin chen dgag pa yi// gzung ba 'dzin pa yin par bshad// sems ni 'gog
480b7(tsha): pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur// mtshan ma ra nyer 'dzin 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan ma'i khams ni rnam pa lngar// byang chub rdo rjes gsungs pa yin// smig rgyu 'dra ba dang po ste//
481a1(tsha): du ba lta bu gnyis pa yin// mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa ste// mar me ltar 'bar bzhi pa'o// sprin med nam mkha' lta bur ni// rtag tu snang
481a2(tsha): pa lnga pa'o// brtan gyur rdo rje'i lam nas ni// nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya// rjes dran gang zhig rnam bsgom pa// de dang 'dra bar spro bar bya// rjes su dran pa zhes bshad de/ so sor snang ba de la
481a3(tsha): ste/ thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas// dngos po thams cad mdor bsdus pa// gong bu'i tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// dbus su gzugs ni rnam par bsgom//
481a4(tsha): yid kyi ye shes rdzogs byed pa// ting nge 'dzin ces bya bar gnas// so sor sdud la snyoms 'jug na// sngags rnams thams cad byin gyis rlob// bsum gtan ye shes
481a5(tsha): snyoms 'jug na// mngon shes lnga po thob par 'gyur// srog dang rtsol bas nges par ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs// rtag tu 'dzin pa'i stobs kyi
481a6(tsha): ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'jug/ rjes dran mnyam par sbyor ba yis// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dbang gyur tsam gyis ni// sgrib pa rnams
481a7(tsha): dang bral bar 'gyur// snying po de ni thugs kha ru// zla ba rdo rje'i sbyor bas blta// mtshon cha mchog gi drangs nas ni// sems ni sngags kyi dngos byas te// sngags kyi
481b1(tsha): gzugs kyi tshul gyis ni// byang chub tshig bcad brjod par bya// cho ga yang dag sbyor bsgoms pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te// sems de ye shes gzugs
481b2(tsha): kyi ni// bsgom pa nye bar sgrub pa'o// ji srid mthong ba de srid du// rnam gnyis zla ba drug tu sgom// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod pas// thams cad du ni rtag tu bya//
481b3(tsha): gal te zla ba drug gis ni// ji skad gsungs pa ma mthong na// ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga dang // sdom pas lan gsum brtsom par bya// de ltar byas kyang sgrub pa po//
481b4(tsha): mthong ba 'byung bar ma gyur cing // gang tshe bya ba ma grub na// drag shul sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// de'i tshe de yi ye shes ni// grub pa nges par nye bar 'byung // rigs
481b5(tsha): kyi dbye ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje phur bus phur bu gdab// de nas dbang du bya ba dang // bsrung ba'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul nyid kyis//
481b6(tsha): ye shes 'khor lo can rnams bsdu// lha mo dgu ni spros nas su// bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la dgod// yongs su gyur las phyag rgya bzhi'i// dkyil 'khor der
481b7(tsha): ni brtag par bya// bdag nyid dbus su gnas bya la// 'khor lo can kun bsdu bar bya// thams cad rdo rje dngos byas la// de 'og byang chub bsgom par bya//
482a1(tsha): bskul ba'i glu dbyangs bzhi yis ni// lha mos snying po bskul ba yi// dus gsum rdo rje'i rang bzhin sems// ye shes lta bur lus bsgom
482a2(tsha): mo// dregs pas kha dog rnam par du bya// de bzhin nyams kyi snying po ste// dbang bskur bas ni rang gi rgyu// bzhi yi 'bras bu phye ba yin// sngags kyis chos ni
482a3(tsha): byed 'gyur la// rig pa'ang chos kyi phyag rgyas so// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po drug/ gtsug tor zhes ni rnam par grags// rdzu 'phrul chen po longs spyod bzhi//
482a4(tsha): rig pa'i rgyal mo zhes byar grags// de bzhin rdo rje'i bdag po rnams// 'dod pa thams cad ces byar bshad// bsam gtan rdo rje thams cad la// dbang bskur ba
482a5(tsha): ni rab tu bsngags// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yi su ni// ye shes lus dang lhan cig tu// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// gnyis su med par byed sgrub pa//
482a6(tsha): sngags bshad pa ya rim gyis ni// rig pa'i skyes bu rdo rje can// bdag dang 'dra ba dkyil 'khor bskyed// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// bsnyen pa'i dus su
482a7(tsha): gtsug tor che'i// sbyor ba nyid kyis gzugs su dmigs// nye bar sgrub pa'i dus su ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i gzugs kyi bar// sngags pa cho ga shes
482b1(tsha): pa yis/ sgrub pa rang lha'i sbyor bas bya// sgrub pa chen po'i dus su ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas bdag po'i sku// 'di ni rdo rje can kun dang // rnal 'byor
482b2(tsha): mchog gi gsang ba che// de lta'i rnam phyes shes byas nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// gzhan du bskal pa bye bas ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa rnams
482b3(tsha): kyis kyang // dngos grub mchog ni zhi ba dag/ nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya sgrub par yang dag sbyor// gang yin de ni bsnyen par bshad// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam
482b4(tsha): sbyor ba// nye bar sgrub pa zhes bshad do// yi ge hUM dang phaT ldan pa// skyod pa sgrub pa zhes bshad pa// ngo bo nyid ni zhi bde ba// sgrub pa chen po zhes bshad do// dpal ldan
482b5(tsha): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po'i gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs las byung // de nyid chos rnams chos nyid do// las dang rjes 'thun gang gang gis//
482b6(tsha): rnal 'byor pa yi sbyor ba dmigs// dkyil 'khor de dang de skyed nas// dam tshig mi zad bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// dam tshig dang po bsrung bar bya//
482b7(tsha): de nas gtsug tor dam tshig ni// cho ga ji skad gsung las byung // las dang gang gang rjes mthun pas// rang gi 'khor la bka' yang bsgo// bsgrub bya'i lus gang yin pa
483a1(tsha): la'ang // dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgoms nas su// de yi lus gnas 'khar la la// de yi nyes pa bsgrag pAr bya// de nas de rnams des bcom
483a2(tsha): nas// byung bar gyur pa rnam par bsgos// dngos po rgyun gyis rnam bzhom nas// dngos po kun gyis drangs nas ni// de ni rang gi 'khor lo gcu// de skad gsung
483a3(tsha): ba'i rdzas rnams kyis// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// khro bo'i khyab pa'i sems kyis ni// rkang pas mtshan ma mnan par bya// de nas bka' gnon zla bo ni/
483a4(tsha): sna tshogs tshogs kyis bskor ba rnams// sgrub pa rdo rje can gyis ni// bsgrub pa bsad phyir gtang bar bya// khro bo'i rgyal po des bskor nas// de ni bcing zhing rdeg pa
483a5(tsha): dang // de nas gdungs shing skrag gyur pa// sgrub pa pos ni dgug par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sngags kyis ni// de yi gzugs brnyan la phab nas// sngags pas rdo rje dgra
483a6(tsha): gis ni/ spyi bo mgrin pa snying khu ru// phur bu'i sngags kyis phur bu gdab// yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba kun// sna tshogs yul las byung ba rnams// gzugs de
483a7(tsha): la ni phab nas su// de rnams kyi ni phur bus gdab// de nas sbyor ba thams cad kyis// cho ga ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyi sbyar la sogs//
483b1(tsha): las kyi dbye bas sbyor bar bya// mtshan ma mtshan nas bzlas pa 'am// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg gam// sgom pas gdug pa'i sems can gyis//
483b2(tsha): zos par gyur pa rab tu brtag/ zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis bya// rgyas la dga' ba'i yid kyis te// dbang la chags pa'i yid du bya// khro la gtum pas
483b3(tsha): rab tu sgrub// ces pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyi the tshom
483b4(tsha): thams cad bcad par mdzad nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la bzhugs par rang gi sku dang / gsung dang /
483b5(tsha): thugs kyis dmigs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
483b6(tsha): gshegs pa de dag thams cad la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di bstod do// thams cad sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad gsung la phyag 'tshal 'dud// thams cad
483b7(tsha): thugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// sku gsung thugs ni thob 'gyur bas// sems
484a1(tsha): tsun sangs rgyas mi mnyam mnyam// bsgrub bya su yi sgrub po gang // sgrub pa'i dbang po bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad gsod pa yis/
484a2(tsha): ji ltar sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// gal te gos 'gyur 'bras bu gang // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems
484a3(tsha): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// bdag nyid chen po legs so legs// gsu
484a4(tsha): dbyangs chen po legs so legs// mchod pa chen po legs so legs// slob dpon byang chub rdo rje can// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ dngos
484a5(tsha): rnams thams cad sgyu ma bzhin// skyed dang sdud par mdzad pa'o// des na de yi sdig mi 'gyur// bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin no// gang la sdig dang bsod
484a6(tsha): nams med// don byang chub yin par gsungs// mgon po de yi slu ba yi// lus can thams cad 'jig mdzad kyang // ngan 'gror skye ba mi 'gyur zhing // byang chub
484a7(tsha): kyang ni rnyed mi dka'// sngon ni mi zad las byas pas// gal te dmyal ba rnams su ni// skye bo skye 'gyur de rnams kyis// dmyal ba rnams kyi 'bras bu che//
484b1(tsha): byang chub rdo rjes bsgrub bya 'di// ye shes kyi ni rgyas btab pas// sems can rnams la sbyor ba des// mchog tu phan gdags shes par bya// tshar gcod pa/
484b2(tsha): dang rjes gzung las// bdag nyid chen po de yis bya// sgrub pa chen po'i mthar thug par// byas nas las rnams brtsam par bya// de nas bya
484b3(tsha): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams rdo rje can thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i tshul gyi chos thos pas/ dga' zhi ba rab tu dga' la mgu ba'i yid kyis
484b4(tsha): legs so zhes bya ba gsol te// mgon po chen po legs so legs// thub pa chen po legs so legs// chos rnams chen po legs so legs// thugs rje/
484b5(tsha): chen po legs so legs// e ma ho kun tu bzang po yi// thugs rje chen po dri ma med// gdug pa'i mi bzad las kyis kyang // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bu stsol//
484b6(tsha): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de lta bas
484b7(tsha): na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya zhing / skrag par mi bya/ dngang bar mi bya'o//
485a1(tsha): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub rdo rje las byung ba// zhe sdang rdo rje che la sogs// sngags kyi rgyun ni bsdus pa dag/ yongs su spang bar mi bya'o//
485a2(tsha): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'dis
485a3(tsha): mngon par bstod do// dus gsum rdo rje'i thugs yin srid dang thar gyur gang // zhi zhing sgrib med nam mkha' dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas rnams rgyas byang chub
485a4(tsha): dbang phyug rdo rje can// de la lus ngag yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam par shes dang skye mched drug
485a5(tsha): dang dbang po drug/ sa chu me dang rlung dang nam mkha' thams cad ni// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// gti mug nyes pa 'dod chags rdo rje chos bcas gang //
485a6(tsha): rig pa'i sbyor ba las byung rtag tu rab 'bral bar// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' bas mos pa'i dngos gyur pa// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag 'tshal lo// spro dang dga' dang
485a7(tsha): rnam pa de bzhin mi 'gyur dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rang bzhin sems su rjes rtogs chos// rmongs dang zhe sdang 'dod chags sgrib pa rdo rje ste// byang chub sems 'dra rgya chen de la phyag
485b1(tsha): 'tshal lo// gang zhig thog med dngos po rnam dag 'di bsgom pa// thabs dang shes rab las byung spros dang rnam par bral// gsang ba'i dbang bskur brtul zhugs dam tshig sbyor ba
485b2(tsha): dag/ byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig dngos grub mchog gi thabs ni 'di bsgom zhing // bsnyen pa'i cho ga nye bar sgrub dang sgrub pa dang // sgrub pa chen pos blo ma
485b3(tsha): 'gyur ba'i sgrub dbang po// byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig thun bzhi'i rdo rje dag ni sgrub byed pa// mi snang la sogs sna tshogs mchog dang dman grub cing // bla ma'i
485b4(tsha): drin gyis 'di ni ma nor lam rtogs pa// byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig rab gsang 'dus pa'i rgyud 'di nyan pa dang // 'don par byed dang klog pa dang ni sems pa
485b5(tsha): dang / mchod par byed pa dang ni 'dri'am 'drir 'jug pa// byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang du zhi sogs las tshogs shin tu brtags pa yis// 'khrul
485b6(tsha): 'khor sngags kyi cho ga de bzhin rgyas 'debs pa'i// bsgrub bya 'di dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang po ni// byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba na de la rtag phyag 'tshal// gang gis gcas
485b7(tsha): sgrub pa po mthong reg pa dang // legs par dran dang ming tsam nges par thos pa dang // dang bar byed cing phyogs gcig tsam zhig 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub rdo rje 'dra ba lta de la
486a1(tsha): rtag phyag 'tshal// bstod pa'i tshig ni zhi ba 'dis// 'dren pa kun la bstod pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod chen la//
486a2(tsha): mgon po de dag rjes yi rang // 'dus pa gsang ba las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rgyud kun bdag po'i dbang po yis// rgyud
486a3(tsha): 'di legs par gsungs pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis de skad ces gsungs
486a4(tsha): nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rang
486a5(tsha): gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje la dmigs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
486a6(tsha): kyi gsang ba chen po gsang ba 'dus pa las/ gsang ba thams cad rton pa rdo rje'i ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// /
486a7(tsha): rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+ya shra d+ha ka ra tha ra ma dang / zhu chen gyi mo tso ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa/
